U ku nguut _ nengllugute t _ , _ siv un gh i _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ tagi kau uq _ D av i d -em _ neng ll ug ut ang aneng _ . _ David _ A b r a h am -en ku neng _ pi u uq _ .
abraham _ ata ke a _ I s aa c -em _ , _ isaac _ ata ke a _ J a c o b -em _ , _ Jacob _ ata ke aat _ J u d a h - n kut _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ,
Judah _ ata ke ak _ P er e z -en kuk _ , _ Z er a h - n kuk _ ( _ naange ak _ Tam a r _ ) _ , _ perez _ ata ke a _ H e z r o n -em _ , _ hezron _ ata ke a _ R am -em _ ,
ram _ ata ke a _ A m min a d a b -em _ , _ amminadab _ ata ke a _ N a h s h o n -em _ , _ nahshon _ ata ke a _ S al m o n -em _ ,
salmon _ ata ke a _ B o a z -em _ , _ ( _ B o a z -em _ naa ke a _ rahab _ ) _ . _ Boaz _ ata ke a _ O b e d -em _ , _ ( _ O b e d -em _ naa ke a _ R ut h _ ) _ , _ Obed _ ata ke a _ Jes s e- m _ ,
Jes s e _ ata ke a _ umiileg m _ D av i d -em _ . _ David _ ata ke a _ S o l o m o n -em _ . _ ( _ S o l o m o n -em _ naa ke a _ U r i a h - m _ n ul igh q es aq anga _ . _ )
solomon _ ata ke a _ R e h o b o am -em _ , _ rehoboam _ ata ke a _ A b i j a h - m _ , _ abijah _ ata ke a _ A s a- m _ ,
a sa _ ata ke a _ J e h o s h ap h at -em _ , _ Jehoshaphat _ ata ke a _ J o r am -em _ , _ Joram _ ata ke a _ U z z i a h - m _ .
U z z i a h _ ata ke a _ J o t h am -em _ , _ Jotham _ ata ke a _ A h a z -em _ , _ ahaz _ ata ke a _ H e z ek i a h - m _ ,
H e z ek i a h _ ata ke a _ M an as s e h - m _ , _ manasseh _ ata ke a _ A m o s -em _ , _ amos _ ata ke a _ J o si a h - m _ .
J o si a h _ ata ke aat _ , _ J e c h o n i a h - n kut _ ang leg ut ku llgh h iit _ allgegh kau ut _ tamaani _ J e w s - et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te aqe yatki _ B a b y l o n - mun _ .
kingu aneng _ aglagh te llghite a _ B a b y l o n - mun _ , _ J e c h o n i a h _ ata ke a _ S h e al t i el -em _ , _ S h e al t i e l _ ata ke a _ Z er u b b a b el -em _ ,
zerubbabel _ ata ke a _ A b i u d -em _ , _ A b i u d _ ata ke a _ El i ak im -em _ , _ El i ak i m _ ata ke a _ A z o r -em _ ,
azor _ ata ke a _ Z a d o k -em _ , _ zadok _ ata ke a _ A c h im -em _ , _ achim _ ata ke a _ El i u d -em _ ,
El i u d _ ata ke a _ El e a z ar -em _ , _ El e a z a r _ ata ke a _ M at t h an -em _ , _ matthan _ ata ke a _ J a c o b -em _ ,
Jacob _ ata ke a _ J o s ep h -em _ . _ Joseph _ ugu ikagh a _ M ar y - m _ . _ mary _ naa ke a _ Jesus-em _ . _ Jesus _ M es si a h - ngu uq _ .
S iv un gh i _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ whatete ut _ : _ 1 4 - ng uk aag ut _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ A b r a h am - e meng _ D av i d - mun _ . _ 1 4 - ng uk aag ut lu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ D av i d - meng _ kenlanga _ J e w s - et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te llegh itnun _ B a b y l o n - mun _ . _ taagken _ B a b y l o n - mun _ aglagh te llegh itneng _ 1 4 - ng uk aag ut lu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ kenlanga _ Christ- am _ allgellegh anun _ .
Jesus _ Christ- a _ allgegh kau uq _ whaten _ : _ naange a _ mary _ aa ng Ê¼ gh ut ng w aaq aq _ J o s ep h - mun _ , _ iwernga _ nengughte te llghite lukek _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ quminge stekagh a _ .
ugi kaghqagh an _ J o s ep h -em _ ken qig negh ut min eng _ kay ngu s aa k negh meng _ mary _ pi luku _ , _ aksaqe luku _ pegge naqekagh a _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ qavangugh kun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Joseph _ , _ D av i d -em _ k ing un gha _ , _ alinge gpenang _ n ul igh q igu _ mary _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aqsa nge stekaqe a _ .
ighnegh nge naqngu uq _ ; _ atigh naken _ Jesus - meng _ qayughllak _ ellmi _ yug ni _ yug ul iyagh q aq ii _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ "
qamagte luni _ tawaten _ aneghtekau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ Atan ghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ ,
" _ aghnagh aq _ yug m _ atuqe llghite kanga _ quminge luni _ , _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ ategh kete yaghqaqe a _ E m m an u e l _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ whang kun n il nguq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph _ taghtugh luni _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ mary _ n ul igh q egk aa _ ,
iwernga _ atuqe ma ite kanga _ kenlanga _ ighnegh nge llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ J o s ep h -em _ Jesus - meng _ ata iqe a _ .
Jesus _ allgegh aqngan _ B et h l e h em - e mi _ J u d e a- m el ngugh mi _ , _ herod _ umiileg u lghii _ . _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ a siv agh meng _ kaate tke aat _ J er us al em - e mun _ .
A ap qugh w aaq at _ , _ " _ naagu _ taghnughhagh _ allgegh lghii _ umiileg at _ J e w s - et _ ? _ ighaleqetaagh a _ esgh aam aagh put _ asivagh mete luku _ enkaam _ m an ig ugh yagh tugh aq agh put _ . _ "
umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ nagaqugh luku _ teggellghiigh ghllagkagh _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh lu teng llu _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ maligte te luteng _ .
T ag si q l igh tegh luki _ qamagte luki _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ nani _ Christ- a _ allgegh yaghqau a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ B et h l e h em - e mi _ J u d e a- m el ngugh mi _ . _ U uk nal iq is te m _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ :
' _ elpek _ Bethlehem _ , _ J u d a h - m el nguq _ , _ iglegh ut is te y ag g iit neng _ J u d a h - m _ uk av an te llegh pig aanghi tu ten _ , _ qayughllak _ el pen eng _ tagi naqngu uq _ igleghte te i sta _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqagh _ yug mneng _ I s r a el - egh m ii neng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ H er o d -em _ aksaqe luku _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ , _ liigike na luku _ qavngaq _ aliigh yuwhaagh kau ta a _ ighaleqetaagh _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ B et h l e h em - e mun _ aghulaqe lusi _ elngaatall _ ivagh teggu _ taghnughhagh _ . _ naalke gkufsigu _ ungipaate yaghtugh nakefsinga _ , _ whanga llu _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ umiileg m _ pi y is t eng _ igleghtekagh t _ . _ esghagh laataghkagh at _ ataasigh _ taana _ ighaleqetaagh _ asivagh mete luku _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ . _ maligtekagh at _ kenlanga _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ taghnughhagh m _ ne an _ qule ani _ .
itegh luteng _ mangteghagh mun _ esghaghkagh at _ taghnughhagh _ , _ naange a llu _ mary _ . _ segesqughte uute luteng _ manigugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ aqeftaghaagh teng _ qelpeghte luki _ tunqugh qu aat _ tunute yameng _ : _ g o l d - meng _ , _ f r an k in c en s e- meng _ , _ m y r r h - meng _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ qavangugh kun _ yitekagh i _ H er o d - mun _ uteghnigh fqiita _ pi s qell uki _ enkaam _ aglaghkagh t _ nuna meggnun _ alla tgun _ tume tgun _ .
ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ Joseph _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ anag te kek _ E g y p t- mun _ . _ Tam aan llegh h aten _ uteghnigh sqe lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ qayughllak _ H er o d -em _ ivagh ste naqe a _ taghnughhagh _ tuqute ste na luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ un ug mi _ tawani _ J o s ep h -em _ makete luni _ aghulaqe te gkakek _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ E g y p t- mun _ .
Tam aan tek at _ kenlanga _ H er o d -em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ apeghiigh kau uq _ Atan ghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ , _ " _ tuqlugh kaqe aqa _ ighnegh ka _ tagi sqellug qu _ E g y p t- meng _ . _ "
H er o d -em _ liigike yamigu _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag nun _ puughte ma ni luni _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ . _ taagken _ pi ll u w agh tet _ kayagtekagh i _ B et h l e h em - e mun _ , _ u v it ang an un llu _ tuqu q ii s qell uki _ qamagte luki _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh neng _ , _ maalghug gnun _ ayumiqulleghtutka lghii nun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaakut _ taghnughhagh t _ nakmike kaqe ai _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh m _ allgellegh aneng _ maalghug ughte lghiik _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ apegh llegh itni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh kun _ u uk nal iq is te m _ J er em i a h - am _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiighkagh _ :
" _ ramah- mi _ nagaqugh qu aat _ legh agh llag aat aq _ . _ R a c h el - ngu f tuq _ qiya lghii _ avaqutagh minun _ , _ repall _ il u tugh sagh yaghq aagh h aag pen ani _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ "
J o s ep h -en kut _ E g y p t- m ell uki _ herod _ tuqukagh _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vikekagh a _ Joseph _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ uteghnigh te kek _ israel- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqute i naqe yagh lghiit _ taghnughhagh meng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ . _ "
enkaam _ J o s ep h -em _ makete luni _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ aglagh te gkakek _ israel- mun _ .
iwernga _ J o s ep h -em _ nagaqugh luku _ nutaghagh _ umiileg a _ J u d e a- m _ , _ A r c h el a us - ngun il uku _ H er o d -em _ ighnegh a _ , _ alingekagh _ tawavek _ aglagh nghmeng _ . _ qavangugh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh tke a _ Joseph _ J u d e a- te f q aan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ enkaam _ nazareth- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ G al il e e- m el ngugh mun _ . _ Tam aan tek at _ u uk nal iq is tet _ whaten _ pi llgh at _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ , _ " _ M es si a h _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii ngu yaghq aag uq _ . _ "
Taa k w an ing ani _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ aglagh luni _ kilgaa anun _ J u d e a- m _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ ungip aq i meng _ .
whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ A v utegh qell usi _ taaqe tek _ seghlegh q en negh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
J o h n - ngu uq _ u uk nal iq is te m _ I s a i a h - am _ akuzi tkekagh a _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ kilgaa ni _ kina _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ yataaghqe teggu _ Atan ghem _ tume kaghqagh a _ , _ taklaghrukegte yagh teggu _ igleghavigkagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
J o h n -em _ aatkagh i _ c am el -em _ melqugh aneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ neq ek luni _ l o c us t- m eng llu _ h o ne y - m eng llu _ .
yug t _ aglagh uute tke aat _ ellnga nun _ J er us al em - em eng llu _ J u d e a- m eng llu _ u v it ang an eng llu _ kiiw m _ J o r d an -em _ .
seghleghqe lleg teng _ qayvighqe nghatki _ , _ J o h n -em _ p aap taa y aaq egk angi _ J o r d an - eg ni _ .
J o h n -em _ esghagh luki _ P h a ris e es - el gh u te t lu _ S a d d u c e es - el gh u te t lu _ tagi lghiit _ ellmi nun _ p aap taa y es qell uteng _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ kitum _ anag sqe isi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleghqagh aneng _ kaate naqe lghii meng _ ?
sivuke lusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ip a pi gh q i teg gu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ avuteghqe llegh i _ .
Wh at en Ê¼ ng am _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ qayughllak _ kingunegh ke ainkut _ A b r a h am -em _ . _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ kingunegh ngllagh te nayagh aa _ maaken _ uyghag neng _ !
whaa _ maaten _ q al q al im ay aq leg g iin agh ll uteng _ ayuqe ut _ uqfig t _ akugh itgun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ uqfig t _ pinigh lghii meng _ piite ste i nghite ngugh t _ kepe luki _ , _ ken gh eg nun _ miluute yaghqaa ut _ .
megh kun _ p aap taa y egh ii qu nga _ av utegh k egk anun _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ . _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh m _ kingu mneng _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng llu _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ kenegh meng llu _ . _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ whanga mneng _ , _ repall _ talwa _ kameg kek _ tugumiiqepagningite agka _ .
taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ nan qig t iy aq leg g iin aag uq _ . _ aafte yaghqaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ yug t _ seghlegh neng _ , _ katam _ pii tes iigh agh te m _ pekete ta mineng _ malliigh llegh atun _ g r a in - et _ . _ kagpag luki _ g r a in - et _ mallagh _ tamaa na _ miluute yaghqaqe a _ qaame yaghqaa nghite ngugh gnun _ ken gh eg nun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ galilee- meng _ tagikagh _ J o r d an - eg nun _ , _ J o h n - mun _ p aap taa y es qell uni _ .
iwernga _ J o h n -em _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga _ elpek _ p aap taa y e yaghq aq sagh agh pe nga _ . _ sangavek _ whanga mnun _ tagi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ legan _ sa aqe ziin _ p aap taa y e nga _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kumtung _ apegh iigh lleq agh p un g _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ " _ enkaam _ J o h n -em _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
Jesus _ p aap taa y e y at ni _ megh meng _ aanekagh _ . _ taagken _ qilag _ qelpegh luni _ esghagh kakek _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ uki lghiik _ d o v e- e tun _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ nalugkagh k _ .
taagken _ me _ qilag meng _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ U n ang u uq _ piniqekagh ghllag ka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghulaqe tke a _ Jesus _ kilgaa nun _ , _ tughneghagh mun _ seghleghqe ste naqutke sqellug qu _ .
4 0 _ aghneq _ , _ 4 0 _ unuk _ Jesus _ negh ma ite ngughk _ ; _ taagken _ taakut _ aghnegh t _ kingu itneng _ iyataghkagh _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ neqe ughte sqe ki _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ kiyaghte naanghite uq _ neqe inagh ghhagh kun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta akun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ aglagh tke a _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ . _ tawani _ T em p l e- m _ uusqagh llegh akun _ nekeve ste luku _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ qetgegh i _ tesamavek _ ; _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ yaquleg minun _ p aq n a sigh tes agh tugh lleq aaten _ ; _ iigge meggneng _ nuqnegh kete lleqe aaten _ luuraq _ itegagh ten _ uy ghagh qu un n ay uk ata _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten llu _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ nanghiiqu gpenaan _ sa sqellug qu _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke nghite ka aneng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ mayugh te luku _ u us q a pig llegh ii mun _ naayghagh mun _ keleg tke ai _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ nuna m _ , _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag i llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luki _ maakut _ tuune lleqe anka _ elpenun _ , _ segesqughte luten _ manigugh yagh kuvnga _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ ! _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ manigugh yaghqaqe an _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ , _ ellng in aag uq lu _ qepghagh te yaghqagh n _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ unite yagu _ Jesus _ , _ yaquleg t _ aflengake yaghtugh qu aat _ .
Jesus-em _ nagaqugh luku _ John _ anusimingllaghvig mete ni luku _ , _ galilee- mun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
nazareth- meng _ aglaghkagh _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ tamaa uute na luni _ . _ C ap er n a u m _ esne anite uq _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ , _ nuna mi _ Z e b ul un -en kuk _ N ap h tal i - n kuk _ k ing un ghi ta _ kiyaghfig itni _ .
Jesus-em _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ u uk nal iq is te m _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ . _ Q av ng ar ug llak _ I s a i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna gkeni _ Z e b ul un -en kuk _ N ap h tal i - n kuk _ . _ taake uk _ nuna k _ naayvagh m _ tu ng ang an il ngu uk _ , _ nalla ani _ kiiw m _ J o r d an -em _ , _ galilee- mete ngugh mi _ G en t il e- et _ kiyaghfig itni _ !
I s a i a h - m _ pi kaqe kangi _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ seghleghqe llegh m _ m am legh q es te llgh ani _ esghaate yaghqaa ut _ nighug ghllag meng _ . _ alinge llghite a _ tuqu meng _ llangaqa _ nuna at _ saape nga lghii _ taghneghagh nge te llegh aneng _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ aghtaghagh te aqe ai _ . _ "
galilee- mun _ uteghnigh llegh mineng _ kenle ke luku _ Jesus-em _ piinlegh iqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleg ni _ , _ " _ A v utegh qell usi _ seghlegh q en nan igh tek _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esne ani _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ , _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ S im o n -en ku ngu f tu k _ ( _ ategh an _ all gha _ peter _ ) _ , _ A n d r e w - n kuk _ . _ iqalliniigh lghiik _ negaghpag ek _ miluute aqe luku _ naayvagh mun _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amtek _ iq all in iigh teng ugh tes qell u tek _ yug neng _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
T aag an iq aagh aq _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e- m _ . _ angyagh meggni _ ata ke te lghiit _ negaghpag teng _ ilaaghtugh aqe ait _ . _ Jesus-em _ tuqlugh kakek _ .
Taw an ing in aq _ angyagh tek _ unitekagh ak _ ata ek llu _ enkaam _ Jesus _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus _ igleghakagh _ tea- ma anun _ galilee- mi _ , _ s y nag o gu e- ng it ni _ apeghtugh i aqe luni _ . _ nani _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ , _ naallghute qughkagh _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
ungipagh _ mingite kau lghii _ naallghute qugh llegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ S y r i a- mi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ellnga nun _ qamagte luki _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ all aagh h iin aagh neng _ aqnighnegh leg t _ , _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh leg t _ , _ sayugpagtagh kayug t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ . _ qamagte luki _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii m _ maligtekagh at _ galilee- meng _ , _ D e c ap o l is - meng _ , _ J er us al em - e meng _ , _ J u d e a- meng _ , _ J o r d an - em llu _ inglu aneng _ t aag eg ken _ .
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligte te lghiit _ , _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ . _ M al ig s aagh te mi _ taku laghate te yatni _ ,
apeghtugh ikagh _ :
" _ tamaakut _ liisimake i lghiit _ ak l uk ing all egh meg g neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
tamaakut _ qivghu lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ qu s ev eg ng alghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe a _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe i yu pigte lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe ai _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
tamaakut _ nangllegtagh lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ umyugaqegtagh t _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i kayug t _ yug neng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ni yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ amyuutke lleg nge lghiit _ atuqe te meggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ qaatke te nga te meggneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
" _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yug t _ segh l equ uq ang i si _ , _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ iqlengiqe tke kangisi _ maligte yaaghte u te gpesineng _ whanga mnun _ .
elngaatall _ quya ghllag tek _ qayughllak _ qilag mi _ pama _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh leg ghllag u usi _ . _ amenqun _ , _ neghigh luku _ u uk nal iq is tet _ amyuutkekagh it _ katam _ maaten _ am y u utk ell ghi s tun _ elpek si _ .
" _ taghyugh stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ iwernga _ taghyugh _ taghyughni igh u uute kuni _ , _ alla _ naten _ taghyughni ighsaghqagh u nghite uq _ . _ atugh u nanigh lleqe uq _ sa mun _ alngunak _ enkaam _ egte lleqe uq _ taagken _ yug t _ tu t m aa s gh aq ell eq aat _ . _ "
" _ nighug stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ negh ghllag _ qemi m _ qaye anite ngughk _ talugh nga yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kumaghllug kek _ sagnegh mun _ asi igh te naanghite ak _ . _ itupill _ qu ul v aq un _ lli lleqe ak _ nighug u te sqellug kek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ il ung an il ngugh nun _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ nighug i _ kuukgute steggu _ yug nun _ esghigh sqellug qu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe nakangat _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ taaqesaghtugh u ni luki _ atuqe nghmeng _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ tagi u nga _ apeghtugh te kete na luki _ ipa _ sa meng _ pi sigh pig aat angi _ .
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ qilag nkuk _ nuna nkuk _ ken l et gh uu te llgh egk en un _ kenlanga _ , _ talwa _ s as qu v eg aghh aq _ allangughte naanghite uq _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ kenlanga _ qamagte luteng _ L iiligh tuus an il nguut _ apeghiigh llegh itnun _ .
En kaa ng am _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ ataasigh _ liilightuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke gkunigu llu _ yug nun _ qaatke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ uk al igh pig aan il uku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ N aq am en r aq _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ apeghtugh kumiki llu _ ila i _ yug t _ q aatk es qell uki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ aange yaghqaa ni luku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ , _ wetku qun _ q aat ku t ng aagh atagh aq u f si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ P h a ris e es -en eng llu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ yugtagh gpenasi _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yugtagh lghii _ nan qig saq leg u uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi yagute kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ nanqigtivig mun _ ag lagh saq leg u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ nallu ghllag _ ' _ , _ ag ghi s t en un _ ag lagh saq leg u uq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ sasii nghite ni kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ ag lagh saq leg u uq _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ hell- mun _ .
En kaa ng am _ aghqefig gni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune i naqe ma luten _ tunusagh gpeneng _ , _ neqagh u uute kuvgu _ s ug ag sim an il uku _ yug lgute n _ ,
tunute yan _ unite luku _ ilaliigh yaghtugh naken _ . _ taagken _ tagi luten _ tunute yan _ tuun ak en _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ kitum _ avutke ma kangaten _ seghletun _ pi ma ni luni _ , _ ilaliigh aghte naken _ aglagh te ma luten _ nanqigtivig mun _ , _ luuraq _ av utk is teg p ek _ tuun ay uk ang aten _ nan qig t is te mun _ . _ taagken _ nan qig t is te m _ k el eng ak is te mun _ anusimingllagh ste na yu kangaten _ .
ipa _ pi amken _ , _ an u sim ing ll agh te simak ang aten _ aan aanghi tu ten _ kenlanga _ nan qig t is te m _ llivike sqe llegh a _ qamagte luku _ llivike gkuvgu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ gelgaghniigh gpenasi _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ qiliigh ke gkunigu _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh u uq _ qamagun _ ilu mikun _ .
enkaam _ aghenqignegh m _ iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh aneng _ .
aghenqignegh m _ iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ pi lleghqagh aneng _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ , _ igagh ngllagh te nakanga _ kelgute sighqagh meng _ pegte ma ni luku _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ wetku qun _ gelgaghniigh kan _ . _ gelgaghniigh nghite ghngaan _ pegtekunigu _ , _ g el gh aghn iigh tes l eq aa _ alla neng _ yug meng _ ugiigh kan _ . _ kitum _ n ul igh k eg kum igu _ , _ taana _ yuug _ ellnga llu _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i llu _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ akequsagh n _ avelghagh gpenaan _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh mun _ akequsagh n _ atuqe aqe gu _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ akeqe i gpenang _ atuqe luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ akeqe i gpenang _ qilag kun _ qayughllak _ aqumutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh minun _ ,
nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ qayughllak _ itegagh iitagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ nalighmeng _ J er us al em - kun _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag ke a _ U m iil eg pag llag em _ .
akeqe i gpenang llu _ naasqugh gpegun _ qayughllak _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ nuyagh _ qategh snaanghite an _ nalighmeng _ tagnegh snaanghite an _ .
yeghlegi _ legan _ ' _ aa ng Ê¼ gh h aa si _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ ' _ nak aagh h aa si _ ' _ . _ sa u aat _ ilate kufsiki _ taa ku g nun _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u ut _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kina _ iye igh kuvgu _ elpek llu _ iye igh yaghqaa uten _ . _ kitum _ ggute a _ m ugh ug agh te ku v gu _ elpek llu _ ggute n _ m ugh ug agh s aghq aag uq _ ' _ .
" _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ seghletun _ pi s te si _ akite gpenaki _ . _ kitum _ qasaghtegkangaten _ ullungag gpegun _ inglu a llu _ tuun ak en _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ aglagh u uute kangaten _ nan qig t is te mun _ , _ g g a teg ken _ ellmi _ pi na lukek _ qaasligh gken llu _ tuun ak eg ken _ ellnga nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ q el gh us k ag u _ akmagtagh ni _ igleghte te sqellug qu _ ataasigh mun _ mile- mun _ , _ alla _ ataasigh _ mile- a _ ilate naken _ .
kitum _ sa meng _ tungsigh vike kangaten _ , _ tuun ak en _ . _ kitum _ sa meng _ navghagh vike kangaten _ , _ n av ghi n nak en _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ilakumtaagh si _ , _ ugumi ke luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ , _ yughagh te kaqe teki llu _ am y u utk is te si _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quy as tes qell uki _ ' _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aisi _ avaqutagh qu tsi _ ata gpesinun _ q ilag m el ngugh mun _ . _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ taw at egh ll u w aaq _ pi aqe a _ . _ siqinegh ni _ piite sta qaa _ seghlegh nun llu _ pinigh lghii nun llu _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ qaatke te kayug nun llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ak il egh tugh lleq is ii - i _ pin iq is teng in aghh a si _ piniqe gkufsiki _ ? _ talwa _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is tet _ piniqe aqe ait _ pin iq is te t eng _ .
enkaam _ il aku m t aghh iin a si _ quyake aatagh kufsiki _ , _ naten _ alla u lleqe tsi _ ila itneng _ yug t _ ? _ talwa _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya kaqe ait _ ilakumtaagh teng _ !
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke u ta aneng _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ pinigh tek _ taw at egh pig aq _ ata gpesi _ pinigh llegh atun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ es ghagh saq eg pen ak i _ . _ E s ghagh saq eg ku f si k i _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ akileghtugh naanghite aisi _ .
" _ enkaam _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenang _ . _ qalghightagh ste i kayugu ut _ tuune i vagilgameng _ es ghii s qell uteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ s y nag o gu e- n illu _ tume ni llu _ us uq es qell uteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ ak il egh tuus ang waagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ,
kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sqellug qu _ tuune i i llegh n _ . _ ata gpek _ esghapag aqe aaten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ . _ "
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh yuneghtu ut _ nekevghagh meng _ s y nag o gu e- n illu _ tume ni llu _ es ghii s qell uteng _ yug nun _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ ak il egh tuus ang waagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yughagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ itegh luten _ ne gpenun _ umeg te luten _ yughagh aqe i _ ata gpenun _ al iin negh il g ugh mun _ . _ ata gpek _ liisimake a _ aksaqe luku _ s all gh en _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ m an ig uu si g al ngugh es tun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh negh meggni _ uteghpagtagh aqe ait _ akuzite t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ sumegh meggni _ akuzillegh ghllag megteggun _ kiimsigh lleqe ni luki _ yughagh lleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ .
ellngistun _ ayuqe gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ ak l uk egk agh si _ , _ talwa _ aapte ste gpenasi _ .
" _ enkaam _ whaten _ yughagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ pamani _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ ategh n _ qu ul v all eng l i _ .
yughagh ukut _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ tagi sqellug qu _ , _ piyuke llegh n llu _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ katam _ q ilag m el ngugh es tun _ .
N egh yaghq al i te q egh t i kut _ aghneghmi _ whani _ .
seghevute aghte ki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ seghevute ma luki _ seghletun _ pi s te put _ .
nanghiiqu lleg nge ste gpenaamta _ , _ iwernga _ yugu likut _ taagken _ seghlegh meng _ . _ ataneghpag u llegh _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eq _ , _ n igh ugh qell eq _ , _ elpek _ pi katen _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ . _ '
" _ seghevute kufsiki _ seghletun _ pi s te si _ , _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ seghletun _ pi s te si _ , _ ata gpesi _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
" _ F as t- en egh pesi ni _ iil q es ug n igh q eg pen a si _ piniiyugnegh stun _ . _ aghmig igate ut _ , _ mesuuna igate ut _ lii g ik es qell uteng _ f as t- eng un il uteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ ak il egh tuus ang waagh luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
F as t- en egh pen i _ aghmig aqe i llu _ mesuuna aqe i llu _ ,
ila gpenun _ nalluke sqellug qu _ f as t- ell gh en _ . _ iwernga _ ata gpek _ aliite nghite ngugh m _ liisimake a _ sa aqe uten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ nuna mi _ whani _ kagpag gpenasi _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ kingug m llu _ anaghtaa llegh m llu _ naafqe lleqe ai _ , _ teg leg n iigh te t lu _ naafqii luteng _ tegleg lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qilag mi _ kagpag i tek _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ m o t h - ng i tuq _ , _ an agh taa ng i tuq _ naafqii yaghqagh meng _ , _ teg legh n iigh teng i tuq lu _ naafqii luteng _ teg leg ugh yaghq ameng _ .
S um egh tagh aat ku mang in agh lleq agh si _ aklungi gpesinun _ kagpag vig i _ .
" _ iye k _ kenegh lghutagh stun _ ayuqe uk _ yugusigh mun _ . _ iiskegtekuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ nighug ghllag u lleqe uq _ ,
iwernga _ iyellug mete kuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ mamleg ghllagu lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ nighug _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ mamleg u kuni _ , _ elngaatall _ mamleg pigte uq _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ qepghagh te naanghite ak _ maalghug _ umiileg k _ . _ maalghug gneng _ umiileg lgu kuni _ ugumi ke lleqe a _ ataasigh _ , _ piniqe lleqe a _ ila a _ . _ qaatke te nga lleqe uq _ ataasigh mun _ , _ pite kete naanghite a _ ila a _ . _ enkaam _ pin iq n aanghi tagh si _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe ma luku _ mat- ni _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ ung v all egh si _ , _ sa meng _ neghe lleghqagh i _ , _ meghe lleghqagh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ aate lleghqagh i _ . _ sumeghtaghagh qagh tek qun _ , _ unguvallegh _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ neqe meng _ , _ yugusigh llu _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ aatkagh neng _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh igate ut _ , _ unatagh igate ut _ , _ kagpag i igate ut _ . _ naqamllu _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ neghqe aqe ai _ ! _ elpek si _ meg nun agh atagh an ghi t si i _ qawaag neng _ ?
naligh gpesi _ nulqaviigh te kete luku _ unguvallegh ni _ taa ku gh lleq ag u u _ ?
" _ sangan _ n ul q av iigh taq et si _ aate yaghqagh meng _ ? _ esghaqagh teki qun _ piitesighagh at _ piite llegh it _ , _ qepghagh igate ut _ talwa _ aatkagh ngllagh igate ut _ ell meg g neng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ talwa _ solomon _ aklungi ghllag mini _ aate igate uq _ pii te si ghagh es tun _ pinightutka lghii meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh aqe ai _ vegaagh t _ , _ iwernga _ aga _ unaami _ quug ke aqe ait _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh kayugu kaki _ v egh aag et _ , _ aasi ightugh aghagh naanghite i sagh i _ elpek si _ ? _ U g peq i llegh q es taa pig ut si _ !
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ n ul q av iigh teg pen a si _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa meng _ negh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ megh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ aate naqe sta _ ? _ '
G en t il e- et _ tamaa na _ nulqaviigh te kaqe aat _ . _ ata gpesi _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ liisimake ai _ qamagte luki _ ak l uk egk a si _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughte stekek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ piyuke llegh a llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ ak l uk egk a si _ .
nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ unaami igh lleghqagh _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami m _ seghleliigh i _ itagnagh yaghqaa ut _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ . _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pikayug u uq _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ ilaagh aghagh gpenaan _ unaami m _ seghleliigh lleghqagh aneng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ nanqigte i gpenasi _ ila gpesineng _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nan qig g negh ill i si _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ taw a teng ng w aaq _ nanqigte i llegh gpesistun _ ila gpesineng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ai llu _ elpesi nun _ ataasigh t _ tamaakut _ pi kasi _ ila gpesinun _ .
sangan _ esghagh zigu _ yug lgute gpek _ iisqughute a _ , _ elpek _ katam _ iisqughute n _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ avelghagh luku _ ?
sa lghii meng _ yug lgute n _ pi zigu _ , _ ' _ entaa- a _ iisqughute igh qagh laken _ ' _ , _ elpek _ paninang _ iisqughute lgu luten _ unaghsigh ghllag meng _ ?
uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ sivuke luku _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ iye gpeneng _ nusug luku _ elngaatall _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ esghagh luku _ yug lgute n _ iisqughute igh naken _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L eg as iigh w agh t en un _ apeghtuusagh ke gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ qikmigh stun llu _ ku r ug agh es tun llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghiit _ tuune gpenaki _ qikmigh nun _ luuraq _ sughug na yu kangisi _ . _ akituqagh t _ sungagh t _ miluute gpenaki _ ku r ug agh nun _ , _ luuraq _ tu t m aa s gh aq n ay uk at k i _ .
" _ aapte tek _ , _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ ; _ ivagh i tek _ , _ naalkute lleqe usi _ ; _ tenglugtugh tek _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe aisi _ .
qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ aapte lghii _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ ivagh i lghii _ , _ naalkute yaghqaa uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ tenglugtugh lghii _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe a _ .
kitum _ yug m _ ighnegh ni _ tungsigh kan _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ uyghag meng _ ?
nalighmeng _ tungsigh kan _ iqallug meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ nemegh yameng _ ?
S egh legh ugh ng aagh p esi _ , _ avaqutagh si _ tuune yaghqaqe asi _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ . _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ tuune i yug aghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ tam aa ku nun _ aap legh h in un _ ellmi nun _ .
" _ enkaam _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pinitun _ pi ste sug kufsi _ , _ elpek si llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ . _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i u ut _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ , _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ itegh tek _ kagpestaaghhagh kun _ amig kun _ . _ amigh k _ hell- mun _ ayuqe lghii _ nuqutu uq _ , _ tume kegte uq llu _ enkaam _ uglagh _ taakwagun _ igleghte aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ amigh k _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ , _ tu um ll ug m e tuq lu _ enkaam _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh m _ naalke aqe ai _ tume t _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ kelenga lusi _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh neng _ . _ taku lleqe aisi _ pen n iigh s ug n igh qell uteng _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
liigike lleqe asi _ nangaghnegh itgun _ liigike llegh gpesistun _ uqfig t _ sa meng _ piite ste i llegh itgun _ . _ sikughllug t _ piite ste i igate ut _ grapes- meng _ nalighmeng _ figs- meng _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi igate ut _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ seghlegh meng _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ , _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
enkaam _ alngunak _ uqfig _ piite ste i nghite ngughk _ pinigh lghii meng _ kepe luni _ kumaghsaghqagh u uq _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawatete llegh itgun _ liigike lleqe asi _ uuknaliqe i ste sighwaagh ta i _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ ila i _ yug m _ whanga mnun _ malig s aagh tek n ii qu t _ enkaam _ pi aqe aatnga _ , _ ' _ atanegh ke amken _ ' _ iwernga _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ Tam aa ku ng in aat _ atuqe i lghiit _ piyuke llegh aneng _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ uglagh m _ pi yaghqaqe aanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ ategh gpegun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ apegh qaghkagh ut _ . _ ategh gpegun _ aag negh squgh ke aqe aput _ tughneghagh t _ uglagh lghii neng _ yug neng _ . _ ategh gpegun _ all aagh ll u wh agh t iigh aat aq aag u kut _ uglagh ghngaan _ ! _ '
iwernga _ whaten _ pi lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ nallukngwaagh amsi _ , _ iqite tek _ whanga mneng _ , _ seghletun _ pi s t en i _ ' _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate lghii _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke gkumiki _ peghqinegh lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ taw all im a _ mangteghagh _ ullegh ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ uyghag kun _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
" _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ , _ nalluqagh tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ qenaaghllug kun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh _ uulegh ke aq _ naa v ng waagh luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ tamaaken _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el igh luni _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug stun _ liilightuusagh meng _ pi gpenani _ .
Jesus _ qemi meng _ ukig yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh a _ .
taagken _ yuug _ , _ l ep r o s y - l ek _ , _ tagi luni _ ellnga nun _ , _ segesqughte vike luku _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ , _ ukmangigh qagh nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tawavek _ saafte luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ ukmangigh u aghten _ ! _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ l ep r o s y - ng iit k aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ naallghute llegh gpeneng _ , _ yeghlegi _ aglagh a _ priest- mun _ esghagh ligu _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ taagken _ aghq er r aagh h aaten _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ ip a pi gh q es qell uku _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ kaate aqe uq llu _ , _ R o m e -em _ um iil waagh an _ taku luku _ kay us ii tagh tes qell uni _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ whang kun ni _ qep ghagh tek a _ , _ uniigh ma uq _ , _ ikfiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naallghute yaghtugh naqe aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ um iil waagh em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ itegh vike yaghqaa lunga _ mangteghagh mnun _ . _ legan _ taw an ll u ten _ naallghute sqe gu _ qep ghagh tek a _ enkaam _ naallghute li _ .
qelegh i kayug meng _ umiileg lgu unga _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ qelegh aqe anka _ pi ll u w agh t en ka _ . _ ataasigh _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ ' _ aga _ aghulaqe lleqe uq _ . _ ila a _ whaten _ pi kumkun _ , _ ' _ tea- ai _ ' _ tagi lleqe uq _ . _ Q ep ghagh tek a _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ una _ pi aghte gu _ ' _ , _ aga _ pi lleqe a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yuke aq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ maligte te lghiit _ ellmi nun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nallagh te igate unga _ k itu meng _ alngunak _ I s r a el - egh m ii meng _ , _ uu tun _ yug tun _ ugpeqe i neghtutka lghii meng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ a siv agh m eng llu _ pakfalla meng llu _ yug lghute t _ tagi laghate te yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ neghe lgusigh lleqe ait _ sivunegh put _ A b r a h am -en kut _ , _ I s aa c -en kut _ , _ J a c o b -en kut _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ataneghpag u llegh mete yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ aanesaghqagh u ut _ mamleg ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ elngaatall _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ av utegh q em _ ang tal ang aneng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ . _ " _ enkaam _ taw an ing in aq _ um iil waagh em _ qep ghagh te nga _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
Jesus _ P e te r -en ku nun _ pi luni _ , _ esgha qaa _ aghnagh _ P e te r -em _ saki a _ qavaghvig mete uq _ puqlegha luni _ .
S aa f saq min igu _ iiggagh kun _ puqlegha nga i tke aq _ , _ aga _ makete luni _ kepsiiqukagh a _ .
I ghi v g agh y ag u _ Jesus - mun _ tagi qugh tke ait _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ enkaam _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh it _ akuzillegh mikun _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ q in u yuget _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ apeghiigh na luku _ u uk nal iq is te m _ I s a i a h - m _ whaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ " _ tugu kaqe ai _ qinuyug lleg put _ , _ iqite kaqe ai _ aqnighnegh put _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ u v it min il nguut _ yug lghute ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe sqekagh i _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ aghvigh na luteng _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh meng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ natmun _ alngunak _ pi kuvek _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kaviigh t _ riigte lgu ut _ , _ qawaag t _ unglute lgu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ingaghte vig ite aqe uq _ . _ "
ila yan _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ iwernga _ sivuke luku _ ata ka _ llivegh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ tamaakut _ maligte te yu nghite ngugh t _ whanga mnun _ tuqu kau ut _ taghneghagh megteggun _ ; _ llivegh litki _ tuqu m as lii t eng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte yan _ malig s aagh teng illu _ u ug llegh aatk at _ .
puglegh llghite a _ k ii ngu ng iigh h aan eng _ esla _ nuuskagllagan _ naafte ghllagkagh _ , _ naayvagh llu _ imaghllug ughte ghllag magh mi _ , _ repall _ angyagh _ im igh aat aqegk aa _ . _ iwernga _ Jesus _ qavaa lghii _ .
M al ig s aagh tet _ taku luku _ tagh tugh te kaa t _ whaten _ pi magh an _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu likut _ ! _ tuqu laghate te naqe ukut _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ U g peq i llegh q es taa pig u usi _ ! _ " _ taagken _ nekeve luni _ ineghtekakek _ an uq allu _ imaghllug t llu _ enkaam _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ N ate l ngu u wa _ yuug _ una _ ? _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ! _ "
Jesus -en kut _ kaate yameng _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ aglaghkagh t _ G a d ar a- gh m iit _ nuna itnun _ . _ taagken _ maalghug _ yug k _ tughneghagh leg k _ il um eg n eg un _ tagi lutek _ llivegh neng _ nallaqagh ak _ Jesus _ . _ suugllug ghllag k _ repall _ kina _ alngunak _ taakwagun _ tume kun _ igleghte igate ngughk _ .
legan _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikut _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ ikfiqe ste naqe zikut _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ ? _ "
taawa nguq _ qantagha ni _ kurugagh lghute t _ , _ negh aqe ut _ .
tughneghagh t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ aane stekufkut _ , _ ku r ug agh nun _ it egh aa tes nak ef kut _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ " _ aanleghaate luteng _ ku r ug agh nun _ it egh aatk at _ . _ aga _ kurugagh at _ pangaleg tke aat _ asitmun _ naayvagh mun _ nagnegh luteng _ megh mi _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
K u r ug aghn eng _ aflengake i lghiit _ q im aag u utk at _ ne mun _ . _ tawani _ aap q ag ke t _ sa mate kek _ tughneghagh lgu yagh lghiik _ il um eg n eg un _ , _ samatagh nge i llu _ kurugagh lghute t _ .
enkaam _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ tam aa kum iit _ esghagh yaghtugh tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ esghagh yamegteggu _ maniguute pigte luteng _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghvag iqe aq _ . _ enkaam _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ellnga nun _ tagi tke aat _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ . _ Jesus-em _ liigike luki _ ugpeq i llegh tu l ng it _ , _ pi ke aa _ unegh ii iqe aq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ quya _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ . _ "
taagken _ ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ seghleghqe ghllag uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh u yug uq _ seghevute i llegh mikun _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake luki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
naligh _ akuzillegh _ piyaqnagh u i te a _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ makete luten _ piyug i _ ' _ ?
liigike ste naqe amsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ seghevute i lleghqagh lgu ta a _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yuug _ makete luni _ aglaghkagh _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ tallugh yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ taw ate l ngugh meng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el is k angi _ yug t _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ t a x -em _ qerngughte i ste nga _ , _ aqume luni _ qepghagh vig mini _ ; _ M at t h e w - ngu f tuq _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ M at t h e w - m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
mulu gpenateng _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ M at t h e w - n ku nun _ . _ neghe uute ma luki _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is te l gh u te t lu _ , _ seghlegh q es te l gh u te t lu _ aqume luteng _ Jesus -en kut _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ .
ila ita _ P h a ris e es - et _ esghagh luku _ neghe lgute yu igh i lghii _ , _ malig s aagh teng i _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste gpesi _ neghe lgusigh aki _ t a x - meng _ q er ngugh t is te t lu _ , _ seghlegh q es te t lu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luki _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yugunqegtagh t _ agh all eg tagh s ugh n ii tut _ , _ tam aa ku ng in aat _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
liite yaghtugh teggu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ una _ akuzite nite ngughk _ igaqegkagh _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ piyuke nghite anka _ aghqe te si _ , _ itupill _ nangllegtagh sug amsi _ . _ ' _ tagi u nghite unga _ tagsigh na luki _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi u unga _ tagsigh na luki _ seghlegh q es tet _ . _ "
taagken _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta llu _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ awen _ fast- u aqe sta _ , _ naqam _ malig s aagh te ten _ f as t- eg pen at eng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh yaghqagh m _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ qivghu nga yaghqau aat _ taw an ll uku _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate yaghqaa uq _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ iqite stekumegteggu _ , _ elngaatall _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ f as t- ell equ t _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaagh naanghite ak _ aatkagh lug k _ nutaghagh meng _ liiqnegh meng _ . _ ilaagh llegh _ qellughtekuni _ piig u lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ sulleve lleqe uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ w in e- egh r agh agh meng _ imigh naanghite a _ awataghpag lug _ qayughllak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh kuni _ aafkagh luni _ imaa igh u lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ awataghpag lug _ atugh u yaghqaa nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ awataghpagraghagh _ imigh kuni _ w in e- egh r agh agh meng _ qerngagh egmek _ naave naanghite uk _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus _ akuzi ma luku _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng at _ itegh luni _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panike a _ whaa _ tuq un Ê¼ gh h aag uq _ , _ iwernga _ taku luku _ saaftekuvgu _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ , _ malig s aagh teng illu _ maligte tke aat _ .
aglagh ma luki _ , _ qinuyug lghii m _ aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ tun ut ang aneng _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ k ii te l qu ng ig al nguq _ . _ whaten _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ S aa f te q egh saq um kun _ aatkagh akun _ , _ naallghute nayagh unga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saaftekagh a _ atkuyaagh an _ kenigh akun _ .
Jesus-em _ qiive te kete luku _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ alinge gpenang _ ! _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ naallghute uten _ . _ " _ aga _ aghnagh _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ kaate luni _ iglegh ut is t en ku nun _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ tuqu i lghii ni _ q al ghi gh tagh te t lu _ , _ yug lghute t llu _ qiya aghte tete te ghllag lghiit _ .
tawavek _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ qavaa uq _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ neng l aq eg kaa t _ .
A an legh aa tes at k i _ , _ itegh luni _ Jesus-em _ tugukagh a _ iiggagh kun _ , _ enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh _ unguvaqagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill eq _ ungipagh kekagh at _ tea- ma ani _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ ne meng _ . _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ maligte yu aqe ak _ , _ akilghuu magh egmek _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ D av i d -em _ , _ nanglleg yagute kung _ ! _ "
aga _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ maligtekagh ak _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ U g peq es teg n eg u u _ naallghute i lleghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ iye gkenkun _ saafte lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetegetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ esghagh yagutekagh k _ . _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ak ek _ , _ " _ ungipagh gpenatek _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ "
iwernga _ navek _ pinegh megteni _ apegh aqe ka ak _ Jesus-em _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ellmegnun _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ aghulaqe ma lukek _ , _ Jesus - mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ .
legan _ Jesus-em _ tughneghagh _ aane sta _ , _ yuug _ aga _ akuzikagh _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute t _ saghiigha yug te luteng _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Wh ate l ngugh meng _ all aagh ll u w agh t i llegh meng _ esghaate igate ukut _ israel- mi _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P h a ris e es - et _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ umiileg ita _ tughneghagh t _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el i sim aat _ aane ste qigh sqellug qu _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ galilee- mi _ , _ apeghtugh i magh mi _ s y nag o gu e- ng it ni _ , _ ungipagh ke i magh mi llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qamagte luki _ aqnighnegh leg t llu _ qinuyug lghiit llu _ .
esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh nga ghllaget _ , _ kayute ngunateng _ ; _ penniigh stun _ pen n iigh n igh teng il ngugh es tun _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ ugpeqe yug aqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ uspute nga lghiit _ nunivagseghagh nun _ un atagh yaq leg g iin aagh tek at _ . _ taawanginaq _ p al a pig u ut _ qep ghagh tet _ .
En kaa ng am _ yughaghte k _ Atan gh anun _ unataghyaghqagh t _ , _ kayagte i sqellug qu _ qep ghagh tek aghq ameng _ unataghyaghqagh anun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qerngughte luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it k ii _ aane ste i yaghqaa luki _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
U ku nguut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- et _ : _ sivuligh _ , _ simon _ ( _ alla _ ategh leg _ peter- meng _ ) _ , _ A n d r e w _ ( _ ang leg ut anga _ ) _ , _ J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ ( _ Z e b e d e e- m _ ighnegh kek _ ) _ ,
P h il ip -en kut _ , _ B ar t h o l o m e w - n kut _ , _ T h o m as -en kut _ , _ M at t h e w - n kut _ ( _ t a x - meng _ qerngughte i ste u yagh lghii _ ) _ , _ J am es -en kut _ ( _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e us -em _ ) _ , _ T h a d d a e us -en kut _ ,
S im o n -en kut _ Z e al o t- a _ , _ Judas _ I s c ar i o t- lu _ ( _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ Jesus - meng _ ) _ .
Jesus-em _ , _ taakut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- et _ kayagtekagh i _ q el gh u um ii ta _ , _ " _ G en t il e- et lu _ , _ S am ar i a- gh m iit lu _ nuna itnun _ pi fqaafsi _ .
yeghlegi _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ pi tek _ qayughllak _ iflakagh stun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh gpesini _ whaten _ ungipagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ ! _ '
Q in u yuget _ naallghute ki _ , _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh teki _ , _ l ep r o s y - l g et _ naallghute ki _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ aane ste qugh teki _ yug neng _ . _ aki u na an _ allgegh te kau usi _ , _ enkaam _ aki u na an _ tuune tek _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ mani meng _ : _ g o l d - meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ talwa _ c o p p er - meng _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ akmagtagh meng _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ talwa _ ayaviigh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh a _ ak l uk egk aan eng _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ T o w n -en un _ nalighmeng _ v i llag e- en un _ kaate negh gpesini _ ivagh i aqe tek _ k itu meng _ pinigh lghii meng _ enkaam _ ellngan ite aqe tek _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte llegh gpesinun _ .
itegh kufsi _ mangteghagh anun _ quya ta qite ki _ taw an l e nguut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ elpesi nite li _ . _ '
U p ugh as k ang i si _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ taw an tes nak esi _ . _ iwernga _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ veghte nakesi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ nalighmeng _ nagate nghite kangisi _ , _ aane te kete luku _ mangteghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ aghulaqe te kete luku _ t o w n - meng _ , _ itegagh gpesi _ pagula i _ ufsug te nakesi _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ S o d o m - egh m iit lu _ G o m o r a h - gh m iit lu _ agh y uu llegh q es t aagh h aa yaghq aag ut _ taa m _ ne m _ yug aneng _ ! _ "
" _ ukughsi _ ! _ kayagtekumsi _ penniigh stun _ qu ng ang it n il ngugh es tun _ amaa t _ ll iigh l equ si _ enkaam _ pegh q in gh ul usi _ nemeghyagh stun _ , _ n ek eg g m ell usi _ d o v es - tun _ .
kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ tugu lusi _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ ag ghi s t en un _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi llu _ s y nag o gu e- meg g ni _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ nekeve ste lleqe aisi _ sivu itgun _ iglegh ut is te t lu _ umiileg t llu _ . _ enkaam _ lii g ik es aghq aagh lleq agh pesi nga _ ellngit nun llu _ G en t il e- en un llu _ .
N an qig tes te mun _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ , _ teggellghiigh gpenasi _ naten _ akuzi lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh gpesineng _ . _ akuzi yaghqaaghtekufsi _ akuzite kaghqagh lgu lleqe usi _ .
akuzite t _ elpek si _ pike nghite asi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ taghneghagh kek _ akuzi lleqe uk _ elpesigun _ .
" _ yug t _ ellmeng _ katam _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ ata t llu _ avaqutagh teng _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ avaqutagh t _ angu yiite luki _ angayuqagh teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga mneng _ apallugh ke lusi _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ ugumi ke lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtuqagh t _ kenlanga _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ .
takukagh gpesini _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ ila anun _ t o w n -em _ qimag ggaasi _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qamagte naanghite asi _ I s r a el -em _ town-ngi _ , _ sivungagh ni _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh an _ .
" _ maligsaagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ apeghtughiste mineng _ , _ talwa _ qepghagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ umiileg mineng _ .
itagnaghi yaghqaa uq _ maligsaagh a _ apeghtughiste mitun _ lliigh kuni _ , _ qepghagh a llu _ umiileg mitun _ lliigh kuni _ . _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ B e el z e b ul - meng _ atigh ma katgu _ , _ neng ll ug ut angi _ seghlegh atagh aal uki _ atigh yaghqaqe ait _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ am y uq e tagh tet _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nallukekagh _ liitesaghqagh u uq _ , _ qamagte luni llu _ aksaqekagh _ qayvighqesaghqagh u uq _ .
elpesi nun _ sa u aat _ apeghkagh nka _ apegh yaghqaqe asi _ tea- ma anun _ . _ sigutqugh tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ , _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe asi _ mangteghagh t _ qaye itneng _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ tuqute i kayug t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh meng _ iwernga _ tuqute i naanghite ut _ unguva sigh meng _ . _ itupill _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ hell- mi _ naafqii yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh gkeneng _ yugusigh meng llu _ unguva sigh meng llu _ .
P en n y - meng _ tukfigh yaghqaqe agsi _ q aw aag g aa k _ , _ naqamllu _ aag llegh a _ ifkagh kan _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aflengake aghagh lusi _ ayuqe aisi _ , _ qayughllak _ talwa _ nuyagh gpesi _ ug lagh tal ng i _ liisimake ai _ .
enkaam _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ ata gpesi _ megnu ke aghagh aisi _ q aw aag g aghn eng _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ , _ whanga mnun _ pik n il uni _ , _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pik n il uku _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luni _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ paninang _ aleghqugh qu ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u nghite unga _ , _ taawanginaq _ pillugute ste i yaghtugh u unga _ .
tagi u unga _ yug mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ ata a _ , _ aghnagh mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ naange a _ , _ ukaagh anun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ saki a _ aghnagh _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ neng ll ug ut ang it a _ anguyag liite lleqe aat _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ p ak ig gu ll uku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ighnegh ni _ nalighmeng _ panig ni _ p ak ig gu ll uku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaquuragh ni _ tugu yu nghite kunigu _ maligte naanghite aanga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga mni _ itagnagh nghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ pik n i kum igu _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ pegtekunigu _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ unguvallegh pig _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p ugh as k ang i si _ , _ whanga llu _ upugha lleqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p ugh as kum i nga _ , _ upugha lleqe a _ kayagte i steke _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ u p ugh as kum igu _ uuknaliqe i sta _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ uuknaliqe i stetu te _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ u p ugh as kum igu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ yuug _ elqughute nga ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ elqughutngagh lghii tun _ yug tun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nenglekegte lghii meng _ meghsi kunigu _ uk al igh pig aq _ maligte yaaghteke _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te mneng _ , _ ipa _ pi amsi _ akileghtuusagh nge pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh t en i _ apeghiigh yamiki _ apegh tugh an egh meng _ , _ tamaaken _ aghulaqekagh _ ila itnun _ t o w n - et _ apeghtugh i na luni llu _ ungipagh ke i na luni llu _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete luni _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ nagaqugh luku _ Christ- a _ sa aqe ta a _ , _ ila i _ malig s aagh t en i _ kayagtekagh i _ Jesus - mun _ .
aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ El p eng w aa _ tagi naqe nikagh at _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ tagi yaghqau a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teggu _ John _ nagatekagh gpesineng llu _ esghaghkagh gpesineng llu _ :
aya kaayagh lghiit _ esghagh yagute ut _ , _ piyug igate yagh lghiit _ piyug yagute ut _ , _ l ep r o s y - l gu y alghiit _ naallghute ut _ , _ tuuslagh yagh lghiit _ nagaqugh te yagute ut _ , _ tuqu kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh ut _ , _ aklumalghii nun llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nanigh nghite kuni _ whanga mneng _ quya stekau uq _ ! _ "
aga _ J o h n -em _ malig s aagh teng i _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ Jesus-em _ akuzi tkekagh a _ John _ yug lghute nun _ , _ " _ kilgaa nun _ pi aqngafsi _ , _ sa u a _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ vegaagh _ anuqe m _ u f s ug us k ang aa _ ?
sa qu tsi mi _ ? _ E s gh aghn al u ku u _ aatkagh kegte aq _ yuug _ ? _ tamaaken _ aate kaqe lghiit _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ umiileg t _ mangteghagh itni _ !
sa u a mi _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste inagh u nghite uq _ . _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ 
qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ sivu gpeni _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ ungipaghteke _ , _ yataaghqesaghtigh sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ ' _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ yug neng _ all g eq agh y ag g aghn eng _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ uk al igh pig aq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ J o h n - meng _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ .
John _ paaptaaye sta _ ungipagh ke i yuggaagh llegh aneng _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ , _ suugllug t _ wayagh naqutke aqe aat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ .
qamagte luteng _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ M o s es - em llu _ liilightuusagh ita _ u uk nal iq ut ke ng ng w aat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kenlanga _ J o h n -em _ tagi llegh anun _ .
J o h n - ngu uq _ u uk nal iq is tet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ tag in aq n i llegh meg g teg gun _ elijah _ . _ ugpeqe yu kufsigu _ uuknaliqe llegh _ , _ John _ El i j a h - ngu uq _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ !
" _ maaten _ kiyagh llegh h it _ yug t _ sa mun _ uspute naqe zingi _ ? _ T aghn ugh h aagh es tun _ ayuqe ut _ aqume uute luteng _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ naghaalgute meggnun _ akilghuu te lghiit _ whaten _ ,
' _ qalghightaute amsi _ , _ tu k al eg an ghi tu si _ ! _ qiyiqe te ukut _ , _ qiyiqe nghite usi _ ! _ '
" _ John _ tagi aqngami _ fast- u aqe uq _ , _ megh igate uq llu _ wine- meng _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ' _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi aqngami _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe ai _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe ai llu _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ Y u uk qun _ taana _ esghaqagh teggu _ ! _ neghetu pigte uq _ , _ meghetu pigte uq _ , _ ilakumtaagh ke aat llu _ t a x -em _ q er ngugh t is teng it a _ , _ seghlegh q es te t lu _ ! _ ' _ naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ ip a pi gh q eng ng aaq _ s all gh akun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ allute luki _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill en i _ atuqe kaqe ai _ Ch o r a z in - mi _ , _ B et h s a i d a- mi _ , _ C ap er n a um - em illu _ . _ iwernga _ yug it _ av utegh qell uteng _ taaqe llghite ngugh t _ seghlegh q en negh meng _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ agh y uugh m ik ii _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ , _ Ch o r a z in - egh m ii ni _ ! _ S egh legh waagh un aq ngu usi _ , _ B et h s a i d a- gh m ii ni _ ! _ elpesi ni _ all aagh ll u w agh t i llegh llag et _ apeghiighkagh t _ pi kaayagh kata _ T y r e- m illu _ S i d o n - m illu _ , _ neghigh pigte luteng _ yug it _ av utegh qell uteng _ seghlegh q en nan igh n ay agh tut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ suvinagh lghii meng _ qiipaghaghqagh meng _ aate luteng _ aqume nayagh ut _ p an e te llegh teg gun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ T y r e- egh m iit lu _ S i d o n - egh m iit lu _ agh y u llegh q es t aagh h aa yaghq aag ut _ elpesi neng _ !
enkaam _ elpek si _ , _ C ap er n a um - egh m ii ni _ ! _ qaywa _ ang l is tegh llag yagh ng aagh p esi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ repall _ sumegh gpesini _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe nighllug si _ qilag mi _ , _ yeghlegi _ ukig lleqe aisi _ hell- mun _ . _ A ll aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh llag et _ pi kaayagh kata _ S o d o m - e mi _ , _ paninang _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nekevgha nayagh uq _ !
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aghagh yaghqaqe ai _ S o d o m - egh m iit _ p ak ig gu ll uki _ elpesi neng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ kaay _ a ta _ , _ atanegh ke aaten _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ ! _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ qayughllak _ liite kau nghite ngugh nun _ liite stekaqe an _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ iigh kan _ liitekagh neng llu _ peghqinegh neng llu _ .
aa-a _ , _ A taa y _ , _ efqugh ke llegh gpetun _ pi kau uten _ .
" _ ata ma _ tagivagh kaqe a _ sa u a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ ighnegh _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ata m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ a ta _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ighnegh m _ , _ enkaam _ ighnegh m _ nakmikegkagh minun _ liite ste lleqe a _ a ta _ .
" _ tagi tek _ whanga mnun _ qamagte lusi _ ugh legh il ghii ni _ , _ uqigtuqagh meng llu _ akmag leg ghllag ni _ , _ meghnaali ste lleqe amsi _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ aate lukek _ liite i vike tengnga _ , _ qayughllak _ y aku mang in negh itu nga _ , _ ilu ka _ qu s ev eg ng aaq _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali lleqe usi _ unguva sigh gpesinun _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ piyaqnagh u i te uk _ , _ akmag ka llu _ uqengestaaghhagh u uq _ . _ "
taagken _ S a b b at h -em _ aghnegh ani _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ wh e at -em _ piite vig akun _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng i _ iyataghkagh t _ enkaam _ wh e at - meng _ qesug te aqe luteng _ neghekagh t _ .
P h a ris e es - et _ esghagh luki _ malig s aagh tet _ wh e at - meng _ qesug te aatagh lghiit _ , _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ S a b b at h - mi _ malig s aagh te ten _ qepghagh ut _ , _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe aat _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t igh tu um ang is teg gu u _ D av i d -en kut _ y u ku ll ghiit _ sa kau ta i _ iyatagh aqngameng _ ?
itegh kau uq _ t a b er n a c l e- mun _ enkaam _ y u ku ll ghiit _ neghe kaqe aat _ neqekrangllagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe kaqe aat _ qayughllak _ priest- nge i na ut _ negh yaghqaqe yagh kangat _ .
A t igh t iig as teg gu llu _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ p r i es t- et _ temple- mi _ qepghagh negh meggni _ S a b b at h - mi _ naafqe aqe kangat _ S a b b at h -em _ liilightuusagh a _ ? _ naqamllu _ p r i es t- et _ anaggute igate ut _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaante uq _ temple- mi _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ nangllegtigh sqe sug amsi _ yug lgute gpesinun _ p ak ig gu ll uku _ aghqe te gpesineng _ . _ ' _ taakut _ akuzite t _ lii g ik ng waagh yaq u f si k i _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ , _ nanqigte nayagh nghite asi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ anaggute llghite ngugh t _ ,
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ atanegh ke a _ S a b b at h -em _ . _ "
Taa ken _ Jesus _ aglagh luni _ s y nag o gu e- ng it nun _ iteghkagh _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ iigge an _ inglu i _ unegh ii iqe aat _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taw an l e nguut _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ n aal ke f ik nal uku _ anaggute llegh meng _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa- a _ naallghute i lleghqagh _ S a b b at h - mi _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ naligh gpesi _ penniigh a _ k al ef k ag saq an _ laawaagh mun _ S a b b at h - mi _ , _ n us ug n ay agh es teg gu u _ ?
yuug _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ penniigh meng _ ! _ enkaam _ liilightuusagh ni _ itagnagh lghii u uq _ pinitun _ pi lleghqagh _ S a b b at h - mi _ . _ "
taagken _ yuug _ uniigh nga lghii meng _ iigge leg _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengug te ki _ iigge ten _ . _ " _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ , _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ , _ inglu megestun _ lli aqe aat _ .
taagken _ P h a ris e es - et _ aane luteng _ agghi saghtuqagh t _ naten _ tuqute na luku _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-em _ liisimake luku _ agghi llegh at _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaa t _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinuyug lghiit _ qamagte luki _ ,
ineghtekagh i llu _ ungipagh ke te qugh a mi _ pi s qell uni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi llgh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ I s a i a h - kun _ whaten _ :
" _ una _ esgha _ nakmikegkagh ka _ qep ghagh te ngu luku _ . _ piniqe kaqe a _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke pigte a _ . _ taghneghagh gka _ ellnga kun _ nekegte lleqe agka _ . _ ungipaate lleqe ai _ G en t il e- et _ taw at egh ll u w aaq _ nanqigte i lleghqagh mneng _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
aaghtiiraagh naanghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akilghuu naanghite uq _ , _ tume ni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ akuzi naanghite uq _ .
iike naanghite a _ vegaagh _ ullegh nga lghii _ , _ qaame yaghtugh u ngestaghkagh k _ kenegh lghutagh k _ q aam n n aanghi taa k _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ whaten _ piyug luni _ lliigh kan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llegh a _ yug neng _ av ut ang i tuq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh akun _ G en t il e- et _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus - mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ ayaakagh _ , _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke a _ enkaam _ akuzi yagutekagh llu _ esghagh u sag u tke aq llu _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ ell meg g neng _ aap qugh aagh utk at _ whaten _ , _ " _ una _ D av i d -em _ ighnegh ke nghite agu _ ? _ "
P h a ris e es - et _ nagate luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ yug neng _ aane ste aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ qayughllak _ atuqe u kanga _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ B e el z e b ul -em _ , _ iglegh ut is teng at _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alngunak _ ataneghpag u llegh _ aafqugh te luni _ pillugute kuni _ , _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tanemlleqa _ ne ghllag t _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute t _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ q er ng agh m en n aanghi tut _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ tughneghagh m _ aane stekunigu _ tughneghagh _ , _ taawa _ ellmi neng _ pi ll u w aag uq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ ken l et gh uu ll equ q _ .
aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ B e el z e b ul - kun _ , _ naten mi _ yug gpesi _ aane ste qugh aqe atki _ tughneghagh t _ ? _ enkaam _ yug si _ nanqigte i stekete lleqe asi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ taawa _ taa m _ ip a pi gh q aa _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ kaate ma uq _ elpesi nun _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh yug kuni _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ teg leg ugh nal uni _ saghya aneng _ , _ sivuke luku _ yuug _ asighqesaghqagh ke a _ . _ taagken _ w ay agh tegh lleq ii _ saghya i _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ whang am n in negh il nguq _ k ip ull g in aagh tek aqa _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ qerngughte i lgusigh nghite kuminga _ mingite i ste u uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ alngunak _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ alngunak llu _ segh l equ u llegh meg g neng _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ segh l equ u qu m i ke k _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kunigu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ maaten _ kiyagh taa llegh mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ .
" _ uqfig _ aflengakekagh _ pinigh lghii u uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ pinigh ut _ . _ uqfig _ aflengake llghite ngughk _ seghleghu uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ seghleghu ut _ . _ piite ste i llegh akun _ lii simak ell eq agh si _ uqfig m _ nateghtu langa _ .
ukughsi _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ naten _ akuzi aqe tsi _ pinigh lghii meng _ seghlegh ugh ng aagh p esi _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ aane kau yug u uq _ akuzillegh akun _ .
pinigh lghii _ yuug _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilumike i lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ . _ seghlegh _ yuug _ seghlegh meng _ ilumike i lghii _ seghlegh meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ .
" _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ yug t _ apegh yaghqagh pestaagh ke ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ atuqekagh teng _ sangita _ atuqe ma ta i _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ akuzite gpegun _ . _ akuzite gpek _ ip a pi gh qell eq aaten _ avute ite ni luten _ nalighmeng _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ . _ "
taagken _ ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh m _ , _ ila ita llu _ P h a ris e es - et _ pi ke aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh t il ghii ten _ esgh ap ag y u w am ken _ liigike na luku _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh en _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghnegh m _ uu m _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ ataa s iigh negh il nguut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ naqam _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i tes qu t _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ T aan ang in aghh aq _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ill eq _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ all aagh ll u wh aagh t i llgh a _ J o n a h - mun _ .
Jonah _ iqallug ghrugllag m _ aq saq gh w an it kaa g uq _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ un ug et _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ s am an s aghq aag uq _ nuna mi _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ un ug et _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ nekeve luteng _ anaggute ni lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni lusi _ . _ uuknaliqe i sta _ Jonah _ ungipagh yan _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ av utegh qell uteng _ seghlegh q en nan iq aag ut _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ av utegh qell usi _ seghlegh q en nan ill ghi tu si _ qaywa _ nagate kaqe ghngaaghpesigu _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ J o n a h - meng _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ queen- nge an _ S h e b a- m _ nekeve luni _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni lleqe aisi _ . _ tagi kau uq _ uy av agh p an il ngugh meng _ ne mineng _ nagate na luku _ S o l o m o n -em _ peghqinegh ghllag _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ S o l o m o n - meng _ whaante uq _ , _ taw all ii m a _ igh s ak aq agh si _ . _ "
" _ tughneghagh _ yug meng _ aane gkuni _ igleghte lleqe uq _ m eq r ag g iil ngugh mi _ nuna mi _ , _ ivagh i lleqe uq _ meghnaali vigkagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute nghite yami _ ,
pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghfig ke yagh ke mnun _ uteghte naqe unga _ . _ ' _ kaate yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ , _ aa ll waagh luni _ , _ m ing ll eg teng ng waagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ tagi tke ai _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ ellmi neng _ seghlegh atagh alghiit _ . _ I tegh aa ll uteng _ yug mun _ taw an tek at _ . _ enkaam _ taana _ yuug _ siv un gh aneng _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh waagh ugh tek aq _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ maaten _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh ugh tagh agh yaghq aag ut _ sivugh nghaani _ pi llegh meggneng _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus-em _ aleghqugh ma luki _ yug t _ , _ Jesus-em _ naange a llu _ ang leg ut ang illu _ kaate luteng _ manughagh mi _ aleghqugh yug qu aat _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ ungipagh tke a _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ qakma _ naa n llu _ anglegute ten llu _ , _ aleghqugh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
taagken _ kenigh luki _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Taa ku s ta _ naa ka llu _ anglegute nka llu _ !
kina _ alngunak _ ata ma _ q ilag m el ngu u m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pikumi _ , _ anglegute ke aqa _ , _ nayag ke aqa _ , _ naa ke aqa llu _ ! _ "
tawani _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Jesus _ aane luni _ mangteghagh meng _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ aqume luni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ kangllu qaghte yatni _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esne metekagh t _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piitesighagh a _ piitesighaghvig minun _ aglagh luni _ , _ ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ .
piitesighaghvig mini _ i f k aghq iy alghii mi _ piitute neng _ , _ ila i _ tume tgun _ tekite ke aat _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagaghtuqagh kun _ s un ap ag il ngugh qun _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ piite tke aat _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
iwernga _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ qayughllak _ aku pag il nguut _ .
ila i _ piitute m _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ piitute t _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste ikagh t _ g r a in - meng _ , _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
taagken _ malig s aagh teng it a _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ ungipaghaate meng _ atuqe aqe ziin _ apeghtugh nghpeki _ yug t _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ talugh nga lghii _ ip a pi gh qell gha _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit nun _ liite tesi mangite a _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ liigike lleg ngekagh _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ liigike lleg nge aghagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ lii g ik ell ep ag il nguq _ liigike llegh a _ iqite lleqe uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaate ghngaaghmeng _ esghaate igate ngugh t _ , _ nagate ghngaaghmeng _ nag aq iig al nguut _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate ngugh t _ .
