nuna t _ yug it _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh t llu _ pillug utu lleqe ut _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ neqangisag ghllag lleqe uq _ , _ nuna t _ uvelegtagh ghllag lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luni _ tamaa na _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu kestagh llegh atun _ ayuqe lleqe uq _ .
" _ taagken _ tamaa na _ pi ma luku _ yug t _ tugu lleqe aisi _ , _ amyuqetagh tke lleqe aisi _ , _ tuqu lleqe aisi llu _ . _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ ramke an _ ugumiite lleqe aisi _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
enkaam _ uglagh u pigte lghii m _ ugpeqe nanigh lleqe aatnga _ , _ uveghpag utu sag u lleqe ut _ , _ ugumiite yagute lleqe ut llu _ .
taagken _ u uk nal iq is te sigh w aal gh u tet _ tagi luteng _ puughte qugh lleqe ait _ yug lghute t _ .
seghlegh _ n ul am _ ang tal ang aneng _ apallugh ke luku _ allute luteng _ yug t _ piniqe i nanigh lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nuqete neghtuqagh _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ .
ukut llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa ut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ramke itnun _ nag aq ii s qell uki _ . _ taagken _ nuna _ iqugte lleqe uq _ . _ "
" _ yeqay _ at igh tugh te m _ liigike ligu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ u uk nal iq is te m _ D an i el -em _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ . _ uuknaliqe tkekagh a _ taana _ agleghnagh ite ngugh u uq _ paaghqite te ste i lghii _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne mi _ . _ esghagh kufsigu _ tesqamani _ nekeve lghii _ ,
J u d e a- m el nguut _ anagniigh ghhaat _ naayghagh nun _ .
yuug _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anite ngughk _ ukig luni _ saghyaqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
yuug _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mete ngughk _ qaasligh ghqu te qugh a mi _ pi lghaaq _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ seghlegh waagh un aq nguut _ qumig leg t _ aghnagh t _ , _ mamaghtagh leg t llu _ !
yughaghte k _ anagniigh fqaafsi _ uksugh mi _ pi s qell usi _ nalighmeng _ S a b b at h - mi _ ,
qayughllak _ tamaani _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag ughte yaghqaa uq _ . _ S egh legh atagh aa yaghq aag uq _ seghleliigh aqe llegh neng _ ima _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ . _ allameng llu _ taw ate l nguq _ pi naanghite u aghte uq _ .
tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ p al all im ang is aq ak i _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ unguva nayagh nghite uq _ . _ iwernga _ apallugh ke luki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ aghnegh t _ p al all iyagh q aq ii _ .
" _ tamaani _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ Christ- a _ whaa _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ T a z ing an tuq _ ! _ ' _ ugpeqe gpenaan _ ,
qayughllak _ Christ- a sigh waagh et lu _ , _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh et lu _ tagi lleqe ut _ . _ A ll aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag ll equ t _ , _ sagh iigh an aghq egh llag lleq ut lu _ puughhe na luki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ p uugh saq leg u ku meg tek i _ .
taawa _ ungipaate amsi _ siv ut gh ull uku _ pi lleghqagh _ .
" _ En kaa ng am _ whaten _ pi kangisi _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ Christ- a _ paaghqagh igh llegh anite uq _ ! _ ' _ taku gpenaan _ ; _ nalighmeng _ whaten _ pika ta _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ilu anite uq _ ' _ , _ ugpeqe gpenaki _ .
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ tawatete yaghqaa uq _ nighugte pagte te te llegh tun _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ a siv agh meng _ pakfalla mun _ .
" _ qawaagpag t _ qerngughte aqe ut _ nani _ alngunak _ ke meg q w aal g un gh ani _ .
" _ ' _ kingu ngiighhagh itneng _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ siqinegh _ mamleg ste lleqe a _ , _ tanqigh _ nighugte te nanigh ste lleqe a _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t _ ifkagh qu uute ste lleqe ai _ qilaga meng _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh et _ q ilag am el nguut _ iglegha llegh it _ allangughte uute ste lleqe ai _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ qilaga kun _ sa u a _ allgegh lleqe uq _ liisimake sighqagh _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ . _ taagken _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ q iv gh u m _ qiya aghte te te ghllagte lleqe ut _ . _ esghagh lleqe aat _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi lghii _ q ilag waagh teg gun _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh tu um agh m illu _ n igh ugh qell el igh llag l un illu _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ qalghightu an _ qalghigh ste ghllag kunigu _ kayagte lleqe ai _ yaquleg ni _ navek _ alngunak _ q er ngugh tes qell uki _ nakmikegkagh ni _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
" _ liite vike teggu _ uqfig a _ f ig s -em _ . _ esghagh kufsiki _ avayagh i _ unite te lugh u i aghagh lghiit _ , _ ququngagh i _ piite kestagh lghiit _ , _ liisimakagh i _ kiig yaghtugh ngestagh aa _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ apeghkagh nka _ tamaakut _ esghagh kufsiki _ , _ lii simak ell eq agh si _ ellnga _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ , _ aaqun _ amig mun _ lliigh ma uq _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ maaten _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu laghate te ste gpenaki _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ .
qilag a llu _ , _ nuna llu _ aviighute yaghqaa uk _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ akuzite nka _ aviighute naanghite ut _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ taa m _ aghnegh m _ aflu a _ qakun _ kaate yaghqaa ta a _ . _ talwa _ q ilag m el nguut _ yaquleg t _ nalluke aat _ , _ ighnegh m llu _ nalluke a _ , _ ata inagh ghhagh m _ liisimake a _ .
katam _ tamaani _ N o a h - m _ kiyaghte llegh ani _ , _ yug t _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh ani _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ , _ sivungagh ni _ ul ev em _ yug t _ negh aqe luteng _ , _ megh aqe luteng _ , _ nengughte te aqe luteng _ ayuqekagh t _ kenlanga _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ N o a h - n kut _ itegh llegh itnun _ ark- mun _ .
nallukekagh at _ natete yaghqaa ta a _ kenlanga _ uleve llegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kan _ , _ nalluke lleqe aat _ natete yaghqaa ta a _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ maalghug _ yug k _ piitesigh u aghagh vig megteni _ qepghagh te k _ , _ aag llegh a _ tugu lleqe a _ , _ ila a _ unegte lleqe a _ .
aghnagh k _ kagimte i lghiik _ g r a in - meng _ , _ aag llegh a _ tugu lleqe a _ , _ ila a _ unegte lleqe a _ .
" _ En kaa ng am _ kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ n all uk ng waagh agh si _ nani _ aghneghmi _ atanegh gpesi _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
N all un eq n ii tuq _ , _ mangteghagh m _ yug an _ liisimake yagh kunigu _ teg leg n iigh te m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ , _ qavagh gpenani _ kelenga nayagh uq _ naafqe te luni _ itegh na yu kan _ mangteghagh minun _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ elpek si llu _ apeghiighsagh lusi _ quunpeng _ , _ qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ waakenghillghaghte lusi _ .
" _ kinangaawa _ ataa s iigh m el nguq _ peghqinegh lghii _ qepghagh a _ ? _ T aan ang u uq _ umiileg an _ igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh a _ qep ghagh te l g ut ang anun _ , _ neq el it aat ii s qell uk illu _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
taana _ qepghagh a _ quya ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ umiileg an _ kaate luni _ esghagh kunigu _ qelegh llegh mitun _ pi lghii _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ taana _ qepghagh a _ umiileg an _ aflengake i ste ngllagh yaghqaqe a _ sa minun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
iwernga _ taana _ qepghagh a _ seghleghu kuni _ sumeghtaghagh lleqe uq _ whaten _ , _ ' _ umiileg ka _ tagi lghaghtugh naanghite uq _ ' _ ,
enkaam _ amyuutke sag u lleqe ai _ qep ghagh te l g ut ni _ . _ ila lleqe uq llu _ suume lghii nun _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe luki _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe luki _ lliigh lleqe uq _ .
taagken _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ umiileg a _ kaate lleqe uq _ qepghagh a _ yataaghqe llghite luku llu _ , _ sighimake llghite luku llu _ .
enkaam _ umiileg an _ qevuute luku _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ , _ aglagh ste lleqe a _ piniiyugnegh nun _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ maligte te luku _ . _ tawani _ qiyiqe lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ .
" _ tawani _ pi llegh mi _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ uspute yaghqaa uq _ qu lagh y ag nun _ aghnaghagh nun _ k el qell uki _ kenelghutag teng _ paayghi lghiit _ nulightugh naqe lghii meng _ .
tallimat _ n all u uq at _ tallimat _ peghqinegh lghiit _ .
N all u uq at _ kelqekagh it _ kenelghutag teng _ uqughqagh ngunaki _ ,
iwernga _ peghqinegh lghiit _ kelqekagh it _ kenelghutag teng _ uqughqagh ligh luki _ .
nulightugh naqe lghii _ muluughkagh _ , _ qenwat _ aghnaghagh t _ qavaghnikagh t _ enkaam _ q av at gh utk at _ .
" _ U n ug em _ qukaa ni _ kina _ akilghuukagh _ whaten _ , _ ' _ uka _ tagi aqe uq _ nulightugh yaghqagh _ ! _ aane lusi _ payegh teggu _ ! _ '
aghnaghagh t _ taghtugh aghtagh te luteng _ kenelghutag teng _ ken ghi t _ nallghusaghkagh it _ .
taagken _ n all u uq at _ pikagh t _ peghqinegh lghii nun _ , _ ' _ U qugh q al it agh t i kut _ , _ kenelghutag put _ qaame naqe ut _ . _ '
peghqinellegh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ uqughqagh pagite ukut _ , _ ak il p eg agh t en un _ tukfigh i yaghtugh tek _ . _ '
enkaam _ n all u uq at _ uqughqagh nge yaghtugh tke aat _ . _ aviite ma luki _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ kaate tke aq _ . _ taakut _ y at aagh q eng ng alghiit _ iteg lgu sigh ke aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ amigh k _ umeg ke aat _ .
" _ kingu aneng _ n all u uq at _ aghnaghagh t _ kaate luteng _ , _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ qelpegh te aghte kut _ ! _ '
iwernga _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nalluke amsi _ kinku u tsi _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ ungipaghaate ni _ taaqe nigh ke a _ whaten _ , _ " _ En kaa ng am _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ n a tu ng ut anga _ aghneq _ nalighmeng _ n a tu ng ut anga _ aflu _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ uspute yaghqaa uq _ whavek _ ungipaghaate mun _ : _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ iglegha naqe lghii _ navek _ uyavagh nun _ . _ tuqlugh qu ai _ qep ghagh t en i _ aviillegh mini _ aflengake i ste u luki _ saghya minun _ .
ataasigh mun _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ tuunekagh i _ , _ ila anun _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ , _ kinguligh mun _ 1 , 0 0 0 _ . _ tamaghhagh ita _ tunqugh qu ai _ pi ll eg tu l ng is tun _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
yuug _ taana _ 5 , 0 0 0 - neng egk aq _ , _ taw an ing in aq _ aghulaqe luni _ akike yaghqagh meng _ tukfightuqagh _ . _ enkaam _ alla _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ all g egh tek aa _ .
taana llu _ 2 , 0 0 0 - neng egk aq _ , _ allgegh tke aq _ alla _ 2 , 0 0 0 - meng _ .
iwernga _ taana _ 1 , 0 0 0 - neng egk aq _ aane luni _ laag te luki _ iiw iqe ai _ umiileg mi _ mani i _ .
" _ muluugh ghllag luni _ qep ghagh tet _ umiileg at _ uteghnigh yami _ ungipaghsugh qu ai _ samatagh nge i _ mani ni _ .
5 , 0 0 0 - neng egk am _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 5 , 0 0 0 _ all g egh sim aaq aa _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ ataa s iigh m el nguq _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ p al aghh agh nun _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 2 , 0 0 0 - neng egk am _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 2 , 0 0 0 _ all g egh sim aaq a _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ ataa s iigh m el nguq _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ p al aghh agh nun _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 1 , 0 0 0 - neng egk am _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ liisimake amken _ elpek _ aaghte yaghqaa nghite uten _ . _ unatagh aqe uten _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke gpeneng _ . _ qerngughte aqe aten _ piite tke aat _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ alinge lunga _ laag te luki _ mani ten _ iigh kaqe anka _ . _ ang _ , _ taawa _ elpek _ pin _ . _ '
iwernga _ umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ qepghagh a _ ! _ elpek _ p iigh pe nga _ unatagh aqe ni lunga _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ , _ qerngughte i aqe ni lunga llu _ piitekagh neng _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ .
S ang an Ê¼ ng am _ mani ka _ kanaghte nanigh zigu _ b an k - amun _ ? _ tawaten _ pi kaqsagh kuvgu _ , _ uteghnigh lleg mni _ veghte nayagh aqa _ all g egh n el igh luku _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ qep ghagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ tugu luku _ 1 , 0 0 0 _ mani a _ , _ tuune teggu _ tea- mete te _ 1 0 , 0 0 0 - n el eg mun _ .
tamaakut _ pi lget _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa ut _ enkaam _ siipte i uute lleqe ut _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ ava ite ngughk _ pi llgagh u yagh ghngaan _ iqite yaghqaqe ait _ ellnga neng _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ aane steggu _ taana _ sea-te u nghite ngughk _ qepghagh a _ qagavek _ mamleg ghllag mun _ . _ Taw aani _ yug t _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ '
" _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ n igh ugh qell egh m i kun _ , _ yaqulegtugh ma ghllag mi _ , _ taagken _ aqume lleqe uq _ n igh ugh q eng ng alghii g ne kun _ aqumutagh gmikun _ .
sivungagh kun _ qerngughte te ste lleqe ait _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ taagken _ avugh lleqe ai _ , _ katam _ pen n iigh n iigh te m _ avugh llegh atun _ penniigh t _ g o at - neng _ .
penniigh t _ agh en qig negh min i tes l eq ii _ , _ g o at - et _ saghumignegh mini _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ agh en qig negh min il nguut _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ tagi tek _ , _ ata ma _ quya stekagh itni _ , _ pi liite ggu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ yataaghqekagh _ elpesi nun _ ima _ nuna _ ulima aqngan _ .
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ negh q egk aq agh pesi nga _ ; _ meqsug u lunga _ megh si k aq agh pesi nga _ ; _ allaneghtagh u lunga _ u p ugh at k aq agh pesi nga _ .
amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightuqagh qagh zinga _ , _ qinuyug u lunga _ l aal igh f ik egk aq agh pesi nga _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u lunga _ esghagh yaghtuqagh qagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ negh e si ken _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug u luten _ meghsi ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ allaneghtagh u luten _ upugha te ziken _ , _ nalighmeng _ amsikaghmete luten _ aasi ightugh ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ laalighfike ziken _ ? _ '
umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pikagh i _ uk al igh pig agh nun _ anglegute mnun _ , _ whanga mnun _ pi aqe asi _ ! _ '
" _ taagken _ umiileg m _ sagh um ig negh min il nguut _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ elpesi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqagh i _ . _ awite te k _ whanga mneng _ , _ aglagh tek _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ ken gh eg nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh anun _ tughneghagh mun llu _ , _ yaquleg anun llu _ !
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ negh es te ll ghi tagh pesi nga _ , _ meqsug u lunga _ megh si ll ghi tagh pesi nga _ ,
allaneghtagh u lunga _ u p ugh ate ll ghi tagh pesi nga _ , _ amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightugh ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ qinuyug u lunga llu _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga llu _ laalighfike ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ , _ meqsug u luten _ , _ allaneghtagh u luten _ , _ amsikaghmete luten _ , _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ , _ kayusiite mangite ziken _ ? _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ tawaten _ pi nghite llegh gpesistun _ naligh ghhagh inagh itnun _ ukut _ uk al igh pig aat _ , _ whanga _ pin ghi taq agh pesi nga _ . _ '
enkaam _ taakut _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe yamiki _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ tamaakut _ , _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ liisimakagh i _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ P as s o v er -em _ pi naqngu uq _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ . _ "
tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ p al a c e- ng ani _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ , _ C a i ap h as -em _ .
agghi tkekagh at _ Jesus _ ak saq l uk lu _ tugu luku _ , _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ N eq en gh aghq em mi _ pin aanghi tagh put _ , _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ . _ "
Jesus _ B et h an y - m e taq ng ami _ S im o n -en kun it k aq _ l ep r o s y - l gu y alghii mi _ .
aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ , _ tugumiiqe lukek _ al a b as te r - ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ imaleg k _ akitu pigte lghii meng _ tepe ngllagh sigh meng _ . _ negh ma luku _ naa s q w akun _ kuuve gkakek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ .
iwernga _ malig s aagh tet _ esghagh luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ sangan _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike kaqsagh kumikek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ mani u tke ghllag lukek _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh nayagh aa _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake luki _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ segh l equ ugh es teg gu _ aghnagh _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ tam aan s aghq aag ut _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
T ep eng ll agh qell egh m i kun _ yugusigh ka _ y at aagh q eng ng w aa _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nani _ alngunak _ una _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ , _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ apegh aqe lleqe aat _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un _ pi luni _ ,
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tuune lleqe ste ngnga _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ tuune gkumkun _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ key-tu tete luku _ 3 0 _ silver _ mani meng _ llivikekagh at _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ Jesus _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Y e as t- al ill ghi ll ngu u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ malig s aagh tet _ Jesus _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ nani _ yataaghqe te sug ziin _ whang kun nun _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ negh es qell u ten _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ J er us al em - e mun _ pi tek _ . _ yuug _ tea- magh an tuq _ ; _ ungipaate nakesi _ , _ ' _ apeghtugh i sta _ pi uq _ , _ pi lleghqagh ka _ kaate naqe uq _ . _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqagh ut _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ elpesi ni _ . _ ' _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh t _ , _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ yataaghqekagh at _ .
I ghi v g agh y ag u _ Jesus -en kut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ t ip el ng i _ aqume te tke aat _ negh na luteng _ .
neghe uute ma luki _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
M al ig s aagh tet _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ tuungligh igh qutagh luteng _ aapte aataghkagh at _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ t aan ang u uq _ negh ke ni _ neptekanga _ sagnegh mun _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
ipapestaaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ . _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh un aq ngu uq _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
U v egh pag ut is te m _ J u d as -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taawa _ el pen eng _ apegh uten _ . _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ Jesus-em _ tugu luku _ neqekrangllagh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ malig s aagh t en i _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ megh vike aatagh teggu _ qamagte lusi _ .
taana _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ seghevute sigh u luni _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ , _ w in e- egh r agh agh meng _ meghe lgusigh lleqe amsi _ ata ma _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagagh luteng _ aane luteng _ M o un t _ O l iv es - mun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U n ug mi _ whani _ , _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ un iq agh aa lleq agh pesi nga _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ tuqu llegh meng _ sivu gpesini _ aglagh lleqe unga _ galilee- mun _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luten _ elpek _ qaywa _ ila ma _ un iq agh aat egh ng aaten _ , _ whanga _ un in n aanghi t ng waagh am ken _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ r o o s te r - a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ke t w el l _ n all un qell eq agh pe nga _ . _ "
P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuquma lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ n all un q en n aanghi tam ken _ . _ " _ M al ig s aagh te t lu _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ tawaten _ .
taagken _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ kaate tke aat _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ gethsemane- meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aqumugh u tek _ taaggun _ , _ ingavek _ yughagh yaghtugh ma lunga _ . _ "
tazingavek _ kelqekagh i _ , _ peter _ , _ Z e b e d e e- m llu _ ighnegh kek _ . _ taagken _ q iv gh ugh llag em llu _ segh l el iigh em llu _ kaate kestagh qagh a _ ,
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qaame na ke _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ , _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ Taw an ll usi _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
T a z ing a pi gh q aagh luni _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ meghe nghite langa _ whaken _ qayuusigh meng _ ; _ iwernga _ nakaan _ piyuke lleg mtun _ , _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ t aku yaq min ik i _ pi nga yu t _ malig s aagh t en i _ qavaa ut _ . _ enkaam _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ K el eng al gu sigh pag n ing i tes teng ng aa _ ataasigh _ aflu _ ?
kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ nan ghii qu ll eng en ghi tes qell usi _ . _ I p aap es taa q _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ tazingavek _ aglagh luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ megh yaghqaqe u kumkun _ una _ qayuusigh _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
T aku n qig saq min ik i _ malig s aagh t en i _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ .
Jesus-em _ unite laatagh luki _ , _ tazingani _ pingayut iqe ai _ yughagh lleg ni _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ y ugh at _ atuqe luki _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh t en i _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ seghlegh q es t en un _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ ii-i _ , _ uka _ uvegh ghpagte te i steke _ . _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ .
U v egh pag ut is te m _ J u d as -em _ kaate vagilgameng _ ila ni _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ungipaate kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ ellnga u uq _ piyukekagh i _ . _ tugu nakesi _ . _ "
J u d as -em _ takuaghaghte luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ aga _ sa aqe ziin _ pi lleghqagh n _ pi gu _ ! _ " _ taagken _ taku luku _ Jesus _ akuqagh luku _ n uq negh te q aat _ .
tawani _ naligh ita _ yug t _ Jesus - m el nguut _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ kepe qaghtekagh a _ sigute a _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ qep ghagh te l aagh an _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ savigpag n _ kanaghte gu _ qantagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ savigpag meng _ atuqe i lghiit _ savigpag kun _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ .
S um egh pen ii - i _ ata ka _ kayute ngllagh naanghite ni luku _ pi z ig u u _ ? _ aaptekumkun _ taw an ing in aq _ 7 2 , 0 0 0 -en eng _ uglagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ pi ll u w agh tet _ kayagte nayagh ai _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghiigh yaghqaa lghiit _ igaqe llegh megestun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ T ug u yagh tugh es teng ng aa _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ , _ nikimqun _ w ay aghn iigh tes tun _ ayuqe lunga _ ? _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ aqume lunga _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ tug ung ig atagh pesi nga _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi u ut _ , _ apeghiigh na luki _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqegkagh it _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ " _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ malig s aagh tet _ unite luku _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ tug us teng it a _ aglagh tke aat _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ , _ C a i ap h as -em _ , _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
U y av aq aan lluni _ P e te r -em _ maligtekagh a _ c o u r t y ar d - ng anun _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ mangteghagh an _ . _ itegh luni _ aqume lgusighkagh i _ k el eng ak is tet _ esghapag na luku _ Jesus _ sa yaghqaa ta at _ .
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ag ghi s tet _ iq l eng iq utk es teng naq utk egk at _ Jesus _ tuqute ste pigesnagh na luku _ .
iwernga _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtughkagh t _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ esnevagh aqe luteng _ apegh aatagh yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ apeghkagh it _ allake tke aat _ . _ qenwat llu _ yug k _ esnevagh lutek _ 
pikagh k _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ temple- a _ naa f q es aq leg w aaq a _ enkaam _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ pi ng ay ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ yug k _ apegh llegh gkenun _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh amken _ ungipaate kut _ Christ- ang u z ii n _ ? _ ighnegh ke aten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi llegh gpetun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uu m _ kingu aneng _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh akun _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh m _ , _ es ghagh lleq agh si llu _ tagi lghii _ qilawaagh itgun _ qilaga m _ . _ "
taagken _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ aatkagh ni _ piigugh magh ita _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh u ni luni _ pi lghii _ ! _ alla _ lii simak is teng is agh ng aam ta _ pi lta _ . _ legan _ whaa _ nag atagh si _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ !
naten _ elpek si _ nanqigte steggu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqute yaghqaaghte ma uq _ . _ "
taagken _ gginagh akun _ qesigh qukagh at _ , _ tenglug agaataghkagh at llu _ , _ enkaam _ q as agh tes teng it a
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ elpek _ Christ- a _ uuknaliqe te kut _ ! _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ "
tawaten _ taakut _ pi ma luki _ c o u r t y ar d - mi _ peter _ aqumgakagh _ . _ Q ep ghagh te m _ aghnaghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ Jesus - m et kaa gu ten _ , _ galilee-kagh mii mi _ . _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesag igh aqe aq _ sivu itni _ tamaakut _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ . _ "
aane yan _ c o u r t y ar d -em _ iteghvig anun _ ila yan _ qep ghagh te m _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh luku _ peter _ , _ taw an l e nguut _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ Jesus - m et kaa g uq _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii mi _ . _ "
peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ . _ "
mulunghituq _ , _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tagi luteng _ , _ peter _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipa _ ila ke aaten _ Jesus-em _ mal igh sagh teng it a _ qayughllak _ akuzillegh n _ galilee-kagh mii stun _ ayuqe uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ ungipaate amsi _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ ! _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ r o o s te r - a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ P e te r -em _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ pi llgh a _ , _ " _ R o o s te r - a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ pi nga yu neng _ n all un qell eq agh pe nga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ aane luni _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
unaangu luku _ qamagte luteng _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute ste na luku _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ asighqellug qu _ aglagh te luku _ tuunekagh at _ pilate- mun _ , _ R o m e -em _ g o v er n o r - ng anun _ .
U v egh pag ut is te m _ J u d as -em _ , _ lii g ik saq min ik i _ ag ghi s tet _ nanqigte ma kangat _ Jesus _ tuqutesaghqagh u luku _ , _ qemall _ avuteghqe ghllagkagh _ . _ enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un llu _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ veghute yaghtugh qu ai _ 3 0 _ si l v er - et _ mani t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ seghleghqe ma unga _ uvegh ghpagte te lleg mkun _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ yuug _ tuqute sqellug qu _ ! _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Wh ang kun nun _ sasii lleqe a _ ? _ elpek _ tawaten _ pil q an _ ! _ "
enkaam _ J u d as -em _ milugh tke ai _ mani t _ T em p l e -em _ ilu anun _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqe luni _ qemitekagh _ .
Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et _ saghna te kete luki _ mani t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ ukut _ mani t _ kanaghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ manilghutagh anun _ T em p l e -em _ qayughllak _ ll iv i ku us aq eg kaa g ut _ tuqute sighqagh u luteng _ yug mun _ . _ "
enkaam _ agghi tkekagh at _ mat- ni _ tukfigh i sigh ke na luku _ nuna mun _ ategh llegh ke lghii _ , _ " _ P o t te r Ê¼ s _ field _ " _ llivegh vigkagh u luku _ n aku um ii nun _ .
enkaam _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ taa m _ nuna m _ ateligh tke a _ , _ " _ nuna a _ aaw m _ " _ .
neghigh luku _ u uk nal iq is te m _ J er em i a h - m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ ila ita _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ it ag naq egk aq iit _ ang tal ang it _ 3 0 _ silver _ mani t _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ akitutka ni luku _ pi ke aat _ . _ taagken _ taakut _ mani t _ tukfigh i sigh kekagh it _ P o t te r Ê¼ s _ F i el d - mun _ . _ tawaten _ Atan ghem _ qelqe aqe aanga _ . _ " _ J er em i a h - m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiigh stekaqe aat _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et _ tukfigh aqe yamegteggu _ P o t te r Ê¼ s _ field _ .
tawani _ Jesus _ nekevgha lghii _ sivungagh kun _ R o m e -em _ g o v er n o r - ng an _ . _ G o v er n o r -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ J e w s - et _ U m iil k at aan _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ tawatete ni luku _ pi an _ . _ "
iwernga _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ anaggute ni ghngaatni _ , _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ .
taagken _ P il ate -em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ N ag a si k ii _ qamagte luki _ anaggute ni llegh it _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ talwa _ ataasigh mun _ anaggute ni llegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ g o v er n o r - a _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ .
ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ P as s o v er -em _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ R o m e -em _ g o v er n o r - ng an _ iteme te aqe a _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug lghute t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ tam aan te f tuq _ apeghseghugh _ anusimingllagh aq _ , _ ategh a _ B ar a b b a s _ .
enkaam _ yug lghute _ qerngughte yan _ , _ P il ate -em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ B ar a b b a s _ nalighmeng _ Jesus _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ Christ- ameng _ ? _ "
P il ate -em _ liisimake u kangi _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellmi nun _ .
P il at e _ aqumga ma luku _ nanqigtivig mi _ , _ nulighh an _ ungipaatesaghtugh qu a _ , _ " _ sa naqe fqaan _ taana _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ yuug _ qayughllak _ qavangugh ke kaqe aqa _ enkaam _ aghn el qu si q _ seghleliigh sigh ke aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ma luku _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ iteme te sqellug qu _ B ar a b b a s _ , _ Jesus _ tuqute sqellug qu _ .
G o v er n o r -em _ aapte laataghkagh i _ yug lghute t _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ elpesi nun _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ B ar a b b a s _ ! _ "
P il ate -em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ S an aq si kun Ê¼ ng am _ Jesus _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ Christ- ameng _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P il ate -em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ ? _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ pi kaqe agu _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ ig l ag t aagh all uteng _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
P il at e _ liigike luni _ alla _ sapagningite yami _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute t _ seghleliigh kestagh lghiit _ , _ tugu lukek _ aghmigusigh k _ uughtughkagh _ sivu itni _ yug lghute t _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ avute ite unga _ tuqute lleghqagh anun _ , _ elpek si _ tawaten _ pi s teng ng waagh si _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ ii ngun aghh agh meng _ aki tke aat _ , _ " _ whangkuta _ kingunegh ke te lghii ni _ avute u lleqe ukut _ tuqute llegh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ P il ate -em _ B ar a b b a s _ iteme te luku _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ pi ll u w agh t en un _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ g o v er n o r -em _ pi ll u w agh teng it a _ aglagh tke aat _ Jesus _ q er ngugh t aagh v ig meg g nun _ g o v er n o r -em _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ tawani _ ila teng _ qerngughte luki _ kangllukagh at _ .
aatkagh i _ mataghte qugh luki _ , _ kavirrakegtagh gneng _ atkuyaagh gneng _ aate ste vikekagh at _ .
taagken _ sikughllugtuqagh meng _ avayagh meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ naa s q w akun _ aate stekagh at _ . _ aghenqignegh an llu _ iiggagh kun _ tugu ste luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ , _ segesqughte uute luteng _ sivungagh kun _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Q u ul v agh am ken _ umiileg at _ J e w s - et _ ! _ "
taagken _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ tugu luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ naa s q w akun _ anagu llegh ke aat _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ apeghiigh yamegteggu _ , _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate te squgh ke ait _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
aane ma luteng _ ne ghllag meng _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ , _ C y r en e- egh m ii _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ , _ qelqe aat _ uyamig sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ qaquuragh a _ .
kaate yameng _ G o l g o t h a- mun _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ N aa s q w an _ nenge a _ " _ ) _ ,
pi ll u w agh tet _ Jesus - mun _ tuunekagh at _ megh sqellug qu _ wine- a _ s ung aghn il ngugh meng _ akumekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naasiigh luku _ megh y un ghi t k aa _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ , _ nengigh tke ait _ aatkagh i _ ateghteiiraagh te kaqe luki _ .
taagken _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ kelengakekagh at _ .
N aa s q w an _ qule akun _ nekegtekagh at _ qaquuragh llegh anun _ apallugh _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ una _ J E S U S - N G U U Q _ , _ umiileg at _ J E W S - E T _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita _ 
akilghuukagh at _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi kau uten _ temple- a _ naa f q en naq n il uku _ enkaam _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ ne ke f neq ig g naq n il uku _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ el pen eng _ katam _ yugu li _ , _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig i _ ! _ "
Taw at egh pig aq _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- et _ , _ maligte te luteng _ apeghtugh i kayug nun _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ ,
" _ yuguligh u iqe ai _ ila i _ , _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ ! _ umiileg u kuni _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ ukig li _ qaquuragh mineng _ enkaam _ ugpeq n ay agh agh put _ .
neghyuke u a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ pi aqe uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke u kunigu _ yug ul il igu _ maaten _ . _ "
qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ legasiighwagh tkekagh ak _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ m am legh q w aa k aq _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ t h r e e- k l aag mun _ .
tea- ma ni _ nani _ t h r e e- k l aag mi _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ El i _ , _ El i _ , _ l am a _ s a b a c h t h ani _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ taw an l e nguut _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ nepsag sigh meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ qu w aal ghii mun _ wine- mun _ , _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ Jesus - mun _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ El i j a h - m _ yug ul iyagh tugh n ay uk ag u _ ! _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ pegtekakek _ taghneghagh gni _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ , _ pikegken _ kanavek _ pike aq _ mal gh ugh qell uni _ . _ nuna _ ufsug te yan _ , _ uyghag t _ quupe aghtagh tke aat _ ,
llivegh t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ uglagh lghiit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ tuqu laghate te kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh uute tke aat _ ,
enkaam _ llivegh meggneng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ . _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ unguv agh te llgh an _ aglagh uute tke aat _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ qaquuragh vig mi _ , _ um iil waagh en kut _ pi ll u w agh te ku llgh h iit _ kelengake kangat _ Jesus _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ nuna _ qaprag ghllag lghii _ , _ tamaa na llu _ sa u a _ pi yan _ , _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ ighnegh ke ma yagh agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
Tam aan te f tut _ aghnagh lghute t _ esghapag lghiit _ uyavagh neng _ . _ galilee- meng _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ kayusiite na luki _ .
A ku l ng it n i te f tut _ mary _ M ag d al a- gh m ii _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ J am es -en kuk _ J o s ep h -en kuk _ , _ Z e b e d e e- m llu _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ .
Wh an i ku y ag u _ ak l ung il nguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ Joseph _ , _ A r im at h e a- gh m ii _ , _ maligte yaaghte nga _ Jesus-em _ kaate tke aq _ .
pilate- mun _ pi luni _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ tungsigh iqe a _ . _ enkaam _ P il ate -em _ qelegh tke a _ yugusigh _ J o s ep h - mun _ tuune sqellug qu _ .
En kaa ng am _ tugu luku _ yugusigh a _ , _ nutaghaghllug kun _ q ii p agh akun _ imeg tke a _ .
taagken _ llikagh a _ ellmi _ lliveghraghagh mig qu te _ , _ uyghag ghrugllag kun _ laag stekagh mikun _ siklagh kumeng _ . _ taagken _ paye anun _ up- llghite aghte luku _ uyghag ghllag _ , _ apeghiigh yami _ aghulaqekagh _ .
Taw an te f tu k _ mary _ M ag d al a- gh m iin kuk _ , _ aag llegh a llu _ mary _ llivegh mun _ ayuqe lutek _ aqumga lghiik _ .
unaami ani _ kingu aneng _ Y at aghq ef ig em _ aghnegh an _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ aleghqugh yaghtugh qu aat _ P il at e _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ neq am ik agh put _ taana _ puughte i sta _ salin _ unguva luni _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh ste lleqe unga _ . _ '
En kaa ng am _ kayagte te gu _ llivegh a _ k el eng ak ng waagh es qell uku _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ , _ luuraq _ malig s aagh teng it a _ yugusigh a _ tegleg luku _ ungipaate na yu katki _ yug t _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ . _ una _ iq l eng aq _ seghlegh atagh aa yaghq aag uq _ sivuligh meng _ . _ "
P il ate -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ K el eng ak is te l gu usi _ , _ elngaatall _ k el eng ak es teng ng waagh teg gu _ llivegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ llivegh mun _ aglagh luteng _ maghqate luku _ nallu na iqe aat _ uyghag _ qelpeghte na yu katgu _ . _ taagken _ qelegh tke aat _ pi ll u w agh t en un _ kelengake sqellug qu _ .
S a b b at h -em _ kingu aneng _ , _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ mary _ M ag d al a- gh m ii _ , _ ila a llu _ M ar y - m _ , _ llivegh _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ak _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ nuna _ qaprag ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg a _ qilag meng _ ukikagh _ . _ llivegh m _ paye an _ uyghag a _ up- llghite aghtagh luku _ aqumekagh a _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nighugte pagte te te lghii stun _ nighugtu tekagh mi _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ qategh lghiit _ anigu stun _ .
K el eng ak is tet _ yaquleg meng _ alingruughkagh t _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ , _ tuqukagh stun llu _ lli aqe aat _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh k _ yaquleg m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ liisimake amtek _ Jesus _ ivagh aqe aghte tek _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ .
Wh aan negh i tuq _ ; _ unguvagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ tagi tek _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh tegnegu _ llivike yagh kanga _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate qaghte yaghtugh tegneki _ malig s aagh teng i _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ aga llu _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ galilee- mun _ . _ taagani _ es ghagh lleq agh si _ ! _ taawa _ ungipaate amtek _ . _ "
En kaa ng am _ taw an ing in aq _ llivegh meng _ aghulaqekagh k _ , _ alinge magh egmek llu _ quya ghllag magh egmek llu _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aik _ malig s aagh teng i _ .
Jesus-em _ aliigh aghte vike lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh _ el pe teg n ill i _ . _ " _ enkaam _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ taku luku _ , _ itegagh i _ n uq neq luki _ manigugh qu ak _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ ungipaate yaghtugh tegneki _ mal igh s aagh t en ka _ anglegute yagh u i tke anka _ , _ G al il e e- m un Ê¼ nguq _ aglagh lit _ taagani nguq _ esghagh lleqe aatnga _ . _ "
aghnagh k _ igleghte ma lukek _ , _ ll iv egh m el nguut _ ila i _ k el eng ak is tet _ J er us al em - e mun _ itegh luteng _ , _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un _ apeghkagh at _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ apeghiighkagh _ .
enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte luteng _ agghi tke aat _ . _ taagken _ m an il it egh llag luki _ pi ll u w agh tet _ ,
pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ungipaate nakesi _ yug t _ , _ ' _ U n ug mi _ qavaa te ma luta _ malig s aagh teng it a _ tagi luteng _ tegleg ma ut _ yugusigh a _ . _ '
G o v er n o r -em _ nagaqugh ma kagu _ whangkuta _ al egh qugh lleq agh put _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg nge naanghite usi _ . _ "
K el eng ak is tet _ mat- ni _ tugu luku _ pi sqe llegh megestun _ pikagh t _ . _ enkaam _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ J e w s - et _ paninang _ apegh aqe aat _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ tegleg kaqe ni luku _ malig s aagh teng anun _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ taakut _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh tet _ aglaghkagh t _ galilee- mun _ , _ naayghagh mun _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ tawaten _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ manigugh qu aat _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga u ta a _ .
Jesus-em _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qamagte luni _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eq _ qilag mi llu _ , _ nuna mi llu _ whanga mnun _ tagivagh kau uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghulaqe lusi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ maligte yaaghte ngllagh teki _ whanga mnun _ , _ p aap taa y el agh tek i _ ategh akun _ ata m _ , _ ighnegh m _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ .
apeghtuusagh qite ki _ q aatk es qell uki _ qamagte luki _ qelegh tke anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpesinite pestaagh lleqe unga _ quunpeng _ kenlanga _ ken l et gh uu te llgh anun _ nuna m _ . _ "
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piinligh kau ut _ whaten _ :
U uk nal iq is te m _ I s a i a h - m _ igaqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ " _ ungipaghteke _ kayagte kestagh naqe aqa _ sivu gpeni _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ .
kilgaa ni _ me _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Atan ghem _ tume a _ yataaghqe teggu _ , _ taklaghte ggu llu _ ! _ ' _ "
taana _ ungipagh a _ J o h n - ngu uq _ paaptaaye sta _ . _ kilgaa ni _ p aap taa y el agh aq uq lu _ ungipagh aqe uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ A v utegh qell usi _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh l usi _ p aap taa y e tek _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ . _ "
J u d e a- gh m iit lu _ J er us al em - egh m iit lu _ nagate yaghtugh tke aat _ John _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ apeghragh nghatki _ p aap taa y aaq egk angi _ kiiw gni _ J o r d an - meng _ ategh ke lghii gni _ .
J o h n -em _ aatkagh i _ c am el -em _ m el q w aneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ negh aqe lghii _ l o c us t- m eng llu _ h o ne y - m eng llu _ .
ungipagh ke ikagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ kingu mneng _ yuug _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi tagh alghii _ whanga mneng _ . _ whanga _ sasii nghite unga _ repall _ i tem te pag n ing it an ka _ singigh a _ .
megh meng _ p aap taa y aa qam si _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga n _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
John _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ Jesus _ kaate tke aq _ nazareth- meng _ , _ G al il e e- m el ngugh meng _ , _ enkaam _ J o h n -em _ paaptaayekagh a _ J o r d an - eg ni _ .
paaptaaye negh meng _ taaqe yatni _ Jesus-em _ taw an ing in aq _ esghaghkagh i _ qilag t _ qelpegh lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik llu _ taghneghagh k _ uki lghiik _ ellmi nun _ d o v e- e tun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
me m llu _ qilag meng _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ . _ efqugh ke pigte amken _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ Jesus _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ kilgaa nun _ .
E ll ng in aghh aa k aq _ iwerngaqun _ nuyaagh lghiit _ teghig ke sagh t _ tam aan tek at _ . _ Tam aan sim al uku _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqukagh a _ ke t wh el l _ 4 0 _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ yaquleg t _ aflengakekagh at _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ kingu aneng _ J o h n -em _ anusimingllagh llegh an _ , _ Jesus _ galilee-llug ni _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghneghtagh neng _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ whaa _ kaate ma uq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaa _ whaante uq _ ! _ A v utegh qell usi _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh l usi _ ugpeqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ! _ "
Jesus _ igleghte te kete luku _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ esne akun _ esghagh kakek _ maalghug _ iqalliniigh tek _ siifte i lghiik _ negaghpag meng _ . _ S im o n -en ku ngu f tu k _ A n d r e w - n kuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh naqe amtek _ yug meng _ naa p s ag u tes qell u tek _ . _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
T a z ing a pi gh q aagh luni _ esghagh laatagh kakek _ J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e- m _ . _ negaghpag megteneng _ ilaaghtu lghiik _ angyagh megteni _ .
Jesus-em _ esghaqagh inagh lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ angyagh kun _ unite luku _ ata ek _ Z e b e d e e _ , _ taakut llu _ qep ghagh te ngu luki _ tugukagh teng _ , _ maligtekagh ak _ Jesus _ .
Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ kaate tke aat _ . _ S a b b at h - ngugh s ag u _ , _ Jesus _ s y nag o gu e- ell uni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
nagate lghiit _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi llegh q al i te llgh akun _ , _ apegh tu ghi s teng is tun _ liilightuusagh t _ pi gpenani _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ itegh luni _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ akilghuukagh _ ,
" _ Jesus _ , _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ , _ sangamta _ qinuyug zikut _ ? _ N aa f q es agh tu u z i ku ut _ ? _ kina nge uten _ liisimake aqa _ , _ yuguligh i ste u uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ kayagte lleqe ni luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ N ep ngun an g _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ yuug _ sayugpagtagh ste luku _ , _ aragh ghllag magh mi _ aanekagh _ .
yug t _ saghiigha yug luteng _ ell meg g neng _ aap qugh aagh utk at _ , _ " _ una _ sangaawa _ ? _ una _ apeghtuusaghraghagh u uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ uu m _ yug m _ qelegh ai _ tughneghagh t _ aan es qell uki _ , _ legan _ qaatke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ G al il e e- l q aagh agh mi _ yug t _ ungip aq ng in aam aan _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aane ghesnagh luni _ s y nag o gu e- meng _ , _ S im o n -en kuk _ A n d r e w - n kuk _ mangteghagh itnun _ pi ke aq _ , _ J am es -en ku k lu _ J o h n -en kuk _ maligtekagh ak _ .
S im o n -em _ saki a _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ puqlegha luni _ . _ legan _ Jesus _ kaa tuq _ ungipagh tke aat _ aghnagh _ qinuyug u ni luku _ .
itegh luni _ aghnagh _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ enkaam _ puqlegha nga i uute luni _ , _ kepsiiqu inagh magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
S a b b at h -em _ i ghi v g aani _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ Jesus - mun _ tagi qugh tke ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ C ap er n a um - egh m iit _ mangteghagh m _ manughagh ani _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ uglagh lghiit _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ aqnighnegh itneng _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug lghute t _ ilu itneng _ . _ tughneghagh t _ sa meng _ pi te ma ite kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ kina u ta a _ liisimake kangat _ .
salin _ aghsug niite ghllag luku _ , _ Jesus _ makete luni _ aanekagh _ yughagh na luni _ kilgaa ni _ .
S im o n -en kut _ il aku l ghiit _ ivagh yaghtugh qu aat _ ,
n aal k es am eg teg gu _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug t _ ivagh nghiighte te aqe aaten _ . _ "
yeghlegi _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ pi naqe ukut _ . _ ellngit ni llu _ ungipagh ke i yaghqaa unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagi u unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ G al il e e- l q aagh agh mi _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ s y nag o gu e- n ni _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ ilu itneng _ .
yuug _ l ep r o s y - l ek _ tagi luni _ Jesus - mun _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ n angll eg si pig lluni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ naallghute aghte nga _ uk mang iigh tes qell unga _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nanglleg yagute luku _ nengug luku _ sa uute te kete luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ naagh llegh u te n _ ! _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ yuug _ naallghute luni _ ukmangigh u aghtekagh _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq aa _ , _ " _ nagate aghten _ , _ wataghllak _ kinku t _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaki _ naallghute ni luten _ whanga mnun _ . _ itupill _ priest- mun _ yuvghiighsigh yagh a _ . _ enkaam _ aghq er r aagh h aaten _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh ita _ pi s qell ghi s tun _ ip a pi gh q es qell uku _ yug nun _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ " _ taagken _ taw an ing in aq _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ igleghte te kete luku _ nani _ alngunak _ apegh manginagh qagh a _ Jesus - mun _ n aal gh u sim an il uni _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ Jesus _ alngunak _ ne nun _ pi na nigh ke aq _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku aqe kangat _ , _ enkaam _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ kiyaghtekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naken _ alngunak _ yug lghute t _ paninang _ taku aqe kangat _ .
mulu gpenani _ Jesus _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ C ap er n a um - e mun _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh kekagh at _ n ayuq aq eg ke min in n il uku _ mangteghagh mi _ .
yuug _ tagi laghate te yalghiimi _ ellnga nun _ kangsugh tke aat _ repall _ manughagh mun _ qakmavek _ . _ Jesus _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ,
estamat _ yug t _ kevegtugh luku _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ tagi tke aat _ ellnga nun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute nghmeng _ aghtugh qu aat _ , _ qayughllak _ yuug _ kangsuute ghllagu lghii _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh m _ qaye an _ tile- nge i _ ikugh luki _ r egh igh ull uku _ , _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ uk ig te kaa t _ Jesus-em _ nalla akun _ .
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ ugpeq i llegh tu l ng it _ , _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ . _ "
tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aqumga te lghiit _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ ,
" _ sangami _ yuug _ una _ tawaten _ akuzi a _ ? _ akuzillegh a _ seghleghu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ seghevute i yaghqagh _ ! _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ Jesus-em _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ liisimakekagh i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
N al i ke k _ piyaqnagh u i aatagh aghte lleqe ak _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi yagh kumkun _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ piyug i _ ? _ '
iwernga _ liisimake sug aqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ segh ev ut iy aq leg u uq _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ ungipaate amken _ , _ maketen _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ elpesi nun _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yug t _ esghapagkagh at _ yuug _ taw an ing in aq _ nekeve luni _ , _ allighagh ni _ tugu luku _ aane lghii _ . _ enkaam _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ taw an l e nguut _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at llu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ Wh ate l ngugh meng _ esghaate igate yagh ukut _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ , _ esne anun _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ pi nqigtekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate te yatni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ t a x - neng _ qerngughte i sta _ , _ ategh a _ levi _ , _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e us -em _ . _ aqumga uq _ qepghagh vig mini _ . _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ L ev i -em _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
tawani _ i ghi v g agh mi _ , _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ L ev i -en ku nun _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ . _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ t a x - neng _ q er ngugh t is te l gh u te t lu _ tamaakut llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ . _ ( _ Taw ate l ngu ut lu _ yug t _ maligsaagh u kangat _ Jesus _ . _ )
ila i _ apeghtughiste it _ liilightuusagh t _ P h a ris e es - ngu l ghiit _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ neghe lgusigh i lghii _ , _ aaptekagh it _ malig s aagh teng i _ , _ " _ sangami _ Jesus _ negh aqa _ t a x -em _ q er ngugh t is teng it n illu _ seghlegh q es t en illu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghallegtagh _ qinuyug lghii nun _ pi u uq _ , _ yugunqegtagh nun _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ungipaate yaghtugh u anka _ seghlegh q es tet _ av utegh q es qell uki _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe igate ni luteng _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ malig s aagh teng illu _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ f as t- e ngu l ghiit _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangameng _ J o h n -em _ P aap taa y es te m _ malig s aagh teng illu _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ malig s aagh teng it _ fast- u aqe aat _ , _ naqam _ elpek _ malig s aagh te ten _ pi gpenateng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ aqelqagh i _ f as t- ell eq aat _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ paninang _ taw an ll uku _ tawaten _ pi naanghite ut _ .
nulightugh naqe lghii stun _ ayuqe unga _ , _ malig s aagh t en ka _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ aq el q ii s tun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghulaqe stegkanganga _ elngaatall _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ malig s aagh t en ka _ f as t- ell equ t _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nutaghagh _ qiipaghagh _ qellughte ma ite ngughk _ ilaagh sigh ke naanghite a _ qaasligh lug gnun _ . _ ilaagh sigh ke gkunigu _ piigughtu aghagh lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ s ull ev atagh ll equ q _ .
enkaamllu _ kitum _ alngunak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh naanghite a _ w in e- egh r agh agh meng _ . _ imigh kunigu _ awataghpag lug _ quupaghte lleqe uq _ enkaam _ wine- a _ sakusiiqe lleqe uq _ , _ awataghpag lug llu _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ w in e- egh r agh aq _ awataghpagraghagh mete te _ kuuve yaghqaa uq _ ! _ "
ataasigh mi _ S a b b at h - mi _ , _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ wh e at - et _ piite vig itgun _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng it a _ iglegha lgusigh te kete luku _ wh e at - et _ piigtu ta itneng _ ikute aghtagh qukagh t _ negh na luteng _ .
taagken _ P h a ris e es - et _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ ! _ sangameng _ malig s aagh te ten _ saghna ut _ wh e at - et _ piigtu ta itneng _ ? _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ qepghagh ut _ S a b b at h - mi _ , _ enkaam _ qaatke te nghite u ut _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t igh t iig as teg gu _ D av i d -em _ pi llgh a _ q av ng ar ug llak _ ? _ Y u ku ll ghiit _ iyatagh iqe aqngameng _ ,
David _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ neghe kau uq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ A b i at h a r _ , _ H ig h _ P r i es t- ngu luku _ . _ liilightuusagh mta _ pi llgh ani _ priest- nge i nagh ghhaat _ negh yaghqaa yagh ut _ tamaaken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ David _ negh luni _ yug ni llu _ tuune kaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ S a b b at h - a _ nakmike kau uq _ megh nal iv ig ul uni _ yug m _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ . _ S a b b at h - a _ nakmike kau nghite uq _ yug mun _ ik f iq l iigh utk es qell uku _ .
En kaa ng am _ whanga _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ , _ Atan gh uu nga _ talwa _ S a b b at h - mun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ , _ taw an te f tuq _ yuug _ inglu i _ iigge an _ unegh ii iqe aat _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ taw an l e nguut _ riirngi u aqe aat _ Jesus-em _ naallghute na yu kagu _ S a b b at h - mi _ . _ naallghute kagu _ whaten _ pi na luku _ , _ " _ anaggute uten _ ! _ "
uniighkagh meng _ iigge leg _ yuug _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug t _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mta _ sa sqe inkut _ S a b b at h - mi _ ? _ pinitun _ pi s q in ku ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ ? _ Yug ul i ghi s q in ku ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuq ut is q in ku ut _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ yug t _ q all eg nan igh waagh utk at _ .
Jesus-em _ esghapag ghngaaghmiki _ ugumi yagutekagh i _ , _ naqam _ iilqe tke magh ita _ pineghllug u llegh itneng llu _ w aa k ig at ng it neng llu _ . _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ qiive luku _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iigge ten _ nengug te ki _ . _ " _ legan _ nengug te ai _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
enkaam _ P h a ris e es - et _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ s y nag o gu e- meng _ , _ H er o d -em _ il ap g as teng it nun _ aglagh luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ Jesus _ .
Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligtekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kangit _ Jesus-em _ all aagh ll ug wh agh t i llgh i _ . _ tamaa na _ yug lghute _ galilee- meng _ , _ J u d e a- meng _ , _ J er us al em - e meng _ , _ I d um e a- meng _ , _ J o r d an -em _ kiiw m _ ing l ung an il ngugh neng _ nuna neng _ , _ T y r e- meng _ , _ S i d o n - meng _ pi u lghiit _ .
yuug _ uglaghi ghllag yan _ Jesus _ malig s aagh te min un _ angyagh meng _ yataaghqe te sqekagh _ luuraq _ igh llegh n ay uk ang at ni _ megh mun _ .
yug lghute _ naallghute qugh kaqe ta aneng _ qamagte luteng _ q in u yuget _ ellnga nun _ kaate naqe ghllag ke aat _ saafte pigesnagh na luku _ .
tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ il ung it n il nguut _ esghagh nghmegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ sivungagh kun _ u llgh agh ll uteng _ akilghuu aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ i negh teng ng w aaq ii _ tughneghagh t _ kina u te ni _ apegh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ yug t _ piyukekagh ni _ tag sigh te q ii _ . _ tagi laghate te yata _ 
nakmikegkagh i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yug t _ ap o s t l e- ngu luki _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Wh ang am n i tes qell usi _ nakmike amsi _ , _ kayagte lleqe amsi llu _ ungip agh yagh t ii s qell usi _ .
Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu ll equ si llu _ tughneghagh t _ aan es tes qell uki _ yug neng _ . _ "
ukut _ nakmike kaqe ai _ , _ simon _ , _ ( _ Jesus-em _ ateghagh iqe a _ peter- meng _ ) _ ;
J am es -en kuk _ J o h n -en kuk _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Z e b e d e e- m _ , _ ( _ Jesus-em _ atigh kakek _ B o an er g es - meng _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ ighnegh kek _ kallug m _ " _ ) _ ;
A n d r e w - n kut _ , _ P h il ip -en kut _ , _ B ar t h o l o m e w - n kut _ , _ M at t h e w - n kut _ , _ T h o m as -en kut _ , _ J am es - llu _ ighnegh a _ A l p h a e us -em _ , _ T h a d d a e us -en kut _ , _ S im o n - llu _ Z e al o t- a _ ,
Judas _ I s c ar i o t- lu _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ Jesus - meng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ tukugh minun _ aglaghkagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute laataghkagh t _ ellngit nun _ , _ repall _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ .
N eng ll ug ut ang an _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ aneghte llegh a _ aqfakagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ pi kangat _ nallungughte ni luku _ .
ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ J er us al em - e meng _ tagikagh t _ whaten _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ Beelzebul _ Jesus-em _ ilu anite uq _ ! _ enkaam _ aane ste qugh aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ B e el z e b ul -em _ , _ um iil w aa ghi t gun _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tagsigh luki _ yug t _ ungipaghaate ke ai _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ ellmi neng _ aane ste lleqe a _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh _ aafte uute kuni _ , _ taana _ ataneghpag u llegh _ q er ng agh m en n aanghi tuq _ .
nengllugute t _ aafte uute kumeng _ , _ taakut _ nengllugute t _ q er ng agh m en n aanghi tut _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ tughneghaan- kut _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ tughneghagh _ nekevghapagningite te luni _ kenle kaghqagh minun _ kaate lleqe uq _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ w ay agh tegh nal uki _ saghya i _ . _ sivuke luku _ iknaqe lghii _ yuug _ asighqe aghte luku _ , _ taagken _ w ay agh tegh lleq ii _ saghya i _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke llegh itneng _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke gkumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ seghlegh q eng ngu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ . _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ ke ng l eng il ngu ug uq _ . _ "
Jesus _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ pi kaqe kangat _ , _ " _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ilu mikun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ naange a llu _ ang leg ut ang illu _ kaate tke aat _ . _ manughagh mete luteng _ aanesqekagh at _ esghagh yug ni luku _ .
yug lghute t _ aqume uute nga lghiit _ Jesus-em _ u v it ang ani _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ qakma _ naa gpek llu _ anglegute gpek llu _ esghagh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
Yug s ugh al uni _ aqumga lghiit _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ naa ke amsi llu _ , _ anglegute ke amsi llu _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ anglegute ke aqa llu _ naa ke aqa llu _ . _ "
Taa k w an ing ani _ Jesus _ apeghtugh i laataghkagh _ naayvagh m _ G al il e e- m _ esne ani _ . _ elngaatall _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ tagi laghate te ghllag ke aq _ ellnga nun _ , _ repall _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ llaaghanwha _ yug lghute t _ naayvagh m _ es neng an it k at _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ all aagh iin agh meng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ nagate tek _ ! _ piitesighagh a _ aglagh luni _ piitesigh u aghagh vig minun _ 
ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ . _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ tume tgun _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ s un ap ag il ngugh qun _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ piite tke aat _ , _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
enkaam _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ p iin negh h at _ , _ akugh nge llegh ite u te meggneng _ paligh rakegtekagh t _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ g r a in - et _ .
naqamalla _ tamaakut _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste i ghllagkagh t _ g r a in - meng _ , _ ila i _ 3 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ Jesus _ ellng in aagh s an _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ malig s aagh teng it allu _ ila ita llu _ tamaakut _ nagatekagh t _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghaate kekagh aneng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike sta _ talugh nga lghii _ ip a pi gh qell gha _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ liite tesi mangite yagh aa _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ iqite nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ nagaqugh aqe ut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaghaate tgun _ .
enkaam _ ' _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ , _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ esghaate gpenateng _ . _ nagate aqe ut _ , _ nagate aqe ut _ liigike gpenateng _ . _ pi kaayagh kumeng _ qiive nayagh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ seghevute nayagh ai _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ taana _ ungipaghagh an _ piitesighagh a _ lii g ik en ghi tes teg gu u _ ? _ naten mi _ liigike naqe steki _ alngunak _ ungipaghaate t _ ?
piitesighagh a _ ifkaghqagh igh lghii _ piitute neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ungipaghte ngatu te _ ayuqe uq _ .
ila i _ yug t _ qelli ghllagkagh stun _ tume stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite nghata _ tume tgun _ qawaag t _ negh aqe ait _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te nghata _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ taw an ing in aq _ tughneghagh m _ puygu ste aqe ai _ .
ila i _ yug t _ uyghagtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ akugh t _ uy gh ag tuq am el nguut _ asivagh pagigate ut _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te negh meggni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ taw an ing in aq _ tugukligh aqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ ugpeq ng w aa ghi g al k ang it _ akuzi ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh it _ mulu igate ut _ . _ seghleliigh negh meggni _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyuutke lleg nge negh meggni _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ taw an ing in aq _ ugpeqe i nanigh aqe ut _ .
ila i _ yug t _ sikughllugtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ tekite ke aat _ nagu igate ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sikughllug t _ piite vig igh aqe kangit _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke igate ait _ ,
qayughllak _ una _ unguvallegh _ n ul q aa v iigh utk aq aat _ , _ teghhwaaghigh te kaqe aat llu _ aklungi _ , _ sa meng llu _ wata _ all g egh ut agh agh yug aq ut _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ sikughllug t _ p iit f ig ill ghi s tun _ piitute t _ , _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piyuke llghite a _ puygu ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ pinigh lghii stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ pinigh lghii kun _ suna kun _ elngaatall _ nagu aqe ut _ . _ ila i _ piite ta iqe ut _ 3 0 _ , _ ila i _ 6 0 _ , _ ila i _ 1 0 0 _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ qepghagh aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ila i _ wataqaaghaq _ qep ghagh at aagh agh aq ut _ ila meggneng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ itghute lukek _ sagnegh m _ asi anun _ lli naanghite ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavaghvig m _ asi anun _ . _ itupill _ qu ul v aq un _ lli lleqe ak _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ iiw iqe aq _ qaye anun _ lliigh yaghqaa uq _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ saapekagh _ saaputagh igh yaghqaa uq _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate u aghte ngnga _ ! _ T u un i llegh pesi s tu ng w aaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ , _ paninang _ tuune aghagh lleqe aisi _ .
yuug _ seal- k _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ yuug _ s ap ag llag il nguq _ sangiighhagh i _ tugu yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
whaten llu _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whatete uq _ : _ yuug _ ifkagh qugh aqe uq _ piitute neng _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mini _ .
piitute t _ piite luteng _ nagu aqe ut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yuug _ qavaa yagh ghngaan _ , _ tegh h um ay agh ng aan _ , _ paninang _ piitute t _ nag w aa qu t _ . _ yug m _ nallu kaqe ai _ naten _ nagu aqe ta i _ .
suna inagh ghhagh m _ kayute ngunani _ piitute t _ nagu ste aqe ai _ enkaam _ piite steka nge aqe ut _ : _ sivuke luteng _ sungaghyug kegtagh ghhagh t _ piite aqe ut _ , _ taagken _ n ap aa z ii ng aq ut _ qenwat llu _ g r a in - eng aq ut _ .
G r a in - et _ qigugh nghata _ unatagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ yug m _ kepugh aqe ai _ kepugh sigh mikun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun _ uspute naqe steggu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ sa u a _ ungipaghagh te kete naqe steggu _ liigike ste i sigh u luku _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ m us t ar d -em _ piitute atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ M ek es taa llegh pig aag uq _ piitute neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesigh u aghagh nghminigu _ ,
angli ghllag aqe uq _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte luni _ nun iv ag segh agh y ag g aghn eng _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ avayagh ghrugllag i _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ ququngagh an _ akule akun _ si q in ghi llgh akun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ atuqe luki _ ungipaghaate lghute t _ yug nun _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ lii g ik ell egh tu l ang is tun _ .
quunpeng _ yug t _ apeghtugh aqe kangi _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ iwernga _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ ellng in aagh h negh meg g ni _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ liigike ste aqe kangi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ ungipaghaate t _ .
Taa m _ i ghi v g aani _ Jesus-em _ angyagh mete luni _ malig s aagh t en i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghvigh lta _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ malig s aagh tet _ uugte luteng _ angyagh mun _ unitekagh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ ila ita llu _ angyagh t _ maligtekagh it _ .
taagken _ anuqligh ghllagkagh _ , _ repall _ imaghllug m _ im igh aat aqegk aa _ angyagh _ qenwat _ esleqe yaghtuqagh _ .
Jesus _ angyalligh mi _ qavagh _ akisigh luni _ . _ M al ig s aagh teng it a _ taghtughllug qu _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ tuqu yagh ng aam t aa _ pi z i ku ut _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ taghtugh luni _ an uq allu _ imaghllug t llu _ ineghtekagh i _ , _ " _ anuqe _ taaqe i ngam _ , _ imaghllug t _ aghuliigh tek _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ ellmaaragte te kete luku _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
taagken _ malig s aagh t en i _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ taawa _ ugpeq ig as teng ng aa _ ? _ "
saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ tallugh yug ghllagkagh t _ alingruugh magh meng _ , _ enkaam _ aap qugh aagh utk at _ ell meg g neng _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ , _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ? _ "
naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ kaate tke aat _ Jesus -en kut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ nuna itnun _ gerasa-kagh mii t _ .
legan _ Jesus _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ yuug _ aane luni _ suflugh itneng _ ll iv gh et _ , _ payegh qagh a _ .
taana _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh _ llivegh ni te aqe lghii _ . _ awen _ qiipraghute neng _ asighte aqe yagh kangat _ iig g it g un llu _ itegagh itgun llu _ iwernga _ sakeqe aqe kangi _ qiipraghute t _ , _ kagimte aqe kangi llu _ savikenghaagh t _ i teg am in il nguut _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ asighqepag nigh nge i tke a llu _ aghula i aghtepagningitekagh a llu _ , _ qayughllak _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ igleghte aqe lghii _ llivegh t _ qu ng ang it n illu _ qemi ni llu _ , _ quunpeng _ araghaatagh magh mi _ , _ uyghag tgun _ kiitigh qu magh mi _ ellmi neng _ .
Jesus _ esghagh yamigu _ uy av aq aan ll uku _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ segesqughte vike luku _ manigugh qu a _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ tughneghagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ tughneghagh _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ ! _ " _ tughneghagh m _ araghaatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sa naqe zinga _ ? _ akeqe i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ikfiqe stesaghqagh u fqaama _ pi s qell unga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ ? _ " _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ategh kaqe a _ ' _ uglagh ghllag _ ' _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghllag ukut _ ! _ "
elngaatall _ Jesus - mun _ aapute uute tke ai _ tughneghagh t _ aghulaqe ste fqiita _ pi s qell uki _ taagken _ nuna meng _ .
taawa nguq _ qemi m _ mingle ani _ kurugagh lghute ghllag t _ , _ neghe uute lghiit _ .
tughneghagh t _ aapute uute tke aat _ Jesus - mun _ , _ " _ K u r ug agh nun _ kayagte kut _ , _ ellngit nun _ itegh ste kut _ . _ "
enkaam _ angeghqe ma kekagh i _ . _ tughneghagh t _ yug meng _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ ku r ug agh nun _ it egh aatk at _ . _ entaqun _ 2 , 0 0 0 - nguut _ kurugagh at _ , _ pennagh neng _ asitmun _ pangaleg te luteng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghagh tke aat _ enkaam _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
kurugagh at _ af l eng ak is teng it _ qimagugh tke aat _ ne ghllag mun llu _ u v it ang an il ngugh nun llu _ nuna nun _ . _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh it _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh llu _ , _ kurugagh at llu _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ esghagh yaghtugh tke ait _ samatagh nge i _ .
Jesus - mun _ kaate luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ ilu mikun _ . _ taawa nguq _ aqumga uq _ pil ug u waagh luni _ , _ umyugagh kek llu _ naallghute lutek _ enkaam _ alingruughkagh t _ .
tamaakut _ esghapagkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ naallghute ma ni luku _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ kurugagh at _ samatagh nge i _ .
taagken _ yug lghute t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
Jesus _ uugte aqe uq llu _ angyagh mun _ , _ yug m _ tughneghaghtu yagh lghii m _ maniguute pigte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ M al ig ll ak en _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ ighsake luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengllugute gpenun llu _ , _ ilakumtaagh gpenun llu _ aglagh luten _ apegh naken _ Atan ghem _ nanglleg ke pigte luten _ apeghiigh llegh a _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ yuug _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ tamaani _ nuna mi _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag t _ , _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus-em _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmi nun _ , _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ all aagh ll u wh agh y uk at _ .
Jesus _ angyagh kun _ uteghnigh yan _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ esne mi _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qerngughte tke aat _ u v it ang anun _ .
taagken _ ataasigh _ s y nag o gu e -em _ um iil waagh a _ , _ J a i r us - ngu f tuq _ ategh a _ , _ tagi luni _ Jesus - mun _ segesqughtekagh _ manu akun _ .
maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ P an ig g aqa _ qinuyug ghllagu uq _ , _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ . _ taku aghte gu _ saafte yaghtuqagh ghhu _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute luni _ kiyaghte li _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ maligtekagh a _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ malig llegh aat kaa t _ Jesus _ , _ repall _ kangllu qaghte luku _ .
aghnagh llu _ taw an te f tuq _ aagtuqagh te aq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ ayumiqullegh ni _ . _ talwa _ aghallegtagh lghute t _ kayusiite aqe yagh ghngaatni _ naallghute igate ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ naa v ng in alghii _ . _ qenwat _ m an iq r ag g iigh utk aq _ .
nagaqugh aqe kanga _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aku l ang it gun _ tun ut ang aneng _ takukagh a _ .
sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ aatkagh i _ s aa f te q egh saq um k i _ naagh llegh u nayagh unga _ . _ "
legan _ atkuyaagh kek _ saafte ak _ kii ii te inagh u magh mi _ pi ke aq _ , _ enkaam _ elpeg kekagh a _ naallghute llegh a _ qaamna mi _ .
Taw an ing in aq _ Jesus-em _ liigikekagh a _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eq _ aane lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qiive luki _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ aatkagh nka _ saafte aki _ ? _ "
M al ig s aagh teng it a _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qu ng ang it n il ngu u ten _ sangan _ kitumun _ saafte ni luten _ pi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ esghagh naqekagh a _ kitumun _ sa uute te ni _ .
aghnagh m _ liigike luku _ naallghute lleg ni _ al ing em _ ungelegte magh mi _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ ungipagh tke a _ sa llegh mineng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ nekeggmellegh ligh luten _ aglagh a _ , _ naa llgh ut ng waagh um aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aleghqugh ma luku _ aghnagh _ , _ ke v g at _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ J a i r us _ , _ " _ panig n _ tuquma uq _ , _ t aku s q eg pen aan Ê¼ ng am _ apeghtughiste mun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate ghngaaghmiki _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ J a i r us _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpegh i _ . _ "
taagken _ kitumun _ alngunak _ maligte ste na nigh ke aq _ , _ iwerngaqun _ kelqekagh i _ P e te r -en kut _ J am es -en kut _ J o h n -en kut _ , _ ang leg ut anga _ J am es -em _ .
Jesus -en kut _ kaate yalghiimeng _ J a i r us -en ku nun _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ elngaatall _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u ut _ metuumagh meng _ .
Jesus-em _ itegh luni _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u tsi _ ? _ sangafsi _ nepugti i ghllagu tsi _ ? _ taghnughhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ , _ qavaa uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ neng l aq eg kaa t _ tawaten _ pi y is t eng _ . _ qamagte luki _ aan es am ik i _ angayuqagh kek llu _ taakut llu _ malig s aagh t en i _ itghutekagh i _ taghnughhagh m _ ne anun _ .
Jesus-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ T al it h a _ ku m _ ! _ " _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ makete sqe amken _ ! _ " _ )
