iwernga _ B ar n a b as -em _ S a u l _ aglagh te luku _ ap o s t l e- en un _ aapte qugh a _ S a ul - mun _ tume mi _ esghagh ma ni luku _ atanegh _ , _ aleghquute kau ni lutek llu _ . _ aapte qugh a llu _ D am as c us - mi _ ungipagh kau ni luku _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Jesus-em _ .
enkaam _ tugukligh iqe aat _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ S a u l _ ugpeq an it k aq _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ tetug gpenani _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ J e w s - et _ G r e ek - es tun _ akuzi kayug t _ aaghtiiraaghkagh an _ tuqute yu kaqe kangat _ .
ugpeqagh t _ liigike yamegteggu _ J e w s -en un _ tuqute naqe ni luku _ S a u l _ , _ aglagh tke aat _ C a es ar e a- mun _ , _ taagken _ kayagtekagh at _ tarsus- mun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ J u d e a- mi _ , _ galilee- mi _ , _ S am ar i a- m illu _ am y u utk es teng ngun at eng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ . _ ugpegh llegh it _ ik naq ugh tek at _ , _ alinge aqe lghiit _ qaatke te nghite lleghqagh meggneng _ atanegh mun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ kayusi i u kangi _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nulakagh t _ .
P e te r -em _ iglegha te kete luku _ laalighfike te qugh u i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ n aan sagh ngaat a _ . _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ laalightekagh _ L y d d a- m el ngugh nun _ .
tamaani _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ ategh a _ A en e a s _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayumiqullegh _ makete igate ngughk _ uniigh nga te mii neng _ .
P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ A en e a s _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ naallghute aaten _ , _ makete luten _ allighagh n _ imeg ggu _ . _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ A en e a s _ maketekagh _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ L y d d a- gh m iit lu _ S h ar o n - egh m iit lu _ esghagh yamegteggu _ A en e a s _ naallghute luni _ , _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ atanegh kun _ .
J o p p a- m i nguq _ taawa _ ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ategh a _ tabitha _ , _ ( _ G r e ek - s tun _ Dorcas _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ quyngigh _ ) _ , _ quunpeng _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ , _ kiyang _ tam aa ku nun _ aklumalghii nun _ .
taagken _ qinuyug luni _ tuqukagh _ enkaam _ ughvughqellug qu _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ .
J o p p a- gh m iit _ ugpeqagh t _ nagaqugh qu aat _ peter _ L y d d a- m en n il uku _ . _ lydda _ , _ J o p p a- meng _ q an tagh aghh an l e nguq _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ ke v g aqegk ag ke t _ maalghug _ yug k _ peter- mun _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ J o p p a- mun _ .
P e te r -em _ y at aagh qell uni _ maligtekakek _ . _ kaate yan _ qemtagh mun _ mayugh tke aat _ . _ legan _ itegh uq _ ugingighagh t _ qiya magh meng _ kangllu qaghte luku _ keleg u vikekagh at _ aatkagh neng _ D o r c as -em _ ulimaagh aneng _ .
P e te r -em _ aane ste qugh luki _ segesqughte luni _ yughaghkagh _ . _ taaqe luni _ yughagh nghmeng _ qiive luku _ yugusigh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tabitha _ , _ maketen _ . _ " _ tabitha _ esghaate kete luku _ esghagh yamigu _ peter _ aqumekagh _ .
P e te r -em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ tuqlugh qu ai _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvagh ma ta a _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ J o p p a- gh m iit _ nagaqugh qu aat _ T a b it h a- m _ unguvallegh a _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
peter _ mulukagh _ J o p p a- mi _ , _ S im o n -en kun it k aq _ s an agh t is te mi _ .
C a es ar e a- m i nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ ategh a _ C o r n el i us _ . _ umiileg at _ R o m e -em _ pi ll u w agh teng it a _ italy- meng _ pi t _ .
yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kayusigh i ma ghllag _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ yughaghtuqagh llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ qep ghagh te ku ll ghiit _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ 3 - k l aag mi _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ . _ Wh at egh ll u w aaq _ esgha qaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg a _ itegh lghii _ , _ yaquleg m _ tuqlugh qu a _ , _ " _ C o r n el i us _ ! _ "
alingruugh magh mi _ esghapagtugh luku _ yaquleg _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ sa meng _ pi ziin _ ? _ " _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma ai _ yughagh llegh ten _ , _ efqugh ke pigte a llu _ kayusigh i llegh n _ aklumalghii nun _ enkaam _ neqamike aaten _ .
J o p p a- mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
S im o n -en kun i tuq _ s an agh t is te mi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ tawaten _ pi luku _ unitekagh a _ . _ taagken _ C o r n el i us -em _ tuqlugh kakek _ maalghug _ qep ghagh teg ni _ , _ pi ll ug w agh t allu _ . _ taana _ pi ll u w agh ta _ C o r n el i us -em _ kayute anga _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tagi yata _ ungipaate u aqe ai _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ , _ taagken _ keveg aqekagh i _ J o p p a- mun _ .
unaami ani _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ ke v g at _ kaate yaghtugh aqe ut llu _ J o p p a- mun _ , _ peter _ mat- yuqagh _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ yughagh na luni _ .
taagken _ iyataghkagh _ , _ sa meng _ neghyuke aq _ . _ sama _ neqe meng _ yataaghqe ma luki _ peter _ esghaghwaaghkagh _ .
esgha qaa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taagken _ esgha qaa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ uk ig tek angat _ nuna mun _ es tam at gun _ tekerqagh akun _ .
taawa nguq _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ r ep t il e- en eng _ , _ qawaag neng llu _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P e te r -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ yeghlegi llu _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate unga _ iinghutekagh meng _ ukmangite nghite ngugh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ "
me m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ taakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ pi gpenaki _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ pi nga yu neng _ ke t wh el l _ . _ taagken _ taw an ing in aq _ taana _ iingunagh mi _ qilag mun _ mayugh tke aq _ .
P e te r -em _ kukriqe tkekagh a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma luku _ C o r n el i us -em _ keveg ai ta _ liite tke aat _ S im o n -em _ mangteghagh a _ n aan tu l anga _ , _ enkaam _ manughagh anun _ kaate tke aat _ .
qamavek _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ whani _ aqelqagh u nghite a _ yuug _ ategh a _ simon _ peter _ ? _ "
P e te r -em _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ esghaghwaagh lleg ni _ , _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ , _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ ivagh aqe aaten _ .
ukig luten _ qaqilqa fqaavek _ maligte ki _ , _ qayughllak _ whanga _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ P e te r -em _ ukig luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ ivaghkagh i _ . _ sa meng _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ C o r n el i us -em _ keveg aqe ainkut _ , _ umiileg u uq _ R o m e -em _ pi ll u w agh teng it nun _ . _ yuug _ pinigh ghllag uq _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ J e w s - et _ sii vag ke pigte aqe aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ pika qaa _ C o r n el i us _ , _ ' _ aqfa ste gu _ peter _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh a _ elpenun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ itegh sqekagh i _ , _ tawani llu _ qavigh sqekagh i _ . _ unaami ani _ y at aagh qell uni _ maligtekagh i _ C o r n el i us -em _ keveg ai _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ila i _ J o p p a- meng _ maligte tke aat _ .
taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate tke aat _ C a es ar e a- mun _ . _ C o r n el i us -em _ ilakwaagh ni llu _ ilakumtaagh ni llu _ tagi laghate te ste luki _ ellmeggnun _ utaqakagh at _ peter _ .
peter _ itegh aqe uq llu _ C o r n el i us -em _ payegh luku _ segesqughte vikekagh a _ manigugh na luku _ .
iwernga _ P e te r -em _ ne ke v es tu t k ell uku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nekeve i _ , _ whanga llu _ yugu unga _ . _ "
iitghute kete luku _ P e te r -em _ aleghqugh qu a _ C o r n el i us _ . _ itegh yalghiimi _ taawa _ yuug _ qerngughte te ghllag ma lghii _ tawani _ .
P e te r -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ L ii simak ng waagh agh si _ whangkuta _ J e w s -en i _ liilightuusagh mta _ ineghtekaqe ainkut _ ilate fqaamta _ pi s qell uta _ G en t il e- en un _ , _ talwa _ laalighfike snanigh kaqe ai _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kina _ alngunak _ ukmangite nghite ni luku _ sumeghtaghagh tke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
aqfate yafsinga _ tagi unga _ qaqilqa gpenanga _ . _ sangama _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ "
C o r n el i us -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whaten _ lliigh magh an _ aku w aaq _ pi aqe lleg mtun _ yughagh ma lunga _ 3 - k ell aag mi _ , _ yuug _ manu mkun _ nekeve uq _ aatkagh i _ nighug ghllag t _ .
whaa _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ C o r n el i us _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughagh llegh ten _ nagaqugh ma ai _ , _ neqamike ai llu _ aklumalghii nun _ kayusigh i llegh ten _ .
J o p p a- mun _ kina _ keveg aqe gu _ aqfa sqellug qu _ simon _ peter _ . _ S im o n -en kun i tuq _ s an agh t is te mi _ , _ mangteghagh a _ esne mete uq _ . _ '
enkaam _ taw an ing in aq _ aqfa sqe amken _ , _ quyake amken _ tagi lghiiten _ . _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayugh ke llegh a _ qamagte luta _ wh aan l eng ugh ni _ nag aq ugh yug agh put _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ Atan ghem _ elpenun _ apegh sqekagh a _ whang kun nun _ . _ "
taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa _ liigike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pikayug u a _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag an _ yuug _ ataasigh stun _ .
tugukligh yaghqaqe a _ kina _ alngunak _ n aku m ii ngu yagh ng aan _ alike i lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ pinitun llu _ pikayug _ .
liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ungipagh kekagh _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ , _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ yug t _ nekeggmellegh nge sighqagh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ , _ atanegh ke a _ tam aghh agh waagh mi _ yug m _ .
liisimakagh i _ taana _ ungipagh _ mingite kau uq _ J u d e a- l q aagh agh mi _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ galilee- mi _ J o h n -em _ ungipagh kaqe yagu _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
liisimakagh i _ Jesus _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ i mi qaa _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m eng llu _ . _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ pinitun _ pi aqe kangi _ yug t _ , _ naallghute qugh qu ai llu _ tamaakut _ tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ Jesus - m el nguq _ .
whangkuta _ ap o s t l e- en i _ liisimake i ste u ukut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ tawaten _ pi llgh anun _ J e w s - et _ nuna itni _ , _ J er us al em - em illu _ . _ tuqute kaqe aat _ tuquuqagh te luku _ qaquuragh kun _ .
iwernga _ pingayut ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ esghagh stekaqe a llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luni _ yug m _ esghagh mangite a _ . _ whangkuta _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ liisimake i ste u luta _ . _ talwa _ neghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ meghe lgusigh qaghkagh ut llu _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh ste llegh an _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ , _ apegh sqe kau uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmike kaqe ni luni _ nanqigte i ste u luni _ unguva lghii nun llu _ tuqukagh nun llu _ .
qamagte luteng _ u uk nal iq is tet _ pi kau ut _ , _ kitum nguq _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ ategh akun _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ . _ "
peter _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ qamagte luki _ nagate lghiit _ ungipagh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ iteghkagh i _ , _ enkaam _ all aagh ll u wh a tun _ akuzi stekagh i llu _ usuqe i stekagh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ C i r c um c is e- ek at _ ugpeqagh t _ J o p p a- meng _ maligte tke aat _ peter- mun _ saghiigha yuke aat _ nagate yamegteki _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ . _ liigikekagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ tunusagh ke kek _ talwa _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ taagken _ P e te r -em _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ ukut _ yug t _ allgegh te ut _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ whang ku tegh pig agh es tun _ . _ kitum ngam _ paaptaaye snanigh nagh kaki _ megh kun _ ? _ "
taagken _ qelqe ai _ p aap taa y es qell uki _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ ell meg g n it agh ii s q eg kaa t _ peter _ .
A p o s t l e- et lu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ J u d e a- m el nguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ G en t il e- en un llu _ ugpeqe ma ni luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
peter _ kaate yan _ J er us al em - e mun _ , _ J e w s - et _ ugpeqagh t _ c i r c um c is e- egh iy uk at _ G en t il e- et _ ugpeqagh itneng _ segh l equ uq aat _ peter _ , _ pi ke aat _ ,
" _ sangan _ c i r c um c i z e- em ang il nguut _ itegh vike luki _ ne itnun _ neghe lgusigh ziki _ ? _ "
L iig ik es qell uki _ P e te r -em _ esghaghwaagh llegh mineng _ kenlanga _ aapte qugh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ apeghiighkagh _ .
" _ J o p p a- mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh kau unga _ . _ esghagh aqa _ qiipaghagh ghllagte yu gni _ es tam at gun _ tekerqagh akun _ uk ig tek angat _ qilag meng _ whanga mnun _ .
tawavek _ y u v ghii gh waagh y aqegk a _ imaqe uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ teghig ke sagh neng _ , _ r ep t il e- en eng _ , _ qawaag neng _ tengaa kayug neng _ .
taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ peter _ , _ makete luten _ tuqute i luten _ negh i _ ! _ '
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ yeghlegi llu _ atanegh _ ! _ negh igate anka _ tamaakut _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ neqe t _ iinghutekagh t _ . _ '
" _ me m _ pi laatagh aanga _ qilag meng _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ , _ ukmangite nghite ni luki _ sumeghtaghagh te kete yaghqaqe nghite aten _ . _ '
tawaten _ pi kau uq _ pi nga yu neng _ ke t wh el l _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ taakut _ aga _ qilag mun _ mayugh te aqe ut llu _ ,
whaa _ yug t _ pi nga yu t _ kaate ut _ tukugh mnun _ , _ ke v g aa f tut _ whanga mnun _ C a es ar e a- meng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ qaqilqa fqaama _ maligte sqe ai _ . _ ukut llu _ aghvinleg _ yug t _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ maligte te ut _ J o p p a- meng _ C a es ar e a- mun _ . _ kaa llu ta _ C o r n el i us -en ku nun _ it egh aa tu kut _ .
C o r n el i us -em _ apegh aa _ yaquleg meng _ esghaate lleg ni _ ne mini _ , _ yaquleg m nguq _ whaten _ pi a _ , _ ' _ J o p p a- mun _ aqfa ste gu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ simon _ peter- meng _ .
ungipaate lleqe aisi _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ . _ '
enkaam _ akuzi aqe unga llu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ itegh ai _ tawatengwaaq _ whang kun nun _ itegh llegh mitun _ P en te c o s t -em _ aghnegh ani _ .
taagken _ neqangugh aqa _ Atan ghem _ pi llgh a _ whaten _ , _ ' _ John _ p aap taa y el aq aag uq _ megh kun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ paaptaaye lleqe usi _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ . _ '
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma kaki _ G en t il e- et _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ tunute yameng _ tuunekagh mineng _ whang kun nun _ ugpeqe aqe yamteggu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ , _ whanga _ kina u zinga _ aghula i aghte naqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi llgh aneng _ G en t il e- en un _ ? _ "
tawaten _ P e te r -em _ pi y is t eng _ qalleg nanigh luteng _ , _ yeghlegi _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taawa _ liigikagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ talwa _ G en t il e- et _ pi llegh q al i simak angi _ av utegh q es qell uki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ unguv all eng es qell uk illu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ! _ "
S te p h en -em _ tuqute llegh a _ kenle ke luku _ J e w s - et _ amyuutkekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ anagkagh t _ J er us al em - e meng _ . _ aghulaqe te tke aat _ kenlanga _ P h o en i c i a- mun _ , _ C y p r us - mun _ , _ A n t i o c h - m un llu _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh kekagh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ J e w s - ng in aghh agh nun _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ C y p r us - m eng llu _ C y r en e- m eng llu _ A n t i o c h - et k at _ , _ kaate luteng _ ungipagh kekagh at _ atanegh _ Jesus _ talwa _ J e w s - ngun ghi l ngugh nun _ .
Atan ghem _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ ellngitnite kau lghii _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pestaagh _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ qiive te tke aq _ atanegh mun _ .
ugpeqagh t _ J er us al em - em el nguut _ nagate luku _ peter _ , _ Barnabas _ kayagtekagh at _ A n t i o c h - mun _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ yuug _ ugpegh uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ quya ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ liigikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ yug nun _ . _ Barnabas _ pinigh lghii u lghii _ yuug _ , _ imigh nga ghllag llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg leg ghllag llu _ . _ taagken _ allangughte fqiita _ ataasiighmete kestigh sqekagh i _ atanegh mun _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ .
taagken _ B ar n a b as -em _ S a u l _ ivagh yaghtuqagh a _ tarsus- mun _ .
N aal k es am igu _ kelqekagh a _ A n t i o c h - mun _ . _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ tam aan te llegh meg ni _ ilate aqe lutek _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - mi _ ugpeqagh t _ atigh yuwhaagh ke ait _ , _ " _ Chris t i an - et _ . _ "
tamaani _ ila i _ u uk nal iq is te m _ J er us al em - e meng _ A n t i o c h - mun _ tagikagh t _ .
ataasigh _ A g a b us - ngu f tuq _ , _ nekeve luni _ uuknaliqekagh _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ neqangisag ghllag naqe ni luku _ tea- ma ani _ . _ taawa _ negh ke igh sag ghllag ke aq _ C l a u d i us _ U m iil eg pig aa luku _ .
ugpeqagh t _ ugpeq aal gu te t eng _ J u d e a- m el nguut _ kayusigh yug qu ait _ pi tu tal meg es tun _ .
enkaam _ qerngughte i luteng _ mani meng _ tuyugh ikagh t _ el d er -en un _ J er us al em - em el ngugh nun _ B ar n a b as -en ku g ne kun _ S a ul -en ku g ne kun _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ amyuutke sag u tke ai _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
J o h n -em _ ang leg ut anga _ James _ tuqute stekagh a _ savigpag kun _ .
umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ liigike yamigu _ J e w s -en eng _ efqughtagh igh lleg ni _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ , _ qelegh tke a _ peter _ tugu sqellug qu _ . _ ( _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ N eq en gh aghq eng ngu luki _ Y e as t- al ii mang il ngugh meng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ . _ )
peter _ tugu yatgu _ , _ umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ qelegh tke a _ 1 6 - egh y ag nun _ pi ll u w agh t en un _ kelengake sqellug qu _ estamat kaghte ai ta _ kipullegte te aqe luki _ . _ yugtuqagh mi _ nanqigte yukagh a _ kingu aneng _ P as s o v er -em _ .
enkaam _ peter _ anusimingllaghvig mete stekagh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh te ke ghllag ke aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
peter _ qavaa lghii _ maalghug _ kelengake istek _ akule gkeni _ , _ petug nga lghii llu _ mal gh ug negh teg gun _ qiipraghute tgun _ . _ allameng _ anusimingllaghvig m _ amig a _ k el eng ak is te l ek _ . _ whaa _ aghtekan _ H er o d -em _ tagite ste naqngu kanga _ yug nun _ nanqigte sqellug qu _ .
Atan ghem _ yaquleg a _ aliigh aghtekagh _ , _ enkaam _ nighug _ kuukgute ke aq _ anusimingllaghvig m _ ilu anun _ . _ yaquleg m _ peter _ tuye akun _ aghulate luku _ , _ teghtughllug qu _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ egmiinaq _ maketen _ ! _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ qiipraghute t _ ifkagh qu te tke aat _ iiggagh neng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ pilugug luten _ kameg gken _ aate kek _ . _ " _ peter _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ yaquleg m _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ qaasligh gken _ aate lukek _ maligte nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ P e te r -em _ maligtekagh a _ . _ ugpeqe mangite u aqe aqe yagh kanga _ aane te lleg ni _ , _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ esghaghwaagh ni luni _ .
sivuligh t llu _ tuungligh ghhagh i llu _ k el eng ak is tet _ naghughte luki _ kaate tke ak _ savikenghaagh mun _ amig mun _ . _ amigh k _ ellmi neng _ qelpegh yan _ , _ aane lutek _ iglegh tegh ng aag m ek _ tume tgun _ yaquleg _ aviite qaghtekagh _ .
taagken _ P e te r -em _ liigike u aqe a _ sa mate ni _ enkaam _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ taawa _ ipa u uq _ Atan ghem _ kayagte ma a _ yaquleg ni _ iq itu tes qell unga _ H er o d - meng _ , _ J e w s - et lu _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
liigike luku _ sa mate ni _ M ar y - n ku nun _ aglaghkagh _ , _ John _ M ar k -em _ naa anun _ . _ tawani _ yug lghute _ qerngughte te luni _ yughagh te ghllagu lghii _ qerngagh mi _ .
peter _ es l ak l igh qun _ amig kun _ tenglugtugh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ qep ghagh te m _ , _ R h o d a- m _ qelpegh te yaghtuqagh a _ .
liisuqe yamigu _ P e te r -em _ me a _ , _ qu yagh llag em _ ang tal ang aneng _ qelpegh te gpenaan _ , _ yeghlegi _ ilu te mun _ itegh qaghte luni _ aapte qugh a _ qakma _ peter _ m an ugh am en n il uku _ .
iwernga _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ temngi _ pi uten _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ sagiqe tke ai _ ipa u ni luku _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yaquleg ke nghite agu wha _ . _ "
qakma _ peter _ tenglugtugh ma inagh ke aq _ . _ Q el pegh us aq meg teg gu _ ellnga u uq _ enkaam _ saghiigha yuke aat _ .
P e te r -em _ apaqukagh i _ q all eg nan ii s qell uki _ , _ enkaam _ ungipamsug te u aqe ai _ Atan ghem _ aane te llegh aneng _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ apegh qagh nakefsinga _ J am es - m un llu _ ugpeq aal gu tem n nun llu _ tawaten _ pi ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane luni _ natmun _ pi ke aq _ .
aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ k el eng ak is tet _ av iil ng aq aat _ peter _ , _ al ing r ugh um agh meng _ kukriqekagh t _ samatagh nge a _ .
H er o d -em _ iv agh te sim ay aq anga _ iwernga _ naalke ma nge i tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ k el eng ak is tet _ aap qugh aagh tes luki _ nalluke yatgu _ tuqu qugh stekagh i _ . _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ herod _ J u d e a- meng _ C a es ar e a- lluni _ tam aan tegh r aa k aq _ .
umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ ugumi yagute ghllagu kangi _ T y r e- egh m iit lu _ S i d o n - egh m iit lu _ , _ iwernga _ tam aa kum iit _ yug t _ kayagtekagh it _ B l as tu s - mun _ akuz itu n naq agh tes qell uteng _ H er o d - mun _ . _ Blastus _ iglegh ut is tek egk anga _ umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ mangteghagh ghllag an _ . _ kaate luteng _ aaptekagh at _ Blastus _ akuz itu tagh tes qell uteng _ umiileg mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghiit _ neqenge nanigh na yukagh meng _ H er o d -em _ nuna aneng _ .
tawani _ aghneghmi _ pi vigkagh meggni _ H er o d -em _ umiileg u sigh t _ aatkagh ni _ aat qugh luki _ aqume luni _ aqumutagh ghllag gmikun _ akuzikagh _ .
taaqe yan _ akuzi nghmeng _ yug t _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ yugu nghite uq _ akuzi lghii _ , _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ ! _ "
Taw an ing in aq _ Atan ghem _ yaquleg an _ qinuyug ste ghllag qagh a _ herod _ , _ qayughllak _ tugukligh kanga _ qu ul v all eq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi a _ . _ U nguv agh mi _ kingugtagh u ghllag luni _ tuqukagh _ .
taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh i _ mingite ma inagh ke aat _ enkaam _ wata _ yuug _ ugpegh uute tke aq _ .
taake uk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ S a ul -en kuk _ apeghiigh yamegnegu _ qepghaqagh ek _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ A n t i o c h - mun _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ .
A n t i o c h - mi _ ugpeqagh m _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u ut llu _ apeghtughiste u ut llu _ . _ Taa ku ngu f tut _ Barnabas _ , _ simeon _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ niger- meng _ , _ L u c i us _ ( _ C y r en e- meng _ pi _ ) _ , _ M an a en _ ( _ angli lgute anga _ umiileg m _ H er o d -em _ ) _ , _ S a ul - llu _ .
maniguute ma luki _ atanegh mun _ , _ f as t- em al uk illu _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aafte kek _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ S a ul -en kuk _ , _ qayughllak _ nakmike agka _ alla neng _ qepghaqagh meng _ qepghigh sqellug kek _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taaqe yameng _ f as t- ell egh m eng llu _ yughagh llegh meng llu _ saafte lukek _ yughagh tkellug kek _ aghul aq es tek ag ke t _ .
B ar n a b as -en kuk _ S a ul -en kuk _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kay ag si s tek _ , _ S el e u c i a- t k ak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ kayute u luku _ . _ tamaaken _ angyaghpag kun _ qiighqagh mun _ C y p r us - mun _ pikagh t _ . _ kaate yameng _ salamis- mun _ s y nag o gu e- ng it ni _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
salamis- meng _ igleghakagh t _ inglu anun _ qiighqagh m _ P ap h o s - mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ alignagh lghii _ ategh a _ B ar - Jesus _ , _ u uk nal iq es te sigh w aaq _ , _ J e w s - a _ .
qiighqagh m _ G o v er n o r - ng an _ S er g i us _ P a ul us -em _ ilakumtaagh a _ . _ S er g i us _ P a ul us _ pilleg ghllag _ . _ aqfa stekakek _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ S a ul -en kuk _ nagate na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ B ar - Jesus-em _ alignalghii m _ , _ ateghagh leg m _ elymas- meng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh kakek _ g o v er n o r - a _ ugpegh na yu kan _ . _ ( _ ategh _ elymas _ , _ G r e ek - s tun _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ alignagh lghii _ . _ )
taagken _ S a ul -em _ , _ ateghagh ke lghii m _ P a ul - meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ esghapagtugh luku _ alignagh lghii _ 
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh m _ ighnegh a _ ! _ ugumi ke an _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinigh lghii _ . _ iqlengasag ghllag u uten llu _ seghletun llu _ pi ste ghllagu uten _ . _ Taa q naq en ghi si k ii _ iqlengiqe sigh ke nghmeng _ Atan ghem _ apeghtuusagh i _ ?
whaa _ Atan ghem _ aghyuugh naqe aaten _ ay aa s tem meng _ , _ enkaam _ esgh aa te l ghagh tugh n aanghi tu ten _ aghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ . _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ El y m as -em _ iye kek _ m am legh q w aa k ak _ , _ enkaam _ tamaani _ ef l ugh waagh meng _ ivagh ikagh _ kitumun _ t as l uq ii s qell uni _ .
G o v er n o r - a _ ugpeqe aq _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ saghiigha yagutekagh a llu _ apeghtuusagh _ atanegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
P a ul -en kut _ iglegha lgutke te lghiit _ angyaghpag kun _ igleghtekagh t _ P ap h o s - meng _ , _ perga- mun _ P am p h y l i a- m el ngugh mun _ . _ Tam aan ll uki _ John _ M ar k -em _ unite luki _ J er us al em - e mun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ P a ul -en kut _ perga- meng _ , _ A n t i o c h - et k at _ P i si d i a- m el ngugh mun _ . _ S a b b at h - ngugh s ag u _ s y nag o gu e- ng it nun _ itegh luteng _ aqumekagh t _ .
I g legh ut is teng i _ s y nag o gu e -em _ , _ taaqe yameng _ atightugh nghmeng _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ igaqegkagh itneng _ , _ keveg aqe tke ait _ P a ul -en kut _ whaten _ pi s qell uki _ , _ " _ U g peq aal gu tem n ni _ , _ ungipagh lgu kufsi _ ik naq s u ug u sigh q ameng _ ugpegh lleg mnnun _ , _ sa aqe tsi _ akuzite k _ . _ "
taagken _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ apaqu magh mi _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ elpek si llu _ G en t il e- en i _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nagate ngnga _ !
whangkuta _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ manigughkagh mta _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ , _ nula ste ghllag kaqe ai llu _ nunatagh u aqngata _ E g y p t- mi _ . _ Taa k w an ing ani _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh tek at _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh llag m i kun _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ E g y p t- meng _ .
kilgaa nite luki _ q aat ku te pag ll an ghi tegh ngaat a _ ellmi nun _ paninang _ aflengake kaqe ai _ ke t wh el l _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ naa f q es am ik i _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ ramke t _ C an aan - m el nguut _ nuna ke yagh kangat _ pi liite stekaqe a _ sivunegh mnnun _ pagite aqe sqellug qu _ .
entaqun _ 4 5 0 - nguut _ ayumiqullegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llegh aneng _ sivunegh put _ kenlanga _ nuna _ pi liite llegh itnun _ . _ " _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ nanqigte i ste ngestagh u aatagh kaqe ai _ iglegh u tes qell uki _ kenlanga _ samuel _ uuknaliqe i sta _ igleghte te i stekau aghte llegh itnun _ .
taagken _ um iil eng y u w aq ng ata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ S a u l _ umiileg ke sqellug qu _ K is h -em _ ighnegh a _ , _ B en j am in -em _ ramke aneng _ pi _ . _ umiileg u kau uq _ 4 0 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ um iil g un an igh tes am igu _ S a u l _ , _ David _ umiileg liite stekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Jes s e- m _ ighnegh a _ David _ umiileg ughte sug aqa _ . _ Taw ate l nguq _ yuug _ piyuke aqe aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ '
" _ Taa k w an ing ani _ D av i d -em _ k ing un gh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe i llegh mitun _ allgegh stekaqe a _ yuguligh i sta _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ . _ taana _ yuguligh i sta _ Jesus - ngu uq _ .
Jesus-em _ salin _ qepghaqagh ni _ piinligh llghite luku _ John _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ I s r a el - egh m ii nun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ A v utegh qell usi _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh l usi _ , _ p aap taa y e tek _ . _ '
J o h n -em _ qepghaqagh ni _ taaqe yaghtugh ngestagh luku _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kina u ni lunga _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ whanga u nghite uq _ utaqakagh i _ . _ kingu mneng _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ aange ghllag lghii _ , _ repall _ whanga _ pinigh nghite unga _ singigh anun _ i tem t is te ngu l unga _ . _ '
" _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ A b r a h am -em _ k ing un ghi t ni _ , _ G en t il e- en illu _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana _ ungipagh a _ yuguligh llegh m _ whang kun nun _ pi u uq _ !
J er us al em - egh m iit _ igleghte te i stekete te lghiit _ nalluke kaqe aat _ Jesus _ yuguligh i ste u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ S a b b at h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ nagate ghngaaghmegteki _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ naqam _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqegkagh it _ apeghiigh kaqe ait _ agghi te kaqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
taawa _ legan _ temngi _ apallugh ite ghngaan _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ pilate- mun _ tuqute sqe kaqe aat _ .
legan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh meng _ ateghte luku _ llivegh kaqe aat _ ,
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ iglegha lgutke ke ii te a _ Jesus-em _ galilee- meng _ , _ J er us al em - e mun _ esghagh aatagh kaqe aat _ qafsinegyag ni _ aghnegh ni _ . _ E ll ng i nguut _ ungipagh lghiit _ yug mnnun _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguva luku _ .
" _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
apeghiigh ma a _ akequsagh ni _ whang kun nun _ k ing un ghi t nun _ , _ unguvagh ste llegh mikun _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ P s al m _ 2 - mi _ , _ ' _ elpek _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ A tal ii tagh pe nga _ . _ '
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ en kaa ng am _ allameng llu _ tuqu naanghite uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akequsagh kekagh nka _ D av i d - mun _ ipapestaaq _ quya ste i sigh ke lleqe anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ '
ilangani _ P s al m s -em _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghii n _ aghu snaanghite aqa _ llivegh mi _ . _ '
" _ D av i d -em _ unguvallegh mini _ atuqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ qavagh yan _ qungugh kaqe aat _ siv un gh an _ saaghw itgun _ , _ yugusigh a _ aghu kau uq _ llivegh mi _ .
iwernga _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh a _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghu mangite uq _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ elpesi nun _ liite sqe sug aqa _ Jesus - kun _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ seghevute lleg nge kayugu ut _ . _ taana ta _ ungipagh ke kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
qaatke te llegh m _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh itgun _ kina _ alngunak _ iteme te naanghite a _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ u uk nal iq is te t gun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nagate tek _ elpek si _ aygugh itagh lghii ni _ . _ sa aqe tsi _ saghiigha yug lusi _ tuqu tek _ , _ qayughllak _ unguva u lusi _ sa lleqe unga _ iwernga _ ugpeq n aanghi tagh si _ talwa _ kitum _ ungipaate ghngaisi _ . _ ' _ kelenga lusi _ , _ luuraq _ tawaten _ pin ay uk af si _ . _ "
P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ s y nag o gu e- meng _ aane ma lukek _ alla _ tag is q egk ag ke t _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ S a b b at h -em _ , _ wata _ ung i pi qu tes qell uteng _ .
aanleghaate yameng _ J e w s - el gh u te t lu _ , _ G en t il e- el gh u te t lu _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ J e w s - es tun _ , _ maligte tke aat _ P a ul -en ku g nun _ B ar n a b as -en ku g nun _ . _ A p o s t l e- ek _ kayemekagh ik _ kiyagh tek es t ii s qell uki _ sighimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ S a b b at h -em _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ A n t i o c h - egh m iit _ nagate yagh tke aat _ Atan ghem _ ungipagh aneng _ .
J e w s - et _ aqinake aat _ esghagh yamegteki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ enkaam _ P a u l _ k ip ull g in aq aat _ , _ seghleqekagh at llu _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ tetug gpenaki _ J e w s - et _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ elpesi nun _ sivuke luni _ apegh yaghqaa yagh uq _ iwernga _ nagate yug mangite usi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ighsake kaqe te gpesineng _ , _ palaqe kau te gpesineng llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ whaa _ G en t il e- en un _ ungipagh ke i naqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ Atan ghem _ qelqe aqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nakmike kaqe amsi _ nighug u lusi _ G en t il e- en un _ , _ apegh sqellug qu _ yuguligh llegh _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ ' _ "
G en t il e- et _ nagaqugh luki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ pi kau lghiit llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ . _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguv all eng es qell uki _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ungipagh meng _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - mi _ , _ u v it ang an il ngugh n illu _ nuna ni _ Atan ghem _ ungipagh a _ mingitekagh _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - et _ takukagh it _ G en t il e- et _ aghni ut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ iglegh ut is teng illu _ A n t i o c h -em _ naa v gu un nal uk ek _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ am y u utk egk ag ke t _ taake uk _ yug k _ , _ aghul aq es tek ag ke t lu _ nuna meggneng _ .
enkaam _ ap o s t l e- ek _ itegagh tek _ pagulangigh iqe aik _ kelgute na luku _ pegge ni luki _ k ip ull g in aal ghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ I c o n i um - e mun _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ A n t i o c h - m el nguut _ quya nga ghllaget llu _ , _ imigh nga lghiit llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
I c o n i um - e mi _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ pii qell egh meg e tun _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ aglaghkagh k _ . _ tawani _ wh at egh ll u w aaq _ akuzikagh k _ repall _ J e w s - el gh u te t lu _ , _ G en t il e- el gh u te t lu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
enkaam _ I c o n i um - em e te l q in aq ak _ , _ tamaani _ tetug gpenatek _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ atanegh meng _ . _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ Atan ghem _ all aagh ll u wh agh t is tegh llag aat aq ak ek _ yug nun _ ipa u ta a _ liigike sqellug qu _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ Atan ghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpegh yug ma ite ngugh t _ J e w s - et _ G en t il e- en un _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh tke stekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ .
enkaam _ I c o n i um - egh m iit _ mal gh ugh k egk at _ , _ ila i _ ila tke aat _ J e w s -en un _ , _ ila i _ ap o s t l e- en un _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ G en t il e- et lu _ , _ J e w s - et lu _ maligte te luteng _ iglegh ut is te meg g nun _ amyugh te kete yu ke agket _ ap o s t l e- ek _ , _ m il ugh pag aat aghh iin aq lu _ tuqute yu ke agket _ .
nagaqugh yamek _ yug nun _ tawaten _ pi naqe ni lutek _ , _ qimagkagh k _ L y c a o n i a- m _ ne ghllag gkenun _ L y s t r a- m un llu _ , _ D er b e- m un llu _ , _ u v i teg ken il ngugh nun llu _ ne nun _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh ik _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
L y s t r a- m i nguq _ taawa _ yuug _ itegagh i _ n ate l nguut _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ enkaam _ piyug igate ngughk _ .
aqumgagh mi _ tawani _ nagatekagh a _ P a u l _ akuzi lghii _ . _ P a ul -em _ liigikekagh a _ yuug _ ugpegh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ naallghute lleqe ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qiive luku _ tawavek _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ N e ke v ng waagh i _ itegagh gpegun _ ! _ " _ aga _ yuug _ nekefqaghte luni _ tamaani _ piyuke aq _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ P a ul -em _ naallghute i llegh a _ araghaatagh tke aat _ L y c a o n i a- gh m ii s tun _ , _ " _ yugu luteng _ kiyaghnegh t _ taku inkut _ ! _ "
Barnabas _ Z e us - ngun i kaa t _ enkaam _ P a u l _ H er m es - ngun i kaa t _ kiyang _ akuzi ste u ta aneng _ .
priest- nge an _ Z e us - em llu _ , _ yug t llu _ aghq er r aagh y uk ag ke t _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ . _ enkaam _ priest- a _ tagi tke aq _ teghig ke te yameng llu _ pii tes iigh agh m eng llu _ L y s t r a- m _ mingllu ta an _ amig ghllag anun _ . _ ( _ temple- a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Z e us - mun _ amig ghllag m _ tu ng ang an il nguq _ ) _ .
iwernga _ ap o s t l e- ek _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ P a ul -en kuk _ liigike yamegneki _ sa naqe ta i _ aatkagh tek _ piigugh qu aik _ . _ taagken _ aqfaasnaq _ yug nun _ qungangiite tke ak _ aragh magh egmek _ ,
" _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sangafsi _ tawaten _ pi tsi _ ? _ whangkutung llu _ yugu ukung _ el pesi s tu ng w aaq _ ! _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh u ukung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun _ , _ tunute lusi _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ manigughkagh gpesineng _ q ii v es qell usi _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ ulima kaqe ai _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaghhagh an _ taa kun il nguq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ J e w s - ngun ghi l nguut _ pi y uk ell ghi s tun _ pi stekaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ taw ate tegh ngaat a _ paninang _ liisimake stekau uq _ unguva ni luni _ pinitun _ pi llegh mikun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ nunivagseghagh t _ nag us qell uki _ . _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte luku _ piite ste aqe ai _ piite yaghqagh t _ piite vig it _ kaate nghata _ neq el g us qell usi _ , _ quy ang as qell usi llu _ . _ "
P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ tawaten _ akuzi ghngaayek _ taawa _ paninang _ L y s t r a- gh m iit _ aghq er r aagh naq utk egk ag ke t _ . _ iwernga _ pegnem _ pi s negh it k ak _ .
taagken _ ila i _ J e w s - et _ A n t i o c h - m eng llu _ I c o n i um - em eng llu _ kaate tke aat _ L y s t r a- mun _ . _ L y s t r a- gh m ii nun _ naa v g uu ll uk ek _ ug um ii tes tek ag ke t _ . _ enkaam _ J e w s - et lu _ , _ L y s t r a- gh m iit lu _ P a u l _ milugh agaatagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ ne m _ k el ut ang anun _ sumegh meggni _ tuquma ni luku _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ taku laghate te yatni _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ ne mun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ elkek _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ D er b e- mun _ aglaghkagh k _ .
P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ D er b e- mi _ enkaam _ uglagh _ maligte yaaghte ngughtekagh _ . _ taagken _ L y s t r a- mun _ pi nqigtekagh k _ , _ taagken _ I c o n i um - e mun _ , _ A n t i o c h - m un llu _ pikagh k _ P i si d i a- m el ngugh mun _ .
takuughaghkagh megteni _ tamaani _ apeghtugh qu aik _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ wata _ ik naq ugh tes qell uki _ , _ kayemekagh ik llu _ ugpegh llegh it _ aghul ii tes qell uki _ . _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ seghleliigh llegh _ a tuq s aghq ap es taa qagh put _ itegh yaghqaaghte na luta _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
takuughaghkagh megteni llu _ nakmiightuqagh k _ El d er - k aghq ameng _ iglegh u tes qell uki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ yughagh magh egmek _ f as t- ek ak _ . _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ atanegh mun _ ugpeqekagh megtenun _ yughagh tkekagh ik _ El d er - et _ af l eng ak es qell uki _ .
taagken _ P i si d i a- kun _ igleghakagh k _ P am p h y l i a- mun _ .
tamaani _ perga- mi _ , _ P am p h y l i a- m el ngugh mi _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ taaqe yamek _ tesamavek _ A t tal i a- mun _ pikagh k _ .
taagken _ A n t i o c h - mun _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh k _ . _ ( _ tamaani _ A n t i o c h - mi _ ugpeqagh t _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ aghulaqe llghite lukek _ yughagh tke kaqe kegket _ . _ aapute kaqe kegket _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiite sqellug kek _ ungipagh ke i llegh gkeni _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ qepghaqagh _ apeghiighkagh ak _ . _ )
kaate yamek _ A n t i o c h - mun _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughtekagh ik _ . _ ungipagh tke aik _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ ell m e teg n eg un _ , _ apeghkagh ak llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeq i llegh q al i te llgh i _ G en t il e- et _ .
tamaani _ muluugh ghllagkagh k _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
taagken _ J u d e a- meng _ ila i _ yug t _ tagi luteng _ A n t i o c h - mun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ , _ " _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite usi _ wetku qun _ c i r c um c is e- e ku f si _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ "
iwernga _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ elngaatall _ aaghtiiraaghkagh ik _ taakut _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh it _ P a ul -en kuk _ , _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ A n t i o c h - meng _ pi t _ , _ J er us al em - e tes qell uki _ aap sagh t ii s qell uki _ ap o s t l e- et lu _ El d er - et lu _ q er ng agh m el nguut _ naligh _ apeghtuusagh _ elqughute nga ta a _ .
K ay ag si s t eng _ P a ul -en kut _ iglegha te kete luku _ P h o en i c i a- kun llu _ , _ S am ar i a- kun llu _ ugpeqagh t _ tam aan l e nguut _ ungipagh tke ait _ G en t il e- et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qiive uute ma ni luki _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ .
kaa sa ta _ J er us al em - e mun _ ap o s t l e- et lu _ , _ El d er - et lu _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ upugha tke ait _ . _ taagken _ P a ul -en kut _ apegh laataghkagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmegteggun _ .
ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ P h a ris e es - et _ nekeve luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ G en t il e- et _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ut _ wetku qun _ c i r c um c is e- el u teng llu _ , _ qaatke te luteng llu _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ ap o s t l e- et lu _ El d er - et lu _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghi te kete na lukek _ taake uk _ .
A ku z it ken negh pag ll ak aat _ . _ taagken _ P e te r -em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ G en t il e- en un _ ungip aq is qell unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ug pegh es qell uki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake i lghii m _ yug m _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ , _ tugukligh kaqe ai _ G en t il e- et _ . _ kelgute kaqe a _ tugukligh i lleg ni _ ellngit neng _ tuune llegh mikun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ katam _ tawaten _ whang kun nun _ tuune llegh mitun _ .
Wh ang ku tes tu ng w aaq _ kiyaghute aqe ai _ ; _ whang ku tes tu ng w aaq _ ukmangigh aqe ai _ ilu it _ ugpegh nghata _ .
enkaam _ sang an Ê¼ ng am _ kiyaghnegh _ s ak r aa s naq ut ke ng ngu s teg gu _ qelegh llegh gpesigun _ G en t il e- et _ ugpeqe ait _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh put _ kiyagh tes qell uki _ ? _ talwa _ sivunegh mta llu _ whangkuta llu _ q aat ke pag n ing il ke put _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ yuguligh lleg nge na luta _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ul ik aq iin kut _ kayusillegh akun _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ taw at egh pig aq _ G en t il e- en un _ pi llegh mitun _ . _ "
taagken _ taw an tu ll ghiit _ q all eg nan igh waagh ull uteng _ nag at k ag ke t _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ , _ P a ul -en kuk _ apegh kangik _ ell m e teg n eg un _ kiyaghnegh m _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh i _ G en t il e- en un _ .
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yayek _ J am es -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ !
simon _ P e te r -em _ ungipaate ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nak m i ku q es t all gh i _ G en t il e- et _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ liigike stekaqe ai _ ellngit llu _ piniqe ni luki _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ s all gha _ G en t il e- en un _ elqughute uq _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqegkagh itnun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ :
' _ D av i d -em _ mangteghagh a _ ullegh kau uq _ iwernga _ uteghnigh lunga _ ne ke f neq ig lleq aqa _ . _ naavuma yagh ghngaan _ nallghusagh lleqe aqa _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ yug t _ G en t il e- en eng _ nakmikegkagh ma _ whanga mnun _ katam _ pi u luki _ , _ ellngit a _ liite yug lleqe aat _ atanegh _ .
Atan gh u uq _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ , _ ima _ q av ng ar ug llak _ ellnga n _ liite stekaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ' _ "
J am es -em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ whanga _ sume mni _ G en t il e- et _ qiivekagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q aat ku tes qugh aa f q ii ta _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ pi lteki _ .
itupill _ lata tgun _ neghe snanigh lteki _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ , _ aaw meng _ ; _ ineghte lteki llu _ seghleghqe sigh ke fqaan _ sex _ pi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi yaghqaa nghite ut _ qayughllak _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh an _ iinghute kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ima _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ J e w s - et _ nagate aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ atightugh luki _ ungip aq en gh at k i _ S a b b at h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ s y nag o gu e- ni _ . _ "
taagken _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ El d er - et _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmiighkagh t _ yug meggneng _ maligte tesaghqagh meng _ P a ul -en ku g nun _ B ar n a b as -en ku g nun _ A n t i o c h - mun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ . _ nakmikegkagh gket _ S il as -en kuk _ J u d as -en kuk _ ateghagh ke lghii _ B ar s a b b as - meng _ . _ taake uk _ yug k _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ ugpeqagh ita _ s ii v ak e pig tek ag ke t _ .
El k eg ne kun _ tuyugh qu ait _ lata t _ whaten _ igaqegkagh t _ : _ " _ whangkuta _ ap o s t l e- en illu _ El d er -en illu _ lata aqe ukut _ G en t il e- en un _ ugpeq aal gu tem n nun _ A n t i o c h - m el ngugh nun _ , _ S y r i a- m el ngugh nun _ , _ C il i c i a- m el ngugh nun llu _ , _ quyake amsi _ !
nagaqugh ma ukut _ yug mta nguq _ ila ita _ taku lusi _ sa meng _ pi lusi _ seghlegh yug tek aq ii si llu _ ku k r ag yug tek aq ii si llu _ . _ naqamllu _ whangkuta _ tawaten _ pi sqe mangite aput _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emta _ agghite luta _ nakmike agput _ J u d as -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ maligte te sqellug kek _ piniqekagh mnnun _ ugpeq aal gu tem n nun _ B ar n a b as -en ku g nun _ P a ul -en ku g nun _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ .
taake uk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ P a ul -en kuk _ tuqute yagh ghngaistek _ pi kau uk _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ .
J u d as -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ kayagte naqe agput _ aap gh waagh es qell uki _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata tkekagh put _ elpesi nun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ whangkuta llu _ it ag naq am si _ allute luki _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh it _ atuqe nghite yagh ghngaaghpesiki _ pi s qell uki _ . _ iwernga _ ukut _ liilightuusagh t _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sug aput _ :
neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ aaw meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ qemitekagh meng _ , _ n uq e tu taq i teg gu llu _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ maligtekufsiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi lleqe usi _ . _ Taw a teng in aq _ lata amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ taakut _ yug t _ aghulaqekagh t _ J er us al em - e meng _ A n t i o c h - mun _ . _ kaate yameng _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ tuunekagh it _ lata t _ .
atightugh luki _ lata t _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ il u tugh llegh iit _ .
J u d as -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ elkek llu _ uuknaliqe i ste u lghiik _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke ii aghagh ta ghllag ke ak _ ugpeqagh nun _ ugpegh llegh it _ ik naq ugh tes qell uki _ .
Tam aan te l q in agh lu tek _ aghulaqe yu ke ak _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ aghul aq es tek ag ke t _ whaten _ pi lukek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgute k _ iglegha llegh gpetegni _ . _ " _ taagken _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kay ag t is te meg nun _ J er us al em - em el ngugh nun _ .
iwernga _ silas _ tam aan s uk aq _ .
taake uk _ P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ A n t i o c h - m et aagh aq ak _ . _ elkek llu _ maligte te lutek _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k llu _ ungipagh ke ikagh k llu _ ungipagh aneng _ Atan ghem _ .
tagtalmi _ P a ul -em _ pi ke aa _ Barnabas _ , _ " _ takuughagh kau ltegneki _ ungipagh ke i vikekagh pung _ Atan ghem _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh ltegneki _ nateghtu langi _ ugpeq aal gu te p un g _ . _ "
B ar n a b as -em _ kelqe sug qu a _ John _ mark _ ,
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ kelqe sug ma ite kanga _ , _ qayughllak _ P am p h y l i a- m ell uteng _ John _ M ar k -em _ unite kakek _ qepghaqagh eng _ taaqe ste gpenaan _ .
P a ul -en kuk _ B ar n a b as -en kuk _ aaghtiiraagh tke ghllag luku _ pelleghmun _ aghulaqe te tke ak _ . _ B ar n a b as -em _ kelqellug qu _ mark _ angyaghpag kun _ C y p r us - mun _ pi ke aq _ .
enkaam _ P a ul -em _ aghulaqe vagilgami _ nakmikegkagh a _ silas _ k el q en nal uku _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh tkellug kek _ neghyuke tke agket _ atanegh mun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ .
igleghtekagh k _ S y r i a- kun llu _ C il i c i a- kun llu _ ik naq ugh s aam ii ta _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh it _ .
P a u l _ D er b e- t k aq _ enkaam _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ L y s t r a- mun _ , _ tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ T im o t h y - meng _ . _ naange a llu _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ J e w s - a _ , _ naqam _ ata a _ greek- a _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ L y s t r a- m el ngu ut lu _ I c o n i um - em el ngu ut lu _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ T im o t h y _ pi niigh pigte ni luku _ .
P a ul -em _ kelqe sug qu a _ T im o t h y _ kayute u luku _ enkaam _ c i r c um c is e- es tek aa _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ J e w s -en un _ , _ qayughllak _ tam aan l e nguut _ J e w s - et _ liisimake kangat _ ata a _ G r e ek - ngu l ghii _ .
taagken _ iglegha u luteng _ ne ghllag nun _ kaate negh meggni _ ugpeqagh t _ qaatke te sqe aqe kangit _ ap o s t l e- et lu _ , _ El d er - et lu _ liilightuusagh ngllagh qite te nun _ J er us al em - e mi _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ wata _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh t _ , _ nula ma inagh ke aat llu _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
P a ul -en kut _ igleghtekagh t _ akule gkenkun _ P h r y g i a- m llu _ , _ G al at i a- m llu _ , _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungip agh te sim ang il k angi _ ungipagh meng _ A si a- mi _ .
tughwaagh luteng _ M y si a- mun _ nagnegh naqe kaayagh lghiit _ B it h y n i a- mun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ taghneghagh gkenka _ pi s negh it k ii _ .
enkaam _ M y si a _ naghughte luku _ tesamavek _ T r o as - mun _ pikagh t _ .
U n ug mi _ tawani _ P a ul -em _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ M a c e d o n i a- gh m ii _ tagsigh ragh lghii _ . _ yug m _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tagi luten _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ kayusiite aghte kut _ ! _ "
legan _ P a ul -em _ esghaghwaagh llegh an _ kingu aneng _ yataaghqe ukut _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ pi na luta _ , _ qayughllak _ lii g ik eg ke f ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh qite yu kanginkut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ te l an ang ameng _ nangaqaghte ukut _ T r o as - meng _ S am o t h r a c e- mun _ . _ unaami ani _ N e ap o l is - mun _ pi ukut _ .
taagken _ qute kun _ kaate ukut _ ne ghllag mun _ philippi- mun _ M a c e d o n i a- m el ngugh mun _ R o m e- egh m iit _ neli ke ii te nun _ . _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ tam aan tu kut _ .
Tam aan sim al uta _ S a b b at h - ngugh s ag u _ mingllute m _ amig ghllag akun _ aane luta _ kiiw gnun _ pi ukut _ , _ J e w s - et _ tawani _ yughagh te aqe na yu kata _ . _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ taw an tu te f tut _ enkaam _ aqume uute luta _ aleghqugh aput _ .
ataasigh _ nagate lghii _ L y d i a- ngu f tuq _ , _ T h y at i r a- gh m ii _ , _ akilpegagh qagh yu k _ esnegrukegtagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ , _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Atan ghem _ lii g ik es teng ng w aaq ii _ P a ul -em _ akuzi ta i _ L y d i a- mun _ enkaam _ ugpeqekagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ p aap taa y e y ameng _ L y d i a- m _ aqelqagh ngllagh ainkut _ , _ " _ sumegh gpesini _ ipapik _ ugpegh ma kuma _ atanegh kun _ , _ whang kun n it aghh n ay an ghi t si i _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ sagiqe sigh nkut _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiiw m _ es neng an il ngugh mun _ yughagh te vig mun _ aglagh ma luta _ , _ n all agh agh put _ qep ghagh te l aaq _ aghnagh aq _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Taa m _ tughneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke ste aqe kangi _ sa u aat _ sa yaghqagh t _ siv ut gh ull uki _ . _ enkaam _ pi lii tes teng it a _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u kangat _ .
Taa m _ aghnaghagh m _ maligsaagh ainkut _ P a ul - llu _ whangkuta _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ qep ghagh tek ii _ A ang ell egh pig aam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ ungipaate aqe aisi _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ ! _ "
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi uq _ . _ qenwat llu _ P a ul -em _ qinuyagute luku _ tughneghagh _ ilu anite ngughk _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ qelegh amken _ aan es qell u ten _ ellnga neng _ ! _ " _ Taw an ing in aq _ tughneghagh _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh _ .
P il ii tes teng it a _ liigike yamegteggu _ all g egh u tu t k es aghq aan an ii m at s eng _ aghnagh aq _ , _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ akugh ke aqe agket _ . _ Q am ugh s iigh meng _ aglagh tke agket _ iglegh ut is t en un _ ak il p eg aghv ig m el ngugh nun _ .
taagken _ iglegh ut is tet _ aglagh te lukek _ R o m e- egh m iit _ nan qig t is teng it nun _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yug k _ ukuk _ J e w - ngu uk _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii u uk _ maani _ .
apeghtugh i aqe uk _ kiyagh taa llegh meng _ whangkuta _ R o m e- egh m ii ni _ liilightuusagh mta _ iinghute ke ii te neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtuusagh ik _ atuqe naanghite aput _ . _ "
enkaam _ yug lghute _ ilate qaghtagh te luni _ sughukagh gket _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ . _ N an qig t is tet _ qelegh tke agket _ aatkagh ik _ q es ug um eng _ mataghte qugh luki _ an ag ul gh es qell uk ek _ .
A nag ul egh taa negh meng _ taaqe lukek _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghtekagh gket _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg anun _ m aghq a tu t ng waagh es q egk ag ke t _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ tawaten _ kayagte yatni _ il uk l igh pig agh mun _ qamavek _ kanaghtekakek _ . _ taagken _ um ugh llag meng _ unaghsigh meng _ tu ku gh u sigh l uk ek _ , _ maghqatekagh it _ taakut _ tukughte te t _ qaprag yaghqaa gpenakek _ .
nani _ tamaani _ un ug em _ qukaa ni _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ yughagh magh egmek _ ilagaghkagh k _ usuqe i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ anusimingllaghagh t _ taw an l e nguut _ nag at k ag ke t _ .
nuuskagllagan _ nuna _ tu y ep egh taq aq _ , _ repall _ anusimingllaghvig _ tunemaghtuumagh an _ aghula tke a _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ amig t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ anusimingllaghagh neng llu _ qiipraghute t _ ilefkaghaghtagh tke aat _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ , _ amig t _ qelpatu te ut _ . _ sumegh mini _ anusimingllaghagh t _ qimagugh te ma ni luki _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ ellmi neng _ tuqute naqekagh _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tuqute naqe gpenang _ el pen eng _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ wh aan tu tu kut _ ! _ "
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ kenegh meng _ tungsigh luni _ itegh qaghtekagh _ . _ A l ing r uugh em _ ungelegte magh mi _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ manu gkenkun _ segesqughtekagh _ .
taagken _ aan u tu t k ell uk ek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ yug gni _ u ku gh tek _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ yuguligh lleg nge nayagh zinga _ ? _ "
pikagh ak _ , _ " _ ugpeqe gu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ , _ nengllugute ten llu _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ atanegh _ ellnga nun llu _ neng ll ug ut ang an un llu _ .
tawani _ un ug mi _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ ugh v ugh te q ii _ taake uk _ yug k _ an ag ul ell gh egk en ka _ kii ik _ . _ taagken _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ paaptaaye inagh magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ ellmeggnun _ aglagh te lukek _ negh es tek ag ke t _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aghte yagu _ R o m e- egh m iit _ nan qig t is teng it a _ keveg aqekagh it _ um iil w aat eng _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ whaten _ , _ " _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ aane ste kek _ . _ "
enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ P a u l _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ N an qig t is tet _ kayagte te ii stek _ aan es l am teg nguq _ enkaam _ aane lghaatek _ , _ aghulaqe tek _ n ek eg g m ell u tek _ . _ "
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ umiileg u aaghet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ R o m e- egh m ii ngugh ng aam tun g _ yugtuqagh mi _ an ag ul egh taa k aq iin kun g _ , _ talwa _ ip a pi gh q utk eg pen aan _ sa meng _ an ag gu sim at f un g _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllagh ainkung _ . _ En r agh ng am _ whaa _ maaten _ aksaqe luku _ aan es naq in ku un g _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ E ll meg g neng _ nan qig t is tet _ tagi luteng _ aane ste linkung _ . _ "
P a ul -em _ tawaten _ pi y is t eng _ umiileg u aaghet _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu ait _ nan qig t is tet _ . _ enkaam _ nan qig t is tet _ alingekagh t _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ nagaqugh lukek _ R o m e- egh m ii ng ut ke k _ .
taagken _ taku lukek _ qivghuke lukek _ aan es tek ag ke t _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ , _ aghul aq es q egk ag ke t lu _ .
enkaam _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ aane yamek _ , _ L y d i a- n ku nun _ pikagh k _ . _ tawani _ laalighfike luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
P a ul -en kut _ igleghtekagh t _ A m p h ip o l is - kun llu _ , _ A p o ll o n i a- kun llu _ T h es s al o n i c a- mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ J e w s - et _ s y nag o gu e- el g et _ .
P a u l _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ pingayut ni _ S a b b at h -en i _ P a ul -em _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ yug t _ Christ- ameng _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
U uk nal i qell egh teg gun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ ipa _ Christ- a _ tuqu yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ unguvagh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ Jesus _ apegh kegka _ elpesi nun _ Christ- ang u uq _ . _ "
ila i _ J e w s - et _ ugpegh luteng _ ila tke aat _ P a ul -en ku g nun _ S il as -en ku g nun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ G r e ek - el gh u tet _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghnagh lghute t llu _ pingwaagh t _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
taagken _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ J e w s - et _ aqinake lukek _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ tes q ag an taq elghii neng _ sa igate ngugh neng _ yug neng _ qerngughte i luteng _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ qenwat _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ T h es s al o n i c a- gh m iit _ q ap r aghq egk iit _ . _ taagken _ ketanqusnaq _ J as o n -en ku nun _ aglagh luteng _ itegh qaghtagh tke aat _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ aane te na lukek _ yug lghute nun _ .
iwernga _ naalke nghite yamegtekek _ , _ J as o n - llu _ ila i llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qamughsiighkagh it _ T h es s al o n i c a- m _ iglegh ut is teng it nun _ . _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ navek _ alngunak _ pinegh megteni _ seghleliighqagh ii aqe uk _ , _ whaa _ maani llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe uk _ .
C a es ar -em _ liilightuusagh i _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe aik _ whaten _ pi llegh meg n eg un _ , _ ' _ Jesus _ um iil eg pig aag uq _ , _ Caesar _ umiileg u nghite uq _ . _ ' _ J as o n -em _ ell meg g n i tes taq aa k _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yata _ yug t llu _ iglegh ut is teng illu _ T h es s al o n i c a- m _ sakraa ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ iglegh ut is tet _ pi ke ait _ J as o n -en kut _ , _ " _ qelegh te agput _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ elpesi nun _ aghulaqe ste sqellug kek _ T h es s al o n i c a- meng _ , _ iwernga _ sivuke lusi _ m an il it i kut _ . _ aghulaqe gkayek _ mani i _ v egh ull eq agh put _ . _ " _ taagken _ aglagh stekagh it _ .
mamlegte ghesnagh yagu _ ugpeqagh t _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ aghul aq es tek ag ke t _ B er e a- mun _ . _ kaate yamek _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ pikagh k _ .
tamaakut _ Jews-ngit _ nagate yu kestagh lukek _ ayuqe kegket _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ , _ T h es s al o n i c a- m el ngugh neng _ . _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ J e w s - et _ ell meg g neng _ liite naqekagh it _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ liigike na luki _ P a ul -en kuk _ S il as -en kuk _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ ipa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ , _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ pingwaagh t _ G r e ek - et _ aghni ut llu _ yug it llu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - et _ T h es s al o n i c a- m el nguut _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i ni luku _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ B er e a- mi _ , _ B er e a- t k at _ . _ kaate luteng _ q ap r aghq ii k at _ yug neng _ seghleliighqagh iikagh t _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l _ esne mun _ atghagh te qagh stekagh at _ iwernga _ S il as -en kuk _ T im o t h y - n kuk _ B er e a- m et k ak _ .
yug t _ igleghte te i lghiit _ P a ul - meng _ maligte tke aat _ athens- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ uteghnigh naqe yata _ B er e a- mun _ P a ul -em _ lipeghsagh kakek _ S il as -en kuk _ T im o t h y - n kuk _ t aku s qell uni _ pi yaghqaaghte ghesnagh kayek _ .
athens- mi _ P a u l _ utaqa i te kete luku _ S il as -en ku g neng _ T im o t h y - n ku g neng _ , _ yuvghiigh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ngllagh qaghtu pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ P a ul -em _ s y nag o gu e- mi _ J e w s - et lu _ G en t il e- et lu _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un il uku _ . _ akilpegaghvig mi llu _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ alngunak _ taw an negh ata _ apegh aqe kanga _ Christ- a _ .
ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ E pi c u r e an - et lu _ , _ S t o i c - et lu _ taku luku _ P a u l _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ ila ita _ ila teng _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ una _ akuz iv all ughllak _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ " _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ llangaqa _ n aku m iit _ kiyaghnegh it _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ P a ul -em _ ungipagh ke u kanga _ Jesus _ , _ unguvallegh a llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ P a ul - mun _ maligte stekagh t _ ag ghi s t en un _ A r e o pag us - m el ngugh nun _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yameng _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ taana _ nutaghagh _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ken _ lii s u w agh put _ .
sa u a _ taana _ apegh kan _ all aagh ll u wh aag uq _ whang kun ni _ , _ enkaam _ lii g ik s u w agh put _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ "
( _ sa u aat _ nutaghagh t _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi nghata _ A t h en s - egh m iit lu _ , _ n aku m iit lu _ tamaavek _ lli aqe aat _ apegh y u w aq iit lu _ nagate yug aqe ait llu _ . _ )
enkaam _ A r e o pag us - mi _ P a ul -em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ A t h en s - egh m ii ni _ , _ liigike amsi _ elngaatall _ maniguute kayugu usi _ elpek si _ yug ni _ .
igleghte yalghiinga _ qagani _ akule mi _ , _ esghagh anka _ manigugh vig lghute si _ , _ aghqefig llu _ ataasigh _ igaqe vike nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nallukekagh mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ' _ T aan ang u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ nalluke ghngaaghpesigu _ manigughkagh i _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
Taa m _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ nuna _ , _ sa u a llu _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ nuna mete ngughk _ . _ atanegh ke a _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ enkaam _ m an ig u ut f ing ll aq an i si g a tuq _ .
T aan ang u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ tuune i kayug _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ aneghnegh meng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ yug nun _ . _ aklu ke yaghqagh ke nghite a _ yug t _ kayusillegh at _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ ak l uk ig at aa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ yuug _ nuna mete ngughk _ whani _ . _ I ing ke r ug llak _ yataaghqe kaqe ai llu _ qakun _ yug t _ allgegh yaghqaa ta i _ , _ nani llu _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ .
tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ yug nun _ iv ii s qell uni _ luuraq _ n aal ken n ay uk ang at ni _ . _ naqamllu _ naligh ghhagh inagh mnneng _ uy av an negh i tuq
qayughllak _ ' _ ellnga kun _ kiyagh teng ngu u ku t lu _ , _ qaprag u ukut llu _ , _ allgegh kau ukut llu _ . _ ' _ talwa _ ila i _ ig angll agh te si _ whaten _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ '
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ s um egh tagh aatk es aghq aq en ghi tagh put _ yug t _ ul im aa ghi s tun _ g o l d - meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uyghag meng _ ayuqe luki _ . _ yug t _ s um egh tagh all ghi s tun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ yug t _ salin _ nalluke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghyuugh yug mangite ai _ agh y u us aq egh ngaat a _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ qelegh u ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ n aan sagh ngaat a _ av utegh qell uki _ , _ seghlegh q en nan ii s qell uki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ qelqe aqe ai _ qayughllak _ nekegtekaqe a _ aghneq _ nanqigtivig u luku _ . _ nakmikegkagh mikun _ yug kun _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ taw at egh ll u w aaq _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ . _ liite ste na luku _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yuug _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
nagate luku _ P a ul -em _ apegh kanga _ yuug _ unguv agh te sim an il uku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ila ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ P a u l _ , _ " _ wataqaaghaq _ nag as u w agh put _ alla _ apegh naqe gkuvgu _ . _ "
taagken _ P a ul -em _ unitekagh i _ ,
iwernga _ ila ita _ maligsaagh luku _ P a u l _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ . _ ataasigh _ D i o n y si us - ngu f tuq _ , _ A r e o pag us - mi _ agghi sta _ , _ aghnagh llu _ ategh ke lghii _ D am a ris - meng _ , _ kinku t llu _ ila i _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ P a u l _ C o r in t h - et k aq _ athens- meng _ .
tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ J e w _ ategh a _ A qu il a _ , _ P o n tu s - mi _ allgeghkagh _ . _ italy- meng _ kaate negh ghhagh u uk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ P ris c ill a- n kuk _ , _ qayughllak _ U m iil eg pig aam _ C l a u d i us -em _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ J e w s - et _ R o m e- e meng _ . _ P a ul -em _ laalighfike lukek _ 
el k egk en it k aq _ qayughllak _ qepghaqagh ak _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ tiinta ngllagh llegh m _ aki a _ kiyagh usi q egk angat _ .
S a b b at h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ P a u l _ s y nag o gu e- mun _ pi luni _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ J e w s -en un llu _ , _ G r e ek -en un llu _ ug pegh es qell uki _ .
S il as -en kuk _ T im o t h y - n kuk _ kaate tke ak _ M a c e d o n i a- meng _ , _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i inagh luni _ lli aqe aq _ . _ J e w s -en un _ aapte qugh a _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un il uku _ .
J e w s - et _ k ip ull g in aagh y at n illu _ seghletun llu _ akuzite kete yatni _ , _ aatkagh mi _ pagula i _ ufsug te luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ifla kufsi _ elpek si _ pil qagh si _ , _ whanga _ pil q en n aanghi taq a _ . _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ G en t il e- en un _ ungipagh ke i naqe unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ unite luki _ J e w s - et _ T it i us _ J us tu s - mun _ lli aqe aq _ , _ gentile- mun _ maniguute kayug mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ mangteghagh a _ s y nag o gu e -em _ saaghw anite ngughk _ .
S y nag o gu e -em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ C ris p us - ngu f tuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ . _ C o r in t h - egh m iil gh u te t lu _ nagate luku _ P a u l _ ugpegh luteng _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
taagken _ un ug mi _ ataasigh mi _ P a u l _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ Atan ghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ iilqayug fqaavek _ 
qayughllak _ el pen it aq unga _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aqnigh snaanghite amken _ , _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag mi _ whani _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ whanga _ pi kaqe a _ . _ "
enkaam _ P a u l _ tamaani _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
gallio _ , _ R o m e -em _ umiileg ughte ste aqe yagu _ G r e e c e- mun _ , _ J e w s - et _ qerngughte te luteng _ sughug luku _ P a u l _ aglagh tke aat _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ U u m _ yug m _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ manigigh sqellug qu _ alla u luku _ liilightuusagh mnneng _ ! _ "
iiwenllu _ P a u l _ akuzi naqe aqe uq _ , _ G all i o - m _ J e w s - et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ tegleg uqagh u yagh kan _ , _ yugtagh kaayagh kan _ nalighmeng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghlegh pestaagh _ pi kaqsagh kagu _ ilapga pestaagh nayagh amsi _ .
iwernga _ una _ yuug _ tawaten _ pi mangite uq _ . _ A agh t ii r aagh ut ke ng ngun ghi t a si _ R o m e -em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ aagh t ii r aagh ut ke ng ng w aa si _ elpek si _ katam _ liilightuusagh si _ , _ akuzite t llu _ ategh t llu _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ . _ tamaaken _ nanqigte i yaghqaa nghite unga _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi teki _ . _ "
enkaam _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ aan es qell uki _ .
taagken _ yug t _ akuqagh luku _ s y nag o gu e -em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ S o s t h en e s _ , _ qevute i aqe aat _ nanqigtivig m _ manughagh ani _ iwernga _ G all i o - m _ avelghagh ke ii naqe ai _ .
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ P a u l _ paninang _ ugpeq an it k aq _ qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ C o r in t h - mi _ . _ taagken _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ S y r i a- mun _ kelqellug kek _ P ris c ill a- n kuk _ A qu il a- n kuk _ . _ kaate yameng _ C en c h r e a- mun _ P a u l _ qigughkagh _ liigike sqellug qu _ akequsagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apeghiigh llegh a _ .
kaate luteng _ ephesus- mun _ , _ tamaani _ P a ul -em _ unite kakek _ P ris c ill a- n kuk _ A qu il a- n kuk _ , _ s y nag o gu e- ell uni _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ J e w s -en un _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un il uku _ .
E ll meg g n it agh ii s q egk aq saq angat _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke aq _ .
enkaam _ aghulaqe naqe yami _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ alla _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ " _ taagken _ ephesus- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
kaate luni _ C a es ar e a- mun _ nagneqe aq _ J er us al em - e mun _ laalighfike na luki _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taagken _ A n t i o c h - et k aq _ .
Tam aan tagh lluni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ G al at i a- kun llu _ P h r y g i a- kun llu _ , _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
P a u l _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ apollos _ , _ ephesus- mun _ kaate tke aq _ . _ J e w - ngu l ghii _ allgeghkagh _ A l e x an d r i a- mi _ . _ elngaatall _ akuzi lleg ghllag llu _ liite te ghllag ke aq llu _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ .
salin _ A l e x an d r i a- m ell uku _ kitum _ apeghtugh kaqe kanga _ Atan ghem _ tu mang aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe pigte luni _ akuz it ke ng ng uk ang allu _ apeghtuusagh ke u kanga llu _ elqughaghte luku _ Jesus _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ . _ naqam _ liisimake kanga _ paaptaaye llegh _ J o h n -em _ apeghtugh te llegh igh u naaghtu te _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ephesus- mi _ apollos _ s y nag o gu e- ell uni _ tetug gpenani _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ . _ P ris c ill a- n kuk _ A qu il a- n kuk _ nagate luku _ aqelqagh ngllaghkagh ak _ lii g ik es tagh aghn al uku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tu mang aneng _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ elqughaghte luku _ .
apollos _ G r e e c e- mun _ piyug yan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ kayemekagh at _ enkaam _ lata ke aat _ G r e e c e- egh m iit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ taakut _ G r e e c e- egh m iit _ ugpeqe kaqe kangat _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh akun _ . _ A p o ll o s -em _ kaate luni _ elngaatall _ ik naq ugh saq aqegk angi _ ugpegh llegh it _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ .
yugtuqagh mi _ aaghtiiraagh ghllagkagh i _ J e w s - et _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ ip a pi gh qu si q luki _ Jesus _ , _ Christ- ang un il uku _ .
apollos _ C o r in t h - m ell uku _ , _ P a u l _ qute kun _ igleghakagh _ ephesus- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ ila i _ malig s aagh tet _ nallagh luki _ 
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ all g egh sim as te ke k _ ugpegh aqngafsi _ ? _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ nakaa _ , _ nallukngwaagh agput _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun mi _ p aap taa y em at si _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ J o h n -em _ paaptaaye llegh atun _ . _ "
P a ul -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J o h n -em _ p aap taa y egh i llgh a _ av utegh qell uteng _ seghlegh q en nan il ghi nun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ pi kaqe ai llu _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ kingu mineng _ tagi yaghqagh _ , _ taana _ Jesus - ngu uq _ . _ "
nagaqugh yamegteggu _ taana _ , _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ .
P a ul -em _ s aa f saq min ik i _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ iteghkagh k _ ellngit nun _ . _ taagken _ akuzikagh t _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ ulu stun _ , _ uuknaliqe magh meng llu _ pikagh t _ .
entaqun _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yuug _ taw an tuq _ .
pingayut ni _ tanqigh ni _ S a b b at h - a _ tamaghhagh an _ P a ul -em _ tetug qagh gpenani _ aleghqugh qu ai _ yug t _ s y nag o gu e- mi _ . _ aaghhe naqutkekagh i _ , _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ pineghllug lghiit _ ug pegh y un ghi t k at _ , _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzi tkekagh at _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ Atan ghem _ apeghtuusagh a _ . _ enkaam _ P a ul -em _ unitekagh i _ k el qell uki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ T y r an n us -em _ apeghtugh i vig ani _ , _ P a ul -em _ aleghqugh aqe kangi _ yug t _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh meng _ J e w s - et lu _ G r e ek - et lu _ A si a- m el nguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ akuzi ta i _ Atan ghem _ .
kiyaghnegh _ all aagh ll u wh agh t iigh aat aq aq _ saghiigha nagh lghii meng _ P a ul - kun _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ yug t _ P a ul -em _ kakegllugiitagh i llu _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ lli nghmegteki _ qinu yu gnun _ naallghute aqe lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ il ung it n il nguut _ aane aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ J e w s - et _ iglegha u lghiit _ nuna nun _ , _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh u u kangit _ tughneghagh t _ . _ taagken _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ ategh a _ aane ste qugh sigh ke naqutke kaqsagh kangat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ qelegh amken _ aan es qell u ten _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ Jesus - kun _ P a ul -em _ ungipagh kekagh akun _ . _ "
S c ev a- m _ m aagh r aghv il ek _ ighnegh i _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ taana _ sceva _ J e w - ngu l ghii _ h ig h _ priest- a _ . _ )
iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ Jesus _ , _ liisimake aqa _ P a u l _ , _ elpek si _ kinku u tsi _ ? _ "
taagken _ yug m _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg m _ qetgegh vike luki _ taakut _ yug t _ qevute i aqe ai _ , _ ik naq e pig tu t min eng _ qamagte luki _ ava igh lleg kekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh aneng _ aane qagh tate luteng _ qimagugh tke aat _ amsikagh meng _ , _ kiitigh qu lleg ligh luteng _ .
qamagte luteng _ E p h es us - egh m iit _ , _ J e w s - et lu _ G r e ek - et lu _ alingruugh tke aat _ taana _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ enkaam _ ategh a _ Jesus-em _ wataqaaghaq _ qu ul v aq aat _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ ug pen gh h aq an iit _ yugtuqagh mi _ apeghraghkagh it _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ alignaghtaagh kayugu yagh lghiit _ tagite uute luki _ alignaghtaagh sigh t _ igagh teng _ panegh qugh qu ait _ yug lghute t _ esgh aam an ghi t ni _ . _ igagh lghute t _ ak itu l es ugh yaq meg tek i _ 5 0 , 0 0 0 _ silver _ d r a c h m as - et _ akike ait _ .
tamaa na _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ akuzi ta i _ Atan ghem _ mingitekagh t _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpeqekagh it _ .
kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ P a u l _ qakiqniqekagh _ J er us al em - e mun _ pi na luni _ , _ M a c e d o n i a- kun llu _ G r e e c e- kun llu _ aag luni _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ J er us al em - e tagh ll unga _ taagken _ R o m e- es aghq ap es t aagh uu nga _ . _ "
taagken _ P a ul -em _ kayute gni _ T im o t h y - n kuk _ E r as tu s -en kuk _ kayagtekakek _ aglagh kestigh sqellug kek _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ , _ ellnga _ A si a- m e tagh aq aq _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ E p h es us - egh m iit _ elngaatall _ seghleliigh tkekagh at _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ Atan ghem _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ .
tamaa na _ seghleliigh llegh _ D em et r i us -em _ silver- meng _ ul im as te m _ piinlegh iqe a _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ qayughllak _ ulima lgutke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh sigh ke u kangit _ silver- meng _ ulimaagh t _ tem p l e- eng waagh h aat _ . _ tamaakut _ tem p l e- eng waagh h aat _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ artemis- mun _ maniguute vig stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
D em et r i us -em _ ul im al g ut n illu _ ila i llu _ taw ate l ngugh meng _ ulima kayug t _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh aqe ukut _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
iwernga _ esgh ap ag agh si llu _ nag atagh si llu _ P a ul -em _ pi llgh a _ . _ pi aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ allangughte qugh aa _ maani _ ephesus- mi _ , _ m aan ing in aag pen aan _ tea- ma ghhagh ani llu _ A si a- mi _ pi aqe uq _ .
seghleghhalek _ sa nghite kumta _ qepghaqagh ut _ ukavagh lleqe uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ qamagte luteng _ A si a- gh m iit lu _ nun at aghh aan il ngu ut lu _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghnagh _ kiyaghnegh _ artemis _ . _ sa nghite kumta _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh tke sag u lleqe aat _ temple- a _ megnu nagh ite ni luku _ , _ A r tem is - em llu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taakut _ yug t _ nagate luku _ D em et r i us _ elngaatall _ sakraakagh t _ , _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t llu _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ E p h es us -em _ ! _ "
mulu gpenateng _ qamagte luteng _ E p h es us - egh m iit _ ke tan q waagh aatk at _ akilghuu magh meng _ nalluke ghngaaghmegteki _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ P a ul -em _ igleghalgute kek _ G a i us -en kuk _ A ris t ar c h us -en kuk _ M a c e d o n i a- gh m ii k _ tam aan l e ngu uk _ u v it ang it ni _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taake uk _ akuqagh lukek _ qamugh ke lukek _ ke t ar w ak at _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ maligte luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
P a u l _ itegh yug kaayagh lghii _ yug lghute _ aleghqugh na luku _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ ighlekekagh at _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ A si a- m _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ keveg aqe tke aat _ ilakumtaagh eng _ P a u l _ wataghllak _ itegh fqaan _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
