taakut _ q er ngugh ut f ig llag m el nguut _ wanlegi _ nepug ghllag ughtekagh t _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ sa meng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ , _ ila i _ sa meng _ alla neng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ . _ kiyang _ allute luteng _ nalluke kangat _ sangameng _ q er ngugh u sim at s eng _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ A l e x an d er - meng _ , _ J e w s - et _ apegh tugh waagh luku _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ akuzi yaghtigh sqekagh at _ sivu itnun _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ A l e x an d er -em _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ nag a tes qell uni _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ yug lghute ghllag t _ liigike yamegteggu _ alexander _ J e w - ng ut anga _ , _ q er ng agh llag meng _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ E p h es us -em _ ! _ " _ tawaten _ akilghuukagh t _ ke t wh el l _ maalghug _ aflu k _ .
ataasigh m _ E p h es us -em _ um iil waagh an _ nepiigh ste qaghte yamiki _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ E p h es us - egh m ii ni _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag mi _ liisimake a _ ephesus _ aflengake i stekagh a _ aange lghii m _ A r tem is -em _ temple- nge an _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ uyghag m _ ifkaghkagh m _ qilag meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aygughike naanghite ainkut _ taa ku g neng _ af l eng ak es teng ut f ut _ enkaam _ nepiigh tek _ . _ sa u a _ teme igh ghllag _ apeghiigh vagilgafsigu _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ whavek _ tagite kaqe agsi _ talwa _ sa meng _ tegleg nghite ghngaayek _ tem p l e- en eng _ , _ akuzi tke nghite ghngaagnegu llu _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghnegh ut _ artemis _ .
una _ nanqigtivig u nghite uq _ . _ D em et r i us -en kut _ qep ghagh te ku ll ghiit _ sa meng _ apallugh lgu kumeng _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglagh lit _ . _ tawani _ nan qig t is t en un _ apegh nakangit _ apallugh teng _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ avutkeiiraagh ghhaat _ .
wata _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh lgu kufsi _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ q er ngugh ut f ig pig agh mi _ agghi te kete nakesi _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ qayughllak _ R o m e -em _ umiileg ita _ nagaqugh kumegteggu _ una _ seghleliigh llegh _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke te nghite ni luta _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi naqe ainkut _ . _ S am eng Ê¼ ng am _ pi lleqe steki _ qayughllak _ apallugh ite ukut _ seghleliighqagh ii lleg mnnun _ . _ "
Taa m _ um iil waagh em _ tawaten _ pi luki _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ .
taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ alpag yan _ P a ul -em _ aqfa stekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ .
enkaam _ M a c e d o n i a- kun _ igleghte te kete luku _ laalighqwaagh vikekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ . _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ G r e e c e- mun _ ,
tam aan tek aq _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ . _ yataaghqe aqe uq llu _ angyaghpag kun _ S y r i a- n nal uni _ , _ liigikekagh i _ J e w s -en Ê¼ nguq _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ tuqute na luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uteghte yu ke aq _ M a c e d o n i a- kun _ J er us al em - e mun _ .
M al ig tes te ke f t ii _ S o p ate r _ , _ ighnegh a _ P y r r h us -em _ , _ B er e a- gh m ii _ , _ A ris t ar c h us -en kuk _ S e c un d us -en kuk _ T h es s al o n i c a- gh m ii k _ , _ G a i us _ D er b e- gh m ii _ , _ T y c h i c us -en kuk _ T r o p h im us -en kuk _ A si a- gh m ii k _ , _ T im o t h y - llu _ .
taakut _ aghulaqe kestagh luteng _ T r o as - mun _ , _ tamaani _ utaqa i ut _ whang kun neng _ .
kingu aneng _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Y e as t- al ii mang il ngu u m _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ philippi- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ kaate aput _ ila put _ T r o as - mi _ . _ Tam aan tu kut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ T r o as - egh m iit _ ugpeqe ait llu _ whangkuta llu _ qerngughte te ukut _ negh na luta _ Atan ghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ un ug em _ qukaa nun _ kenlanga _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ aghulaqe yug u lghii _ .
Q em tam el ngu u kut _ kenegh lghutaghtuqagh mi _ .
nukalpigagh _ E ut y c h us _ , _ aqume luni _ qergese m _ esne akun _ nagatekagh _ . _ P a u l _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ qenwat _ E ut y c h us _ qavaghni ke aq _ . _ qenwat llu _ umu qite luni _ qavagh yalghiimi _ eslate mun _ ifkaghkagh _ pamaken _ pi ng ay aan eng _ qemtagh m _ . _ aane luteng _ tu gu yaq meg teg gu _ tuqu luni _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ uki ragkiigh luni _ segesqughte vike luku _ qetekagh a _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whaa _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ mayugh uute luteng _ P a ul -em _ neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh luku _ neghekagh t _ . _ aleghqugh tke aat _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kenlanga _ aghte llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ P a u l _ aghulaqekagh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ nukalpigagh _ aglagh tke aat _ ne anun _ ilutu lleg nge ghllag luteng _ unguvallegh a _ ap all uq ll uku _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ A s s o s - mun _ sivungagh ni _ P a ul -em _ , _ qayughllak _ qute kun _ A s s o s - mun _ pi luni _ wetku _ tamaani _ uugte naqe ni lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ .
kaate yan _ A s s o s - mun _ qaake luku _ angyaghpag mun _ M it y l en e- e tu kut _ .
unaami ani _ M it y l en e- meng _ aghulaqe luta _ aghuliigh ukut _ Ch i o s -em _ tu ng ang akun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ S am o s - mun _ , _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ kaate ukut _ miletus- mun _ .
P a ul -em _ naghughte yukagh a _ ephesus _ qayughllak _ A si a- mi _ kimaawi yu nghite ngughk _ . _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ J er us al em - e mun _ kaa s u pig teng ngu l ghii _ angiite na luni _ P en te c o s t- mun _ .
miletus- mete luni _ P a ul -em _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ elder-ngit _ E p h es us - m el nguut _ .
kaa sa ta _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimakagh i _ naten _ kiyagh taa l q a _ elpesi nite lunga _ A si a- mun _ kaate yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ ima _ .
qepghagh te kaqe aqa _ atanegh _ qusevegte pigte lunga _ , _ qunituumagh ma llu _ qaywa _ J e w s - et _ segh l el iigh q egh llag ngaat ng allu _ , _ tuqute naqutke ghngaatnga llu _ .
iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ n uq e tu si g at an ka _ sa u aat _ kayute kaghqagh si _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ , _ apegh tun em si _ yugtuqagh mi llu _ ne gpesini llu _ .
qevuute luki _ qelegh aqe yagh anka _ J e w s - et lu _ G r e ek - et lu _ av utegh qell uki _ seghlegh q en nan iq ata _ q ii v es qell uki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ ugpeq is qell uk illu _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ .
whaa _ maaten _ qaatke te lunga _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ J er us al em -en naq unga _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa yaghqaqe aatnga _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ .
iwerngaqun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ nuna ni _ takukagh mni _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate aqe aanga _ J er us al em - e mi _ seghleliigh lleqe ni lunga llu _ anusimingllagh lleqe ni lunga llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ katam _ unguvallegh ka _ waakigate aqa _ apeghiigh qaghte na luku _ qepghaqagh _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ . _ apegh sqe kaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ liisimake aqa _ allameng _ esgh aghn aanghi tagh pesi nga _ , _ elpek si _ ungipagh iqe tekagh mni _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghneghmi _ whani _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ mal gh uk l ill ngun aan _ , _ naligh i _ ifla kan _ whanga _ pil q en ghi taq a _ ,
qayughllak _ n uq e tu sim ang it aqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite sug qu a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nun _ aflengake sqe ai _ katam _ tawaten _ pen n iigh n iigh te m _ aflengake llegh atun _ penniigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ k el eng ang waagh l usi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ yug i _ k el eng ak ng waagh luki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe ai _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mikun _ .
liisimake aqa _ unite kumsi _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ taku lleqe aisi _ . _ katam _ tawatete ut _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ naafqii naqe lghiit _ penniigh meng _ , _ naa f q en naq utk ell eq iit _ ugpeqagh t _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ .
talwa _ ila i _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ iqlengiqe yaghqaa ut _ ugpeq es qell uki _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ ug pegh te q egh te ku meg tek i _ malig s aagh tek nal uki _ .
enkaam _ k el eng ang waagh l usi _ p uugh te ll eng n ay uk af si _ . _ neqamike luku _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ qamagte lusi _ tamaaken _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ segh l el iigh ll agh ng aagh m a _ , _ qunituumagh ma _ .
" _ naange niite kete naqe aqa _ , _ neghyuke te amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ af l eng ak es qell usi _ , _ ungipagh mun llu _ piniqe llegh anun _ quy as tes qell usi _ . _ nagate llegh gpesigun _ taana _ ungipagh _ ugpegh lleg si _ ik naq ugh lleq ut lu _ all g egh lleq agh si llu _ elpek si _ pi liite yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taana _ pi liite yaghqagh _ tam aa ku nun _ pi u uq _ aaftekagh minun _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ mani gpesineng llu _ aatkagh gpesineng llu _ qiliigh mangite unga _ .
L ii simak agh pesi nga _ sa u a _ ak l uk egk aqa _ , _ ila ma llu _ whang am n il nguut _ ak l uk egk iit _ qep gh aat kay u w aan ka _ all g egh h nal uki _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi kaqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ usputagh u sqellug qu _ , _ whanga mtun _ ughleghiigh llegh gpesigun _ kay us ii tes qell uki _ pi pag n ing il nguut _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ whaten _ pi llgh a _ , _ ' _ quyanagh aghagh uq _ tuune i i llegh _ allgegh te llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
P a u l _ tawaten _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ , _ segesqughte luni _ yughagh lgusighkagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiya magh meng _ P a u l _ qete aqe luku _ naagh aataghkagh at _ .
qivghuke lleghpigagh ke kangat _ qayughllak _ pi kaqe kangi _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite ni luteng _ . _ taagken _ qanig ke aat _ angyaghpag mun _ .
unite yamteki _ ugpeqagh t _ angyaghpag mun _ uugg llu ta _ nangaqaghte ukut _ C o s - mun _ . _ unaami ani _ R h o d es - mun _ kaa llu ta _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ patara- mun _ .
tawani _ angyaghpag meng _ naalkute ukut _ P h o en i c i a- n naq elghii meng _ enkaam _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ .
esghagh yamteggu _ qiighqagh _ C y p r us _ uughqa akun _ nagnegh ukut _ S y r i a- m _ esne akun _ T y r e- mun _ . _ tawani _ usingigh aat _ angyaghpag _ .
tamaani _ ivagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ n aal k es am tek i _ ellngit nite ukut _ ataasigh _ santillegh _ . _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ ugpeqagh t _ P a u l _ J er us al em - e tes nan iq aat _ .
Agh ul aq s aghq aagh teng ng am ta _ ugpeq aal gu tem ta _ nulighh ghqu te lghiit _ , _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ maligte ainkut _ esnagh mun _ . _ tawani _ segesqughte uute luta _ yughagh te ukut _ .
taagken _ uugte ukut _ angyaghpag mun _ , _ q an ii ghi s te put _ ne meggnun _ aglagh uute ut _ .
aghulaqe luta _ T y r e- meng _ kaate ukut _ P t o l em a is - mun _ . _ tamaani _ quyake luki _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
U n am ing ani _ C a es ar e a- mun _ kaa llu ta _ P h il ip -en kun itu kut _ ev ang el is t- e mi _ . _ M aagh r aghv in l eq egk angat _ nakmikegkagh t _ kayute u luki _ .
E s tam aneng _ panig leg _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh meng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ u uk nal iq is tet _ .
salin _ tam aan sim al uta _ uuknaliqe i sta _ agabus _ , _ J u d e a- meng _ kaa tuq _ .
Wh ang kun nun _ tagi luni _ P a ul -em _ tafsi a _ iike luku _ a sigh qell uki _ itegagh ni llu _ iigge ni llu _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ ' _ J er us al em - e mi _ tafsi m _ uu m _ y um anga _ J e w s - et _ asighqesaghqagh ke aat _ , _ taagken _ tuune lleqe aat _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ ' _ "
whangkuta llu _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ nagate luku _ agabus _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ igh leg aatk es agh agh put _ P a u l _ J er us al em - e te f q aan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya magh gpesi _ tawaten _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ S egh l el iigh qagh pesi nga _ ! _ whaa _ apegh iigh waagh l unga _ ayuqe unga _ asighqesaghqagh u lunga _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ talwa _ tuqu yaghqaa lunga _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ "
P a u l _ sagiqe yan _ iil qay ag ut agh put _ en kaa ng am _ piigh ut _ , _ " _ yeqay _ Atan ghem _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ qafsina _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ y at aagh qell uta _ aghulaqe ukut _ J er us al em - e mun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ C a es ar e a- gh m iit _ maligte ainkut _ , _ kaate yamta _ J er us al em - e mun _ aglagh te ainkut _ tukughqagh mnnun _ M n as o n -en ku nun _ , _ C y p r us - egh m ii mun _ . _ U g peq aq s u wh aagh teg gun _ maligte te luni _ ugpeqekagh a _ Jesus _ .
J er us al em - e mi _ ugpeq aal gu tem ta _ quyake luta _ upugha te ainkut _ .
unaami ani _ P a u l _ maligte luku _ es ghagh yagh tugh yaq ef ut _ James _ , _ El d er - et lu _ qamagte luteng _ taw an te f tut _ .
P a ul -em _ quyakekagh i _ . _ taagken _ ungipagh tke ai _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ qepghagh llegh mikun _ G en t il e- en ill uni _ .
nagate luku _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ P a u l _ , _ " _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liisima kan _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ J e w s - et _ ugpeqe aat _ Christ- a _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te manginagh yug aqe ut llu _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
Ung ip aat aq iin nguq _ apegh tugh aq at en nguq _ qamagte luki _ J e w s - et _ , _ G en t il e- et _ nun ang it n il nguut _ qaatke te fqiita _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh anun _ pi s qell uki _ . _ pi aqe aten llu nguq _ ighnegh it _ c i r c um c is e- en ghi sagh ngaat a _ , _ talwa nguq _ atuqe snanigh aqe an _ J e w s - et _ kiyagh taa llgh at _ .
kaate ma ni luten _ nagaqugh pestaagh naqngu aten _ . _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ?
itagnagh pigte nayagh uq _ pi sqe lleg mtestun _ pi yagh kuvek _ . _ estamat _ yug mta _ apeghiigh yaghtugh ngestagh ma ait _ akeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek llu _ maligte luki _ temple- mun _ ukmangigh yagh a _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ tukfigh naketen llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh si _ enkaam _ aghqerragh ghhaasi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Taa m _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ taakut _ taawa _ m eq es teng ng waagh luteng _ qigugh yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ liilightuusagh t _ pi s qell ghi s tun _ . _ elpek llu _ ukmangigh kuvek _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - et _ liigike lleqe aat _ qaatke te nga llegh n _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ liigike lleqe aat llu _ nagaqughkagh eng _ tamaa na _ temngingu ta a _ .
taakut _ G en t il e- et _ ugpeqe ait _ ungipaate kaqe aput _ lata tgun _ q aatk es qell uki _ ukut _ , _ ' _ neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ aaw meng _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ nuqete aqe tek llu _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ unaami ani _ P a u l _ ukmangigh yaghtuqagh _ liilightuusagh t _ pi s qell ghi s tun _ maligte luki _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangigh yaghtugh lghiit _ . _ taagken _ P a u l _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ p r i es t- et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ santillegh _ atugh luku _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh eng _ apeghiigh naqe aat _ liilightuusagh t _ pi s qell ghi s tun _ . _ tukfigh lleqe anka _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh it _ enkaam _ aghqerragh u aghte te aatagh qagh nakesi _ taakut _ yug t _ . _ "
iiwenllu _ santillegh _ naange naqe aqe uq _ taakut _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh at _ , _ A si a- meng _ pi t _ J e w s - et _ esghaghkagh at _ P a u l _ temple- mete luku _ . _ aga _ akuqagh luku _ akilghuukagh t _ ,
" _ I s r a el - egh m ii ni _ , _ tagi aghte tek qun _ ! _ una _ yuug _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ segh l equ ugh aq iin kut _ J e w s -en i _ whangkuta _ , _ liilightuusagh put llu _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ seghlegh atagh aag uq _ tagite aqe yamiki _ G en t il e- et _ temple- mun _ liilightuusagh t _ iinghutekagh it _ . _ sakusiiqe aqe a llu _ una _ agleghnagh lghii _ temple- a _ . _ "
( _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ sumegh meggni _ P a ul - mun _ gentile- a _ itghute ma ni luku _ temple- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ J er us al em - e mi _ esghagh kaqe kegket _ T r o p h im us -en kuk _ q er ng agh m ell uk ek _ . _ trophimus _ G en t il e- ngu l ghii _ E p h es us - egh m ii _ . _ )
J er us al em - egh m iit _ ugumi yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ aglagh uute tke aat _ temple- mun _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ temple- mi _ P a u l _ akuqagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ eslate mun _ . _ Taw an ing in aq _ kitum _ amig ghllag t _ umeg ke ai _ .
tuqute naqutke ma luku _ P a u l _ R o m e- egh m iit _ pi ll u w agh teng it a _ umiileg at _ ungipangekagh _ qaga _ iingunagh mi _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagu ni luku _ .
Taw an ing in aq _ R o m e- egh m iit _ pi ll u w agh teng it a _ umiileg at _ kelqekagh _ um iil waagh neng llu _ pi ll u w agh t en eng llu _ enkaam _ aqfaasnaq _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esghagh luki _ pi ll u w agh tet _ qevute ta igh na nigh ke aat _ P a u l _ .
taagken _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ tugu luku _ P a u l _ asighqe stekagh a _ malghugnegh neng _ qiipraghute neng _ . _ P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ sa ma a _ ? _ "
ataasigh kun _ ak il gh u um eng _ k ii m s ii saq meg teg gu _ repall _ umiileg m _ lii g ik en ghi t k ii _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ . _ enkaam _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ yug minun _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ P a u l _ pi ll u w agh tet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
T u tem q ii r aagh nun _ kaat ute te luku _ pi ll u w agh tet _ kevegkagh at _ P a u l _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ suugllug ughte ghllag lghiit _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ malig llegh aat kaa t _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ "
P ill u w agh tet _ itghute naqe yatni _ P a ul -em _ aaptekagh a _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg at _ G r e ek - es tun _ , _ " _ A legh qu q aghn ay an ghi si kaa n _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ awii _ G r e ek - es tun _ akuzi kayugu ziin _ ?
T aan ang un ghi s ii n _ E g y p t- egh m ii _ qavnganghhaq _ qerngughte ikagh _ yug meng _ awite te na luku _ R o m e -em _ k av em e nga _ , _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqe tke ai _ 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ ategh leg t _ , _ Yug tagh tet _ ? _ "
P a ul -em _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ J e w - ngu unga _ , _ C il i c i a- gh m ii _ , _ allgegh kau unga _ ne ghllag mi _ tarsus- mi _ . _ A legh qu q aghn ay an ghi si ng ii _ yug t _ ? _ "
P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ angeghqe ma ke yatni _ , _ P a u l _ nekeve luni _ tu tem q ii r aagh teg gun _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ ne pi gh es qell uki _ . _ enkaam _ qalleg nanigh yata _ aleghqugh qu ai _ H e b r e w - s tun _ .
P a ul -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liigike ste naqutke aghte naqe amsi _ sa aqe te mneng _ . _ "
J e w s - et _ nagate yamegteggu _ akuzi lghii _ ellmegestun _ elngaatall _ q all eg nan igh waagh utk at _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - ngu unga _ allgeghkagh _ tarsus- mi _ C il i c i a- m el ngugh mi _ iwernga _ maani _ J er us al em - e mi _ angli kau unga _ . _ gamaliel _ apeghtughiste ke luku _ liite u aqe aqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh kekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ tuune kau unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ q aat ke ng ng waagh nal uku _ katam _ tawaten _ elpesi stun _ .
elngaatall _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ repall _ tuqute naqutke kaqe anka _ . _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tugu ste aqe luki _ anusimingllagh ste qugh kaqe anka _ .
H ig h _ p r i es t- em llu _ ag ghi s te t lu _ ipa u ni naagh aat _ apegh llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ whanga mkun _ lata t _ tuyugh ait _ J e w s - el gu tem n nun _ D am as c us - m el ngugh nun _ , _ lata tke ma kangatnga _ ivagh i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ naalke gkumki _ a sigh qell uki _ tagite naqngu yagh anka _ J er us al em - e mun _ aghyuugh na luki _ .
" _ taagken _ J er us al em - e meng _ D am as c us - mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe unga llu _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag _ kuukgute qagh uq _ whanga mnun _ .
ullegh aghte lunga _ nuna mun _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke aqe zinga _ ? _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus - ngu unga _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii _ amyuqetagh te kegken _ . _ '
tamaakut _ igleghalgute ma _ esghagh kaqe aat _ nighug _ iwernga _ al egh qugh tem a _ me a _ nagaqugh mangite aat _ .
enkaam _ aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ sa langa _ ? _ ' _ Atan ghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ nekeve luten _ aglagh a _ D am as c us - mun _ . _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh aneng _ elpenun _ . _ '
ayaa ma lghiinga _ nighug ghllag m _ ang tal ang aneng _ enkaam _ igleghalgute ma _ taslugh aatnga _ D am as c us - mun _ .
" _ kaate yamta _ yug m _ A nan i as - ngu un iiq egk ang it a _ esghagh yaghtugh aanga _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te nga lghii _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ , _ D am as c us - egh m iit _ J e w s - et _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ .
taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ anglegute mni _ S a u l _ , _ esgh as ag un neq ig ten _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ taw an ing in aq _ esghaate yagute lunga _ esghagh aqa _ .
pi unga _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ , _ nakmike aaten _ elpenun _ liigike sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Q ep ghagh t en i _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ aleghqugh kangaten _ .
enkaam _ ungipaghtekete lleqe aaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghaate llegh gpeneng llu _ nagate llegh gpeneng llu _ .
sa meng _ utaqa i aqe ziin _ ? _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaaye sten _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ ughvugh ste ki _ tuqlugh i llegh gpegun _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ J er us al em - e mun _ tagi nqigte lunga _ , _ temple- mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ 
esghagh aqa _ atanegh _ . _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe ragkiigh i _ J er us al em - e meng _ qayughllak _ maani _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ ungipagh n _ whanga mneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ '
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ lii simak ng waagh aat _ s y nag o gu e- n nun _ pi aqe lunga _ tugulagh kaqe anka _ ugpegh lghiit _ el pen eng _ , _ an ag ul egh tes taq an k allu _ anusimingllagh ste aqe anka llu _ .
ungipagh ten _ stephen _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ legan _ it ag naq egk aq aqa _ , _ taakut _ tuq ut is teng it a _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh it _ aflengake kaqe anka _ . _ '
Atan ghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ , _ kayagte naqngu amken _ agavek _ uyavagh nun _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ ' _ "
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ nagatekagh at _ P a u l _ kenlanga _ G en t il e- en un _ pi naqe ni llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ unguva u yaghqaa nghite uq _ ! _ "
S ak r itu tegh llag em _ ang tal ang aneng _ akilghuu te kete luku _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ nengug te luki _ aghula tke ait _ , _ suna meng llu _ qule mun _ milughmigkagh t _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ esghapag luki _ pi ll u w agh te min un _ itghute sqekagh a _ P a u l _ pi ll u w agh tet _ mangteghagh itnun _ . _ kayagte tke a llu _ kagsagmig sqellug qu _ apegh sqellug qu _ sangan _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ akilghuu tke ta a _ .
iwernga _ a sigh q es at ni _ P a ul -em _ aaptekagh a _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ R o m e -em _ liilightuusagh itni _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ kagsagmig kufsigu _ R o m e- egh m ii _ , _ talwa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ ? _ "
P a ul -em _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ um iil waagh em _ umiileg eng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sa naqe ziin _ ? _ una _ yuug _ R o m e- egh m ii ngu uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg m _ taku luku _ P a u l _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ipa _ R o m e- egh m ii ngu z ii n _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ llivike te ghllag lunga _ R o m e- egh m ii ngugh te kaa gu nga _ . _ " _ P a ul -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ R o m e- egh m ii ngu l unga _ allgegh kau unga _ . _ "
taakut _ aap qugh aagh tek aghq aq saq angi _ taw an ing in aq _ iq ill agh aatk at _ ellnga neng _ . _ P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ liigike yamigu _ P a u l _ R o m e- egh m ii ng ut anga _ alingekagh _ qayughllak _ asighqe stekaqe kanga _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ liigike sug qu a _ J e w s -en un _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ P a u l _ . _ enkaam _ unaami ani _ qiipraghute igh stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ ag ghi s te t lu _ qerngughte te ste luki _ aglagh tke a _ P a u l _ ellngit nun _ .
P a ul -em _ qiive luki _ ag ghi s tet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ aghnegh mun _ whavek _ kenlanga _ seghleghyug ta ite unga _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
aga _ H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ A nan i as -em _ nekevgha lghii nun _ P a ul -em _ tu ng ang ani _ qelegh tke a _ P a u l _ qasaghte sqellug qu _ q aan gh akun _ .
taagken _ P a ul -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe aaten _ , _ uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ liilightuusagh tgun _ nan qig s aghq aq agh pe nga _ iwernga _ elpek _ naafqe aten _ liilightuusagh t _ qasaghte ste llegh gpegun _ . _ "
P a ul -em _ s aagh w an il nguut _ nekevgha lghiit _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghletun _ aleghqugh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ h ig h _ priest- nga _ . _ "
P a ul -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ liisimake yagh kumkun _ h ig h _ priest- nge ta a _ tawaten _ pi nayagh nghite aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake yagh aqa _ akuzite i _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ igleghte te i lghiit _ yug gpesineng _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite asi _ . _ ' _ "
P a ul -em _ liigike luki _ ila i _ S a d d u c e es - ng ut angi _ , _ ila i _ pharisees- nge ta i _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ pharisee- ngugh u nga _ , _ siv un gh en k allu _ pharisees- ngugh t _ . _ whaa _ nanqigte na qagh zinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ta i _ . _ "
P a u l _ tawaten _ pi yan _ P h a ris e es - et lu _ S a d d u c e es - et lu _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ aga _ mal gh ugh q eng ng in aam agh meng _ pikagh t _ .
( _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ P h a ris e es - et _ ugpeqe u kangit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ , _ yaqulegtu ni luku _ , _ taghneghaghtu ni luku llu _ , _ naqam _ S a d d u c e es - et _ ugpeqe igate kangit _ tamaakut _ ) _ .
qenwat _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ ig l ag tugh tek at _ . _ ila ita _ P h a ris e es - et _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ mesag ii aghagh tke aat _ P a u l _ whaten _ , _ " _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ n aal ke f ik negh meng _ agh tugh agh put _ , _ ipa _ entaqun _ taghneghagh m _ nalighmeng _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh ma a _ . _ "
wanlegi _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag yata _ repall _ P a u l _ wayagh te luku _ lliigh yatgu _ , _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ yakugh yagute luku _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ pi ll u w agh te min un _ aqfa ste luku _ aw ite u te sqekagh a _ ag ghi s t en eng _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ pi ll u w agh tet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
tawani _ un ug mi _ Atan ghem _ aliigh vike luku _ P a u l _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilutu luten _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ J er us al em - e mi _ ungipagh ke llegh gpetun _ , _ R o m e- em illu _ ungip aq ell eq agh pe nga _ . _ "
unaami ani _ 4 0 - neng _ uglagh lghiit _ J e w s - et _ agghite luteng _ tuqute naqekagh at _ P a u l _ . _ E ll meg g neng _ akeqe tke aat _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ .
enkaam _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en un llu _ siivanllegh nun llu _ aglagh luteng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ akeqe i ukut _ negh naanghite ni luta _ kenlanga _ tuqute lleg mnnun _ P a u l _ .
elpek si llu _ ag ghi s te t lu _ aapte ggu _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg at _ tag in neq ig tes qell uku _ P a u l _ aap qugh aagh waagh naq n il uku _ . _ enkaam _ tume mi _ taakwani _ whangkuta _ tuqu lleq agh put _ . _ "
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ uyghu an _ nagaqugh luki _ agghi llegh it _ ungipaate yaghtuqagh a _ P a u l _ pi ll u w agh tet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
ungipaate yatni _ P a ul -em _ tuqlugh luku _ umiileg u aq _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ U u m _ n uk al pig aam _ ungip aa s u w aqaa _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg at _ sa meng _ , _ aglagh te aghte gu _ . _ "
U m iil waagh em _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh te luku _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg at _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anusimingllaghagh m _ P a ul -em _ tagite sqe a _ elpenun _ una _ nukalpigagh _ , _ s am e nguq _ ungip aa s u w aaten _ . _ "
umiileg m _ t as l uq luku _ iqitute luku _ ellng in aagh s am ek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ ungipaate yug zinga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ J e w s - et _ agghi te ma ut _ aapte na luteng _ P a u l _ aglagh te aghte sqellug qu _ agghi vig mun _ unaami _ , _ aap qugh w agh atagh aghn aq n il uku _ .
ugpeqe gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ 4 0 - neng _ uglagh ut _ yug t _ iigh luteng _ tume mi _ utaqa i naqe ni lghiit _ tuqute na luku _ . _ akeqe i ma ut _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ P a u l _ . _ apeghiigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
umiileg m _ i negh teng ng w aaq aa _ nukalpigagh _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ungipaate yaghtugh ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane stekagh a _ .
taagken _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ tagsiqligh lukek _ umiileg u aaghek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ 2 0 0 _ pi ll u w agh tet _ , _ 7 0 _ ku un it is tet _ , _ 2 0 0 _ p an as tet _ iglegh saq leg g iin aagh ll in nguq _ C a es ar e a- mun _ , _ ighivgaqun _ 9 - ek l aag mi _ .
P a ul - llu _ kuuni meng _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ iglegh u sigh q ameng _ , _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ kaat ute na ke si _ G o v er n o r - mun _ F el i x - mun _ . _ "
taagken _ g o v er n o r - mun _ lata tkekagh a _ P a u l _ :
ukut _ lata t _ C l a u d i us _ L y si as - meng _ pi u ut _ angegh lleg mnun _ G o v er n o r - mun _ F el i x - mun _ , _ quyake amken _ .
J e w s - et _ tugu kaqe aat _ P a u l _ , _ tuqute naqe aqe yaghpete aat llu _ iwernga _ liigike luku _ R o m e- egh m ii ng ut anga _ pi ll u w agh te ku ll ghii ni _ aq f aagh put _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ .
liigike yug luku _ J e w s -en un _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ ag ghi s teng it nun _ aglagh te aqa _ .
iwernga _ liigike yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ , _ talwa _ anusimingllagh yaghqaa luni _ . _ taawanginaq _ J e w s - et _ q aat ku un egh in n il uku _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi aqe aat _ .
ungipaate yatnga _ J e w s -en nguq _ tuqute naqe aqe aat _ P a u l _ , _ taw an ing in aq _ elpenun _ aglagh te ste aqa _ . _ taakut llu _ av utk is teng i _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ apegh yaghtigh sqellug qu _ apallugh at _ .
enkaam _ un ug mi _ tawani _ pi ll u w agh tet _ kayagte llegh megestun _ aghulaqe tke aat _ P a u l _ kenlanga _ antipatris- mun _ .
unaami ani _ ila i _ uteghnigh iqe aat _ pi ll u w agh tet _ mangteghagh itnun _ , _ taakut _ ku un it is tet _ nagnegh tke aat _ P a u l _ C a es ar e a- mun _ .
kaate luteng _ P a u l _ aglagh tke aat _ g o v er n o r - mun _ , _ lata t llu _ tuunekagh it _ .
G o v er n o r -em _ lata t _ atightugh luki _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ nalighnegh aneng _ R o m e -em _ pi u ziin _ ? _ " _ P a ul -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ C il i c i a- meng _ " _ .
G o v er n o r -em _ pilagh te aqe a _ , _ " _ A v utk is te ten _ kaate kata _ nanqigte lleqe amken _ . _ " _ taagken _ k el eng ak is t en un _ kayagte tke a _ kelengake sqellug qu _ P r a et o r i um - e mi _ mangteghagh mi _ H er o d -em _ ulima stekagh ani _ .
tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ H ig h _ priest- a _ A nan i a s _ , _ ila i llu _ siivanllegh t _ , _ akuzi stekaghqagh at llu _ tertullus _ , _ kaate tke aat _ C a es ar e a- mun _ . _ nanqigtivig mi _ G o v er n o r - mun _ F el i x - mun _ apeghkagh it _ P a ul -em _ seghletun _ pi llgh i _ .
tuqlugh yatni _ tertullus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ angegh lleg mni _ governor _ F el i x - mi _ , _ elpek _ apallugh ke luten _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut _ nuna mnni _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ . _ tamaakut llu _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ allangughte qughkagh ten _ pinigh ut _ .
sa llegh gpenun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ iyamsiqa yug ghllagu ukut _ .
kimaawi ste nayuke amken _ takestaaghhaa luku _ akuzi naqe unga _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ nagate naqe kefkut _ .
una _ yuug _ P a u l _ segh l el iigh q is te ngu uq _ . _ seghleliighqagh ke ai _ qamagte luki _ J e w s - et _ n aan sagh ngaat a _ . _ M agh yaghq ugh te kaa t _ Jesus-em _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii m _ malig s aagh teng it a _ .
talwa _ sakusiiqe naqe kaqsagh aa _ temple- a _ , _ iwernga _ tug uk aq agh put _ .
N an qig g naq egk aq sagh agh put _ lii ll igh tuus am ta _ pi llgh a tun _ , _ taawanginaq _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg ita _ L y si as -em _ tagi luni _ pi ll u w agh te min un _ wayagh stekaqe a _ whang kun neng _ . _ taagken _ qelegh ai _ av utk is teng i _ elpenun _ tag is qell uki _ .
governor _ F el i x - mi _ , _ aap qugh aa qu v gu _ liigike lleqe aten _ anaggute ni lleg put _ ipa u ta i _ . _ "
J e w s - et _ ilate qaghtekagh t _ tertullus- mun _ , _ akuzillegh i _ qamagte luki _ ipa u nikagh it _ .
taagken _ g o v er n o r -em _ P a u l _ akuzi sqekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ P a u l _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ governor _ F el i x - mi _ , _ quya unga _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ elpenun _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake amken _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ nanqigte i ste u uten _ whang kun nun _ J e w s -en un _ .
elpek ni _ liigike yugnagh uq _ ipa u ta a _ aku g aa r ug llak _ J er us al em - e te l q a _ maniguute na lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
A nag g un n is tem a _ liisimake aatnga _ aaghtiiraagh mangite aqa _ kina _ alngunak _ , _ q ap r aghq ii mang itu ng allu _ yug neng _ temple- mi _ , _ s y nag o gu e- n n illu _ , _ talwa _ nani _ alngunak _ J er us al em - e mi _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawaten _ pi ma ni ghngaaghmegtengnga _ ip a pi gh q en n aanghi taa t _ .
iwernga _ apegh naqe aqa _ una _ elpesi nun _ , _ manigugh aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh at _ sivunegh mta _ maligte luku _ T um anga _ Jesus-em _ . _ ukut _ yug t _ pi kangat _ temngingu ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ whanga llu _ ellngistun _ ugpeqe anka _ M o s es -em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
A nag g un n is tem tun llu _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh tes aghq aq ii _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ tuqukagh t _ pinigh yagh nga a ta _ , _ seghleghu yagh nga a ta _ .
En kaa ng am _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte naqutke aqe unga _ seghleghyug te kaghqagh ite te lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
" _ qafsinegyag _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ qantaghaqu nghhagh _ uteghnigh unga _ J er us al em - e mun _ m an il in nal uki _ akluma lghiit _ J e w s - el g ut en ka _ , _ aghq er r aagh nal ung allu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
pelungighsagh nghmeng _ apeghiigh lunga _ temple- mi _ aghq er r aagh um al unga _ , _ ila ita _ J e w s - et _ A si a- meng _ pi t _ esghagh aatnga _ . _ uvite ka _ paaghqite uq llu _ seghleliigh i tuq llu _ .
taakut _ J e w s - et _ sangameng _ tagi nghite aat _ ? _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kuma _ ellng i ngu yagh tut _ apegh i stekaghqagh nka _ seghletun _ pilleg mneng _ iwernga _ aviite ut _ .
yeqay _ ukut _ wh aan l e nguut _ nagate kaqe aatnga _ mesighagh aqngama _ J e w s - et _ agghi vig itni _ , _ apegh litgu _ anaggute llegh meng _ n aal ke f i kum aku meg teng nga _ .
entaqun _ ellngit ni _ seghleghu uq _ whaten _ pi aqe yamki _ , _ ' _ N an qig tagh pesi nga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ . _ ' _ "
iwernga _ F el i x -em _ , _ lii simak ng waagh luku _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh a _ , _ w in t aku si t k aa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ P a u l _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ P ill u w agh tet _ umiileg at _ L y si a s _ kaate kan _ agghi tke lleqe aqa _ P a u l _ . _ "
taagken _ um iil waagh mun _ kayagte tke a _ P a u l _ kelengake sqellug qu _ , _ naqam _ anusimingllagh snanigh qagh a _ . _ ighsake ste na nigh ke ai llu _ ilakumtaagh ita _ sa meng _ tagite nghatgu _ ak l uk egk aan eng _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ F el i x -em _ J e w s - a _ nuliigh ni _ , _ D r usi ll a _ , _ kelqellug qu _ tagikagh _ . _ tagsiqligh luku _ P a u l _ , _ nagatekagh ak _ ungipagh lghii _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ .
P a ul -em _ akuzi tke sag ke i _ ukut _ : _ pinitun _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ governor _ F el i x -em _ alinge luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ A an el gh aat en Ê¼ ng am _ , _ alla _ aqfa ste lleqe amken _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuma _ . _ "
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ felix _ neghyu u yagh lghii _ P a ul - mun _ m an il ill eq n il uni _ pegtekunigu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagsiqligh aqe kanga _ mulu te gpenaan _ aleghquute na lutek _ .
taagken _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ atugh lukek _ , _ P o r c i us _ festus _ g o v er n o r - ngugh tek aq _ . _ iwernga _ F el i x -em _ ef qugh s ug luki _ J e w s - et _ P a u l _ unitekagh a _ paninang _ q ii p r agh u sigh ng al uku _ .
festus _ kaa sa mi _ C a es ar e a- mun _ igleghte te i na luni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqekagh _ J er us al em - e mun _ .
tawani _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ iglegh ut is teng it allu _ J e w s - et _ ungipitekagh at _ , _ P a u l _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag kau ni luku _ J e w s -en eng _ .
sagiqe tke aat _ festus- mun _ , _ P a u l _ tagite sqellug qu _ J er us al em - e mun _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ tuqute yu ke aat _ tumangani _ .
iwernga _ F es tu s -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ P a u l _ k el eng ak aq agh put _ C a es ar e a- mi _ . _ qantaghaqun _ uteghnigh yaghqaa unga _ ,
iglegh ut is teg p esi _ maligte nakangatnga _ . _ elngaatall _ tawani _ sa meng _ anaggute ma kan _ apegh nakangat _ . _ "
festus _ J er us al em - em e tagh aq aq _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ nalighmeng _ qula _ aghneq _ , _ taagken _ C a es ar e a- t k aq _ . _ unaami ani _ nanqigtivig m _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ aqume luni _ aqfa stekagh a _ P a u l _ .
tagite yatgu _ , _ J er us al em - egh m iit _ J e w s - et _ kangllu qaghte luku _ anaggute aatagh ghllag mani ke aat _ iwernga _ ip a pi gh qep ag n ing it k iit _ anaggute llegh i _ .
P a u l _ mesag igh aqe aq _ , _ " _ qaatke igate nghite anka _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh it _ , _ seghletun _ pi igate unga _ temple- mi _ , _ seghletun _ pi mangite aqa _ R o m e -em _ U m iil eg pig aa _ . _ "
F es tu s -em _ ef qugh s ug luki _ J e w s - et _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ J er us al em - e mi _ whanga mnun _ nanqigte sug ziin _ ? _ "
P a ul -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ nakaa _ ! _ whaa _ U m iil eg pig aam _ nanqigtivig ani _ nekevgha unga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whani _ nanqigte yaghqaa unga _ . _ L ii simak ng waagh an _ J e w s -en un _ anaggute llghite unga _ .
anaggute ma kuma _ R o m e -em _ liilightuusagh an _ pi llgh ani _ repall _ tuqute yaghqaa lunga _ , _ anag naqe naanghite aqa _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ J e w s - et _ anaggute ni llegh at _ temngingu kan _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ J e w s -en un _ sastegkanganga _ , _ taana _ yuug _ qaatke te naanghite uq _ R o m e -em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ R o m e -em _ U m iil eg pig aan un _ nanqigte sug unga _ . _ "
F es tu s -en kut _ agghi lgutke te lghiit _ agghite nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ P a ul -em _ piyuke llegh aneng _ , _ P a u l _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nanqigte sug u lghiiten _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ , _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ aglagh lleqe uten _ . _ "
Taa m _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ umiileg _ agrippa _ kaate tke aq _ C a es ar e a- mun _ kelqellug qu _ nayag ni _ B er n i c e _ , _ quyake na luku _ governor _ festus _ .
Tam aan sim al uk ek _ F es tu s -em _ ungipamsug tke a _ agrippa _ P a ul - meng _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ G o v er n o r - ngugh s alghii nga _ F el i x -em _ yuug _ anusimingllaghvig mete ste aqe a _ maani _ .
J er us al em - em ell unga _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- et lu _ , _ iglegh ut is teng it allu _ J e w s - et _ ungipaate aatnga _ P a ul -em _ anaggute llegh aneng _ . _ taagken _ aapte aatnga _ whanga mnun _ tuqute ste sqellug qu _ ,
iwernga _ kiimsigh kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ R o m e- egh m ii ni _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nanqigte gpenaki _ tuqute igate aput _ . _ liilightuusagh put _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ seghletun _ pini ke aat _ , _ sivuke luni _ apegh tes aghq aag uq _ ipa _ pi ma ta a _ an ag g un n is tet _ nag a tes tek luki _ . _ taagken _ lii g ik ell eq agh put _ sa lleghqagh ut _ . _ '
enkaam _ P a ul -em _ an ag g un n is teng i _ tagi laghate te yata _ aga _ unaami ani _ aqume kau unga _ nanqigtivig kun _ , _ tagite stekaqe aqa llu _ P a u l _ .
A nag g un is teng i _ nekeve uute luteng _ seghletun _ pi llgh i _ apegh yaq meg tek i _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ seghleghtutka nghite ut _ .
Taa w ang in aghh aq _ aaghtiiraagh ma kangat _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ , _ taana llu _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Jesus - meng _ tuquma ni luku _ , _ iwernga _ P a ul -em _ sagiqe te kaqe a _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ .
liisimakepagunghite te mneng _ tamaakut _ , _ P a u l _ aapte aqa _ nanqigte sug ta a _ J er us al em - e mi _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ nanqigte sug unga _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ . _ kelengake ste nga _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste llegh gpenun _ ellnga nun _ . _ ' _ enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ k an agh tes neq ig taq a _ kenlanga _ aglagh ste lleghqagh mnun _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ . _ "
A g r ip p a- m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ whanga llu _ nagate yug aqa _ P a u l _ . _ " _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ unaami _ nagate lleqe an _ . _ "
unaami ani _ A g r ip p a- n kuk _ B er n i c e- en kuk _ iteghkagh k _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ elngaatall _ aa r r agh waagh lu tek _ umiileg m _ aatkagh aneng _ , _ malig tes tek luki _ umiileg it llu _ pi ll u w agh tet _ , _ iglegh ut is teng illu _ C a es ar e a- m _ . _ taagken _ F es tu s -em _ itghute sqekagh a _ P a u l _ .
F es tu s -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ wh aan l eng ugh ni _ , _ una _ yuug _ esghagh kesi _ , _ P a ul - ngu uq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - et _ m aan l e nguut _ , _ J er us al em - em el ngu ut lu _ q ik egh q uk egk aq aat _ whanga mkun _ repall _ akilghuu tke kaqe aat _ tuqute yaghqaa ni luku _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ . _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte sug kau ta aneng _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ aglagh ste na luku _ pi aqe aqa _ .
iwernga _ lata tgun _ sa meng _ ip a pi gh q eng ng alghii meng _ apegh yaghqagh ite unga _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ u um eng _ yug meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagite aqa _ sivu gpesinun _ , _ kiyang _ elpenun _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ ! _ neghyuke aqa _ aap qugh aa qu m teg gu _ sa meng _ lata sighqagh meng _ n aal ke f ik n ay uk am kun _ .
whanga mni _ temngingu uq _ aglagh stekumkun _ anusimingllagh aq _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ sa meng _ anaggute llegh meng _ apallugh ngunaan _ . _ "
A g r ip p a- m _ pi ke aa _ P a u l _ , _ " _ taawa _ mesighagh yaghqaaghte uten _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ akuzi _ . _ " _ P a ul -em _ iigge ni _ nengug te luki _ , _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ elngaatall _ aneghneghte unga _ sivu gpeni _ mesighagh naqe lghiinga _ J e w s - et _ an ag gu te l q en n ik ang it neng _ ,
qayughllak _ n all uk en ghi t ng waagh aten _ J e w s - et _ nangaghnegh it llu _ apallugh ke te kaqe kangit llu _ . _ enkaam _ n angll eg si pig ll unga _ aapte amken _ nag atagh tes qell unga _ .
" _ N un am n il ngu ut lu _ J er us al em - em el ngu ut lu _ qamagte luteng _ J e w s - et _ liisimake aat _ kiyagh taa l q a _ anglinghhagh u te mneng _ ima _ .
apegh yug yagh kumegteggu _ liisimakekagh eng _ apegh nayagh aatnga _ iiwleng _ qaatke te nga lghiinga _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ .
whaa _ J e w s - et _ tagi ste aatnga _ whavek _ nan qig tes qell unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke u kegka _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh t i llegh q aa _ tuqukagh neng _ akequsagh kekagh a _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
taana ta _ akequsagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke lghiit _ ramke mta _ neghyuke kangat _ all g egh h nal uku _ , _ elngaatall _ maniguute u luteng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ . _ umiileg mi _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ ataasigh _ neghyuke i llegh _ apallugh ke luku _ J e w s - et _ nanqigte sug aatnga _ .
sangafsi _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tsi _ kiyaghnegh _ unguv agh t ip ag n ing in n il uku _ tuqukagh neng _ ?
" _ sivugh nghaani _ agani _ ugpeqe pigtekaqe aqa _ k ip ull g in aa llegh ll ak a _ elqughute nga ni luku _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ N a z ar et h - egh m ii m _ .
tawaten _ pi kau unga _ J er us al em - e mi _ . _ Ch i e f _ p r i es t- en eng _ pi lleghqagh nge kau unga _ anusimingllagh ste na luki _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ . _ tuqu qugh naqe yatki _ itagnagh ke pigtekaqe anka _ tuqu tes qell uki _ .
uglagh ghngaan _ aghyuugh stekaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ s y nag o gu e- n ni _ , _ whaten llu _ pi ste naqutke kaqe anka _ , _ ' _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ Jesus _ . _ ' _ ugumi yagute pigtekaqe anka _ repall _ malighqagh kaqe anka _ talwa _ G en t il e- et _ nuna itnun _ amyugh te kete na luki _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ D am as c us - e tu nga _ pi lleghqagh ligh lunga _ , _ qelegh lleg ligh lunga _ c h i e f _ p r i es t- en eng _ .
umiileg mi _ , _ iglegh taa l uta _ aghneq _ qukaghite aqe uq llu _ esghagh aqa _ nighug _ n igh ug atagh alghii _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ . _ elngaatall _ nighugh pigte luni _ kuukgute kau uq _ uvite mnun _ , _ igleghalgute mnun llu _ .
qamagte luta _ u llegh aa tu kut _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ me _ nagaqugh aqa _ whaten _ pi lghii _ H e b r e w - gh m ii s tun _ , _ ' _ S a u l _ , _ S a u l _ ! _ sangama _ amyugh te kete zinga _ ? _ aqnigh qugh u uten _ el pen eng _ amyuutke i llegh gpegun _ , _ taw at egh pig aq _ o x -em _ aqnigh qugh llegh atun _ kete igh qugh llegh mikun _ yug mi _ maghyaghqugh sagh i _ . _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ Atan ghem _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus - ngu unga _ , _ amyuutke ken _ .
nekeve i _ . _ aliigh vike amken _ qayughllak _ nakmike amken _ qep ghagh te ngu l ut en llu _ liisimake i ste u luten llu _ . _ apegh naketen _ tamaakut _ esghagh uqagh ten _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ tamaakut llu _ kelgute yaghqagh nka _ k i nguv aq un _ aliigh vike gkumken _ .
yuguligh u iqe naagh amken llu _ elpek _ katam _ yug gpeneng _ , _ G en t il e- en eng llu _ . _ ellngit nun _ kayagte naqngu amken _ 
es ghagh tes tes qell uki _ , _ tunute luki _ mamleg meng _ q ii v es qell uki _ n igh ugh mun _ , _ tunute luki _ tughneghagh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh aneng _ q ii v es qell uki _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh anun _ . _ taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe ai _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ ila lleqe ai llu _ tamaavek _ aaftekagh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ whanga mneng _ . _ '
" _ umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ qaatke kaqe aqa _ taana _ esghaghwaagh llegh ka _ qilag meng _ .
sivuke lunga _ ungipagh ke i unga _ D am as c us - mi _ taagken _ J er us al em - e mi _ , _ tea- ma ani llu _ J u d e a- mi _ . _ ungipagh ke i unga _ J e w s -en un llu _ G en t il e- en un llu _ av utegh qell uki _ seghlegh q en nan igh luki _ q ii v es qell uki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi sqe anka _ ip a pi gh q utk es qell uku _ av utegh qell uteng _ seghlegh q en nan ii m at angi _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh ke i llegh ka _ apallugh ke luku _ temple- mi _ J e w s - et _ tugu lunga _ tuqute naqutke kaqe aatnga _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aqe aanga _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ , _ enkaam _ sivu gpesigun _ nekeve lunga _ apegh aqa _ Christ- a _ pingwaagh ghllag nun llu _ uk av an t alghii nun llu _ . _ apegh kaqe a _ t aan ang u uq _ ataasigh _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ M o s es - em llu _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ .
pi kau ut _ Christ- a _ ikfiqe pestaagh lleqe ni luku _ enkaam _ sivulii luni _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ apegh yaghqaa ni luku llu _ nighug a _ yuguligh llegh m _ yug nun llu _ G en t il e- en un llu _ . _ "
P a u l _ mesighagh ma luku _ F es tu s -em _ akilghuu ghllag qagh a _ , _ " _ P a u l _ , _ nallungughte uten _ ! _ liite llegh ghllag gpek _ nallungughte ste aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ governor _ festus- mi _ , _ nallungughte llghite unga _ , _ liisima lunga _ ipa meng _ akuzi u unga _ .
umiileg m _ A g r ip p a- m _ lii simak ng waagh aa _ tamaa na _ enkaam _ tetug gpenaan _ aleghqugh aqa _ . _ liisimake aqa _ nagaqugh kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ aksaqe luku _ pi kau nghite ut _ .
umiileg mi _ agrippa- mi _ , _ ugpeq aq si k ii _ u uk nal iq is tet _ igaqegkagh it _ ? _ liisimake amken _ ugpeqe aqe aten _ ! _ "
umiileg m _ A g r ip p a- m _ aaptekagh a _ P a u l _ , _ " _ S um egh pen ii - i _ whaa _ tan- squghhagh n _ aleghqugh lunga _ ugpegh ste naqe zinga _ Christ- ameng _ ? _ "
P a ul -em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ tan- squghhagh u ghngaan _ , _ nalighmeng _ taake luku _ aleghqugh yagh ghngaamken _ y ugh aat ke ng ng w aam ken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ug pegh es qell u ten _ . _ ellnginagh gpek _ y ugh aat ke ng ngun ghi tam ken _ , _ y ugh aat ke ng ng w aam si _ qamagte lusi _ nagate lghii ni _ whanga mneng _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ whanga mtun _ ll iigh es qell usi _ iwerngaqun _ qiipraghute ngunasi _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg _ agrippa _ , _ governor _ festus _ , _ B er n i c e _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila i _ nekeve te tke aat _ .
aane luteng _ ell meg g neng _ aleghqugh tke aat _ , _ " _ U um un _ yug mun _ sa meng _ apallugh ite ukut _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllagh sighqagh meng _ . _ "
A g r ip p a- m _ pi ke aa _ festus _ , _ " _ A an es n ay agh agh put _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ nan qig tes qell uni _ pi kau nghite yagh kan _ . _ "
F es tu s -em _ I tal y - tes q es ug y in kut _ angyaghpag kun _ , _ aglagh te stekagh i _ P a ul - llu _ ila i llu _ anusimingllaghagh t _ um iil waagh mun _ J ul i us - mun _ . _ J ul i us -en kut _ pi ll u w agh te ku ll ghiit _ ategh ke lghiit _ , _ " _ U m iil eg pig aam _ P ill u w agh teng i _ . _ "
taawa _ angyaghpag _ A d r am y t t i um - e meng _ pi _ , _ aghul aq saq leg g iin aagh tek aq _ ne nun _ A si a- m _ es neng an il ngugh nun _ . _ tawavek _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ A ris t ar c h us -em _ maligte ainkut _ T h es s al o n i c a- gh m ii m _ . _ ( _ thessalonica _ M a c e d o n i a- m el nguq _ ) _ .
unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ S i d o n - mun _ . _ J ul i us -em _ pinitungwaaq _ pi ke aa _ P a u l _ , _ laalighte ste aqe luku _ ilakumtaagh anun _ S i d o n - mi _ , _ sa meng _ ak l uk egk aan eng _ tuune aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
S i d o n - meng _ aghulaqe ukut _ anuqe _ aygugh mun _ enkaam _ igleghte ukut _ uq iin ell gh akun _ qiighqagh m _ C y p r us -em _ .
iglegha ukut _ esne akun _ C il i c i a- m llu _ P am p h y l i a- m llu _ , _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ myra- mun _ L y c i a- m el ngugh mun _ .
Tam aan te f tuq _ angyaghpag _ A l e x an d r i a- meng _ pi _ , _ enkaam _ U m iil waagh em _ J ul i us -em _ liigike luku _ I tal y - n naq ut anga _ uugte ste ainkut _ .
N un m aa s qugh h aq _ igleghte ukut _ qafsinegyag ghllag _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ kaate ukut _ C n i d us - mun _ . _ anuqligh te m _ iglegh ap ag n ing ii te si n kut _ taagavek _ , _ igleghte ukut _ uq iin ell gh akun _ qiighqagh m _ C r e te -em _ , _ naghughte luku _ S al m o n e _ .
esne ngiighhagh akun _ igleghte ukut _ piyaqli i ghngaamta _ , _ kaate ukut _ kangighagh mun _ ategh ke lghii mun _ , _ U q it aghv i k _ kangegh igh aq _ , _ taana _ q an tagh an l e nguq _ L as e a- meng _ .
Tam aan tegh llag tu kut _ qenwat _ yakugh nagh a _ taake luku _ iglegh amun _ , _ siingenllu _ aghneq _ naghughte lghii _ p r i es t- et _ aghq er r aagh v ig at _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ J e w s - et _ . _ enkaam _ P a ul -em _ kelenga sagh u aghagh u i _ angyaghpag m _ um iil waagh i _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sume mni _ whaa _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh naqe ukut _ iglegha lleg mnni _ . _ ifla aqe lteggu llu _ angyaghpag ut _ usituumagh an _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ tuqu laghate te lleqe ukut _ . _ "
iwernga _ U m iil waagh em _ J ul i us -em _ nagate kaqe kek _ angyaghpag m llu _ umiileg a _ , _ angyaghpag leg llu _ yuug _ avelghagh luku _ P a u l _ .
allute luteng llu _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ igleghte yu ke aat _ qayughllak _ taana _ kangegh igh aq _ yakugh nagh lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ uksughte vig u luni _ . _ kaate naqe na luteng _ P h o en i x - mun _ pikagh t _ uksughte yaghqaa luteng _ tamaani _ . _ P h o en i x -em _ kangighagh a _ qiighqagh mete ngughk _ C r e te - mi _ , _ n o r t h w es t- m un llu _ s o ut h w es t- m un llu _ ayuqe lghii _ .
I k eg ke meng _ anuqataghaaghte yan _ angyaghpag m _ yug i _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ taana ta _ anuqe _ utaqakagh ut _ . _ " _ enkaam _ uyghigh te a _ sayug luku _ te l an ang aakut _ C r e te -em _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
iwernga _ anuqligh ghllag uq _ nakaghya meng _ enkaam _ qiighqagh meng _ atghaghtegh ghllag aa _ .
angyaghpag _ awatmun _ teng s ag u _ qute mun _ taglagh naqutkesagh luta _ iilqayug ukut _ enkaam _ u p uu p eng _ teng tes tu kut _ .
qiighqagh squghhagh m _ C a u d a- m _ uughqa anun _ lliigh sigh nkut _ up- qite ghraag ukut _ . _ tawani _ qam uq saq ef ut _ angyat ghhagh ut _ piyaqleg iigh tke ghngaamteggu _ qaakagh ut _ .
taagken _ angyaghpag _ ayugighsagh aat _ asighte luku _ t ap ghagh meng _ . _ alinge luteng _ qenaaghte lugh qugh te na yukagh meng _ S y r t is - mi _ te l an angat _ ifkagh qugh luki _ teng tes tu kut _ .
unaami ani _ paninang _ esla _ almesiqe ghllag yagu _ , _ angyaghpag m _ usi an _ ila i _ megh mun _ ategh qugh ait _ .
awakaghaani _ esla _ almesiqe yagu _ angyaghpag m _ sanqute i _ ategh qugh ait _ .
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ si q in ngun ani _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ngunani _ pi uq _ esla m _ seghlegh ghllag m _ ang tal ang aneng _ . _ enkaam _ talwa _ iilqayug ukut _ , _ isigima qun _ tuqu laghate te naqe lghiikut _ .
yug t _ neghe gpenateng _ muluugh ghllag yata _ P a ul -em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ nagate kaqsagh kufsinga _ kete nayagh nghite ngugh u kut _ C r e te - meng _ enkaam _ aghsaan _ seghleliigh nayagh nghite usi _ , _ saghya igh te nayagh nghite usi _ .
iwernga _ iilqayug gpenasi _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ .
unuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg an _ taku kaqe aanga _ . _ taana ta _ kiyaghnegh _ manigugh aqe kegka _ , _ ellnga n _ pi ke aanga _ .
yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ P a u l _ , _ alinge gpenang _ , _ kaate lleqe uten _ R o m e- e mun _ , _ nekeve lleqe uten _ sivungagh kun _ U m iil eg pig aam _ . _ yughagh tke kaqe te gpeneng _ ang yagh pag m e te l gu te ten _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ul ill eq ii _ . _ '
enkaam _ quya tek _ , _ ugpeqe i unga _ kiyaghnegh kun _ taw ate t ng waagh es qell uku _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ .
iwerngaqun _ angyaghpag igh u lleqe ukut _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ "
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ unuk _ kellii mi _ A d r i at i c - mi _ teng t iin kut _ . _ taakwani _ un ug em _ qukaa ni _ yulaagh t _ pi aqe ut _ qute mun _ tughwaaghsugnite ni luta _ .
tapghagh _ uqigkutagh igh luku _ megh mun _ at egh saq meg teg gu _ yuginagh _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutka uq _ . _ T a z ing a pi gh q aagh y am ta _ tapghagh _ at egh ll aat agh yaq meg teg gu _ aki mig aq _ yaagnegh _ uusqaghtutkaligh ma lghii _ .
yulaagh t _ alingekagh t _ angyaghpag _ qalmesite na yu kan _ enkaam _ es tam aneng _ uyghigh aat _ kingu akun _ . _ taagken _ yughagh ut _ aghte ragkiigh sqellug qu _ .
angyaghpag m _ yulaagh i _ anag naqekagh t _ sivuyag a _ angyaghpag m _ uyghiite ligh naqe sighwaagh te kete luku _ , _ angyat ghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghtekagh at _ .
iwernga _ P a ul -em _ pi ke ai _ umiileg u aq llu _ pi ll u w agh te t lu _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ aghulaqe gkata _ kayute pagite te lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ elpek si _ tuqu laghate te lleqe usi _ . _ "
enkaam _ pi ll u w agh tet _ angyat ghhagh _ kepe tke aat _ .
aghtaghagh naqe aqe a llu _ P a ul -em _ qamagte luki _ negh es qugh w aaq ii _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ aghneq _ negh el q un ghi tu si _ qayughllak _ elngaatall _ kelengaruugh lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh es qugh waagh naq am si _ ik naq ugh tes qell usi _ . _ naligh ghhagh inagh i _ tuqu naanghite uq _ talwa _ aqnighte naanghite uq _ . _ "
nepiigh yami _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tugu tete luni _ igamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ manu itni _ ikute luni _ neghekagh _ .
yug t _ il u tugh sagh y is t eng _ ellngit llu _ qamagte luteng _ negh te tke aat _ .
Q er ng agh llag em ta _ ang yagh pag m el ngugh ni _ 2 7 6 - ngu u kut _ .
qamagte luteng _ neghe uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ angyaghpag _ uqengelli na luku _ wh e at - a _ megh mun _ ategh qugh aat _ .
aghte yagu _ qute meng _ esghaate ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liisuqe nghite aat _ n a tu ng ut anga _ . _ iwernga _ kangighagh lgu uq _ esnagh leg meng _ enkaam _ taaggun _ tamlag naqe yug ut _ .
kepugh te luki _ uyghiite t _ unitekagh it _ megh mete luki _ , _ petugutagh ik llu _ aquutagh k _ naghigh qugh qu ait _ . _ taagken _ sayug luki _ telaananga t _ siv uy ag m el nguut _ teng tes tut _ tespikavek _ esnagh mun _ .
iwernga _ angyaghpag m _ sivuyag a _ aghqe itagh i sagh n _ kingu a _ qagi ghllag t _ kagimte aat _ .
P ill u w agh tet _ pi yagh ait _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tuqu qugh na luki _ luuraq _ qute mun _ pugime luteng _ navek _ anag na yu kata _ .
iwernga _ um iil waagh em _ tuqute sug ma nge i tke a _ P a u l _ enkaam _ iinghutekagh i _ . _ yeghlegi _ qelqe ai _ p ug im aq ayug g aat _ qute mun _ tag lii s qell uki _ .
tamaakut _ pugime lleg ite ngugh t _ angyaghpag m _ ik ell gh aa kun _ tugu luki _ taglagh naqe sqekagh i _ qute mun _ . _ tawaten _ qamagte luta _ yaywaaseng _ u ug llegh aa tu kut _ qute mun _ .
yaywaaseng _ qute mun _ uugte yamta _ liigikagh ut _ qiighqagh _ malta- nge ta a _ .
Tam aa kum iit _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ kumagh qite magh emta _ qayughllak _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ eslallugughte magh mi _ .
P a u l _ saqumig luni _ quugkagh meng _ qiigh i ma luku _ , _ tuqunagh lghii _ nemeghyagh _ maatnegh m _ aane ste luku _ quug neng _ , _ iiggagh kun _ amqeghtekagh a _ .
Tam aa kum iit _ esghagh luku _ nemeghyagh _ P a ul -em _ iiggagh neng _ qughagh nga lghii _ ila teng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ yuug _ yugte aghte u uq _ . _ qaywa _ un Ê¼ g ani _ megh mi _ tuqu nghite ghngaaghmi _ esghaghhu _ tuqu yaghqaa ma lghii _ . _ "
P a ul -em _ iigge ni _ u f s ug us aq min ik i _ nemeghyagh _ ifkagh uq _ ken gh eg nun _ iwernga _ talwa _ nemeghyagh m _ aqnighte ma ite kanga _ .
yug t _ pi kaqsagh kangat _ P a u l _ puuve ghllag naqe ni luku _ nalighmeng _ tuqu naqe ni luku _ . _ iwernga _ sa gpenani _ muluugh ghllag yan _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh at _ , _ " _ una _ nalug iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh t _ . _ "
Taa m _ qiighqagh m _ umiileg a _ P u b l i us _ , _ nuna lgu uq _ ughugsigh vig mta _ tu ng ang ani _ . _ P u b l i us -em _ elngaatall _ upugha te ainkut _ , _ ellnga nite ukut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
ata a _ puqlegha u uq _ aqsalliqe magh mi _ . _ P a ul -em _ esghagh yaghtugh luku _ yughagh te kete luku _ , _ s aa f saq min igu _ naallghute uq _ .
P a u l _ tawaten _ pi yan _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ q in u yuget _ tagi laghate tke aat _ enkaam _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tun qugh t aag iin kut _ tunute yameng _ . _ tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ atugh luki _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yamta _ tunqughtagh u laatagh ainkut _ tumangani _ atughqagh mnneng _ . _ angyaghpag _ A l e x an d r i a- meng _ pi _ uksughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ qiighqagh mi _ . _ ategh ke a _ " _ malghi k _ kiyaghnegh k _ " _ siv uy ag an i te f tu k lu _ ulimaagh u lutek _ taake uk _ . _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte yan _ taaggun _ uugte ukut _ .
S y r a c us e- mun _ kaa llu ta _ tam aan tu kut _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qapiighwtagh ukut _ R h eg i um - e mun _ kaate lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ . _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ tamaani _ , _ unaami ani _ anuqataghaaghte te ainkut _ i ke v agh meng _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ P u te o l i - mun _ kaate ukut _ .
Tam aan te f tut _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ ell meg g n i tes q iin kut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ . _ taagken _ R o m e- e mun _ nagnegh ukut _ .
ugpeqagh t _ R o m e- em el nguut _ nagaqugh luta _ , _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tu ng ang it nun _ akilpegaghvig t _ A p pi us - m el nguut _ , _ ila ita _ payegh ma kanginkut _ tu ng ang it nun _ pi nga yu t _ aqelqagh lghutagh t _ . _ P a ul -em _ esghagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ ilutughtekagh _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
R o m e- e mun _ kaate yamta _ P a u l _ ellng in agh m e tes taa t _ nani _ pi y uk el gh ani _ iwerngaqun _ ataasigh m _ pi ll u w agh te m _ kelengake a _ .
pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ P a ul -em _ tagsiqligh ai _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it _ . _ tagi yata _ pi a _ , _ " _ J e w - l gu tem ni _ , _ sa nghite ghngaamki _ yug put _ , _ nalighmeng _ k ip ull g in aanghi tegh ng aam k i _ nangaghnegh it _ sivunegh mta _ , _ paninang _ iglegh ut is tem ta _ J er us al em - em el nguut _ tugu lunga _ tuune aatnga _ R o m e- egh m ii nun _ .
A ap qugh aagh l unga _ sa meng _ apallugh ite yama _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ iteme te na lunga _ pi yagh aatnga _ .
iwernga _ J e w s - et _ ighleke aatnga _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pi aqa _ nanqigte i sta _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ nanqigte sug ni lunga _ . _ U m iil eg pig agh mun _ segh l equ ugh yagh tuun ghi tan ka _ yug lgute nka _ .
enkaam _ tagsiqligh amsi _ apegh na luki _ tamaakut _ elpesi nun _ . _ liite sug aqa llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ ataasigh _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ neghyukekagh at _ apallugh ke luku _ q ii p r agh u sigh ng aa nga _ . _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ J u d e a- gh m iit _ lata tke igate aaten _ whang kun nun _ . _ talwa _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ ugpeq aal gu tem ta _ t aag eg ken _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh ke igate aaten _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ akuzi tke igate aaten _ .
whangkuta _ lii s ug agh put _ elpenun _ sa meng _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ta i _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Jesus - meng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh ut _ nani _ alngunak _ segh l equ ugh aq iit _ . _ "
taagken _ nakmikegkagh at _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ qerngughte te vig u luku _ . _ taana _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ uglagh pigte luteng _ tagi laghate tke aat _ P a ul -em _ kiyaghfig anun _ . _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ unug llegh anun _ kenlanga _ apeghtugh qu ai _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ lii g ik es teng ng waagh naq utk egk ii llu _ Jesus - meng _ atuqe luki _ liilightuusagh i _ M o s es -em _ , _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ igaqegkagh it _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqekagh at _ iwernga _ ila ita _ ugpeqe ma ite kangat _ .
enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ . _ nekeve uute aqe ut llu _ aanleghaate na luteng _ P a ul -em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ipa _ pi ma lghiik _ sivunegh gpesigun _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ I s a i a h - kun _ .
whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ taku luki _ ukut _ yug t _ whaten _ pi ki _ , _ N ag as agh ng aagh p esi _ , _ esgh ap ag ng aagh p esi _ liigike naanghite usi _ .
taakut _ yug t _ tawatete ut _ qayughllak _ umyugagh it _ pi negh ll u ug te kaa g ut _ enkaam _ sigute teng llu _ iye teng llu _ saape kaqe ait _ . _ tawatete nghite yagh kumeng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ qiive nayagh ut llu _ whanga mnun _ naa llgh u tes qell uteng _ . _ ' _ "
P a ul -em _ taaqe niite te kun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ liigike sug aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kay ag teng ng w aaq aq ii _ ungip agh t en i _ ungip ii s qell uki _ yuguligh llegh meng _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
tawaten _ P a u l _ pi yan _ J e w s - et _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag magh meng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ .
maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ P a ul -em _ kiyaghfig kekagh a _ mangteghagh _ llivike aqe luku _ . _ upugha te aqe kangi _ qamagte luki _ it egh t en i _ ,
tetug gpenani llu _ ungipagh ke aq _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ apeghtugh tkekagh a llu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ . _ tawaten _ pi llgh a _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte ma ite kanga _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a ul - meng _ pi u ut _ ; _ qep ghagh te kaa nga _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ ap o s t l e- ngu l unga _ , _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ ungip aq es qell uki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh ni _ .
ayumigh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe ai _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ u uk nal iq is tem i kun _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ait _ agleghnagh lghii tgun _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ yugu luni _ allgegh kau uq _ umiileg m _ D av i d -em _ k ing un ghi t gun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u uq _ ighnegh a _ . _ taghneghagh m _ ip a pi gh q egk aqaa _ unguvagh ste luku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ellnga kun _ nanglleg ke lleg nge ma unga _ ap o s t l e- ngu l unga _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi kaqe aanga _ tuq lii s qell uki _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ yug i _ ugpeqe sqellug qu llu _ , _ qaatke sqellug qu llu _ Christ- a _ . _ enkaam _ Christ- am _ ategh a _ qu ul v all eng ell equ q _ .
elpek si llu _ R o m e- em el ngugh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ pik es qell usi _ .
qamagte lusi _ elpek si _ R o m e- em el ngugh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ , _ tuqlugh qite te ni llu _ y uk nal usi _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ Atan gh em llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ kay us ii ll i si _ , _ n ek eg g m ell el i si ll illu _ .
sivuke luku _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh a _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ mingite u uq _ yug lghute nun _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ungipagh ke na luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ighneghagh neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ quunpeng _ y ugh aat ke ng ng uk em si _ .
yughagh aqe unga llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ qenwat llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaa lunga _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ quy as te ll el in nal usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ ik naq s u ug tes qell usi _ .
whaten _ pi u amsi _ : _ qerngagh emta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ , _ elpek si _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ , _ whanga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ awen _ laalighfike yug aqe amsi _ iwernga _ s aam _ quunpeng _ pi nghite ste aqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ kayusiite yug anka _ R o m e- egh m iit _ ug pegh es qell uki _ Christ- akun _ , _ ila itnun _ G en t il e- en un _ pilleg mtun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungip aq es qell uki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe anka _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ , _ G r e ek -en un llu _ G r e ek - ngun ghi l ngugh nun llu _ , _ peghqinegh nun llu _ n all u uq an un llu _ .
enkaam _ whaa _ ungipagh ke i yug ghllagu unga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun llu _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ R o m e- e mi _ .
kayngu ke igate anka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi l q ii _ yuguligh llegh mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ J e w s -en un _ taagken _ G en t il e- en un _ .
taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ liigike ste ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh aqe ta i _ yug t _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh inagh itgun _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ . _ katam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ N all gh ugh q egk aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ neghyuke luku _ ellnga _ . _ "
qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug t _ liigike ste ai _ s ak r itu t ngun il uki _ , _ aghyuugh lleqe ni luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pi ll ghi t nun _ . _ seghletun _ pi llghite a _ liigike nanigh ste ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ ip a pi llgh aneng _ .
sa u a _ yug t _ liisimakekagh at _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ wh at egh ll u waagh u uq _ ellngit nun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ wh at egh ll u waagh ugh t aa _ ellngit nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima ta aneng _ nuna _ , _ yug t _ lii g ik ng waagh aq aat _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ , _ ipallu _ kiyaghnegh u ta a _ . _ qaywa _ yug t _ esghaghpagningite ghngaaghmegtekek _ taake uk _ , _ paninang _ liisimake agket _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh akun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ apallugh ite ut _ whaten _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ nallukagh ut _ kiyaghnegh lgu ta a _ .
liisimake ghngaaghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qu ul v iig at aat _ kiyaghnegh u luku _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike igate aat llu _ . _ yeghlegi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ kiyaghnegh meng _ sea-te u nanigh kau ut _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ liigike nanigh kau ut _ .
P egh q in gh un ii qu t _ iwernga _ n all uugh taq ut _ .
enkaam _ manigugh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ manigugh aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ , _ qawaagsugnite ngugh t _ , _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ nemeghyaghsugnite ngugh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ a tuq es qell uki _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe ait _ yugusigh teng _ anagnga luki _ , _ seghleghqe aqe luteng _ s e x - kun _ ila meggnun _ ,
qayughllak _ ip a pi ll eq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ naavghute ma ut _ iq l eng amun _ . _ En kaa ng am _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ , _ qepghagh te aqe ait llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ , _ avelghagh luku _ ulimaghista _ ellnga _ katam _ . _ ellnga u uq _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ a tuq es qell uki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ piyug ke ghllag ke ait _ . _ aghnagh t _ s e x - e yug nan igh iit _ yug t _ , _ yeghlegi _ s e x - e y ag u tut _ aghnaa lgute meggneng _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ yug t llu _ s e x - e yug nan igh iit _ aghnagh t _ , _ yeghlegi _ s e x - e y ag utegh llag tut _ yug lgute meggneng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ta itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh ai _ yugusigh itgun _ apallugh ke luki _ anaggute llegh ghllag it _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ sumegh meggni _ sea-te u nghite na iqe aat _ lii simak ip ii ll eq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pegte ai _ sea-te u nghite ngugh nun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itnun _ , _ atughqagh ke nghite yagh ka itnun llu _ .
A ll aagh h in agh meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ , _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ , _ pakignegh u ut _ , _ ugumi ketagh ut llu _ . _ aqinaketagh ut _ , _ yugtagh yuneghtu ut _ , _ pi ll u w agh y un egh tu ut _ , _ puughte i yuneghtu ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ait llu _ ila teng _ seghlegh pigu luki _ . _ yiillgi aqe ut _ ,
seghletun _ akuzite kaqe ait _ ila teng _ . _ ugumi ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ y uk egh q en gh u ut _ , _ q uk aa yug negh u ut lu _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ wata _ seghletun _ pi na luteng _ ; _ qaatke te igate ut _ angayuqagh meggnun _ ,
nallu ut _ , _ akequsagh teng _ atuqe igate ait _ , _ nanglleg yug igate ut _ , _ nafugh ta ii te aqe ut llu _ ila meggnun _ .
liisimake ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pi lghiit _ taw ate l nguut _ yug t _ all g egh s aghq aq aan Ê¼ nguq _ tuqu llegh _ . _ N ag negh ut ng in agh pen ak i _ tamaakut _ atuqekagh teng _ , _ talwa _ itagnagh kaqe ait _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nanqigte i kuvek _ yug neng _ an ag n iil q av ig itu ten _ . _ nanqigte nghpeki _ , _ el pen eng _ nanqigte aqe uten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ qayughllak _ elpek llu _ ellngistun _ pi aqe lghiiten _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ yug neng _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi lghii neng _ , _ liisimakagh ut llu _ nanqigte i llegh i _ elqughute nga ut _ .
iwernga _ nanqigte aqe aten _ anaggute lghiit _ , _ naqamllu _ elpek _ katam _ pi aqe aten _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ anaggute llegh t _ . _ enkaam _ s um egh pen ii _ anag yaghqaa ni luku _ pi z ig u u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ ?
L iig ik en ghi si gu u _ nangllegtaghtu langa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ aghyuugh aghte igate kangaten _ taw an ing in aq _ qayughllak _ n uq e tu taq egk ang aten _ . _ S um egh pen ii - i _ taakut _ sea-te u nghite aat _ ? _ L ii simak en ghi si gu u _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aqe kangaten _ qayughllak _ avuteghqe sqe sug kangaten _ ?
iwernga _ elpek _ aleghqugh neghllug u uten _ , _ pineghllug u uten _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ avuteghqe sug igate uten _ . _ En kaa ng aam _ elpek _ katam _ ulima u an _ aghyuugh lleg nge lleghqagh n _ seghlegh atagh aa luku _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliigh lleqe ak _ sakraa lleg ni llu _ , _ elqughutngagh lghii llu _ nanqigte i lleg ni _ .
nanqigte lleqe ai _ tamaghhagh ita _ yug t _ apegh iigh u te ll ghi s tun _ .
ila i _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi manginagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh meng _ all g egh s uk ang it _ usuqe llegh _ , _ qu ul v all eq _ , _ yugusigh llu _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguv all el ill eq ii _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ ellng in aa yug negh u ut _ . _ ugpeqe yug igate aat _ ip a pi ll eq _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi na luteng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ s ak r itu tegh llag luki _ , _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luni _ nuna mete ngughk _ yuug _ , _ J e w s - a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ segh l el iigh m eng llu _ ikfiqe llegh meng llu _ .
iwernga _ qam ag teng ng waagh luni _ yuug _ , _ J e w s - a _ nalighmeng _ gentile- a _ , _ pinitun _ pi ke aq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ usuqe lleqe a _ , _ qu ul v agh lleq aa _ , _ n ek eg g m ell el ill eq aa llu _ .
T an ii ll ngun ak i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ yug t _ .
G en t il e- et _ all g egh te ll ghi t iit _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ M o s es - mun _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lghiit _ nalluke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ J e w s - et _ liilightuusagh lgu ut _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe gkata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ liilightuusagh tgun _ .
tamaakut _ nagate ghesnagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh igate ai _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke te lghiit _ liilightuusagh minun _ n all gh ugh q aq ii _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
G en t il e- et _ all g egh te ll ghi t iit _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ . _ iwernga _ qaute kete nghmegteki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ qaatke te llghite a _ liilightuusagh leg stun _ ayuqe ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ , _ all g egh tek aq en ghi tegh ng aagh meg tek i _ .
qaatke te llghite a _ yug nun _ liigike ste ait _ ilu megteggun _ liisimake ait _ liilightuusagh t _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a llu _ liisimake ste ait _ liilightuusagh t _ ilungite nightu langi _ , _ qayughllak _ sumeghtaghagh llghite a _ ilangakun _ anaggute na iqe ait _ nalighmeng _ ilangakun _ itagnagh na iqe ait _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ yug t _ aksaqekagh it _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ . _ apegh aqe aqa _ taana _ ungip aq n em k i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
M aat en Ê¼ ng am _ lata yug anka _ J e w s - et _ . _ J e w - ngu ku v ek _ , _ neghyu katen _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ qukaayug uten llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pik n il u ten _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ liisima kan _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa sqe sug llegh a _ elpenun _ , _ naten llu _ nakmike yaghqaa ta a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ sumegh gpeni _ m agh yaghq ugh teng un ii qu ten _ ayaakagh nun _ , _ nighug u na iqe uten llu _ m am leg m el ngugh nun _ .
sumegh gpeni _ n all gh us agh teng un ii qu ten _ n all u uq anun _ , _ apegh tu ghi s teng un ii qu teng llu _ taghnughhagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh lgute gpeneng _ , _ sumegh gpeni _ liisimake ni luku _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi iigh kan _ , _ qamagte luku llu _ ip a pi ll eq _ .
apeghtugh aqe aten _ ila ten _ , _ sangan _ el pen eng _ apeghtugh igate ziin _ ? _ ungipagh kau iqe uten _ , _ " _ tegleg gpenang _ , _ " _ el p aa - ak _ , _ tegleg qiigate ziin _ ?
pi aqe uten _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ , _ " _ el p aa k _ , _ gelgaghniigh qiigate ziin _ ? _ ugumi ke pigte aten _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ , _ el p aa k _ , _ tugute niigh qiigate ziin _ temple- nge i te neng _ ?
qukaayug taqu te n _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh ni _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug gpenun _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite nghpeki _ liilightuusagh t _ qu ul v iig at an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ apallugh ke lusi _ elpek si _ J e w s -en i _ , _ G en t il e- et _ sa ngugh ughte aqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ . _ "
Q aat ke ng ngu ku f k i _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ c i r c um c is e- ell gh en _ pinigh uq _ . _ iwernga _ qaatke nghite kufki _ liilightuusagh t _ c i r c um c is e- ell ghi l ngugh es tun _ ayuqe uten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg nge naanghite uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
gentile- a _ c i r c um c is e- ell ghi l nguq _ qaatke te lghii _ qelegh sagh itnun _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe a _ nikimqun _ c i r c um c is e- e kaa luku _ .
elpek si _ J e w s -en i _ liilightuusagh lgu usi _ igaqe nga lghii neng _ , _ c i r c um c is e- e kaa gu si llu _ , _ taawanginaq _ qaatke igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ iwernga _ G en t il e- et _ c i r c um c is e- ell ghi l nguut _ , _ qaatke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ enkaam _ qaatke te llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
C i r c um c is e- eng in agh luku _ yug m _ yugusigh a _ J e w - pig ugh tes n aanghi t aa _ . _ C i r c um c is e- ell ep ii k _ pi igate uq _ yugusigh m _ qaye inagh akun _ .
itupill _ , _ yuug _ J e w - pii gu uq _ J e w - ngu ku mi _ ilu mikun _ . _ I gh saq gh wa _ c i r c um c is e- e kaa g uq _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ , _ nakaan _ igaqegkagh tgun _ liilightuusagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh meng _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ .
sa u a _ an egh negh qu s iig wa _ yuug _ allgegh kuni _ J e w - ngu luni _ ? _ sa u a _ an egh negh qu s iig wa _ c i r c um c is e- ell egh mun _ ?
uglagh u pigte ut _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh t _ ! _ S iv ul igh pig aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ J e w s -en un _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ .
ila i _ ataasiighmete nghite kata _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ ataa s iigh m en negh i tes l eq at gu u _ ?
