En kaa ng am _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ ungipaghte u yug aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ taaqe ste gpenaki _ akuzi lghiit _ alla stun _ ulu stun _ .
yughaghvig ni _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinitungwaaq _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ pi aqe teggu _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ negh ka ughte yug amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipagh kekagh mneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ tugukligh kaqe asi _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg si _ taaggun _ nekegnga ut _ ayugite luteng _ .
yuguligh lleg nge kau usi _ ugpeqe aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe manginagh teki _ apeghkagh nka _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe nanigh kufsiki _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii naanghite ut _ .
apeghtugh kaqe amsi _ apeghtuusagh kekagh meng _ whanga mnun _ . _ taakut _ ugpeqe yaghqaqe asi _ : _ Christ- am _ tuqu tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ .
taagken _ llivegh kaqe aat _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghnegh m _ unguvagh kau uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ pi naq n ill ghi s tun _ .
P e te r -em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ taagken _ kingu aneng _ qamagte luteng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kingu itneng _ 5 0 0 - neng _ uglagh lghii m _ malig s aagh teng it a _ q er ng agh llag meng _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ kiyang _ taakut _ unguva ut _ , _ ila i _ tuqu kau ghngaaghmeng _ .
taagken _ J am es -em _ esghagh kaqe a _ , _ enkaam _ k i nguv aq un _ qamagte luteng _ ap o s t l e- et _ esghagh kaqe aat _ .
kinguligh u lunga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ ug pegh yaghq agh pag n ing it k aagh ng aagh m a _ kitum i _ alngunak _ .
U k al igh pig aag unga _ ap o s t l e- en i _ , _ talwa _ atigh yaghqaa nghite yagh unga _ ap o s t l e- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ am y uq et aat q egk aq an ka _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ ap o s t l e- ngu unga _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ avangite nghite uq _ . _ qepghagh aghagh unga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ap o s t l e- et _ , _ iwernga _ whanga mneng _ pi u nghite aqa _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ pi aqe unga _ .
qepghagh aghagh llegh ut _ ila mnneng _ megnu nagh ite uq _ . _ megnu nagh lghii ta _ taana _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke kaqe aput _ elpesi nun _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe kaqe asi _ .
ugpeqe u kesi _ ungipagh _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ : _ Christ- am _ unguv agh te llgh a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ S ang am eng am _ ila si _ pi aqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh naanghite ut _ ? _ "
kina _ alngunak _ unguv agh te sim ang il k an _ , _ Christ- a _ paninang _ tuqu nga nayagh uq _ .
paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ungipaghqe i uute ukut _ , _ enkaam _ ugpeqe yaghqagh ite usi _ .
tuqukagh t _ unguv agh te sim ang il k ata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh te sim ang it aa _ Christ- a _ . _ En kaa ng am _ whangkuta _ ap o s t l e- en i _ qamagte luta _ iqlengiqe ste u ukut _ qayughllak _ pi kau ukut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ Christ- a _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
tuqukagh t _ unguv agh te sim ang il k ata _ , _ Christ- allu _ unguv agh te sim ang i tuq _ .
Christ- a _ paninang _ tuqu nga kan _ ugpegh lleg si _ sasii nghite ut _ enkaam _ aghyugh lleg nge lleqe usi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesinun _ .
U g peq is tet _ Christ- akun _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ ifla nayagh ut _ .
neghyuke i llegh ut _ Christ- akun _ wh an ing in aghh aq _ kiyagh taa ll em n ni _ atugh u kan _ , _ nanglleg nagh lleghpigagh u yaghqaa ukut _ yug ni _ k itu meng _ alngunak _ .
ipa u uq _ Christ- a _ unguvagh kau uq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lii simak ng waagh agh put _ whangkuta llu _ unguv agh tes aghq aag u kut _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ .
tuqu llegh _ allgegh kau uq _ ataasigh kun _ yug kun _ , _ A d am - kun _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ unguvagh ste llegh _ tuqu llegh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ ilangakun _ yug kun _ , _ Christ- akun _ .
A d am - kun _ qamagte luni _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ Christ- am el nguut _ unguv agh tes aghq aag ut _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ pi lleghqagh teng _ kaate nghata _ unguvagh aqe naagh ut _ : _ Christ- a _ siv ul igh pig aal uni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ taagken _ tagi nqigtekan _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi i _ unguvagh yaghqaa ut _ .
Christ- a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kayaalqe llegh minun _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh et _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ iglegh ut is tet _ , _ yug t llu _ iglegh ut is tet _ ilate luki _ . _ Christ- a _ umiileg u yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqe llegh anun _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ Christ- am _ anguyag i _ . _ kingulighpigagh _ anguyag _ tuqu llegh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayaalqesagh qugh a _ . _ Christ- am _ tuune gkagu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mun _ taagken _ kenle a _ kaate lleqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ lli aghtesaghqagh ke a _ . _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke stesaghqagh ke a _ Christ- a _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte stekunigu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ Christ- amun _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaaghte yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi kan _ , _ taagken _ ighnegh _ ellmi neng _ katam _ asi ligh u aghte yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ elngaatall _ kiyaghnegh m _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ igleghte te lleqe a _ .
ila i _ yug t _ paaptaaye ste aqe ut _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u nghite kata _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ sang am eng am _ ila i _ paaptaaye ste aqe aat _ tuqukagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ ?
liisimake aput _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh kau ut _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ En kaa ng am _ ungipagh ke i u ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tuqute naqe yagh ghngainkut _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ipa u uq _ tuqu saq leg g iin aq _ ayuqe aatnga _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ katam _ liisimake llegh gpesistun _ quyake llegh ka _ ugpegh llegh i _ angli lghii _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ atanegh mteggun _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ip a pi gh q utk es aghq aq agh si _ tuqu saq leg g iin aq _ ayuqe kangatnga _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yug t _ E p h es us - m el nguut _ pi ll u w aq an ka _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ allgegh te na lunga _ whani _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ pi ll u w aq um k i _ , _ sa meng _ allgegh te naanghite unga _ . _ tuqu lleg mta _ kingu aneng _ unguvagh yaghqaa nghite kumta _ , _ " _ negh lta _ , _ megh lta _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ tuqu lleqe ukut _ . _ "
kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ilakumtaagh nge ma kufsi _ seghletun _ pikayug meng _ , _ a tuq s ag ull eq agh si _ sa u a _ pi aqe kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lusi _ pi nigh itun _ , _ seghlegh q en nan igh tek _ , _ ila si _ aku leg pesi n il nguut _ apeghtugh ma ite ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayngu yug yaghqaa usi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ whaten _ pi kan _ : _ " _ naten _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh ste aqe aat _ tuqu llegh meng _ ? _ N ate l ngugh meng _ yugusigh lgu yaghqau aat _ ? _ "
uyuq _ n all u uq aq _ ! _ piitute _ nuna kun _ peghu kuvgu _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ sivungagh ni _ piite lleghqagh mi _ .
piitute meng _ alla u luni _ angli aqe uq _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh negh gpeni _ , _ pii tu tes qu v eg aghh aq _ peghu aqe an _ nuna kun _ , _ wh e at - k aghq aq _ nalighmeng _ sa u yaghqagh _ .
P ii tu tes qu v eg aghh aq _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh mineng _ yug usi l it aqaa _ . _ allake te lghiit _ piitute t _ allake te lghii meng _ yugusighqagh lgu ut _ .
Taw ate l ku t ng waagh un ghi tut _ yugusigh t _ . _ yug t _ , _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ iqallug t _ allake te ut _ yugusigh at _ .
qilag _ yugusightu uq _ , _ nuna _ yugusightu uq _ . _ yugusigh t _ q ilag m el nguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ . _ yugusigh t llu _ nun am el nguut _ ellmegestun _ pinighnagh ut _ .
siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleqetaagh t llu _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ . _ talwa _ ighaleqetaagh t _ all ak aq agh tagh meng _ allake te ut _ pinighnagh llegh it _ .
tawatete yaghqaa ut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh stekata _ tuqu llegh meng _ : _ nuna mi _ yugusigh put _ tuqu aqe ut _ , _ aghu aqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh igh ragh aput _ tuqu naanghite u aghte ut _ .
llivegh kumeng _ nun am el nguut _ yugusigh put _ seghlegh ughte yaghqagh t _ kayaali yaghqagh t _ , _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ pinighnagh yaghqagh llu _ iknaqe yaghqagh llu _ .
llivegh nghmini _ yugusigh _ yug m _ pi ke aa _ . _ iwernga _ yugusigh _ unguvagh stekuni _ taghneghagh mnnun _ yugusigh u yaghqaa uq _ . _ yugusigh lgu kata _ yug t _ yugusighqagh lgu ut llu _ taghneghagh put _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau uq _ , _ " _ Y uk s u wh aaq _ adam _ unguva lghii ughtekau uq _ . _ " _ iwernga _ kinguligh _ adam _ unguv all el it ik ayug u uq _ taghneghagh _ , _ Christ- ang u uq _ .
sivuke luta _ yug m _ yugusigh aneng _ yugusigh nge aqe ukut _ , _ taagken _ taa k w an ing ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug usi l it aq ii _ taghneghagh put _ .
Y uk s u wh aaq _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ , _ pagula aneng _ nuna m _ ulimaagh u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ yuug _ Christ- a _ , _ qilag meng _ pi u uq _ .
yug t _ kiyaghtekumeng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ yugusigh lgu ut _ A d am -em _ yugusigh itun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ qilag mi _ kiyaghte yaghqagh t _ Christ- a tun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ .
A d am - e tun _ yugusigh lgu lleg mtestun _ , _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ Christ- a tun _ yugusigh lgu yaghqaa ukut _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liite sug amsi _ yugusigh put _ ukut _ kemekrag meng _ , _ aaw meng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilangani _ aghnegh m _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ . _ unguva naanghite ut _ quunperugllag _ .
Ung ip aat agh ll am si _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ : _ qamagte luta _ tuqu naanghite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ qamagte luta _ allangughte yaghqaa ukut _ ,
sukate pigte luta _ qunqalleg llegh stun _ kingulighpigagh _ q al ghi gh t aq _ nagaqugh kumteggu _ . _ tawani _ qalghightagh llegh mi _ ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh uute yaghqaa ut _ nutaghagh meng _ yugusigh ligh luteng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ taagken _ whangkuta llu _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ nutaghagh meng _ yug usi ng agh agh taa ll equ kut _ .
yugusigh put _ pagula meng _ ulimaagh t _ allangughte yaghqagh pestaagh u ut _ naafqesaghqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kayug t _ simigh yaghqaa ut _ yugusigh meng _ tuqu yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
enkaam _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqegkagh _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ : _ " _ tuqu llegh _ naafqe uq _ ; _ kayaalqe i i llegh _ iighwigh uq _ ! _ "
" _ tuqu _ , _ kayaalqe i i llegh n _ naagu _ ? _ tuqu _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh en _ aqnighqe uute ziin _ whang kun nun _ naagu _ ? _ "
tuqu llegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll en i _ allgegh a qaa _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ aqnighte na luta _ , _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llegh m _ liilightuusagh t _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi l q ii _ .
En kaa ng am _ iy am si qay ug v ik aq agh put _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ kayaalqe i i stekaqe ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ .
En kaa ng am _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ kayaalqe i i lleghqagh ut _ ip ap es tagh ut ang aneng _ , _ ugpegh lleg si _ aghula i te ste luki _ , _ n u ug g agh t af q aa f si _ , _ quunpeng _ qepghagh teggu _ Atan ghem _ qepghaqagh a _ . _ liisimakagh i _ atanegh kun _ qepghagh llegh i _ avangite nghite uq _ .
ukut _ esgha _ elpesi nun _ qelegh sagh nka _ mani meng _ tuune yaghqagh gpesineng _ ugpeqagh nun _ J u d e a- m el ngugh nun _ . _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ G al at i a- gh m iit _ ugpeqe ait _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellngistun _ pi tek _ .
S iv ul igh pig agh mi _ santillegh m _ aghnegh ani _ qamagte lusi _ aafte i aqe tek _ mani meng _ all g egh negh pesi neng _ . _ tuune yaghqagh gpesi _ ang tal anga _ all g egh negh p esi _ ang tal ang aneng _ iike luku _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ . _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ qerngughte i fqaafsi _ mani meng _ pi lghaasi _ .
kaate kuma _ kayagte lleqe anka _ tamaakut _ nakmike gkasi _ lata tgun _ aglagh te sqellug qu _ tunusagh i _ J er us al em - e mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ whanga llu _ pi lleghqagh ka _ pinigh yaghqaa kan _ , _ maligte nakangatnga _ .
elpesi nun _ laalighte naqe gkuma _ sivuke lunga _ M a c e d o n i a- kun _ aag lleqe unga _ .
entaqun _ elpesinite aghagh qagh lleqe unga _ walluumllu _ uksulqusigh _ . _ taagken _ navek _ pi naqe gkuma _ yataaghqe lgusigh qagh nakefsinga _ .
Atan ghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ maaten _ pi kuma _ elpesinite aghagh yug aqe unga _ , _ aag vike ghesnagh yug nghite amsi _ .
iwernga _ ephesus- mete lleqe unga _ kenlanga _ P en te c o s t -em _ aghnegh anun _ ,
qayughllak _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ aange lghii _ qepghagh lleghqagh ka _ atanegh mun _ pi aqe uq _ . _ M aan ll equ nga _ qaywa _ uglagh pigte lghii m _ anguyag ke yagh ghngaatnga _ .
T im o t h y _ elpesi nun _ pi kan _ , _ elngaatall _ upugha tete nakesi _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uq _ atanegh mun _ whanga mtun _ .
qamagte lusi _ a si t ng in aagh pen aan _ , _ enkaam _ quya nga an _ kayagte nakesi _ whanga mnun _ . _ utaqa aqe aqa _ maligte te luku _ ugpeq aal g ut nun _ .
Ung ip aat agh ll am si _ ugpeq aal gu tem n neng _ A p o ll o s - meng _ . _ elngaatall _ qelegh kaqsagh aqa _ l aal igh f ik es qell usi _ maligte luki _ ila i _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ piyug nghite uq _ . _ laalighfike naagh aisi _ pi lleghqagh nge gkuni _ .
kelenga tek _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesini _ aghula itek _ , _ ilutu tek _ , _ iknaqe tek _ .
piniqe llegh kun _ pi aqe teggu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ liisima kasi _ S te p h an as -en kut _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe aqe yuwhaagh u lghiit _ A c h a i a- mi _ . _ atanegh mun _ tuune kau ut _ ell meg g neng _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ ila i _ kayusiite na luki _ .
qelegh amsi _ q aat ku mang in ii s qell uki _ liilightugh llegh it _ taw ate l nguut _ yug t _ , _ ila i llu _ qep gh al g ut ang it _ .
quya unga _ S te p h an as -en kut _ , _ F o r tun a tu s -en kut _ , _ A c h a i c us -en kut _ kaate lghiit _ qayughllak _ kayusiite u aatnga _ aviillegh gpesini _ .
Q uy as teng ng w aat nga _ quya ste llegh megestun _ elpek si _ . _ kayusiite i llegh itnun _ iyamsiqa yug vike llegh gpesineng _ lii simak es teng ng waagh nak esi _ .
ugpeqagh t _ A si a- m el nguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ A qu il a- n kuk _ P ris c ill a- n kuk _ sumegh ke ghllag aisi nguq _ atanegh kun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ el k egk en ka _ mangteghagh itni _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ whang am n il nguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ quyake te aqe tek _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ : _ sumegh ke amsi _ . _ P a u l _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe nghite kunigu _ atanegh _ , _ naafqe lleg lgu uq _ . _ " _ M ar an at h a _ , _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ tea- ai _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ elpesi nite li _ .
piniqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a ul - meng _ pi u ut _ , _ ap o s t l e- ng aneng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ , _ T im o t h y - m eng llu _ pi u ut _ ugpeq aal gu tem n neng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ C o r in t h -em _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ ii ngun aghh aani _ A c h a i a- m _ .
yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ tuune lisi _ quya ste llegh meng llu _ nekeggmellegh meng llu _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ n angll eg t a pig llegh ii _ a ta _ , _ kiyaghnegh meng _ tagi aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ kayute kaghqagh _ !
kayusigh aqe ainkut _ qamagte luta _ seghleliigh lleg mnni _ , _ enkaam _ whangkuta llu _ kay u sigh yaq leg w aap ut _ tamaakut _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh lghiit _ , _ atuqe luku _ ataasigh _ taana _ kayusillegh _ all g egh tek agh put _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
katam _ ilate nga lleg mtestun _ Christ- am _ uglagh u pigte lghii nun _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ Christ- akun _ ilate nga lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh ghllag anun _ .
ikfiqe gkumta _ , _ kayusillegh gpesinun llu _ yuguligh llegh gpesinun llu _ pi llgh u uq _ ; _ kayusillegh nge gkumta _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ kayusillegh nge lleqe usi _ enkaam _ tuune lleg nge lleqe usi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ suflughte yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ ikfiqe llegh t _ suflughtekagh put _ .
enkaam _ sighimake i llegh ut _ elpesi nun _ aghula i tuq _ ; _ liisimakagh ut _ taana _ katam _ ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ ikfiqe lleg mnnun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ kayusillegh mun _ all g egh tek am n nun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem n ni _ , _ nalluke sug nghite amsi _ seghleliigh llegh meng _ nanghiighkagh mnneng _ A si a- mi _ . _ elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ uqigtu pigtekau uq _ , _ repall _ sighima nanigh kau ukut _ kiyaghte lleghqagh mnneng _ .
ipapestaaq _ tuqu naqe ni luta _ pi yagh ukut _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ aneghte ukut _ whang kun neng _ sighimake fqaamta _ pi s qell uta _ , _ taa w ang in aghh aq _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake sqellug qu _ unguvagh ste i kayug _ tuqukagh neng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh meng _ tuqu m _ tevnegh aneng _ yug ul iin kut _ , _ yug ul ill eq iin ku t lu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ sighima u ukut _ ellnga n _ yug ul il aat agh lleq iin kut _ ,
elpek si _ kayusiite ma luta _ yughagh llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke i llegh ghllag i _ whang kun neng _ kiimsigh lleg nge lleqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ ; _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ ig l ag tugh ll uteng _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ whang kun neng _ .
una _ esgha _ qukaayug sigh ut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mta _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyagh taa llegh put _ whani _ nuna mi _ ip a pi gh q eng ng aaq lu _ piniqe i nga uq llu _ , _ kiyang _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii kun _ kayusillegh akun _ , _ nakaan _ yug m _ peghqinellegh akun _ .
qamagte luteng _ lata put _ elpesi nun _ piyaqnagh u i te ut _ atightugh yaghqaa luteng llu _ liigike yaghqaa luteng llu _ . _ sighima kaqe amsi _ lii g ik ng waagh es qell uku
sa u a _ maaten _ liigikekagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ghhagh inagh a _ , _ enkaam _ aghnegh ani _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ elpek si _ q uk aa yug utk ell eq agh pesi kut _ katam _ whangkuta _ qukaayug tke lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
qayughllak _ ip a pi gh q utk egk aq aqa _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ , _ sivuke lunga _ elpesi nun _ laalighte na lunga _ pi kaayagh unga _ , _ quy as te ll eng n ay uk af si _ mal gh ugh q eng ng aan _ .
laalighfike yu kaqe amsi _ aglagh te kete luku _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ , _ uteghnigh te kete luku llu _ tamaaken _ , _ kayute nge na lunga _ elpesi neng _ iglegha lleghqagh mnun _ J u d e a- mun _ .
S um egh pesi n ii _ tawaten _ qakiqniqe lleg mni _ ataa s iigh negh i si ng aa _ ? _ S um egh pesi n ii _ qakiqniqe llegh ka _ nuna m _ yug atun _ ayuqe a _ , _ taw an ing in aq _ pi yaghqagh _ , _ " _ aa-a _ , _ " _ " _ nakaa _ ? _ "
ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ , _ akequsagh ka _ elpesi nun _ " _ A ang Ê¼ gh un ghi tuq lu _ " _ " _ N ak aagh un ghi tuq lu _ " _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ ungipagh kekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ S il as - lu _ T im o t h y - llu _ whanga llu _ , _ " _ A ang Ê¼ gh un ghi tuq lu _ " _ " _ N ak aagh un ghi tuq lu _ " _ ; _ iwernga _ ellnga ni _ quunpeng _ " _ A ang Ê¼ gh u uq _ " _ .
ellnga u uq _ " _ angegh llegh _ " _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whangkuta _ " _ amen- u aghagh qu kut _ " _ ellnga kun _ us uq n em teg gu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh ainkut _ , _ maligte te luta _ elpesi nun _ Christ- akun _ ; _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ aafte ainkut _ ;
nalluniigh ainkut _ ellmi nun _ pi u luta _ , _ tuune ak llu _ taghneghagh gni _ ilu mnnun _ nallangigh sagh u lukek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ whang u kun nun _ .
tuqlugh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i ste u luku _ qayughllak _ liisimake kanga _ qaamna _ ilu ka _ ! _ C o r in t h - es ug un ghi tu nga _ segh l el iigh q es n ay uk am si _ .
I g legh un naq ut ke ng ngun ghi tagh put _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ ; _ qepghagh lgusigh yug amsi _ quy am as qell usi _ , _ qayughllak _ aghula i te usi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ .
taawa _ umyugagh gka _ ataasiighte ma agka _ alla _ elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ quya nghitesaghqagh u fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ .
qayughllak _ quya nghite stekumsi _ kitum ngam _ whanga _ q aq ayug tes l eq anga _ ? _ alla _ kitum _ pi naanghite anga _ iwerngaqun _ elpek si _ quya nghite stekagh ma _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ piyug nghite ngugh u nga _ quy an ghi tes n ay uk af si nga _ , _ elpek si _ quy an ghi tes n ay uk af si nga _ , _ elpek si _ quy as t is tem ni _ . _ I p a pi gh q ut ke ng ng w aaq a _ una _ , _ whanga _ quya nga negh mni _ taawa _ elpek si llu _ qamagte lusi _ quya nga aqe usi _ .
lata kau unga _ elpesi nun _ elngaatall _ aange luku _ qivghu lleg ligh lunga _ qamagun _ ilu mkun _ , _ qiya magh ma _ alla _ quya nghite ste fqaafsi _ pi na lusi _ taawanginaq _ liigike sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghllag ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ yuug _ seghleghqe lghii _ tawani _ , _ seghleghqe nghite uq _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi _ elpesi nun _ seghlegh q eng ngu uq _ iwernga _ nakaan _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ . _ U n iigh m igh s un ghi taq a _ sa meng _ pilleg mkun _ .
Taw a teng in aq _ aghyuugh i llegh i _ itagnagh uq _ .
maaten _ segh ev ull u ku ng Ê¼ ng am _ kayeme teggu _ wata _ iil q en n ay uk an _ repall _ iilqayug ghllag na yu kan _ .
manigugh utu te aqa _ elpesi nun _ liigike ste sqellug qu _ ipapestaaq _ piniqe ni luku _ elpesi nun _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ lata kaqe amsi _ : _ liisimake na luku _ q aat ku t ng w aaq ut si _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kina _ segh ev un negh pi si gu _ sa meng _ elpesi nun _ pi llgh aneng _ whanga llu _ seghevute aqe aqa _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghevute yaghqagh _ seghevute yug aqe aqa _ elpek si _ apaghllug lusi _ Christ- a _ taw an te pig llegh h ii s tun _ ,
tughneghagh m _ aaghqute aqe na yu kanginkut _ qayughllak _ lii simak eg ke f ut _ sa u ta a _ yataaghqekagh a _ .
kaate yalghiinga _ T r o as - mun _ ungipagh ke na luku _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh a _ Christ- am _ , _ Atan ghem _ pi llegh q ang es teng ng waagh um ak ang anga _ .
iwernga _ pengeg ghllag kau unga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke a _ titus _ av iil nguq _ tamaani _ . _ enkaam _ unite luki _ aghulaqe unga _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ .
iwernga _ iyamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ iiwleng _ igleghte te u ainkut _ kay all q ii ng all egh qun _ Christ- akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkutgun _ m ing i tes teng ng w aa _ liisima lleg ni _ nani _ alngunak _ katam _ neqnigh lghii m _ tepe ngllagh sigh m _ tepagh nge an _ mingite llegh atun _ .
qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tepkegtagh stun _ neqnighsaasigh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ Christ- am _ aghqe tkekagh atun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tepe ut _ me ite u uq _ yug ul ik an un llu _ iflakagh nun llu _ .
Tam aa ku nun _ iflakagh nun _ tepe ke ainkut _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute i kayug m _ ; _ iwernga _ yug ul ik anun _ tepe ke a _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug m _ . _ kina ngam _ qepghagh yaghqau a _ taw ate l ngugh meng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ?
uglagh pigte lghii stun _ kinku stun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ salin _ qep ghagh yaghq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ tamaaken _ qepghaqagh meng _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ pi aqe ait _ il ang is tun _ qepghaqagh stun _ ayuqe ni luki _ allgegh te sighqagh t _ kiyagh t aagh u sigh qam un _ . _ iwernga _ whangkuta _ ataasiighmete luta _ ip a pi gh qell uta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ ; _ apegh aqe aput _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ kayagte llegh atun _ ungipaghte u luta llu _ qep ghagh te ngu l ut allu _ Christ- amun _ .
whangkuta _ us uq es aa yug g naq l aat agh es t aa _ whang kun neng _ katam _ ? _ nalighmeng _ il ang is tun _ ak l uk i ngu s t aa _ lata meng _ aap gh es qell uta _ elpesi nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ elpesi neng _ ?
elpek si _ , _ elpek si _ katam _ whangkuta _ lata ke amsi _ , _ igaqe nga usi _ ilu mteggun _ tea- ma anun _ lii simak es qell usi llu _ at igh t ii s qell usi _ .
Wh at egh ll u w aaq _ lata u usi _ Christ- ameng _ pi t _ whang kun nun _ tuyugh qu ai _ . _ lata tke kau nghite usi _ ink- akun _ nalighmeng _ lliivneqegtagh tgun _ uyghag tgun _ . _ lata tke kau usi _ yug t _ ilu itgun _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyu lleg lgu ukut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Christ- akun _ .
Wh ang kun neng _ pik n in aanghi tagh put _ qep ghagh yaq leg un il uku _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyaqleg ughte ste aqe ainkut _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
ellnga n _ qep ghagh yaq leg ugh tes t iin kut _ nutaghagh mun _ akequsagh mun _ . _ taana _ nutaghagh _ akequsagh _ igaqe nga lghii u nghite uq _ liilightuusagh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh gneng _ ayuqe uq _ . _ igaqe nga lghii m _ liilightuusagh m _ tagite a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ iwernga _ taghneghagh m _ tuune a _ unguvallegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ igaqe kau ut _ uyghag tgun _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ n igh ugh qell gha _ aliigh kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune aqngata _ . _ M o s es -em _ gginagh a _ kuukgute kau uq _ taagken _ n igh ugh qell egh meng _ , _ qaywa _ gheve ghngaan _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ esghaghpag nigh nge i tke aat _ gginagh a _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ tuqu ste i yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ yug t _ qaatke nghite kangit _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ n igh ugh q es t igh llag um ak ata _ ,
naten mi _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ n igh ugh q es t iigh atagh agh lleq a _ !
liilightuusagh _ nanqigte i yaghqaa kan _ yug meng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ n igh ugh q eng ng ay agh tuq _ ; _ anaggute llghite ni luteng _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ naten mi _ angka an _ n igh ugh q eng ng all egh tu lleq at _ !
tawaten _ pi u ukut _ qayughllak _ n igh ug atagh alghii ngugh tuq _ n igh ugh qell eq _ maaten _ , _ taana _ n igh ugh q eng ng ay alghii _ sivugh nghaani _ aviighute ma uq _ .
N igh ugh qell el gu yaq an _ tawaten _ mulu ghraagkagh meng _ , _ naten mi _ angka an _ n igh ugh qell eg ull eq a _ mulu ghllag yaghqagh meng _ quunperugllag _ !
taana _ sighimake te mnneng _ tetug igate u aghte ukut _ .
M o s es - e tun _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ gginagh ni _ saaputagh iqe a _ enkaam _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ esghagh mangite aat _ nighug ghllag _ aviighute lghii _ .
umyugagh it _ liigikepagningite te kau ut _ , _ wh av e mun _ kenlanga _ umyugagh it _ saape nga ut _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ saaputagh meng _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ neghigh aat _ akequsagh t _ . _ taana _ saape te aq _ iqite yaghqaa uq _ Christ- ang in aghh aghq un _ .
talwa _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ atightugh nghmegteki _ liilightuusagh t _ M o s es - mun _ tuunekagh t _ , _ umyugagh it _ saaputagh meng _ saape nga aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ qiive nghmini _ atanegh mun _ saaputagh a _ iqite aqe uq _ .
maaten _ atanegh _ taghneghagh u lghii _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ Atan ghem _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi lgu kuni _ , _ iteme nga lleg lgu uq _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh l uta _ saape ta u na ki _ gginagh put _ es ghagh lleq agh put _ n igh ugh qell gha _ Atan ghem _ . _ taana _ ataasigh _ n igh ugh qell eq _ tagi lghii _ atanegh meng _ taghneghagh u uq _ , _ allangughte ainkut _ ellng as ug n igh tes qell uta _ aange aghagh luku _ n igh ugh qell egh meng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut _ whaken _ qepghagh yaghqagh meng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iilqayugigate ukut _ .
ighsayagute kaqe aput _ aksaqekagh t llu _ kayngu nagh lghiit llu _ . _ puughte igate aput _ yug t _ , _ allangughte igate aput llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ Wh at egh ll u w aaq lu _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ ip a pi llgh i _ , _ en kaa ng am _ yug t _ liite lleqe ainkut _ n ate l ngu ut f ut _ esghagh ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh kekagh put _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ saape nga kata _ , _ saape nga ut _ ifla yaghqagh ghhagh inagh nun _ .
ellngit a _ ugpeqe igate aat _ ungipagh ut _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ , _ uu m _ nuna m _ kiyaghnegh an _ , _ ayaa stekaqe ai _ umyugagh it _ . _ esghagh nghite sta qaa _ nighug a _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ n igh ugh qell gh aneng _ Christ- am _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ Christ- a _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Wh ang kun neng _ katam _ ungipagh ke u nghite ukut _ , _ itupill _ ungip aq ng waagh put _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ Atan gh un il uku _ . _ Q ep ghagh tek agh pesi kut _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ nighug _ kuukgute li _ mamleg llegh meng _ ! _ " _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ kiyaghnegh _ kuukgute ste i lghii _ nighug meng _ ilu mnnun _ . _ taaggun _ nighug kun _ legh igh iitagh ut _ n igh ugh qell gha _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kuukgute lghii _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ gginagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ whang kun nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kanaghtekaqe a _ taana _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu mnni _ . _ whangkuta _ qiku stun _ qantaghqagh stun _ ayuqe ukut _ , _ enkaam _ tea- ma yan _ liigike lleqe aat _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag _ kiyaghneghtagh u ni luku _ , _ whang kun neng _ pi u nghite ni luku _ .
seghleliigh lleg nge aqe ukut _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ iwernga _ kayaalqe igate ainkut _ . _ ilangakun _ kukrag yug lleg nge aqe ukut _ iwernga _ sighima llghite te igate ukut _ .
amyuqetagh tke lleg nge aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unite igate ainkut _ ; _ aq n igh q w aa ll eng aq u kut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ukut _ .
iiwleng _ tuqu llegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnnite uq _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ unguvallegh a _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh mnni _ .
unguva u luta _ iiwleng _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ unguvallegh a _ yugusigh mnni _ tuqu kayug ni _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ yakugh nagh llegh anite ukut _ tuqu llegh m _ qayughllak _ qep gh aat ng uk ef ut _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ iwernga _ qepghagh lleg mta _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguv all eng es teng ng w ii si _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ , _ " _ ugpeqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuzite kaqe aqa _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ tawatete uq _ igaqe stetu te _ . _ whangkuta llu _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ enkaam _ akuz it k aq agh put _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh tek aqaa _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ whangkuta llu _ unguvagh lleqe ainkut _ Jesus - kun _ . _ taagken _ aglagh u lleqe ainkut _ qerngagh emta _ elpek si llu _ taw an te llegh min un _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ apeghiighkagh t _ whang kun nun _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh an _ nula ste lleqe ai _ yug t _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ- akun _ . _ enkaam _ iyamsiqa yug llegh ghllag _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nula lleqe uq _ , _ qu ul v all eng egh llag ll equ q lu _ .
enkaam _ iilqayugigate ukut _ . _ qaywa _ yugusigh put _ kayaali kestagh yagh nga a ta _ , _ taghneghagh put _ n ut agh teng nguut _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
seghleliigh lleg put _ sa squghhagh u ut _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ut _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe te u ainkut _ all g egh tes qell uku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ kenle ite ngughk _ quya llegh ghllag _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg put _ av ang il ngugh es tun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke manginagh igate aput _ seghleliigh lleg put _ . _ itupill _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aput _ es ghagh pag n ing il ke put _ . _ qantaghaqun _ seghleliigh lleg put _ ken l et gh uu ll equ t _ , _ iwernga _ quya llegh ut _ es ghii g al ke f ut _ qu un pe k aghq aag uq _ .
whani _ nuna mi _ ukut _ yugusigh put _ kiyaghfig put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ yugusigh put _ tuqu kata _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh lgu uq _ qilag mi _ whang kun nun _ kiyaghfigkagh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ mangteghagh _ , _ yug m _ ulima aqe nghite a _ . _ taana _ mangteghagh _ qu un pe k aghq aag uq _ .
ipa _ ngillegte ukut _ nuna mete u luta _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yu pigte lghiikut _ yugusighraghagh mnni _ qilag mi _ .
aatkagh stun _ aate lleqe aput _ tamaakut _ yugusigh igh ragh aat _ amsikaghmete nghite na luta _ .
yugusigh put _ tiinta stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tiinta mete luta _ ngillegte aqe ukut llu _ , _ seghleliigh ukut llu _ qayughllak _ mat- aghte yug igate ke put _ . _ itupill _ simigh yug aqe aput _ yugusigh nun _ tuqu igate ngugh nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe ainkut _ whavek _ allangughte llegh mun _ . _ Wh ang kun nun llu _ tuune kaqe ak _ taghneghagh gni _ liisimake sqellug qu _ allangughte lleghqagh ut _ ipapestaaq _ apeghiigh lleqe ni luku _ .
enkaam _ iiwleng _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ ne mete u luta _ yugusigh mnni _ , _ atanegh mete igate ukut _ .
Kiyagh teng ngu u kut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ nakaan _ esghaqagh yu mteggun _ .
enkaam _ ilutu aqe ukut _ . _ unite yug aqe aput _ yugusigh put _ ne mete na luta _ atanegh mi _ .
ne mete yagh ghngaamta _ nalighmeng _ ne mete nghite ghngaamta _ , _ ef qugh s ug aq agh put _ atanegh _ .
qamagte luta _ nekeve pestaagh yaghqaa ukut _ Christ- am _ sivungagh kun _ nan qig tes qell uta _ . _ A taa si k agh taa m ta _ allgegh u lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii meng _ nalighmeng _ seghlegh meng _ apeghiigh te lleg mtestun _ yugusigh mteggun _ .
En kaa ng am _ al ik aq agh put _ atanegh _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpegh ste naqutke aqe aput _ yug t _ Christ- akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake ainkut _ n ate l ngu ut f ut _ yug ni _ , _ sunanguq _ elpek si llu _ liisimake tekut _ tawatete luta _ .
elpesi nun _ tug uk l igh tes naq ut ke ng ngun ghi tu kut _ allameng _ . _ itupill _ ungipaate aqe amsi _ whang kun neng _ elpesi nun _ q uk aa yug utk es qell uta _ . _ taagken _ apegh yaq leg ugh lleq agh pesi kut _ qukaayug tke i lghii nun _ yug m _ q aa s tu l ng in aghh aan eng _ . _ waakigate aat _ sa u ta a _ yug m _ ilumikekagh a _ .
N all u tu y iq ngu kum ta _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ n all u tu y iq ngun ghi l kum ta _ , _ elpesi nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
Christ- am _ igleghte te u ainkut _ piniqe llegh mikun _ . _ L ii simak ng waagh agh put _ yug m _ ataasigh m _ tuquma tke kaqe a _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ yuug _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ yug t _ tuqu kau ut _ .
Christ- am _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lghiit _ kiyagh saq leg ull equ t _ ellnga nun _ , _ nakaan _ ellmeggnun _ katam _ . _ tuqu luni _ unguv agh te kaa g uq _ ellngit _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ s um egh tagh aat ken nan ii m aagh put _ nuna m _ yug an _ sumeghtaghagh tke llegh atun _ . _ qaywa _ ataasigh meng _ s um egh tagh aatk egk aq agh put _ Christ- a _ nuna m _ yug an _ pi llgh a tun _ , _ tawaten _ s um egh tagh aat ken nan ii m aagh put _ .
kina _ alngunak _ Christ- am _ pi liite nghminigu _ nutaghaghllug ughte aqe uq _ . _ Kiyagh taa ll el ug a _ aviighute aqe uq _ , _ iwernga _ nutaghaghllug _ kiyagh taa llgh a _ piinligh aqe uq _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ . _ ellnga n _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ Christ- akun _ . _ qepghaqagh lightu ainkut llu _ ila i llu _ yug t _ il al iigh u tes qell uki _ ellmi nun _ .
Christ- akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliigh u ai _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ yug t _ , _ umyugagh mig ke gpenaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ En kaa ng am _ ungip aghq al it k aq iin kut _ aap gh es qell uki _ naten _ ellmi nun _ ilaliigh ta i _ ellngit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekaqe ainkut _ ungipaghte u luta _ Christ- amun _ , _ enkaam _ whangkutgun _ tag is qell usi _ ellmi nun _ . _ akuzi ste u ukut _ Christ- amun _ kayeme i lghiit _ il al iigh u tes qell usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Christ- a _ seghleghqe mangite u aghte uq _ , _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ seghleghqe kau luku _ . _ enkaam _ Christ- akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh ngllagh kaqe ainkut _ .
Q ep gh al g ut ku tu tem n neng _ kiyaghnegh llu _ , _ taawa _ kayeme amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ tugukligh gpenaan _ temngitwha u luku _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ P i llegh qagh ll u waagh mi _ nagaqugh kaqe amken _ , _ aghnegh ani _ yuguligh llegh m _ kayusigh kaqe amken _ . _ " _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ m aa te ngu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi llegh qagh ll u waagh a _ ; _ nagate tek _ , _ m aa te ngu uq _ aghnegh a _ yuguligh i llegh m _ !
Kiyagh taa ll em teg gun _ naagte yaghagh ngllagh igate aput _ yug t _ , _ segh l equ u f q aan _ pi sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ atanegh mun _ .
iwernga _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ liigike ste aqe ukut _ yug nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qep ghagh tek n il uta _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ n uq e tu t im all em teg gun _ suflughtagh aqe aput _ seghleliigh llegh t _ , _ piyaqli i llegh t _ , _ ikfiqe llegh t _ .
Q ev ut qu q aag u kut _ , _ anusimingllagh kau ukut _ , _ uglagh te lleg nge kau ukut llu _ . _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ , _ qavagh llegh ke mangite ukut _ , _ iyatagh kau ukut llu _ .
L iig ik es teng ngu u ku t lu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qep ghagh te ku t f ut _ pinitun _ kiyagh taa ll em teg gun _ , _ liisimake i lleg mteggun _ , _ n uq e tu t ill em teg gun _ , _ nangllegtagh lleg mteggun _ , _ pin iq i pi ll em teg gun _ , _ A g legh n alghii g ne kun _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ .
Q ep gh aat ng waagh put _ kiyaghnegh _ ungipagh ke lleg mteggun _ ip a pi ll eq _ . _ atugh qaghkagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ guutute kellug qu _ aghenqignegh mnnun llu _ saghumignegh mnnun llu _ .
Q u ul v all eng aq u ku t lu _ uk av agh ll eng aq u ku t lu _ ; _ segh l equ ugh sigh aq u ku t lu _ usuqe lleg nge aqe ukut llu _ . _ iqlengagh lghii u na iqe ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ akuzi aqe ukut _ ipa pig meng _ .
yug t _ nalluke nigh ke ainkut _ , _ naqamllu _ liisimake luta _ ; _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ unguva ukut _ . _ aghyuugh yagh ghngainkut _ , _ tuqute igate ainkut _ .
qivghu u ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ quya nga ghllagu aqe ukut _ ; _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ naqamllu _ aklungi igh i ste aqe aput _ yug t _ ; _ av aq r ag g ii tegh ng aam ta _ , _ naqamllu _ pi lgu aqe ukut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem n ni _ , _ C o r in t h - egh m ii ni _ , _ ip a pi gh qu ll usi _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ ungipaate amsi _ piniqe pigte amsi _ .
nuqnegh te mangite amsi _ piniqe lleg mnneng _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi u ut _ nuqnegh te ikagh t _ piniqe i llegh gpesineng _ whang kun nun _ .
maaten _ aleghqugh amsi _ avaqutagh ke pigte lghii stun _ , _ pin iq eq egh t i kut _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
inglu ke gpenaki _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ elqughutngagh llegh nkuk _ seghlegh nkuk _ inglu ke tepagningite uk _ . _ nighug nkuk llu _ mamleg nkuk llu _ q er ng agh m e te pag n ing itu k _ .
Christ- am _ it ag naq s aghq aq en ghi t ng waagh aa _ tughneghagh _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ piyuke llegh it _ alla u ut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh neng _ .
kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ manigugh yaghqaa nghite ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga ni _ . _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ temple- ke ainkut _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ ellngitnite lleqe unga llu _ aku l ng it n ill equ ng allu _ ; _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit llu _ yug ke lleqe anka _ . _ "
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ pi kau lghii _ , _ unite ki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ aafte tek _ ellngit neng _ . _ saafte gpenaki _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ ; _ enkaam _ tugukligh lleqe amsi _ .
A t ak ell eq agh pesi nga _ , _ enkaam _ elpek si _ ighnegh ke lleqe amsi llu _ panike lleqe amsi llu _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ . _ "
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ tam aa ku neng _ akequsagh ngllagh kau ta aneng _ whang kun nun _ , _ ukmangighsagh lteki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ nukeggnagh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ taghneghagh mta llu _ . _ P el ung igh teng ng waagh el ta _ qayughllak _ al ik agh put _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ilaliigh qagh kut _ ilu gpesigun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ anagnga lghii meng _ pi ng ig atagh put _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ naa f qu mang it agh put _ , _ talwa _ p uugh neq g uu sim ang it agh put _ .
ungipaate u nghite amsi _ tam aa ku neng _ av utk en nal usi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ piniqe pigte ni lusi _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lgusigh lleqe amsi _ nalighmeng _ tuqu lgusigh lleqe amsi _ .
neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qukaayug tke pigte amsi _ . _ K ay em egh llag aq agh pesi nga _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag mnni _ paninang _ tevugha aqe unga _ quya llegh meng _ .
kaate aqngamta _ M a c e d o n i a- mun _ , _ meghnaalipagningite kau ukut _ . _ seghleliigh kau ukut _ tea- ma ani _ , _ yug t _ aaghtiiraagh kaqe ainkut _ , _ teggellghiigh kau ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh aqe ai _ iil q eng ng alghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ilutughsagh ainkut _ tagi ste llegh mikun _ titus _ whang kun nun _ .
ilutughtekau ukut _ tagi aqngan _ titus _ , _ iwernga _ il u tugh ll eng atagh agh tu kut _ ungipagh sigh nkut _ elpesi nun _ ilutughsagh ma ni luni _ . _ ungipaate ainkut _ elpesi nun _ esghagh yug pigte ni lunga _ , _ qivghuke ni lunga _ segh l el iigh qell egh pesi neng _ , _ kayusigh yug pigte ni lunga llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ wanlegi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ .
qaywa _ lata mkun _ qivghu ste ghngaamsi _ , _ av utegh q ut ke ng ngun ghi tan ka _ lata nka _ . _ sivukun _ avuteghqesagh unga _ qayughllak _ lata ma _ qivghu ste aghtegkangisi _ .
quya u nghite unga _ lata mnun _ qivghu te ma ni lusi _ . _ iwernga _ quya ghllagu unga _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ allangughte stekaqe kangi _ kiyagh taa ll esi _ . _ qivghu llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe kaqe a _ elpesi nun _ , _ enkaam _ naten _ alngunak _ whangkuta _ aqnighte llghite amsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ atuqe aqe a _ qivghu llegh _ yug nun _ av utegh qell uki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ yug ul ill eng es qell uki _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ avuteghqe te kete naanghite a _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ iwernga _ qivghu llegh _ nuna meng _ pi _ tuqu ta iqe uq _ .
esghaqagh teggu qun _ sa u ta a _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh qagh a _ qivghu llegh gpesigun _ . _ qivghu llegh gpesi _ efqughute sug ghllag aisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elngaatall _ ip a pi gh q en naq utk eg kaa yagh tu si _ anaggute llghite ni lusi _ . _ U g um iy ag utk aq agh si _ anaggute llegh _ , _ alingruugh kau usi llu _ . _ E s ghagh y u pig tek aq agh pesi nga _ , _ pinitun _ pi kau usi _ , _ aghyuugh qaghkagh i llu _ anaggutekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ip a pi gh q eg kaa g usi _ apallugh ite ni lusi _ .
enkaam _ qaywa _ tawaten _ lata yagh ghngaamsi _ , _ apallugh ke u nghite aqa _ anaggutekagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawavek _ seghletun _ pikagh anun _ . _ itupill _ lata kaqe amsi _ lii g ik ng waagh es qell usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma nghaani _ tuun Ê¼ ng waagh l usi _ whang kun nun _ ayuqe lghiisi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ il u tugh teng ng aakut _ . _ I lu tugh teng ng in agh pen aam ta _ , _ iwernga _ quy aagh atagh agh tu kut _ esghagh luku _ T itu s -em _ quya ma llegh a _ . _ qamagte lusi _ s um egh y al ing ii te sim aagh si _ .
Q an at k egk aq am si _ titus- mun _ efqugh ke ni lusi _ . _ elpesi nun _ pi aqngami _ liite kaqe ai _ ipa u ta i _ sa meng _ pi llgh en ka _ elpesi neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ kayngu yagute llghite anka _ q an at k i llgh en ka _ . _ iiwleng _ ip a pi gh qell uta _ aleghqugh aqe amsi _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ipa u ut _ q an at k i llegh put _ titus- mun _ .
enkaam _ T itu s -em _ wanlegi _ pinigh kau aghte aisi _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghminigu _ qaatke te nga llegh i _ ellmi nun _ . _ upugha te kaqe kesi llu _ alinge lleg ligh lusi _ , _ up- nge llegte llegh ligh lusi _ .
quya ghllagu unga _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ !
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ whangkuta _ lii simak es u w am si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh aneng _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvig itni _ M a c e d o n i a- m _ .
I k f iq l iigh te llegh llag it a _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge ste ghllag kaqe ait _ . _ qaywa _ akluma ghllag yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ paninang _ quya ma ghllag kau ut _ repall _ ighleg gpenateng _ tuune i kau ut _ kayusigh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ungipaate amsi _ tuune i kau ut _ tuun yaghq agh tu tal meg es tun _ , _ talwa _ tuun iigh atagh aq aag ut _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ ellngit _ tuune i yu lghiit _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi sqe mangite ai _ .
talwa _ aapute uute ghllag kau ut _ tuune i lgusigh i na luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
tuune i llegh at _ uglagh kau uq _ sighimake lleg mnneng _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ell meg g neng _ pegte ut _ atanegh mun _ , _ taagken _ whang kun nun _ piyuke llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
titus _ elpesi nite aqngami _ piinligh i kau uq _ qerngughte i llegh gpesineng _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ kay em agh put _ kay us ii sagh t ii s qell usi _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nanglleg ke sagh i _ tunusagh _ .
sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinitun _ pi aqe usi _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ liisima llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusigh i yu kestagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpesigun llu _ whang kun nun _ . _ mate- te mi llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe tek _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ tuun is qell usi _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate u amsi _ naten _ ila it _ tuune i ma ta i _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesi _ ip a pi gh qell eq aa _ piniqe i llegh i _ ipa u ta a _ .
liisimakagh i _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ aklungi ghllag mini _ taw all ii m a _ ellmi neng _ katam _ akluma aghtekau uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aklungi igh i sqe qaghte lusi _ akluma llegh mikun _ .
awatangani _ elpek si _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh kau usi _ mani meng _ , _ tuune i kau usi llu _ qayughllak _ tuune i yu lghiisi _ . _ sume mni _ whatete luku _ pi yagh kufsigu _ , _ itagnagh nayagh usi _ ,
nagnegh te yagh kufsigu _ piinlighkagh i _ ! _ sagiqe nga kau usi _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh aqngafsi _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe nqigte lusi _ apeghiigh teggu _ qerngughtekagh i _ . _ tuune tek _ tuune i lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
tuune i yu pigtekufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ tunute yasi _ . _ piyuke aqe a _ yuug _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tuune yaghqagh lgu kan _ , _ iwernga _ avangite kan _ tuune i nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
nuuqragti ste sug u nghite amsi _ ila si _ n u uq r ag t in ghi sim al uki _ .
maaten _ llilegh ghllag lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ kayusigh yaghqaqe asi _ tamaakut _ aklu lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ aklu kufsi _ taawa _ ellngit a _ kayusigh lleqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kayu siightu lleqe usi _ enkaam _ atunem _ pi lleqe usi _ .
katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ ig aq ell ghi s tun _ , _ " _ yuug _ saghna ghllagkagh _ suyvaghte mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ saghnapag ma ite ngughk _ aklu naanghite uq _ . _ "
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ titus _ kayusigh i yug ste ghllag kanga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ whangkutestun _ .
titus _ angeghqe ma kau uq _ elpesi nun _ pi s q es am teg gu _ . _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigtekau uq _ , _ taana _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke a _ .
U g peq aal g ut f ut _ titus- mun _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ . _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ usuqe pigte aqe aat _ ungipagh ke i llegh aneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
T aan ang in aag pen aan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmike kaqe aat _ maligte te sqellug qu _ whangkutgun _ , _ tuune i yaghtugh kumta _ nanglleg ke te yameng _ tunute yameng _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi u ukut _ usuqe lleg nge sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ yug nun llu _ liite sqellug qu _ kayusigh i yu llegh ut _ .
piraamsi u ukut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ segh l equ u f q aam ta _ pi s qell uta _ naten _ af l eng ak aq ut f ut _ taana _ tunute yagh ghllag _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ a tuq s ug aq agh put _ kiyaghnegh mi _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ yug ni llu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
T itu s -en ku g nun llu _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ ila a _ ugpeq aal g ut f ut _ . _ awen _ esghagh na luku _ nateghtu langa _ pi iqagh ut _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ iiwleng _ kayusigh i yu kestagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wanlegi _ maaten _ kay usi ghi yug llag ugh tuq _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag kangisi _ .
titus _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aanga _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ taake uk llu _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ ugpeqagh t _ y ugh aghv ig n il nguut _ kayagtekaqe agket _ . _ Q u ul v agh llag luku _ Christ- a _ ayuqe ak _ .
enkaam _ C o r in t h - egh m ii ni _ , _ esghaghte steggu _ piniqe i llegh i _ taa ku g nun _ yug gnun _ . _ taagken _ piniqe i llegh gpesi _ ip a pi gh q es l eq iit _ ugpeqagh t _ y ugh aghv ig n il nguut _ sangan _ q an at k ell em n neng _ elpek si _ .
lata tke nghite yagh ghngaamkun _ ayuqe aqa _ tunusagh _ tuyugh yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ J er us al em -em _ .
liisimake amsi _ kayusigh i yug lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ q an at k aq am si _ ugpeqagh itnun _ M a c e d o n i a- m _ . _ whaten _ pi kau unga _ , _ " _ awatangani _ ima _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ A c h a i a- m el nguut _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tuune i na luteng _ . _ " _ sagiqe llegh gpesi _ allute luki _ ugpeqagh t _ m aan l e nguut _ tuune i yug stekaqe ait llu _ .
iwernga _ kayagte naqe anka _ ila i _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ elpesi nun _ . _ apallugh ke aqa _ q an at k il q a _ elpesi neng _ temngingu fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ yataaghqe sqe sug amsi _ katam _ whanga _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ elpek si _ ,
luuraq _ M a c e d o n i a- gh m iit _ ila ita _ maligte na yu kangatnga _ C o r in t h - mun _ . _ esghagh kunisi _ yataaghqe llghite lusi _ tunute yaghqagh gpesineng _ , _ taawa _ whangkuta _ kayngete te yaag kete lleqe ainkut _ , _ elpek si llu _ kayngu yug lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ sivu mni _ kayagte kestagh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ . _ tawaten _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh i _ tunusagh _ . _ taagken _ kaate kuma _ tunusagh i _ apeghiigh nga lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aat _ tuune i yu llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ .
neqamike luku _ una _ , _ yuug _ p al aghh agh meng _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ palaghhagh an _ saghna lleqe uq _ . _ yuug _ uglagh luku _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ uglagh luku _ saghna lleqe uq _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sumeghtaghagh tke teggu _ tuune i lleghqaghtu ta leg si _ . _ ighleg magh gpesi _ tuune i gpenasi _ nalighmeng _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i aqe tek _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ai _ taw ate l nguut _ tuun is tet _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuun yaq leg w ii si _ ak l uk egk agh pesi neng _ qaayghute luku _ . _ enkaam _ iiwleng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ pi lgu aqe lleqe usi _ , _ siipngaan llu _ kay us ii tes qell uki _ ila si _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ I gh l ell ngun ani _ tuune i aqe uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ; _ pinitun _ pi nga llegh a _ nagnegh yaghqaa uq _ quunpeng _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuune i kayug _ piitute meng _ pii te si ghagh te mun _ , _ neqe meng llu _ neghyaghqagh meng _ . _ tuune lleqe a _ qamagte luku _ piitute _ ak l uk egk agh si _ , _ nagu ste lleqe ai llu _ . _ En kaa ng am _ unatagh ghllag lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ igh leg il ngu usi _ .
sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aklungi igh i ste lleqe aisi _ , _ n ar an Ê¼ ngun aan _ tuun is qell usi _ sa llegh mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ whangkutgun _ uglagh lghii m _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ J er us al em - em el nguut _ allgegh lleqe ait _ ak l uk egk at eng _ tunusagh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ iyamsiqa yug llegh meng _ tevugha lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tuune yaghqagh gpesigun _ ip a pi gh qell equ si _ ugpeqe i nga ni lusi llu _ qaatke te nga ni lusi llu _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ Christ- am _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ igh l ell ngun a si _ tuune i llegh gpesineng _ J er us al em - egh m iin un llu _ ila itnun llu _ .
En kaa ng am _ piniqe pigte lusi _ yughagh tke lleqe aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ piniqe llegh ghrug ghllag _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuun Ê¼ ng akanga _ elpesi nun _ .
yeqay _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ tunusagh anun _ akuzite t _ apegh pag n ing il k angat _ .
ila ita _ yug gpesi _ pi aqe aatnga _ tetugtagh ni lunga _ elpesinite negh mni _ , _ iwernga _ tetug igate na iqe aatnga _ elpesinite nghite negh mni _ . _ whanga _ P a u l _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ , _ Christ- am _ qu s ev eg ng all gh aku n llu _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ ,
tetug ste nghite aghte nakefsinga _ laalighfike nqigtekumsi _ . _ iwernga _ tetug yaghqaqe nghite kumki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ kiyagh teng ngun il unga _ nuna m _ yug is tun _ , _ elngaatall _ tetug naanghite anka _ .
nuna mete u ghngaamta _ pi ll u w iig a tu kut _ nuna m _ yug an _ pi ll u w all ghi s tun _ .
guutute t _ pi ll u w aa si put _ nuna m _ yug an _ guutute ke nghite ai _ . _ guutute put _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh aneng _ pi lgu ut _ . _ N aa f q es aq leg w iit _ ay ep s ug il nguut _ mingllute t _ anguyag m _ nekefte qugh qu ai _ yug t _ u v it ang it gun _ .
Taa ku t gun _ guutute tgun _ naafqe aqe aput _ anguyag m _ iqlengagh u i _ , _ sumeghnegh it llu _ aa ng aa yug negh et _ . _ apeghtugh i llghite a _ amig igh aqe ait _ yug t _ liite lleghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ katam _ pi ll u w agh tet _ tu gu te ll ghi s tun _ anusimingllagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tug w aaq ap ut _ qamagte luki _ sumeghnegh t _ q aat ku tes qell uki _ Christ- amun _ .
Christ- amun _ q aat ku t ng ng w aa qu f si _ , _ taawa _ aghyuugh i yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ qaatke te nghite ngugh nun _ .
nanqigte i aqe usi _ esgh all ghii nagh pesi gun _ . _ Christ- amun _ pike pestaagh ni kufsi _ , _ neqamike luku _ whangkuta llu _ Christ- am _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ elpesi stun _ .
kayngu ke igate aqa _ q an at k iv legh ap al q a _ Atan ghem _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stegkanganga _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ whang kun nun _ kayeme sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ naa f q en nal uku _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ al ing es naq ut ke ng ngun il usi _ lata mkun _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe ait _ P a ul -em _ lata i _ seghlegh ghllag u ni luki _ agh s aagh m ik agh ng an il uki _ , _ naqam _ whang kun n in negh min i _ , _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe uq _ , _ akuzi yiite aqe uq llu _ !
tamaakut _ yug t _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ liigike litgu _ sa meng _ pi llegh ut _ lata tgun _ , _ tam aa ku nguut _ ataasigh t _ pi yaghqagh put _ ellngit nun _ pi kumta _ .
inglute naqute kete naanghite ukut _ tam aa ku nun _ aangaayugte lghii nun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ aange ni luteng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh utu te aqe lghiit _ aange ni luteng _ . _ N all uugh h agh meng _ !
Q uk aa yug utk en n aanghi tagh put _ alngunak _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte te ma ite kanga _ whang kun nun _ . _ iwernga _ q uk aa yug ut ke ng ng in agh lleq agh put _ qepghaqagh _ kayagte tke a _ whang kun nun _ . _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ qepghaqagh mnnun _ .
S iv ul igh pig aag u kut _ ungipagh ke i yaghtuqagh ni _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ Christ- am _ . _ enkaam _ al pag ig atagh put _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte tke a _ whang kun nun _ .
Q uk aa yug utk ell eq agh put _ t aan ang in aq _ qepghaqagh _ pikagh ut _ , _ nakaan _ ila ita _ qepghaqagh at _ . _ U g p ell egh tugh te ku f si _ sighima ukut _ kay u sigh atagh ii s qell uta _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
enkaam _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ . _ Q uk aa yug utk es ug un ghi tagh put _ qepghaqagh _ ila ita _ apeghiighkagh at _ .
iwernga _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ q uk aa yug s u ku mi _ , _ qukaayug te kete ligu _ Atan gh h iin aq _ . _ "
Atan ghem _ tugukligh igate ai _ pinighnagh igh lghiit _ . _ itupill _ Atan ghem _ tugukligh aqe ai _ tamaakut _ pinigh ni luki _ pikani _ .
sighimake amsi _ n ek eg g m e tu tes qell unga _ akuzi kuma _ temngitwha lghii stun _ natengiighhaq _ . _ N ek eg g m e tu te qagh teng nga _ .
qungyagh aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qungyaqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ , _ qayughllak _ tuute ma amsi _ Christ- amun _ . _ P el ung il ngugh es tun _ ugiigh naqe lghii stun _ aa ng Ê¼ gh u sim aam si _ ellnga nun _ , _ ugi ke sqellug qu _ ellng in aa _ .
iwernga _ alingutke aqe amsi _ anguyag m _ puughhe na yu kangisi _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nemeghyagh m _ peghqiniqe te kete luku _ puughte llegh atun _ E v e _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ pin iq nan igh waagh n ay uk af si gu _ Christ- a _ .
ungipagh kaqe yamteki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeq egk aq agh si _ Jesus _ , _ tugukligh agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ iwernga _ nagate yu kestagh luki _ ayuqe kaqe asi _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lghiit _ ila aneng _ Jesus-em _ . _ tugukligh i yug usi llu _ ila aneng _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe yukagh kasi llu _ ila i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
tamaakut _ ungip aq is tet _ ap o s t l e- ngun il uteng _ pi aqe ut _ . _ sumegh meggni _ aangwaagh u na iqe ut _ ap o s t l e- et _ . _ iwernga _ liisimake anka _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
akuzi llgite ghngaaghma _ , _ liisima ghllag unga _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ liigike ste aqe amsi _ liisima lleg mneng _ .
elpesi nun _ akileghtughsagh qu mangite unga _ ungipagh kaqe yamki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qusevegte lunga _ qu ul v aghn al usi _ . _ S egh legh q e si ng aa - a _ tawaten _ pi lunga _ ?
ugpeqagh t _ il ang it n il nguut _ yughaghvig t _ akileghtugh kaqe aatnga _ elpesi nite lunga _ . _ W ay aq all gh uugh an ka _ mani itneng _ kayusiite na lusi _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ ugh legh iigh te ll ghi tam si _ kay us ii tes qell unga _ ak l uk egk am neng _ . _ U g peq aal gu tet _ M a c e d o n i a- meng _ tagite kaqe aatnga _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ak l uk egk am neng _ . _ enkaam _ aapte vike llghite amsi _ ak l uk egk am neng _ , _ aapte vike naanghite amsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ A c h a i a- mi _ aghula i aghte naanghite a _ q uk aa yug te l q a _ taagken _ . _ tawaten _ pi unga _ Christ- am _ ip a pi gh qell gh akun _ whanga mnite ngugh qun _ .
kayute ngllagh nghite u te mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ s um egh pesi n ii - i _ piniqe nghite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ whanga mnun _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taawa _ ighsa ke ii vike manginagh naqe amsi _ mani gpesineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ q uk aa yug g nan ii s qell uki _ ap o s t l e- e sigh waagh et _ whangkutestun _ qepghagh ni lghiit _ akileghtuusagh ngunateng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ ap o s t l e- e sigh waagh u ut _ puughte i lghiit _ yug neng _ iqlengiqe llegh megteggun _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ Christ- amun _ ap o s t l e- ep ii k n il uteng _ .
T aam eng wh aq un _ . _ talwa _ tughneghagh _ allangughte aqe uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aliigh yaghqaa luni _ kuukgute nga lghii tun _ yaquleg tun _ .
enkaam _ saghiigha nagh ite ut _ tughneghagh m _ qep ghagh teng i _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luteng _ qep ghagh teng i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ kenle mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ elqughutngagh lghii meng _ aghyuugh llegh meng _ anaggute llegh itnun _ .
alla _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tke nghite linga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ s um egh tagh aat ke ng ngu ku f si nga _ , _ tugukligh qaghte ngnga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ taagken _ whanga llu _ q uk aa yug te v legh agh ll equ nga _ .
qukaayug tke llegh ka _ whanga mneng _ atanegh meng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ itupill _ akuzi u unga _ temngi _ pi lghii stun _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ugpeq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ q uk aa yug taq ut _ qepghaqagh meggneng _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ .
sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigte ni lusi _ pi aqe usi _ . _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nagate aqe asi _ temngitwha lghiit _ .
tugukligh aqe asi _ qelegh llegh it _ nikimqun _ elpek si _ qep ghagh te l aagh et _ ellngit nun _ . _ kagu kaqe ste aqe usi _ , _ tegleg vike ste aqe usi _ , _ ukaligh ke ste aqe usi llu _ , _ talwa _ gginagh gpesigun _ qasaghte ste aqe lusi _ .
kayngu yug unga _ kayaate pigte ukut _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ tam aa ku s tun _ ap o s t l e- e sigh waagh es tun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayugsaghqagh u kan _ , _ whanga llu _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh _ temngitwha u uq _ .
taakut _ ap o s t l e- e sigh waagh et _ , _ H e b r e w - ng w aat _ ? _ whanga llu _ H e b r e w - ngu unga _ . _ I s r a el - egh m ii ng w aat _ ? _ whanga llu _ I s r a el - egh m ii ngu unga _ . _ A b r a h am -em _ k ing un q ak ii _ ? _ whanga llu _ kingunegh ke aanga _ .
Christ- am _ qep ghagh tek ak ii _ ? _ iwernga _ whanga _ pinigh aghagh unga _ qepghagh a _ ellngit neng _ . _ taawa _ akuzi unga _ n all ek aghn il ngugh es tun _ . _ qepghagh aghagh kau unga _ ellngit neng _ , _ an u sim ing l aghv ig m et aagh aq aag ung allu _ ellngit neng _ . _ kagsagmig lleg nge kau unga _ kestekau nghite ngugh meng _ , _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aatagh kau unga _ .
T all im ag y ag neng _ J e w s - et _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ kagsagmig ste aatagh aatnga _ . _ ( _ 3 9 - ng w aa qu t _ ataasigh t _ kagsagmig llegh t _ . _ )
R o m e- egh m iit _ um iil w aa ghi ta _ pi nga yu neng _ an ag ul egh tes tek aq aat nga _ . _ ataasigh meng _ ila ita _ yug t _ milugh agaatagh aatnga _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ angyagh igh utu te aqe aanga _ enkaam _ ataasigh meng _ unug llegh ke sigh _ , _ aghn el qu si q _ ughhe te kaqe aanga _ kellii ni _ .
uglagh pigte lghii mi _ iglegha lleg mni _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ kiiw ni _ , _ w ay aghn iigh t en eng _ , _ talwa _ yug lgute mneng llu _ , _ G en t il e- en eng llu _ . _ yakugh nagh igh unga llu _ ne ghllag ni _ , _ kilgaa ni _ , _ kellii ni llu _ . _ talwa _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ ugpeq aal gu te sigh waagh neng _ .
ughleghiigh ghllag kau unga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh aqe lunga _ . _ ilangani _ qavagh gpenanga _ , _ iyatagh nga aqe lunga _ , _ meqsug nga aqe lunga _ . _ awen _ neqe ite aqe lunga _ , _ azigutigh te aqe lunga _ , _ ghhuute aqe lunga llu _ aatkagh ii te m _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ aghh ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghyali tke kaqe anka _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ tam aghh it ni _ y ugh ag v ig ni _ .
U g peq aal gu te m _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kayaate nghaani _ , _ whanga llu _ kayaate aqe unga _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ kitum _ seghleghqe ste nghagu _ , _ sakrite aqe unga _ .
Q uk aa yug g naq ngu kum a _ , _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe naanghite unga _ . _ ellnga _ ata ke a _ Atan ghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ .
D am as c us - m ell unga _ , _ g o v er n o r -em _ tugu ste sug kaqe aanga _ . _ ( _ umiileg m _ A r et as -em _ g o v er n o r - ngugh tes tek aqaa _ . _ ) _ enkaam _ tug us qell unga _ pi ll u w agh t en i _ kelengake i stekaqe ai _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itni _ .
iwernga _ ilakumtaagh ma _ uk ig tek aq aat nga _ p as ke teg ne kun _ mingllute m _ qergese gkenkun _ enkaam _ anag kau unga _ g o v er n o r - meng _ .
qukaayugsaghqagh u unga _ , _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh u nghite ghngaan _ . _ paninang _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ esghaghwaagh lleg mneng _ , _ Atan gh em llu _ aliigh qughkagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ .
liisimake aqa _ yuug _ Christ- am el nguq _ . _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ ayumiqullegh ni _ agani _ naghughtekagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ pi ng ay aan un _ qilag m _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yug u sim in itu t anga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aan Ê¼ ng ak aat anga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
liisimake aqa _ taana _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ P ar a d is e- mun _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yug u sim in itu t anga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aan Ê¼ ng ak aat anga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
tawani _ nagate kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ apegh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ tamaakut _ iinghute kau ut _ yug mun _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ .
qukaayug te kete naqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete naqe nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ iwerngaqun _ kayaaghlliqe sigh kekagh ghhagh inagh mneng _ .
qukaayug tke sug kuma _ whanga mneng _ , _ temngingu naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ip a pi ll eq _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete na nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke sug unga _ elqughte lunga _ esghapag llegh itgun llu _ nagate llegh itgun llu _ whanga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ghngaaki _ whanga mnun _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ sa u aat _ qilag mi _ , _ qukaayug ste sug nghite aanga _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ qu s ev eg tes qell unga _ sikughllug ngestagh u nga _ yugusigh mkun _ . _ taana _ sikughllug _ ungipaghte u uq _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ Taa m _ ikfiqe ste aanga _ qu s ev eg ng as qell unga _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ke t w el l _ atanegh mun _ yughagh aqe unga _ iqite sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ kayusillegh ka _ naama uq _ elpenun _ suflughte sqellug qu _ taana _ ikfiqe llegh _ qayughllak _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi l q a _ ik naq ell egh pig aag w aq uq _ kayaaghlliqe negh gpeni _ . _ " _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ qukaayug taqu nga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ whang am n i tes qell uku _ Christ- am _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ quya aqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ , _ segh l equ ull eng n em ni _ , _ piyaqli i negh mni _ , _ amyuutke lleg nge negh mni _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng llu _ seghleliigh negh mni _ Christ- a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ taawa _ iknaqe aqe unga _ .
akuzi u unga _ tem ng it wh as tun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ tawaten _ pi s tagh pesi nga _ . _ elpek si _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe yaghagh zinga _ ila gpesinun _ . _ qaywa _ sasii nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ tamaakut _ " _ aw nge aaghet _ ap o s t l e- et _ " _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
elpesi nite lunga _ n ek eg ll u w aan _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llgh et _ pi kaqe anka _ . _ tamaakut _ ip a pi gh q aat nga _ ap o s t l e- ep iig utk a _ .
sa kaqe zingi _ ugpeqagh t _ il ang it n il nguut _ yughaghvig t _ elpesi nun _ pi ma ite ke mneng _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh inagh _ alla u uq _ , _ akilguqe mangite amsi _ . _ seghevute aghte ngnga _ anagte ma kumsi _ !
laalighfike naqe aqe amsi _ pingayut ii te kun _ , _ iwernga _ ughleghiigh tke ste sug nghite unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpek si _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ , _ nakaan _ saghya si _ . _ taghnughhagh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ taghnughhagh t _ aflengake i yaghqaa nghite ut _ angayuqagh meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ angayuqagh t _ aflengake yaghqaqe ait _ taghnughhagh teng _ .
tuune yaghqaaghte amsi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga _ pi mneng _ , _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ tuune lleqe unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ P in iq atagh an em si _ , _ llangaqa _ elpek si _ pin iq ep ag ig atagh pesi nga _ .
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ liisimakagh ut _ ugh legh iigh te sim ang it am si _ . _ iwernga _ ila gpesi _ anaggute ma ni aatnga _ . _ pi aqe ut _ p uugh neq gu un n il usi _ iqlengiqe lleg mkun _ .
naten _ tawaten _ pi s tem si _ ? _ sakenge kau zinga _ elpesi neng _ kayagte aqe yamki _ yug t _ elpesi nun _ ?
kayagtekaqe aqa _ titus _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ugpeq aal g ut f ut lu _ maligte te sqe aqa _ . _ T itu s -em _ puughtekagh qite yu ai _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ T itu s - lu _ whangkutung _ qepghaqagh ung _ ataasigh u uq _ , _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
S um egh pesi n ii - i _ elpesi nun _ ip a pi gh q en naq utk es teg n eg u u _ anaggute llghite ni lutung _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma nghaani _ , _ akuzi aqe ukung _ Christ- am _ akuzi sqe llegh atun _ . _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ sang wa _ qamagte luku _ pi iqagh ung _ ik naq ugh s aghn al uku _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ kaate kuma _ esghagh kumsi _ allake nayuke amsi _ whanga _ sighimake lleg mneng _ . _ elpek si llu _ whanga _ esghagh kufsinga _ all ak n ay uk af si nga _ sighimake llegh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ agh iv at ngun ay uk af si _ , _ aq in aku t ngun ay uk af si _ , _ s ak r aa tu t ngun ay uk af si _ , _ ellng in aa yug ut ngun ay uk af si _ , _ segh l equ ugh ut ngun ay uk af si _ , _ y ii ll g it ngun ay uk af si _ , _ q uk aa yug ut ngun ay uk af si _ , _ s u ug ll iq ut ngun ay uk af si _ .
sumeghyali aqe unga _ alla _ taku kumsi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ kay ngu s aa k n ay uk ang anga _ sivu gpesini _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ enkaam _ qivghu ghllag lleqe unga _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii ni _ elpek si _ seghleghqe manginagh u usi _ avuteghqe gpenasi _ . _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh aqe usi _ s e x - meng _ pelungite nghite ngugh meng _ , _ s e x - a _ seghletun _ atugh qaghkagh i _ , _ s e x - ell gh et lu _ anagnga lghiit _ n uq e tu si g at a si _ .
una _ pingayut ii tke a _ laalighte naqe llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ anaggute ma ni katgu _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ lii simak is tet _ ip a pi gh q es aghq aq aat _ anaggute llegh a _ . _ "
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ laalighfike aqe yamsi _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ tamaakut _ sivugh nghaani _ seghleghqe lghiit _ . _ ila it llu _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke anka _ , _ tagi nqigtekuma _ agh y uugh m ig lleq n il uki _ seghleghqe manginagh kata _ . _ tamaa uute nghite ghngaaghma _ k el eng as aagh naq an ka _ .
whanga mnun _ ip a pi gh q es tes uk esi _ Christ- a _ akuzi aqe ta a _ whanga mkun _ . _ Christ- a _ kayaate nghite uq _ agh y uugh m i kum i si _ , _ itupill _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
qaywa _ Christ- a _ kayaate kaayagh uq _ qaquuragh aqe yamegteggu _ , _ maaten _ kiyagh teng ngu uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ . _ whangkuta llu _ kayaate ukut _ katam _ Christ- am _ kayaate kaayagh llegh atun _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite kumta _ kayusiite lleqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ .
yuvghiigh tek _ elpesi neng _ liigike sqellug qu _ ugpeq ep iig ut si _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ . _ L iig ik en ghi s teg g uu - u _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ kiyagh teng ng ut anga _ ilu gpesini _ ? _ I l ug pesi n in negh it ng uk an _ , _ taawa _ ugpeq ep ii ll ghi tagh si _ .
sunanguq _ liigike teggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ .
yughagh aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kay us ii tes qell usi _ anaggute fqaafsi _ pi s qell usi _ . _ iwernga _ yughagh u u nghite ukut _ ip a pi gh q en nal uku _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ . _ itupill _ whangkuta _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ elqughute nga an _ pi s qell usi _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ pi ghngainkut _ it ag naq ell ghi n n il uta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
K ip ull g in aagh pag n ing it agh put _ ip a pi ll eq _ ; _ itupill _ il ap g ay aghq aq agh put _ .
quya aqe ukut _ kayaate negh mta _ , _ iknaqe u negh gpesini _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ v egh un neq ig tes qell usi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata aqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ qayughllak _ nanqigte yu nghite kemsi _ agh y uugh m ig yaghq aal usi _ . _ Atan ghem _ qelqe aqe aanga _ nanqigte ste u lunga _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigte yug amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ ugpeq i llegh tugh tes qell usi _ , _ nakaan _ kay aal is qell usi _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ taw at en Ê¼ ng am _ pi unga _ . _ quya nga tek _ . _ veghute tek _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ pi sqe sug lleg mtun _ pi tek _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ , _ n ek eg g m e tu ll usi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ t en em e nga _ piniqe llegh m llu _ nekeggmellegh m llu _ elpesi nite li _ .
Q uy aku tu taq i tek _ agleghnagh lghii kun _ naagh llegh kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeq aal gu tet _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atan ghem _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ q er ng agh m e te llgh allu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ P a ul - meng _ pi u ut _ , _ ap o s t l e- meng _ . _ yug t _ nakmike llghite aatnga _ ap o s t l e- ngu l unga _ , _ talwa _ kayagte llghite aatnga _ . _ A p o s t l e- ngu ugh te kaa gu nga _ Jesus _ Christ- aku n llu _ kiyaghnegh kun llu _ ata kun _ , _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ ellnga neng _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
lata aqe amsi _ ugpeqagh ni _ G al at i a- m el ngugh ni _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeq aal g ut m a _ m aan l e nguut _ pinigh ke ii sigh nge uk _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ n ek eg g m ell el g us l i si l illu _ .
Christ- a _ ellmi neng _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ iteme te na luta _ whaken _ seghlegh meng _ kiyagh taa llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pi kau uq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
saghiigha yagute amsi _ aawallu _ p eg tagh tagh si _ tuq lu ghi s te z i _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ Christ- am _ , _ tugukligh aisi _ alla neng _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ .
A v aq r ag g ii tuq _ alla _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ teggellghiigh ste aqe aisi _ allangughte naqutke llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ- ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
qaywa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh mta _ whangkuta _ ungipagh ke gkumteki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ taana _ ungip aq il gh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ , _ whaa _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke gkumiki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh mkun _ ef qugh h naq ut ke ng ngun ghi tan ka _ yug t _ . _ nakaa _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ ef qugh s uk aqa _ . _ paninang _ yug nun _ ef qugh t in aq ut ke ng ngu kum a _ , _ Christ- amun _ qep ghagh teng un aanghi tu nga _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ una _ liisimake sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ yug neng _ pi u nghite ut _ .
nagaqugh kaqe nghite anka _ yug neng _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh tke mangite ai _ whanga mnun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ aliightekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ .
nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ natete yagh tke a _ malig teng ngu luki _ J e w s - et _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ . _ elngaatall _ n angll eg y ull ngun anga _ amyuutke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ aviighute ste naqutke kaqe anka _ .
ingyagh kaqe anka _ allute luki _ angtaagh lgute nka _ atuqe u luki _ J e w s - et _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ , _ qayughllak _ sagiqnegh ghllag u yagh unga _ sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh itnun _ .
iwernga _ allgegh mangite lunga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ whanga mnun _ aliightekaqe a _ kina u ta a _ ighnegh ni _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ G en t il e- en un _ . _ kinku nun _ alngunak _ akuzi tkesaghtugh llghite aqa _ taana _ ,
talwa _ J er us al em - e te ll ghi tu nga _ akuzite kete na luku _ ap o s t l e- ngugh tek anun _ sivu mni _ . _ yeghlegi _ A r a b i a- mun _ pi unga _ . _ tagtalmi _ uteghnigh unga _ D am as c us - mun _ .
tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ J er us al em - e tu nga _ aleghqugh na luku _ C ep h a s _ ( _ peter _ ) _ . _ ellnga nite unga _ aki mig aq _ unuk _ .
kina _ alla _ ap o s t l e- a _ aleghqugh nghite aqa _ iwerngaqun _ James _ , _ Atan ghem _ ang leg ut anga _ .
apeghkagh nka _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ .
taagken _ iglegha unga _ S y r i a- m un llu _ C il i c i a- m un llu _ .
tamaani _ J u d e a- mi _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ- akun _ salin _ nallagh igate kangatnga _ gginasaghqugh lunga _ .
taawanginaq _ liisimake aat _ nagaqugh llegh eng _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ am y uq et iq es tek egk agh put _ , _ naafqii naqutkekagh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ Christ- ameng _ maaten _ whaa _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Christ- akun _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe aqe aat _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ uteghnigh unga _ J er us al em - e mun _ ; _ B ar n a b as -em _ maligte aanga _ T itu s - lu _ kelqe aqa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste aanga _ J er us al em - e tes qell unga _ . _ kaate yamta _ ugpeqagh t _ iglegh ut is teng in iit _ qerngughte te aghte sqe anka _ . _ tawani _ ungipamsug te anka _ naten _ G en t il e- en un _ ungipagh ke i lleg mneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ luuraq _ taakut _ iglegh ut is tet _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ temngingu ni na yu katki _ sivugh nghaani llu _ maaten llu _ .
liigike anka _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ tugukligh ait _ qayughllak _ maligte i steke _ titus _ , _ G r e ek - ngugh ng aan _ , _ c i r c um c is e- es q en ghi l k angat _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeq a sigh waagh et _ aksaqe luku _ ilate ut _ whang kun nun _ riirngi na luku _ iteme nga llegh ut _ Christ _ Jesus - kun _ . _ Q ep ghagh te l aagh ugh h neq ig tes qell uta _ pi inkut _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
ellngit nun _ malighqutagh ke llghite ukut _ talwa _ natengiighhaq _ al m e si q es qell uki _ ipa u llegh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke lleg mtestun _ elpesi nun _ .
taakut _ ugpeqagh t _ iglegh ut is teng it a _ allangughte mangite ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ . _ ( _ I g legh ut is te ngu yagh ngaat a _ , _ whanga mni _ allangughte te ite ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ . _ )
I g legh ut is tet _ liigike ma ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghyuke te ma ni luki _ whanga mnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungip aq es qell uki _ G en t il e- en un _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ neghyuke te llegh atun _ peter- mun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungip aq es qell uki _ J e w s -en un _ .
katam _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghaqagh u uq _ peter- kun _ ap o s t l e- ken nal uku _ J e w s -en un _ , _ whanga mkun llu _ qepghaqagh u uq _ ap o s t l e- ken nal unga _ G en t il e- en un _ .
