ugpeqe i llegh kun _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ aghviqagh ke aat _ R e d _ S e a _ nikimqun _ qute stun _ . _ iwernga _ E g y p t- egh m iit _ , _ aghv igh naq ut ke ng ngu luteng _ pekagh qu te kau ut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ aghnegh ni _ uzivgagh kaqe aat _ J er i c h o - m _ mingllu ta a _ . _ taagken _ mingllu te a _ u llegh aat kaa g uq _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ R a h a b -em _ , _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ upugha te kaqe ak _ I s r a el - egh m iit _ riirngi steke t _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llghite uq _ maligte te luni _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
wataqaaghaq _ ungip am s ug ull am si i _ yug neng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ? _ taake ghllag yaghqaa ut _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luki _ G i d e o n -en kut _ , _ B ar ak -en kut _ , _ S am s o n -en kut _ , _ J ep h t h a h - n kut _ , _ D av i d -en kut _ , _ S am u el -en kut _ , _ u uk nal iq is te t lu _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ ila i _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ : _ kayaalqe kaqe ait _ ataneghpag u llegh t _ , _ elqughute nga luteng _ igleghte te i kau ut _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ tugu kaqe ait _ . _ ila ita _ l i o n - et _ q aanghi t _ meqete ste aqe ait _ .
kumaghugh ghllaget _ ken gh et _ qaamte aqe ait _ , _ anag aqe luki llu _ tuqute i stekaghqagh teng _ savigpag kun _ . _ kayaate aqe ut _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llghite a _ iknaqe ughtaghkagh it _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ pi ll u w agh teng it _ ik naq ugh tegh llag aq ut _ enkaam _ kayaalqe aqe ait _ ila ita _ nuna t _ pi ll u w agh teng it _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ aghnagh t _ tuqu m as lii t eng _ veghte aqe ait _ tuqu llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv aghh negh ak i _ . _ ila i _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe ste ghllag aqe ait _ pegte sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu na luteng _ pi aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguv agh tes qell uteng _ pin igh atagh al ghi mun _ unguvallegh mun _ .
ila i _ legasiighwagh te kaqe luki _ , _ ila i _ kagsagmig aqe luki _ , _ ila i _ q ii p r agh u sigh luki _ anusimingllagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ m il ugh pag aat ameng _ tuqute aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ yugusigh at _ pilagtugh luki _ malghughqe aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ tuqute aqe ait _ savigpag kun _ . _ ila i _ tem g i _ tamaani _ igleghte aqe ut _ aate luteng _ penniigh m llu _ g o at - em llu _ amigh aneng _ . _ ila i _ akluma pigte lghiit _ , _ yug t _ amyuqetagh tkekagh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ kiyaghute ke ait _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ pinighpagunghite ut _ kiyaghte lgusigh yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ ! _ ila i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ temngi _ tamaani _ iglegha kau lghiit _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ , _ naayghagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte aqe luteng _ qaye ni _ , _ laawaagh ni llu _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ it ag naq egk aq ii _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ ! _ naqamllu _ all g egh sim ang it aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ whang kun nun _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ whatete uq _ : _ akequsagh ni _ pi naanghite ai _ ellngit nun _ whang ku ngun ak i _ . _ qerngagh emta _ qamagte luta _ iighwigh lleqe ainkut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liigike ste ainkut _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ naten _ kiyaghte llegh megteggun _ . _ maaten _ uvitangigh luta _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ k il g aa qu s tes tun _ iqite lteki _ qamagte luki _ uqigkutagh t _ , _ seghleghqe llegh t llu _ iglagute lghiit _ whang kun nun _ . _ sagiqe luta ngam _ kilgaaqu lta _ siv um n n il ngugh mun _ ,
esghagh ma ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piinligh i ste nga llu _ apeghiigh i ste nga llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ . _ kayngu nagh uq _ tuqu lleghqagh _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi tke mangite a _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ . _ yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe na luni _ qaquuragh kun _ apallugh ke luku _ quya llegh _ allgeghsaghqagh ni _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ Jesus _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qaywa _ seghlegh q es tet _ ug um i ke r aagh ll agh ngaat ni _ . _ tawaten _ elpek si llu _ ilutu llghite te naanghite usi llu _ iilqayug naanghite usi llu _ .
seghleghqe nghite naqutke llegh gpesi _ salin _ yug nun _ tuqute sigate aisi _ .
puygu stekagh i _ ilutughsagh sigh t _ akuzite t _ ungipaate i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni lusi _ ? _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ avelghaqiinagh gpenaan _ Atan ghem _ nallghusagh nghaten _ , _ iilqayug gpenang llu _ aghyuugh nghaten _ .
qayughllak _ qamagte luki _ piniqekagh ni _ Atan ghem _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ q aatk es qell uni _ , _ aghyuugh aqe ai llu _ tuguklighkagh ni _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ "
tugukligh aqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ avaqutagh teng _ ata ita _ aghyuugh aqe ait _ n all gh ugh q en nal uki _ .
qamagte luteng _ avaqutagh t _ aghyuugh lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ aghyuugh lleg nge nghite kuvek _ taawa _ ata ite ngugh u uten _ enkaam _ avaqutagh pig ke nghite aaten _ .
Taa m _ saaghw akun _ , _ ata mta _ nun am el nguut _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ apeghtugh na luta _ q aatk es qell uteng _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ qu ul v agh aq ap ut _ . _ enkaam _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ q aatk atagh agh yaghq aq agh put _ unguva na luta _ .
ata mta _ nun am el nguut _ aghyuugh aqe inkut _ natengiighhaq _ , _ sumegh meggni _ elqughte luku _ aghyuugh i u ni luteng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ pinighqe lleghqagh mnnun _ p el ung iigh tes qell uta _ ellmi tun _ .
quya niite uq _ aghyuugh lleg nge negh mta _ qayughllak _ aqnighte aqe kanginkut _ . _ iwernga _ tagtalmi _ , _ lii t f ik n em teg gu _ , _ nekeggmellegh nge aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yagute aqe ukut _ elqughute luta _ .
keveg teki _ iigge si _ qughagh nga lghiit _ , _ taagken _ ik naq ugh sagh tek i _ kay aal nguut _ segesqugh si _ !
taklaghte ki _ tume i _ tutmagh llegh gpek _ , _ taagken _ kay aal nguq _ ighu n _ aane qagh naanghite uq _ naflugh mineng _ , _ iwernga _ naallghute lleqe uq _ .
kiyaghte naqe tek _ n ek eg g m e tu ll usi _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ kiyaghte naqe tek llu _ seghlegh qell ngun a si _ . _ kinku t _ alngunak _ pelungite nghite ngugh t _ esghagh naanghite aat _ atanegh _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ luuraq _ all g egh h negh is aagh aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ nagu tete yaqunaan llu _ sungagh nite ngughk _ akugh _ seghleliighqagh ii luni _ naafqii yaghqagh _ yug lghute meng _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ seghleghqesagh u aghte ut _ s e x - kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku t _ alngunak _ qu ul v agh in ghi s aagh tut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ E s a u - tun _ . _ akike kaqe kanga _ pagitaghqagh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ neghyaghqagh mun _ .
liisimakagh i _ taa m _ kingu aneng _ , _ all g egh s ug aq ng am igu _ a ta mi _ quya ste llegh a _ , _ ata an _ ighsake kaqe a _ . _ E s a u - m _ allangughtepagningite kaqe a _ apeghiighkagh ni _ , _ qaywa _ qunituumagh mi _ tungsigh ghngaaghmigu _ a ta mi _ quya ste i llegh a _ .
sivunegh gpesistun _ ayuqe nghite usi _ M o un t _ S in a i - mun _ pikagh stun _ . _ esghagh yaghqagh at _ , _ saafte yaghqagh at llu _ . _ tawani _ mamleg ghllagukagh _ , _ naafte ghllagukagh _ , _ naayghagh llu _ kumaghugh ghllagu lghii _ .
nagaqugh qu aat _ qalghightu an _ q al ghi gh llegh h ii _ , _ nagaqugh qu aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ . _ iwernga _ nepiigh qigh sqekagh at _ ,
qayughllak _ tugukligh yug nghite kangat _ qelegh i llegh a _ wh ate l nguq _ , _ " _ taana _ naayghagh _ , _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ teghig ke sagh m _ saaftekunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh pestaagh u uq _ m il ugh pag aat ameng _ . _ "
M o s es -em _ esgha qaa _ kakavaatagh na pigte lghii _ repall _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ E ll ngaatall _ ungelegte unga _ al ing r uugh em _ . _ "
iwernga _ katam _ elpek si _ tagi kau usi _ M t _ . _ Z i o n - mun _ , _ qilag m _ J er us al em - ng anun _ , _ ne ghllag anun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kestekau nghite ngugh nun _ yaquleg nun _ qerngughte tekagh nun _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luteng _ .
tagi kau usi _ qerngughte te llegh itnun _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ qilag mi _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh tgun _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nan qig t is teng it nun _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ yug t _ , _ taghneghagh itnun llu _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ iighwigh stekagh nun _ .
tagi kau usi _ Jesus - mun _ , _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsaghraghagh ngllagh kau uq _ . _ tagi kau usi llu _ siv i llag t aatk amun _ aaw anun _ Jesus-em _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ A b el -em _ aaw aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe llegh t _ Jesus-em _ aaw akun _ .
enkaam _ kelenga tek _ , _ nagate yu nghite gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi lghii _ . _ sivunegh mta _ nag as un ghi t k aq aat _ k el eng as aa ghi llgh a _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ enkaam _ anag mangite aat _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ . _ whangkuta _ aghyuugh aghagh lleqe ainkut _ nagate yu nghite kumteggu _ kelenga sagh u llegh a _ qilag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqngami _ M o un t _ S in a i - meng _ , _ me an _ ufsugute ka qaa _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ akeqe i ma uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ u f s ug un neq ig lleq aqa _ nuna _ , _ iwernga _ qilag llu _ ufsug u lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ akuzillegh an _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ u f s ug un neq ig lleq aqa _ nuna _ , _ " _ lii g ik es teng ng waagh iin kut _ whaten _ , _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ulimaagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ ufsug te yaghqagh t _ . _ Tam aa ku ng in aghh aat _ u f s ug u te pag n ing il nguut _ tam aan ll equ t _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ tuune kanginkut _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ufsug te yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ En kaa ng am _ manigugh lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ efqugh nagh leg kekagh atun _ alinge lleg ligh luta llu _ qu ul v agh ill el igh l ut allu _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ut _ naafqii lghii u uq _ kenegh _ .
piniqe kestagh teki _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ .
upugha manginagh tek _ aqiiyag nun _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ upugha te aqe ait _ nalluke luki _ yaquleg u ta i _ .
neqamike luki _ an u sim ing ll aghv ig m el nguut _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ an u sim ing ll aghv ig m e te ll ghi s tun _ . _ neqamike luki _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ ikfiqe lghii stun _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sii vag qite ggu _ nengughte te llegh _ enkaam _ ugi t llu _ nulighh t llu _ ataa s iigh m e tu ll it _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ gelgaghniigh lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila aneng _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ pakignegh u gpenasi _ mani mun _ , _ itagnagh aqe tek llu _ seat- ta leg gpesistun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ U n in n aanghi t ng waagh am si _ ; _ p eg g n aanghi t ng waagh am si _ . _ "
enkaam _ te tu ll ngun aam ta _ whaten _ pi lta _ , _ " _ atanegh _ kayute ke aqa _ ! _ alinge naanghite unga _ yug t _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
neqamike luki _ iglegh ut is te si _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ neqamike luki _ naten _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg lgu naqe tek _ ellngistun _ .
Jesus _ Christ- a _ almesiqe aqe a _ ighivgaq _ , _ aghneghmi _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ .
iqitute ste gpenasi _ ip a pi llegh meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh nun llu _ allakaayagh gnun llu _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh teki _ ilu si _ , _ nakaan _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh t _ negh ke neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ taakut _ neqe t _ liilightuusagh it _ qaatke gkufsiki _ ayepsugighsagh naanghite ait _ ilu si _ .
P r i es t- et _ qepghagh lghiit _ t a b er n a c l e- mi _ ineghtekau ut _ neghe lleghqagh itneng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ aghqefig mteggun _ .
H ig h _ P r i es t -em _ tagite aqe ai _ aaw it _ teghig ke sagh t _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aghqe te kete na luki _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ kemegkwaagh it _ teghig ke sagh t _ ne ghllag meng _ iqitute luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus - llu _ iqitute kau uq _ ne ghllag meng _ . _ tawani _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mineng _ .
En kaa ng am _ ne ghllag meng _ whangkuta llu _ aglagh lta _ Jesus - mun _ , _ seghletun _ akuz it k es qell uta _ katam _ ellnga _ seghletun _ akuz it k ell ghi s tun _ .
nuna mi _ whani _ qu un pe k aghq ameng _ ne ghllag ite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ utaq ang waagh put _ negh ghllag _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
Jesus - kun _ iiwleng _ aghqe tke i lta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ aghqe te put _ usuqe i llegh ke aput _ ap en em teg gu _ Jesus _ Atan gh un il uku _ .
puygu gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ , _ tuune te aqe tek llu _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ aghqe te u ut _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaatke teki _ iglegh ut is te si _ atuqe luki _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ kelengake i u ut _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nan qig s aghq aat s eng _ . _ quya nghite ste gpenaki _ iglegh ut is te si _ , _ itupill _ qaatke llegh gpesigun _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi lleqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ . _ qaatke nghite kufsiki _ kayusiitepagningite aisi _ .
yughagh tke tekut _ . _ liisimake ukut _ umyugagh mta _ anaggute llghite na ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ iiwleng _ pi y uk el qagh put _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pi yaghqaa luku _ .
Taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ kayagte amsi _ y ugh aatk es qell unga _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh na lunga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n ek eg g m ell el it is te m _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ aaw mikun _ P en n iigh n iigh tegh llag ugh te kaa g uq _ penniigh nun _ . _ aaw an _ atugh u yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qu un pe k aghq aq _ akequsagh a _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuun es qell usi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinigh lghii meng _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh a _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ Jesus _ Christ- aku n llu _ ilu gpesinun _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ligu _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellmi nun _ . _ Christ _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ki _ lata nka _ qayughllak _ kayeme yug aqe amsi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ takestaaghhaa luku _ lata amsi _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeq aal gu tem n neng _ , _ T im o t h y - meng _ , _ aan e sim aaq _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ K aa te l ghagh tugh yaq an _ qerngagh emtung _ esghagh yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ .
quyake aghte nakesi _ qamagte luki _ iglegh ut is te si _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ . _ U g peq aal gu te t lu _ italy- meng _ pi t _ quyake aghte na ke ii sigh nge uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ J am es - meng _ pi u ut _ qep ghagh teng aneng _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ Atan gh em llu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ lata aqe unga _ J e w s - et _ ugpeqagh itnun _ mingite nga lghii nun _ tea- ma ani _ . _ quyake amsi _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ quya aqe tek _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ ,
qayughllak _ liisima kasi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesi _ nan ghii qu ng w aat _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nuqete neghtughsagh na lusi _ .
taagken _ nuqete neghtu llegh i _ nagnegh nga steggu _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ ang tan ii ll equ si _ , _ iighwigh lleqe usi _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenasi _ .
naligh i _ peghqinellegh nge yu kuni _ tungsigh li _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ighlegite ghllag uq _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ tuun egk ay u w aa _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ aapte lghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ tungsigh kufsi _ .
enkaam _ aapte tek _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luku _ mal gh uk l ill ngun aan _ . _ malghukli nga lghii _ imaghllug stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ anuqe m _ tenge qagh te aqe kanga _ .
malghukli nga lghii _ ataasiighte igate uq _ sa llegh mikun _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ Taw ate l nguq _ yuug _ talwa _ sumeghtaghagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh u lleqe ni luni _ atanegh meng _ .
yeqay _ akluma lghii _ ugpeq aal gun _ quya li _ qu ul v agh tes teng ng all egh min eng _ .
yeqay _ ak l ung il nguq _ ugpeq aal gun _ quya li _ qu s ev eg tes teng ng all egh min eng _ , _ qayughllak _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ pii te si ghagh es tun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghmini _ m aat negh q waagh llag aq elghii _ , _ piitesighagh at _ paligh ste luki _ . _ taagken _ piitesighagh at _ ifkagh qu uute aqe ut _ , _ pinigh niigh te aqe ai _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ak l ung il nguq _ yuug _ sa kestagh ghngaaghmi _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
quyanaghhalek _ yug m _ nanghiiqu lleg ni _ n uq e tu t kay ug i _ . _ suflughtekumiki _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ akileghtuusagh ni _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ pin iq is te min un _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nanghiiqu lleg nge gkuni _ whaten _ pi te qugh a mi _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe ste naqutke aanga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu lleg nge yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe ste naqute kete yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ piyuke lleg lug an _ nanghiiqu lleg nge sta qaa _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ sivuke luku _ piyuke lleg lug an _ sayug aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh m _ naapte aqe a _ .
piyuke lleg lug m _ allgegh ste aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh _ angli nghmini _ tuqu llegh ughte aqe uq _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ puughtesigh gpenasi _ .
qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit llu _ , _ s all gh waagh h iil ngu ut lu _ tunusagh t _ qilag meng _ pi u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ ata meng _ pi u ut _ ul im agh is teng aneng _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ ; _ allangughte igate uq llu _ , _ mamleg ste i igate uq llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ piyuke llegh ke a _ , _ tuun al uta _ nutaghagh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ungipagh akun _ ip a pi gh qell ghem _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ whangkuta _ meg nun all egh pig aa s qell uta _ ul im aagh y ag g agh min eng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ neqamike luku _ una _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ nagate yu kestagh luni _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ akuz iigh agh t af q aam illu _ s ak r aag agh agh t af q aam illu _ ,
qayughllak _ s ak r aam _ kayusiite igate aisi _ pinitun _ kiyagh taa llegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukekagh anun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ggu _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqe aqe kesi _ . _ Q us ev eg ng agh p esi _ tugukligh teki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piite tesiigh aqe ai _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ul iyagh q aq ii si _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ .
nagate ghesnagh gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ itupill _ atuqe teki _ . _ puughte aqe usi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ nagate ghesnagh nghpesiki _ atuqe gpenaki _ .
yuug _ nagate ghesnagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ atuqe gpenaki _ , _ taghneghaghqugh lghii stun _ ayuqe uq _ 
tunute kuni _ taw an ing in aq _ puygu lleqe a _ n ate tu l en i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh i _ iteme te ta iqe ut _ yug neng _ . _ yug m _ liinnaquma inagh kumiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ puygu gpenaki _ atuqe gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya saghqagh ke a _ s all gh akun _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh yu k _ ugpeqagh ghllag u ni luni _ , _ naqam _ akuz it k es aghq aq en ghi l ke m min eng _ akuzi kayug _ temngi _ p uugh teng ngu uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ ugpegh llegh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pi llgh ani _ yuug _ ug p ell ep iil gu ku mi _ , _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ai _ yaywaali t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ seghleliigh nghata _ , _ nuqete yaghqaa uq llu _ seghlegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ ugpeqe i u te gpesineng _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ- ameng _ , _ Atan gh aneng _ n igh ugh qell ghem _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaki _ ila i _ yug m _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luki _ ila meggneng _ .
maalghug _ yug k _ itegh yagh kayek _ qerngughte te vig gpesinun _ , _ aag llegh a _ aarragh luni _ , _ g o l d - meng _ alangqughiitagh ightugh luni _ , _ aag llegh a _ aatkagh lug kaghte luni _ ,
taana _ aarragh nga lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ whagun _ aqume i _ pinigh llegh akun _ aqumutagh m _ , _ " _ naqam _ akluma lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ tawani _ nekevgha _ , _ " _ nalighmeng _ , _ " _ aqume i _ itegagh ma _ saaghw akun _ , _ "
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ p ak ig gu lleq a si _ ila i _ yug t _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ nagate aghte tek qun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ ak l um aal ghiit _ nuna mi _ whani _ ugpeq i llegh tu s qell uki _ . _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tug uk l igh te ngu luki _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ yug minun _ , _ piniqe i nga lghii nun _ ellmi neng _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ ak l um aal ghiit _ yug t _ ukaligh u ste aqe asi _ . _ liisima kasi _ ak l ung il nguut _ piyaqleg iighqagh ke aisi _ , _ aglagh te aqe lusi _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
E ll ng i nguut _ seghletun _ akuzi tke i lghiit _ qu ul v agh ng alghii meng _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ , _ ategh _ tuunekagh _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ pike kangisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ L iiligh tu s aa _ unaagh nge uq _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ el pen eng _ katam _ . _ " _ Q aat q eg ku f si gu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ , _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi usi _ .
iwernga _ p ak ig g us ku f si k i _ ila i _ yug t _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ , _ q aat ken n aanghi tagh si llu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ .
kitum _ qaatkesagh ghngaaghmiki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ ataasigh _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ , _ qamagte luki _ q aat ke ng ngun ghi t ii _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ . _ " _ gelgaghniigh nghite yagh ghngaaghpek _ yugtagh kuvek _ taawa _ q aat ke ng ngun ghi t aten _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ sa llegh gpesigun _ piraamsi lusi _ qayughllak _ elpesi u usi _ nanqigte yaghqagh t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh qun _ liilightuusagh kun _ . _ Taa m _ liilightuusagh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekunisi _ nanglleg yagute naanghite aisi _ , _ nanglleg yagute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke gkufsiki _ yug lgute si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute lleqe aisi _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ kina _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu unga _ , _ " _ iwernga _ taa m _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ yug ul in aanghi t aa _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun _ . _ sasii lleqe a ngam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ an egh negh q ill ngun ani _ ?
sa nayagh tsi _ ugpeq aal g ut si _ aatkagh isag yagh kan llu _ , _ neqangisag yagh kan llu _ ?
tuune gpenaan _ ak l uk egk aan eng _ temngi _ whaten _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste naagh aaten _ ; _ sunanguq _ neghyaghqagh nge i llu _ aate kangi llu _ maqagh lghii meng _ , _ " _ s as ii lleq an Ê¼ ng am _ akuzite si _ an egh negh q ill ngun at eng _ ?
ugpeqe i llegh llu _ tawatete uq _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh kun _ atuqe nghite kuni _ sasii nghite uq _ .
kina _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu uten _ , _ whanga _ an egh negh qell el g uu nga _ . _ " _ keleg u vike nga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpeneng _ aneghneghqagh igh llghite ngugh meng _ , _ keleg u vike lleqe amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mneng _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mkun _ .
ugpegh kan _ ataasigh ghhagh u ta a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taana _ pinigh uq _ ! _ tughneghagh t llu _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ taana _ en kaa ng am _ alingruugh aqe ut _ , _ ungelegte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe kangi _ .
uyuq _ n all u uq aq _ yuug _ , _ paninang _ lii g ik ig a si gu u _ ugpeqe i llegh _ an egh negh q ill ngun ani _ sasii nghite u langa _ ?
sangan _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ seghlegh qu mang il ngugh es tun _ ? _ tugukligh kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ atuqe kaqe a _ an egh negh qell egh m i kun _ aghqe te kaqe yamigu _ ighnegh ni _ isaac _ aghq ef ig eg ne kun _ .
L iig ik si gu u _ ? _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh llu _ qerngagh egmek _ qepghagh kayugu uk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ A b r a h am -em _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ iigh w igh tek aqaa _ an egh negh qell egh qun _ .
enkaam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi ll ghi t _ A b r a h am - e meng _ apeghiigh kau ut _ , _ " _ A b r a h am -em _ ugpeqe kaqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ abraham _ seghlegh qu mang il ngugh es tun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ ilakumtaagh ke ni luku _ pika qaa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh aqe a _ yuug _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh akun llu _ ugpeqe i llegh akun llu _ ; _ tugukligh igate a _ ugpeqe i lleg raaghinagh akun _ .
R a h a b - llu _ usputagh u uq _ . _ akike i kayugu yagh lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ seghlegh qu mang il ngugh es tun _ apallugh ke luku _ kayusigh i llegh a _ . _ J o s h u a- m _ kayagtekaqe kek _ maalghug _ yug k _ aksaqe luku _ nuna at _ yuvghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ yug t _ ivagh yatkek _ , _ R a h a b -em _ alla kun _ tume kun _ anag stekakek _ .
En kaa ng am _ yugusigh _ taghneghagh ngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ an egh negh q ill ngun ani _ tuqu nga uq _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ allute lusi _ apeghtughiste ughte fqaafsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ whangkuta _ apeghtughiste ni _ nan qig teng ng waagh atagh agh yaghq aag u kut _ .
qamagte luta _ anaggute aghagh neghtu ghllag ukut _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ akuzillegh mikun _ anaggute igate ngughk _ elqughutngagh pestaagh u uq _ . _ yug m _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ talwa _ yugusigh ni llu _ agghi te kete luku _ ayuqe yaghqaqe a _ .
savikenghaagh ghhagh t _ sa ni te mun _ ayuqe luki _ kuuni t _ q aanghi t nun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ q aatk es qell uta _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ igleghte te aqe aput _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun llu _ angyaghpag ghllag t _ ; _ aq u ut as qu v eg aghh aam _ qiifte aqe ai _ angyaleg m _ piyuke llegh anun _ talwa _ an uq at egh llag yagh ng aan _ .
ulu llu _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ iwernga _ aa ng aa yug negh llag u uq _ . _ K en gh h aam _ uqfig lghute ghllag t _ kumaghsaghqagh ke ai _ !
ulu llu _ ken gh es tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ esleqnga uq _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ seghleghqe ma llegh a _ mingite kayugu uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ enkaam _ naafqii kayugu uq _ kiyagh taa ll em n neng _ qayughllak _ h ell -em _ ken gh an _ kumagh a qaa _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ nemeghyagh t _ , _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh i _ qimugtekayugu ut _ , _ aaqun _ yug m _ qimugtaghkagh i _ 
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qimugte naanghite a _ ulu _ . _ nekleg igate ngugh u uq _ , _ seghleghu uq _ , _ esleqnga uq _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ p o is o n - meng _ .
ulu _ us u qu si q aq agh put _ atanegh mnnun _ ata mun _ . _ naqam _ seghlegh meng _ neghyugtaghagh usigh qaghkagh ut _ yug lgute mnnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh itnun _ ellmite yu gnite luki _ .
usuqe i llegh llu _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ neghyugtaghagh llegh _ aane kayugu uk _ ataasigh meng _ qanegh meng _ . _ U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite yagh uq _ .
pinigh lghii llu _ seghlegh llu _ megh _ m aaq egk ay u w aa k _ ataasigh meng _ sengngugh meng _ ?
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ f ig s -em _ uqfig a _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ o l iv es - meng _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ g r ap es -em _ vine- nga _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ figs- meng _ . _ talwa _ meghtaghvig _ tagh y ugh n il ngugh meng _ meqe lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ megh ite uq _ .
kina _ akule gpesinite a _ peghqinegh lghii _ , _ liigike i ma lghii llu _ ? _ tawatete lleg ni _ kelgute ligu _ pinitun _ kiyagh taa llegh m i kun _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun llu _ qu s ev eg ng agh mi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ aqina nga kufsi llu _ , _ ellng iin aa yug negh u ku f si llu _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaan _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ , _ qaghya llegh gpesigun _ liisima ni lusi _ .
Taw ate l nguq _ peghqinellegh _ qilagtagh u nghite uq _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u uq _ .
nani _ alngunak _ aqina lleg lgu nghaani llu _ , _ ellng in aa yug ll el g un gh an illu _ taawa _ k ip ull g in aa ll el w aa qu q _ , _ sa u aat llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ taw an taq ut _ .
iwernga _ peghqinellegh _ qilagte aq _ kiyang _ pelungite uq _ . _ A m all eq aa _ n ek eg g m e tuq _ , _ kavyugite uq _ , _ malighqutagh ke i nga uq _ , _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ pikayug u uq _ , _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ y u p iin gh u uq _ .
nekeggmellegh _ piitute stun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh mun _ qepghagh kayug t _ piitesighagh aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ saghna aqe ut _ elte qugh nga lghii meng llu _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ kiyagh taa llegh meg g ni _ .
S aam _ aaghtiiraagh te ste aqe isi llu _ , _ pillugute ste aqe aisi llu _ ? _ apate lugh qaghkagh i _ , _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ pi ll u w agh aq ii _ pinigh lghiit _ piyuke lleg si _ .
qiliigh aqe usi _ avangite negh gpesini _ enkaam _ yugtagh yaghqaghte aqe usi _ all g egh h nal uki _ qiliigh ke gkasi _ . _ qiliigh ghllag aqe usi _ taawanginaq _ all g egh te pag n ing it aq a si _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe usi _ , _ pi ll u w utaq usi _ . _ allgegh te igate usi _ kiyaghnegh _ aap si g a tu teg pesi neng _ .
talwa _ aapte ghngaaghpesigu _ kiyaghnegh _ all g egh si g at a si _ qayughllak _ seghlegh mun _ atughqagh u luki _ aapte aqe lghiisi _ . _ piyukekagh i _ elpek si _ katam _ piyukekagh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ .
ukughsi _ ataa s iigh negh il ngugh ni _ ! _ L ii simak en ghi s teg gu u _ piniqe gkufsigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ , _ ug um ik agh si _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ anguyag u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ temngingu ni luku _ whaten _ pi llgh at _ , _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ aqina naqe neghtu uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aghagh aqe ainkut _ n uq e tu tes qell uki _ piyuke lleg lug put _ . _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusigh aqe ai _ qu s ev eg ng alghiit _ puuru _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe ai _ q uk aa yug negh et _ . _ "
tuune lusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ , _ anagniigh lleqe uq _ elpesi neng _ .
qantaghalli i aghagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qantaghalli i aghagh lleqe uq _ elpesi nun _ . _ S egh legh q es t en i _ , _ uughtugh tek _ ! _ elpek si _ ataasiighte llghite ngugh ni _ , _ ukmangigh teki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ .
quya nghite tek _ , _ asemeghqe tek _ , _ qiya tek _ ! _ nenglaghqagh iqe lleg si _ qiya llegh ughte ki _ , _ quya lleg si _ quya nghite ngugh ughte steki _ .
qusevegte tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ qu ul v agh lleq ii si _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ segh l equ ugh u teg pen a si _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ segh l equ u qu m igu _ ugpeq aal g ut en i _ , _ segh l equ ugh lleq ii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekunigu llu _ ugpeq aal g ut en i _ nan qig teng ng w ii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekufki _ liilightuusagh t _ q aat ke ng ngun ghi t aten _ . _ yeghlegi _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte i stekau te n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ liilightuusagh ngllagh a _ , _ nanqigte i sigh u luki _ atuqe aqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ sang an Ê¼ ng am _ nan qig si gu _ yug lgute n _ ? _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ , _ naafqe i yaghqagh _ .
ila si _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ unaami _ tawavek _ nuna mun _ aghulaqe lleqe unga _ . _ Tam aan ll equ nga _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ mani ngllagh lleqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallukagh i _ unaami _ sa lleghqagh i _ ! _ talwa _ nallukagh i _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale kaghqagh a _ . _ unguvallegh i _ tan- squghhagh u uq _ , _ ag ep s ugh r ug g agh es tun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute kayug _ .
itupill _ whaten _ pi aqe tek _ , _ " _ Atan ghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ unguva kestagh lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ apeghiigh te aqe lleqe ukut _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ aangaayugte lleqe usi llu _ q an ang ull equ si llu _ . _ tamaakut _ aangaayugte llegh t _ seghleghu ut _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liisimake ghngaaghmigu _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ , _ seghlegh q eng ngu uq _ .
nagate tek _ ak l ung il ngugh ni _ ! _ qiya kestagh tek _ , _ iilqe kestagh tek _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh naqngu usi _ .
aklungi si _ aghu ma ut _ , _ aate kasi _ m o t h -em _ negh ma ai _ .
G o l d - e si llu _ si l v er - e si llu _ anaghtaa ma ut _ . _ anaghtaa llghite a _ ip a pi gh q en naq ng w aa _ ellng in aa yug negh u llegh si llu _ , _ pakignegh u llegh i llu _ nanqigte lleg nge gkufsi _ . _ taagken _ anaghtaa llegh m _ yugusigh si _ naafqe lleqe ai _ katam _ ken gh es tun _ . _ qaywa _ kinguligh nun _ aghnegh nun _ ll iigh ng aagh p esi _ , _ qerngughte i manginagh u usi _ wata _ aklungi igh i na lusi _ .
talwa _ akileghtugh llghite asi _ qep ghagh te si _ unatagh ke aat _ piitesigh u aghagh vig gpesini _ . _ nagate ki _ akuz il g all ghi t _ . _ Atan ghem _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi tegh llag em _ nagaqugh ma ai _ akilghuu llegh it _ .
Kiyagh taa llegh pesi ni _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ aklungitu te gpesineng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyukekagh i _ allgegh taqagh i _ ef qugh h nal usi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe usi _ . _ penniigh t _ q ug il i sigh at _ nalluke aat _ qantaghaqun _ tuqute lleghqagh eng _ . _ N all uk es teg gu u _ qantaghaqun _ Atan ghem _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ ?
elpesi u ut _ nanqigte i ste ikagh t llu _ tuqute i ste ikagh t llu _ anaggute ma ite ngugh neng _ yug neng _ , _ ellngit a _ ayag qligh u mangite aisi _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ qelanegh gpenasi _ kenlanga _ Atan ghem _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh anun _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh a _ usputagh qite ggu _ . _ nuna mi _ piitesigh u aghagh luni _ qelanegh yukagh gpenani _ utaqa i aqe uq _ uksaagh m llu _ u pen gh aam llu _ es l all u w aneng _ nagu ste i kayug meng _ piite yaghqagh neng _ .
elpek si llu _ qelanegh neghllug te k _ neghyu manginagh lusi _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh uq _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ segh l equ ugh pen ak i _ ila si _ enkaam _ Atan ghem _ nan qig g negh ill i si _ . _ ellnga u uq _ nanqigte i sta _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh lghii _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ neqamike luki _ u uk nal iq is tet _ akuzikagh t _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ . _ usputagh qite ki _ qelanegh gpenateng _ nuqete neghtu luteng _ ikfiqe llegh mi _ pikagh t _ .
quya nga na iqe aput _ u uk nal iq is tet _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghmeng _ paninang _ neghyuke manginagh kaqe aat _ atanegh _ . _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ J o b -em _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ , _ quya ste llegh a llu _ atanegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh a _ alpag yan _ . _ enkaam _ J o b - kun _ Atan ghem _ liite ste aisi _ nafughtagh llegh mineng llu _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng llu _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ apegh naqe kegka _ una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ . _ akeqe i negh gpesini _ , _ akeqe i gpenasi _ qilag kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ pi yaghqaa kufsi _ legan _ aa ng Ê¼ gh h aa si _ , _ pi yaghqaa nghite kufsi _ legan _ nak aagh h aa si _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe teki _ akequsagh si _ , _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atan ghem _ nanqigte naanghite aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
kina _ akule gpesini _ ikfiqe u a _ ? _ yughagh li _ . _ kina _ quya nga a _ ? _ ilagagh li _ usuqe i llegh meng _ .
kina _ q in uy u w aa _ ? _ tuqlugh liki _ El d er - et _ enkaam _ yughagh te kete litgu _ mesiighqellug qu _ ategh akun _ Atan ghem _ .
yughagh llegh m _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ naallghute yaghqaqe a _ qinuyug lghii _ yuug _ . _ enkaam _ Atan ghem _ yug un q w uugh tes neq ig lleq aa _ , _ seghleghqe llegh i llu _ seghevute lleqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apegh aqe luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ ila gpesinun _ , _ y ugh aat ku tu taq l usi _ naa llgh u te ll eng es qell usi _ . _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ yug m _ yughagh llegh i _ iknaqe ghllag ut _ , _ allgegh te kayugu ut _ .
elijah _ yugu uq _ whangkutestun _ ayuq el g ii _ . _ Taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte ma ite ngughk _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh _ ilate luku _ .
taagken _ alla _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte yalghiimi _ nuna _ piite ste ikagh _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ni _ , _ una _ kinguligh u uq _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ . _ naligh i _ ugpeqe i nanigh kan _ apeghtuusagh pig neng _ , _ kitum _ kayusigh ligu _ ugpeqe i nqigte llegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kunigu _ yug ul is l eq aa k _ seghlegh q es te m _ unguva te zikek _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ segh u v ull eq ii _ taa m _ seghlegh q es te m _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag i _ .
ukut _ lata t _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ ap o s t l e- ng aneng _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ yug nun _ aghulaqe uute stekagh t _ P o n tu s - mun _ , _ G al at i a- mun _ , _ C ap p a d o c i a- mun _ , _ A si a- mun _ , _ B it h y n i a- m un llu _ .
neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ pelungighsagh kaqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uk _ q aat ku tes qell usi _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ , _ uk mang iigh tes qell usi llu _ aaw akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi nun _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ ! _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ allgegh nqigte ste ainkut _ unguv agh te llegh m i kun _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Taa m _ sighima lleg nge ste ghllag ainkut _ n all un eq n iil ngugh meng _ .
enkaam _ utaqa u aput _ pi liite yaghqagh put _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kangi _ yug minun _ . _ aflengake u ai _ qilag mi _ elpesi nun _ enkaam _ aghu naanghite ut _ , _ naave naanghite ut _ , _ gheve naanghite ut llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ p aq n iigh sagh lleq ii si _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ ken l et gh uu te llegh mi _ aliigh lleqe a _ yuguligh llegh _ y at aghq egk aq _ elpesi nun _ .
Taa m _ quya ma ste aisi _ , _ qaywa _ maaten _ natengiighhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ segh l el iigh yagh ng aagh p esi _ .
tamaakut _ seghlegh ligh u aaghet _ nanghiiqu sigh u ut _ ip a pi gh q en nal usi _ ugpeq ill ep iil g ut si _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii nguq _ g o l d - n neng _ . _ G o l d - et _ nanghiiqu nghmegteki _ kenegh kun _ naafqe kayugu ut _ . _ paninang _ ken gh et _ atuqe aqe ait _ pelungigh na luki _ . _ Taw at egh pig aq _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ nanghiiqu yaghqaa uq _ . _ aghula i uute kan _ pelungite luni _ , _ all g egh lleq agh si _ usuqe llegh _ , _ n igh ugh qell eq _ , _ qu ul v all eq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aliightekagu _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ .
esghagh igate ghngaaghpesigu _ pinighkagh i _ , _ esghagh nghite ghngaaghpesigu _ maaten _ ugpeqagh i _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu usi _ repall _ aap gh waagh pag n ing it agh si _ ang tal anga _ quya llegh gpesi _ ,
qayughllak _ all g egh teng ng uk esi _ yuguligh llegh a _ unguva sigh gpesi _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ apallugh a _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ Christ- akun _ .
neghigh luku _ u uk nal iq is tet _ lii g ik ng waagh naq egk aq aat _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aat _ tunusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ elpesi nun _ .
taghneghagh kek _ Christ- am _ u uk nal iq is tet _ il ung it n it kaa gu k _ . _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe ai _ ikfiqe lleghqagh aneng _ Christ- am _ , _ qu ul v all eng ell egh qagh llag an eng llu _ ikfiqe llegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ enkaam _ u uk nal iq is tet _ liigike naqutke kaqe aat _ kina u yaghqaa ta a _ Christ- a _ , _ qakun llu _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ u uk nal iq is tet _ liigike stekaqe ai _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ellngit nun _ pi u nghite ni luki _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi u ni luki _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kayagtekau uk _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga n _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh akun _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipaate kaqe aisi _ tamaaken _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ liigike yu pigtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ .
En kaa ng am _ umyugagh si _ apegh iigh sagh waagh luki _ ayuqe teki _ sa lleghqagh mun _ . _ umyugagh si _ wh at egh ll u waagh ul uki _ , _ sighimake u aghte ggu llu _ tunusagh _ yuguligh lleg nge llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ tagi kan _ .
qaatke te lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gpenaki _ seghlegh t _ piyuke lleg si _ atuqe u yagh kesi _ . _ tawatete yagh usi _ nalluke te gpesineng _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh an _ ayuqe ta a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nak m ik es te z i _ , _ pelungitu ta aneng _ elpek si llu _ pelungi tek _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ pelungi tek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ pelungite unga _ . _ "
yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata ke niighkagh i _ . _ nanqigte aqe a _ a tu neng w aaq _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ s all egh tu l ng a tun _ . _ enkaam _ tallugh ke teggu _ nunatagh ma lusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
liisimakagh i _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghtekau usi _ sasii gpenasi _ katam _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ taagken _ sasii nghite ngugh meng _ kiyagh taa llegh meng _ . _ tukfigh llghite aisi _ silver- meng _ nalighmeng _ g o l d - meng _ naave kayug meng _ ,
iwernga _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ megnu nagh pigte lghii meng _ aaw aneng _ Christ- am _ . _ ellnga _ pen n iigh agh agh tun _ ayuqe uq _ s all wh aagh h iil nguq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ Christ- a _ talwa _ sivungagh ni _ nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ . _ maaten _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aliightekaqe a _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ .
Christ- akun _ ugpeqagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ ellnga n _ unguv agh tek aqaa _ Christ- a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ qu ul v agh ll ak aq aa llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ sighima llegh i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ .
qaatke te llegh kun _ ip a pi gh qell egh mun _ p el ung igh tek aq a si _ unguva sigh si _ , _ enkaam _ pin iq ep iig a si _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ . _ piniqe te kestagh tek _ ilu gpesineng _ qamaken _ .
allgegh nqigtekau usi _ . _ unguvalleghraghagh i _ tuqu kayug meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ allgegh nqigtekau usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta itgun _ , _ unguva lghiit _ , _ kenle ite ngugh t _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ vegaagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ pinighnagh llegh i llu _ pii te si ghagh es tun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ vegaagh t _ paligh aqe ut _ , _ piitesighagh at llu _ ifkagh aqe ut _ ,
iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ qu un pe k aghq aag ut _ . _ " _ Taa ku s ta _ akuzite t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kangit _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ taaqe teggu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqekagh i _ . _ iqlengiqe nanigh tek _ , _ pin ii yug g nan igh tek _ , _ aqina nanigh tek _ , _ segh l equ ugh un nan igh tek lu _ .
allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug aqe ut _ . _ ellngistun _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug tek _ p el ung il ngugh meng _ taghneghagh m _ mamagh aneng _ . _ A ng tan ii tes l eq aa _ yuguligh llegh i _ ,
qayughllak _ naa s iigh agh si _ Atan ghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tagi tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ ellnga _ unguva lghii u uq _ uyghag _ . _ yug t _ ighsakekagh at _ s as iin ghi l ngugh es tun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ megnu nagh luku _ .
elpek si llu _ unguva lghii stun _ uyghag stun _ ayuqe usi _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ nekefte sigh ke lisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Q ep gh aa lleq agh si _ aaftekau lusi _ p r i es t- et _ tuune i lghiit _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ aghqe te t _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ .
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ Z i o n - mi _ nekegte aqe aqa _ megnu nagh lghii _ uyghag _ ; _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ nakmikegkagh ka _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii _ ellnga neng _ kayngumiqe naanghite uq _ . _ "
taana _ uyghag _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ wh ate l ngu ug uq _ , _ " _ taana _ uyghag _ mang tegh angll agh tet _ ighsakekagh at _ , _ kangighagh m _ uy gh ak aagh sim akanga _ . _ "
amalleqa _ , _ " _ Taa m _ uyghag m _ yug t _ naagte ste aqe ai _ , _ iqu ste aqe ai llu _ . _ " _ naagte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta anun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ yug ni _ nakmike kau usi _ , _ umiileg m _ p r i es t- ek ii si _ , _ aaftekau usi _ yug ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ yug ke aisi _ . _ nakmike kau usi _ aap gh es qell uki _ all aagh ll u wh aat _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ tagsigh ikagh _ elpesi neng _ mamleg ghllag meng _ ellmi _ katam _ all aagh ll u wh agh mun _ nighug minun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke nghite yagh aisi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ yug liite ma aisi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ n all uk sagh agh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ all g egh sim aagh si _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ nunatagh u usi llu _ allaneghtagh u usi llu _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ enkaam _ kayeme amsi _ ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh an _ pi ll u w aa ng w aa _ unguva sigh i _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte tek _ akule itni _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ , _ luuraq _ ellngit a _ seghletun _ pi ste u ni na yu kangisi _ . _ esghagh kumegteki _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg si _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ aghnegh ani _ Christ- am _ tagi llegh an _ .
atanegh _ apallugh ke luku _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ k av em em _ iglegh ut is teng it nun _ . _ qaatke te lusi _ umiileg mun _ ; _ ellnga u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ igleghte te i sta _ .
qaute kete luki llu _ iglegh ut is tet _ ; _ umiileg m _ agh y uu ghi yaq leg ugh tes taq ii _ seghletun _ pi s t en un _ , _ us uq iy aq legh ugh tes tek aq ii llu _ pinitun _ pi s t en un _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ n ep iigh tes qell uki _ n all u uq at _ tem ng it wh ameng _ akuzite lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ iteme nga lghii stun _ iwernga _ iteme nga llegh i _ atuqe fqaan _ seghlegh mun _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ qep ghagh te l aagh ul usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Q u ul v agh luku _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ , _ piniqe luki _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ , _ alike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qu ul v agh lu ku llu _ umiileg _ .
elpek si _ qep ghagh te l aagh ni _ qaatke utek _ pi lii tes teg pesi nun _ s ii v ak ell el igh l usi _ . _ qaatke gpenaki _ nangllegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ umyugaqegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke aqe teki llu _ amyuqetagh lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke aqe aisi _ sumeghmike nghpesigu _ ellnga _ ikfiqe u lusi _ sa meng _ sapiglleghhiistun _ .
iwernga _ suflughsi ma kufsiki _ q ev ut qu ll esi _ , _ seghletun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ usuqe naanghite aisi _ . _ N aq am en r aq _ suflughsi ma kufsigu _ ikfiqe llegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke lleqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ s u f l ugh tes qell uki _ ikfiqe llegh t _ qayughllak _ Christ- am _ ikfiqe tke kaqe aisi _ . _ ikfiqe llegh a _ usputagh u uq _ elpesi nun _ maligte sqellug qu _ .
ellnga _ seghleghqe igate uq _ , _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ .
S egh l equ ull eng aq ng ami _ akite mangite ai _ . _ ikfiqe aqngami _ akeqsagte mangite ai _ . _ itupill _ neghyuke te kau uq _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte i kayug mun _ elqughaghte luku _ .
Christ- am _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aglagh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ yugusigh mig ke luki _ qaquuragh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqu ng as qell uta _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ unguv as qell uta _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ . _ kiitigh qu llegh akun _ naallghute kau usi _ .
penniigh stun _ aghulaqe aatagh lghii stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ uteghnigh ma usi _ P en n iigh n iigh te mun _ K el eng ak is teng anun _ unguva sigh gpesi _ .
elpek si _ ugiighkagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatke te lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ . _ ila i _ nuliigh leg t _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqagh ughte na yu kata _ sa meng _ pi nghite ghngaaghpesiki _ ,
qayughllak _ esghapag kangat _ pelungi tun _ kiyagh taa llegh si _ , _ alike i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
nuyagh kegte yagh llegh m _ , _ ull ng aq ell ghem _ g o l d - meng _ , _ aarragh llegh m _ pinighnaghsigh igate ai _ ilu si _ .
itupill _ pinighnagh tek _ ilu gpesigun _ qu s ev eg ll el igh l usi _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi llu _ . _ Taw ate l nguq _ pinighnagh llegh _ qu un pe k aghq aag uq _ , _ megnu nagh ghllag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ , _ aghnagh t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pinighnaghsagh kayugu ut _ ilu megteggun _ , _ qu s ev eg ll el igh luteng _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh luteng llu _ . _ neghyuke kaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke kaqe ait llu _ ugi teng _ .
sarah _ tawatete kau uq _ ! _ qaatke kaqe a _ abraham _ , _ at an q en n ik aq aa llu _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ panike aisi _ pinitun _ pi ma kufsi _ , _ alinge igate kufsi llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ .
elpek si llu _ nulighhtuqagh ni _ kiyaghute ki _ nula isi _ liigike luki _ nateghtu langi _ qayughllak _ kayaate aghagh ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ Q u ul v agh luki _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ atunem _ all g egh s aghq aq agh si _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ s aam _ alngunak _ pillgilliqe naanghite ai _ yughagh lleg si _ .
Taa q n igh naq an ka _ sa meng _ pi llgh en ka _ whaten _ : _ qamagte lusi _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghnegh lgute k _ , _ aqniqe te utek _ , _ piniqe utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ , _ nanglleg ke te utek _ , _ qusevegte te utek _ .
yug t _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ , _ nalighmeng _ segh l equ uq ang i si _ akite gpenaki _ segh l equ ugh meng _ . _ itupill _ akite ki _ quya ste llegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ tawaten _ pi s qell usi _ elpesi nun _ all g egh tes qell uku _ quya ste i lleg ni _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ll ghi s tun _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ quya nga lghii meng _ unguvallegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ quya ma lghii neng llu _ aghnegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ seghletun _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ , _ iqlengiqe nanigh li llu _ .
seghletun _ pi nanigh luni _ , _ pinitun _ pi li _ . _ N ek eg g m en naq l un illu _ kiyaghte li _ ,
qayughllak _ Atan ghem _ esghapag u ai _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ nagate aqe ai llu _ yughagh llegh it _ . _ iwernga _ Atan ghem _ teng v i mun _ ayuqe ai _ seghletun _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
kitum ngam _ aqnigh lleqe isi _ sagiqe u kufsi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ ?
iwernga _ ik f iq egh ng aagh p esi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ quya ste lleg nge lleqe usi _ . _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ sumeghyali gpenasi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ manigugh aqe teggu _ Christ- a _ Atan gh ul uku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ aaptegkangisi _ sighima llegh meng _ il ug pesi n il ngugh meng _ quunpeng _ liigike natu te _ k ii m sigh yaq leg g iin aa w aq i tek i _ .
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqe teki _ qu s ev eg ll el igh l usi _ , _ sii vag ke igh lleg ligh lusi _ . _ seghleghqe nghite kufsi _ umyugagh si _ seghleghni naanghite ut _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ segh l equ uq ang i si _ pinitun _ kiyaghte llegh gpesineng _ Christ- akun _ , _ kayngu yug lleqe ut _ tawaten _ akuzillegh meggneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi y uk el q eng ng uk ag u _ ik f iq es qell usi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ taana _ itagnagh aghagh uq _ ikfiqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ .
Christ- a _ tuqu kau uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ apallugh ke luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ seghlegh q es tet _ tagite na luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yugusigh a _ tuqute kau uq _ iwernga _ taghneghagh kek _ unguv agh te kaa gu k _ .
enkaam _ taghneghagh u luni _ ungipagh yaghtugh kau uq _ taghneghagh nun _ an u sim ing ll aghv ig m el ngugh nun _ .
Taa ku nguut _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyagh teng ngu luku _ . _ noah _ ar k - eng ll aa luku _ kiyaghnegh _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh nun _ av utegh q es qell uki _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu llgagh inagh t _ yug t _ itegh luteng _ ark- mun _ yug ul i kaa g ut _ megh kun _ .
T aan ang u uq _ megh _ uspute aq _ paaptaaye llegh mun _ yuguligh i lghii _ elpesi neng _ maaten _ unguv agh te llgh akun _ Jesus _ Christ _ . _ paaptaaye llegh _ iqangigh sigh u nghite uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ itupill _ paaptaaye llegh kun _ akeqe i ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ umyugagh mnneng _ seghleghni ite ngugh meng _ .
Jesus _ Christ- a _ qilag mun _ mayugh luni _ aghenqignegh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte te u ai _ qamagte luki _ yaquleg t _ , _ qilag m _ iglegh ut is teng i _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh et lu _ .
ikfiqe kau ta aneng _ Christ- a _ yugusigh mikun _ elpek si llu _ yataaghqe tek _ ikfiqe yaghqaa lusi _ Christ- a tun _ , _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ yugusigh mikun _ ikfiqe lghii _ seghleghqe sug nanigh ma uq _ .
enkaam _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ malighqutagh ke gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lqinagh usi _ q aat ku si g al ngugh es tun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ whaten _ pi kau usi _ : _ seghleghnagh pigte luku _ atuqe te kayugu yagh usi _ , _ qiliigh ke te aqe lusi _ , _ suume uute aqe lusi _ , _ q er ngugh u tu ll usi _ uglagh pestaagh t _ seghlegh t _ atuqe aqe luki _ , _ neqenghaghqete lusi _ , _ meghe uute ghllag lusi _ enkaam _ al ngun as egh agh llag ugh taq usi _ , _ manigugh kaqe asi llu _ iinghutekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
kiyaghte nanigh lghiisi _ ugpeq aanghi l ngugh es tun _ , _ liigike igate aat _ sangan _ ilate nanigh u tsi _ seghletun _ kiyagh taa llegh meg g nun _ , _ enkaam _ segh l equ ugh aq ii si _ .
iwernga _ salleg teng _ ell meg g neng _ katam _ apegh yaghqaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nan qig t iy aq leg g iin agh mun _ unguva lghii neng llu _ tuqukagh neng llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ talwa _ tuqukagh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ nanqigtekau ut _ unguva u luteng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ ellngit nun _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh it _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte llegh atun _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ken l et gh u us agh tugh tuq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wh at egh ll u waagh ul uki _ umyugagh si _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ yughagh yaghqaa lusi _ yughagh lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ una _ : _ pin i qu te pii g l usi _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh m _ seghevute ste aqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag t _ .
U p ugh an gh ul usi _ qikeghte qugh fqaafsi _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ allgegh te kau usi _ tunusagh neng _ atughqagh meng _ ila gpesinun _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ tunusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi si _ atuqe aqe teki _ pinitun _ .
tunusagh leg t _ akuz i mun _ akuzi lit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ tunusagh leg t _ qep gh h aat i mun _ qep gh h aat il it _ iknaqe lleg ligh luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ Jesus _ Christ- akun _ . _ ellnga n _ pikagh ak _ n igh ugh qell eq lu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi lleq lu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ quupkagh gpenasi _ seghleliigh ghrukutaagh ghllaget _ kaate kangisi _ nanghiighsaghagh na lusi _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg si _ all ak aa y ag un ghi tut _ .
itupill _ quya tek _ ilate lghiisi _ Christ- am _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ quy ang agh llag es qell usi _ n igh ugh qell gha _ aliightekan _ .
S egh l equ uq ang i si _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghte u ma llegh i _ Christ- amun _ , _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ n igh ugh q eng ng alghii k _ kiyagh teng ngu uk _ elpesi ni _ .
ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ , _ ikfiqe gpenasi _ yugte aghte u lusi _ , _ tegleg nigh ughte u lusi _ , _ seghletun _ pi ste u lusi _ , _ nalighmeng _ yanutqu ste u lusi _ .
N aq am en r aq _ ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ Chris t i an - ngu teg pesi neng _ , _ kayngu yug gpenasi _ iwernga _ usuqe nakesi _ kiyaghnegh _ atigh kangisi _ Christ- am _ ategh aneng _ .
nanqigte i lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ sivuke luni _ piinligh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ neng ll ug ut ang akun _ . _ piinligh naqngu kan _ whangkutgun _ , _ s all eq an Ê¼ ng am _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ll ghi s tun _ , _ " _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pegnem _ yug ul i kaa ku y eng _ , _ av el gh a si ng w aal ghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ seghlegh q es te t lu _ n at en Ê¼ ng am _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe aat _ ? _ "
En kaa ng am _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe lghiit _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ elqughute luteng _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ neghyuke te lleqe ait llu _ unguva sigh teng _ ataa s iigh m el ngugh mun _ U l im agh is te mun _ .
sa meng _ piighhe yug anka _ El d er - et _ y ugh aghv ig pesi n il nguut _ . _ whanga llu _ El d er - ngu unga _ , _ esghapag kaqe kegka llu _ Christ- am _ ikfiqe llegh a _ , _ ilate yaghqaa unga llu _ Christ- am _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagu _ .
enkaam _ qelegh yug amsi _ El d er -en i _ whaten _ : _ pennagh igh nigh ughte u tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ penniigh itnun _ ; _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ elpesi nun _ af l eng ak es qell uki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ aflengake yu kesi _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi sqe sug aisi _ . _ aflengake teki _ nakaan _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na lusi _ , _ iwernga _ qayughllak _ kayusigh yug u kesi _ .
agghi te kaqe gpenaki _ aflengake gkasi _ , _ iwernga _ malig s ug n aghq i tek _ ellngit nun _ .
enkaam _ I g legh ut is teng at _ P en n iigh n iigh tet _ tagi kan _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ pinighnagh pigte lghii meng _ qaghpa meng _ qelmegh i uute yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
Taw at egh pig aq _ elpek si _ uyuqligh ni _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ siivanllegh nun _ . _ qamagte lusi _ qu s ev gu tu ll usi _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kipullegmun _ ayuqe ai _ q uk aa yug negh et _ , _ iwernga _ kayusigh aqe ai _ qu s ev eg ng alghiit _ . _ "
En kaa ng am _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qu s ev eg ng a tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi tegh llag mun _ . _ taagken _ qu ul v agh lleq ii si _ nakmikegkagh mini _ aghneghmi _ .
qamagte luki _ sumeghyali tke gkasi _ pegte ki _ ellnga nun _ , _ qayughllak _ aflengake u aisi _ .
liisima lusi _ , _ kelenga lusi _ . _ anguyag i _ tughneghagh _ iglegha u uq _ ugini lghii tun _ l i o n - e tun _ , _ ivagh i aqe uq _ kina _ naa f q en nal uku _ .
ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ ay ep s ug il ngugh qun _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ liisimake luki _ ugpeq aal gu te si _ nun at aghh aan il nguut _ tawaten _ ellngit llu _ ikfiqe u ut _ .
iwernga _ natengiighhaq _ ikfiqe llegh gpesi _ kingu aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pin iq ing agh llag em _ tea- ma anun _ , _ ellnga n _ katam _ nallghusagh u lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ ik naq ugh sagh lleq ii _ , _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ , _ aghul iil k aagh tes l eq ii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ Christ- akun _ il a tes qell usi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aange llegh ghllag minun _ .
qamagte luku _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eq _ ellnga n _ pi ke aa _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
silas _ ataa s iigh m el ngu ug uq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ ; _ igagh te aqe aanga _ takestaaghhagh tgun _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ . _ lata nka _ kiyaghnegh m _ pin i qell ep iig aneng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ ungipaate amsi llu _ kayeme amsi llu _ kiyagh tek es t ii s qell usi _ piniqe llegh ani _ .
U g peq aal gu te si _ B a b y l o n - m el nguut _ , _ elpesi stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ . _ ellngit a llu _ , _ eight- nghma llu _ M ar k -em _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh llegh kun _ Christ- am _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ nekeggmellegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ Christ- am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ .
ukut _ lata t _ simon _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Q ep ghagh te kaa ng allu _ , _ ap o s t l e- kaa ng allu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ allgegh tekagh ni _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ A ll g egh tek aq agh put _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ elqughutngagh llegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ , _ Kiyagh neq eg ke f ut lu _ Yug ul i ghi s tek eg ke f ut lu _ .
piniqe llegh nkuk _ nekeggmellegh nkuk _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi ni _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh llu _ Jesus - lu _ atanegh ut _ .
Jesus _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh qun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ak l uk egk am n neng _ kiyagh tes qell uta _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu luta _ . _ tamaakut _ all g egh tek aq ap ut _ qayughllak _ lii simak eg ke f ut _ Jesus _ . _ tuqlugh ainkut _ il a tes qell uta _ qu ul v all egh min un llu _ pinigh llegh minun llu _ .
Agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh m i kun _ , _ Jesus-em _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ akequsagh mineng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii neng llu _ pi vag na pigte lghii neng llu _ . _ tamaagun _ akequsagh tgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ste lleqe aisi _ nangaghnegh minun _ . _ taagken _ an ag yaq leg ugh lleq a si _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nun am el nguut _ naa f q ii yaq leg et _ elpesi neng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ n ang aghn el it k aq ut ang aneng _ elpek si _ , _ taa ku ng in aghh aag neng _ pi naq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ ilate ki _ ukut _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ pinigh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ liisima llegh _ ,
liisima llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ n uq e tu t ill eq _ , _ n uq e tu t i llegh pesi nun _ ilate ggu _ aghul iil kaa m all eq _ , _ aghul iil kaa m ell egh pesi nun _ ilate ggu _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh _ ,
kiyaghnegh yug neghtu llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ n angll e ku tu te ll eq _ ugpeq aal gu teg pesi nun _ , _ n angll e ku tu te llegh pesi nun _ ilate ggu _ piniqe llegh _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe u kufsiki _ , _ nula stekufsiki llu _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ atughqagh u lusi llu _ kayute kaghqagh u lusi llu _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ , _ amugtagh pigte uq _ enkaam _ esghaatepagningite uq _ . _ puygu kaqe a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangigh kaqe kanga _ seghleghqe lleqe yagh ka aneng _ .
En kaa ng am _ ugpeq aal gu tem ni _ , _ n all un eq n iigh waagh teg gu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ nakmike kaqe aisi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ taawa _ iqiteqaghte naanghite usi _ Christ- ameng _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyake sigh ke ghllag lusi _ itegh ste lleqe aisi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ atanegh mta llu _ Yug ul i ghi s tem t allu _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ .
qaywa _ liisimake ghngaaghpesiki _ taakut _ ip a pi llgh et _ , _ sagiqe te u ghngaaghpesiki llu _ qaute kete na luki _ , _ iiwleng _ neqangugh lleqe amsi _ taa ku neng _ ip a pi llegh neng _ elpesi nun _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ .
sume mni _ itagnagh uq _ negh ka ughte aatagh kumsi _ tam aa ku neng _ unguva u lunga _ .
liisimake aqa _ tuqu yaghtugh unga _ qayughllak _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe aanga _ .
pi naqe llegh ka _ qamagte luku _ apeghtugh amsi _ tamaaken _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh ma _ kingu aneng _ neqagh te aqe lleqe asi _ .
atuqe mangite aput _ pegh q in iq ut ng waagh luki _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ apegh aqe yamtekek _ elpesi nun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh allu _ tagi llegh a llu _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ- am _ . _ whangkuta _ katam _ iy egh ll u w aam n neng _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ellnga n _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
Jesus-em _ all g egh taq ng ag u _ qu ul v all eq lu _ n igh ugh qell eq lu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe a _ me a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ Q ul igh pig aal ghii _ N igh ugh q eng ng agh llak _ . _ ata m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ U n ang u uq _ piniqe pigtegkegka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigtegkegka _ . _ "
whangkuta _ whang kun neng _ katam _ nag at k aq agh put _ me _ qilag meng _ Jesus - m e taq ng am ta _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ naayghagh mi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whang kun ni _ n all un eq naq r ag g ii tut _ u uk nal iq is tet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ipa u ta i _ . _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lleqe ut _ s um egh tagh aat ke ng ng w aa qu f si k i _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ kenegh lghutagh m _ kuukgute llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ mamleg mun _ . _ tawatete kestagh tek _ kenlanga _ Christ- am _ tagi lleghqagh an _ aghnegh anun _ . _ taagken _ nighug a _ kuukgute lleqe uq _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ un aa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh atun _ ayuqe luni _ .
L iig ik ng waagh yaghq aq agh si _ una _ : _ kitum _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ liigikepagningite ai _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ A ku z it n il nguut _ igaqegkagh ni _ .
U uk nal iq is tet _ nakmike mangite ait _ uuknaliqe te kete yaghqagh teng _ . _ itupill _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ u uk nal iq is tet _ akuz i te l it k aq ii _ akuz is qell uki _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ u uk nal iq is tes iigh waagh et _ aku l ng it n is agh tut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ katam _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ aku leg pesi n ill equ t _ . _ nallu negh gpesini _ apeghtugh lleqe aisi _ iq l eng ameng _ naa f q en nal uki _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ . _ qaywa _ Christ- am _ P il ii tes teng it a _ tukfigh kaqe ghngaisteng _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ pik nan igh lleq aat _ . _ enkaam _ n u us k ag an _ ell meg g neng _ naafqe ste lleqe ut _ .
yug lghute t _ maligte te lleqe ut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh nun _ kay ngun al ghi nun _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t nun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ segh l equ ugh lleq iit _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ atugh put _ .
P ak ig te llegh meg teg gun _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ aklungi igh i yug lleqe ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ enkaam _ apegh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ mani nge na luteng _ elpesi neng _ . _ ima _ negh igh h aan eng _ kiyaghnegh _ N an qig t is teng at lu _ N aa f q ii s teng at lu _ qavagh igate uq _ agh y uugh yaq leg ugh ll uk illu _ ayuqe ai _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yaquleg t _ seghleghqe aqngata _ , _ iwernga _ miluute kaqe ai _ hell- mun _ . _ tawani _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ q ii p r agh u sigh ng aat _ , _ utaqa i lghiit _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyagh teng ngu luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh mangite nghite ai _ yug t _ av el gh a si ng w aa ghi k at _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ uleve stekaqe a _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ yug ul ik aqaa _ noah _ , _ ila i llu _ maaghraghvinleg _ yug t _ . _ ( _ noah _ ungipaghte u kau uq _ elqughutngagh lghii mun _ kiyagh taa llegh mun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh kaqe ak llu _ ne ghllag k _ S o d o m -en kuk _ G o m o r r a h - n kuk _ . _ naafqe kaqe ak _ kenegh kun _ kenlanga _ ashes- ngughte llegh gkenun _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh ughtekaqe ak _ sa yaghqaa ta i _ yug t _ avelghagh sighwaagh ikagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
L o t _ elqughutngagh lghii u yagh uq _ yuug _ kiyaghtekagh _ akule itni _ tamaakut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ . _ Agh h ut anga _ tamaghhagh an _ seghleliigh tke ghllag kaqe ai _ unguva sigh gmikun _ esghapag luki _ , _ nagate luki _ seghletun _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ , _ nuqete gpenateng llu _ s e x - ell ghi t _ . _ enkaam _ Atan ghem _ yug ul ik aqaa _ .
taawa _ legh igh iitagh ut _ , _ atanegh _ liisimake uq _ naten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ nan ghii gh sagh all eng en gh ata _ . _ kelengake u ai llu _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ agh y uu ll eng ell egh m el nguut _ , _ utaqa i ma luki _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ .
taana _ aghyuugh llegh _ kiyang _ tam aa ku nun _ ayuqe uq _ maligte te lghii nun _ yugusigh meng _ seghletun _ piyuke llegh ghllag itnun _ , _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh nun llu _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ tamaakut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ tetug igate ut llu _ ell m i ngu yug negh u ut lu _ . _ alinge gpenateng _ segh l equ ugh aq iit _ n igh ug r ak eg t at _ .
yaquleg t _ iknaqe aghagh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghiteaghaghte ut _ taa ku neng _ n igh ug r ak eg tan eng _ , _ paninang _ sivungagh ni _ Atan ghem _ anaggute ma ni naanghite ait _ n igh ug r ak eg t at _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ segh l equ ugh aq iit _ sa u aat _ liigike gpenaki _ . _ teghig ke sagh stun _ s um egh tagh agh pag n ing il ngu ug ut _ . _ tuqute lleg nge lleqe ut _ teghig ke sagh stun _ allgegh luteng _ tegh ig tugh luki _ tuqu tke aat _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ikfiqe ste aqe ait _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe ste lleqe ai _ . _ talwa _ aghnegh raaghinagh mi _ meghe uute ghllag aqe ut _ , _ yugusigh meng llu _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ atuqe aqe ait _ . _ kayngusaghagh te ghllag aqe ut _ neqenghaghqe lgusigh ma lusi _ , _ enkaam _ akule gpesini _ nukeggnaghqekagh stun llu _ ell m iig utk as tun llu _ ayuqe ut _ .
esghagh nghmegteki _ aghnagh t _ qiliigh ke aqe ait _ . _ seghleghqe sug neghtu ut _ iwernga _ seghleghqe lleg lghutagh nge i ta _ ke p s ugh si g at ng waagh iit _ . _ manu igh aqe ait _ yug t _ puughhe negh kegtagh t _ seghlegh q es ug es qell uki _ , _ pakignegh pigte ut llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ !
tamaakut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ ugpeqe nanigh kaqe ait _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ . _ enkaam _ aghulaqe kau ut _ B al aam -em _ pi llgh a tun _ pi na luteng _ . _ ( _ ighnegh ke yagh kanga _ B e o r -em _ . _ ) _ quya aqe uq _ yug t _ akileghtugh nghatni _ seghletun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ d o n ke y - m _ akuz ip ag n ing il ngu u m _ , _ yug m _ me akun _ ineghtekaqe a _ Balaam _ . _ enkaam _ aghula i aghtekaqe a _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sumeghnegh igh ulliqe llegh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ pateghkagh stun _ sengngugh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q ilag waagh es tun llu _ ayuqe ut _ anuqe ghllag m _ teng tek angi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te kaqe ai _ pisaghtiigh ghllag mi _ .
Agh s aagh m ik ameng _ aangaayugte aqe ut _ tem ng it wh ameng _ akuzite kete luteng _ . _ pi aqe ut _ itagnagh ni luku _ malighqutagh ke lleghqagh _ seghlegh nun _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ taaqe aqe ut llu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh meggneng _ , _ manu igh aqe ait _ tawaten _ pin qig tes qell uki _ .
A pegh tu ghi s te sigh waagh et _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ tamaakut _ yug t _ iteme nga ni luki _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyuke llegh itnun _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ iteme nga u nghite ghngaaghmeng _ . _ Q ep ghagh te l aagh u ut _ seghleghqe llegh meggnun _ enkaam _ seghleghqe llghite a _ naa f q es aq leg w ii _ . _ yuug _ qep ghagh te l aagh u uq _ alngunak _ sa mun _ ig l eq at aq il ghii meng _ ellmi nun _ .
yug t _ liite aqe yamegteggu _ atanegh ut llu _ Yug ul i ghi s te v ut lu _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ anag yaghqaqe aat _ nukeggnagh a _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ uteghnigh nqigtekumeng _ seghletun _ kiyagh taa llegh meg g nun _ uaf- ghqutagh kesi ma kumeng llu _ tam aa ku nun _ , _ taawa _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ seghlegh atagh aa yaghq aag ut _ pi yuwhaagh llegh meggneng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ lii t ng waagh luku _ agleghnagh lghii _ qelegh sagh _ all g egh tek agh t eng _ , _ tunute kaqe aat _ . _ I t aghn agh atagh aghn ay agh tut _ liite mangite yagh kumegteggu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ .
tawaten _ aneghte llghite a _ ipa ughte ste aat _ yug t _ pi llgh at _ , _ " _ qikmigh m _ uteghte vike aqe a _ mighyaghkagh ni _ , _ kurugagh llu _ ughvughqekagh _ aglagh nqigte luni _ ugh ar r amun _ m ing ugh un neq ig taq uq _ . _ "
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ ukut _ alghigh tke ai _ lata llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ tea- ma ghhagh gkenkun _ lata llegh ma _ neqangugh ste naqutke amsi _ liisimakekagh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghtaghigh sqe sug amsi _ tam aa ku neng _ ip a pi gh qell usi _ .
elpesi nun _ neqamike sug anka _ agleghnagh lghiit _ u uk nal iq is tet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ . _ neqamike sug aqa llu _ qelegh sagh _ atanegh mta _ Yug ul i ghi s te m _ aapte qugh a _ ap o s t l e- eg pesi gun _ .
L iig ik ng waagh yaghq aq agh si _ una _ : _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ leg as iigh w agh te l gu yaghq aag uq _ ; _ tam aa ku nguut _ malighqutagh ke nga lghiit _ seghlegh nun _ piyukekagh meggnun _ . _ legasiighwagh tke lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ ,
whaten _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ Jesus _ akeqe i kau uq _ tagi nqigte lleqe ni luni _ . _ naagu _ ? _ ima _ sivunegh put _ tuqu laghate te llegh itneng _ , _ paninang _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ almesiqe aqe a _ nuna m _ piinlillegh aneng _ . _ "
nakmiigh kau ut _ av el gh a si ng waagh nal uku _ una _ ip a pi ll eq _ : _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite mikun _ ulima kaqe a _ qilag a _ , _ ulima kaqe a llu _ nuna _ megh meng _ , _ megh kun llu _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh meng _ uleve ste luku _ nuna _ naafqe kaqe a _ .
iwernga _ taaggun _ akuzite kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflenga kaqe ai _ qilag a llu _ nuna llu _ naafqesaghqagh u luki _ kenegh kun _ . _ aflengake u ut _ kenlanga _ aghnegh anun _ nanqigte i llegh m _ . _ tawani llu _ aghneghmi _ naafqe lleqe ai _ yug t _ av el gh a si ng w aa ghi k at _ ellmi neng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ puygu gpenaan _ una _ ! _ atanegh mi _ aghneq _ ataasigh _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh tun _ aghnegh tun _ ayuqe uq _ .
atanegh _ egnaangite nghite uq _ akequsagh ni _ pi yaghqaa luku _ , _ ila ita _ yug t _ s um egh tagh all ghi s tun _ . _ yeghlegi _ n ek eg g m e tu taq ii si _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ifla yug u nghite kanga _ . _ itupill _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ avuteghqe sqe sug aa _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ .
iwernga _ aghnegh a _ Atan ghem _ tagi lleqe uq _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ qilag a _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ eftughuute te ghllag meng _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luteng _ q ilag am el nguut _ ken ghem _ ughug lleqe ai _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ nun am el nguut _ panegh lleqe ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ ughug yaghqaa ta itneng _ , _ elpek si _ yug ni _ n ate l ngu un aq et si _ ? _ Kiyagh taa ll esi _ pelungite lit _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ ayuqligh t _ ,
utaqa i ma lusi _ aghnegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ P in aq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ pinitun _ pi tek _ aghneq _ tagi ragkiigh sqellug qu _ . _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ ken ghem _ naafqe lleqe a _ qilag a _ , _ maatnegh m llu _ ughug lleqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ q ilag am el nguut _ .
iwernga _ whangkuta _ utaqa i u ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ . _ pi kau uq _ nutaghagh meng _ qilaga ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ nutaghagh meng llu _ nuna ngllagh lleqe ni luni _ . _ tawani _ elqughutngagh lghii inagh t _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ .
En kaa ng am _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ utaqa i ma lusi _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ pi naq ell ghagh si _ qamagte luku _ pelungi tek llu _ afkuyagh ii tek llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ esghagh ma llegh ani _ . _ N ek eg g m e tek lu _ ellnga ni _ .
sumeghmike teggu _ atanegh mta _ n uq e tu t i llgh a _ elpesi neng _ yuguligh lleg nge sqe qaghte lusi _ . _ piniqekagh mta _ ugpeq aal gu tem ta _ P a ul -em _ apegh kaqe ai _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata aqe yamisi _ peghqinellegh ligh luni _ kiyaghneghtagh meng _ .
lata tke kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qamagte luki _ lata mikun _ . _ nalighnegh i _ P a ul -em _ lata yan _ liigike neghllug u ut _ . _ yug t _ lii g ik ell ep ag il nguut _ , _ ugpeq ill ep ag il nguut _ allangughte aqe ait _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ l at ang an il nguut _ . _ tawaten llu _ pi aqe ait _ ila i _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ enkaam _ naa f q eng nguut _ ell meg g neng _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ liisimake te gpesineng _ sa aqe ta i _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ kelenga tek _ . _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga lghii nun _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ malghukli naanghite usi _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ .
iwernga _ nagnegh tek _ wataqaaghaq _ liisimake luku _ Jesus _ Christ- a _ , _ atanegh ut _ , _ Yug ul i ghi s te v ut _ , _ nagnegh tek llu _ wataqaaghaq _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ enkaam _ Christ- a _ usuqe lteggu _ , _ qu ul v aal teg gu _ maaten _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ ! _ amen _ .
taana _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ : _ nagaqughkagh ut _ , _ esghaghkagh ut _ whangkuta _ katam _ iye mnneng _ , _ esghapagkagh ut _ , _ saaftekagh ut _ iigge mnneng _ , _ t aan ang u uq _ akuzite _ unguvallegh _ .
taana _ unguvallegh _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste aqngan _ esghaqaghkagh ut _ ; _ enkaam _ whaa _ aap ghagh p ut lu _ ungipaghkagh ut llu _ elpesi nun _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ata mete yagh lghii _ , _ esghagh stekagh _ whang kun nun _ .
A ap ghagh put _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ut llu _ nagatekagh ut llu _ il a tes qell usi _ whang kun nun _ , _ ilate nga lleg mnnun llu _ ata mun _ , _ ighneghagh nun llu _ Jesus _ Christ- amun _ .
lata tke aput _ tamaakut _ quya llegh ut _ iighwigh sqellug qu _ .
una _ ungipagh _ nagaqughkagh ut _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh naqagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ Kiyaghnegh nguq _ nighug u uq _ , _ m am l ell eq r ag g ii tuq _ .
iwernga _ ilate nga ni kumta _ ellnga nun _ naqam _ paninang _ mamleg mi _ kiyagh teng ngu l uta _ , _ iqlengiqe u ukut _ , _ a tuq ig atagh p ut lu _ ip a pi gh qell eq _ .
iwernga _ nighug mi _ kiyaghtekumta _ ellnga n _ nighug mete llegh atun _ taawa _ ilate nga ukut _ ila mnnun _ , _ aaw an llu _ Jesus-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh an _ , _ uk mang ii w iin kut _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ .
seghleghqe llghite ni kumta _ p uugh teng ngu u kut _ whang kun neng _ katam _ , _ ip a pi gh qell ghi tu ku t lu _ .
iwernga _ apegh kumteki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ seghevute yaghqaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ , _ ukmangigh yaghqaqe ainkut llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ anaggute aghagh lleg mnneng _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq llu _ elqughute luni llu _ ayuqe lghii u uq _ .
seghleghqe igate ni kumta _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ iq l eng iq es teng ugh lleq agh put _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ atuqe u nghite aput _ .
