enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ , _ q aan gh egk en eng _ ken ghem _ aane luni _ tuqu qugh lleqe aik _ anguyag ik _ . _ kitum llu _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ taawa _ tuqute yaghqaaghte lleqe uq _ .
Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el g uuk _ qilag a _ es l all ug ugh nan ii s qell uku _ u uk nal i qell gh egk eg ni _ . _ Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el g uuk _ megh t _ aa w ugh tes qell uki _ . _ Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el gu uk lu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ikfiqe na lghii neng _ segh l el iigh llag neng _ , _ awen _ tawaten _ pi aqe lleqe uk _ pi y uk ell egh meg e tun _ .
apeghiigh kayek _ ungipagh nghmeng _ , _ a si l igh negh il ngugh meng _ laawaagh meng _ aane lleqe uq _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ . _ P ill u w agh lleq aa k _ enkaam _ kayaalqe gkumikek _ tuqu lleqe ak _ .
kemegkwaagh ik _ tam aan ll equ k _ tume ani _ ne ghllag m _ , _ Atan ghi ta _ qaquuragh vig ani _ . _ taana _ negh ghllag _ ategh ke uq _ S o d o m - em eng llu _ E g y p t- m eng llu _ qayughllak _ yug i _ S o d o m - egh m ii s tun llu _ E y g p t- egh m ii s tun llu _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ulu neng _ , _ nunatagh neng llu _ tagi lleqe ut _ esghagh na lukek _ kemegkwaagh ik _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ qungugh snanigh lleqe agket _ .
taake uk _ uuknaliqe istek _ ikfiqe ste i ghllag kau lghiik _ nuna m _ yug itnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ quya ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ tunqugh u lleqe ut llu _ tunute yameng _ ila meggnun _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llegh gkenun _ .
iwernga _ kingu itneng _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghnegh ni _ itegh stekagh a _ u uk nal iq is teg nun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeve yayek _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ esghagh lukek _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
taagken _ uuknaliqe istek _ nag aq ugh aa k _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh tek _ whavek _ ! _ " _ anguyag ik _ esghapag ma luki _ mayugh uk _ qilag mun _ qilawaagh kun _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ qevuute pigte luni _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ ; _ qu lagh qell gha _ ne ghllag m _ naave uq _ . _ enkaam _ seven _ t h o us an d _ yuug _ tuqu qugh aa _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag an _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ yaywaasekagh t _ kakavaatagh te ghllag luteng _ us u qu ugh taa t _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ alpag uq _ , _ iwernga _ esghaghte ggu _ pi nga yu a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ iglagtu pigte luteng _ me t _ qilag mi _ pi ut _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ nuna m _ at an egh pag ul q aagh taa k _ atanegh mta llu _ Christ- ang an llu _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ igleghte te i lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ siivanllegh t _ aqumga lghiit _ umiileg u sigh tgun _ aqumutagh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ , _ gginagh teng _ sekete luki _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ke aat _ : _ " _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ iiwleng llu _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ tugu magh an _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag n _ enkaam _ piinligh uten _ iglegh ut i mun _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ sakrite ghllag ut _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ sakraa lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ . _ tuqukagh t _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ut _ . _ akileghtugh yaghqaaghte aten _ qep ghagh te ten _ u uk nal iq is tet _ , _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yug ten _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ sii vag ke igh lghiit _ el pen eng _ , _ uk av an l e ngu ut lu _ apeghseghugh t llu _ . _ tuqu qu lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ tam aa ku nun _ tuqu quqagh neng _ yug neng _ nuna mi _ . _ "
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ qilag mete ngughk _ qelpate uq _ . _ tawani _ temple- nga ni _ esghagh agka _ ark- ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ C o v en an t- el gh ut ak ek _ . _ taagken _ nighwaagpagtagh uk _ , _ eftughtagh uk _ , _ tengngaagtagh uk llu _ kallug k _ ; _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ , _ kaftekrag ughte ghllag aa llu _ !
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ : _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ itegagh i _ tanqigh kun _ nekegte luteng _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lug ni _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ .
qumig lgu uq _ , _ igh n i yug em _ aqnighqellug qu _ lliigh aa _ , _ aane aqe llegh an _ taghnughhagh m _ aragh qugh a _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ ila a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ apeghiigh naqe lghii mun _ : _ taawa _ kavite ngughk _ d r ag o n - egh llak _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ , _ qula _ sighunegh leg _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ naa s q w i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ .
papeg mineng _ saqipeg te ai _ nuna mun _ pi ng ay ugh qell gh i _ qilaga m _ ighaleqetaagh i _ . _ taagken _ d r ag o n - a _ nekevekagh _ manu akun _ aghnagh m _ negh na luku _ taghnughhagh a _ ighni i ghesnagh kagu _ .
aghnagh _ ighnegh nge uq _ , _ igleghte te yaghqagh i _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ i r o n - meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh a _ akuqagh luku _ aglagh te aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ umiileg u sigh gkenun llu _ aqumutagh gnun _ .
aghnagh _ qimag uq _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe kanga _ nekaghqagh meng _ , _ aflengake yaghqaqe kangat _ 1 , 2 6 0 _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qilag mi _ pillugute ut _ . _ M i c h a el -en kut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pi ll u w agh aat _ d r ag o n - a _ . _ D r ag o n -en kut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pi ll u w agh iit _ M i c h a el -en kut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ ,
iwernga _ M i c h a el -en kut _ kayaalqe aat _ d r ag o n - a _ . _ enkaam _ d r ag o n -en kut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ qilag mete yaghqaa nanigh ut _ .
qilag meng _ miluute aat _ d r ag o n - egh llak _ . _ ( _ neghightagh lug _ nemeghyagh _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh _ , _ p uugh qugh te nga _ nuna m _ yug an _ . _ ) _ miluute aat _ nuna mun _ yaqulegtuumagh an _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu luni _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ whaa _ kaate ma ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh a _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ Christ- ang an llu _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ . _ salin _ tughneghagh _ miluute llghite luku _ qilag meng _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ anaggute nga na iqe ai _ ugpeq aal gu te put _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
U g peq aal gu tem ta _ kayaalqe ma ut _ aaw akun _ P en n iigh agh aam _ , _ ungipagh ke llegh megteggun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ip a pi gh qell gha _ . _ talwa _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ Christ- a _ apallugh ke luku _ .
enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ qilag mi _ , _ quya te ghllag tek _ ! _ iwernga _ seghlegh waagh un aq ngu usi _ nun am el ngugh n illu _ k ell iin il ngugh n illu _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ukig vike ma aisi _ , _ sakrite ghllagu uq _ qayughllak _ liisimake a _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghtugh uq _ . _ "
D r ag o n -em _ liigike yamigu _ nuna mun _ miluute lleg ni _ , _ malighqagh aa _ aghnagh _ ighnegh ngekagh _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tuunekagh at _ qawaagpag ghrugllag m _ yaqugh gkeneng _ tengaa sqellug qu _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ paqniite lleqe uq _ nemegh yameng _ , _ aflengake lleqe aat llu _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
taagken _ nemeghyagh m _ ughyugh te a _ megh _ kiiw stun _ ayuqe lghii _ aghnagh _ maaqute sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ nuna m _ kayusiite a _ aghnagh _ . _ nuna m _ agitaghte te luku _ tuufte a _ megh ghllag _ d r ag o n -em _ ughyugh tke a _ .
taagken _ d r ag o n -em _ ugumi yagute ghllag luku _ aghnagh _ , _ enkaam _ pi ll u w agh yagh tu ghii _ qamagte luki _ ila i _ k ing un gh i _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh itnun _ , _ ataa s iigh m el ngu ut lu _ ip all egh mun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ Jesus-em _ .
taagken _ d r ag o n - a _ nekeve uq _ kellii m _ esnagh akun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ aane lghii _ kellii meng _ . _ qula u ut _ sigh un gh i _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ . _ qamagte luteng _ sigh un gh i _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ naasqugh t _ igaqugh vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ segh l equ ul ghii meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taana _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ l e o p ar d - es ug n i tuq _ , _ itegagh i _ kaynge m _ itegagh atun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ q aan gha _ l i o n -em _ q aan gh a tun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ D r ag o n -em _ tuune a _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh min eng _ , _ umiileg u sigh gmineng _ aqumutagh gneng _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqaaghte sta llu _ ategh ni _ atuqe luku _ .
ataasigh _ naa s q wa _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ tuqute sug ni tke aq _ kiitigh luni _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ kii yagh llegh a _ maame kau uq _ . _ I ing un aghh agh meng _ nuna m _ yug ita _ saghiigha yagute luku _ maligte aat _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ manigugh aat _ d r ag o n - a _ qayughllak _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ tuune kanga _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll en i _ . _ manigugh aat llu _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ , _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ tegh i ku s all u ug tun _ ayuqe a _ ? _ kitum ngam _ pi ll u w agh lleq ag u _ ? _ "
taagken _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ akuzi yaghqaaghte uq _ . _ aangaayugte ghllag uq _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll e nguq _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luni _ 4 2 - nun _ tanqigh nun _ .
piinligh aa _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke i lleg ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ ategh aneng _ , _ kiyaghfig aneng _ , _ tam aa ku neng llu _ kiyaghte lghii neng _ qilag mi _ .
Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el it aa _ pi ll u w ii s qell uki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ kay aal q es qell uk illu _ . _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte ste ai _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ , _ yug t _ , _ ulu t _ , _ nun at aan il ngu ut lu _ yug t _ .
qamagte luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii m _ manigugh lleqe aat _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ manigugh naanghite aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ ategh it _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ pi ke ai _ P en n iigh agh aam _ , _ yug t _ tuqu tke ai ta _ .
" _ nagate tek _ , _ sigute lgu kufsi _ :
kina _ alngunak _ tugu yaghqaa kuni _ , _ tugu lleqe aat _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqute yaghqaa kuni _ savigpag kun _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat _ savigpag kun _ . _ taake uk _ whaten _ pi sigh u uk _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut llu _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ nuna meng _ aane lghii _ . _ maalghug gneng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ pen n iigh agh aam _ sigh un gh a tun _ , _ akuzi uq llu _ d r ag o n - e tun _ .
sivuligh _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ taw an ll uku _ tu ng l igh h aan _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ atuqe a _ qamagte luku _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh a _ . _ taaggun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llegh qun _ maniguute ste ai _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ sivuligh mun _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ . _ ( _ kii yagh llegh an _ tuqute sug ni tke a _ , _ iwernga _ kii yagh llegh a _ maamekagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ all aagh ll u wh agh t igh llag aat agh tuq _ , _ talwa _ qilag meng _ nuna mun _ kenegh _ ukig ste a _ yug t _ esgh aam an ghi t ni _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll e nguq _ all aagh ll u w agh t iyagh q aal uni _ taw an te llgh ani _ sivuligh m _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ . _ tamaagun _ all aagh ll u wh agh t i llegh teg gun _ puughte ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ . _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ n ang aghn eng ll ii s qell uki _ qu ul v ii s qell uku _ sivuligh _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ . _ ( _ taana _ tuqute kaayagh lghii _ savigpag kun _ iwernga _ unguvaqagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll e nguq _ aneghnegh nge ste i yaghqaa luni _ unguvallegh meng _ nangaghnegh anun _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ . _ enkaam _ nangaghnegh _ akuz iy aq leg ugh tuq _ . _ taagken _ nangaghnegh m _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ tuqu q ii s qell uki _ tamaakut _ maniguute yu nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ nalluniigh ta ii sqe ai _ n um b er - meng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghenqignegh itgun _ iig g it gun _ nalighmeng _ qagugh itgun _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh ai _ aa ng waagh ugh ngaat a _ , _ uk av an sagh ngaat a _ , _ ak l ung it egh ngaat a _ , _ ak l um agh ngaat a _ , _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi tegh ngaat a _ , _ qep ghagh te l aagh ugh ngaat a _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tukfigh i yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akike i yaghqaa nghite uq _ wetku qun _ nalluniigh lleg lgu kuni _ . _ taana _ nalluniigh lleg ke te aq _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ ategh ke a _ nalighmeng _ ategh an _ n um b er - k aa _ .
peghqinellegh leg m _ liigike naagh aa _ una _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mikun _ liigike lleqe a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ number-nga _ . _ taana _ n um b er - a _ yug mun _ ategh u uq _ , _ 6 6 6 - ngu uq _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ naayghagh mi _ Z i o n - mi _ . _ ellngan ite u te ut _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ , _ qagugh megteggun _ igaqe vikekagh t _ ategh aneng _ , _ ata an llu _ ategh aneng _ .
nagaqugh aqa llu _ me _ qilag meng _ . _ nagate kau luni _ llangaqa _ qalla atun _ meghllag t _ , _ tengngaag atun llu _ kallug m _ . _ nagate kaqe a _ me _ llangaqa _ h ar p - es tet _ ayngananga te lghii stun _ h ar p - et gun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ el d er - et lu _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ilag aat egh r agh agh meng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ ilagaate _ liite yaghqaqe nghite kanga _ iwerngaqun _ 1 4 4 , 0 0 0 _ yug t _ . _ E ll ng i nguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ul ik ii _ qu ng ang it neng _ nuna m _ yug aneng _ .
taakut _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe ma ite ngugh u ut _ aghnagh meng _ atuqe i llegh kun _ . _ maligte aqe aat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghaani _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ul ik aq ii _ akule itneng _ nuna m _ yug an _ , _ tunusagh ke yuwhaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ P en n iigh agh agh m un llu _ .
iqlengiqe igate u aghte ut _ . _ apallugh ite ut _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ tengaa lghii _ qu ul v agh p ani _ . _ apegh ai _ kenle ite ngugh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ nun at aan il ngugh nun _ yug nun _ , _ ramke nun _ , _ ulu nun _ , _ yug nun llu _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ usuqe teggu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ ! _ yug neng _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ kaawtu uq _ . _ manigugh teggu _ ul im agh ik aq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sengngugh lghii neng llu _ megh neng _ ! _ "
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ maligte a _ sivuligh _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ B a b y l o n - egh llak _ naavuma uq _ ! _ B a b y l o n -em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ s e x - meng _ w in e- e tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wine- mineng _ megheg squgh igh a _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit a llu _ seghletun _ sex _ atuqe yagute aat _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh ste lleqe ut _ . _ "
pi nga yu ak _ yaquleg m _ maligte te uq _ sivuligh gnun _ . _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ manigugh kunigu _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ , _ nangaghnegh a llu _ , _ all g egh sim aku m ig u llu _ nalluniigh llegh _ qagugh mikun _ nalighmeng _ iigge mikun _ 
megh yaghqaqe a _ wine- nga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh an _ . _ taana _ wine- a _ me ligh ma ite ngughk _ kuuvekagh _ qayuusigh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ke a _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ manigugh tke aq _ taa ku g nun _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa uq _ kenegh mi llu _ , _ sulphur- mi llu _ , _ sivu itni _ agleghnagh lghiit llu _ yaquleg t _ , _ P en n iigh agh aam llu _ .
K en ghem _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ agepsugh a _ mayugh lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ikfiqe nanigh naanghite ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtu magh an _ , _ maniguute kau te meggneng _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ , _ nangaghnegh anun _ , _ nalluniigh kau te meggneng llu _ ategh aneng _ . _ "
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh anun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng llu _ Jesus - mun _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ qilag meng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ igaqe gu _ una _ : _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ quya saghqagh u ut _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ qepghagh te ma luku _ atanegh _ ! _ " _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ quyanagh pestaagh ut _ ! _ meghnaali lleqe ut _ ughleghiigh llegh meggneng _ , _ yug t _ neqamike lleqe ait _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh it _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ qilag u aq _ , _ q il aw aghq un _ aqumga uq _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ . _ naasqugh mikun _ g o l d - meng _ qaghpa lgu uq _ , _ tugumiiqe a llu _ ipeg lghii _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ aqumga lghii _ q ilag waagh mi _ , _ " _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig n _ atuqe luku _ unatagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ unatagh lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuna m _ piite stekagh a _ un atagh yaghq aagh teng ngu uq _ ! _ "
enkaam _ qilawaagh mi _ aqumga lghii m _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ unatagh sigh ke a _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ qilag mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ ipeg lghii meng _ p ak r eg m el ngugh meng _ savig lgu uq _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ aghqefig gneng _ aflengake i ste nga _ ken gh an _ aghqefig m _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ yaquleg _ ipeg lghii meng _ p ak r eg m el ngugh meng _ savileg _ , _ " _ savig gpeneng _ kepugh ki _ g r ap es - et _ nuna m _ v in e- ng aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ g r ap es - et _ qig um aat _ ! _ "
enkaam _ y ag ul g em _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ saqipeg te a _ nuna mun _ , _ kepugh ai _ g r ap es - et _ nuna m _ v in e- ng aneng _ . _ taagken _ miluqutagh ke ai _ g r ap es -em _ qageghqugh sigh ghllag anun _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakrite vig ghllag a _ .
grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ es l at aan il ngu uk _ ne ghllag m _ . _ G r ap es - et _ qageghqugh yalghiimeng _ aa w k _ maaqe uq _ qageghqugh sigh neng _ 1 8 0 _ m il e s _ tagtale kellug qu _ , _ 5 _ feet _ uusqaghtu lleg kellug qu _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ aliigh uq _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ . _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ tagite i lghiit _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ taakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ taaqe niite tke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ meghraag kegte aq _ si q in waagh es tun _ , _ akume nga lghii _ kenegh meng _ . _ esghagh anka llu _ kayaalqe i ikagh t _ tegh i ku s all u ug meng _ , _ nangaghnegh aneng _ , _ ategh an llu _ n um b er - ng aneng _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ s aagh w agh ni _ kellii m _ , _ h ar p - el igh tu ull uteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ke ii te neng _ ellngit nun _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagagh ta aneng _ M o s es -em _ , _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ qep ghagh te nga _ ) _ , _ ilagagh ta aneng llu _ P en n iigh agh aam _ : _ " _ kaay _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ qepghagh llegh ten _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ , _ all aagh ll u wh agh llag u ut _ ! _ kaay _ , _ umiileg at _ nuna m _ yug ita _ , _ elpek _ sa llegh ten _ elqughute nga ut llu _ ipa u ut llu _ !
atanegh _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ yug t _ alike lleqe aaten _ , _ qu ul v agh lleq aat lu _ ategh n _ ! _ E ll ng in aag u ten _ agleghnagh lghii _ ! _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ nunatagh t _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aaten _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ nanqigte i llegh ten _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ ! _ "
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ qelpeghtegkangat _ temple- a _ . _ ( _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh u uq _ na _ , _ ellnga n _ yug ita _ liisimake sigh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ taw an n il uku _ . _ )
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ aanleghaate ut _ temple- meng _ k el qell uteng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ nighugh lghii meng _ , _ sakimag megteggun _ g o l d - meng _ tafsi luteng _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ unguva lghii m _ es tam aneng _ taa ku neng _ , _ g o l d - meng _ s ag n el i qu ghii _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ . _ taakut _ sagnegh t _ imigh nga ut _ s ak r aa llegh ll aag aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
T em p l e -em _ ilu a _ ag ep s ugh q aag aa _ kiyaghnegh m _ n igh ugh qell gh an eng llu _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi llgh an eng llu _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ temple- mun _ kenlanga _ maaghraghvinleg _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ ken l et gh uu te ll ghi t nun _ , _ tagi tke ait _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ .
taagken _ temple- meng _ nagaqugh aqa _ iglagtu lghii _ me _ , _ ungipaate kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ " _ kuuve yaghtugh teki _ nuna mun _ maaghraghvinleg _ sagnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag i _ ! _ "
enkaam _ sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve yaghtugh aa _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag t _ aqnighnagh pigte lghiit _ pupig t _ p iit qu u tut _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh nun _ tegh i ku s all u ug meng _ . _ Tam aa ku nguut _ manigugh tke aat _ nangaghnegh anun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kellii nun _ . _ taagken _ kellaag igh a _ aaw atun _ tuqukagh m _ yug m _ lliigh luni _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ unguva lghiit _ kellii ni _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ k iig w nun llu _ , _ sengngugh nun llu _ megh nun _ enkaam _ aaw ughte uute ut _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ igleghte te i lghii _ megh neng _ yaquleg _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ kaay _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ el pe ngu uq _ maaten _ kiyaghte lghii _ , _ el pe ngu uq _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ nanqigte i llegh ten llu _ aghyuugh i llegh ten llu _ elqughute nga ut _ .
yug t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ yug ten _ , _ u uk nal iq is te t en llu _ , _ enkaam _ megh yaghq al it aten _ aaw meng _ . _ tawaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ell meg g neng _ all g egh tek aq aat _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ aghqefig gneng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ ! _ ipa u ut llu _ elqughute nga ut llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ten _ ! _ "
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ s aghn en i _ kuuve a _ siqinegh kun _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ si q in ghem _ ken gh anun _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ .
S iq in ghem _ uguqnagh ghllag an _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ igleghte te i ste u ta aneng _ tamaavek _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag nun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ , _ usuqe nghite aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ , _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ m am legh q w aag aa _ . _ yug t _ ik f iq em _ ulu teng _ amqeghqugh ait _ .
sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ apallugh ke luku _ aqnighqe llegh meggneng llu _ pupigtaa llegh meggneng llu _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh meggneng _ .
aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ k ii w llag eg nun _ E u p h r a tes - eg nun _ . _ kiiw k _ pategh uk _ yataaghqe te na luki _ tume kaghqagh meng _ umiileg t _ tagi lghiit _ a siv agh meng _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ pi nga yu t _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ f r o g - es ug n il nguut _ . _ aane ut _ q aanghi t neng _ d r ag o n -em _ , _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ , _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh em llu _ .
taakut _ tughneghagh t _ all aagh ll u wh agh t ik ayug u f tut _ . _ aghulaqe ut _ umiileg itnun _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte na luki _ pi ll u w amun _ aghnegh ghllag ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek _ ! _ tagi u unga _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ ! _ quyanagh uq _ tegh h umalghii _ , _ aatkagh ni _ pii f teng ng waagh luki _ ayuqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte naanghite uq _ amsikagh mi _ , _ kayngusaghagh te naanghite uq llu _ tesqagani _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ qerngughte ait _ umiileg t _ A r m ag e d d o n - mun _ . _ tawaten _ H e b r e w - gh m ii s tun _ atigh llegh a _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ esla kun _ . _ temple- mi _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ iglagtu pigte luni _ me _ pi uq _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ "
taawa _ nighwaagpagtagh uq _ , _ tengngaagtagh uq _ , _ ka lli tuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ taana _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag a _ segh l ell egh pig aag uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ y ung ll agh yug g all gh aneng _ .
negh ghllag _ pellegh uq _ pi ng ay ugh qell uni _ . _ nuna t llu _ ne ghllag it _ qam ag teng ng waagh luteng _ naave uute ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ B a b y l o n - egh llag em _ seghleghqe llegh i _ . _ enkaam _ megh sta _ wine- a _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ sakrite llegh ghllag mineng _ imaqe lghii _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiighqagh t _ aviighute uute ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ naayghagh t _ kaave uute ut _ .
kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ 1 0 0 _ uqigtutka vzigh lghiit _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh _ apallugh ke luki _ kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ . _ taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ seghlegh pigu lghii _ .
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ , _ taa ku neng _ ataasigh m _ taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ apegh segh uu m _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ aqumga lghii _ meghllag tgun _ .
nuna m _ umiileg i _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ atuqe aqe luku _ aghnagh _ . _ seghlegh t _ atuqe i ste i llegh i _ w in e- e tun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug i _ suume aqe ut _ megh nghmegteggu _ wine- nga _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ T aghnegh ag ne kun _ aglagh te aanga _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tawani _ esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ aqumga lghii _ kavirrakegtagh kun _ tegh i ku s all u ug kun _ . _ T egh i ku s all uuk _ igaqugh vike nga uq _ uzimun _ sa ngugh ughte sigh neng _ ategh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh lgu uq _ , _ qule u ut llu _ sigh un gh i _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug nga uq _ esneyaagh meng llu _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ enkaam _ ull ng aq luni _ g o l d - meng _ , _ ak i tugh llag meng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pe ar l - m eng llu _ . _ tugumiiqe a _ g o l d - a _ qayuusigh _ esleqnga lghii _ seghlegh n alghii neng _ kiyagh taa llegh neng _ , _ nukeggnagh lghii neng llu _ s e x - kun _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ .
qawaag ni _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ apeghseghugh _ Babylon _ , _ naa ke aat _ yugusigh meggneng _ akike i kayug t _ aghnagh t _ , _ seghlegh n all gh an eng llu _ nuna m _ .
esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ suume lghii _ aaw itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ aaw itneng llu _ tuqu quqagh t _ qayughllak _ ataa s iigh m el nguut _ Jesus - mun _ . _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ saghiigha yug ghllag unga _ .
iwernga _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ sangavek _ saghiigha yug ziin _ ? _ ungipaate naqe amken _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi sigh u te kek _ aghnaa nkuk _ , _ tegh i ku s all u ug en kuk _ . _ taana _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ igleghte te i lghii _ aghnagh meng _ , _ naasqugh lgu uq _ maaghraghvinleg _ , _ sighunegh lgu uq llu _ qula _ .
T egh i ku s all uuk _ esghagh kan _ unguva yagh lghii u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ mayugh lleqe uq _ S aam n ang il ngugh meng _ L aag waagh meng _ naafqe lleg nge na luni _ . _ yug lgu uq _ nuna mi _ ategh it _ igaqe llghite ngugh t _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ nuna _ piinligh llghite luku _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ saghiigha yug lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ unguva yagh lghii _ , _ tuqukagh _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh yuqagh m _ liigike lleqe a _ una _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ qemi t _ aghnagh m _ aqumga vig i _ .
taakut _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut llu _ umiileg t _ . _ tallimat _ tuqu kau ut _ , _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i u uq _ , _ enkaam _ ataasigh _ salin _ tagi igate uq _ . _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
T egh i ku s all uuk _ unguva yagh lghii _ iwernga _ tuqukagh _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite u uq _ umiileg _ . _ taana _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite a _ umiileg _ ila ke aat _ sivuligh t _ maaghraghvinleg _ umiileg t _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghtugh u uq _ .
" _ esghaghkagh ten _ qula _ sigh un gh et _ , _ qula u ut _ umiileg t _ salin _ igleghte te i igate ut _ . _ iwernga _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll eng ell equ t _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luteng _ ataasigh _ aflu _ maligte te luteng _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ .
taakut _ ataasigh _ umyugagh ke luku _ tuune lleqe ait _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll e teng llu _ pi lleghqagh teng llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ll u w agh lleq aat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ . _ iwernga _ P en n iigh agh aam _ kayaalqe lleqe ai _ qayughllak _ atanegh ke kangat _ at an gh et _ , _ umiileg ke kangat llu _ umiileg t _ . _ P en n iigh agh agh m el nguut _ tuqlugh kau ut _ , _ nakmike kau ut _ , _ ataa s iigh m el ngu ug ut lu _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ esghagh aten _ megh t _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ aqumga vig i _ . _ taakut _ megh t _ yug lghute ghllag u ut _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ ulu ke lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
esghaghkagh gpek _ qula _ sigh un gh et _ , _ tegh i ku s all u ug em llu _ , _ ugumiite lleqe aat _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ . _ S aq r ag g iigh ull uku _ , _ am si qagh qell uku _ , _ kemeg a _ negh luku _ , _ taagken _ siipnegh a _ kumagh lleqe aat _ .
taakut _ qula _ sigh un gh et _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellngit nun _ atuqe stekaqe a _ piyuke lleg ni _ . _ angeghqe ma te kau ut llu _ tuun al uki _ ataneghpag u lleg teng _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh llegh anun _ .
taana _ aghnagh _ esghagh kan _ negh ghllagu uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ umiileg itneng _ nuna t _ . _ "
Taa m _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ . _ Agh tugh yaghq aanghi ll el eg llag u f tuq _ , _ n igh ugh qell egh min eng _ ii ngun aghh aan _ nuna _ nighugte a _ .
akilghuu ghllag uq _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ naavuma uq _ B a b y l o n - egh llak _ ! _ nekagh ughte ma ut _ tughneghagh t _ , _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ kusge nagh lghiit _ qawaag t _ .
B a b y l o n -em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ s e x - meng _ w in e- e tun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nun at aghh an _ tamaghhagh an _ meghe a _ . _ nuna m _ umiileg ita _ atuqe aqe aat _ , _ nuna m llu _ ak il p eg agh teng it a _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u aat _ nuqete saghqagh u nghite ngugh qun _ s e x - kun _ atuqe i yu llegh akun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ ila a _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ yug mni _ , _ aanleghaate tek _ B a b y l o n - meng _ ! _ ilate gpenasi _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ agh y uu ll eng n ay uk af si _ ellnga nun _ maligte te lusi _ .
seghleghqe llegh i _ may- ughte ghllag nga ut _ u us qagh tu t k agh meng _ qilag tun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ seghleghqe llegh i _ .
seghletun _ pi teggu _ Babylon _ katam _ ellnga n _ seghletun _ pi llgh a tun _ . _ malghughqellug qu _ seghletun _ pi llgh a _ pi teggu _ . _ qayuusigh akun _ kuuve teggu _ wine- a _ ik naq e tu l nga _ mal gh ugh q eng ng aan _ ellnga n _ atuqe aqe ka aneng _ .
ellmi neng _ usuqe ghllag aqe uq _ , _ aklungi ghllag ni llu _ atuqe aqe a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyukekagh minun _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag teggu llu _ qivghu ste ghllag teggu llu _ atunekiite ste luku _ qaghya llegh ghllag anun _ . _ ellmi neng _ pi aqe uq _ , _ ' _ queen- ngugh u nga _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh mkun _ . _ ugingighagh u nghite unga _ enkaam _ qivghu naanghite u aghte unga _ ! _ '
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnegh ghhagh inagh mi _ kaate lleqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ qivghu llegh m _ , _ negh ke igh sag ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ ken ghem _ panegh lleqe a _ qayughllak _ aghyuugh i ste nga _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ . _ "
nuna m _ umiileg i _ ila tke aat _ atuqe i llegh anun llu _ qiliigh yug llegh anun llu _ , _ esghagh kumegteggu _ agepsugh a _ panellegh an _ qiya kete lleqe aat _ , _ iglagtu pigte luteng llu _ qiya ke ghllagte lleqe aat _ .
U y av an ll uteng _ nekeve lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ellmeng llu _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ ! _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ elpek _ aange ghllag _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ negh ghllag _ , _ Babylon _ ! _ aghyuugh lleg nge uten _ ataasigh ghhagh mi _ aflu mi _ ! _ "
nuna m _ ak il p eg agh teng it a _ qiyaaghwagh tke aat _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tukfigh nanigh kangit _ saghya it _ .
B a b y l o n - mi _ ak il p eg agh tet _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ g o l d - et _ , _ si l v er - et _ , _ akitu ghllaget _ uyghag t _ , _ pe ar l - et lu _ ; _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ qiipaghaghqagh t _ ulimaagh t _ linen- meng _ , _ silk- meng _ , _ qiipaghaghqagh t llu _ iqeghte aqe lghiit _ esneg yagh u aaghet _ , _ kavirrakegtagh t llu _ . _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ unaghsigh t _ , _ ulimaagh t _ naangqugh neng _ , _ ak i tugh llag neng _ unaghsigh neng _ , _ siilu neng _ , _ s av ik en gh aag neng _ , _ m ar b l e- en eng llu _ .
aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ c in n am o n - et _ , _ s pi c e- et _ , _ in c en s e- et _ , _ m y r r h - et _ , _ f r an k in c en s e- et _ ; _ w in e- et _ , _ o l iv e -em _ mesiigh i _ ; _ avlawa t _ , _ wh e at - et _ ; _ c at t l e- et _ , _ penniigh t _ , _ kuuni t _ , _ w ag o n - et _ ; _ talwa _ yug t _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ qep ghagh te l aagh ul uki _ .
A k il p eg agh tet _ Babylon _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit _ all g egh s uk egh ll ak agh ten _ aviighute ut _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ aklungi ghllag ten _ qelmegh ghllaget _ aviighute ut _ , _ allameng llu _ allgeghsaghqagh u nanigh aten _ ! _ "
A k il p eg agh tet _ aklungi igh ikagh t _ akike i luteng _ B a b y l o n - mun _ , _ nekevgha lleqe ut _ uy av an ll uteng _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ qiya lleqe ut _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ ,
whaten llu _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ ' _ S egh legh waagh u uq _ ! _ S egh legh waagh u uq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aate kayugu yagh uq _ linen- meng _ , _ esneyaagh meng _ , _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ ull ng aqegk ayug u yagh tuq lu _ g o l d - meng _ , _ ak i tugh llag meng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pe ar l - m eng llu _ !
ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ " _ qamagte luteng _ angyaleg t _ , _ yug it _ , _ passenger-ngit _ , _ ak il p eg agh te t lu _ iglegha kayug t _ angyaghpag tgun _ allgegh te na luteng _ kiyagh u sigh qam eg g neng _ , _ angyaghpag it _ aghula i iqe aat _ uy av an ll uteng _ B a b y l o n - meng _ kumagh aqngan _ .
esghagh luku _ agepsugh a _ kumagh llegh an _ , _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ alla _ ne ghllag ite uq _ wh ate l ngugh meng _ ! _ '
naasqugh teng _ pagula lightugh ait _ qiya te kete luku _ , _ qivghu te kete luku _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ S egh legh waagh u uq _ ! _ S egh legh waagh u uq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ qamagte luteng _ angyaghpag leg t _ aklungi igh i kayugu yagh ut _ ! _ iwernga _ ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ qilag meng _ kina _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ q ilag m el ngugh ni _ , _ quyake teggu _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe a _ Babylon _ ! _ quya tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ ap o s t l e- en i _ , _ u uk nal iq is t en illu _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aa _ qayughllak _ seghletun _ pi kaqe kangisi _ ! _ "
taagken _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ keveg aa _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ , _ g r a in - mun _ kagimte i sigh stun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ miluute a _ k ell i mun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ Taw at egh pig aq _ negh ghllag _ Babylon _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ miluute ghllag lleqe a _ asitmun _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite aat _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh naanghite ai _ h ar p - es te ten _ , _ pi ll gu ghi k at _ ay ng an ang as te ten _ , _ f lu te - es te ten _ , _ q al ghi gh tagh te t en llu _ ! _ qamagte luteng _ pi ll gu ghi k at _ qep ghagh te ten _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ g r a in - meng _ k ag im tes te ten _ alla llu _ nagaqugh naanghite ait _ !
kenegh lghutagh m _ nighug a _ ku uk g un n aan igh naq uq _ elpek ni _ . _ me ik _ nulightugh naqe lghii m llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii m llu _ nagaqugh nanigh naqe uk _ elpek ni _ . _ A k il p eg agh te ten _ agh t iig at ng waagh yagh tut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ alignaghtaagh llegh gpegun _ puu ghqu qagh katen _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ !
B a b y l o n - mi _ taawa _ aaw it _ u uk nal iq is tet _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ tuqu tke aat _ nuna mi _ . _ "
kingu aneng _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ akuzillegh an _ , _ qilag mi _ nagaqugh anka _ yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu lghiit _ , _ " _ H all el u j a h _ ! _ yuguligh llegh _ , _ qu ul v all eq _ , _ agh tugh yaghq aanghi lleq lu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke ai _ !
ellnga n _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ elqughute nga ut _ ! _ ellnga n _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ apeghseghugh _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ qayughllak _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghletun _ pi stegkangi _ s e x - kun _ atuqe ste aqe luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akite kaqe a _ qayughllak _ qep ghagh teng i _ tuqu qugh stegkangi _ . _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu laatagh ut _ , _ " _ H all el u j a h _ ! _ ne ghllag m _ kumagh lghii m _ agepsugh a _ mayugh u uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ el d er - et _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ niinghute uute luteng _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gmikun _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ H all el u j a h _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ me _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ qamagte lusi _ qep ghagh teng ani _ alike i lghii ni _ ellnga neng _ , _ uk av an l eng ugh n illu _ aangwaagh ni llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ llangaqa _ me it _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ nagate kau luteng _ s uk s ug is tun _ tevlughte ghllag lghiit _ megh t _ , _ kallug m llu _ tengngaagtagh llegh atun _ ayuqe luteng _ . _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ H all el u j a h _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ igleghte te i uq _ !
quya te lta _ , _ elngaatall _ quya ghllag lta llu _ usuqe lteggu llu _ ! _ P en n iigh agh aam _ nengughte lleghqagh a _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuliighqagh a llu _ yataaghqe ma uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh ma a _ ugiigh naqe lghii _ pin igh r ak eg tam eng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ . _ " _ ( _ " _ linen- a _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ )
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ una _ igaqe gu _ : _ P en n iigh agh aam _ nengughte llegh an _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh t _ quya stekau ut _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh akun _ manigugh na luku _ , _ iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeq aal gu teg pe tun llu _ . _ E ll ng i nguut _ ataa s iigh m el nguut _ ip all egh mun _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ . _ I p all eq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ t aan ang u uq _ ip all eq _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ u uk nal iq is t en un _ ungipagh ke stekagh a _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ ! _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ ategh a _ " _ A taa s iigh m el nguq _ , _ ipapik _ " _ . _ elqughute nga ut _ nanqigte i llegh i _ , _ pi ll u w aq ang illu _ anguyag ni _ .
iye kek _ kumaghugh llegh atun _ ken ghem _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lghute lgu uq _ . _ ategh a _ ellnga kun _ igaqe nga uq _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke kanga _ iwerngaqun _ ellnginagh an _ .
atkuyaagh k _ atugh kek _ neptekau uk _ aaw kun _ . _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite anga _ " _ .
qilag meng _ pi ll u w agh teng it a _ maligsaagh aat _ uugte luteng _ qatelghii tgun _ kuuni tgun _ , _ at ku y aagh luteng _ iqa ite ngugh meng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ .
Q aan gh aneng _ aane uq _ ipeg lghii _ savigpag _ , _ taaggun _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ n aku m iit _ kay aal qugh lleq ii _ . _ igleghte te lleqe ai _ i r o n - meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ taagken _ tutmagh lleqe ai _ anguyag ni _ katam _ yug t _ tu t m agh aq ell ghi s tun _ g r ap es - et _ q ag egh qu usi g n il nguut _ . _ taana _ tutmagh llegh _ sakraa llegh ghllag ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atkuyaagh akun llu _ qugtuqagh akun llu _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ whaten _ ; _ umiileg a _ umiileg t _ , _ Atan gha _ at an gh et _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ siqinegh kun _ . _ qamagte luki _ qawaag lghute t _ quulvani _ tengaa lghiit _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi a _ , _ " _ tagi laghate te lusi _ qerngughte te k _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ghllag anun _ !
tagi tek _ , _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ umiileg t _ , _ pi ll u w agh tet _ umiileg it _ , _ pi ll u w agh te t lu _ . _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ kuuni t _ , _ kuuni kun _ iglegh tes tet _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ , _ qep ghagh te l aagh et _ , _ qep ghagh te l aagh un ghi l nguut _ , _ uk av an l e nguut _ , _ aw nge aaghet llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ tegh i ku s all u uk lu _ , _ nuna m llu _ umiileg i _ , _ pi ll u w agh te ku ll ghiit _ qerngughte te ut _ pi ll u w aghn al uku _ igleghte lghii _ kuuni kun _ , _ pi ll u w agh teng illu _ .
T ug w aag ke t _ tegh i ku s all u ug en kuk _ , _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh en kuk _ all aagh ll u w agh t iigh aat aq aq _ taw an ll uku _ tegh i ku s all uuk _ . _ ( _ A ll aagh ll u w agh t ii qell egh m i kun _ puu ghqu qu ai _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh t _ tegh i ku s all u ug meng _ , _ manigugh qu aat llu _ nangaghnegh a _ . _ ) _ T egh i ku s all u ug en kuk _ , _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh en kuk _ unguv aag ken ka _ miluute ak _ naayvagh m _ ken gh anun _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ sulphur- meng _ .
P ill u w agh teng i k _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ tuqu qugh ai _ savigpag kun _ qanegh mineng _ aanekagh kun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ qawaag t _ negh ait _ kemegkwaagh it _ kepsugh qiinagh llegh meggnun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ tugumiiqe luni _ ke y - ng aneng _ S aam n ang il ngu u m _ laawaagh m _ , _ qiipraghute ghllag neng llu _ .
kayaalqellug qu _ d r ag o n - a _ tu w aa _ . _ ( _ D r ag o n - a _ t aan ang u uq _ ayumightagh _ nemeghyagh _ , _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ ) _ taagken _ yaquleg m _ asighte qugh a _ qiipraghute neng _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
miluute luku _ laawaagh mun _ , _ taagken _ amig meng _ umeg te luku _ m aghq a tu t k aa _ s e al - el uku _ . _ enkaam _ D r ag o n -em _ puughte yaghqaa nanigh ai _ yug t _ kenlanga _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ alpag kata _ iteme te aghte lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh t _ , _ aqumga lghiit llu _ taa ku t gun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i yaghqaaghte stekagh i _ yug neng _ . _ E s h agh an k allu _ unguva sagh it _ tamaakut _ naa s q w igh tuq iit _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe kangat _ ip all eq _ Jesus-em _ qayvighqekagh a _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taakut _ maniguute mangite ut _ tegh i ku s all u ug mun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nangaghnegh anun _ . _ talwa _ qagugh megteggun _ , _ nalighmeng _ iigge megteggun _ all g egh te ll ghi taa t _ nalluniilkutagh a _ tegh i ku s all u ug em _ . _ unguvagh uute luteng _ igleghte te i lgusigh aat _ Christ- a _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
taana _ sivulii uq _ unguvagh qugh llegh _ . _ ( _ ila i _ tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ )
tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguv agh tek ii _ unguvagh uute yuwhaagh llegh mi _ quya stekau ut llu _ agleghnagh ut llu _ . _ tuqu naanghite ut _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ p r i es t- ngun aq nguut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ Christ- am un llu _ . _ igleghte te i lgusigh lleqe aat llu _ Christ- a _ t h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
T h o us an d _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag kata _ , _ tughneghagh _ anusimingllaghvig aneng _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ .
enkaam _ aane luni _ puughte qugh lleqe ai _ nunatagh t _ mingite nga lghiit _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tamaakut _ nunatagh t _ ategh ke ait _ G o g -en kuk _ M ag o g -en kuk _ . _ yug ik _ uglagh ghllag ut _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esne m _ . _ taagken _ tughneghagh m _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ pi ll u w amun _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ll u w agh teng i _ iqelmun _ mingite luteng _ igleghte lleqe ut _ nuna kun _ . _ kaate luteng _ kangllu lleqe agket _ nunaagh llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ nayugh at _ , _ negh ghllag llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh a _ . _ taagken _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenegh _ ukig ste luku _ paneghtekagh i _ pi ll u w agh tet _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh _ puughte ikagh _ nunatagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ miluute lleqe aat _ naayvagh mun _ kumaghugh lghii _ sulphur- meng _ . _ tawavek _ miluute kaqe kegket _ tegh i ku s all u ug en kuk _ , _ u uk nal iq is te sigh waagh en kuk _ . _ tawani _ ikfiqe ghllag lleqe ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ aqumga lghii _ q ate l ghii g ne kun _ um iil gu si g ne kun _ aq um ut agh llag eg ne kun _ . _ nuna llu _ qilag a llu _ q im aag uu tu k _ kiyaghnegh m _ taw an te llgh aneng _ , _ alla llu _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenatek _ .
esghagh anka llu _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ , _ uk al ii w aq lu teng llu _ aangwaagh u aqe luteng llu _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ igagh t _ qelpeghte ait _ , _ igagh i _ unguvallegh m _ , _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ ategh itneng _ tamaakut _ unguva yaghqagh t _ quunperugllag _ . _ ila i llu _ igagh lghute t _ qelpeghte ait _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ tuqukagh t _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ atuqe luki _ igaqughkagh t _ igagh tgun _ .
taagken _ kellii m _ tuquma ste lugh u i ni _ pegte ai _ . _ tuqu llegh m llu _ H a d es - em llu _ tuquma ste lugh u i tek _ pegte aik _ . _ Q am ag teng ng waagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ kiyagh taa ll ghi s tun _ .
taagken _ tuqu llegh llu _ H a d es - lu _ miluute agket _ naayvagh m _ ken gh anun _ . _ naayvagh m _ ken gha _ tuungligh ke a _ tuqu llegh m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh a _ igaqe ma ite kan _ igagh ani _ unguvallegh m _ , _ milugh tke aat _ naayvagh m _ ken gh anun _ .
taagken _ esghagh agka _ qilag ragh aq llu _ nun agh r agh aq lu _ . _ qilag ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ nuna ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ kellii igh te kau uq llu _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ , _ J er us al em - egh r agh aq _ , _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ q ilag m el ngugh meng _ . _ negh ghllag _ y at aagh qell uni _ ugiigh naqe lghii m _ ull ng aq ell gh a tun _ ugi minun _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh gneng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig a _ yug nite uq _ ! _ kiyaghfig ke lleqe ai _ enkaam _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga _ katam _ ellngitnite lleqe uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aat _ .
quni igh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ . _ tuqu u i lleqe a _ , _ qivghu u i lleqe a _ , _ qiya nga i lleqe a _ , _ talwa _ aq n igh q eng ng ii lleq aa _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ atuqe yagh kangit _ atuqe nanigh lleqe ait _ . _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gnite ngughk _ aqumutagh gni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ , _ ulima aqe anka _ sa u aat _ qam ag teng ng waagh luki _ nutaghagh u luki _ ! _ " _ whaten llu _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqe ki _ tamaakut _ apeghkagh nka _ elpenun _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ akuzite t _ ipa u ut _ , _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O meg a- ngu unga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ , _ aki u na an _ meghsi lleqe aqa _ sengngugh lghii meng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ megh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kayaalqe i i lghii m _ allgegh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ whanga mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ enkaam _ ellngit _ avaqutagh ke lleqe anka _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ quyughtagh lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ , _ segh l ell egh pig aghn eng _ seghleghqe lghiit _ , _ yug tagh tet _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ alignagh lghiit _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ iqlengagh lghiit _ , _ nekaghqagh at _ naayvagh u uq _ kumaghugh lghii _ kenegh meng llu _ sulphur- meng llu _ . _ T aan ang u uq _ tuungligh a _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ esleqnga lghii neng _ kinguligh neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ , _ ataasigh m _ taa ku neng _ taku anga _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ ugiigh naqe lghii meng _ , _ nuliighqagh a _ P en n iigh agh aam _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ yaquleg m _ tugu lunga _ aglagh te aanga _ uusqagh lleghpigagh anun _ naayghagh m _ . _ tawani _ kelgute a _ Jerusalem _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ q ilag m el ngugh meng _ .
K u uk g ut ng agh mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ n igh ugh qell gh aneng _ . _ negh ghllag _ kuukgute uq _ akitu ghllag lghii tun _ uyghag tun _ , _ j as p er - e tun _ , _ megh r aa k eg tu t k agh mi _ c r y s tal - e tun _ .
uusqagh ghllag meng _ mingllute leg _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ am ig ll al g aat aq _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yaquleg t _ amig ghllagnite ut _ . _ A taa si k agh tagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ I s r a el -em _ .
mingllu ta a _ ne ghllag m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag leg _ , _ pi nga yu t _ asivagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aywaa ni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ ikevagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ pakfalla mi _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta a _ tunemagh igh kau uq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ uyghag neng _ . _ A taa si k agh tagh meng _ uyghag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ap o s t l e- ng aneng _ P en n iigh agh aam _ .
yaquleg _ al egh qugh tek a _ g o l d - meng _ usputagh lgu uq _ usputagh na luku _ negh ghllag _ , _ amig ghllag i llu _ mingllu ta a llu _ .
negh ghllag _ ull u v iigh r ak eg te f tuq _ tag tal nga _ , _ p at egh tu l ng a tun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yaquleg m _ negh ghllag _ us p ut agh yaq min igu _ : _ 1 , 5 0 0 _ m il e s _ tagtale ke a _ , _ pateghtu lleg ke a _ , _ uusqaghtu lleg ke a llu _ .
mingllu ta a llu _ us p ut agh yaq min igu _ , _ 2 1 6 _ f e e t- ngu f tuq _ u us qagh tu l nga _ . _ yaquleg m _ usputagh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ yug m _ usputagh llegh a _ .
mingllu ta a _ ulimaagh u uq _ j as p er - meng _ . _ negh ghllag _ ulimaagh u uq _ g o l d - ep er eg waagh meng _ . _ G o l d - a _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ si q in wh aagh tun _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta an _ tunemagh i _ pinigh naagh qusigh luteng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ak i tugh llag neng _ uyghag neng _ . _ sivuligh _ j as p er - ngu f tuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ s ap p h i r e- ngu f tuq _ , _ pingayut ii ta at _ ag ate - ngu f tuq _ , _ estamat ii ta at _ em er al d - ngu f tuq _ ,
tallimat ii ta at _ o n y x - ngu f tuq _ , _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ c ar n el i an - ngu f tuq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta at _ c h r y s o l i te - ngu f tuq _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu ligh ta at _ b er y l - ngu f tuq _ , _ es tam aneng _ inglu ligh ta at _ t o p a z - ngu f tuq _ , _ qule ughte ta at _ c h r y s o p r as e- ngu f tuq _ , _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ii ta at _ j a c in t h - e ngu f tuq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ii ta at _ am et h y s t- ngu f tuq _ .
qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag t _ pe ar l - ngu f tut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ ataasigh meng _ pe ar l - meng _ ulimaagh u ut _ . _ ne ghllag m _ tume i _ g o l d - ep er eg waagh u f tut _ ; _ g o l d - a _ megh r aa k eg te pig llegh ii _ siqinghwaagh tun _ .
ne ghllag mi _ esghaate nghite unga _ temple- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ temple- nga _ Atan gh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ P en n iigh agh aag uq lu _ .
negh ghllag _ si q i negh s ugh n ii tuq _ , _ nalighmeng _ tanqigh ighsugh niite uq _ nighugkagh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ n igh ugh qell gha _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug ke kanga _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aq llu _ kenegh lghutagh ke kanga _ .
Q am ag teng ng waagh luteng _ nuna m _ yug i _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ nighug akun _ kuukgute nga lghii kun _ . _ nuna m llu _ umiileg ita _ aklungi teng _ tagite uute ait _ ne ghllag mun _ .
ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag i _ umeg naanghite ut _ aghnegh m _ naange nghaani _ qayughllak _ unug naagh nghite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
nuna m _ yug ita _ ne ghllag mun _ tagite uute lleqe ait _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ aklungi teng _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ , _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghnagh tun _ pi sta _ , _ nalighmeng _ iqlengiqe sta _ . _ iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ tam aa ku ng in aghh aat _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ P en n iigh agh aam _ pi ke ai _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kiiw gneng _ maaqe lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ P en n iigh agh aam llu _ umiileg u sigh gkenka _ aqumutagh gkeneng _ . _ U nguv all el it ik ayug meng _ me leg k _ , _ megh r aa k eg tu t k alghii k _ c r y s tal - e tun _ .
maaqe nga lghiik _ qukaa kun _ tu mang an _ ne ghllag m _ . _ kiiw k _ inglugtun _ uqfigtuqagh k _ unguv all el it ik ayug neng _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ uqfig _ piite ste i kayugu uq _ f r u it - neng _ tanqigh inagh kun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mi _ , _ ququngagh it llu _ naallghute sigh u ut _ nunatagh anun _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekagh a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ , _ ne ghllag mete naanghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ P en n iigh aghh aan kuk _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh gket _ ne ghllag mete yaghqaa uk _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ qep ghagh teng it a _ manigugh lleqe aat _ .
gginagh a _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ ategh a llu _ qagugh itgun _ igaqe nga lleqe uq _ .
tamaani _ unug nanigh lleqe a _ , _ ken el gh ut agh s ugh n iigh ull eq ii _ , _ nalighmeng _ si q i negh s ugh n iigh ull eq ii _ , _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ nighug ke lleqe aat _ . _ igleghte te i lleqe ut llu _ umiileg u luteng _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite t _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipa u ut llu _ . _ Atan ghem _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i lghii m _ taghneghagh itneng _ u uk nal iq is te mi _ , _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ k el gu v ik es qell uki _ qep ghagh t en i _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ quya stekau ut _ qaatke te lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqe nga lghii nun _ u ku t gun _ igagh tgun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ nagate kaqe anka llu _ esghagh kaqe anka llu _ tamaakut _ . _ nagaqugh aqe yamki llu _ esghagh aqe yamki llu _ tamaakut _ , _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh ani _ manigugh na luku _ , _ keleg u vike i steke _ tamaaken _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ whanga llu _ qep ghagh te ngu unga _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeq aal gu teg pe tun llu _ u uk nal iq is tes tun _ , _ qaatke te lghii stun llu _ akuzi ta itnun _ ukut _ igagh t _ . _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ aksaqe gpenaki _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ ukut _ igagh t _ apeghkagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh it _ kaate yaghtugh ma ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi lghii _ nagnegh li _ seghletun _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ nukeggnagh meng _ sumegh ke lghii _ nagnegh li _ nukeggnagh meng _ s u um qell uni _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh lghii _ nagnegh li _ elqughute nga luni _ , _ kina llu _ alngunak _ p el ung il nguq _ nagnegh li _ pelungite luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh nka _ kelqe lleqe anka _ nallangightugh na luki _ yug t _ kiyagh taa ll ghi s tun _ .
whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ O meg a- ngu unga _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga _ kinguligh u unga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga llu _ . _ "
quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ atkuyaag teng _ aghvig ke ait _ iqangite te ste luki _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh yaghqaaghtekau ut _ piite stekagh aneng _ unguv all el it ik ayug em _ uqfig m _ . _ itegh yaghqaaghtekau ut llu _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itgun _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag m _ es l at aan il nguut _ qikmigh u ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe i ste u ut _ , _ yugte aghte u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ maniguute ste u ut _ , _ iqlengiqe yuneghtu ut _ , _ iqlengiqe manginagh aqe ut llu _ .
" _ whanga _ , _ Jesus _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ yaquleg ka _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ y ugh aghv ig n il ngugh nun _ . _ apegh lleqe ak _ ukuk _ elpesi nun _ , _ ' _ whanga _ D av i d -em _ kingunegh ke aanga _ , _ whanga _ n igh ug r ak eg t aag unga _ un aa ngu m _ ighaleqetaagh a _ . _ ' _ "
taghneghagh k llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii llu _ pi uk _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nagate lghii _ pi li _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ tagi li _ ; _ tugukligh ligu _ aki ite ngughk _ megh _ unguv all el it ik ay uk _ .
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ k el eng as aagh yug an ka _ nagate lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ u ku t gun _ igagh tgun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaraagh kaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ . _ ellnga nun _ ila lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ igaqe nga lghiit _ u ku t gun _ igagh tgun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ikuvike gkaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ nengighqe ai _ piite stekagh t _ uqfigagh neng _ unguv all el it ik ayug em _ . _ kiyaghte snaanghite a llu _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne ghllag mi _ . _ taake uk _ apegh nga uk _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
Jesus - ngu uq _ apegh i lghii _ tamaaken _ qamagte luteng _ ipa u ni luki _ . _ pi uq llu _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ " _ amen _ . _ tea- ai _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
sangami _ qiighqagh _ sivuqagh meng _ atigh kau a _ 
sivuqagh m _ ungipagh aa _ 
nuna _ ulima nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ , _ ulimaghista _ megh nal ik aq _ , _ ulimaagh ni _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ .

enkaam _ taa ku m _ kellii n _ megh anun _ kagukagh _ .
megh m _ saamken _ tegh h aneng _ nuna meng _ tugu tete luni _ sivuqagh a _ .
taana _ sivuqagh ni _ nuna _ llikagh a _ megh m _ qaye akun _ , _ qiighqagh ughtekagh _ .
tagtalmi _ qiighqagh _ nevugh ngekagh _ .
piite vikekagh a _ veg m _ , _ pii te sigh aam _ , _ nun iv ag segh aam _ , _ qu qu ng aam _ .
afsengagh t _ , _ sikig t _ , _ kaviigh t _ uugtekagh t _ qiighqagh mun _ .
aghvegh t _ , _ ayvegh t _ , _ neghsagh t _ , _ ulghaagh t _ , _ nanugh t llu _ tagikagh t _ qiighqagh m _ megh an _ tu ng ang anun _ .
ila a _ uugte yagutekagh _ , _ ila yan _ nayugh ksagutekagh at _ .
ila a _ teghig ke sagh _ uksugh mi _ si ku g ne kun _ kaate kayug _ .
upenghagh mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qagugh ak _ katelghaate yagutekagh _ , _ ighni laghate yagutekagh _ .
ila it _ uksughte aqe lghiit _ .

nelikagh at _ kiyaghfig kekagh at _ .

A ll aagh ll u wh aq _ ayungkaghagh _ 
aasa m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ nenglu mete ngughk _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ellng in aghh aal ghii _ , _ iwernga _ aghn agh agh pag g aagh tek aq _ , _ anglu ighpagkagh ghhagh _ .
kaame llgagh u aqe lghii _ , _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh meng _ , _ ayumigh m _ kaa m eng aneng _ ayngusikagh meng _ .
emta _ tawaten _ aane aqngami _ taa k w eg ku t gun _ qilaga t _ tulimagh ita _ kenle itgun _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh ni _ lli ma kanga _ .
lli luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ pamavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ .

K iil uu m _ akmag a _ 
K es lii m _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ ategh a _ K iil u uq _ .
elngaatall _ ag ghi yug negh llak _ , _ aaghhe neghllug ghllag _ .
angayuqagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni llu _ pin igh te si g al k angi _ , _ naqam _ panignagh ghllag _ .
tawaten _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ K iil u uq _ aaghhneghlliqe ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ samavek _ elqwaagh yagh na luni _ .
qenwat _ naa an _ maligte ma kanga _ .
kii _ , _ qagi ghllag u uq _ .
K iil u uq _ elqwaagh niigh gpenani _ qagi t _ nengulgha llegh itni _ naghaagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qagi t _ kasug ma kangat _ , _ ghhuughaghte ma kanga _ , _ naange a _ n all ut gh aagh ll uku _ .
iitek _ naa an _ akuqagh naqe ma yagh kanga _ siingenllu _ aga _ kaleve uq _ .
K iil u uq _ liite yalghiimi _ s aam _ mangteghagh ghllag m _ ilu nga ni te uq _ .
tamaa nguq _ pegnem _ piyug te aqe ut _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ taku luku _ nekeve sqe ma kanga _ .
tuune ma kanga _ kalngagagh _ uqig ghllag _ , _ ak m ag te sim akanga _ .
meghnugh luteng _ aghul iigh naq en gh ata _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kagsagmig aqe kangi _ .

qiya magh mi _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ sangan lli _ agghiyugniqe ma zinga _ , _ aaghhneghlliqe ma zinga _ !

pi neghllug meng _ taghnughhagh meng _ taana _ mangteghagh _ imaqe uq _ .

pinitun _ lliigh uq _ .
tefaay _ !
akluma lleghpigagh _ quyanagh lleghpigagh _ kuusme _ 
ayuqligh m _ ungipagh ke llegh a _ 
kuusme m _ P in igh y u ug tes te llgh a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ neqamike aqe aqa _ kuusmeyaghtu nghaani _ esla _ quunpeng _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aliineghllug ghllag u aqe lghii _ naqam _ aq lagh ak eg llak _ enkaam _ qakma _ kinku t _ naghughte negh meggni _ piyug llegh it _ aghqiiwtu te _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ un ang u pig ll uku _ aag negh mta _ q al ghi gh q it egh llag et _ tevragh naqe lghiit _ napi naqe lghiit _ qimugsigh meng _ .
A m s an aam _ angtale aneng _ qilug llegh it _ , _ talwa _ ug w at ang agh m iit _ qikmigh at _ , _ al i r ug w ak eg llag et _ .
piyug meng llu _ pi y aan neq eg s aat aq ut _ q aan ng w aat eng _ qamugh ke luki _ .
nalluniite aqe uq _ sivuqagh _ kuusmete yug nightu aqe a _ , _ kinku t _ esgh an em tek i _ quya ma ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe te ghllag t _ .
tamaani _ naagu _ kinku t _ suume qaghte gpenaki _ aqimle meng _ meghe uute lleghqagh it _ , _ aqnighte lleghqagh it _ .
Q el an q en n em teg gu _ ataata mta _ tagi lleghqagh a _ 
ataata ut _ qelanqe sag utagh uqagh ut _ pugughilegh meng _ tagi lleghqagh a _ qayughllak _ kuusme _ siv ut gh ull uku _ qimugsigh ghhagh meng _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
ataata ma _ qamite kek _ tegh ig l ug w em _ inglu aneng _ usi ii ghllag lutek _ tamaaken _ uksaagh mi _ agaghtekagh meng _ k in gh aag agh luteng _ kumlate luteng _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
awen _ apegh aqe kangat _ apa ka _ , _ ataata ma _ awtu anga _ , _ neqe ngllaghtu ni luku _ enkaam _ nagnegh te a _ at aat am aa llu _ .
ataata ka _ n ut aagh ameng _ kineghkagh meng _ iqallug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ qamiye gni _ usi l uk ek lu _ taawa _ ayuqe ak _ .
uksugh ghllag mi _ ilangakun _ neqangisag aqe uq llu _ .
amenqun _ laluramke t _ kuusme mi _ t a b l e- en i _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ whangkuta llu _ legan _ whaa _ taw aaten _ negh u lleqe ukut _ iwerngaqun _ qay ut igh l uta _ nuna mi _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqe lgu aqe ukut _ ing av el q iin aq lu _ .
kiyang _ ataata ka _ kaate aqe uq _ pugughilegh meng _ siqinegh _ tevigh kestagh nghaani _ .
aanqaghte aatagh qu kut _ quya pigte luta _ .
nekefqaghte luteng _ qikmigh t _ u v egh taq iin kut _ ellngit llu _ esghagh nghmegtekut _ quya aqe ut _ .
ila i _ unglegh aqe ut _ entaqun _ megh n u m _ qayughllak _ taake lghii _ tume _ pugughilegh meng _ .
qikmigh a _ makughqugh aqe aput _ , _ pe tug tegh um ii ta _ , _ neghqe aqe luki _ .
ila i _ naatghigh qugh te luteng _ qikmigh an _ kameg i _ ayuqe ut _ .
talwa _ qikmigh a _ kameg meng _ p r aa s en taa q an ka _ .
mamleg a qaa _ , _ qama _ g a s _ l am p - p em _ qergese kun _ nighug kek _ nighug u te aqe uk _ salin _ sivuqagh _ ken ghi ll uku _ .
iwernga _ g en er at o r - es qugh h aa k _ atugh aqe agput _ wetku _ uqug lgu negh mta _ .
ataata mta _ kameg i _ , _ allighte i _ , _ pig in gh i _ , _ at ku g w i _ , _ temkagh i _ agaghte qugh aqe aput _ .
akmagtagh an llu _ imigh a _ n us ug r agh tegh aq ap ut _ .
S u f l ug w ii _ qesighte neghsigh luki _ sangighqugh luki _ , _ mesiighqe aqe anka _ .
K av iigh s iigh um aq elghii llu _ .
unaami _ ughug nghata _ afta aqe aput _ , _ niightugh aqe aput _ , _ kinegh nghata _ pinighsagh aqe aput _ av l aa w akun _ .
awen _ itegh qagh qu aqe ut _ ataata ma _ teghiglugtagh aneng _ aap s at _ .
tunqugh aqe ukut _ elngaatall _ .
ellngit a llu _ liisimake kangat _ kinegh vyiighkagh meng _ kumlatekagh meng _ teghiglug meng _ tagite aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu llegh ut _ 
enankin _ aange lghii kun _ ataata mta _ qamiye akun _ naayvagh meng _ ikellegh itneng _ taghnughhagh ni _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ .
B o il er - et _ , _ qalta t _ , _ salngagkwaagh t _ imightugh aqe aput _ .
naayvagh mun _ sukera aqe ukut _ atghii negh mta _ , _ nenglagh magh emta _ , _ il aag aam aam ta _ , _ uteghmun _ weni _ qule mun _ siinge lqiinagh aqe ukut _ angegh lleg kellug kek _ qamiye gput _ .
kaate negh mta _ miigh aqe ukut _ ilangqugh meng _ .
tamaani _ q el egh teng ngu un aam ta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ .
aqlaghate ngugh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ 
mangteghagh ut _ m ek es qugh h aa yagh tuq _ entaqun _ 1 0 _ feet _ b y _ 1 2 _ f e e t- ng ngu uq _ .
quunpeng _ supug ghllag _ ulima llegh a _ seghlegh _ , _ qayughllak _ ata mta _ naken _ s aghn aagh aneng _ ulima uq _ .
U n ug mi _ q aam ng aam ta _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
aghneghmi _ ke r o s en e _ h e ate r - meng _ itagsi pigte luta _ atuqe aqe ukut _ .
sakighte uute luta _ nuna mi _ qavagh aqe ukut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ , _ sakighte uute negh mta _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ r o o m - eng iigh h aq _ es l eq aq agh put _ .
A r m y - t _ qavaghvig ita _ m at t r es s - ng aneng _ egte llegh neng _ s aghn aagh meng _ all ii ghi gh aq u kut _ .
Y o - y o - ng ll an em ta _ aangqagh ngllagh u negh mta _ aki kaghqagh meng _ tam aa tu m _ m at t r es s -em _ imaa neng _ kevigh aqe aput _ enkaam _ allighagh mta _ nalighnegh i _ im igh ut aa qu t _ .
iwernga _ aatkagh meng _ imigh u llegh i _ tamaakut _ k an agh f i ku gh aq ap ut _ .
repall _ qivghuke kaqe anka _ amigh meng _ allighagh igh te lghiikut _ , _ itupill _ maqagh aqe yagh lghiit _ .
uglaghi yalghiikut _ alngunak _ sa meng llu _ ulig meng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ alla ii aghagh kau qu kut _ .
kiyang _ atkug mnneng _ ii m waagh luki _ akite kaqe ukut _ puvite i _ qam an ll uki _ igh tugh q en n ay uk aat a _ .
kuusmeyaghtugh kanga _ sighima kestagh aqe ukut _ yughaghvig m _ mission _ b o x - ng an _ maqagh lghii meng _ ulig meng _ .
itegagh lghute put _ naa mta _ itegagh anun _ qerngughte te aqe aput _ qayughllak _ itegagh i _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
U n ang ul uku _ teghtugh kete te negh mta _ naasqugh put _ n u ug tes n em tek i _ aneghnegh nge luta _ , _ q aam ng aam ta _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
naave ut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh nghmini _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kum aghh negh min i ke k _ p uq lagh taq iin kut _ .
mat- ke qu tete negh mta _ qaprag te negh mta _ wata _ sukate luni _ p uq lagh taq iin kut _ .
Yug m ek agh t at _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe ta i _ 
ata mta _ naken _ imani _ lipeghsagh ma aki _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ .
K et f agh yaq min ik i _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ .
wallu _ nutaan _ repall _ tamaaken _ pi ke ng y alghii kut _ n u tem k agh tam eng _ whang kun ni _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
taawa _ q ug w in t ap ayug w ek _ s n o w m an - allu _ , _ sa n ta _ C l a us - allu _ , _ c an d l e- ek _ .
K um agh s ug llag ng aam tek i _ itake aput _ alla _ ayumiqun _ ketfagh yaghqaa luki _ nalighmeng _ quunpeng _ af l eng aku r aaq s aghq aal uki _ .
uqfig squghhagh ut _ 
awatkaghtagh _ q em tam es alghii _ uqfig _ naken _ ata mta _ s aghn aagh a _ , _ N at i o n a l _ G u ar d - et _ tagi tke aat _ , _ at egh saq min igu _ pin e _ needle-ngi _ ifkagh te uute ma lghiit _ .
naken _ , _ wallu _ igaghvig meng _ nal ig ken ka _ angayuqagh mta _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ c r ep e _ paper- meng _ pi ke ng luteng _ tamaakut _ avayagh i _ ii m g ut f ii ku gh yaq meg teg n eg u _ legan _ whang kun ni _ uq f ig ll u wh aq _ .
kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ taw aa v ek _ uqfig mun _ ll il agh tugh aap ut _ .
leganqun _ whanga mni _ laluramke t _ mang tegh iit n il nguut _ , _ c at al o g -en i _ esghagh aqe ke put _ taw aa te l nguq _ kuusme m _ uqfig ut _ .
A ll aagh ll u wh aat _ ken gh et _ uqfig kun _ ii m g ut kay ug w et _ kumagh u negh meggni _ qallaqugh aqe ut _ , _ o r n am en t- et _ , _ whangkuta llu _ igaghvig mi _ ulima aput _ uqfig kun _ 
agaghte uute ghllag luki _ , _ uqfig squghhagh _ esghaqaaluni _ ugh legh iigh tegh llag luni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanglleg nagh igh te a _ uq f ii ll eg aagh h aq _ .
En kaa ng am _ c e il ing - ef ut _ aghq es qugh h aq _ qughaseketiigh ghllag luni _ iyaghvig mi _ ulimaagh mnneng _ , _ alla _ tamaa na _ aatkagh lghute _ agaghnga lghii _ .
iwernga _ nal iigh h iin agh put _ q ik egh qu ng ig al nguq _ amig igh te ghllag ghngaita _ .
kuusme m _ Cards-ngi _ 
yughaghvig ut _ naken _ akmaken _ awtuqagh meng _ c ar d s - eng aq elghii _ ayumigh ke te nghaani _ ategh it _ negig luteng _ iikekagh t _ .
nagaqugh aqe ukut _ pika _ tugulagh te ni luki _ .
Y im iy um teg gun _ taglagh aghte aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ ug lagh llag w aaq elghii _ tugulagh te yagh uq _ .
A ku l ang it gun _ iwernga _ tugutagh ke ukut _ .
quyake pigte luki _ atghagh te luki _ yuvghiigh aqe aput _ , _ ila i _ mingle kun _ neve ste qugh aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ p r aa s en t a sim un _ ateligh sigh ke aqe aput _ , _ iyagh ngllagh aqe ukut llu _ ila i _ aflenga kaqe aput _ .
piniqumtaagh nka _ tam aa ku nguut _ akmani _ nani _ s k ate - t ii ng elghii t _ naayvaghaghni _ .
aghni ut _ akughtuqagh meng _ qaasligh igh luteng _ .
qaasligh at _ n as ap er aa ghi t lu _ sa meng _ melqugh meng _ es n el aagh u sigh luteng _ .
I ig g agh luteng _ m u f f - e meng _ .
anglikagh t _ taslugh kete te luteng _ s k ate - te l ghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ qiighnite aghagh magh meng _ .
mangteghagh at _ qama _ puqlate sug nigh ghllag t _ nighug ghllag t _ .
Wh an i kun gh aani _ entaqun _ s k ate - te taq ut _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh lgu aqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ s k ate - t ii ng ell ghiit _ quy am s ug n igh llag et _ .
pinighnagh ghllag k _ qergese gput _ 
qergese gput _ es taa m aneng _ qergese ke lghiik _ q as pi q un negh il nguut _ enkaam _ uksugh mi _ kanegh meng _ umeg igh qite ghllag aqe uk _ .
K aan gh i _ iwernga _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ .
U m yug w am kun _ elngaatall _ navek _ tam aa tu m _ uqfig m _ aku l ang ani _ piyaa aatagh aqe unga _ .
tamaa _ legan llu _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ aliite aqe ut _ kanegh mi _ .
S ig ii qell ghem _ es negh r ug w i _ kumlate igate ngugh t _ kiig u ste aqe anka _ .
kumlu mnneng _ ighneghwaagh mnneng _ aneghnegh mnneng llu _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ q ag aa v ek _ esghapag na luta _ .
ilangakun _ q af si n Ê¼ gu ll uku _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ umu ghllaget _ .
naqamllu _ esghaatepag igate ngugh u kut _ alungutellegh _ qakma _ .
repall _ whanga mni _ qergese k _ taake uk _ esghagh uqagh u lutek _ kuusmete yug nighllug tek _ ayuqe uk _ .
qantaghtugh i _ P r aa s en t a si meng
ata ut _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ piraamsi negh ghllag _ .
talwa _ qantaghtu llegh i _ ayug w in naq e pig ll uki _ ila i _ t ap ghagh p aw aagh meng _ .
ila i _ sa u aat _ atugh qagh ghhaat _ nagh agh u tet _ aatkagh t _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luteng _ qantagh aqe ai _ .
taakut _ qantagh llegh i llu _ leganqun _ p r aa s en taa si w aq ut _ .
neqamike aqa llu _ tamaani _ quunpeng _ ilughagh niigh te neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ .
ata ma _ ilughagh ni _ p r aa s en t aa _ qiipaghagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ iiggagh t _ , _ laluramke t _ iigge ait _ .
inglu inagh a _ mekestaaghhagh kun _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luku _ qantagh luku _ , _ inglu a _ aangeghllag kun _ sa kun _ pikraghniite luku _ qantagh luku _ .
naa mta _ ungipaghagh te aqe ainkut _ ingaghte uute negh mta _ q av ar ag k iigh es qell uta _ qantaghtugh na luteng _ .
qenwat _ naave ut _ tulughagh aqe uq _ whangkuta _ K u us m en aq em _ teng gh un iq em _ p r aa s en t a sigh q iit neng _ leg r e yug w em _ qavagh lghaghtugh gpenaamta _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ P r aa s en t a si t
whanga mni _ tegh igh na ghllag _ nengyugh ut _ ii m g ut angll aan n em teg gu _ .
elngaatall _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ul im aaq agh put _ .
Q ii p agh ameng _ , _ uy g iin agh meng _ , _ m el q igh agh meng _ k ak i pig g agh meng _ ul im al agh tegh aq ap ut _ .
ila i _ qafsina neng _ esteg lgu aqe luteng _ , _ z ip p er - el w aaq luteng _ , _ nagtuqagh lgu aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ tu ug tek ayug w et _ .
I l aa k w aap ut _ ayapghaatagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ , _ allighte meng _ ul ii m aam n neng _ p r aa s en tal agh aaq ap ut _ .
ila i llu _ legan _ q ii p a pig g agh meng _ whang kun neng _ ulima tete luki _ kaki iqe aput _ .
I v agh il egh t aag aq u kut _ anglegute ke te lghii ni _ qantagh yaghqagh meng _ kinku nun _ .
sa tke igate ke put _ segh l eq e si si g al ke put _ atuqe aat _ sa u aat _ p r aa s en t a si q negh meng _ liisimake luku _ taw aa te tegh ng ii ta _ quyake lleqe kangit _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ tam aan l eng ugh meng _ esghaqu sigh ghllag mnneng _ p r aa s en t at aq u kut _ whang kun neng _ .
N aat ng waagh l ut allu _ qantaghkagh meng _ uyghagsugnite ngugh meng _ c an d y - meng _ sa n ta _ C l a us -em _ iiyagh mteggun _ kanaghte vike ma kanginkut _ .
taana _ q aam g g ung in aq _ ay gu ghi kaa q a _ .
yughaghvig mi llu _ igaghvig mi llu _ p r as en taa si t _ tunqugh aqe ait _ p r o g r am -en egh meng _ taa q en gh aat a _ .
aange lghiit _ qiipaghagh t _ nasagh i llu _ aligh a llu _ qepe luki _ p r aa s en taa si put _ aglagh te aqe ait _ .
ata mta _ quunpeng _ sa u aat _ igaqugh aqe kangi _ , _ talwa _ p r aa s en t a si put _ naken _ pi u ta i _ igaqugh aqe ai _ akite yaghqagh t _ .
Q el aa negh nagh llak _ , _ iwernga _ tu r n - k agh taa m ta _ iy aq ugh aaq ii _ .
R e d _ C r o s s -em _ S al ng aa w r ii
iyaghvig mi _ tunqugh aqe ainkut _ R e d _ C r o s s - et _ tunusagh itneng _ .
S al ng aa w aa s qugh h aat _ naqam _ imagh ghllag t _ .
imigh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u aqe ut _ , _ igaasigh t _ , _ r ul er - et _ , _ igaasigh mun _ ipegsagh sigh t _ , _ h an d ke r c h i ef - et _ , _ igaghyaghqagh ngestagh t _ , _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ iye it _ u um kay ug w et
n ev egh llegh h ii ni _ , _ c o l o r - et _ , _ taqughutagh t _ , _ m es un at _ , _ j a c k s - et lu _ , _ c o m p as s - es qugh h aa k lu _ taawa _ .
ata mnun _ tuune agka _ aq u pi legh sagh aatk eg ke k _ ulimaagh minun _ atuqe na lukek _ , _ us p ut aa si qu m aag ken ka _ iy aq r aa si qu m aag ken ka _ .
mekelghiigh nun _ aghnaghagh nun llu _ R e d _ C r o s s - et _ qantaghtuqagh u ut _ tamaakut _ .
M is si o n -em _ salngag i _ 
En kaa ng am _ yughaghvig meng _ seal- nga u uute aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ sivuqagh m _ family- nga _ .
mangteghagh m _ imigh a _ qamagte luteng _ aatkagh nge te aqe ut _ , _ sakenge uute aqe ut _ .
aatkagh it _ , _ j e an s - eng it _ n ut agh agh ll ug w aa qu t _ .
ila it _ s u it -em _ qaasligh a _ aa ng egh ngaat a _ aat aq aap ut _ .
ulig t llu _ quyanagh ghllag t _ qu il t- et _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
aklungi igh i ste aqe ainkut _ y ugh aghv im taa llu _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh sighqagh t _ 
naa mta _ at ku y aa ng ll agh tegh aq iin kut _ qiipaghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ ig agh r ak eg te llgh an _ av l aa w aat am _ qantagh aneng _ .
pinigh ghllagu aqe ut _ atkuyaag put _ .
enkaam _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ g g aat m eng llu _ qu ll ii r aagh m eng llu _ .
naave ut _ angatughqe i aqe uk _ ilangakun _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kakisigh aqe uq _ aatk agh r aagh ii s qell uta _ .
alla _ naa mta _ nuyagh lghute put _ q ip ell eg agh tegh aq ii _ qupughhughkagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng llu _ c o f f e e _ c an -em _ qelpeghte llegh an _ savikenghaagh i _ igaghqwaagh meng _ 
qantagh luki _ .
igamsiqa yug llegh ka _ 
sa u a _ K u us m e y aq _ , _ p r aa s en taa si q _ , _ laalighqwaagh te _ apeghiigh nghaani _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe te ni _ taawa _ k ag pag tugh aq agh put _ .
kuusmeyaghkagh _ ataata ut llu _ pugughilegh mun _ ag l an qig tu tuq _ .
taawa _ mangteghagh squghhagh ut _ nun aa tugh q w aag aa _ iwernga _ elngaatall _ pinighyug te ukut _ quya te ukut _ .
uteghmun _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ K u us m ell egh put _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ q er ng aagh h aam ta _ , _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ kayute ke teqaghte luta _ .
akluma lleg mnnun _ iilqe ste gpenaamta _ angayuqagh mta _ apeghtugh ma aqe ainkut _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ pivake luki _ af l eng ak ng waagh luki _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kayusiite luku _ .
T aan ang u uq _ K u us m ell egh put _ neqamike aqa _ pinigh ghllag _ .
pupig allugh _ mekelghiigh _ nulightugh lghii _ 
ungipaghagh ta a _ T ul ii m
eltughagh ghhagh a _ taana _ pupig ghllag _ quunpeng _ kumeg aqe lghii _ , _ â _ g - g - g _ , _ g - g - g _ . _ â
T aag ken nguq _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ keveg aqe ma kanga _ aghn angll aa tes qell uni _ .
nenglutuqagh _ .
pi ma kanga _ eltughagh n _ , _ â _ aghnangllagh yagh uute nga _ . _ â
I q uk l igh pig agh nun _ aghnangllagh yagh ma lghii _ nengyugh a _ .
taagken _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ â _ Q am aa y _ !
eltughagh ghhagh ma nguq _ panig n _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu nakanga _ . _ â
â _ N ak aan nguq _ .
S ak es qell un i nguq _ pi a _ .
aagra ligh u aghte ngugh lug ni _ ?
