inglu i _ suqagh n _ taakut _ angyagh mun _ all gh u ul eg nun _ , _ pi ng ay u ul eg nun _ , _ taakwavek _ in pi qu us gh aq aq iit _ .
siipnegh _ tamaa na _ suqagh _ siivanllegh nun _ in pi qu us gh aq aq aat _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ , _ angyaleg t _ elqiigh luteng _ ayuqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyaleg t _ kaate lghii ni _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ qepghagh llegh i _ aghvegh m _ , _ angyaleg m _ aa _ elqiigh uute luta _ siv uy ag te t lu _ angyaleg t llu _ .
aquutagh t _ , _ qalugyagh t _ siv uy ag te m _ tugu luki _ mang tag g agh meng _ ikute luteng _ enkaam _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
A qu ut as taa kut _ mangteghagh m _ sivugh u nga kete te _ qavighnga i ta _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
Q al ug y a s _ taakut _ amig m _ aywaa kun _ asighte te aqe ait _ napagh ita _ .
enkaam _ nunivag t _ egsug i _ taakut _ ikute luteng _ peghu aqe lghiit _ , _ aghv eng mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ tugu luki _ , _ itghute luki _ , _ angyagh m _ yug an _ ug lagh tal ng a tuq _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ , _ q i llegh teng ngu us _ taakut _ , _ taqughtekete te _ , _ qiiyngu t _ amenqun _ quyngigh m _ manu i _ melqughtuqagh t _ .
taagken _ ikute te luteng _ naten _ angka i ta _ petug kayugu ait _ .
aavgugh aqe ait _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtala atun _ , _ aghtequgh ligh luki _ , _ enkaam _ qaltaaghwagh ghhagh u ut _ .
qaltaaghwagh ghhagh t _ , _ unaghsigh t _ sa u aat _ , _ ila i _ s uq aa w ut _ , _ tawavek _ kanaghte uute luki _ , _ megh meng _ ila aghte luki _ , _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ tugumiiqe luki _ atghagh aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aquutagh t _ alla _ ila i _ , _ ang y il gh an il nguut _ , _ taakut _ k el qell uki _ , _ uugte luteng _ , _ siv uy ag te t lu _ , _ angyaleg t llu _ .
taakut _ aquutagh t _ angyaleg m _ atuqe luki _ , _ taakut _ angyaleg m _ nulighh i _ angyagh m _ sivuyag an _ kelu kaghagh ani _ , _ m all egh q eng ng waagh aq iit _ ang y a s _ tawaten _ .
angyagh t _ wiin _ iggagte aatagh aqe ait _ tawaten _ t all im aneng _ iggagte aatagh luki _ av iin Ê¼ gh ata _ .
aquutagh teng _ qule mun _ nengug te nghatki _ , _ enkaam _ nulugh igh i te a _ taa m _ qaltaaghwagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te aqe ait _ .
avii nghmeng _ taa q en gh aat a _ , _ enraq _ aghv igh ll uki _ ig g ag aat agh luteng _ .
tawaten _ ama _ inglu anun _ nengug te luki _ av iin Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ ama _ inglu aneng _ aghv igh ll uki _ ama _ qaltaaghwagh teng _ nengug te aqe ait _ qule mun _ .
A v iit _ W u - h u - h u - h uu nguut _ ar at _ av ii meng _ ategh leg t _ .
tawaten _ aviillegh _ W u - h u - h u - h u - h u - h u u _ pi aqe ut _ .
taagken _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ taakut _ aghvegh m _ tegh r ugh waagh i _ sivuyag kun _ neftegtekayugu ut _ .
iike luki _ naten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ , _ mangtagtuumagh ita _ kiwavek _ n ate r ug llak _ tag k ii ta _ mangtag i _ .
N ef teg taq us _ tawaten _ .
taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ taagken _ qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qaghte aghte aqe ait _ sivuke luki _ .
teghrughaagh t _ veghagh m _ iqug ke ai _ , _ iime qaghte luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
V ii s tun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
T egh r ugh aagh us _ taakut _ .
qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qagh qaghaqe ait _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ taakut _ tuune aqe ait _ .
S iv uy ag tet _ sivuke luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ mang tag g agh meng _ pi luten _ , _ megh qagh luteng _ , _ kinguligh ghhagh nun _ , _ iwerngaqun _ angyaleg mun _ .
enkaam _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ puuskaate t _ aghnagh m _ ighu ita _ aku l ang ii kun _ aghvequte aqe ait _ .
tawaten _ whanga llu _ pi kanga _ es tam aneng _ .
pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
puygu laatagh ma aqa _ whangkuta _ sivuke luku _ pi llegh p us _ taana _ .
Agh n a s _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ ilagagh yagh ut _ .
ivi t _ , _ iv iigh un Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ .
ivi u ut _ aghnagh t _ aqume uute luteng _ .
aqumutagh igh luki _ aquutagh m _ taa m _ kelu kaghagh akun _ .
Taa m _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ atghagh naqe lghii ni _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute i tete luki _ unite aqe ai _ enkaam _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
nunanigh pigtu ut _ ilagaate t _ ig l ak g al ek _ .
nalluke anka _ ilagaate t _ , _ liite mangite anka _ iv i s _ tamaakut _ .
I g g w an ing in aat _ iv aagh ull u ug et _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh luteng _ tawaten _ tag l an Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ angyagh t _ usingigh luki _ sayug luki _ kelevagh luki _ .
tamaa na _ angaghqugh luku _ qamestagh _ , _ suqagh n _ inglu i _ manughagh mun _ .
ivi igh ghllag kayugu luki _ .
N un an i pig tu s _ tamaakut _ ivi t _ .
En kaa ng am _ angaghqugh te lghii _ yuug _ esghapag lghii ni _ nun m aag g aq _ , _ ila i _ qamugh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
N un m aag g aq _ mangteghagh meggnun _ aglagh kestagh aqe ut _ ilagagh lghii neng _ nagate magh meng _ .
iglakegte pigte lghiit llu _ , _ aghn agh pag et _ tamaakut _ ima _ m ek elghii gh h aa tem m neng _ .
taana _ Q u w aa r en _ aghvenge kayug _ kiyang _ u pen Ê¼ gh aat anga _ .
nagate kanga _ tamaaken _ .
Q u w aa r en _ P us aan kut _ ata at _ .
ataata ke luku _ whanga _ ayuqe aqa _ .
aghvenge neghtuqagh _ u p o n Ê¼ gh aat anga _ kiyang _ .
enkaam _ nagate lghiinga _ , _ esghapag kanga _ tamaaken _ ima _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u te mneng _ , _ whang kun neng _ pi y aagh ll em n nun _ tawaten _ .
Agh nagh pag et _ iglag kegtagh ghhalek _ .
enkaam _ taaqe aqe ut _ angaghqugh nghmeng _ , _ apeghiigh nghata _ enkaam _ taagken _ enraq _ angyaleg m _ tugukagh mineng _ suqagh meng _ , _ kiyang _ aghnagh t _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ inpite qugh aqe ait _ suqagh meng _ .
enkaam _ inpite qugh nghmeng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ en r agh ng am _ angyagh m _ yug i _ nengigh te ste aqe ait _ .
tamaa na _ qamestagh _ , _ aghvegh m _ llaag i _ , _ talligh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ veghagh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ qengagh i _ , _ iye i _ , _ iye i _ ukut _ iy igh pig aat _ iike luki _ , _ q al t aagh w ag nun _ kanaghte luki _ petug kayugu ut _ .
taakut _ qamestagh t _ , _ taakut llu _ llaag t _ uy v as aghq en negh meng _ apeghiigh aqe kangit _ .
nekegte luki _ tawaten _ taakut _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ taa q en Ê¼ gh ata _ qamestagh i _ taakut _ siqlugagh mun _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ , _ k an aghq ugh aa qu t _ si g l ug agh m iig aq ut _ .
enkaam _ tegh r ugh waagh e s _ taakut _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ pe tu w aq iit _ .
A w atagh pag e s _ taakut _ mangteghagh m _ sivulighte negh akun _ pi ng ay u w aaq elghii t _ , _ petug aqe ait _ .
elqiigh t llu _ mat- aghte luki _ taakut _ apeghiigh aqe lghiit _ , _ agh in Ê¼ gh waagh nun _ n ef tegh qu qay uk _ .
kelqe te aaghet _ quunpeng _ agh in Ê¼ gh waagh nun _ elqiigh t _ .
atungag t _ ukagun _ n as qu ugh u tet _ am y ut leg el l _ yukutate aqe lghiit _ .
kinegh negh meggni _ u ku m _ pi i _ teregh u aghte te neghtu pigte ut _ , _ tu k r u ug taq egk angi _ .
enkaam _ i ghi v g an Ê¼ gh ani _ egh q waagh em _ ilagagh ta i _ taakut _ ivaghullug t _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
qafsina t _ liite kaqe anka _ ilagaate t _ .
elngaatall _ repall _ tu saq n ap ang un a teng llu _ n angll eg g si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ .
wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qugh agh tegh llag luki _ pi aqe kangit _ .
N angll eg g si m _ ang tal ang aneng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
eghte qugh u aagh _ taana _ tanqigh mun _ pi ngun Ê¼ ghi l nguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
K ag pag aal ghii _ sivuke luku _ tuune kayugu lghii _ .
aghvegh mun _ tawavek _ n angll eg g s ii si q _ .
qerngughte i sigh _ taana _ , _ kiyang _ aghvegh _ taana _ angegh llegh u lghii _ unake naqe yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ amalka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflenga kaqe kangit _ tunusagh u luki _ tukfigh sigh u luki _ .
tawaten _ uspeqe llegh i _ nakaan _ tanqigh mun _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tanqigh mun _ pi llgh un il uki _ pi aqe kangi _ .
moon _ w o r s h ip - meng _ ata iqe ai _ apeghtughiste mta _ whangkuta _ .
tanqigh mun _ pi ngun Ê¼ ghi l nguut _ , _ yupig ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tunusagh t _ .
T a z im ak er ug llak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ taana _ .
ima _ siv ul iigh aghn eng _ y uk s ug g aagh neng _ liisimake kangat _ repall _ atigh igate aat _ ell qugh ll uku _ ategh aneng _ , _ aa ng es q em _ aa ng tal ang aneng _ .
A t ii p all aagh yaghq aa nguq _ aange uq _ , _ t all ugh nagh pe tugh nguq _ .
enkaam _ apa meng _ atigh luku _ ayuqe aat _ , _ aa ng es q em _ ang taa l ang aneng _ .
aghvegh m llu _ uyvasaghqe llegh a _ 
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a _ 
taakut _ llaag t _ eghqwaagh naqe lghii ni _ keneligh luteng _ .
uksugh mi _ uqfigagh m _ tangigh llegh m _ q aam n angi _ am es t aagh h aat _ , _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ pe tug t aagh aqegk ang it _ aagra ni _ quunpeng _ kinegh ghngaita _ .
paneghte aqe kangit _ kenegh kun _ .
K um aghh negh meg g ni _ taakut _ uqfigagh m _ ggiillegh i _ p an egh qugh aaq iit _ uglaghi naqe pigte luki _ .
En kaa ng am _ tawaten _ taakut _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ taakut _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ , _ pi nga yu t _ un ug et _ qavagh t _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ qepghagh u ngugh lug ni _ q av an Ê¼ gh ani _ aghte negh ni _ , _ m aal gh un eng _ i ghi v g agh ni _ tawaten _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taakut _ ilagaate t _ atugh aatagh aqe ait _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ agh llegh em _ taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ petug nga lghiit _ qeteghte aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ keneligh luki _ eghqwaagh luteng _ ama _ iike luki _ , _ i teg si n Ê¼ gh u ut _ mangtagti a _ taakwegkut _ .
natengiighhaq _ es l egk ak aan _ entaqun _ naten _ iqetutka aqe ut _ o n e _ f o o t- n a- h al f - neng _ , _ f iv e _ inches _ es l egk ak ii ta _ .
T egh r ugh aagh e s _ taakut _ mangtag i _ uteghmun _ iike luki _ , _ taakut _ ken gh et _ kum agh ll uki _ eghqwaagh aqlaatagh kangit _ tamaaken _ ggiillegh meng _ panegh qugh magh meng _ .
enkaam _ aw atagh p aag et lu _ ikugh aqe ut _ , _ aquutagh t llu _ taakut _ iike magh ita _ .
qalugyagh t llu _ nefteghqe aqe aat _ , _ taawa _ taaqe nghmegteki _ apeghiigh aqe aat _ taaqe aqe ut _ amalka _ aghvegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ .
enkaam _ iye i _ taakut _ qageghte luki _ sa kun _ qalusiqagh kun _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun llu _ megh i _ taakut _ ila ke luki _ iye an _ megh i _ .
tamaa na _ ggiillegh m _ panellegh a _ akuute aqe aat _ mesiigh meng _ ila aghte luki _ ug l aa ghi nal uki _ akuute aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ akuute nghmeng _ taaqe nghmegteki _ angyagh m _ sivuyag i _ aghenqignegh i _ aghvegh ghhagh t _ , _ m i ngu ugh h utaq iit _ puyugh meng _ taagken _ .
T ag neq eg te pig tu ut _ uq f iig am _ ggiillegh an _ panellegh i _ .
aghvegh t _ ulima aqe ait _ aghenqignegh m _ tu ng ang akun _ , _ saghumignegh an _ tu ng ang akun _ veghagh ghhagh inagh t _ pi aqe ait _ asitmun _ teregh luki llu _ inglugtun _ .
enkaam _ aq u ut a s _ taakut _ amalka _ piineqe aqe ait _ aligh a _ taakut _ qu ul q am _ tu ng aa ng akun _ taaggun _ asitmun _ ighighte luteng _ ayuqe ut _ s l an t- el uteng _ .
qulighnegh i llu _ taakut _ m ing ugh h aq iit _ .
enkaam _ tagneqegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ kinegh ngllagh aqe ait _ .
taawa _ aghvegh m _ taana _ uyvasaghqe llegh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
alla _ angyagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ .
A ng yagh tugh lu uteng _ ayveghni ii aagh _ pi luku _ .
ila i llu _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ ama _ tawaten _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ ellmeng _ pi llegh megestun _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ .
tawaten _ ama _ veghagh i _ siqlugagh mig kayug it _ .
enkaam _ sa mun _ ang yagh tu mun _ ll iigh aq us _ taawa _ .
qamestagh m _ aavgugh llegh i _ uyvasaghqe llegh i llu _ 
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a _ 
enkaam _ angyagh uute luteng _ tawaten _ , _ ang yagh n aq _ kayaali nghaani _ enkaam _ taakut _ qamestagh i _ aqfa luki _ angaghqugh luki _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ qu ul v aghq aaq es tan gh ani _ p eg g et _ sa u aat _ kayute kellug ke i _ ang agh qu mun _ .
enkaam _ ighleke aqe kangit _ , _ whangkuta qun _ kayute teng _ .
taakut _ ama _ tawaten _ uy v as aghq el g et _ .
eghqwaagh qagh luteng _ ama _ tawaten _ , _ taawa _ apegh iin Ê¼ gh ata _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ elngaatall _ pil iigh un neq eg g s aat kay uk _ qamestagh m _ mangtag aneng _ .
aavgugh luki _ naten _ umu tate ke ii te a _ qamestagh m _ am es taa llgh i _ , _ mangteghagh nun _ awaligh uute kaqe ait _ .
wetku _ tawani _ nengighqe aqe ait _ .
mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ ama _ imiisagh leg _ sa meng _ piyukekagh meggneng _ .
En kaa ng am _ aghnaghaghhagh t llu _ aw al igh tu mun _ , _ aw al igh tugh y un egh tugh q aag aq ii _ .
imiisagh u ut _ akileghtuusagh t _ amalka _ .
aghnagh u aghagh aat _ sa meng _ neqe meng _ negh yug n ameng _ pi aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ ayghigh luteng llu _ aw aal igh tugh naq aq elghii t _ .
taawa _ taa q en Ê¼ gh aat a _ tegh r uugh aagh e s _ taakut _ petug aqe lghiit _ aagra m _ qula akun _ .
A G H Q E S A G H T U M _ pi a _ 
P el aa si m _ apegh llegh a _ 
enkaam _ ang yagh n aq _ kay aal in Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ enraq _ aghq es agh tu mun _ pikayug ni _ .
ila ke te lghii _ , _ kelgute te luta _ siivanllegh t _ , _ taakut _ aghvengekagh ni _ teghrughaagh t _ .
aghnagh t _ kelgugh luki _ q er ngugh ul uteng _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
qasiqagh m _ itegagh a _ , _ mangtag _ , _ aghn a s _ tamaakut _ , _ mangtag _ agaghte i i ragh u aagh _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng llu _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ quyngigh m llu _ tulimagh aneng _ pi ma aqe aat _ p am aa ken _ atghagh tekagh meng _ .
Q is g eng an kut _ , _ A nagh as u ug en kut _ , _ W iy allu _ taana _ pikayug _ iknaqe llegh a _ umiileg _ .
enkaam _ kum agh ll uteng _ ungagagh meng _ qiigh aqe luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ â _ A a siv aa s aam n a _ t aa _ , _ â _ siv un Ê¼ gh et _ tuqlugh aqe luki _ tag il agh aa tes qell uki _ ken Ê¼ ghem _ asi anun _ neghe ste naqe ni luki _ eghqwaagh aqe kangit _ .
taagken _ apegh iin Ê¼ gh ata _ neghe uute ghllag aqe ukut _ .
teghrughaagh t _ nengighqe aqe luki _ neghe uute aqe ut _ .
elngaatall _ neqe m _ neqnigh lleghpigagh i _ tegh r uugh aagh e s _ taakut _ piinlegh i _ k in Ê¼ gh ag an egh meg g ni _ , _ kii _ mesiigh _ uqlughte nanigh negh meggni _ , _ g ev y agll uteng _ tesqamani _ s aan igh r u ug tek es tagh lu uteng _ aa _ urang _ neqnigh ut _ neqe t _ .
elngaatall _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ .
taaqe negh mta _ kenegh mun _ alleg luta _ veg meng _ sa meng _ .
A t gh amun _ kilgaaqu te aqe ukut _ mekelghiigh ni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luni _ tawaten _ angyaleg a _ , _ angyagh meng _ taaqe llegh at _ p u v aa ll al uku _ , _ taa k w an ing ani _ aghqesaghtugh aqe luteng _ .
allakagh meng _ pi vig leg t _ alngunak _ kinku t _ .
kiyang _ yug a _ aghq es agh tugh v il i k _ n aan taq luteng _ .
ila i _ angyagh meng _ pi aqe luteng _ .
kiyang _ qamagte luni _ .
enkaam _ amalka _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ , _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ sangiighhagh a _ , _ p u v all ar aa llgh aa _ , _ aghq es agh tu m s uk _ apeghiigh aqe kangat _ J un e -em _ kiyang _ naange nghaani _ taakwani _ .
enkaam _ July _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ , _ sa mun _ nunivagseghagh mete te _ saghna vig _ , _ ne w _ y e ar - ngu s qell uku _ . _ alla _ nutaghagh _ amalka _ ay um i qu l eq _ igleghte te aqe kangat _ .
taawa _ sa u a _ n ul ugh y aq _ , _ an av ag y aq _ atuqe magh an _ .
aghnagh t _ aghulaghqugh te aqe lghiit _ iwerngaqun _ kiilqusigh _ al iin Ê¼ gh un Ê¼ gh aani _ .
aghhunneghagu _ avelghagh gpenateng _ navek _ pi aqe luteng _ .
N ul ugh y aq _ , _ kayu _ pin Ê¼ gh ani _ , _ n ef kaa q luku _ , _ mesiigh kun _ ateghte aqe luku _ .
uukagh _ tawaten _ ama _ mesiigh mun _ ateghte aqe luku _ ila a _ .
aghula i te gpenani _ yug a _ legh iitu te mneng _ esghapag lleg mni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ pi ma inagh _ , _ ila a _ tamaa na _ sang ll aq _ navek _ pi igate ngughk _ .
sa meng _ angyagh meng _ ulima _ .
ila a _ mallu nge aqe luni _ , _ u ug teng aq luni _ , _ aghv egh m eng lu _ mallu nge aqe luteng _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh meng _ m all ung en Ê¼ gh ata _ pi laghate aqe luni _ .
kelgugh aqe kangit _ aq f a tes qell uki _ aghvegh meng _ m all ung en Ê¼ gh ata _ , _ aghvesiigh meng _ , _ qu ng v uugh agh meng _ wataghllak _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ pilag nghmegteki _ , _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ pilag aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ne iitagh ke luki _ .
taakwavek _ qenwat qun _ esgha _ aghvepig llu _ qenwat qun _ ne iitagh ke luku _ lliigh lghii _ m aa te mun _ ukavek _ wha _ tawaten _ .
sivuligh _ 
sivungagh m _ Kiyagh taa llgh a _ neghigh luku _ 
mat- yu ke aq _ sivungagh mii _ 
K ing i kaam _ apegh llegh a _ 

A neng aqa _ maavek _ lliigh magh ita _ tagi ukut _ wetku _ .
anengagh ka _ , _ aghnaa igh te yan _ kayagte aanga _ qepghagh te yaghtigh sqellug qu _ q er ngugh ut kaa g ut _ 
amen- a _ q ap r aghq aqegk angi _ ayvigtegh mii t llu _ 
quyngigh m _ en kaa ng am _ tag ii ku t lu _ 
taagken _ A taq am _ tagi ukut llu _ 
kayusigh yaghtigh sqe a _ ataqagh m _ ellng it lu _ 
T a z ig n ata _ qenwat _ ellngit llu _ 
tazigna ta _ mangteghagh at _ , _ 
sivuke luta _ , _ el ngaatall _ aaygu m _ maaten _ nayugh kekagh ani _ 
I ng agh qu un n em ta _ s ak igh ll uta _ elngaatall _ q av aghv ig il nguq _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ sakighte luta _ pi ngu yagh pe taa t _ qavaghvig ite ngughk _ tamaani _ it gh aa sim akanga _ 
igaghvig _ sakmavek _ pi u yaghpete aat _ 
llaaghanwha _ legan _ F ar l is -en kut _ 
A g Ê¼ ghi l ghiit _ nag ate v y iigh an ka _ , _ n em _ k el ut ang ani _ taa m ani _ pinagh u yankut _ .
Tam aa ke y ag g aq _ nagate vyiigh anka _ sigh un gh i _ ne m _ .
Enkaam _ quyngigh neng _ Ung a z igh m ii m _ aange lghiik _ m aana _ 
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ ungazighmii m _ neli kaqsagh kanga _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ m ak ell uku _ .
enkaam _ amani _ sivukekagh _ 
alghigh ta ani _ l o g _ h o us e- meng _ 
whangkuta _ n u te m _ tawaten _ mangteghagh luta _ .
almesiqe a _ nutem _ tawaten _ 
K el ul igh negh it gun _ u w al igh negh it gun _ mang tegh agh tu kut _ 
kelulighnegh itgun _ .
El ngaatall _ n aat qu lluni _ 
elngaatall _ nategh ke te luni _ N egh ell gh en kuk _ , _ S ii v aghh aan kuk _ salngagkwaagh m _ .
elngaatall _ taake uk _ neghe llegh nkuk _ , _ t aan allu _ taghnughhagh ke lukek _ en taqun _ 
enkaam _ taw ani _ it ghagh y u wh aagh aq ng am ta _ , _ taana llu _ saki ni _ entaqun _ .
A m avek _ tawani _ itghagh yuwhaagh aqngamta _ taa kut _ siv ung iigh h am n ni _ itghagh sigh nkut _ maavek _ 
amavek _ maaken _ A y v ig tegh meng _ taakut _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ itghagh kau lghiit _ .
maghagh mete te _ taa m ani _ ayvigtegh meng _ amaken _ tawani _ kiig ani _ 
A ng y iigh utk at
angyi aghte tke aat _ 
malghukuraagh _ tesqawani _ unguvigagh m _ tapghagh ani _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa ke aq _ aquutagh ii aghagh luni _ wallu _ tepe kau a _ 
yug i _ naa y gh at _ pugughileghmii t _ tume liqe luteng _ q im ug si meng _ naalkekagh it _ 
samagun _ naayghagh t _ taa m _ ivagh luki _ qimugsigh meng _ u llegh sim akanga _ 
U llegh ll uku _ kitum _ tal wa _ akuz in an igh luni _ nangllaghqe ghllag yan _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ i wh an i m _ naayghagh t _ .
up- lleghte luku _ iv agh it _ talwa _ akuzi nanigh luni _ mal gh u ku r aagh em _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ .
piiwagh te u yagh kangi _ taana _ kinku t _ .
esghaqagh kau ma aqa _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ tes q aw ani _ 
unguvigagh m _ entaqun _ tapghagh ani _ tesqawani _ .
napaqagh ghllag a llu _ taa wa _ taana llu _ yugusigh a _ .
kingu a llu _ 
uugte aq _ 
T u qu ll uku _ tawani _ , _ el ngaatall _ taana _ veghtekagh llu _ n at ang aneng _ tu u f qagh t alghii _ wallu _ 
tuqute luku _ kagimtegkangat _ q em all _ elngaatall _ taana _ negh eg kaa n _ en taqun _ tuufqaghtagh lghii _ m igh y am _ 
ii _ aghnalqwaagh _ qemall _ .
Tam aani _ aghn aagh te kaa g uq _ nayag ak _ 
tamaani _ aghnaaghtekau uq _ taana _ 
iknaqe qrug raaghinagh _ elngaatall _ 
T es k an an te f tut _ angyi lghii _ 
A ng uk s ak aq sagh ap ut _ am ak en _ angyi lghii _ m aa v ek _ tekeghagh an _ , _ tes k an ani _ tu ku ghii _ 
anguksag kaqsagh aput _ amaken _ tapghapagagh meng _ maavek _ lliigh yama _ qugh aghq ugh v ik luteng _ .
whaten _ ayuqe yaghpete ut _ tam aani _ enkaam _ iighsuute meng _ qughagh qugh vike luteng _ 
arekull _ m aani _ tamaani _ tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ 
I ng l unga _ maani _ taakut _ enkaam _ ay ag sigh luku _ 
inglu a _ qaake luku _ angyaghwaagh m _ 
tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ m aa v ek _ 
mat- yu ke aq _ sivuke pigte luni _ maavek _ lliigh kau uq _ K ii w eg neng _ 
enkaam _ tuqu yan _ 
angyaghpag ghllag _ un a _ 
Taw ani _ una _ k i ngu m i kun _ angyaghpag ghllag _ pi nga yug qu ragh u aagh _ el qagh t aghh agh meng _ esghagh ma aqa _ taana _ 
tawani _ esghagh aqe yamkun _ kingu mikun _ whaten _ ig aghv i k _ tag it aa _ lliigh ma lghii _ ig aghv ik s u wh aaq _ 
P in aa y am _ maagun _ uyghigh uq _ .
Taw aten _ itghagh tke a _ tawani _ tes ak m um llu _ 
tawaten _ pi luku _ umiileg llu _ tes ak m u m _ apeghtughiste a _ kina u yagh uq _ 
I p a _ wallu _ , _ ig agh yagh v ik s u wh aaq a _ apeghtughiste a _ C am p b ell - ngu yagh tuq _ 
ipa _ apeghtugh i sta _ apegh tu ghi s ta _ igaghyagh vike yuwhaagh ka _ whanga _ 
elngaatall _ taana _ apeghtugh i sta _ qepghaqagh ghllag pestaagh u yagh uq _ C al i f o r n i a- meng _ 
S an _ angeles- meng _ tagi kau uq _ taana _ L o s _ A ng el e s _ 
sa n _ n aten _ uughqa ghhagh anite ngughk _ taana _ aghv in gh ani _ angeles _ 
W et k u _ naten _ angka aqa _ akileghtuusagh a _ 
wetku _ upenghagh ghhagh inagh mi _ m a il eng egk ay uk _ taana _ 
En kaa ng am _ wetku _ K u us m em illu _ taana _ yuug _ Y e ar - m illu _ 
P ug u ghi legh meng _ elngaatall _ kuusme mi llu _ .
pugughilegh meng _ wetku _ tagi aqe luni _ tes am avek _ 
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ 
petgegh nghhagh _ 
quyngighqwaagh t _ liisimakekagh nka _ , _ w allu _ igh ung an _ ken l eng akun _ pinagh u yankut _ 
imagh yagh ghllag luku _ p a si s k angat _ i o d in e- meng _ wallu _ ighu an _ kenle akun _ 
taaghta mun _ I meg y uu te m _ w allu _ aghaligh naqe luku _ tuqute ni luku _ 
ata an _ P in aa y am _ wallu _ pasike kanga _ P et g en gh h aq _ 
elngaatall _ s am ani _ iknaqughi ni yagh aa _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ , _ 
esghaghhu nguq _ samani _ tapghagh mun _ taagavek _ quugsaghtugh negh meggni _ taana _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ kakegllugiitagh mineng _ 
quyngigh m _ ataasigh m _ katamngwaagh _ 
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe a _ P et g en gh h aq _ 
Enkaam _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ tuqu yan _ .
enkaam _ quyngighqwaagh uq _ taana _ .
taakut _ amalka _ piinligh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ l aal in eng _ 
entaqun _ n all uk egk egk a _ maaken _ laaligh neng _ ungipamsug meng _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ .
Enkaam _ nalluke kegka _ whanga _ aq f at aq luteng _ sivuqagh _ 
enkaam _ pugughilegh mun _ neqe meng _ aqfate aqe luteng _ y ul gu tu s alghiit _ 
kiyalighagh t _ maakut _ .
ungipamsug ke luki _ 
alaka ghhagh _ 
U y iigh meng _ am el tu l ke k _ us p utaq agh l uk ek _ , _ kukuleg mii u uq _ entaqun _ taana _ alaka ghhagh u uq _ .
uyiigh meng _ nal ug un negh min i _ usputagh qagh lukek _ .
aag vig kaghte luni nguq _ nalugute nghmini _ aghvigh qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ utegh mun _ 
ighleke aqe kangat _ qetgegh luni _ uy am ig aat ak ek _ uteghmun _ megh mun _ ifkagh na yu kan _ uyghag ghllag u lghii _ 
A all gha _ n aten _ wh aten _ maalghug _ uyghag ghllag k _ f e e t- em y aa k _ , _ 
aag llegh a _ naten _ whaten _ entaqun _ ten _ taw avek _ .
T ap gh ap ag ami
tapghapagagh mi _ 
taagken _ uq ugh ut aghh ang un aam ta _ itghagh te luta _ amavek _ 
sa qaghte laatagh sta _ uqughte ta ghhagh ngunaamta _ itghagh ma lghiikut _ aghnegh taq elghii kut _ 
nefkuuragh put _ elngaatall _ sika ke lghii stun _ aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ q i negh pegh waagh yagh luku _ 
esghaghhu _ leg an _ tes pik eg ken _ quyngigh _ qineghpeghwaagh yagh luku _ esghagh ma kanginkut _ , _ 
esghagh luta _ legan _ tespikegken _ neq egh llag un iit _ am a _ naayghagh meng _ taa m ani _ samavek _ 
taagken _ ungipaate luku _ taa m _ neqe ghllag u na ait _ ama _ elqiileg mi _ taamani _ ak m ag yagh tu nga _ 
U naa mi _ W iigh allu _ tag ii kun g _ whanga _ maligte luku _ taama _ pi ukung _ akmag yagh unga _ neqe meng _ .
unaami _ W aagh naa m _ tagi ukung _ esne perewaagh kun _ akmag aatagh lutung _ quyngigh meng _ siv ung iigh h am teg ni _ ayvegh meng _ sa meng _ p am u m _ 
taamani _ tem ng i _ pennagh ghhagh ita _ qaye itni _ ak m ag aat al eg llag ul ghii nga _ aga _ 
aatakqun _ temngi _ pi yagh aqa _ esgh a _ kiyagh taa ll eq _ pin ii pig s alghii _ 
taagken _ kaate lutung _ tamaani _ esgha _ , _ pi niigh pigte yagh lghii _ P in aa y an kut _ 
taana _ tu v gh aq luku _ amalka _ 
P e d er s en
pedersen _ 
pedersen _ una _ kaate nghaani _ ilangakun _ sakmavek _ piiwagh aqe lghiit _ P e d er s en _ it gh aq ayug uy alghii _ akike yaghtugh aqe kangat _ kaviigh _ 
I l ang akun _ itghagh yamta _ taamavek _ tawaten _ aglagh yamta _ 
ilangakun _ taamaken _ upag aqe lghiikut _ maavek _ u un Ê¼ g gun _ 
ilangakun _ ellnga n _ pi ll ek r u r aa ghi n aq _ .
umiileg _ taana _ pilleg qrug raaghinagh _ n aag u _ 
aga _ siku m _ tugu luku _ naagu _ maaqute aqe a _ s ak m ak en _ 
entaqun _ alpag te nghatni _ ang yagh u um agh mi _ whaa _ ak il p eg aam agh mi _ sakmaken _ .
pedersen _ taana _ angyaghugh magh mi _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghvepig mun _ angyaghughtu yaghpete uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ sivuqagh mete luta _ salin _ 
naghughte aqe uq _ 
En taqun _ 
entaqun _ m aaten _ wh aa _ ang yagh p ang es t iigh us k anga _ liite kau lghiinga _ 
esghaghhu qun _ maaten _ whaa _ es n aan eng _ s ameng _ 
P iy akun _ piiwagh negh meggni _ B e a r _ esnagh aneng _ sa meng _ .
piyag qu te _ C o m p an y - ll uteng _ tawaten _ ak il p eg agh luteng _ .
Taw aten _ N o m e- es aghq aa negh meg g ni _ tawaten _ akilpegagh luteng _ uk s ugh h aan eng _ 
tawaten _ p iiq at _ aki kaghqagh meng _ yataaghqe aqe lghiit _ uksugh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ kaa ng qu q luku _ 
naten _ pi aqe aat _ ak ik luteng _ taana _ .
esghaghhu qun _ suqagh meng _ akike luteng _ .
Ch e e c h ak o _ umyugagh meggneng _ lliigh ut _ tes ak m u m _ 
S ay uk ay uk _ allgeghllug qu _ sivuqagh m _ s an igh ll uku _ s ayug aqegk angat _ 
sa yukagh yu k _ tes p am ani _ whaten _ sanighte luku _ sayug aqe kangat _ S aap l ang u f tuq _ aat gha _ .
enkaam _ tespamani _ ungazigh mi _ malghukuraagh _ , _ am a _ ategh a _ , _ 
enkaam _ avate mi _ tawani _ 
tukfigh iqe ait _ pag a _ N o m e- a _ 
maaten _ paga _ nak m iigh aq saq ata _ angyaghpag ngestagh meng _ avaqraggiighute ma uq _ ak m avek _ 
wetku _ entaqun _ nakmiigh aqe yagh kata _ tamaaken _ 
tawaten _ nula kau uq _ sivu nge aq _ , _ 
sivuke pigte luku _ A m ag un kuk _ ungazighmii m _ n ay ak luku _ atghagh luni _ taa kut _ .
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ A m ag u _ taa wa _ nayag ke luku _ .
taana _ S un aagh r ug em _ taawa _ iknaqe qrug pigte yaghtu uq _ , _ 
iwernga _ 
El ngaatall _ 
elngaatall _ upenghagh u uute nghaani _ payangite nghaani _ malig ll uki _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ 
tespamaken llu _ pangeghte luteng _ m ek elghii gh h aal unga _ maligte luki _ 
ukavek _ lliigh yug niite ghllag luta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ am s an agh ll uk _ 
tespamavek _ nangenqagh naqe yagh luta _ tegh ig ill iq l uta _ amsanaghllug _ elngaatall _ .
amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ teghigagh ighlliqe luta _ evlug ghllag t _ kaate luki _ im ani _ 
entaqun _ pi y alghii kut _ , _ kaate kaqe ke put _ amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ evlug ghrugllag t _ mal igh qugh luteng _ 
taagken _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ k itu m _ alngunak _ nallagh aput _ qavregh meng _ malighqugh luteng _ pi kay ug u f taa t _ 
tawaten _ malighqugh llegh ke ut _ B e a r _ kitum _ alngunak _ ayvasaa stekagh a _ naghulleg nghmegteggu nguq _ ellngit a _ pikayug u aat _ .
P iy a _ un a _ C o as t _ G u ar d _ tespamavek _ aq im l eng igh tugh ta _ .
A pegh tu ghi s te m _ una _ apegh luki _ P iy an ku nun _ Cutter _ 
apeghtughiste m _ tawavek _ 
sa n _ aa llgh a _ 
Taa meng _ aag llegh a _ q em igh t aagh yagh tuq _ 
taameng _ pi yameng _ taa m _ i wh an in kut _ A ngu s aat en kut _ 
I wh an in ku ngu yagh pe tun Ê¼ nguq _ ip a _ aghv igh yaghq at _ , _ angu sagh u te nkut _ u kut _ , _ aghvigh te kaqsagh ai _ taaggun _ k in kut _ S un aagh r ug en kut _ 
En kaa ng am _ ipa _ aghvigh yaghqagh t _ k an avek _ igaghyagh kayug t _ ukut _ b r i d g e- el ii m an ik angat _ , _ entaqun _ kinku t _ taa k m an ll uki _ ellng it _ kina u uq _ 
En kaa ng am _ kiyaghte luni _ k el g ut aqegk angi _ kanavek _ sa n _ taana _ b r i d g e- egh llak _ .
Wh ak en _ eltughagh minun _ kelgute aqe kangi _ igaqegkagh nite luku _ esghagh nghminigu _ taana _ G ate - mun _ en taqun _ 
whaken _ sa n _ b r i d g e- el ii m an iiq aat _ navek _ 
tawavek _ kenle ke luku _ aghv iq r aa llgh a _ ellng it _ 
En kaa ng am _ utegh n igh tut _ aghvigh qragh u llegh a _ ellngit _ , _ k in ang u yagh tuq _ 
I n uugh nguq _ uteghnigh ut _ ig aq ay u ug te v y iiq aal ghii _ malghukuraagh kun _ um iil g anun _ kina u yagh uq _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ 
A y g ugh tuun naq ng ata _ taana _ tag il uteng _ leg an _ umiileg anun _ lata ste luku _ 
aygugh uute naqe yata _ tawavek _ tagi luteng _ 
ivagh i ma _ aghnagh _ 
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
elngaatall _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ iknaqe lghii _ p ak r eg ng aghh agh mi _ yuguma neghtuqagh _ repall _ .
W et k u _ taa m _ nekeve nanigh luni _ k i ngu ng aneng _ tuq uk aq _ talwa _ 
wetku _ aat gha _ , _ kingu aneng _ tuqukagh _ K ar g in kuk _ 
ivagh i ma u uq _ ategh a _ ug ik saq anga _ , _ P aa ll eng et aq _ p an ik luku _ nayag ak _ 
sivuke luku _ tuqu lagh aatk ak _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ enkaam _ Q al um ll u nguq _ panike luku _ .
taake uk _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ qamagte lutek _ enkaam _ 
ama _ taana llu _ tuqukagh _ tug uk aa _ 
taagken _ enkaam _ agh y u p aa r igh llag lu tek _ tugukagh a _ , _ 
taake uk _ ne k _ , _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ , _ wetku _ , _ q in u yug utk ell uku _ tuqu lagh aatk ak _ kingu aneng _ 
flu- lutek _ qerngagh egmek _ taana _ .
iknaqe pigte ma lghii _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ all at _ 
ayumigh _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ ayvii llegh it _ alla t _ maaten _ pilleg mnneng _ .
ayvegh meng _ I v agh im am _ ang tugh pag em _ uteghvagh qu te _ iike aqe kangit _ neqetuumagh ita _ s aa y gu m _ 
S iv ul iigh ap ut
sivu liigh aput _ 
T aag an ii _ apegh llegh a _ 
Q af si n a _ qiighqagh _ maana _ yugtu pigte ma yagh lghii _ , _ 
qafsina _ villages- nge ma yagh lghii _ aghn aq egh r ug aat _ sivuqagh _ P ag al iit _ sa igh kuvek _ 
a qaa _ T u us aan kuk _ aghnagh ke ghrug aat _ p an ig ak _ pagaliit _ 
pagaliit _ n uy ek l igh pig aan iiq aa _ .
A ng leg ut ku ll ghiit _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ enkaam _ 
anglegute ke te lghiit _ y ul g ul uku _ enkaam _ ellnga _ .
kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ repall _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ K u ku l g utk aq aat _ 
angayuqagh gkenka nguq _ tesakmaken _ kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ kukuleg u te kaqe aat _ ellnga _ s an ing it neng _ 
K ii _ kukuleg mun _ tagyuqa ut _ q aa y nga _ taakwavek _ ketliqagh t _ sani itneng _ naa v gh u tuq _ igleghte aat _ 
kii _ S iv uq ameng _ nenglu m _ qaye a _ 
angyaghyage neng _ sivuqagh meng _ aragh ut _ t aag g un Ê¼ nguq _ 
taamagun _ tam lii v ig un iiq aat _ ang y igh v ig um agh mi _ , _ tamlag ut _ taana _ 
taana nguq _ tamlu ii vig u na iqe aat _ 
yugtu pigte yaghpete uq _ ang yagh t eng _ 
elngaatall nguq _ angyagh eng _ saafte nghite aat _ tenpe te aqngan _ 
yug m nguq _ ungip am s uk aq ii _ taagken _ 
tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe ai _ .
yug lgu luku nguq _ liisimake a _ p iiq egk angat _ 
Taw at en Ê¼ nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ 
I i _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ aghn agh all eg aat _ entaqun _ .
ii _ pi negh meg tek i _ , _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ ang v ig a pig tut _ 
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ at ku gu ll uteng _ , _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ 
pi nghmegteki _ tag tal mi _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ tes q ag a _ 
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ nagh uy am e nguq _ at ku g pag ull uteng _ .
pi nghmegteki _ T ul iin kut _ nal igh negh it _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ en taqun _ 
esgha _ , _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ u kut _ 
qangeghsagh mii t _ , _ P ung ugh m iit _ kiwatangaghmii t _ elngaatall _ 
kiwatangaghmii u na iqe ait _ , _ pungughmii t _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
P in aa y am _ n uy ek l igh pig aan iiq aa _ P et g en gh h aq _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ 
M ek elghii gh ul uteng _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ petgegh nghhagh _ aag n a _ , _ aw lug ke i _ aam ta _ en taqun _ 
mekelghiigh u luteng _ wh aten _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aagna _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aamta _ entaqun _ seghleghllug u ma yagh uq _ m et ng egh ull aat aam akanga _ 
Q aw aag yagh yagh luteng _ whaten _ E gh q aagh aam _ gu ut qagh f i kum akanga _ taana _ anengagh mi _ , _ S iv uq ami _ qawaagniighusigh at _ 
qawaagyagh yagh luteng _ S iv uq am ell uni _ ungip aa _ guute qaghte vike ma kanga _ taana _ aw lug ke i _ 
Taa wa _ sivuqagh mete luni _ ungipagh a _ S i qu v ek lu _ aghnaghagh u luni _ ug l aghn iiq sagh aa _ 
taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ tawaten _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .
A taa sigh h aghn e nguq _ esla ani _ tawaten _ amsanaghtu pigte yagh na iqe a _ en r agh nguq _ elngaatall _ uk s um i _ 
ataasigh ghhaghte negh nge uq _ aghnegh t _ qafsina t _ naqam _ 
naqam _ aliigh nghmini _ t aag ani _ siv un em n ni _ 
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ taagani _ sivunegh mnni _ .
uksaagh mi _ ang yagh n aq _ taa qagh es nan gh ani _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ mang tegh as q waagh m un Ê¼ nguq _ 
upenghagh mi _ mang tegh agh p ate nguq _ taaqe ghesnagh nghaani _ .
taakut _ k ag pag aq iit _ naafqe aqe ait _ 
K iig mun _ kagpag aqe ait _ s um m e r _ 
kiig mun _ tam aakut _ m ek es t aagh h aag ut _ mang tegh agh pag neng _ nuugte aqe lghiit _ 
B e d r o o m - m eng i _ tamaakut _ mekestaaghhaa ut _ at i llgh i _ .
En k ang am _ qaamkut _ taa w ani _ atigh llegh i _ am al ka _ 
Q ul angi _ sivungagh ni _ taawani _ g aagh v ig et _ amalka _ 
qula i _ tam aakut _ taw at en n iiq iit _ gaagh vig t _ 
mangteghasqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ tawatete na iqe ait _ aan legh aa s u wh aagh luni _ 
Taw a teng waagh nguq _ sivuqagh _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ aanleghaate yuwhaagh luni _ .
E s gha _ siquveg mi _ tesamani _ ayuqe na iqe ait _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ s aam _ ungipamsug kaqe a _ q iigh q am _ 
S iv uq aghh iin aq _ entaqun _ .
sivuqagh ghhagh inagh _ v i llag e -em _ il anga _ 
tamaa na _ aap q aqaa _ ila a _ 
tawaten _ apegh kaqe a _ yug igh ll ak aq sagh aa _ 
K u ku l ek _ sivuqagh llu _ yug igh ghllag kaqsagh aa _ tam aa tu m _ iwernga _ esgha _ siipnegh u ma lghii _ il ung ani _ 
kukuleg _ entaqun _ esgha _ K u ku l ek _ p aagh q iit k aq _ .
qantaghaqun _ entaqun _ 
nanigh u llegh a _ pugughilegh m _ 
pugughilegh _ nan uu m _ neng l ung it _ pennagh t _ .
neli yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ nanugh m _ nenglu it _ 
nellug yug negh meggni _ unite aqe luki _ t aag an ing ani _ 
tawatete yaghpete uq _ pugughilegh _ A v at meng _ at gh aq aq _ 
yuug nguq _ tespamaken _ avate meng _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ 
sivuke luni nguq _ tapghugh kun _ neli kau uq _ aw av aq aan l e nguq _ 
tapghugh _ uksugh mi _ neqe niigh vig a _ 
pugughilegh mun _ teve ma lghii _ iv agh it k aa _ 
tawaten _ nanugh _ ivagh i tke a _ naten _ , _ kum agh taq luku _ 
tawaten _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ nanghiiqu ma kanga _ n aan gh aan eng _ ay aa w aq luni _ ken gh ek _ sa u a _ .
taawa nguq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ q er ngugh tegh llag luni _ nanugh m _ naanghagh aneng _ ayaawagh ke luni _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ taawagun _ 
Taa w ang uq _ aneghnegh an _ agepsughte luku _ P ug u ghi l eq _ 
taawa nguq _ yuggagh m _ t aag an ing ani _ pugughilegh _ 
nanugh m nguq _ ne ke yaghpete a _ .
tawaten _ apegh aqe aat _ 
T aan ata _ kingikagh at _ 
taana ta _ esghaghhu _ whanga _ ategh ka _ me ke negh i _ at egh meng _ 
M ek en egh si ngu ugh nguq _ lii simak ell gha _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ma _ 
M ek en egh si m _ liisimake llegh a _ A w lii nga _ 
A w lii ng am _ ighnegh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ N gu ung ay an kuk _ 
awte lugh u i ngam _ ighnegh kek _ , _ M aa s q em _ naa nga _ 
En kaa ng am _ nayag ke luku _ , _ K ing ik aan kuk _ naange a _ il ugh aq aa k _ 
En kaa ng am _ taana _ A w lii nga _ un Ê¼ g ani _ p el egh q egk aan iiq aat _ ilughagh ke ak _ tan em lleq a _ 
Q ik m ii ta _ taana _ awte lugh u i nga _ .
qikmigh ita _ qighunegh mun _ teghiigh tke a _ q er ngugh negh llak _ 
liilightuusagh u laatagh uq _ qighunegh _ uglagh ghllag _ ug l aat min eng _ kaate qaghte luku nguq _ .
kanagh naghtugh ngugh _ .

tamaavek _ qikmigh ita _ kaate qaghte te luku _ kanaghkagh _ q ik m ii ta _ 
entaqun _ qikmigh a llu _ atunem _ pi naqute yalghiimeng _ qikmigh ita _ mughugtekagh at _ wallu _ tawani _ 
taagani _ nani _ eskimo _ k iy an g _ ellmi neng _ kenle ngllagh llegh _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ .
tawatete luni _ igh negh egk en ka _ peleghqekagh _ kiyang _ taglaate igate aat _ imaken _ ima _ m am leg g naq um agh mi _ 
taake uk _ ighnegh gkenka _ un it kaa k _ qayughllak _ 
iwerngaqun _ taw a tes agh tun Ê¼ nguq _ unitekagh ak _ yuget _ 
tanemlleqa _ N gu ung ay am _ n uy ek l igh pig aan iiq aat _ yug t _ peleghqe kau nghata _ aghnaghaghhagh u luki nguq _ atiiqe aqe yagh ait _ .
T an em lleq a _ A w lii nga _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe aat _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ atiiqekagh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ taana _ ug w iigh umalghii _ 
tanemlleqa _ awte lugh u i nga _ taa kuk _ ilughagh aneng _ , _ K uk ii y ang an kuk _ .
Wh ang ku ta _ il ugh w aag put _ taake uk _ 
whangkuta _ tan em lleq a _ E s tug r uuk _ 
En kaa ng am _ tanemlleqa _ qu ll igh tuq aq eg ke k _ tuqu yan _ taake uk _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ aflengake i ste nga i uute yayek _ el tugh aghh aag ni _ entaqun _ tug uk l iq aq eg ke k _ .
A ng l ik ak _ apangiighhagh mta _ qullug ightuqagh ke gkek _ qayughllak _ ug w iigh tu u te llegh meg nun _ panig mi _ .
anglikagh k _ K em ug y in ku g neng _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ taake uk _

Taagken _ taana _ el ngaatall _ tuqu yan _ paninang _ ug w i ku ll ghii k _ .

tanemlleqa _ wh anga _ taana _ esgha _ 
tawatete uq _ whanga _ 
aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh at _ sivungagh mii t _ 
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a _ 
pugughilegh mi _ aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ tes am ani _ 
aghvegh niigh llegh _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ellng in aghh aagh te kaa l ghii _ tesamani _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ angayuqagh igh te magh mi _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ elngaatall _ .
taawanginaq _ angayuqagh igh te luni _ s aagh w ani _ , _ iitek _ anengagh ghhagh a _ tu v agh llag luni _ taawanginaq _ , _ aghv egh et _ 
ungipagh kaqe kangi _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ el ngaatall _ es tu waagh sim agh m allu _ ilangani _ es tu w agh mun _ tawaten _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ sumeghtaghagh lunga _ elngaatall _ pii g ka _ .
puuskaate meng _ lipeghsagh yug unga _ l ip egh s aghn il uki _ maalghug _ pi agka _ .
elngaatall _ sa u luki _ lipeghsagh ni luki _ atugh u naanghite ni luki _ pi kangit _ , _ 
taana _ all g egh us am a _ ungipamsug llegh a _ sanighte te luku _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ 1 9 7 2 mi _ ungipaate gpenaki _ 
taagken _ allgegh te yama _ estugagh meng _ qakiqniqe unga _ tesamavek _ .
angyagh ut _ n et _ tes am ani _ .
sivuligh t _ ne t _ tesamani _ i wernga _ 
Taa wa _ pegnem _ ay um i qu llegh mi _ iwernga _ aghv egh n ii ll eq _ kayusiite ainkung _ 
taawa _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ piinligh yuwhaagh kaqe a _ aghvegh niigh llegh _ 
sumeghtaghagh lunga _ kingumun _ ukavek _ atugh u yaghqaa uute yu gnite yan _ 
llaaghanwha _ legan _ atugh ughte uq _ m aaten _

iwerngaqun _ laluramke t _ sakwaaqe i naqe ghllag t _ taana _ neqe mnnun _

iitek _ taa p n ay aq anga _ taakwani _ .

ghhuugh _ entaqun _ guute nayagh lghii _ , _ tamaagun _ kaa sim aagh put _

taakut _ .
A ghi ll ug en kut _ anguksag kaqe aqa _ Q u w aa r en kut _ , _ ata at _ , _ 
anguksag ghllag kaqe aqa _ q el ghi luteng _ 
aghillug nkut _ p am ak en _ u pen gh aat anga _ tam aghh aan _ p ay ang it kay uk _ .
enmis _ qelegh i luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ aq el q aghn ii qay ug uk ang it _ esghapag luteng _ 
inglu qligh mnneng _ pamaken _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ payangite kayug _ aq f aat meng _

E s tam ag negh h aa f tut _ taawa _

enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ P e d er s en _ tawaten _ , _ tugumiightugh luki _ igh n is t ik ayug ul ghii kut _ .
aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh yagu _ t en t- a _ pi a _ q aw aag n iigh usi q _ , _ s u f l ug aq _ , _ qakun _ tulugh u i _ kayagte naqe zigu _ nalleghaghhalek _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ pi naqe a _ n uugh yaghq aag pen anga _ , _ upenghagh ke te _ pi naqe a _ ll iigh tes taa nga _

akilpegagh niigh luta _ apeghiigh yamta _ u pen gh ami _ tent- a _ I v g amun _ qawaagniighusigh _ .

Enkaam _ quy ng i q _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ , _ 
tawaten _ ay um i qu llegh ni _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ quy ng iq a _ 
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ , _ r ep all _ quyngigh ka _ taw an ll uki _ , _ 
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ un it qagh ll uki _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ apegh iin em tek i _ 
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ av aq ut agh y un egh tuq at _ repall _ unite igate ait _ il am n nun _ nagh pi gh tes luki _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ av aq ut agh y un egh tuq at _ 
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ 
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ 4 0 0 - ngugh tuq _ , _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _ 
U pen gh ami _ naghpigh luki _ nuqnegh aqe ait _ k iy an g _ 
four _ sagh l ig ang y uq at _ quyngigh ka _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ quy n igh tuq at _ 
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ tam aakut _ $ _ 7 0 0 . 0 0 - ngugh sim aaq elghii _ tamaakut _ 
E s gha _ taakwavek _ ukavagh magh mi _ 
quyngightuqagh t _ tamaakut _ ig ug iq ameng _ tu y u ghi kay ug uy alghiit _ ak m avek _ 
esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ kay usi ghi kaa g uq _ 
W et k u _ apegh iin gh ata _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ ak il p eg aghn ii negh meng _ taa q n em ta _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ J ul y mi _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ tag il agh aat aq u kut _ , _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ sang w aa _ il anga _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ ne mun _ 
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ tam aghh aan _ pedersen _ k el eng ak ng uk angat _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ 
kiyang _ igh n is t i _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ tag il uta _ ne mun _ taa kut _ kiyang _ , _ qayughllak _ aq f aaq luku _ 
taakut _ tu ung l igh h aat _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ 
wetku _ ighni ste i _ un aa mi _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _ 
unaami _ tuungligh ghhagh t _ pi aqe luteng _ p iiq eg ke f ut _

Q er ngugh u tut _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ 
I g aghv i k _ wh aa _ 
qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ tawaten _ 
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ .
N aq am _ qu ut f agh meng _ tawaten _ um eg negh ugh taq egk anga _ ayvigtegh _ 
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ pi y ugh ng aagh meg teg gu _ 
naqam _ s uu p ut ng in aghn ay uk ata _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ 
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ s uu p utegh llag um aaq egk angi _ 
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ nak m i kaa t _ 
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ S iv ung aq _ kii _ m aag un _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ 
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ an uq l iq ay uk _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ naa f qell uki _ 
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ quy ng igh q waagh et _ 
taawa _ ayvigtegh mii t _ itagnagh ut _ p uy g um aaq a _ tagite ait _ mangteghagh teng _ , _ tagi laghate te ut _ maavek _ en taqun _ 
tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ 
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ pi y u wh aagh aq ng ami _ 
D u p er tu is - ngu yagh tuq _ igagh u ni te u lghiit _ ig aghv ig meng _ imatuq _ 
igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _ 
I g aghv i k _ ulimaghista _ igaghvig meng _ taa m _ 
sivuqagh mi _ apeghtughiste u yagh lghii _ , _ 
igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ p iit _ , _ ulima yaghtugh aa _ ig aghv ig llag uy alghii kun _ 
igaghvig _ ulima ut _ sang w aa _ sivungagh m _ igaghvig a _ 
K en l anga _ nutem _ pi ut _ apegh tu ghi ll ghi t nun _ whagun _ igaghvig ghllag u yagh lghii kun _ whaa _ 
En kaa ng am _ M r . _ sa u a _ mekestaaghhagh _ ig aghv ik s u wh aagh em _ 
kenlanga _ n ek eg tek angat _ maavek _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ atuqekagh at _ taana _ , _ 
K um aq aal ghii _ , _ k ii _ lliigh magh ita _ igagh vike yuwhaagh m _ kingu ligh aa _ 
D r um - a _ nekegtegkangat _ iq iq ugh taa kaa t _ maaten _ , _ nekagh ughtekanga _ gu un n ay uk an _ taaggun _ 
kumagh kau lghii _ tan k - angi _ kii _ taawa _ q er ng agh meng _ , _ 
Taa kut _ tamaa na _ iqe iqe ughtagh ukagh at _ 
iwerngaqun _ , _ taakut _ qafsinagnegh u lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ 
taakut _ aghula i te ut _ , _ 
N aten _ f l o o r -em _ qimagugh tke aat _ ukavek _ .
A aghh w meng _ it egh v ik egk ii _ .
naten _ , _ asi a _ aagh h w meng _ iv agh l uk ek _ 
W al te r _ itegh vikekagh i _ , _ 
agepsugh ghllagu lghii _ ayuq n ay alghii _ esghagh vig ite ngughk _ ag ep s u m _ ivagh lukek _ qikmigh llu _ tal wa _ .
walter _ liisima laatagh ma a _ , _ saamna _ taw an tek aq _ asi a _ 
naten _ ayuqe nayagh lghii _ I g agh y al q allu
qaamte i na luni _ taw ate te f tuq _ qu ug llag u yagh tu uq _ qikmigh ghllag a llu _ , _ S ag un gh aan kuk _ 
unaghsigh llu _ leg an _ igaghyagh llegh ka llu _ 
Taa kut _ tawatete uq _ quug ghllag u yaghtu uq _ h o us e- ngu luku _ ul im ak aq aat _ .
mangteghiightuqagh u lghiit _ legan _ tamaaken _ unaghsigh meng _ qupughhugh luteng _ ne ke f te kaa l ghii _ 
taakut _ S iv uq ami _ wh aten _ lii g ik ng waagh pen anga _ ulima kaqe aat _ m aa v ek _ 
llaaghinaan _ esgha _ nalluniigh aa ta qaa _ .
S e c o n d _ sivuqagh mi _ whaten _ , _ itghagh kau lghiinga _ maavek _ 
igaghyagh unga _ tesakmani _ iitek _ m en _ 
Y o un g _ m en _ taaqe unga _ ig agh yaq ayug u yagh pe tut _ igaghyaghpag gpenanga _ .
maani _ itupill _ i ghi v g agh mi _ me n _ 
I g agh yaq ayug uy alghii kut _ me n _ yug teg gun _ igaghyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ im a _ taa q aat _ 
igagh te kayugu yagh ut _ yug t _ 
igaghyagh kayugu yalghiikut _ tamaani _ yug tgun _ .
T al wa _ piyaqli i llegh a _ 
quyngigh igh ni uq _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe na pigte uq _ m ay ugh ll uki _ 
talwa _ ighni ste i mi _ mangteghagh isag lghiikut _ s l e e pin g _ 
esla mi _ legan _ 
talwa _ sa ngunaamta _ m aq alghiit _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ n ugh aat _ 
A at k aghq aagh tek aq _ aatkagh put _ 
qamagun _ nughagh at _ maakut _ ighninghhagh t _ .
aate te kaghqagh ughtekagh _ tem k agh l uta _ 
tamaa na _ all igh sigh l uta _ qaute kete luki _ atkug kaqe aput _ , _ 
T aan ang in aag uq _ um eg negh ugh h negh ani _ segh l e pig u uq _ 
amigh meng _ alla ighsigh luta _ .
Iwernga _ umegnegh ughte nghaani _ seghlegh pigu uq _ , _ 
azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ 
iwernga _ tagtalmi _ sunglug ta ghhagh neng _ ul im al uki _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ sa u aat _ azigutagh liite aput _ .
mangteghagh ke yaag te aput _ leg an _ 
legan _ unaghsigh meng _ tawaten _ ulima luki _ 
llaaghanwha _ legan _ azigutagh t _ piniraaghinagh t _ f iv e _ 
Tam aa ken _ eg ll ung ll agh y ag u tut _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ s u f l ung ll agh luteng _ 
alaghrang _ egllu ngllagh ut _ , _ ulluvikagh t _ P e d er s en _ tag it kay ug ul ghii _ s aag ng alghii meng _ tamaa na inagh u yagh lghii _ ulluvikagh _ sang w aat _ eg ll uk aghq agh llag et _ en taqun _ 
tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ .
suflugkagh t _ sa u aat _ s u f l ung ll an em ta _ egllu kaghqagh meng _ pedersen _ tagite kayugu lghii _ saag nga lghii meng _ s u f l uk aq eg ke put _ .
kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .
whangkuta _ enkaam _ suflu ngllagh negh mta _ , _ meghutlug t _ legan _ uygu uute qugh te luki _ suflu ke aqe ke put _ s ung l ug t aghh aat _ 
llaaghanwha _ legan _ P ug u ghi llgh agh mun _ 
ivgagh m _ qaye ani _ ighni ta iqe lghiikut _ malig s aagh aq agh put _ pugughillghagh mete te _ ukig yagute ukut _ ll iigh naq en gh ani _ pugughillghagh qun _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ ulima luki _ uk ig utaq agh put _ egllu ligh luta _ n ay um n nun _ quugtu pigte lghii _ 
quyngigh ut _ ukig te luku _ pugughillghagh mete te _ aga _ mayugh aqe lghii _ 
mayugh nghaani _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ il ang it a _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ iwerngaqun _ unglegh qaqu luni _ negh es nan igh aqegk angat _ ung ll eg t aat agh aqegk angat _ t ak el eng es t ayug g aal uki _ , _ ukig taqagh ut _ tawavek _ nayugh mnnun _ o n e _ 
pilaataqu lghii ni _ four _ hours _ unglegh ma te kaqe aat _ , _

ungllegtagh ta m _ whaa _ kipullegte i lleghqagh _ tag in gh ata _ .

utaqa i aqe lunga _ taakut _ aleghqagh nka _ 
esghaghhu qun _ taa wa _ it ghii g a tut _ .
taawa _ mulu nghite ut _ nan ghii negh meg teg gu _ 
sivugh qaghte negh meggni _ taawa _ itghagh igate ut _ iglegh h n em ta _ 
entaqun _ iilqayug aqe ut _ nanghiigh nghmegteggu _ ikfiqe na a _ un aa mun _ 
neghe gpenaamta _ , _ qavagh gpenaamta _ igleghte negh mta _ pii w agh aq ut _ ikfiqe na llegh _ .
I il qay un egh ll ug u tem neng _ ivagh i yami _ tawani _ 
nanghiigh aatagh kangat _ , _ t en m aa w ing waagh l unga _ ima _ 
iilqayug neghllug te mneng _ whanga _ , _

enmis _ uteghmun _ aqfaaghtu te aqe luku _ quyngigh ut _ Q it n eg mi _ tughwaagh negh mta _

quyngilegti llegh _

Wh ang ku ta _ quy ng ip ut _ piiwagh te i yaghtugh ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ t en m aa w ik at _ inglulegyag u luta _ , _ 
U kut _ usi ke aatagh aput _ ataasigh kun _ quyngigh kun _ quy ng it eng _ a tugh naq luki _ , _ naa v y igh yug um alghiit _ ataasigh t _ , _

aa _ es tam ag uu kut _ whangkuta _ sivungagh mii ni _ q er ng aam ta _ salin _

T uq ut iigh mi _ , _ tamaakut _ quyngigh mun _ S iv uq ameng _ a tu ng ak _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh yaghqagh t _ qepghagh kayugu ait _ m o ne y - meng _ quunpeng _ quyngigh _ tawaten _ lliigh nghaani _

saama _ qepghagh negh meggni _ llaaghanwha _ hour-ngit _ 
aki msuggagh ngunaan _ urang _ quy ng il eg ni _ , _ qepghagh lghii _ n a si qu tes taq iin kut _ pi y uk ell em tes tun _ quynginge uute kayugu yagh lghii _ tu k f igh luku _ tuqu ta u uute aqe lghii _

whangkuta _ katam _ quyngigh leg ni _ wh anga _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute ste aqe ainkut _ piyuke lleg mtestun _ inwa _ tukfigh luku _ p al agh agh tek ayug uk angi _ 
Wh anga _ whangkuta _ pin i tun _ aki u na an _ tanemlleqa _ quyngigh yaghkagh nun _ tamaavek _ quy ng i q _ 
whanga qun _ kayusiite i naqe nghmeng _ katam _ whanga _ tukfigh aqe luki _ aki it _ pilagh kanga _ yug it a _ k el eng ak saq um eg teg gu _ igh n is t iiq luteng _ , _ 
whanga _ , _ pinitun _ tukfigh aqe kenka _ tuq ut kay ug uk anga _ qayughllak _ negh yugnagh pigte lghii _ quyngigh _ .

tamaaken _ neng ii taq ap ut _ apallugh ke luku _ .
taakut _ amiiragh i _ tuqu llgh a _ tuune luki _ money-ngi _ taakut _ nayugh ikagh ni _ u pen gh ami _ kaviigh t _ tuqu tke aput _ gh h u us qugh aq elghii _ tuune luki _ g gh u ug aq elghii t _ akike luki _ il ang ani _ money-ngi _

tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ nayugh ikagh ni _ tawani _ legan _ akingite ut _ naa ng taq egk ang it _ avangite ut _

qayugtugh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ tam aana _ uk s um i _ tuqu kayugu ut _ quy ng i m _ estug teng _

ungagagh _ tamaa na _ uksugh mi _ quy ng i m _ quyngigh m _ , _

ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .

En kaa ng am _ quyngighqwaagh t _ taa qu t _ , _ kinku t _ sivuke luteng _ , _

L aa v l aagh et _ taakut _ taaqe ut _ m aal gh ug um ay agh tu k _ , _ taakut _ q af si n Ê¼ gu yagh t at _ elngaatall _ 
petgegh nghhagh _ entaqun _ 
laag vlaagh t _ taakut _ entaqun _ maalghug u ma yagh uk _ .
apeghtugh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ qay aa f tut _ 
quyngigh m _ tawaten _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ .
A m en am _ qayagh u ut _ n uy aagh ii tegh ll an gh ata _ a tugh aqegk ang it _ qamuutagh leg t _ 
qaya stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ , _ q ap r a tugh llag tut _ 
amenam _ entaqun _ 
aamta _ nuyaagh luteng _ naafqesaghqagh ke ait _ uy a tu t k aagh luki _ qapragtu ghllag ut _ sang w aa _ 
quyngigh mun _ apeghtugh i llegh _ 
apeghtugh naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ nal ugh q ut agh llag aq u _ naten _ .
taakut _ enlegkutagh t _ qamughaghtagh yaghqaa luki _ ke p ugh luki _ qamugh ghllag yaghqaa gpenaki _ pe tug aq eg ke put _ aaw ghhaghtagh meng _ 
quunpeng _ w et k u _ pin em tek i _ aghul iigh um aaq elghii t _ 
qaprag ghllag aqe ut _ en r aq _ qagh l aaq ap ut _ kepugh luki _ 
unaami _ wetku _ , _ aghuliigh ma aqe lghiit _ tan em lleq a _ 
unaami ani _ enraq _ qaghlu aqe aput _ apegh tugh naq n em tek i _ 
qaghlu it _ , _ qagh l ung it _ enraq _ tanemlleqa _ qaghlu yuwhaagh negh meggni _ s aag teng it _ iwernga _ mulu pagigate ut _ 
liisagh ke put _ n aten _ tawaten _ , _ qaghlu magh ita _ lliigh aput _ .
T ap gh aghh agh meng _ uy g aaq ap ut _ qaghlu it _ 
T egh ig l ug et _ naten _ wh aten _ iq e tu t k ii ta _ teghiglug t _ t h r e e _ in c h e s _ 
tapghagh ghhagh meng _ uygaagh ke aput _ tam aakut _ 
teghiglug t _ peghte luki _ whaten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ sa u a _ qagh lu ku s iigh tegh llag em _ inches _ 
qaghlu t _ pi niigh pigte ut _ tamaakut _ teghiglug t _ pi ng ay un eng _ amiiragh i _ , _ apegh tugh naq n em k i _ qaye anite luki _ 
unange i _ melqiite aqe lghiit _ w allu _ aku u r agh aq si ng i _ .
E m ta _ il ang it a _ whanga qun _ kiyang _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghtaghkagh nka _ .
amenam _ pi nqegtagh t _ wallu _ akuuragh aqe zingi _ s ugh ug ik ayug u ut _ 
emta _ ila ita _ ilullug t _ s aag tek aq ap ut _ .
anusigaa aqe ut _ qam iy ep ut _ uka _ legan _ sughug i kayugu ut _ uugh qagh taq l uta _ enkaam _ 
uyiigh t _ uk an ll uki _ tawaten _ s ay ugh q aaq ap ut _ q ii f naq utk aq ap ut _ 
enkaam _ qamiye put _ uka _ tagi nghata _ sani igh te nghata _ uughqaghte aqe luta _ taa wa _ 
taawa _ , _ quunpeng _ sayughqaaghkagh put _ qiifte naqutke aqe aput _ am uk es tagh aq ap ut _ qiive yagute aqe ut _ 
Wh aa _ angyalligh qugh magh ita _ qamiye put _ taakwavek _ aghul iigh taq luki _ elngaatall _ 
Q en w at _ t en m aa w is n em tek i _ taa wa _ uy a tu tal ang is tun _ ll iigh aq ap ut _ amu kestagh aqe aput _ 
whaa _ tag tal ng i _ lliigh nghata _ t en pe yaghq aag pen ak i _ aghula i aghte aqe luki _ si x - f e et _ 
qenwat _ , _ taawa _ , _ lliigh aqe aput _ ay em n naa qep ut _ 
K iy an g _ pi ng ay u _ wh anga _ tenpe yaghqaa gpenaki _ sa u a _ , _ entaqun _ q av aq _ tawaten _ 
aghuliigh aghtekata _ pi ng ay un eng _ tenpe gkumteki _ pegh q igh aq ut _ ighu i _ .
kiyang _ pi nga yu _ whanga _ 
tawatete kau ut _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghte luki _ peghqigh aqe ut _ peghqigsaghkagh nka _ .
akuuragh aatagh kaqe anka _ ilullug ite ngugh t llu _ f o ll o w - meng _ 
E ll ng in agh meng _ tenmaawi nghata _ , _ enkaam _ ellng in agh meng _ .
tamaakut _ aamta _ naq am _ ata iqe aput _ t as l ugh an q eg tut _ , _ f o ll o w - meng _ elngaatall _ ayuq ap ut _ tamaakut _ 
ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ pe tug luki _ quyngilegti sighqagh u nghite ut _ ellnginagh meng _ iglegh utk aq ap ut _ 
uziveketaagh ghllagu aqe ut _ igleghte gpenateng _ naqam _ petug luteng _ a tun em ta _ yug u yagh ngaat a _ , _ atigh luki _ ayuqe aput _ , _

tawaten _ ing lu te l g et _ pin igh tut _ qu un p eng _ atunem ta _ 
sangameng _ tawatete aqe aat _ inglusi i ma ite ngugh t _ , _ 
enkaam _ s uk agh llag u ut _ pinigh ut _ 
emta _ tawatete laatagh ut _ qikmigh stun _ p ang al eg t in naq n em ta _ ag a _ s uk al ngugh meng _ 
sukate ngugh t _ sukaghllag u ut _ , _ 
whaten _ igleghte te negh mta _ , _ pangalegti tete naqe negh mta _ aga _ sukate ngugh meng _ quyngigh lgu negh mta _ 
U y aat iq aq _ taana _ k iy an g _ aqfayngwaag negh meggni _ whaa _ .
pangalegti naqe te inagh _ aga _ apegh tu ghi negh min i _ ilangani _ 
uyaute iqe aq _ taana _ kiyang _ tuqu qugh kau uq _ 
naten _ pi aqe aki _ apeghtugh i nghmini _ 
entaqun _ nuqnegh qagh nghminiki _ aghvequte ste aqe kangi _ aq n igh h negh meg tek i _ 
ii- sqeaghaghte negh meggni _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ ayuq l aat agh tut _ 
naasqugh t _ ukut _ iisqagh teng _ aqnighte nghmegteki _ , _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ pin q eg tegh r aa s t aghh iin aat _ .

whanga _ amenam _ 
emta _ pi aqlaatagh ait _ tamaakut _ ilullug t _ s as naq ef q aa meng _ umyugagh it _

manigugh luteng _ quyngigh t _ atughqagh u ut _ n ap agh agh taq iit _ , _ qay ug m ig naq negh tuq at _

kii _ .

nula pagllag kau uq _ s aam n a _ 
N ay gh an n aq _ tawani _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ naa y gh aghh aq _ upenghaghyag u _ pi yalghiikut _

taakut _ n at ang ani _ aqsaqugh m _ taakut _ tunu t _ pugughyi u ut _ , _ 
K ev igh q ii _ aqsaqugh t _ n aan l e nguut _ wetku _ iike luki _ tun aan eng _ imigh a _ ke v ing ll aq ay u w iit _ .
aqsaqugh m _ tun aan eng _ alamke t _ im iq ayug et _ .
kevighqagh i _ taakut _ am a _ u ul sim ii ta _ ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ imigh luki _ 
ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ uulte magh ita _ imigh kayug t _ teng ug illu _ 
qellu i _ tamaakut _ ama _ 
whangkuta _ negh igate aput _ iiskag i llu _ q il ung i _ tengug i llu _ pi kay ug et _ 
ila ita _ negh aqe ait _ yug us iin il nguq _

amalleqa _ qamagte luku _ yugusigh anite ngughk _ taana _

upenghagh mi _ n ani _ makugte negh meggni _ aatk aghq aagh taq uq _

taakwani _ nani _ p iin l igh aq ut _ aate te kaghqagh ughte aqe uq _ , _ 
katamngwaagh _ melqughtu langi _ lliigh aqe ut _ pi nigh ghllag t _

eflugh te nga llegh ghllag mun _ amu isigh negh meggni _ ataa si q _ ay ag um ak angat _

ila i _ iike ta t _

A m s an agh ll ug llak _ .
iitek _ whaten _ aklu i te kanigh luteng _ taa kut _ qute m _ n aten _ taakwavek _ .
taana _ im ani _ pi laatagh ma ka ak _ k el ut mun _ alignagh lleghtagh tek _ el ngaatall _ , _ seghleghhalek _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ .

amsanaghllugllak _ i f q all agh ng aagh meng _ 
tawaten _ ilagagh luni _ gh h atagh tek es tagh aq ii _ taakut _ aleghqugh qu ai _ naten _ kayute ngllaghkagh _ 
qateghllug ghllag mi nguq _ imani _ sikuvag ghllag t _ kelute mun _ qukfighute naagh aat _ elngaatall _ n aan tu l e y eng _ tawavek _ kangighagh anun _ 
qute meng _ tu ng tu t gun _ ( _ tuute tke aat _ d ip pe r _ aghqe itagh i tke aat _ ay g ugh tut _ nalugutekagh neng _ 
iwernga _ si q in ghem _ tu ng ang anun _ iglegh taq luteng _

aghte nghaani _ q av aq _ a tu um aan _ igleghte aqe luteng _ w all u nguq _

qafsina _ qavagh _ atugh magh an _ qu ut mun _ wallu nguq _ tanqigh _

tume u lleghqagh i _ iglegh te llegh mi _ temngi _ iime qaghte luteng _ k ii _

tawaten _ seghleghhalek _ negh ke igh te naqe ut _ qute mun _ lliigh yalghiimeng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ nalluniigh te ut _ tumete yug ni u luteng _ iq al u w aa w aq elghii t _ 
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ kii _ al iigh aat _ peghwaagh ghllag t _ ii w en _ q em igh yug meng _ peghwaagh ghllag _ m ay ugh aq ut _ 
negh ut _ elngaatall _ .
negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ , _ 
aygugh lqinagh luteng _ peghwaagh t _ kaate nghmegteki _ taawa _ , _ lii g i kun negh i te m _ 
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ tekeghagh _ esgh a _ inga _ aliigh aat _ apegh iigh waagh luku _ iiwen _ , _ taagken _ mayugh aqe ut _ k i d n ap - e kaa m alghii _ amaken _ 
atunem _ aliigh te ut _ negh igh h aan eng _ 
kii _ q iigh q am _ piyaqmegteggu _ yuug _ tusaqepagningite aat _ aghn agh aan eng _ ulu _ alla _ m et ng egh ut ik ay uk _ 
seghleghhalek _ Q et iin a _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _ 
qete i i na _ taana _ esgh a _ esgha _ sa u a _ tuun aq luki _ tawaten _ ayuqe nghminigu _ .
tespamna _ quteghllag _ ungip aq ag egk ang it _ tawaten _ amyuqetagh na iqe aat _ .
T aana _ qiighqagh m _ tawaten _ anglinghhagh aneng _ .
taana _ qete i i na _ metngeghute kau ma yagh lghii _ 
tawaten _ enraq llu _ esgha _ tuune aqe luki _ agh y uq s ami _ tuune aqe luki _ tawaten _ 
U tegh n iq aam alghii _ maakut _ .
taana _ m aal gh ug ul u tek _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghii _ Q uy ill g em _ 
quyilleg nun _ akike kau ma yagh lghii _ .
quyilleg ni _ qepghagh luni _ pil aat agh aa k _ qepghagh luni _ aghyuqe yami _ metngeqagh qrug u uq _ , _ 
uteghnigh kau ma lghii _ naqam _ , _ 
nukalpigagh k _ maalghug u lutek _ yug m _ ag a _ quyilleg m _ .
I i _ esghaghhu _ kaa tu ll u tek _ 
seghleghhalek _ aag llegh gkenka _ qep gh al g ut ni _ negh igh luku _ m ek elghii q _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ n all aa tu taq ef tu k _ yug lgute mun _ 
Taw aten _ al egh qu ull u tek _ pim ak angi _ ii _ iingken _ negh llak _ nutem _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ akuzillegh a _ ayuqe luni _ 
ii _ n em _ napaghpagtagh te lutek _ aga _ payegh te uk _ yug em _ 
ii _ , _ kaat ute te lutek _ .
piyaqminigu _ taana _ u p ugh at ill ghi t _ neghigh luku _ mekelghiigh _ whaa _ 
tawaten _ aleghquute lutek _ pi ma kangi _ ll aagh an wh a _ ama _ 
M aa te q w aaq un Ê¼ nguq _ ne m _ upugha te i llegh a _ tawatete uq _ yuuk _ yug m _ kaate lghii m _ kaa t qu u tuq _ pana teng _ 
tugu manginagh nakesi _ kaa ll ghii m _ tugu manginagh nakesi _ p an at eng _ 
tuqute naanghite aisi _ N ap a z ug en kuk _ upugha te i llegh it _ tawatete ut _ tam aa tu m _ um iil g an _ 
taawa _ aga _ aglagh uq _ llaaghanwha _ qep gh al g utk eg kaa n _ 
Taa wa _ llaaghanam _ kii _ , _ yuug _ inwa nguq _ palaghhagh _ 
llaaghanam nguq _ kaate lghii m _ tam aa tu m _ pana teng _ all ang u f tuq _ .
taake uk _ taa kuk _ ul uk l uk ek _ ne m _ .
taana _ N ap a z ug em _ , _ aqelqagh ke ma kanga _ qepghagh lgutkekagh an _ Q et iin amun _ 
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ a tuq aq sagh agh put _ . _ taana llu _ 
I i _ ne m _ um iil g em _ ulu a _ alla u uq _ um iil g an _ 
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ kiyaghte ut _ ellng in agh agh mi _ 
T aana _ en taqun _ N ap a z in aq _ nuyekligh ke ma atgu _ ungipaate sqe ma kanga _ qay w all eq ang uq _ tugh negh agh tu pig sim aa _ qu ut mun _ u ug s alghii mi _ ne mnni _ 
a tuq _ sa u a _ agh sagh p aag te kaa g ut _ .
ii _ , _ umiileg m _ piyaqminiki _ yuuk _ umiileg an _ nuna m _ 
elngaatall nguq _ qesugniqe stekaqe a _ 
taana _ entaqun _ ay um i qu llgh ek _ ilagagh luni _ .
A taa s iin aa yaghq aa y alghii nguq _ nal iit _ , _ w allu _ 
ghhute itgun _ es tam iit kun _ melghutagh itgun _ , _ yuug _ ay um i qu llgh em _ Ung a z i mun _ 
tawatete kau ut _ ay um i qu llgh em _ 
maalghug gneng _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh k _ 
ataasigh inagh u yaghqaa yagh lghii nguq _ naligh t _ .
iike te llegh meggneng _ estamat ii te kun _ wetku _

taawa _ igleghte mafte ut _ 
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe ait _ A n as ug en kut _

aghnaghagh u lleg mneng _ neqamike llegh ka _ 
Enkaam _ apegh llegh a _ 
Wh anga _ liisagh lghiinga _ A g e z ang un iiq aat _ pamani _ guygu ita _ kelu kaghagh itni _ 
I q mal u w am _ entaqun _ nuug ukut _ tespagavek _ .
nekeve te _ Agh nagh agh p ak _ whanga _ , _ aqume igate ngughk _ Q i llegh qu u te m _ at ang an _ n ul igh q es aq anga _ 
enkaam _ enkaam _ tu gu tes qugh luki _ taakut _ ll iiq aq _ .
whanga _ ategh ka _ at al g ut ku ll ghiit _ A ng q a teng an w at en kut _ , _ Q aal un kut _ 
Taa kut _ P el aa si n ku t lu _ , _ nulugh igh qugh a _ il aku tut _ 
taana _ whang ku ta _ ay u qu kut _ .
Taa kut _ enkaam _ tugu te ste qugh luki _ tawavek _ 
taakut _ ama _ atalgute ke te lghiit _ P el aa si _ ap ak agh put _ im ani _ aat gha _ 
taakut _ n ev ng am _ en taqun _ at iiq utaq luteng _ ila ke te ut _ 
ila ke te luta _ whangkuta _ ayuqe ukut _ tawaten _ 
taakut _ qayuutagh m _ ila ke ai _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ , _ apakagh ut _ imani _ ategh a _ ang leg ut ku ll ghiit _ 
enkaam _ n ul igh h a _ entaqun _ atiiqe te aqe luteng _ 
saama _ entaqun _ ilaliigh te aqe lghiit _ tawaten _ neghe lgutke te luteng _ lliigh negh meggni _

naange aat _ taana _ P aa ng an kuk _ U z iv an kuk _ , _ taakut _ entaqun _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ tu m a _ 
P aa ng Ê¼ gh et
taana _ p am an ll ii m ta _ , _ aymaramket _ aghnaa t _ , _ 
El ngaat al nguq _ taana _ pi t ke pig taa t _ tuqu yan _ taagken _ 
En taqun _ taakut _ tes p am ken _ uziva nkuk _ .
E s gh aq un llu _ 
whangkuta qun _ whang ku ta _ , _ asag ghllag mta _ U uk et am _ ungip am s ug utk aq iin kut _ .
elngaatall nguq _ tamaa na _ pi tke pigte aat _ megnu nagh lghii _ p ang egh ta _ 
entaqun _ sivunegh put _ tawaten _ pi u ut _ s uq s ut _ 
esgha qun llu _ ukut _ A at negh mi _ .
nallukngwaagh yalghiikut _ whangkuta _ tawaten _ ellnga n _ , _ ungipamsug te kaqe ainkut _ , _ 
liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ quunpeng _ pangeghte a _ 
tagitug mi _ qevuute luteng _ tawaten _ amsanaghllug ghllag mi _ suqsugh t _ uka _ 
sakmani _ M as aa y ung iigh h aq _ aatnegh mi _ taana _ 
taagken _ emta _ tawaten _ tagitugllug _ , _ nan u ut _ nak en _ ik egk en llu _ , _ aatnegh kun _ iggasighte lutek _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ 
sangamta _ tawaten _ pi llegh ut _ nalluke kegka _ uk a _ 
qaasqagh mi _ ama _ pinegh mta _ aghillug m _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ tagh negh iigh te ku ut _ 
uuk _ mate- yaag yu ngiighhagh _ ama _ taana _ quunpeng _ 
En taqun _ pi yalghiikut _ ayuq s alghii _ taghnughhagh nun _ ak l ung i llegh tugh ng aagh meng _ nanugh t _ 
tawaten _ emta _ upenghagh mi _ kii _ uka _ , _ aghn am _ nutem _ pi inkut _ .
Yug et _ aa _ s aat gh w aaq iin agh luteng _ ak il p eg aghn iigh et _ .
upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ kaate kayugu ut _ 
entaqun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ tespamani _ 
ila i qun _ wenigh a _ saaputagh ite aqe ut _ talwa _ qalleg vag qiinagh luteng _ k av igh teng ng w aaq aq _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ leg an _ pin igh s a pig ll uku _ 
yug t _ tamaakut _ saatghwaagh qiinagh luteng _ akilpegagh na i aaghet _ es tu w aam _ 
qevuute luteng _ aki kegte ghllaget _ wh ate l nguut _ 
qallukagh at _ ak ing it _ tawaten _ .
sungagh _ lii s alghii nga _ ugtinghagh _ tam aghh aan _ qikmiiraagh _ t aghn ugh h agh ni _ , _ sa u a _ legan _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ 
qayugh leg nun _ , _ sa meng _ maaken _ il at eng _ pi anun _ 
qiipaghagh put _ maakut _ n all eq l iil ghiit _ ugpeqagh meng _ atigh luki _ 
ugpeqagh ghhagh leg nun llu _ aki it _ tawaten _ , _ 
quunpeng _ liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ 
nalleqligh ke na iqe lghiit _ ak ik eg te pig tut _ entaqun _ 
L ii te ll em ni _ ila ke te lghiit _ nalleqligh u lghiit _ ellngit ni _ ak l ung in n iiq ag ke t _ 
nalleqligh mta nguq _ taana _ tamaakut _ n ul igh h a _ q ii p agh agh llak _ taghnughhagh si _ .
kalngagmig na yu kanginkut _ whangkuta _ taw at en qun _ il angi _ 
urang _ aki kegte pigte ut _ sang w aa _ 
liite lleg mni _ taake uk _ p am a pi kay ug u yagh tu k _ kinku k _ aklungite na iqe agket _ tespamani _ tes p am an te f tut _

iwernga _ whanga _ iitek _ liite aqa _ .

esghapag na pigte uq _ wh anga _ iinghusaleg _ emta _ taa kut _ 
esghapag lqinagh naqe negh mta _ tunuvagh uute sqe aqe kanginkut _ .

ima wha _ wiin _ , _ tunuvagh aqe ukut _ q aa s q aani _ iwernga _ esghapag aqe ukut _ tun ut ang ani _ 
liisagh lghiinga qun _ whanga _ .
entaqun _ tawatete aqe yagh ut _ apegh ii negh meg g ni _ 
aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ .
aki yan _ qaasqagh ani _ .
seghlegh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ S ul ug en kut _ 
whaa _ entaqun _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ tawaten _ taa m _ enraq _ atugh aqe lghiit _ igh l e kum t aagh llag in kut _ sulug nkut ni _ k an avek _ 
amenqun _ taakut _ atughte ghllagu na iqe yagh kangit _ .
iitek _ angukagh put _ p an ig a _ 
K an a _ el ngaatall _ sulug nkut _ nayag at _ tugukagh a _ q el pegh qell u ku nguq _ naa mta _ 
kii _ wh aan t alghii s tun _ ay u qu t _ whangkuta _ 
ellnga _ qayughllak _ .
naqam _ taana _ panig a _ pugughileghmii u lghii _ kay us ii tes qu q _ asag ke te lghiik _ atghagh aqe lghiik _ , _ leg r en ay uk am ta _ 
kana _ elngaatall _ y ung er t aghh aat _ saye at _ una _ .
iglag it qun _ whang ku ta _ ayuqe ut _ , _ 
atugh ghllag t _ tawaten _ tawaten _ 
sa sqe qaghte aqe linkut _ ipa _ meghtigh sqe ainkut _ , _ kayusiite sqe uq _ am s an aghh aa luku _ taghnughhiqe te sqe uq _ .
naqam _ tazingkut _ yug ngertagh ghhagh t _ panig it _ atghagh uute kayug t _ en taqun _ 
pi aqe kanginkut _ whangkuta _ tu m igh q aan negh ata _ p ell aghn ani _ am a _ pagaliit _ 
taagken _ apeghiigh nghata _ tawaten _ atugh ghllag nghmeng _ es l allu _ tumighqaate naqe negh meggni _ .
T es k an an illu _ ila i _ waame te aqe lghiit _ il ang ani _ entaqun _ 
sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ maaten _ esgha _ , _ neve ste uute ghllag luta _ entaqun _ imaken _ 
taagken _ enraq _ tumighqaate nghata _ 
tawaten _ kingu itneng _ atugh ghllag qagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ k il g aa qu meng _ esla llu _ 
N all uk aqa _ tawaten _ aneghte aghte aqe ut _ ilangani _ .
Wh anga _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ tughumgha te aqe luteng _ .
awiim _ ulape sigh ke kangit _ k il g aaq uk ayug g aan iiq sagh aat _ 
taana llu _ sivuqagh _ n aten _ n all uk aqa _ , _ 
nalluke aqa _ whanga _ apegh luku _ pi aqe aat _ .
whanga _ apegh yug igate aqa _ sa na yu kangatnga _ ik naq ef tuq _ 
apa ut llu _ taana _ en taqun _ am al k aq un _ 
taana _ angag ke na iqe lghii _ naten _ 
angag ke na iqe lghii _ , _ taana _ ama _ .
iknaqe llegh ke aqe kanga _ sivuqagh m _ 
mekelghiigh t _ enkaam _ entaqun _ amalka qun _ A an tagh m ii m llu _ amenqun _ whaa _ laluramke t _ 
Q ep qagh tu u sigh luteng _ amalka _ tam aakut _ 
Q ep qagh tu ut ke k _ taa kuk _ A qu m ig al ngugh m e tu k _ Q aal u m _ .
Q iin ghii mang it ag ka _ sang ut ke k _ 
tamaakut _ en taqun _ kilgaaqu ste u na iqe yagh ait _ s all eq _ aantagh mii m llu _ 
qepe qaghtugh usigh luteng _ kilgaaqu kayug t _ tamaakut _ .
qepe qagh uute kek _ taake uk _ aqume igate ngugh mete uk _ qu ll ig it _ , _ 
qiinghigh mangite agka _ sa u te kek _ tun uq i te l g ul uku _ 
salem- perewaagh _ entaqun _ tamaghhagh mi _ sa llegh _ , _ 
nanughaghtagh leg t _ tamaakut _ iknaqughi ghllagkagh t _ yug tu t k al iq aq _ 
nanughaghtagh luteng _ aatkagh it _ tunugh ke isigh luteng _

temngi _ yuug _ qu un p eng _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
whaa _ whangkutestun _ entaqun _ yugtu tekagh liqe aq _ sa meng _ U u - h uuk _ aga _ kayusigh magh an _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ . _

kinku t _ ukut _ keveg iitagh u lghiit _ aga _ meghtagh uute ait _

aga _ kinku t _ esghagh aqe ait _

uksugh mi _ whaten _

qaatke te ma ghllagu yagh lghiit _ talwa _ entaqun _ esgh aa sim ang itu nga _ 
entaqun _ ukavagh magh mi _ aamta _ 
ila a _ aamta _ tamaa na _ A ghi ll uk _ uk s aagh un negh at ni _ ama _ entaqun _ ke v ii w aq elghii _ quy ng i m _ 
puvalla _ 
taakwani _ w allu _ puvalla meng _ esghaate mangite unga _ angli u lunga _ .
avangite ukut _ sa ite ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ apa ghllag ut _ taana _ aghillug _ uksaagh te nghatni _ T u us aan kuk _ isi _ A g ig s ug en kuk _ quyngigh m _ kevigh kaqe kanga _ isigima _ , _ 
I ng l uk negh taa nga _ pi yalghiinga _ aghveghwaagh ke uq _ 
sa u a _ wallu _ melqugh igh aq _ enraq _ liigike llghite aqa _ k aan negh ata _ 
inglukutagh ke lghiikung _ whangkutung _ , _ 
A l ing n iq egh r uk aq _ aqume igate ngugh nkuk _ .
inglu ke neghtu aanga _ whanga _ ugpeq egh llag luki _ 
S ameng _ aga _ legan _ wh anga _ akuqagh aqe ke put _ kaate nghata _ lii taq ng am a _ 
emta _ natete yaghqagh nun _ , _ ellnga qun _ taana _ whangkuta _ apa ut _ m aaten _ whaa _ .
alingnagh igh ke ghrug ke aq _ nutem _ es neng ani _ 
awiim _ ellngit a _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
sa meng _ puvalla raagh meng _ , _ whanga _ u pen gh aq _ tamaani _ liite aqngama _ ag agh tek at _ taa kut _ 
aghqesaghtughtu ukut _ yeqay _ s aghn aaq i tek _ , _ aghqesaghtughtu uq _ p iiq iin kut _ taakwavek _ 
A w al m ig g agh meng _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ 
talwa _ naaghte yameng _ m as ug k waagh h aat _ yuug _ 
saghna sqe aqe kanginkut _ taglagh negh mta _ n us ug luku _ uy gh ag g aq _ upenghagh _ ima _ entaqun _ agaghtekagh t _ taakut _ peq aghh aat _ ll il uki _ 
Q el an egh nagh llak _ kum agh t in aqa _ saghna aqe tek _ 
Taa wa _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ taa kut _ 
taakwani _ sa u aat _ masugkwaagh ghhagh t _ whang ang in aal aat alghii nga _ 
kaate negh mta _ esteg mineng _ nusug luku _ .
qelanegh na ghllag _ s ameng _ q aa ll g agh t af q aam a _ 
taawa _ unguv alghiit _ taakut _ kumagh nghata _ supughragh nghminiki _ .
N aq am llu _ yuggagh m _ av ii taq ut _ whanga inagh u laatagh lghiinga _ sa kayug _ .
aygughiketagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ taagani _ P el aa si _ 
aghyuugh aqe kanganga _ sa meng _ qalleg aghtagh fqaama _ pi naq l aat agh tuq _ un a _ 
unegkut _ unguva lghiit _ eghqwaagh nghminiki _ 
naqamllu _ sa u aat _ aviite aqe ut _ Wh ang ku ta _ tawavek _ aghq es agh tugh v il g uu kut _ 
pi aqe kegka _ .
Agh v eng en gh ata _ aa _ 
naqam _ kelgugh aqe kanginkut _ tawaten _ 
taghnughhagh perewaagh ni _ kelgugh luta _ aghqesagh uute aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ taakut _ aghqesaghtugh vig lgu ukut _ s am ak en _ naa n tuq _ ama _ taakwani _ tapeghagh m _ pi luki _ at ghagh tu utaq u kut _ 
teghigniqe te aqe ukut _ n all uk aqa _ 
Taa wa _ mang tag tu utaq u kut _ 
whaa _ at al ugh ameng _ tawaten _ .
whangkuta _ aghnaghagh ni _ ughvughqe te luta _ taaqe luta _ 
sangamta _ nalluke aqa _ nangaghnegh m _ almesiqe laatagh kanga _ 
taawa _ mangtagtu uute aqe ukut _ tesamani _ pi ll ghii n iit gun _ 
N ul igh h it _ atalughagh meng _ ken il ghem _ nal igh negh ani _ 
angyaleg t _ tamaakut _ esghapag na lleghpigagh at _ q al t aagh w r ag g agh meng _ 
nulighh it _ pika _ angyilghagh ni _ q al t at eng _ 
kaankut _ en taqun _ aquutagh _ 
nulighh it _ pika _ kenilegh m _ nalighnegh ani _ .
iwerngaqun _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ ang aghq ugh aqegk ang it _ , _ nulighh it _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ at igh aq luki _ 
I l ag aat ng it _ n all uk an ka _ sa te lghii ii nagh u kete te _ qalta teng _ aghulate aqe luki _ whang allu _ 
tawatete laatagh lghiit _ entaqun _ , _ 
taakut _ A y m ar am ke pig et _ manughagh kun _ aqume uute luteng _ y us qu ut aghh aat _ 
uka _ llaag t _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ aghn agh aat _ taakut _ aghvegh leg t _ atigh aqe luki _ apallugh ke aqe luki _ ilagagh aqe lghiit _ ig l ak eg tegh llak _ 
ilagaate it _ nalluke anka _ liite mangite anka _ tawaten _ naqam _ whanga llu _ aqume aqe lghiinga _ 
I v igh te l ep er e w aal g et _ aghnagh perewaagh t _ aghv eng negh meg g ni _ aghni ut llu _ 
taakut _ aymaramket pig t _ ll aag et _ aymaramket pigu na iqe anka _ yug squgh u ta ghhagh t _ 
E s gha _ taana _ A pe tek in kut _ aghnaghagh t _ panig it llu _ .
L l aal gh ut aq _ iitek _ il uk lii g uq _ tawaten _ angyaleg t _ atigh aqe luki _ .
Taa k w an tut _ entaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ , _ 
iwerngaqun _ naangellegh itnun _ llaag t _ angaghqugh llegh it _ 
esgha _ siqlugagh lgu yaghpete ukut _ naa s qu q luki _ kelu kaghagh itni _ llaag lghutagh lgu aq _ .
llaag lghutagh _ entaqun _ ilukligh u uq _ K ing un gh am _ ataasigh _ amig ke luku _ en m is s _ 
E s gha _ whangkuta _ siqlugagh put _ taa k w eg kut _ taana _ ama _ neqelghutagh u na iqe a _ taa k w an tut _ .
ellngit a nguq _ , _ taana _ taw ani _ 
nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ tu y uq agh aq iin kut _ 
maaten _ qavngaq _ pi yaqegka _ ang y egh et aq _ sang w aa _ a tuq ngu luku _ .
esgha _ , _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ tu y ugh aq aat _ .
A ng y egh et at _ tam aakut _ nani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pi aqe lghiit _ k el q ut aagh et _ 
paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ agh in gh waagh un iiq iit _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ pi r aam si ll uku _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _ 
angyeghetagh t _ tamaakut _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ 
taakut _ alla _ akmagtagh ghhagh t _ aghinghwaagh u na iqe ait _ y at aagh q en naq negh meg g ni _ 
sanqute t _ A ng l in aq ell gha
aghvenge naqe llegh _ piraamsi tete luku _ 
eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _ 
angyagh mun _ pi sigh _ enkaam _ entaqun _ q a z ig y aq _ eghqwaagh uute aqe lghiit _ wh aten _ 
U w al igh negh meng _ angli naqe llegh a _ 
N all uq anga _ apegh llegh a _ 
siknegh _ 
siknegh mi _ tesamani _ qafsina neng _ akuuragh aqe aqa _ qazigyagh _ wh aten _ whaten _ iiwleng _ pi gpenaan _ m aaq egh llag ek _ ayumiqullegh t _ 
U nak luki _ u pag agh ll uki _ esneghag ni _ , _ 
nalluqagh nge a _ .
ilu te mun _ un ang egh llak _ uughqaghtagh t _ qayughllak _ uy g utegh llak _ 
negig llegh k _ aal ghii _ kenle kek _ .
unake luki _ upag aghte luki _ tugu naqe i nagh ma luki _ il em ll uki _ taakwavek _ malleg aghte nghminiki _ kaa ll uki _ taw av eng iigh h aq _ 
tawatete naagh zinga _ taa k w avek _ 
naqam _ unange ghllag _ ken l e ke k _ qayughllak _ 
Agh v in l ek _ aag lghii _ sa u luku _ 
I l anga _ ag a _ angalqatagh nka _ , _ kete qaghte lunga _ ii w en _ kaate luki _ si q in eq _ te v igh yagh tuq _ .
legan _ taakwavek _ wh an ik w aa _ enraq _ 
U naa mi _ negig llegh m _ kenle kek _ .
aghvinleg _ tugu qaghte aqa _ , _ 
ila a _ aga _ , _ n all uk egh ll agh ng aam k i _ s u f l ug am _ iiwen _ , _ siqinegh _ tevigh yagh uq _ .
K i ngu nga _ iwerngaqun _ nak egh s aat anga _ .
unaami _ uughqaghte aat _ kaate ghllag ma lghiit _ 
teskiwani _ , _ uk at gh ut agh llak _ qenu _ 
sa u a _ kagpesqwaagh _ n ut aan _ un ang egh r aa v y iigh y ag utaq unga _ suflugagh m _ qepghagh llegh i _ taa wa _ piyuke lleg mtun _ lli aghte naqe aqa _ , _ 
kingu a _ walamnaag aghagh aqa _ nakeghsagh ta a _ uk at gh utegh llag luki _ 
pinigh yagh lghii _ apeghiighkagh _ .
naakghite te ste ghllag aqa _ seghlegh h al ek _ gh h uugh h aan ka _ si k n ay ag ut an ka _ 
teskiwavek _ un ill uku _ nutaan _ unange ghraag vyiigh yagute aqe unga _ , _ kaate yalghiinga _ taawa _ .
T egh ig l ug et _ esgh a _ r ep all _ ukatghute ghllag luki _ al iigh aq ut _ 
ii _ guusagh lghiinga _ ag l an em ni _ 
unange gpenanga _ seghleghhalek _ ghhuugh ghhagh nka _ sikna yagute anka _ â
nuug ghllag _ unite luku _ quug meng _ qerngughte i yalghiinga _ leg an qun _ ghhuugh meng _

awavagh qagh a qun _

sivu nge aq _

E s n ev agh aq u kut _ leg an _ angyagh llegh ke sigh ghllag _ .
ii _ am s ak ell ghi n aan eng _ inwa _ n u ug tun gh ani _ .
aa _ un ak luku _ maghyaghqugh aqe kanginkut _ tam aani _ ig l eq aq w aaq elghii _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ puughte i lghiit _ tamaakut _ angwaaghute meng _ anagu aqe luki _ it ag nagh aq ut _ .
esnevagh aqe ukut _ legan _ nuug aqe ut _ ik naq elghii t _ 
kayagte aqe kanginkut _ amsakellegh inagh aneng _ 
qafsina _ unake luku _ n uu pag ii tag u _ tamaani _ 
llaaghanwha _ legan _ taakwegkut _ segge llegh ghllag t _ uteghmun _ itagnagh aqe ut _ 
M aana _ S iv ung aq _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
nuugtu pigte yagh uq _ qu un p eng _ 
sangami _ maaten _ 
leveklug ghllag m _ un ang segh waagh a _ n all uk ng waagh aqa _ .
maana _ sivu nge aq _ nateghtu langa _ 
siknegh mete aqe lghiinga _ quunpeng _ , _ lliigh ghngaan _ , _ 
uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ ay v egh iig a tuq _ 
uksaagh m _ , _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ ay v el ek _ 
qineghpeghwaagh aqe lghiinga _ liigilliigh yama _ esgh aa ll aagh nan igh tu nga _ 
naten _ lliigh nghaani _ aghul iit aagh llak _ uksaaghpag kestagh nghaani _ 
kaana _ ayveghagh igate uq _ 
negh niigh vig ghllag _ n ate tu l anga _ quunpeng _ ayvegh leg _ , _ S ik negh m et k anga _ kana _ 
whaa _ tagtalmi _ tes am ani _ tag ii nga _ 
qantaghante uq _ tag ii kut _ aghula i aatagh u ghllag _ .
