nalluke kegka _ nateghtu langa _ K iy al igh agh m ii ngu y alghii _ .
pugughilegh meng _ , _ tesamani _ tagi unga _ maavek _ W aa ll a _ 
taawa _ tagi ukut _ pugughilegh meng _ n aten _

taakwagun _ quy ng ii _ qamiye t _ malghugnegh t _

uugna qun _ .

kaate luni _ legan _ quyngigh ni _ pegte a _ , _

kukuleg _

kii _ ii _ 
atghagh ukut _ , _ ii _ aghqe i aghaghtu uq _ imani _ q ag it _ 
nuug _ tamaa na _ negh sagh llak _ .
arekull _ aglekesegagh u aqe ut _ s uq s ugh h al ek _ 
U n ang naq mun _ w aa ken ghi tut _ 
kii _ nak ev legh agh meng _ teskanavek _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ .
qawaag ghllag u uq _ neng l ull ul gh utegh llag et _ neghsagh ghllag _ taa k w aa _ 
ii _ legan _ suqsugh ghhalek _ neghsagh t _ qimag aqe ut _ naken _ k el u tem n ni _ 
unange naqe mun _ t en t- tal uteng _ kaate naqe i nagh ut _ uq l igh s aghn aq ut _ 
enraq llu _ es n ev aan naq aat _ anuqe _ 

tamlag luta _ nenglullug lghute ghllag t _ kii _ agh y uugh n ay uk ang at nga _ .
sungaghyug te aqe lghiit _ esghaghkagh nka _ malig s aagh naq elghii s tun _ kaa _ 
taagken _ tent- ta lug teng _ u p aghq agh taq lu tek _ uqlighsagh naqe ut _ ingavek _ A nagh ay aan kuk _ 
angyapig llu _ esnevagh te naqe aat _ .
Taa wa _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh ma _ , _ legan _ aga _ uyavaghqagh ughte ut _ 
ii _ naqam _ riistuniqe magh ma _ aghyuugh na yu kangatnga _ .
I wer ng aq un _ entaqun _ maligsaagh naqe lghii stun _ .
guute lutek _ neng lu v y ii q _ sang w aa _ , _ S ip el am _ en taqun _ ne ke f tek aq l aat agh aa _ 
tagsigh aagnenga llu _ esghagh lunga _ ar e ku l l _ 
taawa _ nuug aqe uq _ .

iwerngaqun _ taa wa _ tagi ukut _ s u f l ug meng _ 
taane a _ nenglu vyiigh _ sa u a _ leg an _ taa k w avek _ entaqun _ nekeftekaqe laatagh aa _ w ay ameng _ 
pinighsagh luku _ taa q iit _ arekull _ 
taana _ nayughkagh ut _ nal igh negh aneng _ 
nevugh ligh aat _ qaye a _ aghq it agh it k am _ nevugh lgu uq _ 
egllu llgagh u uq llu _ taawa _ naagu _ suflug meng _ ing lu v in gha _ .

suflug t _ taaqe ait _ .

quug ke luku _ taana _ taana _ 
tamaa _ telaananga m _ sa i _ , _ napaghyagh i _ n aten _ .
ikiqun _ quyngighqwaagh t _ angaghqugh kaqe ait _ tam aani _ 
siipnegh it _ kepugh ait _ taakut _ s ii f q aq _ 
taake pigte aqe ut _ ak m aghq uk aqaa _ entaqun _ quug ke aqe aput _ .
siknegh mun _ lliigh sigh ut _ taana _ k av iigh n iigh yug nan igh aq uq _ ken l el gu uq _ ayumiqullegh _ taa q aq uq _ 
agaten _ paninang _ aviite qaghte aqe lunga _ 
kaviigh iigh na i ughtagh u ukut _ k av ii v lu ug saq leg es tun _ enraq llu _ tamaani _ 
alngunak _ entaqun _ legan _ ataa sigh h aq _ ay um i qu ll eq _ av el ghagh pen aam ta _ 
tekeghagh aneng _ n ani _ kaviigh _ , _ il ang akun _ 
U k s aaq an ii luku _ kaviigh nge lleg ni _ A nagh ay aam _ kaviigh niigh yug nanigh aqe uq _ kenle lgu uq _ 
uglagh ghllag luku _ kaviigh ii igate uq _ taa k w ag un _ 
entaqun _ ay um iin negh in kut _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ w et k u _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ayumiqullegh _ avelghagh gpenaamta _ .
tawani _ nani _ .
uksaagh kanigh u luku _ aqfa aqe ainkut _ , _ qimugsigh meng _ Q it n eg mi _ 
tefte i aghagh qu kut _ ayvigtegh kun _ taakwagun _ ag lagh aq u kut _ 
legan _ iv en r u un _ teve aqe ukut _ .
tagtale mii _ , _ wetku _ quyngigh _ apeghiigh nghaani _ aglagh yagute ukut _ T ev ng ani _ 
Q en w at _ kanaghte aqe kangat _ neng en ghi gh waagh aq ut _ 
I i tek _ tuqutagh igh yagute lghiit _ K ang ii ni _ ila i llu _ qitneg mi _ 
T ev eq aghh n em t aa _ wetku _ kingu aneng _ aglagh aqe ukut _ .
siingenllu _ ivenruute _ allgegh lghii _ uk am ameng _ 
ii _ whang allu _ ii _ .
qenwat _ qikmigh ghhagh put _ megh n u pag nan igh l unga _ .
iitek _ taawani _ kangii ni _ muluugh aqe ukut _ r ep all _ 
I v en r us tun _ taawa _ qimugsigh llegh ut _ kayaali qaghte aqe uq _ r ep all _ 
sivuligh mi _ tamaani _ pi yaaghte yuwhaagh lleg mnni _ qam ugh al w aaq elghii t _ .
ukamagh aatagh unga _ whanga llu _ qikmigh tgun _ 
tenmaawi lunga _ iq all ug taq u kut _ meghnugh pagnanigh lunga _ qu p negh meng _ 
iitek _ qikmigh ghhagh t _ P ug u ghi legh m iit _ angyagh ghhaat _ repall _ qukfighute ste aqe ait _ 
A g aan ku t lu _ tawaten _ teghugh ii aghte i negh meggni _ , _ repall _ angyagh ghhaat _ 
enraq llu _ angyengestagh meng _ quunpeng _ qamughagh lgu aqe lghiit _ 
sivuke luta _ taa kut _ , _ 
elngaatall _ iqallugte aqe ukut _ pii w agh tu utaq ut _ qupnegh meng _ kiyang _ 
tagtale mii _ ii _ pugughileghmii t _ katelghaate aqe ut _ .
Q u un p eng _ te f t iiq ugh llag et _ T em ke r u un kut _ .
I l ang akun _ taaggun _ , _ k i ngu m n neng _ 
Tam aag un llu _ taakut _ il ang akun _ tam l ag aq ut _ kisii mi _ 
nasiqe aghte aqe ut _ aga _ piiwagh uute aqe ut _ .
Q uy ng igh q waagh et _ taana _ ik ay ugh te l g ul uteng _ tefte i uute qugh ghllag _ L ap l an d - egh m ii neng _ 
quunpeng _ tefte i uute qugh ghllaget _ k i ngu r ug ll am n neng _ mang tegh al iq aq aat _ 
ilangakun _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ taw an sagh tut _ kingu mnneng _ 
tamaagun llu _ whaa _ ilangakun _ tamlag aqe ut _ U n meg g aan kut _ 
qagugh mun _ quunpeng _ mayugh aqe ut _ en taqun _ 
quyngighqwaagh t _ salin _ .
qagugh _ taana _ W al ang an kut _ mangteghagh liqe aqe aat _ m ul um ii ta _ 
qafsinagnegh t _ mangteghagh t _ ken l eng ani _ gu y g ut _ 
K iig aa _ leg an _ pinagh u yankut _ .
taane a _ 1 9 2 5 - 1 9 2 6 - mi _ .
angumake nghite anka _ nalluke anka _ 1 9 2 4 - 1 9 2 5 - mi _ 
sakmavek _ piiwagh magh ita _ neq am ik en ghi t at k i _ .
tawani _ piiwagh llegh gpesi _ kenle ani _ guygu t _ allgegh qugh ait _ ing l ul ek _ 
kiig aa _ legan _ ayuq elghii m _ , _ 
sangaawa _ all g en gh h at _ , _ 
taakwani _ nani _ .
ila ita wha _ qaga _ neqamike nghite atki _ , _ 
ataasigh kun _ taa wa _ ketligh at _ s uk agh llag u uq _ pi nga yu neng _

aleghquusigh t _ allgegh nghhagh t _ ak il p eg aam agh mi _ maakut qun _

kaviigh meng _ tukfightugh magh mi _ , _ sa meng _ tugute meng _ .
kaviigh niigh llegh _

qenghaghtu t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ay um i qu llgh em _ il ang ani _ siipngaan _ wallu _ il ang akun _ k av iigh y ag llag aq luni _ .
tamaani _ unangsagh yagute magh ma _ iig sagh aat all gh es tun _ kaviigh iigh nigh ughte ngughsi magh ma _ k av iigh n iigh utegh llak _ , _ 
kii _ kaviigh t _ pi naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ unake neghllug u laatagh ma ut _ tug ut l ug g naq egh ll all em tes tun _ 
iitek _ malig un naq aq s alghii nga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ nagun _ aag aqe aat _ .

maaten _ .

ataasigh meng _ tesamani _

naqam _ tume t _ tamaa _ esghaate gpenanga _ q ii v umalghii _

iwerngaqun _ unake yu llegh megestun _ wh aten _ unake kayugu yagh aat _ ayuq s alghiit _ 
tawaten _ n ate t k an igh mi _ unake lleghqagh meng _ kenle ite yagh uq _ y u pag il nguut _ 
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ angyaghtu negh meggni _ naamakaghte na iqe lghiit _ ang yaq ayug u yagh tut _ pi nga yu neng _ 
ayveghagh llegh m _ uglaghtala a _ ug lagh tal anga _ negh igh luku _ .

aamtaam _ , _ pi lghii ni _ neghqugh na lghii _

manguna _ whangkutestun _ 
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ uk s ul qu sigh llak _ awatangani _

aqii ma aqe lghiit _ taw ate te f tut _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _

quyngighqwaagh t _ q uk aan un _ 
P aam n a _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ al ig a sim aaq elghii t _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ 
enkaam _ m ug un qig sim aaq elghii t _ tamaakut _ u pen gh aq es tan gh ani _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ tu k f i ghi luteng _ 
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ ak ik luki _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ t ap ghagh p ak _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ 
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ tu k f igh agh t eng _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ 
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ n at egh q aq _ 
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ 
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ n as ap er ameng _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ u kut _ c o ll ar - ng i _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ q ik m ii r aagh et _ uyiigh _ ii ngun ii ta _ c o ll ar - k aq iit _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ i wh an il uki _ 
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ q all uk agh meng _ tem k al w aa qu t _ 
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ m aq aan iiq iit _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ , _ 
ungazighmii t _ , _ 
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ akuz ik ay uk _ il anga _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ 
taawanginaq _ nag at aqaa _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ k at am _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ .
kameg it _ , _ tawaten _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ at ill qu m si llgh a tun _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ i mun _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ tawaten _

E s n amun _ 
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i _ 
Q en aagh qun _ aq um uu ll uta _ 
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
neghigh luku _ aghnagh ghllag _ taana _ .
taakut _ pilugug m _ avaquti a _ aflengake ghllagu ai _ , _ 
quunpeng _ un agh sigh llag u yagh pe tuq _ tam aana _ 
esnagh mun _ tawaten _ alla _ pi yalghiikut _ kana _ tekeghagh ani _ ak m ag aat agh luni _ kaa taq elghii _ 
tagsigh luta _ aglagh uute yamta _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ naa y v agh r ug llag u yagh tuq _ 
qenaagh kun _ aqume uute luta _ whangkuta _ tag iiq elghii _ nunanigh ghllag _ 
pi yalghiimi _ taana _ p eng ug r ak eg sagh tuq _ sivuke luteng _ sivungagh mi _ kiyaghte yuwhaagh kau ut _ 
I i wh l ak ayug u yagh tugh nguq _ qazigyagh meng _ neli yuwhaagh aqngameng _ tal ugh lluni _ 
I in gh us al gu f tuq _ afta vig ngllagh luteng _ pi kau ut _ quug meng _ at egh yaq un ak i _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ 
qayughllak nguq _ unaghsigh ghllag u yaghpete uq _ tamaa na _ ii wh l ag mi _ 
ellnga nge uq _ taana _ quunpeng _ neq ang is ag um alghiit _ sivugh qaghte aqe lghii _ iy at aghn i qu m alghiit _ akmag aatagh luni _ 
taakwna nguq _ maaten _ nalugvig ughtekagh _ naayvagh ghrugllag u yagh uq _ kiiw m _ esne aneng _ 
piyug nghmini nguq _ kiiw m _ esne akun _ tagi aqe lghii _ S ing aa w e tegh llak _ 
tekeghagh a nguq _ taana _ el q waagh h agh meng _ mingle a llu _ 
A t g en r a _ av ang is ag llak _ repall _ 
iinghusaleg u uq _ wataghllak _ es n igh q w agh luni _ pi y alghii m i nguq _ ategh yaqunaki _ pi sqe lleg leg _ tes k an ang uq _ uleve qaghtekayugu ni luku _ sukate pigte luni _ un Ê¼ g av er ug llak _ 
U n Ê¼ g all u nguq _ taghnughhagh lghute _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ , _ uleve qaghte te luki _ iin gh us al g ul ghii _ 
ilangani _ tawaten _ ellngit _ neqangisag ma lghiit _ at ghagh y ugh ng aagh mi _ iyataghnagh iqe ma lghiit _ 
talwa nguq _ tawani _ tepagh isag ghllag _ esgh ap ag umalghii _ elqwaagh isag ghllag _ 
elngaatall nguq _ quunpeng _ esnighqwagh aqe lghii _ taana _ p am a _ k el ut ang aneng _ 
sa meng _ naalkute na luni _ elqwaagh ghhagh meng _ nun ameng _ 
atgenra _ ava isag ghllag _ q al ip aa k agh lluni _ 
alla _ unaangu pigte luku _ esnighqwagh luni _ pi yalghiimi nguq _ tekeghagh a _ nun ak iigh w agh aq elghii _ teskana nguq _ s aaq elghii _ kay aal ing in agh aq elghii _ .
El ngaatall _ elqwaaghtu uq _ qiliigh nagh _ s an ay uk ang at ni _ enraq _ 
saama llu _ enraq _ q al igh h aag ni _ k af s ag t aghn an in gh egk en i _ atg- ghhaghte yu ghngaaghmi _ .
aqume luni _ q al igh h aag ni _ ayuqe luni _ esghapag ma lghii _ un iigh naq aq elghii _ 
tawaten _ aghn al q waagh h aam _ pim akanga _ , _ pama _ K ii _ kafsagtagh ma lghii _ wh ani _ 
Wh anga _ taawa _ temngi _ nuna meng _ amigh k _ 
En ta _ aane aqe uq _ utaq iig i _ un Ê¼ g avek _ nuna meng _ . _ â
naten _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh nghminikek nguq _ ellnga nge uq _ legan _ tal uq agh lluni _ q al m es at _ sa aqe lghii _ kayaali inagh aqe lghii _ 
elngaatall _ qevuute luni _ uk ang uq _ al iigh tuq _ .
naqam nguq _ ken igh h ani _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ .
P im akanga _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh aqe ak _ ellnga _ uniigh naqe aqe lghii _ . _ qevuute pigte luni _ iwernga _ esteqe aqe lghii _ ken ii nun _ k at ag um ak angi _ wata _ 
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ te p aq _ kii _ aghnagh ghllag mi _ whani _ .
whanga _ aane vike amken _ kayusigh nagh u luten _ 
enta _ tawani _ neq eng egk at _ .
naagu nguq _ legan _ aga _ atghagh uq _ all g egh tu k _ talugh qaghte luni _ 
naqamllu _ mulupag gpenani _ uka nguq _ aliigh uq _ E s gh ap ag te ke k _ 
kaate yalghiimi nguq _ kenigh ghhagh ni _ imigh ghllag luku _ tug ul uk ek _ 
pi ma kanga _ t a z ing a pi gh q aagh luni _ uy gh ag meng _ enta _ kenigh ghhagh n _ m il ugh yaq min i ke k _ un ak l uk ek _ key- nghmini _ ay em k agh aa k _ kenigh anun _ 
A g allu _ ag l uk _ elqwaagh _ ag lu m _ tepe aq _ gh ev uk _ uupa _ 
llaaghanwha nguq _ neghekagh t _ , _ 
siingenllu nguq _ ellng it _ neqengekagh t _ nagh aa qay u d et _ 
tawaten _ ungipamsug ma luku _ tagitug ghrug mi _ aglu k _ allgegh uk _ 
pi inkut _ whaa _ S ing aa w e tegh llag em _ ungip am s ug a _ esghapag tekek _ 

ayvegh m _ aglu kek _ tamaaken _ tugu lukek _ 
taagken _ M ay uk aan kuk _ uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ aglu k _ P iin tegh l am _ unake lukek _ aglu k _ 
aga llu _ aglu k _ akuuraate lutek _ aglu m _ 
suna _ aragh qrug a _ 

S uk as alghii _ ellngit _ tawaten _ n uk al pig aal uni _ .
akuuraate lutek nguq _ aglu k _ gheve aqe lghiik _ llaaghan _ es n amun _ 
N an u un Ê¼ nguq _ taawa _ k a siv alghii ni _ ungipamsug a _ q im ag ig al nguut _ 
talwa _ salin _ quyngighqwaagh t _ neli llghite luki _ 
ellngit a nguq _ sivu nge aq _ neli yuwhaagh kaqe aat _ .
S ang il nguq _ s an q ut ng il nguq _ i wer ng aq un _ s av ig g ani _ t af sim ik luku _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ utegh mun _ kasivag te llegh a _ nanugh meng _ 
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipamsug _ ayumigh _ yuggagh _ pugughileghmii _ leg an Ê¼ nguq _ ag a _ nanevgagh ghhagh ughte magh mi _ ke t mun _ 
sukate yagh lghii _ an ag n iigh u tu sim alghii k _ iknaqe yagh lghii _ 
nanevgagh luni _ sa nanigh magh mi _ p am avek _ temngi _ esnagh mun _ 
P ug u ghi l eq _ tamaakut _ kasivag lghii ni _ sughug i kayugu ut _ qimag igate ngugh t _ 
legan _ sughukagh a _ uka _ tuq ut kaa t _ 
aatak _ mayugh aghtekagh _ 
sa ite ngughk _ sanqute ite ngughk _ 
qaygeghte qaghte luni _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ , _ uka _ legan _ nagnegh aqe uq _ nanugh ghllag _ ang ayuq am in eng _ 
aatakqun _ temngi _ , _ amaaghaghte luku _ qule mun _ nengug te luku _ pi ma lghii _ .
kii _ nun am _ nanugh ghllag nguq _ tukegh aghte ghllag luni _ p an il ek _ aga _ 
pelleghmun _ anagniigh utu te ma lghiik _ pag un ghagh t eng _ 
ellnga _ qule mun _ pamavek _ 
pugughilegh _ uusqagh lghii _ k aan negh ata _ nenge aat _ pik eg ken _ 
iwernga nguq _ nani _ ay um i qu ll eq _ tuqu tke aat _ malighqagh luku _ pag un gh aq _ 
qilag m _ taghnughhagh a _ 
Taw aten _ apegh llegh a _ 
tawaten _ pagaliit _ aghnaqe kangat _ n ii v us gh am in un _ pagaliit _ entaqun _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ s um egh tagh agh y alghii mi _ nenge uq _ tamaa na _ quy ak naq aa k _ umiileg leg _ .
umiileg a _ nuna m _ tawaten _ em ta _ panig leg _ al m e sigh h agh m i tun _ 
U y uq l igh pig aam _ aghnaghagh t _ pagunghagh eng _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ 
elngaatall _ t aghn ugh h aq _ en r aq lu _ 
I i _ , _ kaate nghata _ naa ita _ pikegken _ aakagh itneng _ inghu sightu ait _ , _ k ip ull eg mun _ 
alla _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh _ pi luni _ seghlegh h al ek _ pagunghagh _ saghna yaghqaaghte luni _ inghu yagh llegh mi _ tawaten _ inghu ghngaaghmeng _ m a tu m _ nanigh ke aagh _ anglegute mineng _ 
ighninghhagh _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ 
tawaten _ nagate aqe luku _ qiya llegh akun _ taakwavek _ pi luni _ 
elngaatall _ ungip aat egh ngaat ni _ tugu luku _ , _ kanagh a _ aq sang es t aa _ 
U g w in i _ whaa _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ seghleghhalek _ angayuqagh gkenka _ quyake naqe ak _

ii _ E s gh aq aghh uq un _ quyake naqe na iqe a _ aghnaghagh m _ piyaqminigu _ â

yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh luni _ p iiq aa _ , _ naken _ pi a _ wh ani _ n angll ek eg pen anga _ 
Taw aten _ entaqun _ esgha _ yug ngunani _ aqsanguma uq _ m am leg pag uu tuq _ .
yuug _ iisqiighute luni _ panig ni _ pi a _ , _ â _ K ii _ aghn agh agh mi _ aane ste naqe amken _ , _ qagavek _ lliigh naqe uten _ , _ 
nunalgute mnun _ qagavek _ talwa _ kinku nun _ itegh snaanghite amken _ n angll ek l uk ek _ liilightugh te naqe amken _ igh negh il ngu uk _ tesqagavek _ temngi _ lliigh naqe uten _ igh negh q ameng _ .

uksaaqestagh ma kanga _ , _ q ik m ii _ aqlaghaghte a _ qamagll uteng _ kumlate a _

Taw aten _ yaghlegillu _ tu ng tun Ê¼ nguq _ wataghllak _ kitumun _ q er ng aghnegh et _ .

Taa wa _ elngaatall _ puughte aaten _ .
pi naanghite uten _ all a _ naten _ pi naanghite uten _ , _ uk an te r ug pag llag luki _ qinu na ghhalek _ siv uk aghq iit nun _

aapte a _ S as qell unga _ p iiq si ng aa _ naagu _ qaame na a _ w ang iiq elghii nga _ , _ te ke ng ll agh aq elghii nga _ . _ 

Agh nagh aq _ yaghlegillu _ utaqa i aqe unga _ uk a _ tag iy ata _ aghnagh m _ puughte a _ el ngaatall _

amig igh te naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ , _ aklu i uute naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ ima nguq _ aga _ alpag aqe ut _ kaate ste gpenateng _ tawaten _ suka ite ngughk _ , _

tawaten _ alla _ uka _ tagi yata _ .

qavagh ste a _ A p ell gha
qavagh ngllagh luku _ tagtalmi _ takuyangllagh aqe luku _ ungip am s uk aqegk anga _ aghnagh _

taagken _ aga _ taa m _ ukikagh _ kiyagh taa llegh llag em _ taaggun _ kay usi ll eq _

naghuyagh m _ A l ing t ii tu nga
iike te luteng _ entaqun _ 
taawa _ naghuyagh m _ A l ing t ii tu nga _ taana _ .
entaqun _ naghuyagh mun _ tawaten _ naghuyagh t _ 
taawanginaq _ , _ pi kaqsagh kangi _ al ing ig a tu t ang aneng _ wataghllak _ kelute mun _ qamagte luki _

unaami _ aghte yagh kanga _ taakut _ kelute mun _ ingaghte uute nga lghiit _ en leg mun _ qute mete luteng _ elpeg kekagh t _ .

nani _ pennagh ni _ ne mi _ apegh aqe yagh aa _ .

qalghigh llegh a _ iglaglluugte ghllag luni _ siv ul iigh ani _

qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a _

upenghagh ii yaghtugh aqe ut _ , _ tespagavek _ malig ll uku _

sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ tugh negh aq _ q er ngugh t aa _ qayngun _

elngaatall _ tughneghagh igh naqe ma kek _ punguug _ nun am _ 
kelgugh ma lghii _ aam ta _ kelgugh ma kanga _ , _ yug a _ neghyu i sqellug qu _ ellmeggnun _ tugh negh aagh ng aagh meng _

Q av aghn an igh tuq _ aglagh luni _ taakwna _ atigh luku _ ak in ay uk ang at ni _ .
elngaatall _ neqenge naqe lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ ( _ 
apeghiigh yami _ naq am _ kumaghllug kek _ , _ sasiqumtaagh at _ ayumigh _ .
I i _ tiguynge _ sa u a _ tegh tugh t aa _ tiguynge t _ tamaakut _ 
anighqute ni _ ii _ tamaakut _ tiguynge t llu _ iigh luki _ navek _ q er ngugh tegh llag luni _ .
kelgugh qu a _ elngaatall _ punguug _ taw ani _ 
K ay ag tagh waagh utaq ef taa t _ tugh negh aal g ut meg g nun _ tam aa v ek _ maligte luku _ 
ila i nguq _ mingle meng _ tamaaken _ itegh aqe lghiit _ , _ ila i _ qule aneng _ paagken _ ukig aqe lghiit _ A l ing t ii tu nga _ 
ila i _ mingle meng _ naken _ taagken _ , _ ila i _ samaken _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ . _ 
elngaatall _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte a _ nak aan _ 
K an an tagh agh mun _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ , _ kay ag tagh waagh utaq ef taa t _ iwerngaqun _ 
taakut _ , _ anighqute t _ tugu luki _ aliigh aghte te kete luki _ qete te a _ tuqu qu ghllag aa _ 
ila a nguq _ g uu ll aat aam ak angi _ aga _ 
ila a nguq _ aamta _ tuqu qugh llag luku _ .
tawaten _ kelengaruugh uq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ 
qavagh nanigh uq _ sa uq _ kelenga uq _ at ghagh tu ut kay ug et _ en leg meng _ tes pag ken _ 
elngaatall _ qavagh m _ uk s aaq es tagh aa _ P u ngu ug ni _ ii _ .
A q lagh aghh negh an iq un _ naqam _ s aaq elghii t _ m iig tagh aq elghii t _ taawa _ qavagh uq _ .
ii _ iglegh sim alghii _ , _ teghtugh a _ elngaatall _ , _ 
ii _ ii _ nagh ull eg yaghq aa _ paga nguq _ 
guutute kaghagh ni _ taakut _ q ag ugh m ig utegh llag aq luni _ tawani _ .
Q am a _ tughneghaan- lgute meggnun _ tamaavek _ , _ 
I in gh u simak ang aa _ ell meg g nun _ aa _ uygu te gu _ teng l ug tu f q aan _ uygu te gu _ .
Taa wa _ nakaan _ pi luni _ nakaan _ ak in negh in negh at n i nguq _ nakaan _ k ii _ aa _ , _ pi naagh aa _ p ayug tek es tagh aq elghii _ .

ii _ ii _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aa _ taawa llu _ whanga _ an ag n iigh y alghii mi _

mangteghagh nun _ .

tagtalmi _ taagken _ yuug _ neqete nanigh yalghiimi _ ang egh tuq _ neqe meng _ 

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ El p ek _ siv uk lu ten _ kum ak igh l ak en _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ kum ak igh aa _ .

sughug ghllag _

avaquti a _ Yug waagh h aam _ , _ aki vig nkut _ , _ nategh mii nkut _ , _

anagutagh ghhagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh ma _ ataata ke a _ puughhute m _

aaga _ wh ak en _ nulighh a _ yug w an _ 
avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ tagneghli meng _ , _ peleghqe tke aat _ puughhute m _ n aku m ii ng w aaq luteng _ .

qafsina t _ entaqun _ kiyalighagh mun _ A al aam _

neqamike yaghqagh t _ liigi _ .

taana _ ayumightagh ghllag _ qaaqu aq _ wh aa _ nag ate l q a _ sang w aa _ 
N ak aan _ sa kagu _ Q aaq a _ 
sakegh nghite a _ all aku s n aq _ ug l alghii _ iike nagh te mineng _ 
aghnagh nge naqe m _ akequsagh ke luku nguq _ yugusigh ni _ Y aa v g agh si l gu yagh tuq lu _ , _ ellngit ni _ tawani _

alla ghllag _ quutmii neng _ 
taakut _ sang w aa _ Q aaq a _ P ug u ghi l eng ll aq agh nguq _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ T u p n aghq un _ taana _ .
avaqutagh lgutu te lghiit _ ul ap naa r iq luni _ 
taake uk _ melngu nkuk nguq _ n all aam an ghi tag u _ , _ avaqutagh ke ak _ k ell ii ni _ 
taana _ en taqun _ uyuqligh _ panig inagh meng _ nan um eng _ .
temngi _ neqamike vyiigh llegh nka _ puygutagh unga _ apegh anka _ 
nepiigh igate yagh uk _ angli saghteke _ n ut aan _ ungipagh meng _ .

tagtale mii _ pi gh ng aagh mi _ ken l ek s ag g aghn eng _ sa yaghqagh meng _ pakegte aqe luki qun _ amen _ sa ngllagh yaghqagh meng _ 
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ nagaqughsugnite aqa _ whaa _ nagate llegh ka _ sa u a _ 
nakaan _ una _ ke t lii g ne kun _ ungazigh mete ngughk _ kina _ .
ategh qu te _ n ul agh llag tuq _ uglagh lghii _ .
repall _ nagaqugh aqe lghiinga _ .
Taw at en nguq _ ategh i _ akuuraate nga lghiit _ 
Taw at en nguq _ n ek eg lluni _ 
taana _ sa u a _ iigh w il ngugh llag es tun nguq _ pugughilegh ngllagh qagh ngugh _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ ay um i q _ nekegtekau yaghpete uq _ 
U naa mi _ tegh tugh y alghii mi _ qu pegh llak _ nagate aqa _ pugughilegh _ 
entaqun _ upenghagh mi wha _ nallagh ma nghite agu _ a siv iin agh tuq _ aghvegh ghllag nguq _ 
taawa _ entaqun _ takukagh a _ 
Taw aten _ nanugh _ tawaten _ 
entaqun _ nan iigh ut aa _ nutaan _ nalluke kangat _ .
nanugh m _ ne ke luku _ taa m _ 
ii _ tu megh llak _ nenglu ngllagh llegh ke te luku _ tu um l i llegh ll ak aa _ nenglu i _ ifkaghte aqe ai _ nanugh m _ 
N an uu m _ qule iqe te lukek _ il angi _ ik f iq n at _ taana _ .
N eng lu _ q af si n Ê¼ gu yagh ta _ ug lagh r aa k _ 
aghtugh aa _ pi neghllug _ uy g un ani _ 
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ p aam n a _ uqugh a nguq _ ayaawagh ke luku _ .
ii-ii _ mang tegh as q waagh et _ taa k w avek _ m ay ugh tu utaq ut _ ukig uute ghllag uq _ k iig taq ut _ 
P en nan i nguq _ imani _ pen nan it ku ll aal uteng _ kaate lghii _ una _ en taqun _ 
tawaten _ nula ghllag uq _ taakwani _ .
tagtale mii _ ategh ghllag uq _ ng el q aagh aq _ 
S ugh ug w et
T aag an i r ug llag an ii _ nekegte luni _ Q aaq w aam _ en taqun _ 
legan _ kaate lghii _ iglegh tan eng _ qategtu te _ uugh q aneng _ 
esla kegte yagh na iqe kangat qun _ ayumigh _ A as ameng _ 
unaami _ teghtugh yalghiimi _ qupegh ghllag _ iighwilngugh ghllag stun _ .
qafsiniite kun _ qavagh m _ aga _ asivagh inagh uq _ .
qupegh _ talugh qagh uq _ yug wa _ 
tawaten _ nagaqugh aqa _ ang uy iq eg kaa g uq _ 
taawa _ nanigh igh te a _ paninang _ nanughtuqagh _ 
ungipagh kaqe kanga _ m aaten _ k at am _ en taqun _ .
tamaa na ngugh _ tume ghllag _ nanugh m _ .
nanugh m _ 
nenglu _ S i qu v ek _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .
ketwhelqun _ nag aq uq an ghi l ngu u kut _ uygu na ni _ kana _ allameng _ taana _ .
Yug tu llegh pig aan iiq aat _ qaye a _ 
atigh llegh i _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ taakwavek _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ en taqun _ kiigtagh ke ut _ taakwani _ es nagh llak _ 
pennagh ni nguq _ taagani _ ayuq sagh tuq _ qagugh ak _ 
itghagh aqe ut _ tagi luteng _ il ang it _ .
enkaam _ s ug w ag luni _ ay v egh aneng _ neq en negh meng _ agh tugh luni _ iqallug _ sama _ tea- ma anun _ lliigh aqe uq _ leg an nguq _ ukavek _ aghvighteg nun _ navek _ kaate ghllag aqe uq _ 
N egh llak _ 
N ul ii ni _ talwa _ megh si ng ll aghv ik aa _ entaqun _ sivungagh ni _ sughu k _ allgeghkagh _ , _ 
tespamaken _ aywaa neng _ .
taakwegken _ ku u v aa _ aate yameng _ 
taakwegkut qun _ , _ tuqu qugh kau ni kangit _ kiyalighagh mii t _ all ghii n iq eq r ug n il uku _ 
entaqun _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aki naqe m _ 
Taa k w an te q r u wh aam aa _ uukna _ k el ul igh pig agh ni _ pi llghite uq _ 
aygugh a _ uukna _ anguyiqe kau uq _ ungazigh meng _ kenle ke luni _ q ag ing ugh tegh llag aa _ 
qiighqagh _ entaqun _ .
pillugute lghii stun _ maaten _ katam _ entaqun _ .
S ag i qu s at ni _ q i negh s alghii mi _ entaqun _ k ii _ 
sa igh kuvek _ 
taana _ sa igh kuvek _ ungipaghagh u luku _ repall _ nagaqugh aqa _ elngaatall nguq _ 
naken llu _ nagaqugh qagh nghite ngugh u kut _ whaa _ maaten _ .
yugtu lleghpigagh u na iqe aat _ w av e- es tegh llag um akanga _ 
N egh llak _ esgha qun _ napaqagh an _ iqetu langa _ entaqun _ .
Taw aten _ nag at aqa _ ayuqe yagh uq _ ken l e nga _ 
N aq am llu _ ketligh at _ ila it _ S i qu v eg m iit _ 
nanevgagh ghhagh m nguq _ qam aghq w aam ii _ ayvegh aneng _ 
negh ghllag _ qamagte luku _ 
nuliigh ni _ kaate luku _ meghsi ngllagh vike a _ yuuk _ agniqe te a _ 
tuune a _ qinuyagute luku _ taa w aa _ 
Wh ag un nguq _ kuuve a _ ay u qu q _ 
ii-i _ esgh a _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ .
aga _ itegh uq _ enraq llu _ A nagh ay aam _ 
N uq s al g aq aa nguq _ enraq llu _ n ap aqaa _ neng ug luku _ 
ii _ tag taa l anga _ .
nuliigh ni nguq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ p ak in eg luku _ 
ellnga neng _ kayagte a _ ellnga neng _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ 
sagiqe te yatni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnalqwaagh _ kii _ iq el q w akun _ i teg aa kun _ , _ 
taawa nguq _ tungeqligh t _ taana _ S ik negh m ii _ ayemqe aqe a _ 
maaten _ siquveg m nguq _ 
taanegna nguq _ tuq un aq n em ta _ qamagte ma kanga _ ketligh _ 
Y ul g ul uku _ en m i s _ ang uk aq aat _ 
negh ghllag _ taanegna _ estamat _ en taqun _ iighwte ai _ y ul gu yagh tuq _ 
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ negh q waagh tuq aq _ kenle a _ 
naqamllu _ naa ke i _ S ik neq _ siquveg mii t _ 
entaqun _ all ak agh m e tuq _ .
mayeraaghpag _ en taqun _ 
siknegh mi _ 
yug ghrugllag u na iqe aat _ iv al um eng _ n eg agh p ak aq ut _ kelgute yagh aat _ napaqagh squghhagh _ 
El ngaatall _ kaapute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
nengug luku nguq _ esgha _ naama kusiigh aqlaatagh ma atgu _ , _ 
Taw at en nguq _ angvigagh ghllag uq _ im igh aq iit _ wh aa _ apegh aqe a _ y aag negh q am _ 
nuqsaleg aqe a nguq _ taana _ napaqagh a _ 
Wh at en qun _ k ak in aq negh meg g n iq un _ q ii p iiq elghii t _ 
qazigyaghagh ghhagh m nguq _ .
ivghaagh lghii _ it ag nagh in gh ata _ entaqun _ qazigyaghagh meng _ en r agh ng am _ teghig ke sagh ke te _ nuyaaghite yagh lghii _ .
naghulleg aqe luki _ , _ neng l ut aq _ nagun _ 
ategh a _ kiyagh taq ut _ .
P eq l igh sigh at _ .
esgha qun _ tuqu naqe negh mta _ aghtugh igate ngugh u kut _ n ek eg taq luki _ 
yug lgu luku _ enmis _ angu kaqe aat _ siknegh _ ukegkut _ kinguligh t _ .
S uq agh meng _ tamaa na ai _ y eq a y _ entaqun _ 
amenqun _ ama _ neghqwaaghtuqagh _ 
allakagh mi _ ne u uq _ 
siquveg meng _ allakagh mete uq _ 
yug lgu luku _ entaqun _ ungip am s ug naq elghii nga _ liite tke aat _ ang l ill em neng _ liisimakekagh at _ 
negaghpag ngllagh llegh _ 
A ng ayuq ak ek _ ivalu meng _ negaghpag ke aqe ut _ taagani _ 
elngaatall _ uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ qiipe aqe kangat _ I tegh yagh aan kuk _ 
Enkaam _ tamaakut _ qupneghqutaghqagh t _ T ut m ate l g en kuk _ eslege llegh i _ kiiwhtaghqutaghqagh t _ 
Taa wa _ all g egh y alghii nga _ imigh aqe ait _ whaa _ qafsina m _ yaagneghqagh m _ negaghpag m _ Q i waagh m ii neng _ nalluniightugh luteng _ 
qafsina _ imightugh luku _ .
whaten qun _ kaki naqe negh meggni qun _ qiipi aqe lghiit _ whang am neng _ tawaten _ 
N uy ek l igh pig aq _ aa k aqa _ 
entaqun _ itagnaghi nghata _ T ap gh al ug w en kuk _ aghi ste luki nguq _ .
Wh anga _ Agh nagh aghn i q _ nenglute aq _ uy ugh aag ka _ 
taawa _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ ap ak a _ 
Wh a teng w aaq _ lii g ik ng waagh pen aan _ 
tagtale mii _ nagh aagh un n em ta _ tawaten _ nekegte aqe luki _ tag it aqegk ang in kut _ 
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ kaate nghata _ A g aa f tuq _ qilag aqe luki _ negaghpag ngllagh aqe luki _ .
suqagh meng _ pugughyaagh ke na iqe ait _ yeqay _ p an ig ke k _ 
kangghwaag niigh sigh t _ negaghpag t _ N ap aq aghh aan kuk _ 
angli naqe llegh ka _ pugughilegh mi _ 
T aana _ apegh llegh a _ 
akuzi naqe lghii _ aghnaghaghni ii unga _ ungipamsug naqe lghiinga _ pugughilegh mi _ 
aghnaghaghhagh _ allgegh ma lghii _ tan pegh meng _ am iq elghii _ 
angayuqagh kek _ n u ug taq luteng _ nategh mii nkuk _ 
Taa wa _ taana _ whang aq un _ ang w aaq a _ ighneghagh k _ n ayuq egk ayug w at _ .
enkaam _ nategh mii m _ angayuqagh kek _ ii k luku _ q aam n anga _ uk mang igh waagh luku _ 
taawa _ allgegh yalghiinga _ nalluke aqa _ talwa _ aakagh ka _ taa wa _ sivungagh mii neng _ qiwaaghmii neng _ .
aakagh gka _ maalghug _ aghul ii teg pen aam ta _ 
Q aw aag em _ maalghug _ nuyekligh ak _ whanga mneng _ en r aq _ 
nuyeklighpigagh _ aakagh ka _ el ngaatall _ .
naghuyagh nkuk _ p am avek _ N un amun _ yugte aqe lukek _ k ii wh t aan un _ 
whanga _ K ang ii nun _ all a _ uyughagh gka _ maalghug _ taake uk _ utegh n igh naq aq u kut _ P ug u ghi legh mun _ .
iitek _ angu aqa _ apa ka _ taana _ 
U pen gh aan negh is t eng _ k iy an g _ ll ang aqa _ 
iitek _ naghaagh te negh mta _ , _ sa meng _ tagite aqe kanginkut _ p iiq egk angat _ .
S u f l ug w aq _ liigike gpenaan _ a tuq ep ag ig al k angat _ .
taake uk _ asag gka _ el ngaatall _ panig kek _ .
Wh anga _ qep ghagh y ag u sim agh m a _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ ighnegh kek _ t ap gh aghq at _ , _ uy iigh q at _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ ang al q ataa sigh q at _ 
kinku u ta i _ N gu sigh m iit _ nalluke anka _ T aq aa ng allu _ 
taana _ asag ka _ atghagh u nga _ 
enmis _ taa kut _ kaa taq ut _ uk s um illu _ 
aag llegh a _ mangteghapig _ tanpegh meng _ amu iqe lghii _ , _ aag llegh a _ guygu _ k in ku nun _ 
kiig nghaani _ nuugte aqe luteng _ ang yagh p ak _ 
taawa _ mangteghapig ghllag llu _ whanga qun _ angu aqa _ tawani _ iv o r y _ , _ 
T r a d e- aaq egk angat _ legan _ n aam ak aghq aq _ iike luku _ qaame na nga _ k ag im k aq _ kiigtagh ke ut _ 
iwernga _ paninang _ ayagyu t llu _ atuqe u luki _ paninang _ 
angli naqe llegh ka _ elngaatall _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ Q ay g egh taa m _ qawavek llu _ , _ pi aqe luta _ , _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ aate te kaghqagh _ T ak eq s iig en kut _ 
qawaag m _ amiiragh a _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ qawavek _ enraq _ 
iqallug igh ghllag luteng _ tesqawani _ elngaatall _ , _ 
alla _ pamavek _ nuna mun _ enraq _ kiiwhtagh anun _ enraq _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
qanii luteng qun _ kangii nun _ alla _ uteghte pagte luteng _ wetku _ tawaten _ uteghnigh naqe aqe ukut _ 
liite lleg mni _ elngaatall _ neqetu pigte uq _ t aan ang iigh h aq _ 
Taa m _ kiyang _ llangaqa _ m o n t h _ ig agh y aatk aq agh put _ .
teghiglug _ kuuvragh luku _ S iv ung amun _ tasigu luku _ 
S iv ung agh tu kut _ llangaqa _ atuqepag igate kangat _ q af si n a _ 
kuuvragh _ neghusigh ke pigte aat _ elngaatall _ teghiglug meng _ ang ak a _ 
whanga _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ kiyang _ te v negh meg g ni _ tapghaghqagh t _ tes q aw ani _ uyiighqagh t _ .
taakut _ taana _ tagi negh meggni _ tan- qagh u nga llu _ kiyaghte luku _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ amalleqa _ 
Tam aghh aag ken ka _ nayag ke a _ aat gh eg ni _ 
S iv ul i q _ taakut _ kaate aqe ut _ uksugh mi llu _ qimugsigh meng _ .
tamaa na _ amiiragh _ nazighagh _ aate te kaghqagh u luku _ P uugh h ut meng _ teme kaghqagh _ inglukagh ghqu tete luku _ 
taana llu _ tengghu nagh pigte aqe lghii _ angyaghpag _ ategh a _ lii simak aqa _ kaate nghaani _ 
amiiragh _ all ugh q aat _ tapghagh _ .
E s n igh q w aq lu _ uksugh mun _ naamakaghqagh _ sa u a _ qayuq _ kagimkagh _ m ek es t aagh h aa tu ll uta _ 
T es q aw avek _ pi t kay ug u f tut _ tamaani _ liite lleg mni _ N ung ug w en kut _ 
taakut _ enkaam _ atalgute nka _ es ghagh tegh an ka _ avaquti a llu _ 
napaqagh ghhagh _ taana _ nulightugh luni _ I tegh yagh aq _ lii simak ng waagh aqa _ 
ayapghute nkut _ I tegh yagh agh meng _ lii taq a _ sang w aa _ tam aana _ k ag p ar egh all eq _ asag u ma ainkut _ 
K ag p all gha _ enraq _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh mun _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe luta _ .

T al wa _ tagtale ngiighhagh a _ q il ung iigh h ii _ month _ ag agh taq luki _ .
whanga _ igaghyagh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ sivungagh mun _ i teg aa _ 
sivu nge aghte ukut _ nani _ ig at aghn i qell egh mun _ qafsina _

apangiighhagh ka _ taana _ naa ma _ ata a _ ellng aneng _ lii qugh tegh an ka _ .

sivuligh _ ug l aa pig te f tuq _ taa wa _ naa ma _ qantaghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ allameng _ aviighute yan _ nulightugh luni _ puughhute meng _ nalluke aqa _ q all at ng waagh luki _ 
wetku _ ivagh i ma meng _ nulightugh magh an _ taana _ liisimake aqa _ s uq l am eng es t at _ 
taana llu _ allughqagh at _ siftugh te _ el ngaatall _ 
A tam a _ kiyang _ tesqawani _ , _ taghnughhagh u luta _ salin _ mekestaaghhaatu tete luta _ ay v egh em _ 
tesqawavek _ pite kayugu ut _ tam aana _ taakut llu _ aq av z i k _ , _ pag un gh aq _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ kaa v l ak _ .
siknegh mun _ pi yamta _ tamaakut _ pi kay ug w et _ .
El ngaatall _ nengyugh ka _ taana _ itegh yagh aq _ .
kiyang _ taana _ liite aqa _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ pen n aneng _ at a si kun _ 
kagpag llegh a _ neqe m _ liite aqa _ nal igh meng _ akuute llegh i _ sa u aat _ liite qugh anka _ .
qaywa _ G all egh er - meng _ apeghtugh aqe yanga _ tawani _ liite gpenaki _ 
piinlillegh aneng _ iwernga _ apeghtugh llegh an _ liite luki _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate aat _ .
talwa _ taw ani _ qilu ngiighhagh i _ B i b l e- en eng _ agaghte aqe luki _ , _ 
S un d ay - n kuk _ W e d n es d ay - n kuk _ leg an _ itegagh a _ af l eng ak l uk ek _ kinegh ngllagh aqe luku _ .
angiite tke aq _ entaqun _ igataghnagh iqe llegh mun _ q em qagh waagh aqegk en ka _ 
agnepa llu _ entaqun _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate kangat _ whang kun n l _ 
atugh yaghqagh perewaagh _ sangiighhagh _ .
nunivagseghagh ghhagh mun _ talwa _ tamaavek _ uk s um i _ ellnga neng _ s ak m ak en _ S iv uq ameng _ 
nunivag _ t aghn ugh h agh ni _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ akugh anun _ kenlanga _ quy an all egh pig aat _ 
akugh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ taawa _ neghe kayug ut _ elngaatall _ im al gu yagh ng ii ta _ 
alqegkagh t llu _ enkaam _ s ay aghq ii taq elghii ni _ qallate luki _ kagpag kayugu ait _ s ameng _ i wh an i llegh qam m neng _ uksugh mi _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ s ameng _ 
ila i llu _ akugh ghhagh m _ tamaakut _ suqlag t _ , _ suqlamengestagh t _ akughllug ke i _ ama _ , _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
sa u a _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh _ elngaatall _ liilightugh te aqe kangat _ .
ata ma _ ang l ill em ni _ pi aqe kanganga _ ak l un a pig taq elghii _ .
enkaam _ amalleqa _ tamaa na _ inghu yaghqaghte a _ 
T aana _ inghu luteng _ enraq _ wh anga _ f av o r i te - k ell uku _ 
elngaatall _ aqavzig ghllag u uq _ ig agh y all em ni _ pagunghagh ghllag u uq _ ar t is t- ngun iiq aat nga _ 
nunivag _ taana _ kiyang _ el qugh agh taq luki _ aagken _ 
laluramke t llu _ esghagh qaghte yug ni tke anka _ laalighte aat _ nalighmeng _ taakut llu _ 
nurse- a llu _ gallegher- meng _ ategh ke lghii _ kaate aghte uq _ taa k egh llag et _ 
asag ka _ taana _ up-uma _ emta _ qinuyug ghllagu laatagh uq _ tamaani _ ag l ut _

Q et g aat aq l ut allu _ , _ legan _ taake uk llu _ aflengake lukek _ ayuqe agput _ av igh aat aq ut _ 
taakut _ elngaatall _ atalgute nka _ el tugh am nun _ .
Tam aa ku t lu _ taawa _ igaqegkaghtuqagh t _ yuvghiigh na ghllaget _ , _ quy ng igh q waagh et _ .
umuqagh meng _ qaspeghagh ke lghiit _ tam aani _ 
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ whanga _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghii _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ qaygeghte aq _ nalighmeng _ .
A ll ameng _ taghnughhagh ni _ elngaatall _ qiliigh nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghiit _ n ugh aghh aat _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh at _ tuqu m aaq elghii t _ quyanagh lleghpigagh at _ 
qaywa _ paper _ n ul agh ll all gh ani _ talwa _ .
uksugh mi _ enkaam _ sa yaghqagh ite aqe lghii ni _ q aw ani _ entaqun _ sa meng _ k in kut _ quunpeng _ naghaagh ste aqe kanginkut llu _ sa meng _ .
kiyang _ llangaqa _ qagh l ul uki _ ilu anite ghngaamta _ uq f il q aagh meng _ tes q aw an l eng ugh meng _ sa meng _ peghlaaghwagh meng _ usi negh meg tek i _ quy ng it _ qam ugh tek luki _ 
tawaten _ ilu ani _ ig al gu f tuq _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ uyghagagh u te aqe lghiikut llu _ quy ng il g uk aan iyagh tuq _ 
whanga _ angli lleg mni _ igaghyaghqagh llu _ aklunagh pigte aqe lghii _ s al i n _ 
Tam aani _ enkaam _ m ek es t aagh h aal unga _ quy ng igh y at _ 
taana _ enkaam _ quunpeng _ whanga _ U y at iq aan kut _ qimugsigh _ usi leg ghllag _ mission _ iv agh iy at _ sakmaken _ 
tawani qun _ en taqun _ igaghyagh lleg mni _ sivungagh mun _ Q ay g egh t aan kut _ qayughllak _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ siv ul igh pig aag ut _ S iv uq amun _ 
sa u aat _ legan _ U kum a _ elqughaghte aqe luki _ ug w iigh tuq _ 
kiig mi _ amalleqa _ neqamike aqa _ teghigniqe llegh ka _ , _ 
iighaate aqe lghiikut _ P it ii q _ veg a llu _ tes am ani _ taake ghllaget _ tamaavek _ 
sa meng llu _ ategh i _ esgha _ puygu kenka _ t aagken _ naghpigh aqe luki _ aglu t _ ila mta _ inglu ke te luta _ ataasigh _ 
qenwat _ naghpigh lleg t _ uglaghi ghllag aqe lghiit _ naghpigh iqe ait _ neghqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ qamugh it _ Q ag ugh m ii _ 
qetgagh te aqe luta llu _ taa k w n ang iigh h aq _ sa u aat _ tamaakut _ naghaagh lleg put _ teghig nagh tun _ avighaate aqe ut _ n el ik angat _ 
I p a _ whanga _ maaten _ eltughagh mnun _ 
tamaakut llu _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ kiyagh ll uki _ ii tek _ quyngighqwaagh t _ s ii v an llegh pig aq aat _ 
quyngigh ghllag u yagh u uq _ liite lleg mni _ tamaani _ .
aagken _ imagh a _ iq all in iigh v ig mi _ aliigh luni _ pamagun _ El q waagh q un kut _ kiwavek _ aga _ teve ghllag aqe lghii _ .
allameng _ sivuqagh meng _ uteghnigh yalghiikut _ uvite mi _ nughagh ghhagh t _ legan _ tuquma aqe lghiit _ .

ata ma _ 
U kum am _ legan _ 
taawa _ ellnga llu _ igagh lgu uq _ , _ en taqun _ quyngigh lgu kau ni yagh uq _ ellmi llu _ A g aan ku ni _ 
enraq _ taa kuk _ kingu aneng _ aviite luta _ salin _ pennaghqute te luni _ sa u a _ 
tamaani _ enkaam _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ .
kiig mi _ enkaam _ anglu ighpag magh ma _ piyug meng llu _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ , _ siv uk luteng _ K uy ang um ag ni _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ siingenllu _ up-uma _ kiiste i vig meng _ ag avek _ P iq al ag nun _ 
enkaam _ kayute igh te naqe ni luni llu _ , _ pi aqe lghii _ ang aghq ugh aqegk ang it _ sivuqagh mun _ 
nulightugh luni _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh uq _ tesamani _ 
pi ta igh u uq _ whanga _ W al ku tan kut _ kingu mneng _ 
tawani llu _ pi te i uq _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ .
Taw aten _ em ta _ qantagh aq _ taawa _ taagken _ piinligh kau uq _ maaten _ 
ipa _ whangkuta _ kingulighpigagh u ukut _ u us qagh llak _ 
taana _ apa ka _ iv g aghn aq aq ut _ kiyaghte luki _ iitek _ entaqun _ , _ tesamani _ A g l ugh aq _ 
iitek _ t aagken _ kaate aghte aqe ut _ usi t eng _ 
kiyang _ qawani _ iqalliniighvig mi _ qerngughte te aqe lghiikut _ taakut llu _ 
kiyang _ tal wa _ tevnga kun _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ wetku _ 
pugughilegh _ 
A g a _ apegh llegh a _ 
iighwite luta _ s al uku _ kiyaghte luku _ .
piqalag _ taake uk _ nunaagh gket _ .
ighulugh leg k _ ika _ akmagutagh leg k _ .
iwernga _ mayugh aatagh lleg mni _ imani _ nuna ughtekagh _ 
A aw yagh llak _ pennaghte negh meggni _ naa s qugh llag a _ sivuke luteng _ kuyag nge ma gni _ .
kuyag nge ma gni _ tawani _ kiyaghte luteng _ atghagh aqe lghiit _ agavek _ piqalag nun _ .
taakwagun _ sugugte luteng _ pen nagh qu u te llgh an _ ang el q aa _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ 
aghni ut _ pamagun _ av iit k at _ naa k i _ 
T aana _ yug u sigh h aa _ tug uq agh te kaa t _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ ilag iig al nguq _ naq am _ itegh yagh aq _ , _ 
tawaten _ emta _ unguv as tek aa _ qikmigh t _ q ang ig ani _ .
amenqun _ tuqu yaghq aq _ paagna a _ 
N aa s q wa _ iiwenllu nguq _ ivgagh naqe aqe ut _ 
legan _ taagken _ sa u luki _ usi teng _ qetgegh te aat _ all g egh um aan _ 
ellnga n llu nguq _ iitek _ esghagh aa _ 
qikmigh a _ talwa _ naa ke i _ 
N ap aq aghh aan ku nguut _ aliigh qaghaqe uq _ A g l ugh aan kut _ 
esghaghhu nguq _ pen nagh tan eng _ ataata a _ 
aga _ taakwagun _ whaa _ siingenllu _ itegh qaghte lghii _ anigu mun _ tespikavek _ 
K i ngu ng it neng _ sa luku _ pi litgu _ N aa ng iigh aq lu _ 
aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ , _ apegh iigh luni _ 
qughagh nghaani nguq _ ima _ talughte te aqe a _ al iigh y alghii meng _ 
ullegh na nigh an _ tawaten _ ukig te ma kangat _ wh aa _ 
aaw yagh ghllag _ im ani _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .
navek _ pi kau aat _ tawavek llu _ uugta t _ alaghrang _ 
taawa _ taana _ pennaghqute te llegh an _ angegh llegh ke a _ i f k aq uu tuq _ 
qikmigh a _ talwa _ avii tke aat _ naa ke i _ 
taana _ yugusigh ghhagh a _ tugu qaghtekagh at _ aq f aq ugh naq uk _ 
alignagh yagute aqe kanga _ ilagagh igate ngughk _ naqam _ 
Wh ang ku ta _ s aa qu kut _ unguva stekagh a _ .
kinku u lghii ni _ tuqu yaghqagh _ s ung gh an agh tuq _ 
P in aq in aam al uta _ kagimekagh _ A ku l pegh amun _ 
taakwani _ kingu ani _ whangkuta _ wh anga _ , _ allgegh magh an _ .
ifkagh gpenani _ kaave i ke ghllag ke aq _ n uugh tugh aq er tagh put _ 
talligh kek _ sa ghllag ke ak _ ag a _ 
N uq negh tegh aat aq anga _ kaa te qagh tagh p un g _ .
utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .
N uq neq luku _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ tu k ell egh tagh llag ni _ , _ leg an _ av ang il k iin kut _ .
kingu itneng _ whangkuta _ ag l aat iin kut _ .
neqe meng _ gaagh luta _ tu m en un _ apeghiigh luni _ nategh mii _ 
nutem _ paga _ , _ aliigh yalghiimeng _ aga _ 
mate- te ghhagh inagh _ aga _ aliighagh ut _ whaa _ 
kaate yalghiimi _ imani _ seghleghu ut _ .
iwerngaqun _ gginagh ghhagh _ una _ sallghite uq _ tu m en un _ 
kaate luni _ manughagh mun _ tafsi igh yalghiimi _ , _ ifkagh qu uute uq _ .
ilapga qu te aqe uq _ im a _ naasqugh ghllag a _ whang ku ta _ 
aaw ightugh luku _ q ik m i q _ qantaghqagh leg nun _ aqfaqugh naqe uk _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ , _ A g l ugh aq _ .
manughagh mi _ qakmani _ whang ku ta _ 
whangkuta _ sa aqe ukut _ ilu ani _ ing agh simak angat _ 
A q f aq u um akanga _ imani _ sungghanagh uq _ .
pi naqe i nagh ma luta _ aga llu _ aa wa _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ t all i m _ 
N uq en n aanghi l nguut _ q al igh h aat _ q ii p agh aat _ whanga _ at ku g w et _ nategh mii _ .
ima _ aga _ , _ ag av es aa s luku _ 
enankin _ nategh mii m _ aga _ uk i f k aq aa yaq um i _ unguv an aa y an ghi tuq _ .
Q an egh min eng _ kaateqaghtagh ung _ , _ 
I w em g aq un _ ef l ugh waagh aq luki _ uy gh ag igh tegh waagh aa _ 
N ek eg r aam s iigh luni _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ pin iigh s alghii mi _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ qu un p eng _ 
pugughilegh mun _ amavek _ aglagh te ainkut _ al ing r uugh llag aq luni _ 
Taa wa _ atghagh te luta _ tume nun _ pi aqe luta _ 
ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe luta _ pi naq egh llak _ uyghagkagh ightu aghagh a sa _ 
amalka _ qikmigh kun _ tugu laghate luta _ tag it k ag put _ 
aawallu _ s an ghi taa k _ kaate aghte ukut _ tem ng i _ 
iiwenllu _ samaken _ ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe ukut _ tume nun _ agavek _

aga _ ima _ , _ whangkuta _ peghte uute luta _ al ing utk eg pen aan _

sa mi _ kaate lta _ whangkuta _ A g l ugh aam _ neghigh pigte luku _ kaat ute ma kagh nge aat _ pi negh min i _ 
taawa _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ ingaghte ma kangat _ tag iiq luni _ .
aqfaqugh ma kanga _ tag tal k aa _ .
tamaa na _ 
nuqete naagh nghite ngugh t _ qaligh ghhaat _ 
K iig mi _ qukfighte aqe luku _ kiyagh te llegh put _ .
whaa nguq _ naasqugh _ una _ ukifkagh kaayagh kuni _ 
qanegh mineng _ ulu mineng _ ag a _ n a si q negh meg g ni _ uyghag t _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ 
M il gh ul ag n illu _ , _ K uy ang um ag ni _ kiyagh taq u kut _ 
A l p a _ taagken _ igleghte yaaghte yalghiimi _ piniighte yalghiimi _ k iil qu si q _ .
sa uq _ i wer ng aq un _ n a si qu ll uku _ alingruugh ghllag aqe luni _ tag iigh ll uta _ es n ami _ t en tal uta _ 
taawa _ ugpegh llegh gni _ aghula igh te lukek _ ll iigh tu kut _ 
A g lagh aq l uta _ alignalghii mun _ pi naqe ghllag _ .
qenwat qun _ ag l aq agh aq l uta _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ tagi tke agput _ 
naqamllu _ sa nghite ak _ ll ii pii g tu kut _ temngi _ sa naanghite ni luku _ naten _ tu ung l iq a _ .
P iig w ap iig tu kut _ taana _ leganqun _ tengghu nagh _ 
nalla ghhagh _ pi uq _ , _ il ang an i kun _ ukughsi _ A as am _ elpesi ni llu _ Agh nagh ll u wh aan kut _ .
A ng yagh pag et _ pi inkut _ kaa taq elghii t _ T r a d e r _ tuqu naanghite uq _ alingutke gpenaan _ k in a _ 
C as te ll - kun _ qama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ P ug u ghi legh mun _ ag lagh tu kut _ 
taagken _ pii w agh l uta _ ag l aat iin kut _ t aag gun _ .
piniighte a _ mulunghituq _ .
taawa _ tagtale ke a _ 
angli naqngu lunga _ 
N agh aagh u te l g uu kut _ apegh llegh a _ 
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ pi c ku p _ 
kii _ sang w aat _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
G uy g um un _ whang ku ta _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ neq am ik aqa _ 
alpa _ sa u a _ q em tagh llag mi _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ taw ani _ 
iqallug _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute luku _ lii s alghii nga _ tagi aghte luta _ esnagh mi _ .
En taqun _ P e d er s en - meng _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ 
aglagh aqe luta _ tes am an tagh taq luteng _ piiwagh qagh luta _ ang leg ut min i _ 
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ en r aq _ 
tagi luta _ qenwat _ il angi _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _ 
Q ev uu ll unga _ q em all _ il ang ani _ q iv gh uk aq ll uki _ 
sivuqaghte negh mta _ nag at ng waagh nan igh si nga _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ nag at egh llag luki _ .
Q em all _ wh aa _ sivuqagh meng _ pugughilegh mun _ 
A mal ka _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ e x er c is e- es tegh llag um aaq in kut _ 
A an qagh ll uta _ angyaghpag t _ mang tegh at _ 
igaghyagh llghite unga _ en taqun _ 
sivuqagh mi _ , _ igaghyagh qagh lunga _ taaqe kau unga _ sang w aa _ 
naghaaghute lgu ukut _ sa meng _ 
uqfigagh t qun _ amen _ 
A nag ut aam _ sa u aat _ ungip am s uk egk anga _ p an egh aat egh llak _ 
mangteghagh t _ ell nga _ n uk al pig aa luku _ , _ ungip am s uk s aghq aa nguq _ whangkuta _ u r an g _ 
guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ , _ neqamike aqa _ s aam _ 
entaqun _ taakut _ qemtagh ghllag mi _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke te lghiit _ 
angyat nge llegh _ nalluke aqa _ , _ liisagh lghiinga _ taawa _ angyaghwaagh lgu ukut _ q aam kut _ 
entaqun _ p an egh s ii m ak ang it _ .
nekreg te nkut llu _ aan ull uki _ entaqun _ anglegute mini _ tawani _ , _ esghagh aatagh aqe anka _ kaate aghte nghata _ ilangani _ .
T aag ani _ tamaakut _ ila i _ enraq _ am ig meng _ aan es luki _ kiyang _ , _ ungipamsug te lghii neng _ taw avek _ 
Q en w at _ aan un nan ii m ak ang it _ ila i _ 
qevuute lunga _ qemall _ ilangani _ a sim m n il nguq _ s aam n a _ 
sangan lli _ .
puygu ma anka _ an ag te ngu m alghiit _ sa u aat _ nagate ghllag luki _ A g aan kut _ 
qemall _ whaa _ neqangugh lleqe anka _ .

aanqaghte luta _ alla _ mangteghagh t _ uzifqaghte luki _ wiin _

pugughilegh m _ , _

P an egh aa te llgh ani _ pugughilegh _ .
mesiighllug kun _ anigu t _ nepte luki _ 
nanigh m _ peqagh i _ .
avaqutagh teng _ paneghte yu i ma kangit _ P ug u ghi l ghem _ 
taagavek _ aane te luki _ kiiw m _ inglu anun _ lli aqe luki _ , _ taa w ar aa ghi n aq _ ukavek _ lliigh ut _ 
taagani _ kayaali llegh mi _ , _ legan _ amig meng _ aane ste luki _ ifkaghte aqe kangit _ 
qenwat _ aane te nanigh ma kangit _ y uk aa _ 
taana ta _ negh i pig ll uteng _ iiggekagh a _ tal wa _ saamna _ yug meng _ imaqe ghllag uq _ 
A nagh ay aam _ it gh aatk ii _ 
katamqun _ anagte u ma lghiit _ T ut m ate l g en kut _ , _ P uugh h ut en kut _ .
pamavek nguq _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ taslugh kete te luteng _ , _ 
sa meng _ neqe meng _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ 
tamaani nguq _ tuqu quqagh _ .
K u ku leg m iin nguq _ P ug u ghi legh mun _ taakwani _ u pen gh ami _ 
entaqun _ p ak eg tek aq _ panegh pigesnaghkagh t _ ak m ak luku _ negh ke igh llegh m _ .
S uk il p agh mun _ , _ iigge llegh i _ afsengagh m _ sa i _ 
megh kun _ pugughilegh _ neqe igh ghllag kaqe na iqe kanga _ , _ s uk il p aan kut _

neqetu yagh lghii _ pugughilegh _ at ku g w et _

iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ , _ 
I n in aq n em tek i _ siipnegh ghhagh ni _ angayuqagh gka llu _ te qugh p aag tek aghh aat _ m es iigh meng _ ku u v luki _ q at egh q w aa s luki _ nanevgaghtagh ut llu _ 
tazikani _ am igh q waagh et _ .
taawa _ pugughilegh m _ yug ke aa _ .
N eng t aghh n em tek i _ neghigh pigte luteng _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ talwa _ 
Wh anga _ itghagh tke ai _ taa q egk anga _ 
I gh leg y ag us at nga _ taa qu nga _ .
taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ , _ 
Q ug w in ii _ amighqwaagh i _ k el ig agh aq eg ke put _ atkug ngllaghkagh t _ 
nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ , _ 
Q aat g i _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ a tu ug ut _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ all ak agh meng _ 
sukilpagh mun _ at ku g w et _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ 
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ 
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ q aa s l iq luki _ 
qaqsungigh at _ atkug u luteng _ entaqun _ alpa stun _ 
naghuyagh t _ k av igh ll uki _ ngelqagh stun _ taa kut _ , _ 
sukilpagh t _ aat kay ug w et _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ sang it a _ atkug u luteng _ nal igh negh it a _ u pen gh aan negh at n i nguq _ 
amighqwaagh t _ esghapag lleg mni _ sivuke luki _ ghhute kun _ ghhute ngllaghkagh kun _ tequgh kun _ P ang ang aa w en _ naagu _ tam aghh aan _ aghvig nghminiki _ naa ma _ , _ talwa _ whanga _ quy ng i q _ , _ taw aq a pi k _ .
T al wa _ esgh aq an ka _ tequgh ghhagh t _ .
angighhwaagh luki _ amighqwaagh t _ ik naq egh llag et _ 
itghuugute neghsigh luki _ s ung agh y aa w aaq luteng _ ini luki _ 
T aan aq un _ n aam a _ ii m g ut aa _ , _ 
whanga _ qantaghaqun _ taaqe kanga _ tamaaken _ amighqwaagh meng _ qepghagh nghmeng _ taa p egk ameng _ 
ighleg yagute yatnga _ taaqe unga _ taw aq allu _ 
aki ngllagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ amighqwaagh meng _ tamaaken _ 
P ug u ghi legh m iit
P ug u ghi legh mi _ ngelqagh at _ ang ayuq ak ek _ naghuyagh t _ I tegh yagh aan kuk _ 
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ 
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ 
pinighhalek _ A t gh aa ng an kut _ maqagh ghhalek _ A g l ugh aan kut _ 
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ taa kut _ 
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ n ay ag i _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ T aq aa ng an kut _ 
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ s ak aa _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ megh mi _ tuq uk aq _ , _ pinighhalek _ A g aam llu _ 
N eg agh aghn iigh mi _ uk s um i _ S ing ig p ami _ 
Q u un p eng _ ungipamsug te nghminikut _ sangita _ m et ghagh meng _ nalighnegh ita _ 
sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ 
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ av ii tut _ 
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ q aw aag t at eng _ 
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ agh ip a tu um agh mi _ 
taana qun _ naa ma _ imeg te a _ ag ang uq _ maana _ nazighagh _ qukaa kun _ 
iknaqe ghllag _ t a z im an tut _ tawaqa isag negh meggni _ 
maaten _ esghapag lleg mni _ tawaqa llu _ allangughte uq _ A k iv ig en kuk _ 
melugyaghqagh _ allangughte uq _ taana _ 
pugughileghmii t _ 
pugughilegh mi _ I tegh yagh aam _ angayuqagh kek _ G ug w ii ng en _ .
avaquti a _ anglegute nka _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ n ul igh tugh yagh tugh luni _ 
qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ .
liisimakekagh ghhagh nka _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ N ap aq aghh an kuk _ av aq ut ak ek _ .
T u quy an _ taakut _ K u ku leg mun _ 
T ag iy alghii mi _ n ul iiligh luni _ nayag i _ ivagh i ma nkut _ 
T al wa _ ama _ sa ke aa _ , _ 
T aan allu _ taana _ anengagh a _ .
negaghaghni ii aagh mi _ uksugh mi _ i wer ng aq un _ taawani _ tuq utk aa _ 
quunpeng _ negaghagh niigh ghllaget _ taakut _ s ameng _ q ug w el ng i meng _ 
kangghwaag _ 
emta _ tawaten _ negaghagh yagh luteng _ aviite ut _ tazimante ut _ aghn aq _ 
unaami _ k ii w em _ t aag avek _ taawa nguq _ qawaagtagh teng _ allakagh ita _ .
uugte ma lghii nguq _ kanaken _ aghipatuumagh mi _ es ghagh yagh tu um akanga _ 
tawani _ neng l un eng _ taakut _ aga nguq _ taaggun _ ategh ma lghii _ 
taawa _ tazimante ut _ uy av aq un _ 
taakut _ pim akanga _ , _ esghaghkagh nka _ aki vig nkuk _ tag i _ avaqutagh kek _ , _ tag i _ nulighh a _ . _ â
A g lagh luni _ yuuk _ taana _ si q in ghem _ aghn aq _ 
itegh yagh aq _ naa ka _ , _ quutmii t _ panig at _ it en egh meng _ 
taana _ u v it meg teg gun _ ata a _ ay ag sigh l uk ek _ ne kaa k _ 
Taw an ll uku _ tuqu yan _ ungazigh mun _ nulightugh yaghtugh luni _ igh s ak aq luki _ .
atghagh yalghiimi nguq _ ungip am s uk egk aa _ nulighh a _ all ang ugh lleq n il uku _ 
enkaam _ , _ q el megh sim agh mi _ , _ avaqutagh kek _ iglegh s aagh s aghq aq _ 
tuqu yan _ es n amun _ kukuleg mun _ qawavek _ nulightugh yaghtugh ma lghii _ whang ku ta _ 
tagi yalghiimi _ nuliigh ligh luni _ .
talwa _ whanga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ q af si n a _ aghnagh ghllag _ kukuleg mii _ .
taana llu _ A nag ut aam _ esghaqagh vyiigh kaqe aqa _ U um k i _ 
taana _ wh anga _ iwerngaqun _ k at am _ tuqu tke a _ P ug u ghi legh mi _ 
taana _ t a z ik eg kut _ A nag ut aan kut _ sa meng _ Agh tuq aa y ag en kut _ negh neghllug te luni _ tuqukagh _ .
umeg ke i _ 
I g agh ta _ taana _ neghigh luku _ tesamani _ 
taglaate luku _ kiiw m _ taagavek _ inglu anun _ ika _ 
T al wa _ qavagh yan _ q uk agh tes teg pen aan _ esghagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
taakwegken _ nenglu neng _ P ug u ghi legh mi _ ika nguq _ 
taku luku _ aaggun _ uyavagh qu te _ 
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ av ii tu ll uta _ , _ alinge yu ke gpenanga _ tea- ai _ taku nga _ .
aglagh luni _ yuug _ ang y at _ G ug w ii ng en kut _ aghnagh _ .
tagite a _ atghagh te a _ naa ll ng in agh mi _ ighsa uq _ ne mun _ itegh nghmeng _ G ug w ii ng en kut _ 
Taa kun nguq _ uvite megteggun _ q ag egh tagh llag et _ ayagsigh lukek _ 
Q aag ghii s an _ t aku luki _ sa yaghqagh t _ negh kangit _ ighsa kaqe luki _ , _ 
pi niigh luni _ ungipamsug kekagh a _ kingu liigh aq _ 
lengaaghsi magh mi _ ii m n a _ qelmeghte magh mi _ .
A ng y at _ esnagh mun _ naa f qell uni _ ugkelli yaghtugh aqe lleqe ut _ 
taawa _ elqughte a _ p uk an ell g aa y alghii _ 
ipapik _ tuqu nqigte ma lghii _ mulu luni _ qafsina _ ayumiqullegh _ 
ataata ngiighhagh ma _ un ill uki _ esghagh kaqe na iqe kanga _ umeg ke i _ 
K i ngu ng it ne nguq _ whanga _ liisagh lghiinga _ katam _ family- ngiighhagh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ .
K ang k ii legh mi _ tazikegkut _ P egh y al q am _ uk ak agh aani _ mang tegh aat _ .
Q ik m i qu ll uki _ tuqu qu um iit _ , _ 
igagh a _ taana _ 
esla m _ seghlegh m _ tesamagun _ qaakekagh at _ 
talwa _ uksugh _ qukaghte ste gpenaan _ tagikagh _ .
laluramke meng _ esghaate igate ngugh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ m a tu meng _ 
angyagh t _ ayvegh m _ kangllukagh i _ 
taakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ aviitete te luta _ .
agigte te nkut _ taakut _ 
nani _ es n ami _ nalle inagh mi _ ayvegh m _ kanglu ghllag aatagh luki _ taakut _ 
A ll a _ sama _ qagegh ta ghllag t _ am ak en _ 
Q ugh s at ku m _ taku luki _ .
ategh ka llu _ tuqu qu um aa _ t aghn ugh h aq _ 
A t a sigh h iin aq _ iimna _ megh _ .
angyagh t _ tam aana _ negh u um aa _ il angi _ 
Tam lagh qu s alghii meng _ ategh ka _ pukanegh llgagh u yagh lghii _ k an ug llak _ k aana _ 
T aghn ugh iigh waagh luni _ apangiighhagh mta _ ighsake ma kanga _ qaake lleghqagh a _ leg an _ 
legan _ unite luki _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nagh aagh v ig it _ 
T aghn ugh h aq _ taakwani _ kiig mi _ qikmigh at _ 
E s gh aghh u _ taa kut _ kaa v egh llag um aat _ qu l angat _ mangteghagh at _ 
qikmigh ke te luki _ tuqu qugh ma ait _ qam ag teng ng waagh luku _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ panegh qugh ma kangit _ .

nenglu it _ tamaakut _

entaqun _ ayumigh _ yugtu pigte yagh lghii nguq _ 2 9 , 1 9 2 7 _ talwa _ 
nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ P ug u ghi legh mun _ 
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ K uk iy anga _ unite luku _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag negh meggni _ lii tu nga _ 
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ .
alla _ tawaten _ m aa ken _ amaken _ i f l ang waagh al uni _ nanugh ghllag m _ ivgagh ma aki _ qughsatku m _ .
qughsatku m _ uugte vike ma kangi _ El q waagh qu m _ 
nanugh ghllag m _ tuqu qugh ma a _ taghnughhagh _ tamaa na _ 
L ii s alghii nga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ anagkagh _ N ap aq aghh aan ku t lu _ 
tuqu quqagh ni _ tamaa na _ all ak agh m e te f tut _ ila i _ 
A g aq _ taghnughhagh ghllag _ .
I tegh yagh aq _ n ayuq egh ll ak aq aqa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ 
taamna _ taghnughhagh igh vig _ tagh tuq aag unga _ naghaagh vig it _ 
taghnughhagh _ naghaagh yagh te ghllag aqe lghii _ taamavek _ , _ 
esghaghhu _ taakut _ kaave ghllag ma ut _ qula at _ ellng ani _

ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a _ 
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ mal gh ug negh et _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ taa kut _ pi ng ayuq luki _ panig a _

tesamani _ liite unga _ enkaam _

iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .

pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .

aag lleg nge a nguq _ naa ke a _ m atagh qu ll uteng _

ugumi ke ghllag yagh kanginkut _ taa q luteng _ apegh ii negh meg g ni _

pangeghte aat _ 
ungipamsug ghllag t _ elngaatall _ ang yagh w aaq lu _ 
payangite ghllag qagh yu k llu _ angukagh ut _ all g egh te q aghnegh meg tek i _ 
elngaatall _ legan _ k ak i si m _ whaa _ .
aqfaqugh te t _ aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ P e d er s en - meng _ 
legan _ qayugh qiinagh luteng _ neghe gpenateng _ .

ineghneghlliqe gpenanga _ whanga _ angli kanga _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ 
T h o m p s o n - n en kut _ entaqun _ taana _ pilleg pigte yagh uq _ elngaatall _ ungipamsug nghmini _ 
taameng _ sang w aa _ liisagh lghiikut _ am a _ te a c h er - k egk aq agh put _ uk av an l eng ugh ni _ igaghyagh te aqe lghiit _ 
Agh naa r tuq _ ayuq l i q _ igagh i _ 
enkaamllu _ taana _ N i c ke r s o n - ngun ik angat _ 
Wh ang ku ta _ taana _ ayuq l i q _ 
apeghtughiste ke yuwhaagh t _ 
taana _ igaghvig _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ tamaavek _ 
T al wa _ mang tegh ap ag is alghii _ .
T aan Ê¼ g ani _ tea- aghte a _ .
aglu m _ inglu igh llegh aneng _ repa ke luteng _ .
A an t ap ut lu _ elngaatall _ aglu t _ tamaakut _ .
tamaaken _ repa ke luteng _ ulima kaqe na iqe aat _ p ap e r _ 
kayusigh kaqe na iqe aat _ s ap ag ill uta _ 
iwernga _ 
whaten _ igagh yami _ ikiqun _ uglagh ghllag _ 
nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiit _ k iy an g _ 
maaten llu _ k iy an g _ tu k f igh y uk ell ghi t _ 
A v l aw a _ maani _ , _ av l aw at lu _ 
minister- nge magh mi _ m ul ugh llag aq ut _ , _ ayuqe lghii _ .
N ut agh aq lu _ ama _ nan i m _ tawaten _ nulighhqaghtu an _ negh yug nagh llak _ 
iwernga _ sa u a _ ayuqligh _ ama _ uk ill uki _ neq ek r angll agh aq elghii nga _ .
K ang gh ug r ak gu ugh ll uteng _ ayuqligh _ o aten _ 
N eq ev ut
whangkuta _ taana _ ayuqligh _ kaa tu tegh ll an egh meg teg gu _ .
negh yagh uute kayug ni _ N ap aaq lu _ .
negh yaghtugh luta _ s aag b h w am m nun _ tagi aqe luta _ k an agh taq luki _ 
talwa _ mangteghagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
Q aa y ng akun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ q al q al im ameng _ 
enkaam _ uvite _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aante aput llu _ im igh luki _ k apegh t il u tun g _ mallagh ite ngugh t llu _ k apegh tek ap un g _ 
sa kun _ avlawate ta kun _ k apegh tek akun _ paper _ neq n igh h al ek _ qantagh luki _ anuqligh nghaani _ aantagh nun _ aante i negh mta _ 
entaqun _ sa pagite luta _ mallagh ite ngugh u kut _ talwa _ si q l ug w iiq akun _ 
akilpegaghkagh t _ 
Q a z ig y am llu _ anglikagh ni _ whangkuta _ uq ii _ 
Wh aten _ kiyang _ tukfigh yug qumtaagh at _ tawaqa nkut _ ayuq aq ut _ iiqmig nkut _ 
P i r aam si t ng waagh luki _ kiyang _ tukfigh yuke llegh it _ negh yaghq as tun _ 
avlawa _ kiyang _ q av aghq un egh meg g n i nguq _ avlawa t llu _ tamaakut _ 
enkaam _ mulu ghllag aqe ut _ p iigh taq sagh an ka _ neqekrangllagh qaghaqe luteng _ u kut _ 
nutaghagh llu _ taawa _ nanigh m _ 
sa kun _ kum l a sigh aq luki _ .
I q all ug w aq lu _ ila i _ N ap aaq _ mesiigh m _ .
neqe ut _ 
ii _ ug lagh llag et _ neghsagh _ 
S ag negh waagh et _ t ak er iig et _ tam aag un _ 
tazingavek _ leg an _ te ke r q aan i te f tuq _ kanaghte aqe luki _ .
kaate negh megteni _ naq am _ .
qaye akun _ aligh mta _ qalqalima meng _ 
N al igh meng _ qalqalima meng _ kemekrag meng _ nal igh meng _ 
I l angi _ imigh luki _ kapeghte i lutung _ .
neghe uute negh mta _ taaggun _ kapeghtekagh kun _ iwhani _ neqnigh ghhalek _ tam aakut _ ilangakun _ tengug meng _ qell uki _ 
qalqalima kun _ elngaatall _ unaghsigh kun _ 
legan _ pellumeghtagh put _ pightugh vleghagh ghhagh t _ es ghagh luku _ 
qazigyagh m llu _ , _ ayvegh m llu _ 
whaten _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ u pen gh ami _ neve sqe aghtagh luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ , _ 
M ang tegh as q waagh mun _ akuute aqe ke put _ u qu meng _ neghyaghqagh stun _ tawaten _ 
mesiightu luki _ pi sqe aqe kangit _ qavagh ghqu negh meggni nguq _ mesiigh i uute kayugu ut _ naa f qell uki _ 
maaten _ tawaten _ pi aghte aqe yagh anka _ 
M ang tegh as q waagh mi _ uksulqusigh _ ay ag y ul igh luki _ 
akuute luki _ taa kut _ ay ag y u put _ 
Agh negh taq elghii kut _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ qay ung ll agh aq l uta _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ 
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ es l all ug mi _ taawanginaq _ 
A lii negh mi _ uglagh ghllag t _ q ag ani _ 
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _ 
G aa ngu f tut _ legan _ tekerqagh u ni te uq _ kanegh _ t aag gun _ 
tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ lii s alghii nga _ 
tengertagh meng _ ategh ke lghiit _ uq iigh tu llgh a _ 
nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ naa y v aq _ nalighmeng _ , _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ mang tegh agh tu utaq ut _ 
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ , _ 
T an pi gh l uta _ taa kut _ tamaakut _ n ek eg taq eg ke put _ .
tengertagh u ut _ ategh i _ , _ 
aygughike ma aqe yaqenka _ all igh aghq aan iiq eg ke put _ taana _ esghagh luku _ wetku _ ugpeqe yagute anka _ , _ 
mangteghapig t llu _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh t llu _ 
taagken _ mangteghagh put _ upenghagh mi _ v eg llag u yagh tuq _ amaa iqe aq _ 
mangteghasqwaagh mun _ lliigh aqe luta _ uqugh meng _ itagsi naqe nghmeng _ 
mangteghapig m _ tan pegh h agh aagh et _ ikugh luki _ aagra i llu _ tun em aq luki _ am al ka _ mangteghagh m _ 
kiigtagh ke lghiit _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ pi luki _ 
mangteghasqwaagh mi _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikut _ ayagyu ligh luki _ uu m _ 
aghte nghaani _ taakut _ ayagyu put _ .
aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh aqe luta _ ing avek _ 
gaagh ngllagh luteng llu _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ eslallug mi _ es l egk ak alghii meng _ 
aliinegh mi _ aamta _ qagani _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ 
aanqaghte pagte te luki _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ gaagh ngllagh aqe ut _ , _ 
U uy negh mun _ anuqe mi _ , _ eslallug mi _ taaggun _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ 
uqugh _ piyaqnagh kanigh yagh lghii _ liisagh lghiinga _ qayughllak _ uq eng el eng es t aagh h aat _ 
T es p am avek _ taw avek _ uqiightu llegh a _ uqug ngllagh llegh a _ v eg meng _ s aghn ay an em ta _ q ii p agh aat _ akmagutagh kun _ al ii _ 
wetku _ uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ esneli nghaani _ .
taakut _ paaggun _ iwhani sigh u ut _ ke v igh luki _ mangteghagh m _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ 
tanpigh luta _ taakut _ aagra t _ nekegte aqe ke put _ at kuk _ 
amu i ut _ aagra t _ q ak m ag un _ amigh t _ maakut _ allighaghqagh ughtekagh t _ 
amenqun _ allighaghqagh u na iqe ke put _ 
vuvegh m _ tawaten _ tan pi gh luku _ v eg meng _ 
una _ iiggereghwaagh vig _ iigge igate luni _ 
taagken _ veg meng _ saghna ghllag aqe luta _ qep gh aghn agh llak _ 
samagun _ q ak em n a _ ilaagh uute luki _ ikellegh ghqu aaghet _ tunemagh ke luki _ amalka _ i f k aq ugh llag aq uq _ 
enkaam _ veg meng _ pi luki _ vuvegh igh aqe ke put _ tanpegh meng _ i f k aq un egh meng _ 
ukite aqe luki _ an ig ung i _ i f k agh ll uki _ m il u utaq luki _ amigh m _ 
tawaten _ ameltu aqe luki _ napaghte qugh vike aqe ait _ v eg a _ 
test-pag kut _ kelu t _ eslege lghii meng _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ qukaa ii kete te _ 
test-pag kut _ ama _ tawaten _ im igh luki _ uq ig tugh llag et _ amalka _ aagra m _ ug w avek _ 
sa ni te mun _ llilaghtugh vike luki _ ulig aqe ke put _ .
tawaten _ uusqaghtutka i ta _ unaghsigh t _ uq eq _ kevigh luki _ veg meng _ 
S ameng _ enraq _ .
elngaatall _ akmag aatagh aqe lghiit _ I g legh al q allu
tespamavek _ tawavek _ 
A ll g el q aa _ kenegte ghllag aqe luki _ 1 2 _ keviite kaghqagh meng _ 1 8 9 8 _ 
taakwegkut _ uzimun _ aagra t _ kevigh luki _ asi i _ 
elngaatall _ n all uk an ka _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ atg- ke uk _ 
amigh m _ qaye akun _ qakmagun _ eslatagh akun _ 
puqla ghllag t _ W aa y i ngu f tuq _ 
tespamna llu _ tawaten _ tanpigh luku _ veg meng _ 1 9 0 0 - mi _ all ugh q im ak ang at nga _ 
enkaam _ supug ite ngugh t _ seghlegh uy alghii nga _ 
taawanginaq _ t aagh tam i _ tanpegh pigu luku _ qepghagh na ghllag _ ( _ 
legan _ m ek elghii gh pag ugh s am a _ naghigh aqe uq _ tanpegh pigu luta _ S ul ug w en ku t gun _ kanegh _ ifkagh qu ghllag aqe uq _ 
taakut _ veg t _ ifkaghte luki _ t aag gun _ apeghiigh nghaani _ ifkagh qu nghmeng _ pi llgh a tun _ kameraagh i llu ta _ 
whaten _ anigu i _ ifkaghte luki _ miluute aqe luki _ .
T egh tun em ni _ mayugh luta _ saul- ghqu nqigte aqe luku _ veg a _ ke v ii qu ull uteng _ 
taakut _ anigu t _ aane ste qugh aqe ke put _ ghhute tgun _ t aan Ê¼ g ani _ taa kut _ 
Wh anga _ emta _ kalngagagh t _ imigh luki _ uqigtu ghllaget _ 
anigu u lghiit _ l al u r am k em _ egte aqe aput _ pi yaq n alghii _ 
taawa _ mate- yagh i yaaghte nghaani _ taakwna _ uqegh _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ n ef ku y ag u tuq _ 
sa meng _ tes k an kut _ M e ke ng an kut _ 
El ngaatall _ yuuk _ iglegha llegh ka llu _ 
T ag tal mi _ apegh llegh a _ 
allgellegh ke a _ tag l aa ll uku _ , _ k itu mun _ uq iigh tes luku _ t aagh t am _ 
taana _ q aw aag n iigh usi ng es qell unga _ pim ak ang anga _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
angayuqagh nka _ nalluke anka _ kaa s alghii mi _ anglegute nka _ q aw aag n iigh usi q _ 
kergam _ taghnughhagh u lunga _ ifla laghate ma lghiit _ pi ng i _ 
enkaam _ a tuq aqa _ aflengake i steke _ el ngaatall _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ taaghta nkut _ tagi luteng _ 
entaqun _ esghaqagh u lunga _ seghleghu yalghiinga _ .
enkaam _ taaghta mi _ tawani _ un Ê¼ g ani _ negh es qell unga _ en taqun _ .
entaqun _ negh ig al ken ka _ , _ angyagh yaghqaaghte yama _ yug w it a _ angyii sqe aanga _ negh aq iit _ 
enkaam _ ang y egh et iit neng _ egh q waagh us ameng _ taaggun _ angyagh unga _ taaghta m _ , _ sang w aa _ 
unaangu luku _ angyaghnagh nghaani _ taw ani _ keleg yaghtugh aqe aanga _ am iiq is l aat agh aat nga _

enkaam _ 
whanga _ eghqwaagh sagh itneng _ qasiqagh meng _ neghe kayug _ , _

U v in ku nguut _ test-ankut _ A m am eng an kut _ , _ taaghta m _ qeghigh a _ ang l in gh h ap es t aagh et _ 
elngaatall _ yuug _ p ang egh tu kut _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ malig ll uki _ 
tagtalmi _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ .
taawa _ taglaate luku _ el ngaatall _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste luku _ 
arekull _ q uk agh in n em ta _ pi ma kanganga _ ulimasightuumagh an _ utegh taq l uta _ 
enkaam _ agh y uq eg kaa g ung aq un _ kaate yalghiimi _ .
igaghqwaagh u yagh lghiit _ am iiq aqa _ qawaagniighusigh m _ pi i _ m aal gh ug eg nun _ ghhuugh t _ .
llaaghanwha _ atuqe aqa _ taana _ elngaatall _ tam aakut _ 
allameng _ upenghaghyag u _ angyagh laatagh unga _ tag tal ang ani _ 
Taw aten _ taana _ keleg i steke _ , _ 
elngaatall _ angyagh u uute i te aqe kangatnga _ wh aa _ lii g ik saq ef ut _ .
iwernga _ negh igate kenka _ kiyagh sim al uta _ angyagh t _ kaa tut _ taakut _ negh aqe ait _ , _ 
whanga _ angyeghetagh itneng _ 
allameng _ amaa iqe i laatagh unga _ tawani _

pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka _

Enkaam _ t aagh t am _ ll it ii simak ang in kut _ t w en t y _ whanga _ amalka _ anglinghhagh pestaagh t _ .
ellnginagh emta _ naten _ pangeghte ukut _ el ngaatall _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ t aagken _ 
pamaken _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ agh y uq n a pig tu uq _ 
kii _ n uk al pig aagh s am a _ elngaatall _ anguugh kaqe ainkut _ el ngaatall _ 
atghagh aqe yagh luta _ 
elngaatall _ aghyuqe kau unga qun _ whanga _ aghv e ngu m alghii _ 
taana _ amiiqagh ka _ maligte te luku _ ellmeggnun _ maalghug gnun _ amig nge natke ma kangat _ , _ 
N um e- ell uteng _ amigh m _ akike ma kangi _ s l uu p - e ngu m alghiit _ tamaakut _ aat gha _ ang yagh p al qu sigh r aag p ak _ 
enkaam _ tawani _ uteghte aatagh llegh m _ tagtala ani _ te l aan ang ak ay uk _ , _ mangteghagh _ tespamna _ , _ ungazigh _ .

ikevagh ke te _ seghleghu lghii _ whaa _ 
tagtalmi _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ angyaghpag t _ kaate ut _ ak il egh tu qay ug uk ang it _ malghukuraagh ghhagh t _ ataa si t _ iiwen _ tanqigh _ naange aqe uq _ 
qanigughte aqe luni _ tam aani _

taagken _ angyaghpag ggaat _ kaate yalghiimeng _ malghukuraagh u ut _ el ngaatall _

enkaam _ unaangu pigte luku _ kaa llu ta _ el ev en _ y e ar s _ taglagh lunga _ .

alaghrang _ angyagh aatagh lunga _ tawani _ elngaatall _

angyaghpag t _ 
ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ W aa y i _ aghvenge ma lghii _ , _ whang kun ni _ kiyagh taa q _ 
elngaatall _ suqagh a _ pi luku _ I iy iit aq _ .
Wh ang kun ni _ tagi yalghiimeng _ en m i s _ av aq ut il aq aq _ taw ani _ ategh a _ .

elngaatall _ usingigh lghiit _ es l ami _ 
N angll eg t alghii ng in aat _ angaghqugh kangat _ .
K u ul un ku nguut _ tamaani _ U z iv an kut _ 
enkaam _ angaghqughtuqagh t _ tamaakut _ neqekrag eng _ sighla te kaqe kangat _ tuqu lagh as ata _

piyaqli i llegh ka _

tawani _ 
aghvigh ut _ tag tal mi _ 
whanga _ unegte unga _ aghvigh te naqe yagh aatnga _ ell meg g ni _ 
unegte unga _ aghvigh yug nghite ni unga _ el ngaatall _ 
enkaam _ taagken _ taa m _ aghn angll aat aa nga _ 
tanemlleqa _ U z iv am _ taana _ tugukagh a _ pin ii pig tuq _ aghn aq _

mangteghagh ite na iqe aat _ naqam _ , _ iiw yiite aq _ taana _

nangllegtagh lghii inagh t _ neghqe aqe lunga _ aa y _

nulightugh llegh ka _

A taq a _ angyagh aqe lunga _ elngaatall _ , _ 
repall qun _ es ghagh luku _ q ii f qagh te qagh te f tu kut _ aghnangllagh te aanga _ 
T aan ang u uq _ uziva m _ naange a _ tu ng anga _ pi niigh pigte uq _ 
aghnangllagh te lunga _ tu m a _ tawani _ m aghq a sim aan _ entaqun _ talwa _ tukfightugh llghite uq _ p ang egh q aa tut _ 
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ .
aghvenge aatagh luteng _ tawaten _ kinguligh mi _ aghvenge llegh mi _ tawani _ angaghqugh aqe lghiinga _ 
pi unga _ .
kii _ s an iv an l e nguut _ nutem _ egtugte pagte unga _ elngaatall _ ang y al ep ut _ 
taagken _ angaghqugh nghmeng _ taaqe lunga _ itegh lunga _ nategh itnun _ 
tagtalmi _ nuug qaghte yalghiinga _ tug un ay uk ang in kut _ qetngigh ghhalek _ elngaatall _ 
taagken _ ima _ itegh yaaghtekanga _ elngaatall _ nuliigh mnun _ aq u ut agh put _ tu gu yagh aa _ 
kinguligh t _ pangeghte llegh nka _ 
taawa _ pangeghtekayug _ angyaghwaagh kun _ mal gh ug negh ul uta _ 
S ik u _ kaa saq ef ut _ taaggun _ un Ê¼ g a _ al ii tuq _ pangeghtekanga _ aghv iq am el nguq _ 
K ii _ pi ligh tke a _ angyaghpag _ taana _ megh a _ av iit ng waagh tuq _ .
suqaghtu lleghpigagh _ s um egh tagh aa ll uteng _ 
iwernga _ iigh w il p aghq u _ pi ligh tke a _ 
taagken _ ang y at _ s ayug tegh luki _ es av ghagh tu u tu kut _ 
tespamani _ kiyaghte luta _ m ek elghii gh ni _ tagtalmi _ atghagh ukut _ n ap agh y at _ 
I g legh utegh llag luki _ aghsaan _ ataa si t _ , _ nagun _ akivagh ke te _ il angi _ aghqe itagh i te vzigh luta _ tagitug mi _ 
qute _ esghagh luku _ qiive qaghteqaghte ukut _ 
Q af si n a _ pangeghte aatagh llegh ma _ , _ S iv uq am _ n all ang an is agh l uta _ 
taagken _ tume _ uukna _ 
whanga llu _ pangeghte unga _ u ug teng iigh h aq _ 
A g a _ tuqu sagh tugh aat _ upugha te ainkut _ elngaatall _ ungazighmii t _ .
anguugh kanigh luta _ un ak aat _ 
A ng y amun _ tag ill uku _ ruuseghmii t _ , _ U uy gh aam _ angyaleg put _ kakave lghiit _ .
iitek _ qu uk l uta _ kaate naanghite ni luta _ siku ghllagu ni luku _ saq r ug utaq l uta _ 
entaqun _ , _ tugu na yu kanginkut _ kete uute ukut _ q aq ay u ug tu kut _ 
tawaten _ yataaghqe ma luta _ whangkuta _ 
angyagh _ qiifte luku _ iwernga _ tawaten _ ang y at _ taagken _ wayagh aa _ aq f aaq luki _ 
T ag tal mi _ ivenrugh ukut _ elngaatall _ malghugnegh u luta _ al iigh ag put _ 
siku _ T ap gh u m _ n all ang an i te f tu kut _ .
kii _ es n ev aghn aq in aam al uta _ llaaghanwha _ awalighnegh a _ meghe a _ aviite u aghte uq _ , _ 
tawani _ sumeghtaghagh te luteng _ esavghagh liqe ut _ , _ 
naqam _ qu lii wh t ii ll uteng _ t aagken _ 
amenam _ angyagh t _ pin ii m aat _ esavghagh uute ukut _ 
telaananga t _ whangkuta _ mekelghiigh ni _ uyamig ke luki _ iv en r ugh y alghii kut _ napaghyagh t _ .
igleghte te ghllag luki _ angyagh t _ ataasigh t _ enkaam _ igleghte te luki _ uk av ek an i q _ ila i _ 
tawaten _ igleghtekagh ni _ Q i llegh qu u te m _ 
qafsina _ , _ tag il agh aa tu kut _ sivuqagh m _ quy ng igh q waagh et _ n ani _ maaqnegh m _ itghagh u uute kanginkut _ elngaatall _ igh n is t it _ 
naqam _ sii negh _ tag il agh aa tu kut _ 
tawaten _ qukaghite luta _ pin il ghiit _ .
aga _ tuqute yaghtugh aat _ iv g agh tuus agh tu kut _ negh igate ngugh u kut _ k ii wh un _ iv g agh yagh tu kut _ 
taawa _ unake aat _ tam lagh qu tu kut _

sa meng _ quug ke luta _ asingiitagh m _ .
ii _ A taa yagh h aan kut _ neghe uute yalghiikut _ llaaghanwha _ qaqayuugte ukut _ elngaatall _

ii _ .

apeghiigh luteng _ kayagte ainkut _ , _ aghula kayugu lghiinga qun _ whanga _ aga _ ategh unga _ uk a _

taagken _ 
Taagken _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ tes pag avek _ malghugnegh t _ .
entaqun _ maaken _ angyaghpag a _ si k u _ .

teller- mi _ aghqella llegh ut _ 
enkaam _ taagken _ aygugh aqe luta _ 
teller- mi _ tawani _ iqallug _ aghqella taqagh ut _ at egh aa ll uta _ 
I i - ii _ tanemlleqa _ teller- mete ngughk _ megh qun _ 
inglu anite ngughk _ nak r el eg ll aw aaq elghii t _ ang yagh pag et _ taa k egh llag meng _ 
aghqella te aqe ainkut _ tawaten _ 
aghqella _ , _ uzive te luku _ whanga _ g uu te llgh i _ , _ 
S egh legh ll aw aagh u ut _ tamlag te luku _ 
ila a _ tepe ste luku _ , _ iingunagh an _ tepe sigate aat _ .
uglagh _ tepe luni _ tawani _ tepe ste luni _ tag il uni _ 
aw llaag ghhagh inagh ghllag u uq _ leg an _ 
nuna nge aik _ all a _ iqallug _ qayughllak _ kayu _ 
pekete ta meng qun _ imigh aqe aput _ kalngagagh t _ el ngaatall _ .
taana _ naa ng l uta _ .
megh mun wha _ pekete aqe nghite atgu _ iglegh tek ayug u uq _ 
Enkaam _ 
taagken _ 
siku _ pi magh mi _ elngaatall _ siku _ es tug w agh tu uq _ 
siku anun _ kaate aqe ukut _ aw av ani _ taakwani _ 
siku niigh lleg pigu uq llu _ enraq _ pedersen _ taana _ 
gaarinegh pig meng _ nagh ugh taq elghii _ , _ 
elngaatall _ N u r t h _ S t ar - ek s u wh aagh ul uku _ siku mun _ ateghaate luta _ s al ng ak _ 
ii-ii _ taw ate te f tuq _ .
amenqun _ nakreg leg ghllag u aqe lghiit _ angyaghpag t _ s al ng ag et _ q el pegh ll uki _ 
A ng yagh p ak _ tawaten _ asighte te luki _ , _ negh v ik lu _ ighllute luki _ qimagugh te aqe luta _

Taagken _ ii w en _ 
enkaam _ tume ngllagh luku _ , _ aghula i te aqe lghiikut _ tawani _ .
angyaghpag _ uka _ tagi luni _ .
pi ke sigh t _ legan _ nagun _ tapghagh kun _ akuqaghtugh luta _ uugte aqe ukut _ esgh aq aq aqa _

nukalpigagh ni _ elngaatall _ tengghu nagh _ elngaatall _ .

aygugh llegh ut _ 
U g w avek _ lliigh luta _ q aa y ng anun _ taakwna _ .
angyaghpag ut _ kanagh a _ .
saghya a _ ellng a tugh q w aag aa _ aw atagh p ak _ .
neghe llegh llu _ naghughte aqe lghii _ , _ salngag _ taglaate qugh luku _ elngaatall _ aw atagh p ak _ 
esghaghhu _ uk ill uku _ ak m ag ut ag nun _ ku u v luku _ aa y _ salngag _ qelpegh qugh ma ni luku _ uq aa _ maani _ usingigh negh meggni _ 
tespagani _ tawatete uq _ ke v ii s iit _

esghagh a _

aghvinleg _ L is h uu r n e- mun _ ll iigh um aan _ .

stanley _ taana _ qavngaq _ maaken _ un Ê¼ g a _ tengegkayug kun _ esghaqagh kaqe a _

kii _ seghlegh h al ek _ upugha te kaqe aanga _

ataasigh _ kaa ll uta _ awataghpag _ taw an tuq _ 
Wh ang ku ta _ pi unga _ .

aghqe itagh i te llegh _

enkaam _ angyaghpag t _ ukagun _ 
anuqe _ B r u w e r _ angka yagh ghngaan _ evlug ughte igate kanga _ L e av it t- mun _

enkaam _ saghya _ .

kaviigh _
