pamani _ taa wa _ sa u aqe ut _ â _ A ay ii q _ 
arekull _ igleghte te llegh m _ may- ughte ma aqe kangi _ s aa f teg pen anga _ 
tawatete ut _ laluramke t _ aq n igh q iil ghii _ 
aygugh negh meggni _ esgh a _ taana _ 
esgha _ tawatete ut _ 
enkaam _ tawani _ apeghiigh luta _ taw ani _ aleghqugh luki _ tagi luta _ enlegmete te _ pagavek _ 
tekeghagh meng _ taagken _ tugu tete luta _ yug meng _ aygugh ukut _ m aa ng n naq aa _ .
enkaam _ en taqun _ tagi kayug ni _ ilangani _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ angyaghpag mi _ s o o t h - ngu f tuq _ 
En taqun _ u kut _ y ugh aq ii ta _ qaake aqe yagh ainkut _ u kut _ 
enkaam _ y ugh an egh meng _ taagken _ kiyaghte luta _ pin iigh h n ii _ ay ap gh aat ag neng _ ig am si qay ug tuq _ , _ enraq _ tagite aqe ainkut _ pi ng ay aan nguq _ 
maaten _ , _ ellmi neng _ maavek _ tagite yagute ainkut _ .
maavek nguq _ aag lghii ni _ sivuqagh kun _ 
naqamalla nguq _ uughqa kun _ aag lghii ni _ taklaghrukegte uq _ akmavek _ â _ 
entaqun _ en taqun _ taklaghrukegte ma nghite a _ te f aa y ng w aaq elghii _ 
yupig m _ ugpegh llegh a _ 
N all uk aq aat _ apegh llegh a _ 
A ku z it k agh put _ 
En taqun _ taana _ s ameng _ 
Y ugh aq _ taawa _ taw ate te f tuq _ taa wa _ aag yu i aagh _ 
A tegh t i
qaamna _ sa u a _ aqnighqagh ii lghii _ pinighsagh na luku _ ang y alghiit _ 
tungsigh llegh a _ esgha _ taana _ â _ A ay ii q _ tan em _ â _ , _ atightu kangat _ aag kut _ 
sumeghtaghagh tke ghllag aqe kegka _ tegh i ku s amun _ 
taagken _ tungsigh luni _ wetku _ tawani _ taawa _ elngaatall _ si g ut ang an _ tun ut ng akun _ 
ayapegh aatagh luni _ qaamna _ aqnighnegh _ 
S iv uy ag teng an _ entaqun _ tun ut ang akun _ q e sigh l aat agh aa _ 
E s gha _ taana _ .
entaqun _ 
taawa _ yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ whaa _ piniighte na ai _ ayapghaatagh gneng _ 
tefaay _ ungip agh aneng _ en taqun _ qesigh aqe ainkut _ taawa _ .
qesigh luta _ taaqe aqe ut _ s al i qu qay ug ul aat agh tut _ 
S iv un el g ul ghiit _ ay v egh ugh tek ameng _ .
amen- nga _ entaqun _ taana _ siv un gh an nguq _ ay v egh ugh te kaa l ghii _ 
aag yu i aagh _ taana _ taawa _ maaten _ whaa _ kinku nun _ 
nallu kaqe aat _ q en w at _ 
akuzitekagh ut _ kaa ll aat an egh min i nguq _ part _ ay v el gh u te m _ q alghii ll ghii m _ qu ng ang an ill uni _ k ing un egh min un _ beginning _ 
entaqun _ whangkutestun _ sa meng _ 
I p ang u ut _ qamagte luni _ tawatete uq _ taawa _ ungip am s ug w et _ 
ateghte i _ 
kina lli _ ama _ 
tawaten _ sivuke laatagh aa _ taa kut _ kiyagh taa ll ghi t _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ T es tam en tet _ pi ng it _ angyat ghhagh ni _ aagkut _ taghneghagh ngunaki _ ava u na ki _ meghraag pigte luki _ 
sa mun _ teghig ke sagh mun _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenaki _ taghneghagh nge te yaghqaa gpenaki _ aga _ 
En kaa ng am _ y u pig ni _ whang ku ta _ qesigh uq _ sivuke luni _ angyaleg ita _ sigutanga n _ tunute nga kete te _ 
alla _ pi laatagh uq _ n ani _ 
sivuyagte yan _ sigute gkenka _ ayuq egk ang in ku t qun _ qesigh laatagh aa _ 
esgha _ .
A v eg tugh h agh mun _ 
K en l e tu llegh pig aag u kut _ tamaakut _ negh ke igh sag ghllag mi _ elngaatall _ sang w aa _ ug l aa pig llegh h ii _ 
S ang il nguq _ ungipaghagh neng _ entaqun _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ 
teghigsigh negh meggni _ entaqun _ seal- i qugh kayugu laatagh ut _ ayuq egk anga _ alignalghii u ut _ sang w aa _ 
sivunegh lgu lghiit _ ayvegh ughtekagh meng _ s al g et _ 
ayvegh nge yu ghllag t _ sivuqagh m _ ayvegh nge yu lleghtagh igh i _ alngunak _ ayvegh ughtekau lghii _ negh yaghq aanghi l nguq _ 
A g legh n aghn il uki _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ tagi aqe luni _ ag legh n aanghi tuq _ tagi aqe luni _ at i llgh a _ 
melqunge luni _ 
ima _ kaate laatagh nghmini nguq _ en taqun _ ayvegh lghute m _ qalghigh te lghii m _ sang w aa _ kingunegh minun _ p u v all ang ugh tek ayug u uq _ 
ategh teng _ atightugh aqe kangi _ , _ 
ipa u ut _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ayumigh _ .
laluramke nun _ a tugh aq aat _ tamaa na _ .
ayumigh m _ .
U z iv n iiq egk ang it lu _ t ap gh aat _ taakut _ aghv egh aq et akun _ ayumigh m _ .
sangiighhagh _ qamagte luni _ itake ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ ing l ung aneng _

ungipamsug te negh mta _ maaten _ nani _ ungipamsug te negh mta _ tawaten _ 
talwa _ esghapag snanigh ghllag luta _ ayuqe kanginkut qun _ , _ 
esghagh yugnagh ghllaget _ 
I l ang it a _ neghe uute naqe mi _ whaten _ aqelqagh leg ni _ 
kenletu lleghpigagh u ukut _ entaqun _ whangkuta _ ul im aa ghi s tun _ sa u a _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ 
sa ite ngughk _ enkaam _ ayumigh _ , _ 
neqe m _ ila a _ neghe snanigh luku _ ayuqe kanga _ ila a _ sa u a _ anglinghhagh nun _ tamaavek _ yug w et _ ila a _ aqsaleg nun _ aghnagh nun _ am el eng es t aghh agh meng _ 
liisimake luki _ entaqun _ sa lget _ tamaakut _ yupig t _ peghqinegh pigu lghiit _ q aw aag et _ 
talwa _ piitesighagh m _ ila a _ alngunak _ whaten _ 
agleghnagh ni luki _ pi aqe kangit _ unguv alghii s tun _ agleghnagh u nghite uq _ entaqun _ atigh llegh a _ taana _ 
puvalla t _ 
puvalla t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ it egh aan negh meg g ni _ kitum _ sa u a _ 
E s gh ap ag ng aagh meg tek i nguq _ tawaten _ , _ elngaatall _ wh aten _ katam _ ayuqe ut _ neq mun _ amalka _ pi luteng _ iwernga _ akugh leg t _ , _ 
sa u a _ tawaten _ el ngaatall _ liisimake kangat _ esgh a _ 
P u v all an nguq _ atugh aqe aat _ seghlegh i tut _ quy an agh ll aag u ut _ 
neqenghaghqe ghllag kayugu ut _ 
uzive na iqe kangit llu _ tapghagh at _ whaten _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ petug luki _ n angll eg s ii si t _ 
aghnagh t _ tugu luki _ en taqun _ paamken _ inglu aneng _ un ak egk agh t eng _ , _ 
A ng y aq _ legan _ tawaten _ , _ tun uq _ tam aana _ 
seghlegh _ sa u a nguq _ n ek egh qugh luki _ puvalla mi _ tawaten _ qerngughte te luteng _ , _

T an pegh meng _ 
ila ita _ q uk an gh ani _ puvalla it _ , _

kiiwhken _ kiwa _ .
qawaag m nguq _ amighqwaagh i _ taana _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ alngunak _ qawaag t _ taana _ iwhani _ esghaghkagh teng _ 
I q ug wa _ afta nghmegteki _ v egh ull ghii s tun _ kevigh luki _ pi kay ug w aat _ 
kinegh nghata _ kevigh luki _ unguva lghii stun _ legan _ 
nagun _ paamggun _ kaki te aqe ait _ qiipagh t _ s am avek _ 
pika nguq _ qawaag t _ nalug luteng _ tag l an egh meg g ni _ esghagh aqe ait _ taa wa _ 
esghapag ghngaaghmegteki nguq _ qawaag t _ en r aq _ yaqugh teng _ whaten _ ang ef q aghh aan _ tawaten _ neqe mun _ kanavek _ pi luteng _ aw al igh tugh taa kay ug w iit _ T es q ag eg kut _ en r aq _ aga _ tug ug pen ak i _ aw al in ghi s t eng _ 
A mal ka _ esghapagsagh ke nghmini _ elngaatall _ 
K i ngu l igh pig aq _ tamaakut _ seghlegh ite ut _ whang kun ni _ egh q waagh aq ng ameng _ .
eghte qugh u aagh _ 
eghte qugh u aaghet _ maakut _ angyagh m _ piinligh lleghqagh ani _ tugh negh aan nguq _ nangllegsiisigh t _ igh negh w aa qu t _ tungsigh ragh sigh t _ 
Taa w ang uq _ iq ug w aneng _ entaqun _ neqe _ sa u a _ unakegkagh eng _ 
angyagh _ piinligh yaghtugh nghaani _ ategh qugh luku _ W am ii y aq _ tunugh _ tamaa na _ 
aghveghaqetagh m _ neq ang it neng _ tes am an ll uki _ tawaten _ tu gu v ik egk ayug w ii _ alqimagh yukagh gpenaki _ , _ saafte yukagh gpenaki _ naten _ itake ghllag luki _ 
angyaleg m _ nuliigh ghhagh inagh n _ ell nga _ akuute yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ 
tanpegh meng _ ulig luki _ qavaghtekayugu ut _ .
A l ing ig as aq um eng _ en taqun _ angyaleg nkuk _ .
taaqe negh megteni _ sivuyagtekete te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuune i yaghtugh aqe uk _ ip a _ 
taawa _ eghqwaagh aqe ut _ p uy g un ghi l k egk a _ wh aa _ .
eghqwaagh yaghtugh negh meggni _ tuune i yaghtugh naqe na iqe ut _ igh negh w aaq n iiq egk ang it _ 
U y v as aghq a
U y v as aghq a _ amalka _ veghute lghii stun _ 
elngaatall _ tawani _ t ap e en i _ q ik m i meng _ 
taawa _ al ig n alghii m llu _ unaami _ aghte nghaani qun _ samavek _ esnagh mun _ enraq _ angyat teng _ kete luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ al ig n alghii kun _ 
taakut _ elngaatall _ eghqwaagh tkekagh teng _ taglagh negh meggni _ i wh an ing at _ taawa _

amalka _ .
kingulighpigagh _ qepghagh llegh _ nagate kaqe kegka _ pi v ak egh ll ak agh t eng _ eghqwaagh aqngameng _ q in u yug w et _ 
tawani _ sang w aa _ .

kii _

alingruugh ghllagkagh _ taana _ ellnga _ tuqu kau uq _ yug t aanghi l nguq _ 
entaqun _ q an ik at _ tuqute kaqe a _ yug w em _ 
alinge igate yagh kumeng _ entaqun _ k iy ang uq _ yuuk _ 
ugpegh ke ghllag m _ lii simak is te l igh luteng _ tawaten _ taawa _ ipa _ , _ n uy ek l igh tam eg g nun _ 
taana _ esgha _ puygu nghite kegka _ whaa _ uy gh ag llak _ 
pi nga yu neng _ tughneghagh t _ ighneghwaagh ke na iqe kangit _ 
uyvasaghqe a _ 
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ q an in aq elghii t _ 
taana _ amenqun _ , _ qikmigh meng _ pi lghiit _ pin i ghi pig es nagh luteng _ tamaa na _ um yug w aan eng _ tawaten _ ell meg g neng _ qamagte luni _ ategh a _ alngunak _ . _ 
amalka _ alignalghii m llu _ kina _ kayagte yagh kunigu _ qinuyug ta ii lghiit _ , _ tusigagh luni _ sangameng _ tawaten _ , _ alignalghii kun _ liigike naqe luku _ taana _ alignalghii m _ kayagte yagh kumiki _ 
taana _ qikmigh _ tape- mi _ ell meg g neng _ tuq utaq ut _ .
qikmigh t _ tamaakut _ malig ll uteng _ .
naavghusagh ke aqe ait _ il angi _ 
qikmigh u naanghite ut _ il angi _ tam aakut _ pivake ghllagkagh eng _ taakut _ negh q w aa ghi t _ uk iq luteng _ ke m g i m _ egte aqe ait _ , _ 
P in iigh taq ii nguq _ sa u a _ iglegh s ag utaq ut _

uglagh uq _ ategh _ 
qani _ 
tamaakut _ ama _ ii ngun aan _ qani na iqe kangit _ m aa ken _ 
A y ak it aa tet _ taana _ qani u uq _ n aten _ yugtagh u nghite ngughk _ yugte aq _ allakagh mete uq _ .
E s gh aghh u _ qanig ke aat _ , _ agh s aan _ elngaatall _ .
qinuyug negh meggni _ A y uq l i q _ sang an _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ qanig perewaagh _ ap all uq luku _ tuqute aqe ut _ 
N an ev g agh tam a _ taa m _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nanevgaghtagh meggnun _ .
taawa _ amenqun _ ne m _ pik egk angat _ uyghag ghllag _ taa m eng wh a _ ap all uq luku _ pim an ghi ta _ 
neghqute mun _ uyghag ke na iqe kangat _ am avek _ 
neghqute m nguq _ naken _ 
En taqun _ taglagh aqe ut _ qani naqe lghiit _ tamaakut _ M er eg ta _ kiyang _ 
pi aqe kangi _ qu l ang ani _ t a z i nga _ neng l ut _ ay um igh tan egh q es iigh et _ pinighi pigesnagh luteng _ qateghyiighagh m _ nagh ugh taq egk en ka _ .

ila i nguq _ legan _ kenuqagh aqe ut _ ll iiq at _ tuqute aqe ut _ ay um igh tan egh q es iigh em _ 
entaqun _ im ani _ maligte luteng _ 
entaqun llu nguq _ ila i _ pi aqe kangi _ uk avek _ tag is naq egk egk a _ .

M eng y all eq
esgha _ mangteghasqwaagh _ iingunagh an _ akmag ma kanga _ maaken _ 
ayag ke itagh te t _ sa it _ q er ngugh f ig llag mun _ naten _ angka an _ sang w aa _ imani _ .
esghaghhu _ atiiqe te yagh ghngaaghmeng _ Taa w avek _ aghsaan _ tawaten _ .
El ngaatall _ ayuqligh _ sangan _ ilughagh ke steggu _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
nanevgaghtagh ma _ , _ angayuqagh ma _ sa ke aat _ entaqun _ taana _ 
tanemwha qun _ t aghn ugh h al gh ut ni _ , _ pike kangat _ af l eng ak is tek luku _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ pi ma nghite a _ .
esghaghhu _ maaken _ amavek _ akmag kayugu ma lghiit _ 
L eg an _ piinlillegh a _ 
entaqun _ tazingani _ s an gh ata _ neghpigagh a _ meregta _ 
tegh vleghagh m _ qula ani _ tazinga _ nenglu t _ ef qugh h negh min igu _ esghagh aqe kenka _ tamaa _ naghughte aqe kenka _ k aa _ 
aghvegh m _ sang w aa _ pi naq l aat agh y alghii mi _ , _ t aghn ugh h aat _ esghaghhu _ .
tawaten _ uyghag stun _ t aghn ugh h al gh utegh llak _ lli aqe aat _ p aa y ngun aq s alghii mi _ en taqun _ entaqun _ 
kinkungaawa t _ imani _ s aaq _ 
esgha _ all a _ kenle aneng _ ukavek _ tagi ste naqe kegka _ , _ 
taawa _ tazingavek _ piiwagh luteng _ enraq _ qaye igh llegh nun _ taw ate sim alghiit _ 
qaye igh llegh t _ ama _ nenglullug llgagh u aqe ut _ tamaa _ , _ h eng _

uglagh lghii _ nenge a _ elngaatall _ m eng yagh naq ii si _ , _ 
mengyagh llegh _ 
esghaghhu _ repall _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii _ aam t ay aghh aq _ 
navek _ , _ qerngughte vig ghllag mun _ pi y alghii mi _ k an a _ sa u a _ qerngughte vig _ 
ayuqligh t _ S egh legh h al ek aa _ taawavek _ uksaagh mi _ puvalla yagh uute kayugu ma lghiit _ , _ 
elngaatall _ , _ yaywaali leg _ tamaa _ elngaatall _ tes qam ak en _ kezemaghhagh meng _ m ay ugh tuq _ 
El ngaatall _ iit q aq iin agh luni _ , _ am en qun _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ taana _ neng l ull uk _ 
ne ghllag m _ taghnughhagh lghute ni _ uugh qagh lluni _ taana _ taw an ii _ , _ tawavek _ tagi qu ghllag luki _ , _

puvalla _ kitum _ pi a _ taana _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ pi naqlaatagh yalghiimi _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ teghhwaaghigh te ut _ paye u naqe yalghiimi _ entaqun _ ken ghi q eng egk ayug ul ghiit _

entaqun _ paye aneng _ â _ mengyagh t _ esgha _ tawatete ma lghiit _ . _ 
I i _ seghleghhalek _ qenwat llu _ u ut qagh tuq _ .

kii _ , _ alla _ pi yalghiimi _ kana _

kii _ agh y uugh m ig aat _ pi yalghiimi _ qakma _ saaygu tgun _ elpeg kesagh ke yagh lghii mi _ .

sa uq _ .
atghagh uq _ aqeftapag m _ , _ paye anun _ t aghn ugh h aam _

tagi laghate te ghllag luteng _ taghnughhagh teng _ el ngaatall _ utegh tes tek atagh ll ak iit _ naate naagh aat _ .
U g w at mun _ P iin l ill eq
qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ , _ tag iit _ ii _ elpek si llu _ aragh tek _ m aaten _ pineghlliqe tek _ en taqun _ 
tawaten _ pi aqe naagh usi _ m aa v ek _ ll iigh yagh luteng _ elpek qun _ naa gpek _ taa m ag un _ ata gpek _ M er eg te kun _ , _ neng l ung iigh h aq _ 
T aam ak en _ anglikagh t _ ag lagh luteng _ s ak m avek _ sa u a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tawaten _ ineghneghlliqe ut _ 
wetku _ s ag negh ek _ pi yaghqaa na yu kata _ wh avek _ 
qineghte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ ii- u ke _ esgh aghh u _

elngaatall _ yug w i _ k in kut _ taa kut _ N ang u pag agh m ii ngun iiq egk ang it _ E s gh aghh u _ taa w avek _

elngaatall _ kinku k _ taake uk _ maalghug _ taaggun _ amig m _ qula akun _ 
E s gh aghh u _ maaten _ pi llegh tun _ ay u qu m aaq elghii t _ aneghziig aatagh nghmini _ legan _ , _ neng l ung iigh h aat _ 
iiwenllu _ estu laghate te naqe luni _ lliigh aqe uq _ .
pakreg ghpagte ghllag ma lghii _ k itu mi _ 
aanziigh ghllag yalghiimi _ sa yalghiimi _ taa wa _ mighyagh ghllag yalghiimi _ taghnughhagh m _ 
esgha _ sallghite ma lghii _ taghnughhagh _ , _ sa u a _ M er eg te m _ sa mi _ tughneghagh m _ aqsa ani _ ug w avek _

legan _ 
taakwa _ aghvigh qaghte vig t _ esghaghhu _ A y ak i m _ ungip am s ug w ani _ , _ 
aghsughalegh m _ taw an n iiq iit _ taawa _ 
N g iig tek ameng _ aat q ef tut _ kinku t _ taakut _ nangupagaghmii u na iqe kangit _ esghaghhu _ taawavek _ piiwagh kestagh u u ma lghiit _ .

taawa _ taakwagun _ tume tgun _ piiwagh lghii ni _

aghsughalegh _ taana _ kitugh lghii ni _ taakwegkut _ tume t _ taakwa _ el tu ugh aa _

taawavek _ esnevagh negh mni _ whanga _

ayvigtegh mi _ taawa _ elngaatall _ nenglu t _ sa u aat _ S iv ug nagh mi _

ngiigtekagh meng _

sivunegh neng _

megh mi _ aviigh tke aat _

taghnughhagh t llu _ salin _ akuzi yaaghte gpenateng _ atigh llegh it _ ila ita _

pi nga yu a _

puughhute m _ ungipagh aa _

ilughagh ghhagh a _ tagh tugh y alghii mi _ m ev lu ug tet _ nag at ii _ aatkagh kegte aq _ p iiq un nguq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ , _

alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ , _ kaa m g et lu _ taa kut _ av ii tut _ .

anengagh ghhagh a _ itegh luni _ ne mikun _

aqume luni _ igleghte uq _ .
inga _ sa u aat _ esghagh ai _ .
kaate luni _ sivuke luni _ unegh ii aghtekagh meng _ negh ughtagh u uq _ . _ 
taaqe luni _ afta vyiigh luki _ qinuyagute luki _ mingughhu te ghllag naqe yamiki _ taaqe ai _ 
I t gh ut aa _ leg an _ 
taghtugh yalghiimi _ akuzite ghllag t _ k an agh ll uku _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ nalqigangite uq _ elngaatall _ naqam _ q iin q ii s qell uku _ iqallug put _ 
nepiigh yata _ aghnagh aq _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ siv ug w agh s alghii mi _ 
mangteghagh t _ aliigh luki _ kaate ai _ n u ug tes tag ke t _ kaate luni _ 
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi a _ q uk aani _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ .
tekegh mneng _ ughluvegh a _ ayemtegkegka _ iv al um eng _ , _ 
N u v ag s uk agh pen aan _ naqam _ itegh luteng _ una _ 
amenam _ iitqiinagh luni _ tunugh _ kagimte a _ iv al uni _ 
aghnagh m _ pi a _ t ak el eng es t aghh aq _ .
amenam _ kelenga aghte yagh luni _ iigge ni _ alqimagh qiinagh aqe luki _ 
â _ pugnegh squghhagh _ , _ qukagh ghhagh ani _ s ung agh meng _ 
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ n uu v ut aa _ q ii p am i kun _ aatak _ .
kepsugh te u naanghite uq _ tuun aa _ legan _ itegh kuvek _ upugha lleqe aaten _ , _ â _ aagra nun _ ay ag y uni _ 
wataghllak _ avelghaqiinagh naagh aten _ , _ 
wata _ talwa _ qineghte yaqunang _ .
legan _ pugnegh n _ kanaghte luku _ utaqa i lghaaten _ .
amenam _ aghnaghagh m _ pugnegh llegagh ni _ aglagh te a _ K ii _ 
itghute a _ legan _ p iiq ii _ , _ â _ itegh sqe aat _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ am a _ 
Taw aten _ pugnegh ni _ kanaghte luku _ am a _ tuq l ugh aa _ enraq _ legan _ A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ q akun _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ 
qenwat _ tag i _ mamleg ghllag _ â
naqam _ iv g agh y alghii mi _ qama _ legan _ uglagh ghllag t _ 
maateqwaaqun _ whaa _ sagnegh kek _ nuugte ta gket _ n eg pen un _ 
Taa q s an _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ sagnegh an _ qukaa ni _ , _ 
tagi luni _ itegh uq _ aan eg ku v ek _ 
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ivalu meng _ s aam _ malig tegh ng aaten _ ang _ 
nuvagte yukagh gpenaan _ mekegragh yukagh gpenaan _ leg an _ iglegh llegh h aaten _ 
amenam _ tam aa _ aqume luni _ tallu luku _ ivalu ni _ 
E s ghagh luki _ piighhagh squghhagh _ tan- leg ngestagh ghhagh _ ne ke v gh alghiit _ 
aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tuune ak _ .
Agh tugh tuq _ ang _ .
tugu luku _ , _ nuuve te a _ qiipagh mikun _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ q im ag tuq _ 
aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ellnga nun _ s aam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ q e tegh qell uni _ taamani _ ayagyu ni _ 
legan _ alinge gpenang _ t ak lagh mi _ egtug yug gpenang _ .
aghnagh aq _ ivgagh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ taghtugh aat _ .
ama nguq _ pi aqe ut _ el ngaatall _ , _ kii _ sa u a _ ukavek _ kaate ma a _ elngaatall _ 
ama nguq _ aghnagh m _ pi aqe ai _ yug w et _ , _ kaa _ kaa _ ellng anun _ ama _ qavaa uq _ 
tawaten _ qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ ama _ tuqlugh aa _ .
aqume luten _ tea- ai _ pi teg taa t _ , _ 
aqume qaghte luni _ ivgagh yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ , _ kaa s an _ 
A y ng agh l ing aa w en _ enta _ taw ate t aghh aagh ng aan _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ im a _ .
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqellug qu _ 
wataghllak _ alinge gpenang _ 
legan _ aglagh ghhaaten _ 
siinge ghngaaten _ avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ igleghte lghaaten _ w allu _ y u wh aa wa _ 
aane yalghiimi _ tamaa _ kaynge ghllag u uq _ elngaatall _ :
esghagh luki _ tamaakut _ ila i _ nekevgha lghiit _ , _ elngaatall _ .
enraq _ aghnagh m _ alinge snanigh kanga _ , _ 
aghtugh uq _ nuqete nghmeng _ , _ 
alinge uq _ . _ uuvganeng _ 
legan _ kingu aneng _ uka _ .
araghaatagh magh mi _ kiyagh sim al uku _ , _ tekite nghmini _ akuz igh llag et _ 
Tam aani _ nekefqaghte luni _ anagniigh aqe lghii _ .
qemi meng _ es ghagh y alghii mi _ , _ araghaatagh ghllag ma lghii _ pag a _ 
T es pag av eg nguq _ esgh ap ag ii _ elngaatall _ .
uka nguq _ legan _ â _ S iv uy ag ta _ u ug y uq _ pana leg t _ ketanqusnaq _ ellnga nun _ uka _ 
uteghmun _ qiive nghmini _ uka _ kaynge ghllag m _ malighqagh aqe kanga _ at egh ll uku _ 
P iy aq min igu _ kaate luku _ pitegte aat _ 
uka _ tagi uq _ t aag gun _ aa tes f ig akun _ kaate yan _ tawatete ghngaan _ 
I g legh ll aat agh tuq _ ighsani ta ghhagh u te mineng _ 
tefaay _ naange uq _ , _ 
aliigh neghsigh sigh _ aatk ii _ 
aasa m _ ungipagh aa _ 
sa u a nguq _ taana _ aghnagh _ y ag es gu _ wallu _ y ag es gu _ .
legan _ aklu aghte gpenani _ whaa _ aanqute i yalghiimi _ y ag es gu _ 
A ap aa _ y ag es gu _ , _ aap aa _ y ag es gu _ ,
G h h ugh h ugh h ii y a _ . _ â
L eg an q un nguq _ al iigh l aat agh yaq min igu _ , _ aghv agh ll ug llak _ si q i negh ll ug llak _ .
L eg an _ aatk ii _ k i negh l aat agh ii _ 
Taw aten _ nepiigh uq _ akuz it egh llag et _ taa kut _ 
P im akanga _ kiyaghte ma luku _ , _ â _ akuzi ghllaget _ nagaqugh ai _ , _ 
tamaani _ esghaqu yalghiimi _ avangite uq _ i f k agh l i aat agh aa _ 
pagavek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ , _ uk ig l aat agh tuq _ paga _ t a z ing ag un _ 
tespagavek nguq _ esghapag ai _ elngaatall _ 
imani nguq _ m aat egh n ii neng _ pin igh atagh aq _ sivuyagta _ uugyuq _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ 
L eg an _ legan _ aat aqegk angi _ elqiigh ni _ aga _ 
piyaqminigu _ pinighhalek _ , _ 
tugu luku _ legan _ taaggun _ aate ste vig akun _ talligh mig ma kanga _ kaa ll aat agh tuq _ 
igleghte laatagh uq _ s u um q aat aqegk anga _ 
iiwen _ uyavaghqagh ughte uq _ , _ eslallugughte ghllag ma kanga _ , _ 
Y ag es g uu u u _ aatkagh i _ y ag es gu _ , _ whaa _ .
A ap aa y ag es gu _ taakwna _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ ,
G h h ugh h ugh h iy a _ . _ â
L eg an nguq _ al iigh agh ll aat agh yaq min igu _ si q i negh l uuk _ , _ m aaten _ siv ul igh meng _ 
El ngaatall _ k iin gh w aa ghii _ aatk ii _ wh aa _ leg an _ .
L eg an nguq _ pil aat agh tuq _ m er aa ghi n aq _ 
S iv uy ag tem nguq _ t aag w u m _ ang y all igh t en i _ aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ â _ 
legan _ aatkagh i _ kinegh laatagh ai _ at egh sim akanga _ 
tawaten _ pi llegh tun _ akuzite ghllag t _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ angyagh t _ .
pi ma kanga _ utaq al aat agh aa _ u uk n a _ uk il ghii _ qukaghte qugh a _ 
legan _ elqiigh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ uk ig tuq _ , _ 
uka _ ukig laatagh uq _ el ngaatall _ ukig laatagh uq _ 
tazingavek _ taku a _ m aaten _ 
piyaqminigu _ maateghniineng _ , _ â _ up- ke na nga _ qelmegh ghllag _ n em nun _ 
legan _ tugu nghminiki _ aate aqe kangi _ talligh mikun _ ag lagh tuq _ 
taawa _ igleghte laatagh uq _ ataa si q _ ne mineng _ uyavagh ghllag uq _ aa llgh ani _ 
E s l all ug ugh h nan iq aq _ , _ kiyaghte uq _ al iiq aq _ eslallug _ kaate laatagh uq _ 
A ll ameng _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ kaa t k aq _ 
A negh r eng igh llak _ el q iigh neng _ .
T ef aa y _ !
I iyagh h iin al ek
El q iil aam _ A p ell gha
Ung ip agh an i nguq _ im ani _ , _ m ek elghii gh h aan ku g nguq _ maaten _ sivuligh meng _ aagken _ elngaatall _ siqinegh _ 
elngaatall _ aan ig al nguq _ aatkagh i _ whaa _ legan _ .
Q u un pe nguq _ pi laatagh uq _ meraaghinagh _ naken _ m agh u yug lluni _ 
M agh u yug t aagh neng _ siv ug g negh min i _ ii y ani _ pi a _ aghul all uku _ taa wa _ angyalligh a _ kiiwyuq _ elpek llu _ elqiigh n _ 
Q u un p eng _ pike ta mikun _ taaggun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
S ang an _ naq am _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ uka _ ukig yalghiimi _ 
elngaatall _ utaqa laatagh aa _ uukna _ uki lghii _ , _ 
uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ m ek elghii gh h aq _ tekite yan _ tazingavek _ 
satuqagh _ qughalkutaghtuqagh _ elngaatall _ , _ 
M ek elghii gh h aam _ pim akanga _ maaten _ , _ legan _ tugu luku _ talligh mig laatagh aa _ aan naq an ka _ 
talligh mig luki _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aatk aghh ii _ aa ll uki _ aglagh yagh kuma _ esgha _ ne mnun _ .
legan _ taakut _ qerngagh ita _ tugumiiqe luki _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ U ku gh si _ aglagh uq _ q aa _ 
entaqun _ unuk _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ yug k waagh a _ aag llegh ani _ . _ kaa tuq _ 
eslallugughte na nigh ke aq _ ag ang uq _ quunpeng _ 
allameng _ eslallugughte gpenani _ ne minun _ kaate tke aq _ U ku gh si _ 
aneghrengi ghllag _ elqiigh neng _ ig uy aa nga _ 
tefaay _ ang yagh ll equ ten _ 
iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg _ 
U m iil eg llag mun _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ enkaam _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ â _ 
El p ek _ aghn al q waagh em _ aatk aan eng _ aate luku _ maghuyugte luni _ w en i nguq _ siv uy ag tek ell eq am ken _ 
L eg an _ sivugte nghmini _ iiyagh ni _ taana nguq _ 
quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _ 
sangan _ naqam _ iiyagh ni _ qelpeghte aqe agu _ .
alla nguq _ tawaten _ t a z i nga _ , _ um iil g em _ maalghug _ aghn agh ap er ug waagh meng _ aag llegh a _ .
Agh nagh ap er ug waagh meng _ upenghagh mi _ ke taq elghii _ ellnga llu _ 
qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ â _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ , _ enkaam _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ .
Taa wa _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ aatkagh ghhagh i _ aate luki _ me akun _ taaggun _ 
tawavek _ q aa k luku _ esnevagh ma lghii _ aghv eng y ii tegh llak _ yaywaalingiighhagh _ 
T aana _ weni nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ nenglu m _ 
siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut _ 
L eg an _ tawavek _ aghv eq saq min ig u nguq _ tuq un neq eg sagh luku _ ukughsi _ 
enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ um iil ek _ aghv eng agh tuq _ 
weniqruk nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg _ .
I i w en nguq _ aga _ unite aqe aat _ 
umiileg ghllag mun _ tawavek _ kaate ma lghii _ sang ul u ku mi _ taana _ y uk ll aat aam a z igu _ 
kaate luni nguq _ pi a _ wh aa _ megh mi _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ 
A v el gh aq iin agh luku _ leg an _ taawa _ pi a _ ang y aq _ .
elpek _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luten _ qalleg vag luten _ weni nguq _ sivuyagtekete lleqe amken _ nagh p agh si qay u wh aq _ qam ag gu tuq _ 
legan _ taana _ kelute mun _ pii q _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ .
taakwna _ angyagh _ tawaten _ qamagte a _ pil igu _ 
iwerngaqun _ iquklighpigagh at _ tazinga _ , _ umiileg m _ aag llegh a _ , _ panike lghii _ ellng an pi lleq aa _ 
M ek elghii gh h aq _ qep uugh y alghii m i nguq _ kete aqe lghii _ 
tawavek _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ .
Q ep uugh waagh luni _ legan _ angyagh naqe lghiiten _ aa ll uk ek _ 
taawa _ A - n uq - l i - ii _ , _ n a- ng e- ll u - gu - ng u _ ,
kete i aqe ut _ qaake luku _ u - k i - i - n ang e- ll u - gu - ng u _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ 
taana _ , _ y a- i - y a- i - y i - y a _ , _ 
S il am it _ uk in aghn ing it _ kaay _ p ay ugh a _ aghvegh m _ 
legan _ yaywaali ngiighhagh m _ uq - ugh - t aq _ . _ â
aawallu nguq _ taana _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ umiileg _ aghvenge aghte uq _ U qugh t aq _ 
ii _ leg an _ angyagh m _ qetgegh te ma kangi _ elngaatall _ pii k n ang uq _ 
A a y _ kaalguutagh t _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ legan _ m aaten _ anuqe _ atghaghsagh lghii mi _ 
Q at egh ll ug llag nguq _ aa _ aghv eng luteng _ sa u luku mi _ taana _ 
leganqun qun _ tuqu laghate naqe ukut _ whaa _ megh mi _ seghlegh mi _ p iiq aa _ , _ 
avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ q em all _ tugu laghate luni _ angyagh _ 
paagken _ tag l aam alghiit _ legan _ elngaatall _ .
I m pi si g al k anga _ taana _ maamtawha _ pi uq _ , _ av el gh aq um t aagh an _ im pi si g al k anga _ ima _ im pi qu um akanga _ .
naligh ita _ nagaqugh qagh laatagh luku _ neng y ugh h aa _ 
T aana _ aa _ p an in i _ ag a _ pi ligu _ .
Taa w ang uq _ aghv eng y u ghi gh llag tuq _ pi aqe kanga _ aghv eng y ii te p aagh r uk _ yuuk _ aa _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ av aq ut al igh luni _ .
Taa wa _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ atuqe lukek _ 
M e tegh ll ug llag en kuk _ tayeghqagh luni nguq _ 
I tegh yagh aam _ A nag ut agh mun _ N egh igh luku _ A p ell gha
Ung ip agh an i nguq _ im ani _ m e tegh ll ug w et _ , _ 
A n ip an kuk _ m e tegh ll ug w en kuk _ pin i qu te pig s alghii k _ , _ qu un p eng _ q er ng agh m e taq elghii k _ 
Taw aten _ kiyagh tegh ng aag m ek _ an ip am _ m e tegh ll uk _ pim akanga _ 
â _ A - aa _ ! _ â _ m e tegh ll ug llag em _ 
megh _ pateg ma kanga _ inglu aneng _ . _ â
A n ip agh r uk _ legan _ kaay _ 
I g aa si t aq _ ke t f aam ak ang ak _ amsanaghkwaagh lug ni _ naagu nguq _ 
qateghllug ghllag nguq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ aghvenge luteng _ taakut _ , _ 
A n ip agh llag nguq _ umiileg m _ taana _ umiileg _ r ep al nguq _ pi aqe a _ .
taana nguq _ pin igh s a pig ll uku _ qemall _ umiileg _ .
taawa _ taglagh ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ 
impite igate kanga _ tagh negh ani _ megh aagh h agh mi _ es ghagh yaq min igu _ im an i nguq _ avelghagh qumtaagh an _ impite igate kanga _ 
T aag ken nguq _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ ighsa nga kete te _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ 
taana _ uyuqligh _ panig ni _ aga _ H eng _ , _ 
taawa nguq _ A - aa _ taana _ , _ yuug _ ang gh umalghii _ 
mekelghiigh perewaagh meng _ avaqutagh ligh luni _ ig aa si tam un _ 
taawa _ naange uq _ , _ 
meteghllug ghllag nkuk _ anipaghllag nkuk _ 
Taa w ang uq _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ ug um iy ag ull uku _ ig aa si tam in eng _ anipa t _ qateg perewaagh u yagh lghiit _ .
anipa nkuk _ q al ghi gh r ug um agh mi _ piniqe te pigte yagh lghiik _ , _ quunpeng _ Q gh w aaq _ , _ 
tawaten _ im a _ anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ 
En kaa m nguq _ all am eng llu _ il aku n nan ii m af tun nguq _ .
I v is ang iigh h aq
anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ 
Ung ip agh an i nguq _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ .
N em i nguq _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ ang yagh u utaq elghii t _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ 
anipaghllag nguq _ tam aan te f tuq _ ne mi _ tam aani _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ igh negh il nguq _ 
meteghllug ghllag m nguq _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ elngaatall _ igaqragh ma kanga _ ataa si q _ 
taaqe luku _ yug w is ag aq elghii _ qayughllak _ 
N ul iin illu _ taghneghagh ni _ meghaagh ghhagh mi _ y uk l uk ek _ imani nguq _ pinigh uq _ 
K e taq elghii t _ ima _ anipa t _ .
anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ ag a _ heng _ u p leg utaq elghii t _ nun av ag meng _ el ngaatall _ , _ 
A y v egh all ghi t ang uq _ s ii p negh q waagh h iit neng _ s aghn aaq elghii t _ ellng it _ meteghllug _ 
anipa m _ silug _ neq eng ev legh agh aq elghii t _ nepte luku _ 
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ un ug t aagh ll an gh ani _ .
anipaghllag m nguq _ pi aqe a _ .
taawa nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ qaprag ghllag _ qalghigh kaqe magh mi _ nalughqutagh ghllag _ tamaani _ , _ 
qenwat llu nguq _ , _ ugumi yagute luku _ , _ meteghllug ghllag _ kuuve ghllag ma kanga _ .
aga nguq _ taw ate tegh ng aan _ tenge qagh uq _ tagh tuq agh s an _ , _ naq am ll u nguq _ tagh tugh s ug w ig al k anga _ , _ at ghagh tegh luteng _ ellng it lu nguq _ ke tut _ .
Taw at en nguq _ ima _ , _ tagneghtekau ut _ q an tagh an ll uku _ 
enkaam nguq _ allameng llu _ tag itu g ugh us k ang at ni _ q uta _ 
ivisa ngiighhagh _ 
T aag ken nguq _ ungipagh aa _ 
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ n as iigh luteng _ 
ne mi nguq _ tawani _ , _ neng aa k i teng ng aa _ angyaghugh te aqe lghiit _ q aa k i teng ng aa _ neqe ngllagh te aqe lghiit _ â _ 
taawa nguq _ yug w em _ ne mi _ tamaani _ yuug _ ataasigh _ 
taawa nguq _ nulighh a _ n ul igh h an _ panike luku _ ataasigh _ , _ 
angyaghugh te ghllag nghata nguq _ k el ut m un nguq _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ qu ut mun _ 
nuliigh ni llu _ u ug lluni _ , _ taw avek _ angyagh aqe lghii _ q aa s q am _ 
kete aqe lghiit _ pim akanga _ taghtugh qaghte nghaani _ â _ 
kingulighpigagh ghhagh u luteng _ kete luteng _ , _ aga _ angyagh t _ upleg te aqe lghiit _ nunavag meng _ elngaatall _ , _ uka nguq _ tagi laghate te nghata _ â _ taawa _ ellngit _ 
ayveghagh llghite a nguq _ siipneghkwaagh ghhagh itneng _ saghna aqe lghiit _ ellngit _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawaten _ neqenge vleghagh aqe lghiit _ . _ 
â _ uteghnigh aqe lghiit _ unugtagh u ghllag nghaani _ t a z ig n a _ 
pegnem nguq _ aghn aq _ ag lagh luni _ 
Taagken _ aghneghmi _ , _ â _ nani _ imani _ av ang i tuq _ aruugh yagh luteng _ esghagh luku _ taa wa _ . _ 
â _ S egh legh h agh meng _ atghaghtegh te ragkiighute yalghiimeng _ taana _ naq am _ kingulighpigagh ghhagh u laatagh ut _ . _ 
iwernga nguq _ tawatete ghngaan _ ag n iq s u ug tuq _ taghtugh qaghte yan _ â _ naqamllu nguq _ . _ â
Agh n am nguq _ amsanaghllugllak _ q ug w ak l aagh pen aan _ qutenge uq _ ang y am _ wiin _ nallangigh naqe aqe kangi _ m il u ut aa _ , _ angyagh t _ saamkut _ 
sa kan _ tawaten _ p ug legh luteng _ qute _ qantaghante sqellug qu _ 
I g legh sim al uk i nguq _ .
â _ N ul iin g _ , _ pi a _ , _ ang y am _ megh aagh h anun _ k an agh tagh t i nga _ yaavuqugh nghmeng _ uyuq _ 
yaavuquute ni _ qaake luki _ 
I wer ng ang uq _ at ang an _ nag aq ugh luku _ pim akanga _ , _ â _ A a _ , _ seghlegh h al ek _ nagaqugh aat _ taana _ 
sunanguq _ p iiq a _ aquutagh ni _ qiifte agu _ 
aghnagh m _ E s gh aghh u _ nulighh an _ qiive qaghte luku _ pi ma kanga _ pil ghii _ . _ sa u luku _ 
avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ K an agh t igu _ pi luteng _ â
nulighh a nguq _ uugte luni _ ang y am _ tawavek _ .
T aag ken aa _ pi ma kanga _ im an i nguq _ megh m ell uni _ paaghqite uq _ en r aq _ .
uugte naqe yaghtugh ngugh _ angyagh mun _ , _ n ul iin g _ pi laatagh aa _ y aa v u qu u te ten _ taa kut _ whaante unga _ . _ whaante unga _ A v el gh aq iin agh lu ku nguq _ aghn agh aam _ qaghi ite ghllag _ .
taakwavek nguq _ , _ â _ ivagh i ragkiighute ut _ , _ 
A v el gh aq iin agh yagh luku _ whaante unga _ agh y uugh l aat agh aa _ .
A g a _ aatak _ meghhagh _ tazigna _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ taana _ iv is ang iigh h aq _ 
aga nguq _ aghnagh _ aglagh luni _ s uq s ugh h al eg nguq _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ avangite uq _ pi y alghii meng _ s uk er ak es tagh aq ef tut _ taawa _ 
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ n angll agh qell uni _ , _ sa ite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ iwerngaqun _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taawa _ u p um y egh aam agh meng _ , _

ila meng _ sivuqagh mii t _ taghnughhaghqagh it _ ke v iigh aq eg ke k _ .

mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ 
aghnaghagh ghllag m _ ategh a _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag _ ugi igh yaghqagh stun _ angka lugh u ikagh _ .
ungazigh mun _ kaate luteng _ maalghug gneng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ 
K am ek _ taa qu m akanga _ taghnughhagh k _ tuune yaghtugh ma kegket _ quyngigh leg nun _ tu mang ani _ 
kaate yameng _ il ang ani _ esghagh ma kangit _ quyilleg ghllag t _ 
aapte ma kangi _ quyilleg m _ aq ef tagh agh mun _ k an agh ll uku _ sangafsi _ tagi stek _ 
akite ma kangat _ ungazighmii t _ tug ul uki _ ug ke meng _ whangkuta _ tagi ukut _ .
quyilleg _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ tem ng i _ q av agh aq elghii _ naqam _ 
pi ma kanga _ naa v en gh ata _ all aneng _ itupilqun _ ighnegh ka _ 
llaaghanwha _ tuune aqe aat _ kaa sim alghii _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ p aagh q il ngugh qun _ 
M eng tegh aq _ tuune nghite aat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ mang tag meng _ 
uteghte ma lghii _ ungazigh mun _ sagh um ig negh em _ 
U k am ang aan _ ugiigh uq _ quyilleg mun _ aghn agh r u ku t aagh llak _ m at aq el t aghh aq _ 
ugi a _ yuukegte pigte lghii _ ama _ sukate pigte lghii _ ama _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ 
P im akanga _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ ama _ sungaghate pigte lghii _ K aku m i y _ 
U k am ang ate m _ meghtagh aqe lghii _ ama _ ukini aqe lghii _ Q uy ill eg neng _ 
meghtagh naqe nghmini _ ugke meng _ qugtuqagh gni _ kevigh igh aqe kek _ N aku m ii ngu z i n _ 
kiiw gnun _ kaate nghmini _ tamaghhagh an _ aghneq _ 
tawatestaghhiinaq _ S aq um a z i n _ 
ilangani _ kameg ngllaghtagh ma lghii _ ak i kum aat nga _ 
uglagh pigte lghii _ kameg lghute _ ulima ma kanga _ 
taaqegkagh ni _ ugke meng _ imigh aqe luku _ .
kameg _ taaqe ma kanga _ yuginagh _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ metngegh ma lghii _ 
kameg lghute _ akmag luku _ el q un gh ek _ kanaghte luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ tug un ak eg ken _ 
igatagh nghmini _ kameg t _ tugu luki _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ nuna mi _ temngi _ qavagh aqe lghii _ aghn agh r u ku t aagh en kuk _ 
kameg i _ taa q lu tek _ alla neng _ kameg aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh ghllag kun _ .
mengteghagh _ neqetu pigte lghii _ , _ mangtag meng _ ayvegh meng _ neghsagh meng _ ama _ quyngigh meng _ ! _ 
amig m _ saaghw ani _ 
Q ay wa _ naa s q wa _ itegh ma lghii _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ w an leg i _ nag aq u um ang i sim alghii _ 
uvite _ naa s q uk ek _ tug ul uk ek _ qategh pigte lghii _ qugintagh pigte lghii _ al i ngu m aaq elghii _ 
pi ma kanga _ utaq iil uni _ ll iigh tuq _ .
Agh ul iigh tuq _ akite ma kanga _ .
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ aleghqugh uq _ q uk aan un _ ll iigh aq uq _ aghn agh r u ku t aagh llak _ tagh tu umalghii _ .
T agh tugh luni _ sivuqagh mii u unga _ , _ â _ 
Agh nagh r u ku taa q _ sa qu ma ziin _ .
P im akanga _ ungazighmii t _ akike ma aatnga _ quyilleg nun _ I g atagh tu nga _ !
T u un i nga _ negh lta _ yug em _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkumta _ ingaghte uute lghaakut _ 
whanga _ qavagh neghtu ghllag unga _ .
unaami _ taa q luni _ aan umalghii _ 
taake te a _ ayvegh m _ n at mun _ akite ma _ asi ani _ 
taghtugh naagh unga _ un ang umalghii _ negh s ameng _ 
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiik _ mangtag meng _ â _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh nkuk _ negh el ta _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ an ag un ghi l ku v nga _ taghtugh ma lghii _ ! _ â
taghsagh ma kanga _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh _ .
nagaqugh mangite ma lghii _ un ang ul uku _ 
qaywa _ el q un gh ek _ keveg te ma aqe yagh kanga _ aghulate ma kanga _

qenwat _ utaqa i luni _ lliigh uq _ .
aghuliigh uq _ taghsagh i nghmeng _ neng l aam agh mi _

aghnagh ghrukutaagh _ aqume ma lghii _ kay ng e ngu unga _ 
pi ma kanga _ aghul aq umalghii _ U k am ang aan _ Ung a z i mun _ igatagh unga _ 
tuune nga _ taagken _ yug m _ negh ka aneng _ .
I g legh sim al uku _ tuune ma kanga _ esgh aam akanga _ 
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ negh ma lghii _ â _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aane ma lghii _ tug ul agh luki _

tagi yalghiimi _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghul iigh tuq _ .
unaami _ anagu nakevnga _ taawanginaq _ 
iiwen _ anagu nghite kuvnga _ neghe lleqe amken _ 
neqagh lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ lii s uq aat _ 
unaami _ pim akanga _ taghtugh ma lghii _ â _ T ag i pig es nagh tu ten _

anag ma kanga _ negh tuq _ qevuute luku _ .

tawaten _ tawaten _ tawaten _

aapte ma kanga _ .

naa an _ ata a _ pi ma kanga _ agh im ak angi _ .
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ iit gh umalghii _ .

ata a _ ugpegh uq _ panig mineng _ .

taawa _ nengigh uute ma kangit _ taawanginaq _ â _ 
tefaay _ negh s aq _

aane luni _ am si k agh tuq _ .

taagken _ apeghiigh yami _ itegh ma lghii _ s aag ll uku _

ama _ ugkelli ma lghii _ agh ip ate f tu k _

taagken _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i ma lghii _ ug ii ghi g a tu nga _

kaate luni _ w an leg i _ itegh ma lghii _ q iit gh um akanga _ 
itegh yalghiimi _ unange ma lghii _ q av aa sim alghiit _

aghnagh m _ neghsagh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ , _ aghul aq umalghii _ itegh ma lghii _ .

yug m _ pi ma kanga _ .
awituwaq _ yug neng _ alla neng _ ugiigh aqe uten _ En taqun _ kiyagh negh em _

taawanginaq _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh lukek _ U k ii v ag mun _ itegh unga _ .

unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
taghtugh luteng _ yuug _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghii _ nun a _ 
kingu aneng _ aghnagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ neq aat a _

taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .

L l aagh an wh a _ qaywa _ tughneghaan- nghite ziin _ s aag simak angi _ .

I ng agh qu ull u tek _ yeqay _ entaqun _ 
yug m _ akite a _ tagh tugh y am ek _ , _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ ug ing an _ pim akanga _ , _ â _

tuqu nghmeng _ aghtugh unga _ uk ig sim akanga _

llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ amsikaghte uq _ , _

taagken _ neqe meng _ 
apeghiigh luni _ avegtughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
negh ma lghiik _ u v it ang aneng _

llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ 
taagken _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ qu u p agh llag kun _

unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yamek _ it gh u sim akanga _ aghnagh _ 
aghvenge lunga _ tagi lleqe unga _ m aam umalghii _ .

ategh luni _ qaya ni _ kiyagh sim alghii _ .
ukigllug qu _ il ang ani _ aqume ma lghii _ qaya minun _ .

ugke t _ ugute yaki _ . _ â

aghvegh _ ii- u na ghllag an _ nategh mun _ itghute ma kanga _

taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ m ing l e mun _

mulunghituq _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge laatagh uq _ . _ ighni yalghiimi _ 
taawa _ En ta _ k al ng ag g aa k _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .

yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ p iigh h angll aam alghii _ .

taaqe luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ pim akanga _ , _ amen _ nuna mnun _ aglagh naanghite unga _ negh el ta _

ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ n ul ii ni _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ , _ â _ 
akite ma kanga _ m ek elghii gh h aq _ taana _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma _ sa lunga _ 
A m a _ whanga mni _ , _ U k ii v ag mi _ s aam a _ 
En ek ii tek _ enta _ , _ kumlu gpetun _ angka lghiik _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ .
apeghiigh yakek _ m eng tegh aq _ ugi minun _ kelgute ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ tugu ma kek _ , _ 
tugu lukek _ awergha m _ , _ melqugh aneng _ imigh ma kek _ un aa mi _ 
imigh nghmeng _ taaqe yamikek _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ esgh aghn aagh tu ten _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ piighhagh ngllagh ma lghii _ 
taaqe yami _ ugi minun _ kelgute laatagh aa _ p an i ku ll ghii tek _ 
ugi an _ piigh ghhagh kun _ q el pegh te ku f si gu _ maalghug _ petug ma kek _ ama _ aghnagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ pi ma kanga _ si g negh ek _ mang tag meng _ whagun _ nategh m _ qukaa nun _ 
enan _ quy ng i meng _ mengteghagh llu _ maligte te naagh uq _ .
taagken _ nategh m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ .
awite yagh kete ni _ paye ghllag k _ aliigh ma lghiik _ .
qaame na nga _ nighugh pigte lghii _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ 
llaaghanwha _ negh ma lghiik _ p ay ek _ 
negh te kete luku _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ 
whanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ 
ama _ ungipaate naqe amken _ es ghagh yaq es eng _ ukiivag mi _ saama _ 
enekiitek _ tun ut ang it nun _ i f kaa m alghii _ esghagh lleqe aten _ 
Agh nak p an i ku ll ghii k _ , _ q ii v lu tek ag l aam alghii k _ 
enan _ mengteghagh _ .
iiwen _ aghn am _ aapte naagh aaten _ m aal gh ug negh et _ avelghaqiinagh naken _ .
sagiqe gkan _ pi naken _ quy ng i meng _ im ii m ak ek _ enan _ unaami _ ungipaate nagh amken _ .
iiwen _ nategh anun _ kaate kuvek _ uteghmun _ esghagh naagh uten _ En ta _ 
mengteghagh _ esghagh lleqe an _ , _ 
esghagh kuvgu _ piighhe aq _ .
aglagh kuftek _ mengteghagh _ qelpeghtekufsigu _ ag l aam alghii _ itegh kuftek _ 
tugu kufki _ ila kek _ signegh k _ 
ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
A tugh aq ef tut _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh u lleqe agken _ 
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh at _ neghe lleqe ait _ q all eg nan igh waagh u sim alghiit _ 
taawa _ qamagte unga _ esgh ap ag umalghii _ 
U g in i _ es ghagh yaq en ni _ qu ul q i te m _ 
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ paye k _ suupe yagh ke gni _ anglu igh aatagh ma lghiik _ tuun um ak ek _ 
taakwagun _ A n g _ , _ u kuk _ 
nuna mun _ tuute ma lghiik _ si g negh eg neng _ 
tuute yamek _ kalngag _ tuun um ak ek _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ 
mengteghagh _ tunutagh nge i te nun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
N ul igh h an _ si g negh ek _ tug um ak ek _ .
kaate lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ tam aghh aan un _ 
itegh lutek _ aghnagh m _ signegh t _ .
tugu luki _ ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ imigh ma kek _ im aq elghii k _ ila kek _ 
apeghiigh yamikek _ ug im in un _ pi ma kanga _ .
ugi ka _ payugte naqe aqa _ â _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ naa sigh q ek _ . _ 
panig an _ angegh ma kanga _ si g negh ek _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ 
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ si g negh ek _ 
taawa _ s ugh uk anun _ ama _ yugtu ghllagu uq _ .
atugh aqe ut _ aghula magh meng _ im aa _ 
aghnagh _ aagra mun _ nuug yan _ .
taagken _ tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ quulqite m _ 
aghnagh m _ ugi minun _ signegh k _ quyngigh meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tuune ma kek _ â _ 
N ul ii ni _ ang _ in eq s un all egh pig aa _ ukuk _ naasiigh kek _ 
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh gneng _ ataasigh _ avegtugh aq _ negh ma kanga _ p an ik nak ang aten _

tanemwha _ ugi minun _ qu ul q i te m _ q aa y ng aneng _ 
pi laatagh aa _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ 
avegtugh aq _ ataasigh _ neghe a _ aan umalghii _

nulighh an _ sughukagh nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ 
tanemwha _ signegh m _ imagh a _ 
signegh t _ imaa igh te yata _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ , _ 
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ , _ 
taagken _ ugi an _ yug lghute _ tamana _ pi ma kanga _ nak en _ pi z i n _ ? _ â
nuliigh ni _ aag llegh a _ ineqsunagh lleghpigagh a _ tugu ma kanga _ â
pi ma kanga _ aghn am _ qay u ut aq _ elpek _ ug in i _ enngaatall _ panike nakangaten _ 
U g i nga _ ayagaghte ma kanga _ quy ng i meng _ 
aghnagh _ quulqite meng _ asitmun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ n ut agh aa s t aghh iin agh meng _ 
pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ ing agh qu ll uteng _ 
aane yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh uq _ ug in i _ pim akanga _ , _ â _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ â
ila a llu _ nuliigh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi laatagh aa _ n ul igh qu ll ghii k _ aan legh aa sim alghii k _ uyuq _ 
yug m _ siinge ma kanga _ quulqite m _ qaye aneng _ 
ifkaghte laatagh aa _ u ug s alghii m ek _ 
aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ â _ 
yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ enkaam _ 
nutaghagh _ mengteghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .

itegh yalghiimi _ nuliigh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ pim akanga _

yug m _ akite ma kanga _ .
yug m _ aapte a _ .
Taagken _ unaami _ ungipaate naagh amken _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh luku _ ugi ni _ neqlightugh ma kanga _ tuq l ugh tegh um akanga _ 
ugi a _ negh ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ ataa si k agh taa n _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nulighh a _ alla igh i ma lghii _ 
allighagh igh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ yug em _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ pi ll ug aghn an igh aa _ 
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ nulighh an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ 
enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ 
aanleghaate lutek _ 
qaye anun _ uugte yalghiimek _ aghn agh aghh aq lu _ esghagh ma kangat _ n ay aku t alghii k _ saaghw ani _ 
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ T ay ke ng aa w en _ , _ taawa _ ungipaate naqe amken _ T ay k eg er g en _ maye t _ 
ugi an _ angegh ma kanga _ N u ut qam i _ 
llaaghanwha _ angegh qugh ait _ mengteghagh mun _ .
awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ amigh _ ila ke te nghite ngughk _ 
M aaten _ angaghqugh aat _ unug llegh m _ kenlanga nun _ .
apeghiigh yameng _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ 
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ angegh ma lghii _ pim aqegk anga _ 
taagken _ n ul igh h an _ neq meng _

taagken _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ 
unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ m ek elghii gh h aq _ yug m _ nunalgute ni _ qamagte luku _ N aten _ pi yaq um a _ 
taagken _ uyegte ma kanga _ amigh meng _ .
qamagte ma kanga _ mengteghagh _ tamaghhagh an _ 
taagken _ kenlanga _ yug m _ 
yuug _ negh q waagh h aq _ tug ut ku v in gh aghh aq _ ama _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ t ap gh aghh agh meng _ 
yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ 
iimnanguq _ a si ng anun _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ .
nayag an _ ategh a _ y at aagh qu m alghii _ .
nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ , _ â _ 
nunalgutetuqagh t _ ama _

katamqun _ umiileg at _ neqe leg _ 
taagken _ umiileg m _ nuliigh ni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nulighh an _ neqe meng _ aglagh te ma kek _ el q waagh meng _ 
llaaghanwha _ negh kayugu ma lghiik _ igatiqe mangite ma lghiik _ .
nuna lgu ta it _ a si ng ani _ si k l aam alghii _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ 
mekelghiigh _ s aghn aam al uku _ itghute ma lghii _ tag im alghii _ 
taagken _ savighhe ma kanga _ .
K aa lluni _ taaqe ma kanga _ tuq lu um akanga _ 
taaqe yamigu _ neghqwaagh ghhagh _ , _ ulima ma kanga _ El pen un _ s um egh tagh an ghi tu ng an ul igh q es qell unga _ 
taaqe ma kanga _ aghul aq i _ 
taagken _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ ivagh i ma lghii _ .
naalkute yami _ q ate l ghii ngu f tuq _ iqug akun _ 
enkaam _ asi anun _ il anga _ petug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ k av il ngu uk _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ 
nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ tuq lu um akanga _ , _ qiiptaasigh meng _ taaqe te unga _ , _ 
qiiptagh yagh naqe unga _ ak i sim akanga _ 
aghulaqe gkuma _ elpek _ siklagh yagh naagh uten _ mengteghagh m _ 
taagken _ yuuk _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ 
sigugnegh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ anglaagh _ ukite naqe ma kanga _ .
ukite yamigu _ qiiptaasigh ni _ ateghte luku _ qiiptagh ma lghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
nayag a _ tuq lu um akanga _ aane ma lghii _ â _ 
alungutellegh m _ asi ani _ siklagh ma lghii _ .

taagken _ tuq lu um akanga _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ T ay kun g _ 
ratamiiragh kek _ qategh lghiik _ neng l aam alghii _ 
kaate luni _ pim akanga _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ â _ N eng lii s q en ghi tam ken _ ip a pi k _ pii m ken _ . _ â

enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ug iigh n aanghi tu nga _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ . _

llaaghanwha _ i ghi v g aghh aq _ esghagh ma kanga _ . _ 
esghagh luku _ iqlighte ma lghii _ m ak l ak _ 
allameng _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ â _ U m iil eg put _ neq meng _ ag l aat igu _ , _ el q waagh meng _ ugi ke yukagh nghite zinga _ . _ â

llaaghanwha _ kay aal q ii r agh yagh tut _ ellngit nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ a tu ng ag meng _ pi ma kanga _ tem k ag meng _ t ap ghagh meng _ ugi ka _ 
yug m _ kameg ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kanga _ nal ugh q ut agh aq uq _

taagken _ esnagh mun _

llaaghanwha _ maklag meng _ neghsagh meng _ taglagh qu uute ma lghiik _ mengteghagh megtenun _ ? _ 
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ â _ 
N an ev g agh ll ak pim alghii _ lli te i yalghiimi _ enngaatall _ En ta _ apegh tugh l ak en _ 
teghig ke te yameng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aghtugh nanigh ma lghii _ ing l uk l igh h agh p esi _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ tagi luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ â
N an ev g agh llag em _ kayaalqe i i ragh yagh ut _ tagi lleqe ut _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ â _ 
tagi lleqe ut _ atungag meng _ s ag uy ak nan ev g amun _ temkag meng _ .
ellngit a _ aghula stekaqe aat _ .
aghula nghmini _ taawanginaq _ ilagaate inagh kun _ nalughqutagh aqe uq _ N ag u _ 
kayaalqe gkumikut _ wh avek _ wayagh lleqe ainkut _ 
taagken _ yuug _ mengteghagh minun _ 
enngaatall _ nan ev g am _ nagaqugh luni _ qevuute luni _ alinge ma lghii _ 
unug yagu _ ilag aa sim akanga _ aane ma lghii _ â _ 
aane luni _ uughqa nun _ esghagh yagh ma lghii _ tu y eg ni _ 
agepsughtu aaghet _ esghagh ma kangi _ q et g eq aam agh mi _ 
taku ma kangi _ , _

itegh ma lghii _ T ay k eg er g en _

U naa mi _ pi ma kanga _ n ay ag an _ aq f aam akanga _ sa qu ziin _ 
Q i negh lluni _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ N ag u _ tagi nga _ ? _ â
T ay k eg er g em _ ak i sim akanga _ , _ enta _ apeghtugh laken _ ! _ 
taawanginaq _ aapte naqe amken _ , _ â _ Wh ang kun nun _ naten _ pi yaghqau a _ 
U g ik a _ taawanginaq _ . _ nalughqutagh yaghqaa uq _ 
nanevgagh ghllag m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ ag l aam alghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ iit gh umalghii _ .
nanevgagh m _ tugu ma kek _ q im ug si l gh un _ 
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ it gh uu simak ang it _ .
tea- ai _ whavek _ ilag aam alghiit _ 
ilagagh te naqe amken _ aq el q iit _ ilag aam alghiit _ 
teghla ghllag _ nanevgagh m _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ tam aani _ 
T ay k eg er g en _ ilagagh te ma kanga _ .
teghla ghllag m _ yaqugh gni _ , _ tuye gni _ En ta _ s ag uy ak _ 
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ â
L l aagh an wh a _ s ag uy ak _ tuun um ak eg ke t _ taawa _ 
aglagh ghhaaten _ k all ag sim alghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ p uy g um akanga _ aglagh ma lghii _ 
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ â _ qavaa ma lghii _ , _ 
unaami _ ? _ nayag an _ 
qineghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ .
L ii simak ef t aa _ akite ma kanga _ â _ A y ang iy aa _ whaante unga _ y ang iy anga _ , _ 
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ A a _ aglagh a qaa _ taa wa _ 
ugi ka _ aghul as tek aghq aqa _ tegh l a _ ? _ 
llaaghanwha _ T ay k eg er g em _ pilugug luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ , _ 
mulunghituq _ inglu aneng _ qimugsigh lghute _ .
taagken _ tukugh ita _ itghute te ma kangit _ q alghii m alghii _

taaqe yata _ aqelqagh it _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ ! _ 
llaaghanwha _ T ay k eg er g en _ pin i tun _ nalughqutagh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ aqelqagh t _ kayaalqe i i ma lghiit _ 
Q am ag tuq _ ugumi yug ma lghii _ 
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ 
whanga llu _ 
llaaghanwha _ saguyagh k _ tuune ma kegket _ t all im at _ 
M aal gh uk _ kallagte ma lghii _ iil aam alghii k _ 
ilagaate ni _ puygu ma kanga _ aghul aq luni _ 
pi ma lghii _ qay agh tu luni _ i f l aam alghii _ uuk _ 
A min aq umalghii _ ataa si q _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ 
nayag an _ aanqute ma kanga _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ 
liisimake a _ taa q luku _ am ii r igh pen aan _ ayag nge i yu a _ it egh luni _ year- nge i yanga _ .
Q av agh luni _ pi ma lghii _ n ut aan _ n igh u ug tagh agh aq ef t aa _ aa _ 
nagu _ aghula stekaghqagh ka _ teghla _ 
teghla ghllag _ tagh tu umalghii _ kaagkagh akun _ 
T agh tugh y an _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ â _ ayag nge i yu a _ am ii r iq aghh u _ ! _ â
aga _ tuye gni _ qay aa _ ay em qugh taa m akanga _ 
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ 
nanevgagh at _ aragh te ma lghiit _ .
A t ang an _ n at mun _ kayaalqe i i uq _ , _ qay ugh ll a g _ 
taagken _ ellng in aghh agh mi _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghii _ 
qamagte uq _ il ang ani _ 
tefaay _ taa q luku _ 
A m ii r i negh meng _ 
iimnanguq _ ang waagh umalghii _ yug t _ 
maalghug _ mughute lutek _ tag itu g ugh tegh llag um akanga _ .
ila a _ nunivag mun _ aghulaqe luni _ 
ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ .
aminaqe ma lghii _ ataasigh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ al igh um akanga _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh gpenaan _ qavaghni yami _ itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ megh mun _ 
qavagh luni _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ nutaan _ tuq l um akanga _ , _ 
ata ni _ ak it agh sim ang i sim akanga _ .
ata a _ taghtugh ma lghii _ , _ 
taghtugh yan _ pi ma kanga _ aghul as aq eg ni _ ev l ug ugh sim akanga _ qaya ghhagh ka _ 
ata an _ yaghlegi _ qayugh a _ ayemqe ughtagh ma kanga _ ag l aam alghii _ 
K aa lluni _ qaya ni _ .
U ug s an _ yug r u ku t aagh llag em _ pim akanga _ 
ata an _ natmun _ pi sqe igate kanga _ ! _ â
Yug g aam _ ak i sim akanga _ lliigh lghii _ â _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ allameng _ unug yagu _ â _ En ta _ 
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh aa _ 
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luku _ a ta mi _ 
kete luni _ angwaagh ma lghii _ iv am akanga _ 
iiwenllu _ N ag u _ tagitug ughte ghllag ma kanga _ ? _ 
kete mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ yug r u ku t aagh llag em _ 
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ pim alghii _ , _ 
tagitug ite yagh kete ni _ pennagh ghllag _ .
pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ighu gni _ kulngaghllug kek _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ Wh aan tu nga _ . _ â
yuggagh m _ akite aghte mangite ma kanga _ pim akanga _ 
yug ghrug qu ta ghllag m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighu gni _ aghulate yagh ke gni _ evlug ughte ma kanga _ iit gh umalghii _ 
enkaam _ yuggagh _ alinge luni _ yugrukutaagh ghllag meng _ aglagh ma lghii _ te ngu put _ 
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ â _ 
uugte yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ at gh aam alghii _ 
E ll nga _ yeqay _ negh sagh tek alghii _ .
yuggagh m _ akite ma kanga _ igh negh ii _ n us ug um ak angi _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ q al igh h aag ni _ aa ll uk ek _ enta _ quneghten _ t af sim alghii _ .
yuggagh _ quneghte ma lghii _ igh negh aghh ii _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tag l aam alghii _ .
T ag lagh y an _ yuggagh m _ pim akanga _ , _ 
Yug g aq _ nagu _ .
yuggagh _ aqsa anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ 
uugte luni _ tukagh ma lghii _ n us ug um akanga _ 
yuggagh _ pi ma lghii _ aq s anga _ s eg g um akanga _ naqam _ 
yuggagh _ ukig ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ ukig aqe uq _ il ung anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ lii g i ku mang i sim akanga _ .
yuggagh m _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ pi ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ quneghte ma lghii _ pim akanga _ 
quneghte yan _ yuggagh _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kameg anun _ itegh ma lghii _ te ngu put _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ n ev egh ten _ !
â _ pi ma kanga _ yug r u ku t aagh llak _ wiintaku _ qaya ghhagh ka _ 
taagken _ yug g aam _ qaya ghhagh minun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
ellnga _ tumangani _ s eg g um akanga _ .
neghsaghtagh mi _ tengug i _ ighneghagh i _ nusug ma kangi _ 
nusug luki _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ 
tafsi luni _ neghsagh m _ ighneghagh ghhagh i _ qumig ma kangi _ yug r u ku t aagh llak _ 
qumig luki _ taglagh ma lghii _ ev l ug ugh sim ang i sim akanga _ 
taglagh yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ .
yuggagh _ ag lagh luni _ w ata _ 
S uk all uni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ tam l ag umalghii _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ yuggagh m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ ag l aam alghii _ 
tengug i _ aliighte ma kangi _ nan igh h aq _ 
yuggagh m _ atkug mi _ ilu anun _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ liigike mangite ma kanga _ a si ng aneng _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tengug meng _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ â _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aa y _ tengug ten _ llangaqa _ neghsagh m _ tengug i _ s uk all uki _ ! _ 
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ q il ung i _ tuun um ak angi _ whangkuta _ 
enta _ elpek llu _ tal wa _ qam av er ug llak _ 
Q il ut _ llaaghanwha _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ k al ef k agh sim alghii _ .
K al ef k agh lluni _ yuggagh m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ m il uu simak angi _ 
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighneghagh i _ aliigh ma lghiit _ .
N u ug luni _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ tuq lu um akanga _ 
yuggagh m _ pim akanga _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ , _ 
maaten wha _ megh m _ evlug ughte mangite ma kanga _ kiyagh t aagh usi q aqa _ 
tuqute yamigu _ qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ â _ 
qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh luni _ wata _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ 
sukate luni _ qiighqagh kun _ tamlag ma lghii _ â _ 
tamlag luni _ qaya ghhagh ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ uunghagh ghhagh ni _ awataghpag ni _ 
tumangani _ esla mi _ nanigh ghhagh _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ malig simak angi _ 
kiyaghte ma luku _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ aragh magh mi _ tagi ma lghii _ .
nanigh ghhagh kun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ m eng tegh agh mun _ it qagh ta _ 
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ s aagh w ani _ utaq am akanga _ .
A ag r amun _ neghsagh m _ qilu i _ tuune ma kangi _ 
tughneghagh _ agitaghte yalghiimi _ talwa _ .
qilu t _ negh luki _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ 
kalefkaghte luni _ allameng _ aap sim akanga _ , _ 
T ugh negh agh llag em _ pim akanga _ kemagnagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ En taqun _ 
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ il ang it nun _ m eng tegh aan un _ 
nuug luni _ iigh tu m alghii _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ 
I tegh y alghii mi _ pi ma kanga _ m aal gh uk _ esgh aam ak ek _ sangan _ 
ighsaqugh ka _ unguva sigh ke aqa _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ K aa y _ !
K in ang u z i n _ iiwen _ neghe lleqe amken _ 
â _ pi ma kanga _ . _ â
â _ K in a _ naghulleg ma kanga _ ? _ 
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ . _ 
awataghpag t llu _ kalefkaghte ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ i nga _ 
L ang et aq _ aq f all eq aat nga _ maligte ma kangi _ â
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ malighqagh ma kangi _ awataghpag t _ 
suna _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ mengteghagh mete te _ uy aq ugh pen i _ kum ag llag uy eng alghii _ 
Agh nal q waagh em _ amig m _ saaghw ani _ utaqa ma kanga _ En ta _ 
aagra mun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t _ amig m _ , _ â _ 
itegh luni _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ ngillegte ma lghii _ 
qama _ nulighh an _ aapte ma kanga _ nun ugh yaq en ni _ aghn al q waagh h aq _ tuqu sim akanga _ aqnigh aqa _ 
tughneghagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ q ap ii m akanga _ .
taagken _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh anun _ 
kaate luni _ iightu ma lghii _ q ii pim s ug umalghii _ 
itegh yalghiimi _ yuuk _ maalghug _ esghagh ma kek _ 
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ , _ â _ 
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ aapte ma ka ak _ , _ â _ kaay _ ! _ 
kina u ziin _ pim akanga _ , _ 
U m iil eg put _ whanga u unga _ aq n igh aq uq _ .
A g l aqaa _ kina _ elpek _ 
â _ A g l aghn ay agh tu nga _ taa w ang in aq _ kay ate pig tu nga _ 
â _ A m agh l ak en _ weni _ inga _ 
langetaq _ aqfa lleqe aatnga _ ! _ â
nepiigh yan _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
N e ke v y an _ sangaawa _ taana _ uyaqugh gpeni _ 
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aap sim akanga _ taku ma kanga _ â _ 
kaate luku _ pi ma kanga _ q ug il igh ll alghii nga _ , _ enta _ qeteghten _ . _ â
aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ m eng tegh agh llag mun _ 
qeteghte yan _ .
tuqute yamigu _ amiiragh ghhagh a _ qapigh ma kanga _ pim ak angi _ 
qapigh yamigu _ t aghn ugh h aq ull uni _ aate ma kanga _ . _ 
aate luku _ ellnga tun _ k el g ugh aa _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ yuug _ qineghte ma lghii _ . _ 
pi ma lghii _ aq n il ghii _ es ghagh yaq en ni _ naagu _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ an egh taq ef tuq _ ken egh meng _ 
M ul un ghi tuq _ akite ma kanga _ nun al g ut ang it _ tag il agh aa sim alghiit _ taawa _ 
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nan ev g aq ull uteng _ aghn al q w aa qu ll uteng _ aqfa amken _ leg an qun _ 
umiileg ut _ inga _ aqnigh aqe uq _ En tan an iq q aam teg gu _ 
aglagh qagh a _ aghn am _ nan i q _ 
Agh h aghh ang aa w r aam _ aglagh nayagh unga _ taawanginaq _ â _ En ta _ kay u sigh teng nga _ 
K in a _ amagh laken _ ilag aat min eng _ ilag agh l i _ 
I i w en _ aa-a _ tem ng i _ ar agh l i _ 
taagken _ aan qu s kum a _ nekeve ma lghii _ . _ 
nekeve yan _ yug m _ amagh ma kanga _ aan qu tuq _ 
amagh yagh kete ni _ uqigtu uq _ ilag aat meg g neng _ 
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
A r aa sim al uki _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ aq n il ghii _ saama _ alignagh m _ .
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ aan qagh sim alghii _ 
taagken _ t aagken _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ 
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ it gh u sim akanga _ 
I t gh ull uku _ kum agh sim akanga _ qamagte aqa _ 
U g in i _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ .
mulunghituq _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ 
taagken _ , _ nanevgagh ke te luteng _ aghnalqwaagh ke te luteng _ taghnughhagh ke te luteng _ leganqun _ qamagte luteng _ 
S ang avek _ iq l eng i qu m a z i n _ ? _ â
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ nanigh _ qaamllug qu _ 
Q ay aghh ani _ pi ma kangi _ , _ pim akanga _ enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ Q ay aghh aq _ 
kina _ ilagaate leg _ ilagaate mineng _ ilagagh li _ .
iiwen _ ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ temngi _ aragh li _ 
iiwen _ aanqute kuma _ .
taagken _ tugh negh aat _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute uq _ .
tamana _ ellmeng _ ilagaate meggneng _ aanqute uq _ 
ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ aragh te ghllag uq _ m eq _ 
aragh te ma luki _ Agh h aghh ang aa w r aq _ tughneghagh _ aqnigh lghii _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ 
tuqute yamigu _ uunghagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ tug ul uku _ 
nusug luku _ aanqaghte ma lghii _ eslate mun _ .
aanqaghte luni _ taagken _ qimag ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh t _ nepiigh aghtagh te ma lghiit _ s ayug um akanga _ 
nepiigh aghtagh te yata _ tughneghagh m _ nulighh an _ nanigh _ 
itghute luku _ it egh luni _ ang ayuq ag ni _ 
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tuquma lghii _ 
A t ang an _ pim akanga _ malighqagh ma kangat _ â _ 
pi ma kangat _ pim akanga _ , _ â _ kaate kumken _ neghe lleqe kemken _ en taqun _ 
sangavek _ iqlengiqe ma ziin _ uy av anun _ aghul aq egh ng aagh m a _ 
Wh anga _ nan ev g agh l unga _ unite ma kangi _ . _ 
qaya ghhagh ni _ aliigh ma kanga _ 
llaaghanwha _ qaya ghhagh _ 
Ung ip agh aan _ qaya minun _ 
uugte luni _ kete uq _ Q ig igh h m ii k _ 
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ esnagh mun _ 
tughneghagh t _ megh mun _ .
ataasigh m _ tughneghagh m _ megh _ 
megh yagh kete ni _ ii w l eng _ aghv eng aq elghii t _ .
Agh v eng en gh aani _ m ek elghii gh h aq lu _ aghn agh aghh aq lu _ tugu luku _ megh _ anagutagh yagh kete ni _ 
llaaghanwha _ tughneghagh m _ tugu mangite ma kanga _ s ii ng waagh atagh aq eg ke k _ 
taagken _ nuna mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ taa w ang in aq _ 
tamlag luni _ qaya ni _ sayug ma kanga _ tag l an gh ani _ 
sayug luku _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ i ku qu sim aaq elghii k _ 
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ angayuqagh gni _ esghagh ma kek _ 
qagugh mig te lutek _ aqumga aqe uk _ aan en gh ani _ 
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ kiyagh sim alghii k _ .
M aaten _ pi ma kanga _ m ek elghii gh h aq _ pim alghii _ nakaa _ â _ entaqun _ anglegute nka _ nallu te te meggneng _ 
maaten _ whanga _ uyavagh nun _ aghulaqe ghngaaghma _ kitum _ 
whanga _ nanevgagh lunga _ tuqu lleqe unga _ .
qamagte uq _ m ek elghii gh h aq _ 
tefaay _ taa q s am igu _ 
ungipaghagh an _ qay agh t eng _ 
iimnanguq _ m aal gh ug eg neng _ p aa s k elghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ 
M ek elghii gh h aam n ay ag g ani _ mengteghaghtu pigte lghii _ , _ 
ama _ umiileg leg t _ m eng tegh agh put _ 
umiileg at _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
awen _ iiwleng _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ 
N en egh meng _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ esnagh mun _ .
kaate nghata _ umiileg m _ uqugh mun _ m eng tegh agh t eng _ naa f qu m ak an at _ 
llaaghanwha _ ava u na tek _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ mengteghagh mun _ taglagh nghaani _ esnagh mun _ 
kaate negh meggni _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ ikugh qu te ma aqe lghiik _ ama _ 
taglagh lutek _ kaate negh meggni _ qay agh t eng _ q al pegh ll uku _ 
ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ uy ghi gh luku _ umiileg m _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ taa q lu tek _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ 
upupeng _ qaya ngllagh lutung _ pim akanga _ , _ â _ 
llaaghanwha _ nayag an _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ 
qayagh _ taaqe yamigu _ tanpegh ghhagh ghhagh meng _ 
taaqe yamegteki _ qayagh eng _ amigh ma kangat _ q av aam alghii k _ 
qaya ghrukutaaghllag _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii _ aghn el qu si q _ .
Agh negh em _ pi ma kanga _ m ek elghii gh h aam _ n ay ani _ wiin _ maani _ ataasigh meng _ qavaa ltung _ negh el tun g _ 
unaami _ aghul iigh lu tek _ mengteghagh ut _ naafqellug qu _ negh tu k _ .
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ pil aat agh aa _ 
unug yagu _ negh ma lghiik _ n ay ag an _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ , _ 
taagken _ unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ 
N ay ag an _ kete ma lghiik _ am um akanga _ 
ukiivag m _ un ug yagh tugh aqaa _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ al iigh um ak angat _ .
unug yagu _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ 
unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ .
meghnugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ uyghigh luku _ 
taagken _ negh ma lghiik _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya mini _ nalughqutagh ma lghii _ 
Q ay agh t eng _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ 
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angwaagh uk _ .
unug yagu _ uyghigh laatagh uk _ .
uyghigh lutek _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ 
unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ angwaagh aqe lghiik _ n u ug umalghii _ .
aghnegh m _ qukaghyag u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ s aam _ enta _ negh ltung _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghuliigh lutek _ qayagh ek _ uyghigh luku _ 
taaqe yamek _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ â _ Q ig igh h m ii ngu u kun g _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ 
llaaghanwha _ atugh te luku _ nayag an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghula ma lghii _ ? _ 
meghnugh yami _ taaqe luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ 
angwaagh ltung _ segh l e tun _ kiyagh llegh h ii kun g _ 
nayag an _ es n amun _ amu ma kanga _ neq mun _ enkaam _ angwaagh uk _ s ii ng v ag atagh aq iin kun g _ 
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ nuna _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
taagken _ taku ma kangat _ negh el tun g _ 
sukate luni _ nuna _ angli ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghiik _ tag l an gh ani _ 
arekull _ ukiivag mun _ kaate aqe uk _ 
qute mun _ tag lagh aq elghii kun g _ .
qayagh eng _ sayug ma ka ak _ negh aq elghii kun g _ 
sayug luku _ tam ak en _ uk avek _ 
mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghiik _ , _ 
Q am avek _ kaate ma lghiik _ it egh tek _ 
A sang si _ qiighw ma lghii _ tag i ku ni _ 
aghnagh _ ineqsunagh ghllag lghii _ aagra meng _ 
aleghqugh yalghiimi _ ug im in eng _ utaq iit k ell uku _ neq l igh tu um ak ek _ .
maani _ aviite usi _ ug i nga _ k av leg uu sim alghii _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ â _ A v _ ? _ â
â _ aa _ . _ sa kun _ 
Y uuk _ qaya kun _ tagi kung _ 
Taw ani _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ .
Y agh leg i _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ ama _ uqugh mun _ u kuk _ t aghn ugh h aq ak ek _ 
llaaghanwha _ ava ngunaamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ mengteghagh mnnun _ En taqun _ 
kaate negh mtung _ sa meng _ negh ltung _ , _ 
taawanginaq _ igatagh lutung _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikung _ n ani _ 
wetku _ umiileg _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ 
pilagkagh meng _ ikugh qu te aqe lghiikung _ segh l e pig u uq _ 
enkaam _ taglagh aqe lghiikung _ , _ 
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ negh aqe lghiikung _ at gh an em tun g _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ tea- ma ken _ ukavek _ tagi kung _ 
aghnagh ghllag _ qiya ma lghii _ tag l an gh ani _ it ag n a tun _ es n amun _ at ghagh aq u kun g _ waran wha _ 
qamavek _ aagra mun _ itegh tek _ tag lagh aq u kun g _ 
asangsi _ ugi ka _ tagi kuni _ qevuute luni _ quya lleqe uq _ 
A an Ê¼ g ii mal u tu ng llu _ aagra mun _ esgh an egh min i kun g _ 
aghnagh m _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ neqlightugh ma kek _ â
negh ma lukek _ sama _ ugi a _ kavleg u uute ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ aap l atagh ii _ , _ â _ A t at ang is tek _ am a _ as ag is tek _ 
â _ whaante unga _ .
yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ , _ 
tawani _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ esghapag ma kek _ , _ 
yaghlegi _ nuliigh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ ! _ â
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ aapte ma kek _ , _ aan luni _ ang ayuq am in un _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ .
ukavek _ tukughqagh ghhagh leg nun _ ivagh i u kung _ nani _ inqun _ pinitun _ kiyaghte na lutung _ in qun _ 
qayughllak _ nuna mnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ A a _ 
umiileg ut _ enngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ m eng tegh am eg g nun _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ aap sim akanga _ , _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ ? _ â

enta _ itegh i _ .

vuvalla a _ at egh aat aq ut _ 
vuvalla m _ m eng tegh am eg g neng _ sivuligh _ qaligh k _ all aghh iin agh meng _ signegh t _ iv al um eng _ qaltaghwaagh k _ v u v all alghiit _ aghqe sigh ghhagh k _ tughneghagh nun _ .

aghtaghagh nghagu _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _

ilate naqe negh meggni _ mengteghagh meggneng _ tugutagh ke ut _

siqinegh _ piite nghaani _ nanevgagh at _ 
nategh mun _ ateghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ es n amun _ pi y aam alghii _

Wh anga _ nag aq un ghi tu nga _ . _

vuvalla legte aq _ avii aqe uq _ .
ilagaate _ ip ug agh sim akanga _ uzive lghiit _ aghuliigh aqe ut _ eg llegh sim akanga _

tungtu ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ kum ag em _ nun al g ut ni _ pim ak angi _ p aa llgh un kut _ , _ ukapighqaagh i _ ap ay ep ay iigh en kut _ 
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ â _ Q am ar il an aq unga _

tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ s aagh w anun _ esnagh mun _

El pe tek _ tungtu ghllag _ aghiva laatagh aa _ naa y gh aq _ u z iv i teg gu _ tungtu _ paagna _ 
tungtu ghllag m _ pilate- aghagh a _ k il g aq uu sim alghii k _ q et ng all egh y an kuk _ p aa llgh un kuk _ .
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ megh n aal im alghii k _ .

A m a _ ap ay ep ay iigh en kuk _ tungtu ghllag m _ negh ma kanga _ uy gh ag r u ku t aagh llak _

taagken _ qamarila m _ ayaviigh a _ kingutagh leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ igh n iigh ll i _ 
kumag m _ pi ma kangi _ .
elpek tek _ melngu llu _ apayepayiigh llu _ naayghagh _ uzive teggu _ negh um ak angat _ qamagll uku _ 
llaaghanwha _ aga _ al en i _ pim akanga _ paallghu nkuk _ â _ 
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ meghnaali ma lghiik _ , _ 
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghiik _ 
legan _ kaate yamek _ aneghte ma lghiik _ 
apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ naayghagh _ taa kuk _ 
qesiqun _ paallghu nkuk _ A q ang ang iigh h aq _ ne ke v luni _ uzive ma kangat _ naa y gh aq _ 
ama _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ 
llaaghanwha _ kumag m _ paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ 
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ enraq _ melngu _ aghyuugh ma kanga _ 
ellnga _ kumag _ aklungi msuggagh igh te ma lghii _ tag im al gh h k _ 
qamagte uq _ kiyagh sim alghii k _ 
tungtu _ aghul aq en gh egk en i _ 
iimnanguq _ kiyagh sim alghii k _ kiyaghte ma uq _ aghnaanegh _ tungtu _ tu ng t u _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ ighni naqe ma lghii _ 
ighni naqe ma luku _ amaa ghllag k _ maalghug _ kaate ma lghiik _ , _ 
amaa ghllag m _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _

salin _ maaten _ kemgite uq _ aghul iigh u simak angat _ .

taagken _ ila yan _ pi ma kanga _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ aghul aq aq elghii k _ 
uksugh mi _ ilangani _ teghigagh _ ik naq u ghi nal u tek _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ pi aqe yagh kangat _ in qun _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ sighunegh mineng _ egte ma aqe kangi _ ang l im alghii k _ 
tamana _ teghigagh _ qamagte luku _ tuqu qu ma kanga _ .
ungleghtagh aqe lghii _ nag negh lu tek _

ata ita _ waamte ma kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ iknaqughi sqellug kek _ es neng anun _

aa-a _ agh s ag u _ aghul aq l aat aam alghii _

M ek elghii q _ nagaqugh unga _ .

unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aghulaqe laatagh ma lghii _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ sukangite ni luku _ aghul aq umalghii _

allameng _ uusnegh u aq _ kaate laatagh aa _ aku g aagh n ii neng _ 
kaa sa mi _ uusneghwaagh mun _ piyug meng _ igleghte ma lghii _ s aam a _

Q uy ng i m _ esnagh m _ yug y ag llak _ .

M ek elghii q _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ qayughllak _ tughneghaan- i luku _ .
naqam _ atkug a _ aange pigte lghii _ uu llgh agh te v z igh aq luni _ 
nanevgagh _ tunute nghaani _ maligte aqe kanga _ ku u v um ak ek _

tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ it egh aa tut _ .
sunanguq _ nanevgagh _ taana _ 
sunanguq _ taana _ aghnagh aq _ qineghte a _ .

tugu lukek _ ugate mii ii aghte ma lghii _ pegnem _ ullegh aghte vzigh aqe luni _ U taq an aanghi tam ken _

M aaten _ il ang ani _ at ang an _ 
negh luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ aa v gu ll uteng _

unaami _ yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu na luni _

Agh nagh aq _ pi ma kanga _ .

yuug _ masisu _ itegh ma lghii _ ( _ 
itegh yan _ aghnaghagh m _

aghnagh aq _

alla _ ata an _ aaghhe ste laatagh ma kanga _ .

uugte yalghiimi _ saama _ pennagh m _ asi ani _

aghnagh m _ af tam akanga _ pi ma kanga _ 
naqam _ tea- ma kut _ yungestagh ghhagh t _ 
U n ug y an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ ug ug nagh aam _ 
ilangani _ aghneghmi _ qaga _ esla mi _ Q ay aq sigh v ik negh i _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ tea- ma _ yuug _ 
M aal gh uk _ nuliigh minun _ aapute yagh uq _ igh uk ek _ 
nulighh an _ ighleke ma kanga _ pim akanga _ 
U n ug um akanga _ q av agh luteng _ 
aane yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ nag aq um ak angi _ yug lghute ghllag _ ar aa ll ghiit _ 
ellnga llu _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ naa y gh anun _ 
kaate yalghiimi _ saama _ esghagh ma kanga _ kana _ 
nutaan _ naasqugh ni _ ipugte nghagu _ iigh agh tu ull ghiit _ .
ila it _ m ak e tek es tan gh ani _ al ing aq elghii t _ .
qesiqun _ taana _ siku _ siku u nghite uq _ tu ng tu ngun ghi tuq _ naayvagh m _ ku un ii sang u f tuq _ ama _ 
Q ay aq sigh v ig em _ teskanavek _ ketfagh luni _ ugugnaghagh _ 
A r aa sim alghii _ aange nghite a _ tamana _ yuug _ aragh ma kanga _ T ung tu v ak _ tuq ut aa _ nengagh u aq _ nanughagh uq _ !
taagken _ aglagh te ma kangat _ at gh aam alghii _ 
kaat ute te luku _ itghute ma kangat _ at gh aam alghii _ 
aghnagh m _ afta ma kanga _ igh neng eg kaa l ghii _ 
afta luku _ gaagh ma kangat _ aan y alghii mi _ 
unug yan _ negh te ma lghiit _ .
Agh ul aq um alghiit _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ ugugnaghagh m _ tulimagh a _ 
aghnagh m _ llilagh ma kanga _ Q ay aq sigh v ig mun _ p aagh q i te f tuq _ .
E s gh aam akanga _ negh ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ ighu k _ ugugnaghagh m _ ighu kek _ negh ma kek _ y uk aten _ 
taagken _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ay um i q _ aqsa a _ Q ay aq sigh v i k _ y uq aq aa f tuq _ .
unug ma kanga _ qavagh luteng _ at ii m af t aat nga _ 
unaami _ aghte yagu _ naa put _ negh i pig ll uteng _ esla mi _ aragh te lghiit _ 
taagken _ aanleghaate luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ 
ama _ K ay usi q aa _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ 
kaate yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug t _ iighagh uute lghiit _ av aq ut agh tuq aq _ 
legan _ makete kestagh nghaani _ alinge aqe lghiit _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ il ang ani _ taana _ tungtu _ tungtu u nghite uq _ un ang negh meng _ am a _ il ang aneng _ 
U k s ugh y ag u _ tuute qaghte ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ agh tu umalghii _ 
aragh te ma lghii _ yuug _ tamana _ n ul ii ni _ pim akanga _ tungtuvag _ tuqute a _ Wh aa _ tuute qaghte luku _ am avek _ 
yuug _ tamana _ atghagh ma lghii _ 
ama _ qam iy eg neng _ atghagh ma lghii _ aghul aq umalghii _ 
naqam _ yug em _ ighnegh nge kau lghii _ , _ 
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aane yalghiimi _ tamana _ yuug _ aga _ 
esghagh yagh kete ni _ aqergiigh u uq _ .
aghulaqe ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ 
taagken _ kaate yalghiimeng _ agh tu umalghii _ paaghqite uq _ qay ugh llag Ê¼ qun _ 
esghagh ma kanga _ nanevgagh _ p eg n em _ 
mekelghiigh m _ aapte ma kanga _ um eg negh llak _ taw ani _ aghnegh sim alghii _ yug ke aten _ 
A m en am _ taa m _ yug g aam _ ayumigh _ anengagh ka _ kiyagh sim alghii _ .
whanga _ whaa _ atigh mafte aatnga _ taameng _ 
saama _ ata put _ naa put _ neghigh pigte luteng _ tuqu kau ut _ 
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ 
qayuutagh m _ kayusigh iqe a _ aghnagh _ 
Agh n am _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nula i kek _ 
uksugh nghagu _ yuug _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ â _

I it gh umalghii _ negh kangit _ 
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ tu ng sigh waagh aq uq _ 
llaaghanwha _ qamiye gneng _ qamugh luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ nun an igh llag tuq _ 
kaate yan _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ .
taaqe yami _ aghulaqe naqe ma yagh lghii _ yug m _ quyilleg m _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
sagiqe ma lghii _ ighlekuughte ma kanga _ tagh tu umalghii _ 
qavaa ma lghiit _ tu ng sigh waagh umalghii _ 
tawa _ yuggagh _ aghtugh ma lghii _ qavagh nghmeng _ tuun aq am ken _ avaquti a _ neqe ite ngugh t _

amenam _ taa m a _ yuggagh m _ mengteghagh mii a _ 
unug aqe a _ iiwenllu _ q av aam alghii _ .

nuug ma lghii _ ii w en llu _

whaken _ tuune aqe amken _

kaate luni _ uyatu luni _ amig meng _ pi ma kangi _ pil ag um ak eg ke t _ .

aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ 
taagken _ unug yagu _ 
unaami _ estamat ii te a _ mengteghagh at _ aghnagh aq _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ m eng tegh aat _ 
kaate luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ kaa sim alghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ , _ 
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .

â _ P iy aq taq pe ngu y o y _ , _ pi yaq te l q en _ taana _

meteghllug _ taglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ 
itegh luni _ aghnalqwaagh _ pi ma kanga _ .
ighsa ma lghii _ aghn al q w aaq _ 
meteghllug m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ 
kaate luni _ uyatu luni _ pi ma kangi _ 
taakut _ malighqagh luku _ qengagh kek _ savig meng _ pilag ma kegket _ â _ 
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
unug ma kanga _ aghn agh aam _ 
qavaa ma lghiik _ tag l aam alghii _ 
unaami _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ k ag p es t aagh h aa f tut _ nuna m _ 
taagken _ enraq _ tallimat ii te a _ mengteghagh at _ 
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ 
kaate luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ q iy alghii _ es ghagh luku _ a tu um agh mi _ aghul ay alghii mi _ m eng tegh ani _ ang l i sim akanga _ s aam a _ 
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ y u pig ugh sim alghii _ 
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ tagh tugh y alghii mi _ 
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aw al igh t ii s qu m akanga _ pateg magh an _ .

ighsa ma lghii _ kiyagh sim alghii _
