llaaghanwha _ atghagh ma lghii _ um iil ek _ 
kaate luni _ amig meng _ uyatu pigte luni _ pi ma kangi _ av eg luni _ iil aam alghii _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ .
talwa _ akuzi magh mi _ qimag ma lghii _ igh n el ek _ 
iwernga _ aghnaghagh m _ ata an _ panig ni _ angegh ma kanga _ quy ng i meng _

taagken _ aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ igh egh an _ 
A t ang an _ qavaa ma lghii _ , _ 
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ qiya lghii _ esghagh luku _ atugh magh mi _ aghula yalghiimi _ mengteghagh ni _ angli te ma kanga _ saama _ iqa nge i tesi ma kanga _ , _ 
taana _ eltugh aa _ yupig ughte ma lghii _ ama _ 
aghnagh aq _ unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ imani _ enngaatall _ 
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ awaligh ta ii sqe ma kanga _ quyngigh meng _ negh n iigh umalghii _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh aq _ awalightugh ma lghii _ , _ 
Agh nagh aq _ aghnaghagh t _ ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ saama _ yupig ughte ma lghiit _ , _ 
qamagte uq _ A q f ag u _ tefaay _ . _ 
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte aagh _ quurkeli _ meteghllug _ 
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ tannge t _ umiileg at _ quyngightu pigte lghii _ â _ 
quyngigh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ esgh aq agh luku _ 
naqam _ taana _ umiileg _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ umiileg m _ quyngigh a _ aveg luni _ â _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute pigte luni _

itegh luni _ ata ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ s aam _ quy ng iq ag u _ . _ â

ata ni _ pi yatni _ pim akanga _ , _ ivgagh te ma kanga _ W an leg i _ 
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ m e tegh ll uk _ pim akanga _ aa _ â _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ quyngigh ke aat _ â

ungipaate kangaten _ ukig ggaaten _ .

llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ aqfa ma kanga _ â _

Q agh lu ghi m alghiit _ whaten _ pi gu _

ata an _ panig ni _ 
aghnaghagh m _ aglagh luni _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ 
meteghllug _ aglagh ma lghii _ tu m iigh aq luni _ 
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ esgh aghn aq ut ng in aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
E s gh aa ll u tek _ m ek elghii gh ek _ saamna _ quyngigh ke agu _ pim ak angat _ , _ 
â _ nanigh _ awite luku _ esghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug _ 
A an y ag Ê¼ ta _ pi ma kanga _ um iil g it a _ aap simak angi _ esgha _ â _ tannge t _ taana _ quyngigh ke aat _ ? _ â
meteghllug _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ 
uugte luni _ ellmegteggun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ esgh aat agh taq i ten _ whangkuta nge uq _ pikagh ut _ â
ata ita _ pi ma kanga _ ! _ â
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuqutagh igh ma lghiik _ uk ig y alghii meng _ 
tuqute ma kegket _ ellng it a _ quy ng ig ke t _ 
itghute luki _ negh ma kangat _ am ig u ghi m alghii k _ 
taaqe yamek _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane ma lghiik _ .
aane lutek _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i ma lghiik _ 
tannge t _ an uq a _ tuq lu um akanga _ 
T an ng et _ sughug i na luteng _ um eg negh ugh s ag u _ 
taaqe yameng _ tannge t _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ taana _ 
ivagh i ma lghiit _ tuq lu um akanga _ 
taawanginaq _ taana _ mayugh igate kangat _ an igu _ 
umiileg _ mayugh ma lghii _ tume iigh aqe luni _ taana _ 
uugte luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ v egh simak angat _ 
umiileg m _ quyngigh t _ esghagh naqe te inagh _ liisuqe ma kangi _ naa llgh u te sim akanga _ 
esghaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ ata eng _ pi ma kangat _ 
Q uu r k el i _ weni _ itegh sqe i uute ggu _ â _ Q uy ng igh put _ 
Q uu r k el i _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ aapte ma kangi _ tuq lu um akanga _ .
U k ig umalghii _ whangkuta _ 
alla _ aapte laatagh ma kangi _ , _ â _ waniwanllu _ s am a _ esghaate aghte aqe i te n _ quyngigh meng _ pi naq aat _ .
K ay usi qagh kut _ waniwanllu _ â
tannge t _ aga _ qiive luteng _ 
taawanginaq _ ellngit a _ quyngigh gket _ siipte ma lghiik _ ! _ 
mekelghiigh k _ taake uk _ m ay u umalghii _ iwernga _ 
uyuqligh _ itegh aghte luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qukaghte yamigu _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ 
atghagh aatagh luni _ anuqe _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ 
tannge t _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte yagu _ quyngigh teng _ 
mekelghiigh m _ quurkeli m _ ighnegh an _ taana _ quyngigh _ 
L eg an _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ anuqe _ umegneghtuumagh an _ qanig ite ngughk _ tuqu ll uku _ 
anuqligh yagh kete ni _ taana _ nangaghte llegh _ anigu _ suupe ma kanga _ pim akanga _ 
tannge t _ umiileg ita _ ilagagh luni _ taana _ 
kaave yan _ T uq ut in n ay agh am ken _ veghte ma kangat _ â
veghte nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ taana _ naayghagh _ naagh llegh u tesi ma kanga _ nekegneghagh tun _ unguv agh lleq aqa _ 
ima _ quurkeli nkut _ avangite te ma lghiit _ quyngigh igh te ma lghiit _ taw aa te si g a tut _ 
quurkeli _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .

ukig ma lghii _ .
quurkeli m _ pi ma ke aanga _ .
A t ghagh aat agh luni _ m ay u umalghii _ .
M ay ugh luni _ kayusigh naanghite amsi _ .
tawaten _ pi nghite amsi _ elpenun _ quyngigh ke ni luku _ â _ S am a _ 
aga _ ima _ mayugh ma lghii _ quy ng i q _ 
legan _ quurkeli _ pilugug uq _ , _ 
ukig ma lghii _ .
taawa _ yugtu ut _ .
umiileg m _ .
llaaghanwha _ piigugh kaqe ma kangat _ iwernga _ 
legan _ taaqe yatni _ taghnughhagh _ qavagh lghii _ puvug yagh kete ni _ 
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ tuqu lghii _ 
K aa s an _ pi naanghite unga _ .
U m iil g em _ tuqute i tete nayagh amken _ igh n en i _ tuqu l ghii _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ wetku _ quyngigh i _ aveg luku _ tagivagh kufsigu _ taawa _ unguvagh lleqe aqa _ 
pi ma kangat _ an uq lii m akanga _ um eg negh ugh sim alghii _ yeghrat _ .
quurkeli _ angegh ma lghii _ .

ilagagh ma lghii _ kiyagh sim alghii k _ 
ilagagh luni _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .
atghagh aatagh luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ u ug sim alghii k _ 
mayugh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ uy ugh an illu _ 
itegh luni _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .

angegh ma lghii _

mayugh ma luki _ umiileg m _ ighnegh an _ 
meteghllug k _ utaqa ma kangat _ kum l a tu sim akanga _ 
kaate yan _ tuqute ma kangat _ p ap en i _ 
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ 
llaaghanwha _ kaate luki _ wayagh luki _ quyngigh teng _ , _ tuqute gpenaki _ , _ 
naqam _ anuqligh ma kanga _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ 
mayugh naqe yalghiimek _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ am iq l ug g aq _ 
mayugh negh megteni _ pim akanga _ nagnegh aqe lghiik _ amavek _ naayghagh m _ awata anun _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ â
ivgagh negh megteni _ nagnegh aqe luteng _ .
A ll ameng _ pegnem _ uugte ma lghiik _ â _ 
K iy ay u v agh l uk tu ng aa aa _ ata ni llu _ uyughagh ni llu _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ , _ t ay m an al uk aa _ yeghrat _ elpesi neng _ . _ â
llaaghanwha _ nuyekligh _ tuquma lghii _ ke t f agh ta _

tefaay _ ! _ 
afsengagh ghhagh _ 
iimnanguq _ ilag agh l aat agh tuq _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ k an ak ii i _ 
megh ma lghii _ anglaagh ghhagh _ ukite luku _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ 
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ anglaagh m _ saaghw ani _ 
meghnaali ma lghii _ tawani _ , _ 
meghnaali ma luku _ papeg a _ ! _ â
ilagagh ma lghii _ aghul aq umalghii _ papeg ni _ 
A ll ameng _ ilag agh l aat agh tuq _ 
K iy ay u v agh l uk tu ng aa aa _ , _ kay nga _ pik r ung aa aa aa _ , _ t ay m an al uk aa _ , _ k al al i kaa aa _ . _ â
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ kay ng egh llak _ 
sunanguq _ taana _ p aat g um akanga _ ketfagh aghte a _ 
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
uuynite uten _ kay ng em _ af s eng aghh aq _ 
Q am ag tuq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ 
Agh nagh aghh aat _ t all im at _ sikig _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ t aku m ak angi _ ketfagh a _ 
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ k an agh qu u simak angi _ .
papegtu uten _ pe tug um ak angi _ .
Taa q luki _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ , _ 
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ .
U n ill uku _ ag l aam alghii _ ukazigh _ 
sunanguq _ taana _ ukazigh ghhagh _ ketfagh a _ nagh ugh sim alghii _ 
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aag y uq _ ll agh an _ awite te n _ i tem u te qagh t i kut _ 
papeg n _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ yug p esi _ un ak naq aq iin kut _ 
ukazigh ghhagh _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ aag n a _ 
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ nagh ugh sim alghii _ .
â _ M e tegh ll u r uk _ kaynge _ ll agh an yug g ay eng aal ghii ten _ , _ i tem u te qagh t i kut _ . _ â
sunanguq _ taana _ kaynge ghllag _ 
ketfagh te kete luku _ afsengagh ghhagh _ pateg ma kanga _ . _ 
papeg a _ kepkagh ma kanga _ nagh ugh sim alghii _ 
tawaten _ kaynge m _ afsengagh ghhagh _ kayusigh ma kanga _ yug g ay eng aal ghii ten _ 
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ . _ 
mayeraaghpag _ 
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ â _ 
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ â _ 
kaate luki _ ag ugh agh sim alghii _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ 
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ 
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ 
unaghsigh _ tagh s an egh em n g _ agh tugh luku _ 
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ q il ev r i meng _ 
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ 
K aa lluni _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ pil ag um akanga _ .
P ag un gh aat _ i f aq uu sim alghiit _ yug gpesi _ 
â _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ iy er u ug et _ ! _ 
aga nguq _ pil ag yaq en ni _ naghughte ma lghii _ iq el q wa _ 
Enkaam _ q iy am alghii _ aagyuq _ â _ K ek a _ iteme teqaghti kut _ kum aghq ugh tek ell eq agh pe nga _ ! _ 
â _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ u v eg ll u ten _ 
aantagh ni _ it gh u sim akanga _ .
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ aan agh ll anga _ 
â _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ ? _ iteme teqaghti kut _ 
â _ iteme teqaghte na aqe amsi _ at ku g llag en _ aa ll uk ek _ 
taku luki _ aapte ma kangi _ uy at iigh luku _ .
aghnaghaghhagh t _ apeghtugh ma kanga _ yug g aa k _ t ap gh ami _ pi gu _ uqfig _ 
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ â _ Yug g ag ka _ al iigh h agh tu k _ aa aa _ 
unaghsigh igh ghllag _ P an ik ell em aa y _ s ameng _ 
iteme te ma kangi _ A at ak _ 
aanleghaate ma lghiit _ yug ek _ 
M ay er aagh pag em _ tuq lu um akanga _ aghtugh luku _ aligh ni nguq _ unite ma kangat _ , _ 
taake uk _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ ulaagh ni _ ipegsagh luku _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ aligh an _ inglu a _ 
pagunghagh t _ I i teg Ê¼ qun _ kaa s kum si _ 
Q im ag in aam al uki _ kaa sagh tu m ak angi _ .
inglu a _ pilag yagh kete ni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ tugh negh aagh tek alghii ten _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ ! _ 
enkaam _ qiya ma lghii _ n ap agh saq en ni _ naa y ghagh llak _ keka _ keka _ av ang il nguq _ .

aglagh te luku _ itghute ma kanga _ q ii p umalghii _ 
â _ P an ik ell em aa y _ n aten _ aane aghte langa _ ? _ â
â _ sa meng qun _ kameg luten _ atkug luten _ 
M egh yaq eg ni _ kameg ghllag gken _ atkug ghllag n _ aate lukek _ â _ I i tek _ 
Q am agll uk ek _ ne ke v umalghii _ uyatagh igh luku _ qam uq luku _ 
aane luni _ aghn agh aghh aam _ yuggagh k _ tapghagh mi _ esghagh ma kek _ sang an _ 
aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ n ut aan _ t all ig ni _ qu ul mun _ neng ug us agh aa k _ aq s anga _ tapghagh meng _ .

taagken _ yug k _ 
mayeraaghpag m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ n ul igh qu ll ghii k _ .
qalleg kau mangite uq _ av ang il ngu uk _ 
aane yalghiimi _ aga _ uyavagh utu te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ 
taagken _ malighqagh ma kangi _ pi y aam alghii _ 
T all im at _ ng el q at _ kaate kumsi _ neghe lleqe kemsi _ 
qimag inagh ma luki _ kaate yaghtu ma kangi _ .
K aa ll uki _ aghnaghaghhagh u aagh mi _ siingenllu _ .
uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ napaghte yagh kete ni _ naayghagh ghllag _ 
pegnem _ mayeraaghpag m _ 
iqelqugh ghhagh ni _ es n amun _ qiipe ma lghii _ suupe magh an _ nuna _ teregh yagh kete ni _ 
L l aagh an wh a _ tag lagh y alghii mi _ naten _ .
L l aagh an wh a _ megh lukek _ ng el q at _ .
megh yagh ke gni _ megh yagh ke gni _ pi ma kanga _ ng el q at eng _ aan um alghii k _ iitek _ 
qamagte lukek _ nekeve ma lghii _ aqsa ghllag ni _ qamugh ke luku _ iq all ug anun _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ 
mayeraaghpag _ mayugh luni _ nutaan _ talligh gni _ qule mun _ .
quupeaghaghte yalghiimi _ qayungllaasigh _ , _ pag ell eg r aa y _ , _ signegh u aq _ , _ qaltagh _ legan _ allaghhiinaq _ sanqutraagh _ â
qamagte uq _ ii y akun _ 
tallimat _ ngelqagh t _ 
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ yug nkuk _ 
taghnughhagh ite ngugh k _ ava ite ngugh k _ taa qu m alghii _ 
ugi a _ quyngigh ni _ esghapag yaghtugh aqe kanga _ t aghn ugh h aq um ak ang it _ 
ilangani _ maaten _ piyaa ma lghii _ quyngigh minun _ 
tallimat _ ngelqagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ nun aagh mi _ 
taku yagh kete ni _ tenge nghite ut _ un ang aq elghii t _ 
kaate luki _ tugu luki _ atghagh ma lghii _ tu ng sigh n iigh aq elghii _ 
kaate yan _ nulighh a _ quya ma lghii _ , _ 
itghute ma kangi _ yug g aq _ 
ugi a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yalghiimi _ am ii r iq iin agh luku _ an uq lii si s t eng _ 
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiit _ ngelqagh t _ un ang y iit alghii _ 
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ unite luki _ ngelqagh teng _ aane ma lghiik _ , _ 
nulighh a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ iit gh umalghii _ 
taglagh ma lghii _ aq um g aam al uku _ 
iiwenllu _ mengteghagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ atugh ghllag meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ , _ 
S ang w aa _ u uk n a _ tag ii _ ? _ â
U k ang uq _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh t _ estamat _ atugh aqe ut _ ataasigh _ aghula aqe uq _ amiiragh teng _ 
I i w en _ amiiragh itgun _ aqume qaghte ma lghii _ s un a _ 
N an uq _ pim alghii _ 
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ taaqe ma lghii _ quyngigh mun _ pi nghmeng _ n av ghi ll ak en _ 
taakut _ mekelghiigh t _ ellngit a _ taghnughhagh ke ma kangit _ â _ 
yuggagh _ N ak aa _ enkaam _ nanugh _ 
iimnanguq _ yuggagh _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nunaagh mi _ 
ila i _ mughu ta lgu ta i _ unange aqe lghiit _ ellnga _ mughute luni _ taglagh nghmini _ ava ngunani _ .
nulighh a _ qagani _ nunalgute meggnun _ 
nuna lgu ta ita _ unange kaqe kangat _ neghsagh _ .
ellnga _ yuggagh _ sakenge igate ngughk _ â _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ mughute luteng _ 
mughute aat _ nanughagh luteng _ amiiragh igh qiinagh luku _ a tuqu v in gh aa ke k _ taglagh ma lghiit _ megh mun _ 
enraq _ alla _ yuggagh _ unange yu i aatagh lghii _ iike te ma kanga _ un ang aq i _ 
aghtugh luni _ aghvigh naqe nghmeng _ inglu anun _ all a _ ellmeng _ n us ug yaq eg ni _ kete mun _ anag ma lghii _ n us ug um akanga _ .
kaa sa mi _ nan uu m _ aglagh luni _ tawani _ nenglu ngllagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ m eng tegh am nun _ 
tesqamani _ tag l aan n aagh am ken _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ uka _ 
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ aa ll uku _ yug g aan kuk _ uuk _ .
sa u a _ uukna _ 
uka nguq _ legan _ pi aqe uq _ yug g aq _ am agh luku _ aghv ii taq egk anga _ .
iiwen _ yuggagh _ qineghte naqe aqe uq _ suna _ taana _ nanugh ghllag _ 
nanugh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ â _ yuggagh _ uyuq _ iit gh aaten _ pilugug gpeneng _ ghhuute pigte aanga _ 
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ taa q lu tek _ q av aam alghii k _ sa meng qun _ 
U naa mi _ q ak m a _ teng l ug tu um ak ang it _ , _ â _ N aag u _ q aam n a _ ? _ 
â _ nakaa _ ila a _ â _ A aam _ 
â _ Q ay wa _ aan aq unga _ . _ 
kenigh ma kek _ nan uu m _ pim akanga _ aligh u aatagh lghiik _ nanugh m _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimaagh k _ q ak mun _ 
nanugh m _ it ag n a tun _ aq f aqegk ang anga _ 
yuggagh m _ mat- aghte lukek _ tuune ma kek _ ig aam akanga _ 
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ yug g aq _ 
quupute gnun _ kaate lutek _ yuggagh m _ atugh kuvinghagh u kek _ nanugh m _ 
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ pe kaa m alghii _ ig aqaa _ qayughllak _ unange aqe i _ nulighh n _ 
qafsina neng _ nepte aghte lukek _ ukmangigh u sagte a _ 
taagken _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ pi teg saq en ni _ un aku m akanga _ wiin _ mengteghagh mnun _ 
enan _ taglaate naagh amken _ u llgh agh sim alghii _ .

ketmiighte ma lghiik _ S aa _

unaami _ qakma _ tenglugtugh ma kangit _ â

maame ste gpenanga _ itagnatun _ p eg n em _ tughumgha lgute u lunga _ .
yuggagh m _ aane aqe yan _ ipegsagh llegh meng _ 
nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ am ii r aan _ 
tagi gpenani _ mulu yan _ yuggagh _ agipanegh kun _

nutem _ aag llegh a _ pekagh ma lghii _ igaqe a _ aqume luni _ 
aag llegh an _ m aam y ami _ nan uu m _ 
yuggagh m _ k aan negh meg tek i _ nan uu m _ pitegsagh kete ni _ unake ma kanga _ aag llegh a _ 
nanugh _ pategmig kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qu ut mun _ kaa sagh tugh y am ek _ 
ullegh aghte yan _ aag llegh an _ esghapagtugh ma kanga _ yug g aq _

kaate yan _ nanugh m _

whaken _ kenlanga _ pinitun _ 
maame gkuma _ .
nanugh ghllag _ nekeve luni _ pegnem _ aglagh ma lghii _ N ag un tuq _ 
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ . _ 
itegh yan _ tea- ma kut _ amiiragh an _ makreg aghtagh llegh i _ .

uugte yan _ yuggagh _ nanugh _ qiive luni _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ m il uu simak angi _

taagken _ kenlanga _ yuggagh _ .

yuug _ ag avek _ 
yuug _ at al ugh at _ qayaghtugh ma lghii _ pennagh m _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esghagh ma kangi _ angyagh t _ kaalgugh lghiit _ aghvegh meng _ 
kaate luki _ esghaghte yagh ke yagh uq _ qam iy eg n eg un _ 
esghagh nghite aat _ yuuk _ 
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ aghn aq _ qam iy eg n eg un _ nagun tuq _ aghvegh eng _ maallgute nagh katgu _ tag lagh aq ef tuq _ 
esgha _ maligte yagh kumki _ aq um umalghii _ qam iy eg n eg un _ 
yuggagh m _ kaalgugh lghiit _ kingu itneng _ maligte ma kangi _ 
esnagh mun _ kaate luteng _ yuggagh _ esghapag yalghiimi _ S ang am ek _ qam uq ag ka _ nuna ke nghitekagh minun _ tamlag uq _ ?

aghvegh _ pilag ma kangat _ megh n aal im alghii _ 
qepghagh lghiit _ qam iy eg neng _ yuug _ esghapag ma lghii _ .

aagute ghngaaghmegteggu _ esghagh igate kangat _ qay ut am _

maaten _ agavek _ sa yan _ .

yug m _ ugke _

pi ma lghiik _ T ag i _ malig t i nga _ sangami _ amig ut _ ! _ â
yuug _ iit gh um alghii k _ mataawi uq _ 
taagken _ mengteghagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uqegh itni _ nagate ma lghii _ paninang _ aghnagh _ qama _ enngaatall _ ngillegte aqe uq _ m aam es t i negh meng _ 
alignagh lghiit _ qanemsug kayug t _ mataawi te ma kangat _ naallghute nghmeng _ ag l aa s aghq aq eg ku f si gu _ 
qama _ aghn am _ ug in a _ pim alghii _ enta _ enraq _ iigna _ aqfa aghte gu _ .

yuug _ . _ nekevgha lghii _ 
tawani _ t aan ang u f tuq _ aghv eng egk at _ yug m _ kinguligh u luku _ 
yuug _ aq el q aq _ pilugug ke lghii _ kaate yaghtugh te ni _ maligte luku _ yug mun _ at al ugh at _ nekevgha lghii mun _ ayuqe luni _ tagi ma lghii _ g g at megh r ug anun _ 
kaa sa mi _ pi ma kanga _ .
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ aghn eq _ at al ugh aq ani _ aghvegh meng _ kaalgugh lghii tgun _

esghagh igate aatnga _ m es ung es ag et _ 
Q am ag tuq _ whaa _ 
aghneq _ esnagh mi _ 
taakut _ esgha _ 
Kiyagh sim alghii k _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ 
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ ig aat i qu m alghii k _ 
itegh yan _ q ate l ghii _ esghagh ma kangat _ pil ug ug lu m _ 
yuug _ aqfa stekagh at _ pi ma lghii _ .
wetku _ enraq _ nuna anun _ napaqutagh mun _ aglagh te yaghqaqe gkufsigu _ temeghte negh yaghqagh u uq _ 
aqnigh lghii m _ aghnagh m _ s am a _ pi ma lghii _ .
Q ate l ghii ng iigh h aam _ ikfiqe pigte uq _ m an aat ng i _ 
temeghte na qaghte ligu _ q iy alghii _ am um akanga _ 
katam _ qay g egh saq en ni _ aghvengekagh t _ angyaleg at _ 
yuug _ aqelqagh _ aghnagh mun _ 
aghnagh _ n us ug luku _ aq s anga _ 
A k m ag t ani _ yug m _ aghneq _ im ii m akanga _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
unaami _ yug m _ tukugh an _ yug ni _ kelgugh luki _ angyagh eng _ kete luku _ mangtag meng _ tag l aam al gh n _ yuug llu _ 
kaat ute te luku _ napaqutagh mun _ yuug _ esnagh mun _ uugte yan _ angyagh eng _ 
yuug _ kelute mun _ esghagh luni _ kete mun _ qiive luni _ angyagh t _ esghagh naqe yagh kete ni _ aviite ut _ teg leg luki _ 
katam _ mesungesag t _ esghagh ma kangi _ el tugh pag u sim alghiit _ 
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ uk ang uq _ 
meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii nkuk _ 
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ q ate l ghii ng iigh h aq _ meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii ngiighhagh nkuk _ im a _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ igagh te iqe ma lghiik _ pim ak angi _ 
Q ate l ghii ng iigh h aq _ qategh lghii _ aqume luni _ .
manaate i _ tugu luki _ managh yagh ma lghii _ 
anglaagh mun _ kaate luni _ manaate i _ ateghte luki _ managh ma lghii _ q i negh s alghii mi _ 
managh ma luku _ manaate i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ 
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ amu ma kangi _ manaate i _ es l at mun _ 
uka nguq _ qiya lghii _ amu ma kanga _ ag l aa sim akanga _ whaten _ 
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ qaygeghte yagh kete ni _ taghnughhagh ghrukutaaghllag _ t ap gh am i m _ 
naqam _ aqsa ghllag a _ ag lagh luni _ 
savig ni _ nusug luku _ aqsa a _ segge yagh kete ni _ 
akmagtagh ni _ tugu luku _ iqallugagh meng _

unaami _ aghneghte lutek _ unug luku _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ qavagh yan _ meteghllug m _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ manaate i _

amu ma kangi _ av ang un ani _

ilangani _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ managh yagh naqe yalghiimi _ managh ta i _ ima _ aviite ut _ 
meteghllug _ aapte yagh kete ni _ q ate l ghii ng iigh h aq _ pi ma kangi _ pen n am _ 
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ tapghagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ it egh y alghii mi _ 
esghaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh neng _ .

unaami _ enraq _ meteghllug _ it gh ull uki _ piyaa ma lghii _ .

nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ un aa mi _ q ate l ghii ng iigh h aq _ 
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ ag l aam alghii _ .

â _ pi ma kanga _ pen n am _ tu ng ang aneng _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ 
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ 
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ n ul iil ek _ 
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ 
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ u p ugh a sim akanga _ iit gh es qu m aan _ 
llaaghanwha _ aga _ aane ma lghii _ n at egh mi _ 
maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ nuug yalghiimi _ atkug a _ aate ma kanga _ 
llangaqa nguq _ atkug a _ at ku g a _ nuuvekagh _ s am a _ 
M e tegh ll uk n u ug umalghii _ .
sangan _ aate zigu _ neng l aghq w aam alghii _ 
sagiqe ste pigte an _ aq el qam i _ 
esleqeaghaghte an _ !

llaaghanwha _ aghn am _ yuuke magh mi _ atkug a _ aqelqagh m _ 
A g l aam alghii _ pi ma kanga _ pi r ugh t ang un ani _ .

kaate yan _ 
Y uuk _ aagken _ pennagh m _ .
unaami _ meteghllug _ piyaa ma lghii _ taagavek _ m ek elghii s t aghh iin aghn eng _ 
mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ 
qesiqun _ kaate aqe uq _ n ul ii pi ni _ k el qell uku _ 
Y uuk _ tukugh an _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ 
asanut _ atkug ni _ unite luku _ nategh mi _ 
ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghiit _ tuun aqegk angi _ 
taaqe luteng _ sikughwaagh _ aane ma lghii _ quy ng i meng _ 
maateqwaaqun _ meteghllug m _ atkug a _ aate luku _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ pim akanga _ , _ â _ aqelqagh _ tag lagh yaghq at _ esgh ap ag k i _ .
U ka _ al iiq ata _ 
esghagh luku _ sikughwaagh _ aq ef tagh aa _ im ii m akanga _ megh meng _ .
I l anga _ aqelqagh mi _ atkug a _ mat- aghte luku _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ n ul ii pig an _ iigh aan eng _ taana _ aqelqagh _ aane ste gu _ il am ak angi _ 
aglagh li _ uy uq lii m _ 
pirughte i te aghte gpenaan _ pi naken _ igh negh an _ n uy ek lii m _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ meteghllug _ 
aglagh ma lghii _ ava ngunani _ t aagken _ at ghii s qu m akanga _ 
taagken _ kenlanga _ qatelghii m _ unite ma kanga _ 
qamagte uq _ y uni _ 
egeghagh mii _ 
yuug _ egeghagh mii _ nukaghagh leg _ . _ 
nuliigh pig a _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ 
nukaghagh a _ taana _ 
angyaghtugh aqe lghii _ yuug _ 
yuug _ angyagh nghmini _ aghvenge aqe lghii _ , _ 
aghvenge nghmini _ nukaghagh ni _ miite i stekaqe kanga _ 
aghvenge nghmini _ ataasigh t _ pilagkagh t _ tuune aqe kangi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ 
elkek _ nuliigh pig ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ quyngigh meng _ â _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ angyagh yata _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh ni _ 
uka _ aliigh kata _ ungipite nakevnga _ pim akanga _ , _ 
aghnagh m _ siighnagh m _ 
ila a _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te luku _ 
enkaam _ uyuqligh m _ taghnughhagh mi _ ila a _ maka a _ 
iiwen _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ ighnegh an _ an ag u um akanga _ ungipaate ma kanga _ uka _ taglagh ni luki _ 
itegh sqe ma kanga _ ighnegh ni _ ak m ag luki _ 
itegh yan _ neghe ste luku _ taagken _ atghii sqe ma kanga _ esnagh mun _ 
angyagh t _ tamlag yalghiimeng _ aghvenge ma lghiit _ 
angyaleg ita _ yug ni _ es n ami _ nukaghagh ni _ aqfa sqellug qu _ yuuk _ tag lagh y alghii mi _ n ul ii pi ni _ esgh aam akanga _ miite i yaghtugh li nguq _ am ig mi _ naq am _ 
Y uuk _ taglagh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ ugi anun _ aqfa ste ni luku _ miite i yaghtigh sqellug qu _ 
I v agh yaq es eng _ m am leg mi _ atghagh naqe unga _ .
utaqa ma kangat _ .
naagu _ utegh q aa sim alghiit _ 
atghagh nghite uq _ ang y atagh qell uni _ 
itagnatun _ yug m _ aqfate ma kanga _ tu l ugh aam alghii _ .
ghhuute ai nguq _ nag aq u um ak angi _ s uq s ugh t alghiit _ 
Enkaam _ taglagh luni _ n all ang akun _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ â _ P ii k s uq _ !
S aaq si n _ atghagh luni _ angyaleg _ ungipaate ma kanga _ 
angyaleg m _ nulighh pig an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ A ng e te qu mun _ ag lagh yug aq sagh tu nga _ whanga _ puughte isaghtugh lakun _ miite i yaghtugh naqe lghii _ . _ â
angegh ma kanga _ T ag i _ 
aghnagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ ag l aan naq am ken _ 
Agh n aq _ aksaqe luni _ esghapag ma kanga _ taglagh lghii _ 
kaate luni _ nutaan _ qineghte yan _ â
tuqute yamigu _ angyaatagh ni _ akmag luki _ avaqutagh ni _ tugu luku _ qimag ma lghii _ 
qaygeghte yami _ uyghag m _ , _ iigh ma lghii _ A aam _ 
siingenllu _ unug kanga _ pi y alghii mi _ 
aghvengekagh t _ utaqa i yagh luteng _ esnagh mi _ utaqakagh eng _ aviite yan _ yuug _ taglagh yalghiimi _ nuliigh pig ni _ 
yuug _ atghagh luni _ yug ni _ es ghagh y alghii mi _ neng l ugh r u ku taa q _ pik a _ 
N eng l ugh llag em _ mamleg mi _ esghagh nghite aat _ yuuk _ 
aviite uq _ gh h uugh llag lu tek _ 
aviite yan _ es n am el ngugh mun _ ayuq luku _ 
aghnagh _ t aghn ugh h agh tu um aan _ apeghiigh yami _ ukig ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ tu u tes luku _ 
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ meghnaali te kete luku _ tulughagh ma lghii _ 
tulughagh te kete luku _ nagaqugh ma kangi _ suqsughtagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ kana _ nalla akun _ al i mi _ il em agh agh saq en ni _ 
pi ma lghiit _ teng taq egk anga _ q ag it _ piiksuq _ tu u tes luku _ 
sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ an uq egh llak _ u ug negh ani _ 
aghnagh m _ akite ma kangi _ uk ig luni _ neng l um in eng _ angetequgh mun _ aglagh yug aqe yagh unga _ pil ug ug meng _ tug um iigh luni _ aglagh langa _ 
Agh n amun _ tea- ai _ uugten _ yug em _ 
Wh anga _ el p ek _ aglagh te naqe amken _ n angll eg y ag ull u ten _ .
aghnagh _ angyagh mun _ 
A pegh ii qu f si _ quneghte lghaaten _ . _ â
taagken _ itagnatun _ suqsughtagh meng _ aghnagh _ nagate ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ kiyagh sim alghiit _ .
aghnagh _ uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ angetequgh u nghite ngughk _ af taq egk angi _ nuna _ 
maaten _ angyagh ke vig ni _ uteghmun _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ aga _ mesungesag t _ 
taagken _ aghnagh _ kelute mun _ 
nenglu ghllag m _ qaye ani _ nekevgha aqe uq _ yuug _ .
T es p am ani _ ghhuu ghllag lutek _ nasagh ni _ .
aghnagh mun _ tag i negh min i _ ayuqe luku _ talligh ni _ .
aghnagh _ taghnughhaghtuumagh an _ aghn aq _ qagi t _ m ek elghii gh h agh meng _ tuute ste luku _ 
naqam _ anuqe _ alpag ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ itagnatun _ uugte aqe uq _ iglegh s ag u sim alghii _ 
yug m _ enraq _ inglu a _ aligh mi _ ilemeaghaghte yagh kete ni _ 
aghnagh _ all aghh iin agh meng _ qagi t _ ig agh tu pig llegh ii meng _ tuute ste luku _ 
tawatestaghhiinaq _ alpag nghaani _ anuqe ghllag _ ing agh qu ull u tek _ yug m _ nasagh ni _ 
wetku _ yuug _ ukig luni _ nenglu mineng _ uka _ atghagh ma lghii _ pilugug meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ ag lagh pen an g _ 
aghnagh mun _ kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ yug m _ pim alghii _ , _ taawa _ pilugug meng _ tagite amtek _ qayughllak _ pilugug si _ 
whanga _ elpek _ aqfa ste aqe amken _ nanglleg yagute luten _ 
pilugug tek _ ag l aam alghii _ 
apeghiigh kufsi _ taglagh ghhaakut _ ii y aa kun _ q i negh s alghii mi _ 
llaaghanwha _ pilugug nghmeng _ qu u p negh h aq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu anun _ p ell ug tu um agh mi _ 
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ es qam avek _ 
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh aqe lghii _ uu llgh agh sim alghii _ aghnagh m _ 
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ angli uq _ aghnagh m _ 
ellmi neng _ igleghte yaaghte uq _ ne ke v aq uq _ 
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aag nghmini _ ! _ aviite aqe lghii _ 
tespamani _ aghneghte aqe lghii _ nenglu squghhagh mi _ tug ul uk ek _ 
Taagken _ tagi nghmini _ igaghtu pigte lghii meng _ pilugug luni _ taa qu m alghii _ 
En r aq _ tagtala ani _ aghnagh _ ighni ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ il anga _ 
taana llu _ angli ma lghii _ qenwat _ iin gh utaq eg ke k _ 
taana llu _ uyuqligh _ ellmi neng _ igleghte yagute ma lghii _ s um egh tagh agh y alghii mi _ 
anengagh ke te lghiik _ il anga _ aghneghte aqe lghiik _ nenglu ngiighhagh mi _ â
tagi negh megteni _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ pilugug lutek _ aw er gh am _ am ii r aa _ 
tagi negh megteni _ legan _ neghe gpenatek _

maaten _ ilangani _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ 
enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh lakun _ s ay u w agh taq aa _ yuuk _ 
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ aghn aq s a _

aghnagh _ agigte yalghiimi _ sama _ egeghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ enkaam _ mengteghagh _ nayugh kuvinghagh ani _ masisu _

sama _ pi ma lghiit _ k el ut ang ani _ .

yug m _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ .

taakut _ quungvagh m _ quyilleg i _ .

yuug _ enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _

maaten _ ilangani _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ tusaqe i nagh gpenani _ nulighh a _ akmagutagh ngllagh ma lghii _ at egh luni _ s ug er ng eng it gun _ 
taaqe yakek _ akmagutagh k _ m es iigh qugh taa luki _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ akuqagh luku _ kanaghte luku _ tesqamavek _ 
taagken _ yuuk _ akmagutagh k _ at egh luni _ kete ma kek _ , _ 
anuqe m _ akmagutagh k _ s aam _ y egh r at _ natmun _ . _ 
megh m _ itegh gpenakek _ al egh qu umalghii _ qapragsagh ke gni _ up- llghite aghte yagh ke gni _ akmagutagh k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ akmagutagh m _ 
tagtalmi _ tepe ma kanga _ esnagh kun _ un a _ 
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ akmagutagh m _ allungag a _ vuveghte qugh yagh kete ni _ pii g ugh luku _ es l at mun _ 
taagken _ aane yalghiimi _ tepe ma kanga _ tapghaghte lakun _ unguv agh y alghii mi _ 
qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh luni _ tapghagh m _ qaye anun _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ yuug _ qam qagh simak angi _ 
yug m _ kaate luku _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
Enkaam _ q at egh y iigh aghh aam _ un ul qu si q _ kii _ qu ul mun _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nani _ 
I i w en _ sughug u unga _ elpenun _ aghv igh aq uq _ ken l eng akun _ 
yug m _ s ag i qu sim akanga _ unite ma kanga _ 
mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
legan _ nukeggnagh ghllagu uq _ m eng tegh aq _ 
aapte yaqegka _ q at egh y iigh aghh aam _ sughug u uq _ megh qun _ ll ik es taa m akanga _ 
Q am ang uq _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ pim akanga _ 
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ â
itegh luni _ nanugh ita _ mesiigh anun _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ u z i mun _ 
melqugh ni _ mesiighqe ghllag yamigu _ ungavig neng _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ ll igh um a kut _ kavirrakegtagh tgun _ 
iwerngaqun _ megh llag u uq _ mesiighqe ughtagh u luki _ â
unaami _ yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ qefliqe ma lghii _ pim alghii _ , _ â _ P iiq sagh am ken _ , _ ungavig mta _ ! _ seghleghu ut _ 
ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ enankinam _ n aten _ yeghrat _ aan v ig il nguq _ .
Q at egh y iigh aghh aam _ ll iy aq en ni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ ag a _ k al ev umalghii _ pi yagh amken ta _ 
M egh mun _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ una _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ 
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ k al ev umalghii _ unguvagh yalghiimi _ 
masingka _ .
iqug a _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mi _ 
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ unug llegh ke sigh _ mengteghagh _ qule mun _ 
iiwen _ ap al ek _ qukaa neng _ aghvigh aqe uq _ kenle akun _ 
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ nun al g ut ang it a _ 
qenwat llu _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ ghhatagh aghte ma kanga _ .
ghhatagh aghte yamigu _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ atghagh te ma kanga _ megh m _ 
taagken _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ megh kun _ 
qama nguq _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ tag itu g ugh u simak angi _ .
enta _ qiigh negh ke a _ pi yaq es eng _ av ii tuq _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ al ing luteng _ qineghte yalghiimi _ uzimun _ megh ghllag _ esghagh aa _ aghn agh aghh aam _ 
ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
uzimun _ meghllag u uq _ m ii w en _ siv um eg g ni _ 
iiwen _ aghnagh _ nepiigh aqe uq _ qakma nguq _ av ii tuq _ pi ma lghii _ 
yug m _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ naten _ pi ligu _ aanvig ite ngughk _ av ii sim alghiit _ 
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ lli yagh kete ni _ mengteghagh _ aga _ kaleve ma lghii _ 
megh mun _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ makugte naqe yagh uq _ q av aam alghii _ 
aghtugh ma lghii _ i w em g a _ 
ellnga llu _ mengteghagh mun _ maligte te luni _ kaleve ma lghii _ nun al g utk en ghi l kaa nga _ 
qamagte uq _ aghn agh aghh aq _ 
aghnaghaghhagh _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ 
En taqun _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma uq _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ 
I f l ang w iiq l unga _ apa leg _ enkaam _ nengyugh llgagh _ wh ani _ 
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ 
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ 
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ 
taagken _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ neng l unga _ 
tespagani _ unatagh ma luki _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ma kangi _ quy ng i meng _

taagken _ aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ 
ima _ aviite uq _ negh aq i _ 
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghagh t _ 
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh anun _ 
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila i _ tag i negh min i _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ pil ak ameng _ 
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ iv agh yagh luku _ 
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ , _ 
qavaa ma luku _ Agh y uq egh ng aagh m aq un _ taghsagh ma kanga _ ag lagh l anga _ 
taghtugh yalghiimi _ ap an ka _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kau nga _ 
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ â _ Wh aa _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ 
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ tagh tugh n aanghi tu nga _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ p ell agh yug ll equ ten _ 
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ a tuq aq aat _ .
R ep all _ ii y ng iq agh t iigh um aat _ .
qamavek _ itegh ltung _ q av aghn aq utk aq uk _ . _ 
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ el p ek _ 
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ 
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ apegh tugh naq am ken _ mangtag meng _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ . _

unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ whani _

aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ aghn am _ 
qemall _ elpek _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ 
apa gpek _ sama _ utegh s an _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ ag a _ 
repall _ iye igh qagh ta iigh ma ut _ am ig em _

aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ whang ang unga _ 
En m i s _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ vuvalla mi _ egmightagh tate kumeng _ 
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ ! _ â
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ 
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ iq egh t iigh luteng _ .
El tugh agh t eng _ negh es luku _ liite unga _ .
U naa mi _ legan _ atghagh luten _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ aghul agh qu l g ut ang it a _ 
ahaam _ pilugug i _ ap anga _

llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ v u v all am alghii _ 
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ eg m iigh t ataa sim alghiit _ 
atghagh ma lghiik _ s ung at _

aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _

qama _ pi ma lghiik _ s ugh uk am _ aghn al q w aa ghi t _ kaay _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ Agh nagh aq r aag g aq _ ag ghi yug ne pi w aa _

enmis _ sukate luku _ s ag uy ak _ tug ul uk ek _ ilag aam alghii _ 
I l ag aam al uku _ kaay _ eltughagh ut _ tea- uq _ .

itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ q ag it _ iqeghtiigh luteng _ n at egh mi _ 
eltughagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ tu gu lluni _

kimaawi ta ii naqe uq _ ila itneng _

uglagh ghllag uq _ .

llaaghanwha _ amu a llu _ negh ma lghii _ ? _ 
A m aa _ kepsugh lutek _ negh lutek _ tapghagh m _ tuq un n ay uk ang at ni _ uusneghwaagh mun _

enkaam _ amu a _ taghsagh ma ke aanga _ q av aghn aq s ami _

uusneghwaagh mun _ maye ii aqe ut _ .
whanga _ qimag naqe unga _ en ngaatall _ 
elpek _ sa aqe ziin _ q ag egh qugh l uk ek _ un i sim akanga _

naqam _ papeg a _

tuqute naqe aatnga _ .

sangami _ papeg ka _ aqnigh aqa _ .

atghagh nghmini _ gaagh luni _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ .
aghnagh aq _ quyngigh mun _ aghulaqe nghmini _ quyngighqwaagh te kete luku _ ulape aqe lghii _ tu ng ang an il nguut _

uyughagh ni _ qelegh aqe yagh kanga _ waran _ t aagken _ aane aghte aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .

maaten _ ilangani _ aghn agh aq _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
miite ta lgigh a _ seghleghu lghiiten _ kay al q aqegk angi _

saama _ elpek _ langetaq _ mengteghagh igh te naqe uten _ .

A q el q aq _ yeqay _ whanga _ gaagh langa _ .
naa an _ pi ma kanga _ siv ung ani _ k il g aa qu l ghii nun _ imukun _ sangavek _ gaagh yug ghllag ziin _ aghn agh aq _ .
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ q ev uu ll igh aam alghii _ .
taana _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh igate yagh lghii _ nagh ugh qu um akanga _ 
naange a _ naa y gh amun _ kaa taq uq _ 
aghnagh aq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ tunughtu llegh inagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ siv ul iq luku _ 
ugute yami _ angayuqagh ni _ 
aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ negh lutek _ taaqe yamek _ ungipamsug te ma lghiik _ tu ku ni _ 
tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ uyguma lgute kete na luku _ q ev uu lluni _ k il g aa qu umalghii _ 
aqelqagh an _ pi aqe kanga _ utegh mun _ es ghagh y alghii mi _ aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ wetku _ tawani _ mat- aghte naagh unga _ k il g aa qu umalghii _ .

ellnga llu _ aghnagh u lghii _ , _

taagken _ kilgaaqu uute ma lghiit _ .

aqelqagh _ aghnagh aq _ igleghte ma lghii _ tugh um gh a sim alghiit _ .

naayghagh _ ak i simak angi _ , _ â _ 
taakwna _ kilgaaqu te lghii _ aghnaghagh m _ naghughte qugh ma kanga _ pin em ta _

whaa _ mengteghagh t _ aq el q aat _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _

kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ m ataa w it aat _ nunaagh m _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ yug a _ nunaagh m _ .
A q el q aghn ii negh meng _ akite ma kanga _ ag lagh tu u sim alghiit _ .
tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ 
I tegh y an _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ q ev uu ll uku _ u p ugh a sim akanga _ 
sukate ghllag pigte uq _ taa q s ameng _ 
kitum _ inglu ke naanghite a _ , _ 
M at aghh n aanghi tu nga _ naayghagh _ 
tagimun _ unite ghllag aanga _ yug usi q a _ es ghagh lleq an n ate tu l nga _ 
kilgaaqu te tke aq _ kaat quute te yan _ qamagte luni _ p iiq egk anga _ enraq _ tughumgha tete na aqe ma lghiit _ Q av aghn i pig taa nga _ 
taagken _ yug t _ mat- aghte luteng _ 
aqelqagh _ ketfagh yan _ atkugtuumagh mi _ pi ma kangat _ tawaten _ 
U naa mi _ akite ma kangi _ pim akanga _ , _ whangkuta _ ima _ .
wetku _ alghigh luku _ 
aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ 
enngaatall _ tawani _ mataghte lleqe unga _ 
laagh an wha _ aghn agh aq _ s um egh tagh agh aq elghii _ tea- ma kut _ yug t _ M ii w en _ i nga _ 
tughumgha ma kangat _ yug t _ aqelqagh at _ atkugtugh ma ghngaan _ , _

ila i _ tunuvagh nghata _ ila ita _ atg- ghhagh ke luku _ mataawi te aat _ iqute nghmeng _ siv ugh tugh aq ef t ii _

unaami _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ uy ugh ani _ ii s qagh m il ek _ aglagh naqe unga _ es ghagh yaq en ni _

utaqa nakevnga _ y ul gu te v nun _ . _ 
aghulaqe ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ af t aatk ell uku _

avangite unga _
